text: margaery It would be my pleasure. It took me weeks to learn my way around the camp. Twice I walked in on officers in stages of undress. And the moment I learn which tent is mine, we're on the move again.

title: Garden of Bones
Name: petyr
text: petyr Your tent"? Not "Our tent"? The king snores, perhaps? Or simply prefers solitude? Pressures of command, no doubt. Four kings vying for the throne.

title: Garden of Bones
Name: margaery
text: margaery I am not tutored in warfare, but basic arithmetic favors the side with the greater numbers.

title: Garden of Bones
Name: petyr
text: petyr If war were arithmetic, the mathematicians would rule the world. I did notice your brother entering His Grace's tent just now.

title: Garden of Bones
Name: margaery
text: margaery The place of a Kingsguard is by the king's side.

title: Garden of Bones
Name: petyr
text: petyr And on the night of your wedding, who was by the king's side then?

title: Garden of Bones
Name: margaery
text: margaery You seem quite interested in our marriage.

title: Garden of Bones
Name: petyr
text: petyr Your marriage is quite interesting. Not only to me, but to the realm. The marriage of a wealthy girl always breeds interest, if nothing else.

title: Garden of Bones
Name: margaery
text: margaery You've never married, have you?

title: Garden of Bones
Name: petyr
text: petyr I've been unlucky in my affections, sadly.

title: Garden of Bones
Name: margaery
text: margaery That is sad. Though perhaps it's for the best. The whole notion of marriage seems to confuse you, so allow me to explain. My husband is my king, and my king is my husband. Here is your tent, Lord Baelish. Good night.

title: Garden of Bones
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys This isn't your horse.

title: Garden of Bones
Name: kovarro
text: kovarro It was given to me by the Thirteen. The Elders of Qarth.

title: Garden of Bones
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys Qarth?

title: Garden of Bones
Name: kovarro
text: kovarro Three days to the east, on the sea.

title: Garden of Bones
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys Will they let us in?

title: Garden of Bones
Name: kovarro
text: kovarro They said they would be honored to receive the Mother of Dragons.

title: Garden of Bones
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys What do you know of this place?

title: Garden of Bones
Name: jorah
text: jorah Only that the desert around their walls is called the Garden of Bones. Every time the Qartheen shut their gates on a traveler, the garden grows.

title: Garden of Bones
Name: man
text: man Go on!

title: Garden of Bones
Name: man
text: man You, keep moving!

title: Garden of Bones
Name: man
text: man Bring her about!

title: Garden of Bones
Name: hot
text: hot What kind of fire melts stone?

title: Garden of Bones
Name: arya
text: arya Dragonfire.

title: Garden of Bones
Name: hot
text: hot There's dragons here?

title: Garden of Bones
Name: gendry
text: gendry No, all the dragons are dead.

title: Garden of Bones
Name: hot
text: hot What's that smell?

title: Garden of Bones
Name: arya
text: arya Dead people.

title: Garden of Bones
Name: soldier
text: soldier Move.

title: Garden of Bones
Name: man
text: man Please, please, no, no! No.

title: Garden of Bones
Name: woman
text: woman He's dead. He was my son. My sister was three days ago. My husband, the day before that.

title: Garden of Bones
Name: gendry
text: gendry They take someone every day?

title: Garden of Bones
Name: arya
text: arya Does anyone live?

title: Garden of Bones
Name: arya
text: arya Joffrey. Cersei. llyn Payne. The Hound. Joffrey. Cersei. llyn Payne. The Hound. Joffrey. Cersei. llyn Payne. The Hound.

title: Garden of Bones
Name: catelyn
text: catelyn How dare you?

title: Garden of Bones
Name: petyr
text: petyr You may have heard false reports.

title: Garden of Bones
Name: catelyn
text: catelyn You betrayed Ned.

title: Garden of Bones
Name: petyr
text: petyr Betrayed? I wanted him to serve as Protector of the Realm. I begged him to seize the moment.

title: Garden of Bones
Name: catelyn
text: catelyn I trusted you. My husband trusted you. And you repaid our faith with treachery.

title: Garden of Bones
Name: petyr
text: petyr No, my lady.

title: Garden of Bones
Name: catelyn
text: catelyn Get out!

title: Garden of Bones
Name: petyr
text: petyr Cat, I've I've loved you since I was a boy. It seems to me that fate has given us this chance

title: Garden of Bones
Name: catelyn
text: catelyn Have you lost your mind? Get out!

title: Garden of Bones
Name: petyr
text: petyr Do you want to see your girls again? Sansa, more beautiful than ever? And Arya, just as wild as ever?

title: Garden of Bones
Name: catelyn
text: catelyn You have Arya, too?

title: Garden of Bones
Name: petyr
text: petyr Both girls are healthy and safe. For now. But you know the Queen and you know Joffrey. I fear for their longevity if they remain in the capital.

title: Garden of Bones
Name: catelyn
text: catelyn What do you want?

title: Garden of Bones
Name: petyr
text: petyr The Lannisters will trade your daughters for the Kingslayer.

title: Garden of Bones
Name: catelyn
text: catelyn Of course they will. Jaime Lannister for two girls? Robb will never agree to those terms.

title: Garden of Bones
Name: petyr
text: petyr I'm not bringing these terms to him. I'm bringing them to you.

title: Garden of Bones
Name: catelyn
text: catelyn You think I keep secrets from my son?

title: Garden of Bones
Name: petyr
text: petyr Robb has surprised them all with his skills in battle, but he's not a mother. Consider it, Cat. You may not get another chance. I've brought you a gift.

title: Garden of Bones
Name: catelyn
text: catelyn I don't want your gifts. A token of Tyrion Lannister's goodwill. He wants you to understand that this exchange of prisoners is offered in good faith.

title: Garden of Bones
Name: catelyn
text: catelyn Good faith?

title: Garden of Bones
Name: catelyn
text: catelyn What's this?

title: Garden of Bones
Name: petyr
text: petyr Your husband was an honorable man. He should rest beside his family in the crypts beneath Winterfell. You may not believe

title: Garden of Bones
Name: catelyn
text: catelyn Get out.

title: Garden of Bones
Name: man
text: man Get up, you dogs!

title: Garden of Bones
Name: hot
text: hot That's him, the one who picks.

title: Garden of Bones
Name: arya
text: arya The Mountain. What are you doing?

title: Garden of Bones
Name: hot
text: hot He told me he stares at him every day. That's why he doesn't get picked.

title: Garden of Bones
Name: mountain
text: mountain You.

title: Garden of Bones
Name: soldier
text: soldier Move, boy! Move!

title: Garden of Bones
Name: tickler
text: tickler Is there gold and silver in the village?

title: Garden of Bones
Name: prisoner
text: prisoner I don't know.

title: Garden of Bones
Name: tickler
text: tickler Gems?

title: Garden of Bones
Name: prisoner
text: prisoner I didn't see any.

title: Garden of Bones
Name: tickler
text: tickler Where is the Brotherhood?

title: Garden of Bones
Name: prisoner
text: prisoner I don't know. Please.

title: Garden of Bones
Name: tickler
text: tickler Which of the villagers aided them?

title: Garden of Bones
Name: tickler
text: tickler Who?

title: Garden of Bones
Name: prisoner
text: prisoner I-

title: Garden of Bones
Name: prisoner
text: prisoner I never saw. Please. Please, stop. Please, it's starting to-

title: Garden of Bones
Name: prisoner
text: prisoner I didn't see anyone help him. Take it off! Take it off!

title: Garden of Bones
Name: tickler
text: tickler Who helped him?

title: Garden of Bones
Name: prisoner
text: prisoner Ganes, the butcher, and his son.

title: Garden of Bones
Name: tickler
text: tickler That's better. You've been very helpful.

title: Garden of Bones
Name: prisoner
text: prisoner No, stop, please! What are you doing? Please, stop! Please, stop!

title: Garden of Bones
Name: prisoner
text: prisoner No! No! I told you everything! No! No!

title: Garden of Bones
Name: arya
text: arya Joffrey. Cersei. llyn Payne. The Hound.

title: Garden of Bones
Name: woman
text: woman Please, Polliver. Some food. Just a crust of bread.

title: Garden of Bones
Name: arya
text: arya Polliver. The Mountain.

title: Garden of Bones
Name: stannis
text: stannis Lady Stark, I had not thought to find you in the Stormlands.

title: Garden of Bones
Name: catelyn
text: catelyn I had not thought to be here, Lord Stannis.

title: Garden of Bones
Name: renly
text: renly Can that truly be you?

title: Garden of Bones
Name: stannis
text: stannis Who else might it be?

title: Garden of Bones
Name: renly
text: renly When I saw your standard, I couldn't be sure. Whose banner is that?

title: Garden of Bones
Name: stannis
text: stannis My own.

title: Garden of Bones
Name: renly
text: renly I suppose if we used the same one, the battle would be terribly confusing. Why is your stag on fire?

title: Garden of Bones
Name: melisandre
text: melisandre The king has taken for his sigil the fiery heart of the Lord of Light.

title: Garden of Bones
Name: renly
text: renly Ah, you must be this fire priestess we hear so much about. Mmm, brother, now I understand why you found religion in your old age.

title: Garden of Bones
Name: stannis
text: stannis Watch yourself, Renly.

title: Garden of Bones
Name: renly
text: renly No, no, I'm relieved. I never really believed you were a fanatic. Charmless, rigid, a bore, yes, but not a godly man.

title: Garden of Bones
Name: melisandre
text: melisandre You should kneel before your brother. He's the Lordo s chosen, born amidst salt and smoke.

title: Garden of Bones
Name: renly
text: renly Born amidst salt and smoke? Is he a ham?

title: Garden of Bones
Name: stannis
text: stannis That's twice I've warned you.

title: Garden of Bones
Name: catelyn
text: catelyn Listen to yourselves. If you were sons of mine, I would knock your heads together and lock you in a bedchamber until you remembered that you were brothers.

title: Garden of Bones
Name: stannis
text: stannis It is strange to find you beside my brother, Lady Stark. Your husband was a supporter of my claim. Lord Eddardo s integrity cost him his head. And you sit beside this pretender and chastise me.

title: Garden of Bones
Name: catelyn
text: catelyn We share a common enemy.

title: Garden of Bones
Name: stannis
text: stannis The Iron Throne is mine by right. All those that deny that are my foes.

title: Garden of Bones
Name: renly
text: renly The whole realm denies it, from Dorne to the Wall. Old men deny it with their death rattle and unborn children deny it in their mother's wombs. No one wants you for their king. You never wanted any friends, brother. But a man without friends is a man without power.

title: Garden of Bones
Name: stannis
text: stannis For the sake of the mother who bore us, I will give you this one night to reconsider. Strike your banners, come to me before dawn, and I will grant you your old seat in the Council. I'll even name you my heir until a son is born to me. Otherwise I shall destroy you.

title: Garden of Bones
Name: renly
text: renly Look across those fields, brother. Can you see all those banners?

title: Garden of Bones
Name: stannis
text: stannis You think a few bolts of cloth will make you king?

title: Garden of Bones
Name: renly
text: renly No. The men holding those bolts of cloth will make me king.

title: Garden of Bones
Name: stannis
text: stannis We shall see, Renly. Come the dawn, we shall see.

title: Garden of Bones
Name: melisandre
text: melisandre Look to your sins, Lord Renly. The night is dark and full of terrors.

title: Garden of Bones
Name: renly
text: renly Would you believe I loved him once?

title: Garden of Bones
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys I thought we were welcome.

title: Garden of Bones
Name: jorah
text: jorah If you heard a Dothraki horde was approaching your city, you might do the same, Khaleesi.

title: Garden of Bones
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys Horde?

title: Garden of Bones
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys My name is Daenerys-

title: Garden of Bones
Name: spice
text: spice Daenerys Stormborn of the house Targaryen.

title: Garden of Bones
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys You know me, my lord?

title: Garden of Bones
Name: spice
text: spice Only by reputation, Khaleesi. And I'm no lord, merely a humble merchant. They call you the Mother of Dragons.

title: Garden of Bones
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys And what should I call you?

title: Garden of Bones
Name: spice
text: spice Oh, my name is quite long and quite impossible for foreigners to pronounce. I am simply a trader of spices. But we are the Thirteen, charged with the governance and protection of Qarth, the greatest city that ever was or will be.

title: Garden of Bones
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys The beauty of Quarth is legendary-

title: Garden of Bones
Name: spice
text: spice KING Qarth.

title: Garden of Bones
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys Qarth.

title: Garden of Bones
Name: spice
text: spice Might we see the dragons?

title: Garden of Bones
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys My friend, we have traveled very far. We have no food, no water. Once I see my people fed, I would be honored

title: Garden of Bones
Name: spice
text: spice Forgive me, Mother of Dragons, but no man alive has seen a living dragon. Some of my more skeptical friends refuse to believe your children even exist. All we ask is the chance to see for ourselves.

title: Garden of Bones
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys I am not a liar.

title: Garden of Bones
Name: spice
text: spice Oh, I don't think you are. But as I've never met you before, my opinion on the matter is of limited value.

title: Garden of Bones
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys Where I come from, guests are treated with respect, not insulted at the gates.

title: Garden of Bones
Name: spice
text: spice Then perhaps you should return to where you come from. We wish you well.

title: Garden of Bones
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys What are you doing? You promised to receive me.

title: Garden of Bones
Name: spice
text: spice We have received you. Here we are, and here you are.

title: Garden of Bones
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys If you do not let us in, all of us will die.

title: Garden of Bones
Name: spice
text: spice Which we shall deeply regret. But Qarth did not become the greatest city that ever was or will be by letting Dothraki savages through its gates.

title: Garden of Bones
Name: jorah
text: jorah Khaleesi, please be careful.

title: Garden of Bones
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys Thirteen! When my dragons are grown, we will take back what was stolen from me and destroy those who have wronged me. We will lay waste to armies and burn cities to the ground. Turn us away and we will burn you first.

title: Garden of Bones
Name: spice
text: spice Ah. You are a true Targaryen. Only, as you said a moment ago, if we don't let you into the city, you will all die. And so-

title: Garden of Bones
Name: xaro
text: xaro Retreating in fear from a little girl is unbecoming of the greatest city that ever was or will be.

title: Garden of Bones
Name: spice
text: spice The discussion is over, Xaro Xhoan Daxos. The Thirteen have spoken.

title: Garden of Bones
Name: xaro
text: xaro I am one of the Thirteen, and I am still speaking.

title: Garden of Bones
Name: spice
text: spice The girl threatens to burn our city to the ground and you would invite her in for a cup of wine? She is the Mother of Dragons.

title: Garden of Bones
Name: xaro
text: xaro Do you expect her to watch her people starve without breathing fire? I believe we can allow a few Dothraki through our gates without dooming our city. After all, here I am, a savage from the Summer Isles, and Qarth still stands.

title: Garden of Bones
Name: spice
text: spice Our decision is final.

title: Garden of Bones
Name: xaro
text: xaro Very well. I invoke soumai.

title: Garden of Bones
Name: xaro
text: xaro I will vouch for her, her people, and her dragons, in accordance with the law.

title: Garden of Bones
Name: spice
text: spice Be it on your head.

title: Garden of Bones
Name: xaro
text: xaro Welcome to Qarth, my lady.

title: Garden of Bones
Name: tickler
text: tickler Is there gold or silver in the village?

title: Garden of Bones
Name: gendry
text: gendry I'm not from the village.

title: Garden of Bones
Name: gendry
text: gendry I don't know what that is.

title: Garden of Bones
Name: man
text: man You two. Take Lord Lannister's things to his quarters.

title: Garden of Bones
Name: tywin
text: tywin What's this?

title: Garden of Bones
Name: mountain
text: mountain We weren't expecting you till tomorrow, Lord Tywin.

title: Garden of Bones
Name: tywin
text: tywin Evidently not. Why are these prisoners not in their cells?

title: Garden of Bones
Name: mountain
text: mountain Cells are overflowing, my lord.

title: Garden of Bones
Name: polliver
text: polliver This lot won't be here long. Don't need no permanent place. After we interrogate 'em, we usually just-

title: Garden of Bones
Name: tywin
text: tywin Are we so well-manned that we can afford to discard able young bodies and skilled laborers?

title: Garden of Bones
Name: tywin
text: tywin You, do you have a trade?

title: Garden of Bones
Name: gendry
text: gendry Smith, my lord.

title: Garden of Bones
Name: polliver
text: polliver What are you looking at? Kneel! Kneel or I'll carve your lungs out, boy.

title: Garden of Bones
Name: tywin
text: tywin He'll do no such thing. This one's a girl, you idiot, dressed as a boy. Why?

title: Garden of Bones
Name: arya
text: arya Safer to travel, my lord.

title: Garden of Bones
Name: tywin
text: tywin Smart. More than I can say for this lot. Get these prisoners to work. Bring the girl. I need a new cupbearer.

title: Garden of Bones
Name: mountain
text: mountain My lord.

title: Garden of Bones
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion Your visits are too few, cousin.

title: Garden of Bones
Name: lancel
text: lancel Her Grace, the Queen Regent, commands you to release Grand Maester Pycelle. Here's your warrant.

title: Garden of Bones
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion So it is. Will you take a cup with me? I find that mulled wine helps me sleep.

title: Garden of Bones
Name: lancel
text: lancel I am here at Her Grace's behest, not to drink with you, Imp.

title: Garden of Bones
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion If my sister was so concerned for Pycelle, I would have thought she'd come herself. Instead she sends you. What am I to make of that?

title: Garden of Bones
Name: lancel
text: lancel I don't care what you make of it, so long as you release your prisoner immediately.

title: Garden of Bones
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion And you've received these instructions directly from Cersei?

title: Garden of Bones
Name: lancel
text: lancel As I said several times.

title: Garden of Bones
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion And you've waited this long to deliver the information?

title: Garden of Bones
Name: lancel
text: lancel When the Queen Regent gives me a command, I carry it out without delay.

title: Garden of Bones
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion Cersei must have great trust in you, allowing you into her chamber during the hour of the wolf.

title: Garden of Bones
Name: lancel
text: lancel The Queen Regent has a great many responsibilities. She often works from dusk till dawn.

title: Garden of Bones
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion She must be very glad to have you helping her from dusk till dawn.

title: Garden of Bones
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion Ah. Lavender oil. She always loved lavender oil, even as a girl.

title: Garden of Bones
Name: lancel
text: lancel I am a knight!

title: Garden of Bones
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion An anointed knight, yes. Tell me, did Cersei have you knighted before or after she took you into her bed? What? Nothing to say? No more warnings for me, ser?

title: Garden of Bones
Name: lancel
text: lancel You will withdraw these filthy accusations.

title: Garden of Bones
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion Have you ever given any thought to what King Joffrey will have to say when he finds out you've been bedding his mother?

title: Garden of Bones
Name: lancel
text: lancel It's not my fault!

title: Garden of Bones
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion Did she take you against your will? Can you not defend yourself, knight?

title: Garden of Bones
Name: lancel
text: lancel Your own father, Lord Tywin, when I was named the King's squire, he told me to obey her in everything.

title: Garden of Bones
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion Did he tell you to fuck her, too?

title: Garden of Bones
Name: lancel
text: lancel I only meant I did as I was bid.

title: Garden of Bones
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion Hated every moment of it, is that what you'll have me believe? A high place in court, a knighthood, my sister's legs spreading open for you at night. Oh, yes, it must have been terrible. Wait here. His Grace will want to hear this.

title: Garden of Bones
Name: lancel
text: lancel Mercy! Mercy, my lord! I beg you.

title: Garden of Bones
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion Save it for Joffrey. He loves a good grovel.

title: Garden of Bones
Name: lancel
text: lancel My lord, it was your sister's bidding, the Queen. I'll leave the city at once, I swear.

title: Garden of Bones
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion No, I think not.

title: Garden of Bones
Name: lancel
text: lancel My lord?

title: Garden of Bones
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion You heard me. My father told you to obey my sister. Obey her. Stay close to her side. Keep her trust. Pleasure her whenever she requires. No one ever need know, as long as you keep faith with me. I want to know what Cersei is doing, where she goes, who she sees, what they talk of, everything. And you will tell me.

title: Garden of Bones
Name: lancel
text: lancel Yes, my lord, I will. I swear it, as you command.

title: Garden of Bones
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion Oh, rise, rise. Let us drink to our understanding. Oh, you don't have a cup. Oh, well. Smile, cousin. My sister is a beautiful woman, and it's all for the good of the realm. Go back and tell her that I beg her forgiveness, that I want no more conflict between us and that, henceforth, I shall do nothing without her consent.

title: Garden of Bones
Name: lancel
text: lancel But her demands?

title: Garden of Bones
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion Oh, I'll give her Pycelle.

title: Garden of Bones
Name: lancel
text: lancel You will?

title: Garden of Bones
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion Yes, I'll release him in the morning. Cersei can keep him as a pet, if she wants, but I will not have him on the Council. I could swear that I had not harmed a single hair on his head, but that would not, strictly speaking, be true. Stay within one table length.

title: Garden of Bones
Name: davos
text: davos Your Grace.

title: Garden of Bones
Name: stannis
text: stannis Do your knuckle bones bring you luck?

title: Garden of Bones
Name: davos
text: davos Well, life's been good since you hacked them off, Your Grace. And it's four less fingernails to clean.

title: Garden of Bones
Name: stannis
text: stannis Fewer.

title: Garden of Bones
Name: davos
text: davos Pardon?

title: Garden of Bones
Name: stannis
text: stannis Four fewer fingernails to clean. Never understood why you had to wear them.

title: Garden of Bones
Name: davos
text: davos It reminds me of where I come from and where I am now. It reminds me of your justice. It was an honest punishment and you were good with the cleaver.

title: Garden of Bones
Name: stannis
text: stannis You were a hero and a smuggler. A good act does not wash out the bad, nor a bad the good.

title: Garden of Bones
Name: davos
text: davos A lesson I've tried to teach my son.

title: Garden of Bones
Name: stannis
text: stannis Does he listen?

title: Garden of Bones
Name: davos
text: davos To me? Gods, no. But if your Red Woman told him to leap from the crow's nest

title: Garden of Bones
Name: stannis
text: stannis She has a name. I trust you've not forgotten your smuggler's tricks.

title: Garden of Bones
Name: davos
text: davos I've lived within the law for seventeen-

title: Garden of Bones
Name: stannis
text: stannis I want you to be a smuggler this time.

title: Garden of Bones
Name: davos
text: davos Any shore, any night. What am I bringing ashore?

title: Garden of Bones
Name: stannis
text: stannis The Red Woman. No one must know what you do and we'll not speak of this again.

title: Garden of Bones
Name: davos
text: davos I am true to Your Grace and always will be, but surely there are other ways, cleaner ways.

title: Garden of Bones
Name: stannis
text: stannis Cleaner ways don't win wars.

title: Garden of Bones
Name: melisandre
text: melisandre Are you afraid, Onion Knight?

title: Garden of Bones
Name: davos
text: davos Someone once told me the night is dark and full of terrors.

title: Garden of Bones
Name: melisandre
text: melisandre You've carried more unpleasant cargo in your time. Are you a good man, Ser Davos Seaworth?

title: Garden of Bones
Name: davos
text: davos I'd say my parts are mixed, my lady, good and bad.

title: Garden of Bones
Name: melisandre
text: melisandre If half an onion is black with rot, it's a rotten onion. A man is good or he is evil.

title: Garden of Bones
Name: davos
text: davos And which are you?

title: Garden of Bones
Name: melisandre
text: melisandre Oh, good. I'm a knight myself, of sorts, a champion of light and life.

title: Garden of Bones
Name: davos
text: davos Well, that must be very nice for you.

title: Garden of Bones
Name: melisandre
text: melisandre Do you love your wife?

title: Garden of Bones
Name: davos
text: davos I do.

title: Garden of Bones
Name: melisandre
text: melisandre Yet you have known other women.

title: Garden of Bones
Name: davos
text: davos Don't talk about my wife.

title: Garden of Bones
Name: melisandre
text: melisandre I'm not. I'm talking about other women. Like me, Ser Davos. You want me. You want to see what's beneath this robe.

title: Garden of Bones
Name: melisandre
text: melisandre And you will.

title: Garden of Bones
Name: davos
text: davos Strange that this Lord of Light asks you to work in the shadows.

title: Garden of Bones
Name: melisandre
text: melisandre Shadows cannot live in the dark, Ser Davos. They are servants of light, the children of fire. And the brighter the flame, the darker they are.

title: Garden of Bones
Name: davos
text: davos These weren't here before. They've barred the passage.

title: Garden of Bones
Name: melisandre
text: melisandre They can't bar our passage.

title: Garden of Bones
Name: davos
text: davos Gods protect us.

title: Garden of Bones
Name: melisandre
text: melisandre There's only one god, Ser Davos, and he only protects those who serve him.

title: The Ghost of Harrenhal
Name: renly
text: renly You swear it?

title: The Ghost of Harrenhal
Name: catelyn
text: catelyn By the mother. My son has no interest in the Iron Throne.

title: The Ghost of Harrenhal
Name: renly
text: renly Then I see no reason for hostility between us. Your son can go on calling himself King in the North. The Starks will have dominion over all lands north of Moat Cailin, provided he swears me an oath of fealty.

title: The Ghost of Harrenhal
Name: catelyn
text: catelyn And the wording of this oath?

title: The Ghost of Harrenhal
Name: renly
text: renly The same Ned Stark swore to Robert eighteen years ago. Cat, their friendship held the kingdoms together.

title: The Ghost of Harrenhal
Name: catelyn
text: catelyn And in return for my son's loyalty?

title: The Ghost of Harrenhal
Name: renly
text: renly In the morning, I'll destroy my brother's army.

title: The Ghost of Harrenhal
Name: renly
text: renly When that's done, Baratheon and Stark will fight their common enemy together, as they have done many times before.

title: The Ghost of Harrenhal
Name: catelyn
text: catelyn Our two houses have always been close, which is why I am begging you to reconsider this battle. Negotiate a peace with your brother.

title: The Ghost of Harrenhal
Name: renly
text: renly Negotiate with Stannis? You heard him out there. I'd have better luck debating the wind.

title: The Ghost of Harrenhal
Name: renly
text: renly Please bring my terms to your son. I believe we are natural allies. I hope he feels the same. Together we could end this war in a fortnight.

title: The Ghost of Harrenhal
Name: brienne
text: brienne No! No.

title: The Ghost of Harrenhal
Name: soldier
text: soldier Follow me!

title: The Ghost of Harrenhal
Name: soldier
text: soldier You'll die for this.

title: The Ghost of Harrenhal
Name: catelyn
text: catelyn No, wait, it wasn't her!

title: The Ghost of Harrenhal
Name: catelyn
text: catelyn We've got to leave. They'll hang you for this.

title: The Ghost of Harrenhal
Name: man
text: man Inside the king's tent - go

title: The Ghost of Harrenhal
Name: man
text: man Now.

title: The Ghost of Harrenhal
Name: brienne
text: brienne I won't leave him.

title: The Ghost of Harrenhal
Name: catelyn
text: catelyn You can't avenge him if you're dead.

title: The Ghost of Harrenhal
Name: man
text: man Over there, go!

title: The Ghost of Harrenhal
Name: brienne
text: brienne Not that way.

title: The Ghost of Harrenhal
Name: margaery
text: margaery We need to go home. Loras.

title: The Ghost of Harrenhal
Name: petyr
text: petyr My lord, my lady.

title: The Ghost of Harrenhal
Name: loras
text: loras Get out.

title: The Ghost of Harrenhal
Name: petyr
text: petyr Stannis will be here in an hour. When he arrives, Renly's bannermen will flock to him. Your former companions will fight for the privilege of selling you to their new king.

title: The Ghost of Harrenhal
Name: loras
text: loras And you want that privilege for yourself.

title: The Ghost of Harrenhal
Name: petyr
text: petyr You will note that I am standing here talking to you, not Stannis.

title: The Ghost of Harrenhal
Name: margaery
text: margaery There's no time for this.

title: The Ghost of Harrenhal
Name: loras
text: loras Ride back to Highgarden, sister. I'm not running from Stannis.

title: The Ghost of Harrenhal
Name: margaery
text: margaery Brienne of Tarth murdered Renly.

title: The Ghost of Harrenhal
Name: loras
text: loras I don't believe that. You don't believe that. Who gained the most from our king's death?

title: The Ghost of Harrenhal
Name: petyr
text: petyr Stannis.

title: The Ghost of Harrenhal
Name: loras
text: loras I will put a sword through his righteous face.

title: The Ghost of Harrenhal
Name: margaery
text: margaery You can't stay here.

title: The Ghost of Harrenhal
Name: loras
text: loras He would have been a true king, a good king.

title: The Ghost of Harrenhal
Name: petyr
text: petyr Tell me, Ser Loras, what do you desire most in this world?

title: The Ghost of Harrenhal
Name: loras
text: loras Revenge.

title: The Ghost of Harrenhal
Name: petyr
text: petyr I have always found that to be the purest of motivations, but you won't have a chance to put your sword through Stannis, not today. You'll be cut to pieces before he sets foot on solid ground. If it is justice that you want, be smart about it.

title: The Ghost of Harrenhal
Name: margaery
text: margaery You can't avenge him from the grave. Bring the horses. Please.

title: The Ghost of Harrenhal
Name: margaery
text: margaery He was very handsome.

title: The Ghost of Harrenhal
Name: petyr
text: petyr He was, Your Grace.

title: The Ghost of Harrenhal
Name: margaery
text: margaery Your Grace." Calling yourself king doesn't make you one. And if Renly wasn't a king, I wasn't a queen.

title: The Ghost of Harrenhal
Name: petyr
text: petyr Do you want to be a queen?

title: The Ghost of Harrenhal
Name: margaery
text: margaery No. I want to be the queen.

title: The Ghost of Harrenhal
Name: cersei
text: cersei Killed? By whom?

title: The Ghost of Harrenhal
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion Accounts differ. Most seem to implicate Catelyn Stark in some way.

title: The Ghost of Harrenhal
Name: cersei
text: cersei Really? Who'd have thought?

title: The Ghost of Harrenhal
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion Some say it was one of his own Kingsguard, while still others say it was Stannis himself who did it after negotiations went sour.

title: The Ghost of Harrenhal
Name: cersei
text: cersei Whomever did it, I say well done.

title: The Ghost of Harrenhal
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion It's not what Varys says. He says Renly's army is flocking to support Stannis, which would give Stannis superiority over us on both land and sea.

title: The Ghost of Harrenhal
Name: cersei
text: cersei Littlefinger says we can outspend him three to one.

title: The Ghost of Harrenhal
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion And I say Father raised you to have too much respect for money. Stannis Baratheon is coming for us, sooner rather than later.

title: The Ghost of Harrenhal
Name: cersei
text: cersei Aren't there other things you should be doing, like sealing my daughter in a crate so you can ship her away?

title: The Ghost of Harrenhal
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion She'll be safer in Dorne.

title: The Ghost of Harrenhal
Name: cersei
text: cersei Yes, I know how concerned you are for her safety.

title: The Ghost of Harrenhal
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion It so happens that I am. Myrcella is a sweet, innocent girl and I don't blame her at all for you.

title: The Ghost of Harrenhal
Name: cersei
text: cersei So clever. Aren't you always so clever with your schemes and your plots?

title: The Ghost of Harrenhal
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion Schemes and plots are the same thing. They are going to attack us. We need to be ready.

title: The Ghost of Harrenhal
Name: cersei
text: cersei No need to concern yourself over it. The king is taking personal charge of siege preparations.

title: The Ghost of Harrenhal
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion May I ask specifically what the king has in mind?

title: The Ghost of Harrenhal
Name: cersei
text: cersei You may, specifically, or you may ask vaguely. The answer will be the same.

title: The Ghost of Harrenhal
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion It's important that we talk about this.

title: The Ghost of Harrenhal
Name: cersei
text: cersei It's the king's royal prerogative to withhold sensitive information from his councilors.

title: The Ghost of Harrenhal
Name: lancel
text: lancel It's wildfire.

title: The Ghost of Harrenhal
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion Wildfire? You wouldn't lie to me, would you, cousin?

title: The Ghost of Harrenhal
Name: lancel
text: lancel No.

title: The Ghost of Harrenhal
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion MThat's a lie right there.

title: The Ghost of Harrenhal
Name: lancel
text: lancel It is not a lie. Why would I lie?

title: The Ghost of Harrenhal
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion Tell me, if the vile allegations against my brother and sister are true, do you think it will make Jaime more likely to kill you or less likely? When I tell him you're fucking her, I mean.

title: The Ghost of Harrenhal
Name: lancel
text: lancel I'm telling you the truth.

title: The Ghost of Harrenhal
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion The smart money would be on more likely.

title: The Ghost of Harrenhal
Name: lancel
text: lancel She's making wildfire.

title: The Ghost of Harrenhal
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion But then perhaps his own unnatural urges will give him sympathy for yours.

title: The Ghost of Harrenhal
Name: lancel
text: lancel The Alchemists' Guild is being commissioned.

title: The Ghost of Harrenhal
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion I suppose there's only one way to find out.

title: The Ghost of Harrenhal
Name: lancel
text: lancel They have thousands of pots already stored in their vaults. They are planning to launch it from the city walls into Stannis' ships and armies. Please.

title: The Ghost of Harrenhal
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion When did she tell you this?

title: The Ghost of Harrenhal
Name: lancel
text: lancel I heard her talking with the pyromancer. And the other night, after I left her, she went to meet him. I swear to you.

title: The Ghost of Harrenhal
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion Swear to me on what?

title: The Ghost of Harrenhal
Name: lancel
text: lancel On my life.

title: The Ghost of Harrenhal
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion But I don't care about your life.

title: The Ghost of Harrenhal
Name: lancel
text: lancel In the light of the Seven, by all that is holy and right, I, Lancel Lannister, do solemnly vow...

title: The Ghost of Harrenhal
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion All right, all right. Enough. Even torturing you is boring. Just get out.

title: The Ghost of Harrenhal
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion Oh, Lancel, tell my friend Bronn to please kill you if anything should happen to me.

title: The Ghost of Harrenhal
Name: lancel
text: lancel Please kill me if anything should happen to Lord Tyrion.

title: The Ghost of Harrenhal
Name: bronn
text: bronn It will be my pleasure.

title: The Ghost of Harrenhal
Name: davos
text: davos Your Grace.

title: The Ghost of Harrenhal
Name: stannis
text: stannis What is it?

title: The Ghost of Harrenhal
Name: davos
text: davos I'm sorry about your brother, Your Grace, I wanted to let you know that people grieve for him.

title: The Ghost of Harrenhal
Name: stannis
text: stannis Fools love a fool. I grieve for him as well, for the boy he was, not the man he grew to be.

title: The Ghost of Harrenhal
Name: davos
text: davos I need to speak to you - about what I saw in that cave.

title: The Ghost of Harrenhal
Name: stannis
text: stannis I thought I made it clear to you there'd be no need to speak to me on this matter.

title: The Ghost of Harrenhal
Name: davos
text: davos Your Grace, I-

title: The Ghost of Harrenhal
Name: stannis
text: stannis I've never known you to need to hear a thing twice.

title: The Ghost of Harrenhal
Name: davos
text: davos And I've never known you to hide from the truth.

title: The Ghost of Harrenhal
Name: stannis
text: stannis You've come to lecture me on truth?

title: The Ghost of Harrenhal
Name: davos
text: davos I've come to tell you that what I saw.

title: The Ghost of Harrenhal
Name: stannis
text: stannis All my brother's bannermen have come to my side. Except the Tyrells, who fled like cowards. They won't be able to resist us now. Soon I shall be sitting on the Iron Throne.

title: The Ghost of Harrenhal
Name: davos
text: davos Nothing is worth what this will cost you, not even the Iron

title: The Ghost of Harrenhal
Name: stannis
text: stannis I'll hear no more about it.

title: The Ghost of Harrenhal
Name: man
text: man Take a company of men, secure the perimeter.

title: The Ghost of Harrenhal
Name: davos
text: davos When do we sail for King's Landing?

title: The Ghost of Harrenhal
Name: stannis
text: stannis As soon as I've consolidated my troops. We'll make short work of the Lannisters' fleet. Once Blackwater Bay is cleared, we'll deliver our troops to their doorstep and take the city.

title: The Ghost of Harrenhal
Name: davos
text: davos And will you bring Lady Melisandre with you?

title: The Ghost of Harrenhal
Name: stannis
text: stannis That's not your concern.

title: The Ghost of Harrenhal
Name: davos
text: davos If you take King's Landing with her by your side, the victory will be hers.

title: The Ghost of Harrenhal
Name: stannis
text: stannis I never thought I'd have reason to doubt your loyalty. Was I wrong?

title: The Ghost of Harrenhal
Name: davos
text: davos Loyal service means telling hard truths.

title: The Ghost of Harrenhal
Name: stannis
text: stannis Oh, truth again. All right, what's the truth? The hard truth?

title: The Ghost of Harrenhal
Name: davos
text: davos She's a foreigner preaching her foreign religion. Some believe she whispers orders in your ear and you obey.

title: The Ghost of Harrenhal
Name: stannis
text: stannis What do you believe?

title: The Ghost of Harrenhal
Name: davos
text: davos You won those bannermen from Renly. Don't lose them to her.

title: The Ghost of Harrenhal
Name: stannis
text: stannis We set out for King's Landing without Lady Melisandre. And you lead the fleet into Blackwater Bay.

title: The Ghost of Harrenhal
Name: davos
text: davos Your Grace, I'm honored, but my time on the sea was spent evading ships, not attacking them. The other lords won't be happy.

title: The Ghost of Harrenhal
Name: stannis
text: stannis Most of those lords should consider themselves lucky I don't hang them for treason. Hard truths cut both ways, Ser Davos.

title: The Ghost of Harrenhal
Name: girl
text: girl I've got it! I've got it!

title: The Ghost of Harrenhal
Name: man
text: man So it's that one there at the top, on the right.

title: The Ghost of Harrenhal
Name: man
text: man Buy my fruit, my lord. Fresh fruit.

title: The Ghost of Harrenhal
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion Stannis has more infantry, more ships, more horses. What do we have?

title: The Ghost of Harrenhal
Name: bronn
text: bronn There's that mind of yours you keep going on about.

title: The Ghost of Harrenhal
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion Well, I've never actually been able to kill people with it.

title: The Ghost of Harrenhal
Name: bronn
text: bronn Good thing. I'd be out of a job. What about your father?

title: The Ghost of Harrenhal
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion He hasn't sent a raven in weeks. He's very busy. Being repeatedly humiliated by Robb Stark is time-consuming. We won't be able to hold the city against Stannis, not the way Joffrey's planning on holding it.

title: The Ghost of Harrenhal
Name: protester
text: protester Corruption.

title: The Ghost of Harrenhal
Name: crowd
text: crowd Yes!

title: The Ghost of Harrenhal
Name: protester
text: protester We are swollen, bloated, foul. Brother fornicates with sister in the bed of kings and we're surprised when the fruit of their incest is rotten? Yes, a rotten king.

title: The Ghost of Harrenhal
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion It's hard to argue with his assessment.

title: The Ghost of Harrenhal
Name: bronn
text: bronn Not after what he did to your birthday present.

title: The Ghost of Harrenhal
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion The king is a lost cause. It's the rest of us I'm worried about now.

title: The Ghost of Harrenhal
Name: man
text: man A dancing king, prancing down his bloodstained halls to the tune of a twisted demon monkey.

title: The Ghost of Harrenhal
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion You have to admire his imagination.

title: The Ghost of Harrenhal
Name: bronn
text: bronn He's talking about you.

title: The Ghost of Harrenhal
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion What? Demon monkey?

title: The Ghost of Harrenhal
Name: bronn
text: bronn People think you're pulling the king's strings. They blame you for the city's ills.

title: The Ghost of Harrenhal
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion Blame me? I'm trying to save them.

title: The Ghost of Harrenhal
Name: bronn
text: bronn You don't need to convince me.

title: The Ghost of Harrenhal
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion Demon monkey.

title: The Ghost of Harrenhal
Name: man
text: man Yeah, come on.

title: The Ghost of Harrenhal
Name: theon
text: theon You're the crew of the Sea Bitch? I'm your commander. Welcome.

title: The Ghost of Harrenhal
Name: theon
text: theon Stop. Stop! Your captain commands you to stop!

title: The Ghost of Harrenhal
Name: black
text: black Where are we headed, Captain?

title: The Ghost of Harrenhal
Name: theon
text: theon The Stony Shore, to raid their villages. There'll be spoils in it for you, and women, if you do your jobs well.

title: The Ghost of Harrenhal
Name: black
text: black And who decides if we've done our jobs well?

title: The Ghost of Harrenhal
Name: theon
text: theon I do. Your captain.

title: The Ghost of Harrenhal
Name: black
text: black I have been reaving and raping since before you left Balon's balls, Captain. Don't reckon I've got much use for your ideas on how to do it. Don't reckon I've got much use for a captain at all. I'm thinking I can do the job of captain real well myself. All I need is a ship. You wouldn't know where I could find myself a ship now, would you?

title: The Ghost of Harrenhal
Name: theon
text: theon You could do that, take the ship, head out on your own. And I will hunt you down, drag you back here in chains and hang you for a traitor.

title: The Ghost of Harrenhal
Name: yara
text: yara Stop. We yield.

title: The Ghost of Harrenhal
Name: yara
text: yara Congratulations on your first command.

title: The Ghost of Harrenhal
Name: theon
text: theon Thank you. Kind of you to come see me off.

title: The Ghost of Harrenhal
Name: yara
text: yara Oh, I'm not here for you. I was just on my way to Red Harbor. I've got thirty ships. There's nowhere to put them here. Too narrow.

title: The Ghost of Harrenhal
Name: theon
text: theon You'd better get out there. Wouldn't want her to set sail without you.

title: The Ghost of Harrenhal
Name: yara
text: yara That would never happen. My crew would wait on deck for a year if I asked them to. This lot, though... Enjoy the Stony Shore.

title: The Ghost of Harrenhal
Name: dagmer
text: dagmer Come on, I'll take you out.

title: The Ghost of Harrenhal
Name: theon
text: theon Who are you?

title: The Ghost of Harrenhal
Name: dagmer
text: dagmer Dagmer, your first mate.

title: The Ghost of Harrenhal
Name: theon
text: theon Why aren't you with the rest of them? Or did they send you to row me out and dump me halfway in the sea? That would be good for a laugh.

title: The Ghost of Harrenhal
Name: dagmer
text: dagmer They're not gonna respect you until you prove yourself.

title: The Ghost of Harrenhal
Name: theon
text: theon And how am I supposed to prove myself by pillaging piss-poor fishing villages?

title: The Ghost of Harrenhal
Name: dagmer
text: dagmer You're not.

title: The Ghost of Harrenhal
Name: theon
text: theon And yet that's the task my father has given me to prove that I'm a true Iron Islander.

title: The Ghost of Harrenhal
Name: dagmer
text: dagmer They're all Iron Islanders. Do they do as they're told or do they do as they like?

title: The Ghost of Harrenhal
Name: theon
text: theon The Stony Shore's not far from Torrhen's Square.

title: The Ghost of Harrenhal
Name: dagmer
text: dagmer The seat of the House of Tallhart, a more impressive prize than a few fishermen's daughters. What, you don't think we could take it?

title: The Ghost of Harrenhal
Name: theon
text: theon No, we could. We could never hold it for more than a few days. As soon as Winterfell got word that we'd taken Torrhen's Square, the Starks would send their men to take it back. And then-

title: The Ghost of Harrenhal
Name: theon
text: theon Take me to my ship.

title: The Ghost of Harrenhal
Name: reginald
text: reginald The Starks have overextended their lines. Now that summer's over, they'll have a hard time keeping their men and horses fed.

title: The Ghost of Harrenhal
Name: tywin
text: tywin The Starks understand winter better than we ever will. The cold won't beat them.

title: The Ghost of Harrenhal
Name: amory
text: amory Our spies report growing discontent among the Northern lords. They want to return home and gather the harvest before the crops turn.

title: The Ghost of Harrenhal
Name: tywin
text: tywin And I'm sure if those same spies snuck into our own encampments, they would report growing discontent amongst the Southern lords. This is war, no one's content. We've underestimated the Stark boy for too long. He has a good mind for warfare, his men worship him. And as long as he keeps winning battles, they'll keep believing he is King in the North. You've been waiting for him to fail. He is not going to fail, not without our help. So how do we stop him?

title: The Ghost of Harrenhal
Name: reginald
text: reginald We've worked through the night, my lord. Perhaps we'd profit from some sleep.

title: The Ghost of Harrenhal
Name: tywin
text: tywin Yes, I think you would, Reginald. And because you're my cousin, I might even let you wake from that sleep. Go, I'm sure your wife must miss you.

title: The Ghost of Harrenhal
Name: reginald
text: reginald My wife's in Lannisport.

title: The Ghost of Harrenhal
Name: tywin
text: tywin Well, then you'd better start riding. Go, before I change my mind and send her your head.

title: The Ghost of Harrenhal
Name: tywin
text: tywin If your name wasn't Lannister, you'd be scrubbing out pots in the cook's tent. Go!

title: The Ghost of Harrenhal
Name: tywin
text: tywin Not wine, water. We'll be here for some time. Girl, where are you from?

title: The Ghost of Harrenhal
Name: arya
text: arya Maidenpool, my lord.

title: The Ghost of Harrenhal
Name: tywin
text: tywin And who are the Lords of Maidenpool? Remind me.

title: The Ghost of Harrenhal
Name: arya
text: arya House Mooton, my lord.

title: The Ghost of Harrenhal
Name: tywin
text: tywin And what is their sigil?

title: The Ghost of Harrenhal
Name: tywin
text: tywin A red salmon. I think a Maidenpool girl would remember that. You're a Northerner, aren't you?

title: The Ghost of Harrenhal
Name: tywin
text: tywin Good. One more time, where are you from?

title: The Ghost of Harrenhal
Name: arya
text: arya Barrowton, my lord. House Dustin. Two crossed longaxes beneath a black crown.

title: The Ghost of Harrenhal
Name: tywin
text: tywin And what do they say of Robb Stark in the North?

title: The Ghost of Harrenhal
Name: arya
text: arya They call him the Young Wolf.

title: The Ghost of Harrenhal
Name: tywin
text: tywin And?

title: The Ghost of Harrenhal
Name: arya
text: arya They say he rides into battle on the back of a giant direwolf. They say he can turn into a wolf himself when he wants. They say he can't be killed.

title: The Ghost of Harrenhal
Name: tywin
text: tywin And do you believe them?

title: The Ghost of Harrenhal
Name: arya
text: arya No, my lord. Anyone can be killed.

title: The Ghost of Harrenhal
Name: tywin
text: tywin Fetch that water.

title: The Ghost of Harrenhal
Name: jaqen
text: jaqen A girl says nothing.

title: The Ghost of Harrenhal
Name: jaqen
text: jaqen A girl keeps her mouth closed. No one hears, and friends may talk in secret, yes? A boy becomes a girl.

title: The Ghost of Harrenhal
Name: arya
text: arya I was always a girl.

title: The Ghost of Harrenhal
Name: jaqen
text: jaqen And I was always aware. But the girl keeps secrets. It is not for a man to spoil them.

title: The Ghost of Harrenhal
Name: arya
text: arya You're one of them now. I should have let you burn.

title: The Ghost of Harrenhal
Name: jaqen
text: jaqen And you fetch water for one of them now. Why is this right for you and wrong for me?

title: The Ghost of Harrenhal
Name: arya
text: arya I didn't have a choice.

title: The Ghost of Harrenhal
Name: jaqen
text: jaqen You did. I did. And here we are.

title: The Ghost of Harrenhal
Name: jaqen
text: jaqen A man pays his debts. A man owes three.

title: The Ghost of Harrenhal
Name: arya
text: arya Three what?

title: The Ghost of Harrenhal
Name: jaqen
text: jaqen The Red God takes what is his, lovely girl. And only death may pay for life. You saved me and the two I was with. You stole three deaths from the Red God. We have to give them back. Speak three names and the man will do the rest. Three lives I will give you, no more, no less, and we're done.

title: The Ghost of Harrenhal
Name: arya
text: arya I can name anyone and you'll kill him?

title: The Ghost of Harrenhal
Name: jaqen
text: jaqen A man has said.

title: The Ghost of Harrenhal
Name: arya
text: arya The one who tortures everyone.

title: The Ghost of Harrenhal
Name: jaqen
text: jaqen A man needs a name.

title: The Ghost of Harrenhal
Name: arya
text: arya I don't know his name. They call him the Tickler.

title: The Ghost of Harrenhal
Name: jaqen
text: jaqen That is enough. Go now, girl. Your master is thirsty.

title: The Ghost of Harrenhal
Name: jeor
text: jeor He's not here yet. He'd have seen us, blown the horn.

title: The Ghost of Harrenhal
Name: jon
text: jon When will he come?

title: The Ghost of Harrenhal
Name: jeor
text: jeor The Halfhand does things in his own time.

title: The Ghost of Harrenhal
Name: jon
text: jon My uncle told me stories about him.

title: The Ghost of Harrenhal
Name: jeor
text: jeor Most of them are true.

title: The Ghost of Harrenhal
Name: jon
text: jon I heard the Halfhand spent half of last winter beyond the Wall.

title: The Ghost of Harrenhal
Name: jeor
text: jeor The whole winter. He was north of the Skirling Pass when the snows came. Had to wait for the thaw.

title: The Ghost of Harrenhal
Name: jon
text: jon So it is possible for someone to survive out here on their own.

title: The Ghost of Harrenhal
Name: jeor
text: jeor Well, possible for the Halfhand.

title: The Ghost of Harrenhal
Name: sam
text: sam Beautiful, isn't it? Gilly would love it here.

title: The Ghost of Harrenhal
Name: dolorous
text: dolorous There's nothing more sickening than a man in love.

title: The Ghost of Harrenhal
Name: man
text: man About time you did something. At least you'll keep warm.

title: The Ghost of Harrenhal
Name: sam
text: sam The Fist of the First Men. Think of how old this place is. Before the Targaryens defeated the Andals, before the Andals took Westeros from the First Men.

title: The Ghost of Harrenhal
Name: dolorous
text: dolorous Before I die, please, stop talking.

title: The Ghost of Harrenhal
Name: sam
text: sam Thousands and thousands of years ago, the First Men stood here where we're standing all through the long night. What do you think they were like, the First Men?

title: The Ghost of Harrenhal
Name: dolorous
text: dolorous Stupid. Smart people don't find themselves in places like this.

title: The Ghost of Harrenhal
Name: jon
text: jon I think they were afraid. I think they came here to get away from something. And I don't think it worked.

title: The Ghost of Harrenhal
Name: grenn
text: grenn Wildlings?

title: The Ghost of Harrenhal
Name: jon
text: jon One blast is for rangers returning. Wildlings is two blasts.

title: The Ghost of Harrenhal
Name: dolorous
text: dolorous So you got to stand there waiting, wondering. One blast for friends, two for foes.

title: The Ghost of Harrenhal
Name: sam
text: sam And three for White Walkers. It's been a thousand years, but that's the only time they blow the horn three times.

title: The Ghost of Harrenhal
Name: grenn
text: grenn But if it's been a thousand years, how do you know?

title: The Ghost of Harrenhal
Name: sam
text: sam Well I read it in a book.

title: The Ghost of Harrenhal
Name: dolorous
text: dolorous I read it in a book.

title: The Ghost of Harrenhal
Name: jon
text: jon Look. It's Qhorin Halfhand.

title: The Ghost of Harrenhal
Name: dolorous
text: dolorous EDD Aye, we'll live another day. Hurrah.

title: The Ghost of Harrenhal
Name: haylene
text: haylene Take care, my lord.

title: The Ghost of Harrenhal
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion I remember reading an old sailors' proverb, "Piss on wildfire and your cock burns off. "

title: The Ghost of Harrenhal
Name: haylene
text: haylene Oh, I have not conducted this experiment. It could well be true. The substance burns so hot, it melts wood, stone, even steel, and, of course, flesh. The substance burns so hot, it melts flesh like tallow.

title: The Ghost of Harrenhal
Name: haylene
text: haylene After the dragons died, wildfire was the key to the Targaryen power.

title: The Ghost of Harrenhal
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion My companion takes issue.

title: The Ghost of Harrenhal
Name: bronn
text: bronn If I could tell you how many crazy old men I've seen pushing carts around army camps making grand claims about jars full of pig shit. No offense meant.

title: The Ghost of Harrenhal
Name: haylene
text: haylene Our order does not deal in pig shit. The substance is fire given form. And we have been perfecting it since the days of Maegor.

title: The Ghost of Harrenhal
Name: bronn
text: bronn To do what?

title: The Ghost of Harrenhal
Name: haylene
text: haylene The jars are put in catapults and flung at the enemy.

title: The Ghost of Harrenhal
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion How much do you have?

title: The Ghost of Harrenhal
Name: bronn
text: bronn If you could get real soldiers to man the catapults, then maybe you'd hit your target one time in ten, but all the real soldiers are in the Riverlands with your father.

title: The Ghost of Harrenhal
Name: haylene
text: haylene My lord, this man is insulting.

title: The Ghost of Harrenhal
Name: bronn
text: bronn I don't know if you've ever seen a battle, old man, but things can get a bit messy. 'Cause when we're flinging things at Stannis, he's flinging them right back at us. Men die, men shit themselves, men run, which means pots falling, which means fire inside the walls, which means the poor cunts trying to defend the city end up burning it down.

title: The Ghost of Harrenhal
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion My friend remains unconvinced.

title: The Ghost of Harrenhal
Name: haylene
text: haylene He would not dare insult my order whilst Aerys Targaryen lived.

title: The Ghost of Harrenhal
Name: bronn
text: bronn Well, he's not living anymore. And all his pots of wildfire didn't help him, did they? Men win wars, not magic tricks.

title: The Ghost of Harrenhal
Name: haylene
text: haylene We have been working tirelessly, day and night, ever since your royal sister commanded us to do so. Our present count stands at 7,811. Enough to burn Stannis Baratheon's fleet and armies both.

title: The Ghost of Harrenhal
Name: bronn
text: bronn This is a shit idea.

title: The Ghost of Harrenhal
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion I'm afraid I have to concur with my advisor, Wisdom Haylene. The contents of this room could lay King's Landing low. You won't be making wildfire for my sister any longer. You'll be making it for me.

title: The Ghost of Harrenhal
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys Dracarys. Dracarys.

title: The Ghost of Harrenhal
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys He'll be able to feed himself from now on.

title: The Ghost of Harrenhal
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys Let him sleep, Doreah.

title: The Ghost of Harrenhal
Name: doreah
text: doreah Yes, Khaleesi.

title: The Ghost of Harrenhal
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys He loves you.

title: The Ghost of Harrenhal
Name: irri
text: irri I rewove this part of the top. And I fixed the heel on this one.

title: The Ghost of Harrenhal
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys Thank you, my friend.

title: The Ghost of Harrenhal
Name: doreah
text: doreah Did you see the dress Xaro had made for you? They say he's the wealthiest man in Qarth.

title: The Ghost of Harrenhal
Name: irri
text: irri It is known.

title: The Ghost of Harrenhal
Name: doreah
text: doreah And if Qarth is the wealthiest city in Essos-

title: The Ghost of Harrenhal
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys The last time a rich man gave me a dress, he was selling me to Khal Drogo.

title: The Ghost of Harrenhal
Name: irri
text: irri May he ride forever through the night lands.

title: The Ghost of Harrenhal
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys Xaro is our host, but we know nothing about him. Men like to talk about other men when they're happy.

title: The Ghost of Harrenhal
Name: doreah
text: doreah You would look like a real princess in Xaro's-

title: The Ghost of Harrenhal
Name: irri
text: irri She's not a princess. She's a Khaleesi. You should wear it, Khaleesi.

title: The Ghost of Harrenhal
Name: irri
text: irri You are their guest. It would be rude not to.

title: The Ghost of Harrenhal
Name: woman
text: woman And you must visit the night market. The Qartheen night market is like no night market you've ever seen.

title: The Ghost of Harrenhal
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys It sounds wonderful.

title: The Ghost of Harrenhal
Name: woman
text: woman The Meereenis think they have a night market. I will take you there myself.

title: The Ghost of Harrenhal
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys Please excuse me for a moment.

title: The Ghost of Harrenhal
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys What are they doing?

title: The Ghost of Harrenhal
Name: jorah
text: jorah Malakko says the statue is too heavy to carry. Kovarro says that Malakko is an idiot. They can pry out the gems, the rest is pure gold. Very soft. He can chop off as much as we can carry.

title: The Ghost of Harrenhal
Name: kovarro
text: kovarro Or melt it. Very simple.

title: The Ghost of Harrenhal
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys We are his guests! You can't pry it or chop it or melt it.

title: The Ghost of Harrenhal
Name: kovarro
text: kovarro Of course not, Khaleesi! We will wait until we leave.

title: The Ghost of Harrenhal
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys Not even when we leave.

title: The Ghost of Harrenhal
Name: kovarro
text: kovarro Why not?

title: The Ghost of Harrenhal
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys Our host saved us from the Red Waste and you want to steal from him? I will hear no more.

title: The Ghost of Harrenhal
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys My brother used to say the only thing the Dothraki knew how to do was steal things better men have built.

title: The Ghost of Harrenhal
Name: jorah
text: jorah It's not the only thing. They're quite good at killing the better men.

title: The Ghost of Harrenhal
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys That's not the kind of queen I'm going to be.

title: The Ghost of Harrenhal
Name: pyatt
text: pyatt Mother of Dragons. On behalf of the warlocks of Qarth, I welcome you. A demonstration?

title: The Ghost of Harrenhal
Name: pyatt
text: pyatt Take this gem. Look at it. Into its depths. So many facets. Look closely enough and you can see yourself in them. Often more than once.

title: The Ghost of Harrenhal
Name: pyatt
text: pyatt Should you grow tired of Xaro's baubles and trinkets, it would be an honor to host you at the House of the Undying. You are always welcome, Mother of Dragons.

title: The Ghost of Harrenhal
Name: xaro
text: xaro My apologies. Pyatt Pree is one of the Thirteen. It was customary for me to extend him an invitation. Customs die slow deaths in Qarth.

title: The Ghost of Harrenhal
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys What is the House of the Undying?

title: The Ghost of Harrenhal
Name: xaro
text: xaro It is where the warlocks go to squint at dusty books and drink shade of the evening. It turns their lips blue and their minds soft. So soft, they actually believe their parlor tricks are magic.

title: The Ghost of Harrenhal
Name: quaithe
text: quaithe You watch over her.

title: The Ghost of Harrenhal
Name: jorah
text: jorah Do I know you?

title: The Ghost of Harrenhal
Name: quaithe
text: quaithe I know you. Jorah Mormont of Bear Island.

title: The Ghost of Harrenhal
Name: jorah
text: jorah Who are you?

title: The Ghost of Harrenhal
Name: quaithe
text: quaithe I'm no one. But she is the Mother of Dragons. She needs true protectors, now more than ever. They shall come day and night to see the wonder born into the world again. And when they see, they shall lust, for dragons are fire made flesh. And fire is power.

title: The Ghost of Harrenhal
Name: brienne
text: brienne It looked like Stannis.

title: The Ghost of Harrenhal
Name: catelyn
text: catelyn To me it just looked like... A shadow in the shape of a man.

title: The Ghost of Harrenhal
Name: brienne
text: brienne In the shape of Stannis.

title: The Ghost of Harrenhal
Name: catelyn
text: catelyn We should reach my son's camp tomorrow.

title: The Ghost of Harrenhal
Name: brienne
text: brienne Will you stay there long, my lady?

title: The Ghost of Harrenhal
Name: catelyn
text: catelyn Only long enough to tell Robb what I have seen. After that, I will leave for Winterfell. My two youngest need me. I've been away from them for far too long.

title: The Ghost of Harrenhal
Name: brienne
text: brienne I never knew my mother.

title: The Ghost of Harrenhal
Name: catelyn
text: catelyn I'm sorry.

title: The Ghost of Harrenhal
Name: catelyn
text: catelyn My own mother died on the birthing bed when I was very young.

title: The Ghost of Harrenhal
Name: brienne
text: brienne It's a bloody business.

title: The Ghost of Harrenhal
Name: catelyn
text: catelyn What comes after is even harder.

title: The Ghost of Harrenhal
Name: brienne
text: brienne Once you're safely back amongst your own people, will you give me leave to go, my lady?

title: The Ghost of Harrenhal
Name: catelyn
text: catelyn You mean to kill Stannis.

title: The Ghost of Harrenhal
Name: brienne
text: brienne I swore a vow.

title: The Ghost of Harrenhal
Name: catelyn
text: catelyn But Stannis has a great army around him. His own guards are sworn to keep him safe.

title: The Ghost of Harrenhal
Name: catelyn
text: catelyn I'm as good as any of them. I should never have fled.

title: The Ghost of Harrenhal
Name: catelyn
text: catelyn Renly's death was no fault of yours. You served him bravely.

title: The Ghost of Harrenhal
Name: brienne
text: brienne I only held him that once as he was dying.

title: The Ghost of Harrenhal
Name: catelyn
text: catelyn He's gone, Brienne. You serve nothing and no one by following him into the earth. Renly's enemies are Robb's enemies as well.

title: The Ghost of Harrenhal
Name: brienne
text: brienne I do not know your son, my lady. But I could serve you, if you would have me. You have courage. Not battle courage, perhaps, but, I don't know, a woman's kind of courage. And I think that when the time comes, you will not hold me back. Promise me that you will not hold me back from Stannis.

title: The Ghost of Harrenhal
Name: catelyn
text: catelyn When the time comes, I will not hold you back.

title: The Ghost of Harrenhal
Name: brienne
text: brienne Then I am yours, my lady. I will shield your back and give my life for yours, if it comes to that. I swear it by the Old Gods and the new.

title: The Ghost of Harrenhal
Name: catelyn
text: catelyn I vow that you shall always have a place in my home and at my table and that I shall ask no service of you that might bring you dishonor. I swear it by the Old Gods and the new.

title: The Ghost of Harrenhal
Name: winterfell
text: winterfell And it's not just thieves, my lord. There's wolves in them hills now, more than I ever seen. They come down in the night and they kill my sheep. My three sons is away fighting for your brother, my lord. They'll fight, keep fighting till they're told to go home. I have no one to man my flock now. Only me. I can't keep watch all day and all night.

title: The Ghost of Harrenhal
Name: bran
text: bran We can send two orphan boys from Winterstown home with you to help watch over your flock if you can give them room and board.

title: The Ghost of Harrenhal
Name: winterfell
text: winterfell My wife always prayed for more children. We'll look after them. Thank you, my lord. And may the gods bless you and yours.

title: The Ghost of Harrenhal
Name: bran
text: bran Stop it. If that's everyone, I'm going to go for a ride before dark.

title: The Ghost of Harrenhal
Name: luwin
text: luwin Good.

title: The Ghost of Harrenhal
Name: bran
text: bran Hodor.

title: The Ghost of Harrenhal
Name: hodor
text: hodor Hodor.

title: The Ghost of Harrenhal
Name: rodrik
text: rodrik Bran! Lord Stark. Torrhen's Square is under siege.

title: The Ghost of Harrenhal
Name: luwin
text: luwin Torrhen's Square is barely forty leagues from here. How can the Lannisters strike so far north?

title: The Ghost of Harrenhal
Name: rodrik
text: rodrik Might be a raiding party led by the Mountain. Might be sellswords paid by Tywin Lannister.

title: The Ghost of Harrenhal
Name: bran
text: bran We have to help them.

title: The Ghost of Harrenhal
Name: rodrik
text: rodrik Most of the fighting men are away with Robb, but I can gather two hundred decent men.

title: The Ghost of Harrenhal
Name: luwin
text: luwin Do you need so many?

title: The Ghost of Harrenhal
Name: bran
text: bran If we can't protect our own bannermen, why should they protect us? Go, Ser Rodrik. Take the men you need.

title: The Ghost of Harrenhal
Name: rodrik
text: rodrik Won't take long, my lord. Southerners don't do well up here.

title: The Ghost of Harrenhal
Name: bran
text: bran So, what does it mean?

title: The Ghost of Harrenhal
Name: osha
text: osha Ask your Maester Luwin. He's the one studying books all the time.

title: The Ghost of Harrenhal
Name: bran
text: bran I did ask him. He'd never heard of a three-eyed raven.

title: The Ghost of Harrenhal
Name: osha
text: osha Must not mean anything, then.

title: The Ghost of Harrenhal
Name: bran
text: bran You're lying.

title: The Ghost of Harrenhal
Name: osha
text: osha You might be a little lord, but don't you call me a liar.

title: The Ghost of Harrenhal
Name: bran
text: bran You know what it means.

title: The Ghost of Harrenhal
Name: osha
text: osha I never said I didn't.

title: The Ghost of Harrenhal
Name: bran
text: bran You didn't give me an honest answer.

title: The Ghost of Harrenhal
Name: osha
text: osha That's not the same as being a liar.

title: The Ghost of Harrenhal
Name: bran
text: bran Well, it's not far off.

title: The Ghost of Harrenhal
Name: osha
text: osha So, you've been dreaming of a three-eyed raven again? In the godswood, you told me you didn't dream. Now who's a liar? What did you see in your dream?

title: The Ghost of Harrenhal
Name: osha
text: osha Something bad? Tell me, boy.

title: The Ghost of Harrenhal
Name: bran
text: bran I dreamt that the sea came to Winterfell. I saw waves crashing against the gates and the water came flowing over the walls. It flooded the castle. Drowned men were floating here, in the yard. Ser Rodrik was one of them.

title: The Ghost of Harrenhal
Name: osha
text: osha The sea is hundreds of miles away.

title: The Ghost of Harrenhal
Name: bran
text: bran I know. It's just a stupid dream.

title: The Ghost of Harrenhal
Name: osha
text: osha I've got to get these potatoes to the kitchen. Otherwise they'll put me in chains again.

title: The Ghost of Harrenhal
Name: bran
text: bran Osha. The three-eyed raven, what do they say about it north of the Wall?

title: The Ghost of Harrenhal
Name: osha
text: osha They say all sorts of crazy things north of the Wall.

title: The Ghost of Harrenhal
Name: qhorin
text: qhorin There.

title: The Ghost of Harrenhal
Name: jeor
text: jeor Where?

title: The Ghost of Harrenhal
Name: qhorin
text: qhorin On that mountain.

title: The Ghost of Harrenhal
Name: sam
text: sam I don't see very well.

title: The Ghost of Harrenhal
Name: jon
text: jon A fire.

title: The Ghost of Harrenhal
Name: qhorin
text: qhorin There's a fire. The people sitting around it have better eyes than yours or mine. When they see us coming, that fire becomes a signal. Gives Mance Rayder plenty of time to throw a party in our honor.

title: The Ghost of Harrenhal
Name: jeor
text: jeor How many wildlings have joined him?

title: The Ghost of Harrenhal
Name: qhorin
text: qhorin From what we can tell, all of them. Mance has gathered them all like deer against the wolves. They're almost ready to make their move.

title: The Ghost of Harrenhal
Name: jon
text: jon Where?

title: The Ghost of Harrenhal
Name: qhorin
text: qhorin Somewhere safe. Somewhere south. Can't just march into their midst. And we can't wait for them here with nothing but a pile of stones to protect us.

title: The Ghost of Harrenhal
Name: jeor
text: jeor You saying we should fall back to the Wall?

title: The Ghost of Harrenhal
Name: qhorin
text: qhorin Mance was one of us once. Now he's one of them. He's going to teach them our way of doing things. They'll hit us in force and they won't run away when we hit back. They're gonna be more organized than before, more disciplined, more like us. So we need to be more like them, do things their way. Sneak in, kill Mance, and scatter them to the winds before they can march on the Wall. And to do that

title: The Ghost of Harrenhal
Name: jeor
text: jeor We need to get rid of those lookouts.

title: The Ghost of Harrenhal
Name: qhorin
text: qhorin It's not a job for 400 men. I need to move fast and silent. Harker, Stonesnake, Borba.

title: The Ghost of Harrenhal
Name: jon
text: jon Lord Commander, I'd like to join Lord Qhorin.

title: The Ghost of Harrenhal
Name: qhorin
text: qhorin I've been called lots of things, but that might be my first Lord Qhorin. You're a steward, Snow, not a ranger.

title: The Ghost of Harrenhal
Name: jon
text: jon I've fought and killed a wight. How many rangers can say that?

title: The Ghost of Harrenhal
Name: qhorin
text: qhorin He's the one?

title: The Ghost of Harrenhal
Name: jeor
text: jeor Aye. You killed a wight. You also let an old man beat you bloody and take your sword.

title: The Ghost of Harrenhal
Name: qhorin
text: qhorin Craster? In the boy's defense, that's a tough old goat.

title: The Ghost of Harrenhal
Name: sam
text: sam I could take up Jon's duties while he's gone, my lord. It would be no trouble.

title: The Ghost of Harrenhal
Name: jeor
text: jeor Well, I hope you make a better ranger than you do a steward. Go on.

title: The Ghost of Harrenhal
Name: xaro
text: xaro So, tell me, how long has your manservant been in love with you?

title: The Ghost of Harrenhal
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys He's not my manservant and he's not in love with me. He's my advisor and he's my friend.

title: The Ghost of Harrenhal
Name: xaro
text: xaro Unlikely. I can almost always tell what a man wants.

title: The Ghost of Harrenhal
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys And what about what a woman wants?

title: The Ghost of Harrenhal
Name: xaro
text: xaro Much more complicated. You, for example, what do you want?

title: The Ghost of Harrenhal
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys To cross the Narrow Sea and take back the Iron Throne.

title: The Ghost of Harrenhal
Name: xaro
text: xaro Why?

title: The Ghost of Harrenhal
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys Because I promised my khalasar I'd protect them and find them a safe home.

title: The Ghost of Harrenhal
Name: xaro
text: xaro You want to conquer the Seven Kingdoms for the Dothraki?

title: The Ghost of Harrenhal
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys I want them because they're mine by right. The Iron Throne is mine and I will take it.

title: The Ghost of Harrenhal
Name: xaro
text: xaro Ah, a conqueror.

title: The Ghost of Harrenhal
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys And how did you get all of this? Did someone give it to you?

title: The Ghost of Harrenhal
Name: xaro
text: xaro No. I come from nothing. I hit the docks like a piece of cargo, except someone normally cares what happens to cargo.

title: The Ghost of Harrenhal
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys So you wanted more than you had and you took it. You're a conqueror, too. You're just less ambitious.

title: The Ghost of Harrenhal
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys What do you want, Xaro Xhoan Daxos? At the gates of the city, you bled for me. Why?

title: The Ghost of Harrenhal
Name: xaro
text: xaro I will show you why.

title: The Ghost of Harrenhal
Name: xaro
text: xaro The door and the vault is made of Valyrian stone. The hardest steel does not make a mark. I offered the greatest locksmiths in Qarth their weight in gold if they could break into it. I made the same offer to the greatest thieves. They all went home empty-handed. The only thing that can open this door is this key.

title: The Ghost of Harrenhal
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys And behind the door?

title: The Ghost of Harrenhal
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys And it can all be mine?

title: The Ghost of Harrenhal
Name: xaro
text: xaro All? Let us say half. More than enough to buy horses, ships, armies. Enough to go home.

title: The Ghost of Harrenhal
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys All I have to do?

title: The Ghost of Harrenhal
Name: xaro
text: xaro Is marry me.

title: The Ghost of Harrenhal
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys That was a romantic proposal.

title: The Ghost of Harrenhal
Name: xaro
text: xaro I've already married once for love, but the gods stole her from me. I come from nothing. My mother and father never owned a pair of shoes. But marry me, and I will give you the Seven Kingdoms and our children will be princes and princesses.

title: The Ghost of Harrenhal
Name: xaro
text: xaro See? I have more ambition than you thought. The time is right, Daenerys Targaryen, First of Your Name. Robert Baratheon is dead.

title: The Ghost of Harrenhal
Name: jorah
text: jorah If you cross the sea with an army you bought and a foreign husband who paid for it...

title: The Ghost of Harrenhal
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys The Seven Kingdoms are at war with one another. Four false kings destroying the country.

title: The Ghost of Harrenhal
Name: jorah
text: jorah To win Westeros, you need support from Westeros.

title: The Ghost of Harrenhal
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys The usurper is dead.

title: The Ghost of Harrenhal
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys The Starks fight the Lannisters, and Baratheons fight each other.

title: The Ghost of Harrenhal
Name: jorah
text: jorah According to your new friend who earned your trust by cutting his hand?

title: The Ghost of Harrenhal
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys The time to strike is now. We need to find ships and an army or we'll spend the rest of our lives rotting away at the edge of the world.

title: The Ghost of Harrenhal
Name: jorah
text: jorah Rich men do not become rich by giving more than they get. They'll give you ships and soldiers and they'll own you forever. Moving carefully is the hard way, but it's the right way.

title: The Ghost of Harrenhal
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys And if I'd listened to that advice outside the gates of Qarth, we'd all be dead by now.

title: The Ghost of Harrenhal
Name: jorah
text: jorah I know the opportunity before you seems like the last you'll ever have, but you musT-

title: The Ghost of Harrenhal
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys Do not speak to me like I'm a child.

title: The Ghost of Harrenhal
Name: jorah
text: jorah I only want-

title: The Ghost of Harrenhal
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys What do you want? Tell me.

title: The Ghost of Harrenhal
Name: jorah
text: jorah To see you on the Iron Throne.

title: The Ghost of Harrenhal
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys Why?

title: The Ghost of Harrenhal
Name: jorah
text: jorah You have a good claim. A title. A birthright. But you have something more than that. You may cover it up and deny it, but you have a gentle heart. You would not only be respected and feared, you would be loved. Someone who can rule and should rule. Centuries come and go without a person like that coming into the world. There are times when I look at you and I still can't believe you're real.

title: The Ghost of Harrenhal
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys So what would you have me do, as my advisor?

title: The Ghost of Harrenhal
Name: jorah
text: jorah Make your own way. Find your own ship. You only need one. The allies we need are in Westeros, not Qarth.

title: The Ghost of Harrenhal
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys And how do I get the ship?

title: The Ghost of Harrenhal
Name: jorah
text: jorah I'll find it for you. A sound ship with a good captain.

title: The Ghost of Harrenhal
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys I look forward to meeting him.

title: The Ghost of Harrenhal
Name: jorah
text: jorah Khaleesi.

title: The Ghost of Harrenhal
Name: arya
text: arya You should stand sideface.

title: The Ghost of Harrenhal
Name: gendry
text: gendry Sideface?

title: The Ghost of Harrenhal
Name: arya
text: arya Sideways.

title: The Ghost of Harrenhal
Name: gendry
text: gendry Why?

title: The Ghost of Harrenhal
Name: arya
text: arya Smaller target.

title: The Ghost of Harrenhal
Name: gendry
text: gendry Am I fighting someone?

title: The Ghost of Harrenhal
Name: arya
text: arya You're practicing for a fight. You should practice right.

title: The Ghost of Harrenhal
Name: gold
text: gold Guards! Did you see anything? Go up there. Go and see where he fell from.

title: The Ghost of Harrenhal
Name: gold
text: gold Go up the battlement.

title: The Ghost of Harrenhal
Name: woman
text: woman That is strange.

title: The Ghost of Harrenhal
Name: gold
text: gold Move away. Stand back. He's dead.

title: The Old Gods and the New
