Name: theon
text: theon I've taken your castle.

title: The Old Gods and the New
Name: bran
text: bran Theon?

title: The Old Gods and the New
Name: theon
text: theon It's Prince Theon now. Get up. You have to get dressed. I've taken Winterfell. I took it. I'm occupying it. I sent men over the walls with grappling claws and ropes.

title: The Old Gods and the New
Name: bran
text: bran Why?

title: The Old Gods and the New
Name: theon
text: theon To take the castle.

title: The Old Gods and the New
Name: bran
text: bran You went with Robb.

title: The Old Gods and the New
Name: theon
text: theon And he sent me back to Pyke. I'm a Greyjoy. I can't fight for Robb and my father both. Where's Hodor?

title: The Old Gods and the New
Name: bran
text: bran I don't know.

title: The Old Gods and the New
Name: theon
text: theon Find the halfwit.

title: The Old Gods and the New
Name: theon
text: theon My men are bringing your people together in the courtyard.

title: The Old Gods and the New
Name: theon
text: theon So you and I can go down and tell them - how you've yielded Winterfell to me.

title: The Old Gods and the New
Name: bran
text: bran I won't.

title: The Old Gods and the New
Name: theon
text: theon Yes, you will.

title: The Old Gods and the New
Name: bran
text: bran I won't. I'll never yield. We'll fight you and throw you out.

title: The Old Gods and the New
Name: theon
text: theon The castle is mine. But these people are still yours. You'll yield to keep them safe, to keep them alive. That's what a good lord would do. Think carefully about what you want to say.

title: The Old Gods and the New
Name: bran
text: bran Theon. Did you hate us the whole time?

title: The Old Gods and the New
Name: bran
text: bran I've yielded Winterfell to Theon.

title: The Old Gods and the New
Name: theon
text: theon Louder. Say Prince Theon.

title: The Old Gods and the New
Name: bran
text: bran I've yielded Winterfell to Prince Theon. You all know me.

title: The Old Gods and the New
Name: farlen
text: farlen Aye, we know you for a steaming sack of shit.

title: The Old Gods and the New
Name: bran
text: bran Farlen, you be silent.

title: The Old Gods and the New
Name: theon
text: theon Listen to your little lord, Farlen. He has more sense than you do.

title: The Old Gods and the New
Name: bran
text: bran All of you should do as he commands.

title: The Old Gods and the New
Name: theon
text: theon My father has donned the ancient crown of Salt and Rock and declared himself King of the Iron Islands. He claims the North as well by right of conquest. You are all his subjects.

title: The Old Gods and the New
Name: farlen
text: farlen Bugger that. I serve the Starks. If you think you can hold the North with it-

title: The Old Gods and the New
Name: ironborn
text: ironborn Shut up!

title: The Old Gods and the New
Name: theon
text: theon If you serve me as loyally as you served Ned Stark, I will be as good to you as he ever was. Betray me, and you will wish you hadn't. Maester Luwin, send a raven to Pyke informing my father of my victory here. And one to Deepwood Motte to my sister. Inform her that she's to bring You are a maester of the Citadel, sworn to serve the Lord of Winterfell, are you not?

title: The Old Gods and the New
Name: luwin
text: luwin I am.

title: The Old Gods and the New
Name: theon
text: theon I am the Lord of Winterfell as Bran just informed you. Send the ravens.

title: The Old Gods and the New
Name: luwin
text: luwin My lord.

title: The Old Gods and the New
Name: osha
text: osha My Lord Greyjoy.

title: The Old Gods and the New
Name: theon
text: theon I see you've finally learned how to address your betters. What do you want? I was brought here a captive.

title: The Old Gods and the New
Name: osha
text: osha You were here the day I was taken.

title: The Old Gods and the New
Name: theon
text: theon I'm the one who took you. What of it?

title: The Old Gods and the New
Name: osha
text: osha Let me serve you.

title: The Old Gods and the New
Name: theon
text: theon Serve me how? I need fighters, not kitchen sluts.

title: The Old Gods and the New
Name: osha
text: osha It was Robb Stark who put me in the kitchens. Put a spear in my hand again.

title: The Old Gods and the New
Name: theon
text: theon So you can bury it in my neck? Do you take me for a fool? Get up.

title: The Old Gods and the New
Name: osha
text: osha Step aside.

title: The Old Gods and the New
Name: osha
text: osha It's your dream, little lord. The ocean has come to swallow this place. I ain't letting it drown me.

title: The Old Gods and the New
Name: theon
text: theon You'll all go about your tasks as usual. And in a few days' time-

title: The Old Gods and the New
Name: black
text: black Greyjoy!

title: The Old Gods and the New
Name: black
text: black We caught this one on his way back from Torrhen's Square. Took out two of ours before I got his sword.

title: The Old Gods and the New
Name: theon
text: theon Ser Rodrik, it grieves me that we meet as foes.

title: The Old Gods and the New
Name: rodrik
text: rodrik It grieves me you've less honor than a back alley whore. You were raised here under this roof. These people are your people.

title: The Old Gods and the New
Name: theon
text: theon They are not my people.

title: The Old Gods and the New
Name: rodrik
text: rodrik King Robb thought of you as a brother.

title: The Old Gods and the New
Name: theon
text: theon My brothers are dead. They died fighting Stark men, men like you.

title: The Old Gods and the New
Name: rodrik
text: rodrik Aye, they died fighting a war your father started. Lord Stark raised you among his own sons.

title: The Old Gods and the New
Name: theon
text: theon Among them, but not one of them. I was his hostage, taken from my home.

title: The Old Gods and the New
Name: rodrik
text: rodrik If he were alive to see this

title: The Old Gods and the New
Name: theon
text: theon He's not. He's dead. The Seven Kingdoms are at war. And Winterfell is mine.

title: The Old Gods and the New
Name: rodrik
text: rodrik I should have put a sword in your belly instead of in your hand.

title: The Old Gods and the New
Name: theon
text: theon You've served this house faithfully, old man. But keep talking and I'll-

title: The Old Gods and the New
Name: theon
text: theon Take him to the cells. Lock him up

title: The Old Gods and the New
Name: dagmer
text: dagmer My prince. You cannot let that stand. He must pay.

title: The Old Gods and the New
Name: theon
text: theon I'll lock him in a cell until he rots.

title: The Old Gods and the New
Name: dagmer
text: dagmer No, he has to pay the iron price. They'll never respect you while he lives.

title: The Old Gods and the New
Name: theon
text: theon Ser Rodrik, I sentence you to death!

title: The Old Gods and the New
Name: bran
text: bran No! You said no harm would come to them if I yielded.

title: The Old Gods and the New
Name: theon
text: theon The old man couldn't keep his mouth shut.

title: The Old Gods and the New
Name: luwin
text: luwin I urge you not to make a hasty decision.

title: The Old Gods and the New
Name: theon
text: theon He disrespected me in front of my men. That was his decision, not mine.

title: The Old Gods and the New
Name: luwin
text: luwin He is worth more to you alive than dead. The Starks will pay. Please, Theon, think what you do.

title: The Old Gods and the New
Name: theon
text: theon You'll address me as Prince Theon or you'll be next.

title: The Old Gods and the New
Name: dagmer
text: dagmer Come.

title: The Old Gods and the New
Name: bran
text: bran No! No! Theon! Please. Ser Rodrik!

title: The Old Gods and the New
Name: rodrik
text: rodrik He who passes the sentence should swing the sword.

title: The Old Gods and the New
Name: bran
text: bran I'm begging you.

title: The Old Gods and the New
Name: rodrik
text: rodrik Coward.

title: The Old Gods and the New
Name: bran
text: bran Stop. Stop! Stop right now!

title: The Old Gods and the New
Name: theon
text: theon You don't give commands anymore, little lord.

title: The Old Gods and the New
Name: bran
text: bran Please, stop this. Please stop him.

title: The Old Gods and the New
Name: rodrik
text: rodrik Hush now, child. I'm off to see your father.

title: The Old Gods and the New
Name: bran
text: bran You said no harm would come! You said no harm would come. Theon, please.

title: The Old Gods and the New
Name: theon
text: theon Any last words, old man?

title: The Old Gods and the New
Name: rodrik
text: rodrik Gods help you, Theon Greyjoy. Now you are truly lost.

title: The Old Gods and the New
Name: bran
text: bran Theon, please don't.

title: The Old Gods and the New
Name: rickon
text: rickon Do something!

title: The Old Gods and the New
Name: bran
text: bran I'll do anything, please! No, please stop it!

title: The Old Gods and the New
Name: jon
text: jon Ghost, stay with us. Ghost!

title: The Old Gods and the New
Name: qhorin
text: qhorin There goes your pet.

title: The Old Gods and the New
Name: jon
text: jon He's not a pet.

title: The Old Gods and the New
Name: qhorin
text: qhorin No, you're right, he's not. You can't tame a wild thing. You can't trust a wild thing.

title: The Old Gods and the New
Name: jon
text: jon Ghost is different.

title: The Old Gods and the New
Name: qhorin
text: qhorin So you think. Wild creatures have their own rules, their own reasons. And you'll never know them. Now the wildlings we're looking for sleep during the day and hunt at night.

title: The Old Gods and the New
Name: jon
text: jon I thought you said you couldn't know wild things.

title: The Old Gods and the New
Name: qhorin
text: qhorin I said you can't. They find a nice cave to hide in while the sun's up and do their killing when it's dark.

title: The Old Gods and the New
Name: jon
text: jon We could do the same.

title: The Old Gods and the New
Name: qhorin
text: qhorin No, we couldn't. This is their country. They know where to walk, where not to walk. I've lost good men who fell into a crevasse they didn't see till they were in it.

title: The Old Gods and the New
Name: jon
text: jon My father always said I'm of the North.

title: The Old Gods and the New
Name: jon
text: jon I wasn't joking.

title: The Old Gods and the New
Name: qhorin
text: qhorin Look around, boy. This look like home to you? You start thinking you know this place, it will kill you. You understand me?

title: The Old Gods and the New
Name: qhorin
text: qhorin No, you don't. We're at war. We've always been at war. It's never going to end 'cause we're not fighting an enemy. We're fighting the North, and it's not going anywhere. The Watch has given you a great gift. You only have one thing to give in return, your life.

title: The Old Gods and the New
Name: jon
text: jon I'll gladly give my life.

title: The Old Gods and the New
Name: qhorin
text: qhorin I don't want you to be glad about it. I want you to curse and fight until your heart's done pumping. And know this, boy. Your death will be a gift for them south of the Wall. They'll never know what you've done. They'll never know how you died. They won't even know your damn name. But they'll be alive because some nameless bastard north of the Wall gave his life for theirs. Now, do you understand me?

title: The Old Gods and the New
Name: jon
text: jon I do.

title: The Old Gods and the New
Name: qhorin
text: qhorin You're even dumber than you look. It's just words, boy, to keep us a little warmer in the night. Make us feel like we've got a purpose. Come on. We've got to find these goat fuckers before night falls and they find us.

title: The Old Gods and the New
Name: tywin
text: tywin Can you read?

title: The Old Gods and the New
Name: amory
text: amory My lord?

title: The Old Gods and the New
Name: tywin
text: tywin This letter detailing our infantry movements was meant for Lord Damon of House Marbrand. It was sent to Lord Marlyn of House Dormand.

title: The Old Gods and the New
Name: amory
text: amory My apologies, my lord. I must have-

title: The Old Gods and the New
Name: tywin
text: tywin Girl, fetch me the History of the Greater and the Lesser Houses. It's the one on this-

title: The Old Gods and the New
Name: tywin
text: tywin My cupbearer can read better than you.

title: The Old Gods and the New
Name: tywin
text: tywin To whom does House Dormand owe allegiance?

title: The Old Gods and the New
Name: armory
text: armory My lord, I-

title: The Old Gods and the New
Name: tywin
text: tywin To the Starks of Winterfell! Who have twenty thousand men and my son! I judged you might be good for something more than brutalizing peasants. I see I overestimated you. If you ever put my son's life at risk again, I'll Leave us.

title: The Old Gods and the New
Name: tywin
text: tywin Put the book away, girl. Maybe you should devise our next battle plan while you're about it.

title: The Old Gods and the New
Name: guard
text: guard Lord Petyr Baelish.

title: The Old Gods and the New
Name: tywin
text: tywin Mmm. Give us the room.

title: The Old Gods and the New
Name: tywin
text: tywin Clear all this.

title: The Old Gods and the New
Name: petyr
text: petyr Lord Tywin.

title: The Old Gods and the New
Name: tywin
text: tywin Baelish.

title: The Old Gods and the New
Name: tywin
text: tywin Wine?

title: The Old Gods and the New
Name: petyr
text: petyr Thank you.

title: The Old Gods and the New
Name: tywin
text: tywin What news from the capital?

title: The Old Gods and the New
Name: petyr
text: petyr I traveled here directly from Renly Baratheon's camp.

title: The Old Gods and the New
Name: tywin
text: tywin Ah, the late King Renly. Rather a short reign. Murdered by a woman, I hear.

title: The Old Gods and the New
Name: petyr
text: petyr So they say. There has been talk of other forces at work. Dark forces.

title: The Old Gods and the New
Name: tywin
text: tywin Here. Men love to blame demons when their grand plans unravel.

title: The Old Gods and the New
Name: petyr
text: petyr It is my belief that a moment of chaos affords opportunities lost soon after.

title: The Old Gods and the New
Name: tywin
text: tywin You say that as if you were the first man alive to think it. Yes, a crisis is an opportunity. What other brilliant insights have you brought me today?

title: The Old Gods and the New
Name: petyr
text: petyr After the Lannisters and the Starks, the Tyrells command the largest host. Their lands are the most fertile in the Seven Kingdoms, feeding horses and soldiers.

title: The Old Gods and the New
Name: tywin
text: tywin Yes, yes, yes.

title: The Old Gods and the New
Name: petyr
text: petyr The Tyrells have not yet declared for any of the surviving kings. Loras wants revenge. He blames Stannis for Renly's death. And Margaery-

title: The Old Gods and the New
Name: tywin
text: tywin Wants to be queen.

title: The Old Gods and the New
Name: petyr
text: petyr Yes, she does.

title: The Old Gods and the New
Name: tywin
text: tywin House Tyrell rebelled against the Iron Throne. Against my grandson.

title: The Old Gods and the New
Name: petyr
text: petyr They did. And perhaps that treason should be punished one day, after Stannis and Robb Stark are defeated.

title: The Old Gods and the New
Name: tywin
text: tywin More wine for Lord Baelish.

title: The Old Gods and the New
Name: petyr
text: petyr If you will allow me to represent your family's interests, I believe that an advantageous agreement TYWIN

title: The Old Gods and the New
Name: petyr
text: petyr They have.

title: The Old Gods and the New
Name: arya
text: arya Pardon, my lord.

title: The Old Gods and the New
Name: petyr
text: petyr It's only wine.

title: The Old Gods and the New
Name: tywin
text: tywin You would ride there yourself?

title: The Old Gods and the New
Name: petyr
text: petyr Tonight, with your leave.

title: The Old Gods and the New
Name: tywin
text: tywin I'll have an answer by nightfall. That'll be all, girl.

title: The Old Gods and the New
Name: tywin
text: tywin And what else?

title: The Old Gods and the New
Name: petyr
text: petyr On your son Tyrion's directive, I met with Catelyn Stark.

title: The Old Gods and the New
Name: tywin
text: tywin Why?

title: The Old Gods and the New
Name: petyr
text: petyr He had an interesting proposal for her concerning her daughters.

title: The Old Gods and the New
Name: tywin
text: tywin Hmm.

title: The Old Gods and the New
Name: jon
text: jon A girl.

title: The Old Gods and the New
Name: qhorin
text: qhorin A wildling.

title: The Old Gods and the New
Name: jon
text: jon We could question her.

title: The Old Gods and the New
Name: qhorin
text: qhorin You could. She won't answer. I've known a wildling to bite off his tongue instead of talking.

title: The Old Gods and the New
Name: jon
text: jon What's your name?

title: The Old Gods and the New
Name: ygritte
text: ygritte Ygritte.

title: The Old Gods and the New
Name: qhorin
text: qhorin She was reaching for this ax when you got to her. Give her half a chance, she'll bury it in your face.

title: The Old Gods and the New
Name: ygritte
text: ygritte I gave you my name.

title: The Old Gods and the New
Name: jon
text: jon I'm Jon Snow.

title: The Old Gods and the New
Name: ygritte
text: ygritte You ought to burn them you killed.

title: The Old Gods and the New
Name: qhorin
text: qhorin We'd need a big fire for that. Tell me, Ygritte. Why do you want us to build a big fire? Are there some more friends in the area?

title: The Old Gods and the New
Name: ygritte
text: ygritte Burn them or maybe you'll need those swords again.

title: The Old Gods and the New
Name: qhorin
text: qhorin Our boy here's already killed one dead man. He can do it again if he has to. What waits beyond the pass?

title: The Old Gods and the New
Name: ygritte
text: ygritte The Free Folk.

title: The Old Gods and the New
Name: qhorin
text: qhorin How many?

title: The Old Gods and the New
Name: ygritte
text: ygritte Hundreds and thousands. More than you've ever seen, crow.

title: The Old Gods and the New
Name: qhorin
text: qhorin Why come to the mountains? What's in the Frostfangs your king could want?

title: The Old Gods and the New
Name: qhorin
text: qhorin Do you mean to march on the Wall?

title: The Old Gods and the New
Name: qhorin
text: qhorin Do you know who I am, girl?

title: The Old Gods and the New
Name: ygritte
text: ygritte Qhorin Halfhand.

title: The Old Gods and the New
Name: qhorin
text: qhorin Tell me true. If your people captured me, would they take me prisoner?

title: The Old Gods and the New
Name: ygritte
text: ygritte They'd take your head off your shoulders if they was feeling kind. If not, they'd kill you slow.

title: The Old Gods and the New
Name: qhorin
text: qhorin We have no food for her. Can't spare a man to watch her. Can't let her go. She'll bring Mance Rayder's army down on us. It needs to be done. Want me to do it?

title: The Old Gods and the New
Name: jon
text: jon No. No, I'll do it.

title: The Old Gods and the New
Name: qhorin
text: qhorin Come, brothers. We'll leave him to it. We'll meet you at the top. Don't take too long. We're deep in their country now.

title: The Old Gods and the New
Name: ygritte
text: ygritte You never killed a woman before, did you? You don't need to do it. Mance would take you. I know he would. There's secret ways. The crows would never catch us.

title: The Old Gods and the New
Name: jon
text: jon I'm as much a crow as they are.

title: The Old Gods and the New
Name: ygritte
text: ygritte Will you burn me? After?

title: The Old Gods and the New
Name: jon
text: jon Can't. Someone might see the smoke.

title: The Old Gods and the New
Name: ygritte
text: ygritte Strike hard and true, Jon Snow, or I'll come back and haunt you. That's cold.

title: The Old Gods and the New
Name: ygritte
text: ygritte Go on. Be quick about it.

title: The Old Gods and the New
Name: ygritte
text: ygritte Do it. Bastard, do it!

title: The Old Gods and the New
Name: ygritte
text: ygritte You can't do it. We both know it.

title: The Old Gods and the New
Name: ygritte
text: ygritte The sun's going down, Jon Snow. And your friends are nowhere close.

title: The Old Gods and the New
Name: jon
text: jon I'll find them.

title: The Old Gods and the New
Name: ygritte
text: ygritte Call for them. Go on. Call loudly.

title: The Old Gods and the New
Name: septon
text: septon May the Seven guide the princess on her journey. May the Mother give her health. May the crone give her wisdom. May the warrior give her courage.

title: The Old Gods and the New
Name: cersei
text: cersei One day I pray you love someone. I pray you love her so much, when you close your eyes, you see her face. I want that for you. I want you to know what it's like to love someone, to truly love someone. Before I take her from you.

title: The Old Gods and the New
Name: joffrey
text: joffrey You sound like a little cat mewling for his mother. Princes don't cry.

title: The Old Gods and the New
Name: sansa
text: sansa I saw you cry.

title: The Old Gods and the New
Name: joffrey
text: joffrey Did you say something, my lady?

title: The Old Gods and the New
Name: sansa
text: sansa My little brother cried when I left Winterfell.

title: The Old Gods and the New
Name: joffrey
text: joffrey So?

title: The Old Gods and the New
Name: sansa
text: sansa It seems a normal thing.

title: The Old Gods and the New
Name: joffrey
text: joffrey Is your little brother a prince?

title: The Old Gods and the New
Name: sansa
text: sansa No.

title: The Old Gods and the New
Name: joffrey
text: joffrey Not really relevant then, is it? Come, dog.

title: The Old Gods and the New
Name: man
text: man Hail Joffrey! Hail to the King. Seven blessings on you, Your Grace.

title: The Old Gods and the New
Name: man
text: man Murderer! Bastard!

title: The Old Gods and the New
Name: man
text: man All hail the King.

title: The Old Gods and the New
Name: man
text: man He's no king.

title: The Old Gods and the New
Name: man
text: man He's a bastard!

title: The Old Gods and the New
Name: man
text: man Please, Your Grace, we're hungry.

title: The Old Gods and the New
Name: man
text: man Freak.

title: The Old Gods and the New
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion Get the Prince back to the Keep now.

title: The Old Gods and the New
Name: guard
text: guard Yes, my lord. Come, quickly.

title: The Old Gods and the New
Name: woman
text: woman Please, Your Grace, give us some food!

title: The Old Gods and the New
Name: man
text: man Bread, Your Grace, please!

title: The Old Gods and the New
Name: joffrey
text: joffrey Who threw that? I want the man who threw that. Find who did that and bring him to me!

title: The Old Gods and the New
Name: guard
text: guard Hold on!

title: The Old Gods and the New
Name: guard
text: guard Hold them back!

title: The Old Gods and the New
Name: joffrey
text: joffrey Just kill them! Kill them all!

title: The Old Gods and the New
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion Move. Move!

title: The Old Gods and the New
Name: guard
text: guard Pull back!

title: The Old Gods and the New
Name: man
text: man Tear him to pieces!

title: The Old Gods and the New
Name: joffrey
text: joffrey What are you doing? I want these people executed!

title: The Old Gods and the New
Name: sandor
text: sandor And they want the same for you.

title: The Old Gods and the New
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion Where's Sansa?

title: The Old Gods and the New
Name: guard
text: guard Through the door.

title: The Old Gods and the New
Name: guard
text: guard Come on.

title: The Old Gods and the New
Name: guard
text: guard Push hard.

title: The Old Gods and the New
Name: meryn
text: meryn Protect the king!

title: The Old Gods and the New
Name: guard
text: guard Get back!

title: The Old Gods and the New
Name: guard
text: guard Fall back! Keep him safe!

title: The Old Gods and the New
Name: guard
text: guard Come in! Come in!

title: The Old Gods and the New
Name: cuard
text: cuard Keep him safe!

title: The Old Gods and the New
Name: crowd
text: crowd Motherfucker! Brotherfucker!

title: The Old Gods and the New
Name: guard
text: guard Watch out. Hold them back.

title: The Old Gods and the New
Name: man
text: man Hey.

title: The Old Gods and the New
Name: joffrey
text: joffrey Traitors! I'll have all their heads.

title: The Old Gods and the New
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion Oh, you blind, bloody fool!

title: The Old Gods and the New
Name: joffrey
text: joffrey You can't insult me.

title: The Old Gods and the New
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion We've had vicious kings and we've had idiot kings, but I don't know if we've ever been cursed with a vicious idiot for a king.

title: The Old Gods and the New
Name: joffrey
text: joffrey You can't-

title: The Old Gods and the New
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion I can, I am.

title: The Old Gods and the New
Name: joffrey
text: joffrey They attacked me!

title: The Old Gods and the New
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion They threw a cow pie at you, so you decided to kill them all? They're starving, you fool! All because of a war you started.

title: The Old Gods and the New
Name: joffrey
text: joffrey You're talking to a king!

title: The Old Gods and the New
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion And now I've struck a king. Did my hand fall from my wrist? Where is the Stark girl?

title: The Old Gods and the New
Name: joffrey
text: joffrey Let them have her!

title: The Old Gods and the New
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion If she dies, you'll never get your Uncle Jaime back! You owe him quite a bit, you know.

title: The Old Gods and the New
Name: man
text: man Where are you going?

title: The Old Gods and the New
Name: man
text: man You ever been fucked, little girl? Come here.

title: The Old Gods and the New
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion Take some men and go and find the Stark girl.

title: The Old Gods and the New
Name: meryn
text: meryn I take my orders from the king.

title: The Old Gods and the New
Name: man
text: man Where? This way.

title: The Old Gods and the New
Name: sansa
text: sansa Please! No! No!

title: The Old Gods and the New
Name: man
text: man Please!

title: The Old Gods and the New
Name: sandor
text: sandor You're all right now, little bird. You're all right.

title: The Old Gods and the New
Name: man
text: man We'll get you.

title: The Old Gods and the New
Name: man
text: man This way.

title: The Old Gods and the New
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion Are you hurt, my lady?

title: The Old Gods and the New
Name: sandor
text: sandor The little birdo s bleeding. Someone take her back to her cage. See to that cut.

title: The Old Gods and the New
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion Well done, Clegane.

title: The Old Gods and the New
Name: sandor
text: sandor I didn't do it for you.

title: The Old Gods and the New
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys He shouldn't make me wait.

title: The Old Gods and the New
Name: xaro
text: xaro The Spice King is the second wealthiest man in Qarth. He makes everyone wait. Of course, you could have avoided this embarrassment if you married the wealthiest man in Qarth.

title: The Old Gods and the New
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys I already have a husband.

title: The Old Gods and the New
Name: xaro
text: xaro Khal Drogo is gone, Khaleesi. You are far too young to be a widow forever and far too beautiful.

title: The Old Gods and the New
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys And you are far too smart to think that I will succumb to flattery.

title: The Old Gods and the New
Name: xaro
text: xaro I have traveled very far in my life and met many women, but none that are immune to flattery.

title: The Old Gods and the New
Name: spice
text: spice The Mother of Dragons!

title: The Old Gods and the New
Name: xaro
text: xaro Ah, here he comes.

title: The Old Gods and the New
Name: spice
text: spice Forgive me. I had terrible dreams last night. Terrible dreams. I could not sleep until the sun was shining and the birds were singing. Look what a beauty you are now the Red Waste has been washed off you. I am sorry about all that unpleasantness. The silver hair of a true Targaryen. Xaro Xhoan Daxos, she is far too lovely for a glorified dockworker like yourself.

title: The Old Gods and the New
Name: xaro
text: xaro Very true, and yet they say that your grandfather, who sold pepper off the back of a wagon, married a lady far lovelier and higher born than himself.

title: The Old Gods and the New
Name: spice
text: spice Every lady alive was lovelier and higher born than my grandfather. Did my servants not offer you something to eat, to drink? I'll have them flogged in the square.

title: The Old Gods and the New
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys Thank you, my lord. You are a gracious host, but there is no servant alive that can bring me what I want.

title: The Old Gods and the New
Name: spice
text: spice Oh, she has a talent for drama, this one. So, my little princess, what is it you want?

title: The Old Gods and the New
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys My birthright. The Seven Kingdoms of Westeros.

title: The Old Gods and the New
Name: spice
text: spice I fear I'm no better than a servant in this regard. I cannot give you what I do not have.

title: The Old Gods and the New
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys I'm not asking you for the kingdoms. I'm asking you for ships.

title: The Old Gods and the New
Name: spice
text: spice I need to cross the Narrow Sea. I need my ships as well. I use them, you see, to bring spices from one port to another.

title: The Old Gods and the New
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys Whatever you grant me now will be repaid three times over when I retake the Iron Throne.

title: The Old Gods and the New
Name: spice
text: spice Retake? Did you once sit on the Iron Throne?

title: The Old Gods and the New
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys My father sat there, before he was murdered.

title: The Old Gods and the New
Name: spice
text: spice But if you did not sit on it yourself, would it not be correct to say "take the Iron Throne"?

title: The Old Gods and the New
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys I didn't come here to argue grammar.

title: The Old Gods and the New
Name: spice
text: spice Of course not. You came to take my ships. So let me explain my position, little princess. Unlike you, I do not have exalted ancestors. I make my living by trade. And I judge every trade on its merits. You ask for ships. You say I shall be repaid triple. I do not doubt your honesty or your intentions. But before you repay your debts, you must seize the Seven Kingdoms. Do you have an army?

title: The Old Gods and the New
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys Not yet.

title: The Old Gods and the New
Name: spice
text: spice You do not have an army. Do you have powerful allies in Westeros?

title: The Old Gods and the New
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys There are many there that support my claim.

title: The Old Gods and the New
Name: spice
text: spice When were you there last?

title: The Old Gods and the New
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys I left when I was a baby.

title: The Old Gods and the New
Name: spice
text: spice So, in truth, you have no allies.

title: The Old Gods and the New
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys The people will rise to fight for their rightful queen when I return.

title: The Old Gods and the New
Name: spice
text: spice Ah. Forgive me, little princess, but I cannot make an investment based on wishes and dreams. Now if you'll pardon me.

title: The Old Gods and the New
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys Do you know lllyrio Mopatis, Magister of Pentos? Yes, we've met.

title: The Old Gods and the New
Name: spice
text: spice A shrewd man.

title: The Old Gods and the New
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys For my wedding, he gave me three petrified dragon eggs. He believed The world believed that the ages had turned them to stone. How many centuries has it been since dragons roamed the skies? But I dreamt that if I carried those eggs into a great fire, they would hatch. When I stepped into the fire, my own people thought I was mad. But when the fire burned out, I was unhurt, the Mother of Dragons.

title: The Old Gods and the New
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys Do you understand? I'm no ordinary woman. My dreams come true.

title: The Old Gods and the New
Name: spice
text: spice I admire your passion. But in business, I trust in logic, not passion. I'm sorry, little princess.

title: The Old Gods and the New
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys I am not your little princess. I am Daenerys Stormborn of the blood of Old Valyria, and I will take what is mine. With fire and blood, I will take it.

title: The Old Gods and the New
Name: spice
text: spice Yes, my lady, but not with my ships.

title: The Old Gods and the New
Name: tywin
text: tywin Who taught you to read?

title: The Old Gods and the New
Name: arya
text: arya My father, my lord.

title: The Old Gods and the New
Name: tywin
text: tywin Hmm. I taught my son Jaime to read. The maester came to me one day, told me he wasn't learning. He couldn't make sense of the letters. He reversed them in his head. The maester said he'd heard tell of this affliction and that we simply must accept it. Ha! After that, I sat Jaime down for four hours every day until he learned. He hated me for it, for a time. For a long time. But he learned. Hmm. Where is your father? Is he alive? Who was he?

title: The Old Gods and the New
Name: arya
text: arya A stonemason.

title: The Old Gods and the New
Name: tywin
text: tywin A stonemason who could read? Hmm.

title: The Old Gods and the New
Name: arya
text: arya He taught himself.

title: The Old Gods and the New
Name: tywin
text: tywin Quite a man. What killed him?

title: The Old Gods and the New
Name: arya
text: arya Loyalty.

title: The Old Gods and the New
Name: tywin
text: tywin You're a sharp little thing, aren't you?

title: The Old Gods and the New
Name: arya
text: arya Did... Forgive me, my lord. I shouldn't ask questions.

title: The Old Gods and the New
Name: tywin
text: tywin No. But you've already begun.

title: The Old Gods and the New
Name: arya
text: arya Did you know your father, my lord?

title: The Old Gods and the New
Name: tywin
text: tywin I did. I grew up with him. I watched him grow old.

title: The Old Gods and the New
Name: tywin
text: tywin He loved us. He was a good man, but a weak man. A weak man who nearly destroyed our house and name. I'm cold.

title: The Old Gods and the New
Name: arya
text: arya I'll fetch more wood for the fire, my lord.

title: The Old Gods and the New
Name: tywin
text: tywin Mmm.

title: The Old Gods and the New
Name: amory
text: amory Where are you going, girl?

title: The Old Gods and the New
Name: arya
text: arya The armory, my lord.

title: The Old Gods and the New
Name: amory
text: amory Why?

title: The Old Gods and the New
Name: arya
text: arya Lord Tywin sent me.

title: The Old Gods and the New
Name: amory
text: amory What might this be?

title: The Old Gods and the New
Name: arya
text: arya Lord Tywin gave it to me.

title: The Old Gods and the New
Name: amory
text: amory What for?

title: The Old Gods and the New
Name: arya
text: arya To take to the armory.

title: The Old Gods and the New
Name: amory
text: amory Why would he do that? Let's go and ask him.

title: The Old Gods and the New
Name: amory
text: amory Move! Get out of the way!

title: The Old Gods and the New
Name: arya
text: arya Amory Lorch.

title: The Old Gods and the New
Name: jaqen
text: jaqen A girl has named a second name. A man will do what must be done.

title: The Old Gods and the New
Name: arya
text: arya Now!

title: The Old Gods and the New
Name: jaqen
text: jaqen A girl cannot tell a man when exactly he must do a thing. A man cannot make a thing happen before its time.

title: The Old Gods and the New
Name: arya
text: arya But he's going to tell Tywin. He's getting away. It has to be now.

title: The Old Gods and the New
Name: tywin
text: tywin Guard!

title: The Old Gods and the New
Name: soldier
text: soldier Your Grace.

title: The Old Gods and the New
Name: soldier
text: soldier My honor, Your Grace.

title: The Old Gods and the New
Name: quent
text: quent Your Grace.

title: The Old Gods and the New
Name: robb
text: robb Quent.

title: The Old Gods and the New
Name: robb
text: robb Lady Talisa.

title: The Old Gods and the New
Name: talisa
text: talisa Your Grace. I'm not sure I'm a lady. Westerosi customs are still a bit foreign to me.

title: The Old Gods and the New
Name: robb
text: robb It's hard to keep all the rules straight. But if I remember my lessons, a woman of noble birth is always called a lady. Unless she's a queen or a princess. I could find someone who knows.

title: The Old Gods and the New
Name: talisa
text: talisa Why are you so sure I'm of noble birth?

title: The Old Gods and the New
Name: robb
text: robb Because it's obvious.

title: The Old Gods and the New
Name: talisa
text: talisa What if I told you my father sold lace on the Long Bridge, and my mother, my brother, and I lived with him above our shop?

title: The Old Gods and the New
Name: robb
text: robb I'd call you a liar.

title: The Old Gods and the New
Name: talisa
text: talisa Not very noble to accuse a lady of dishonesty.

title: The Old Gods and the New
Name: talisa
text: talisa I always thought I was a brilliant liar.

title: The Old Gods and the New
Name: robb
text: robb Better at amputations, I'm afraid.

title: The Old Gods and the New
Name: robb
text: robb Quite a pretty spot.

title: The Old Gods and the New
Name: talisa
text: talisa Will we be here long?

title: The Old Gods and the New
Name: robb
text: robb I couldn't really discuss troop movements with you.

title: The Old Gods and the New
Name: talisa
text: talisa I'm not a spy.

title: The Old Gods and the New
Name: robb
text: robb Of course, a spy would deny being a spy.

title: The Old Gods and the New
Name: talisa
text: talisa You're right. You've found me out. I'm writing a letter to the Lannisters. "The Young Wolf is on the move. "

title: The Old Gods and the New
Name: robb
text: robb Perhaps you'd join me... If you've got time, of course, for, well-

title: The Old Gods and the New
Name: catelyn
text: catelyn Robb.

title: The Old Gods and the New
Name: robb
text: robb Mother. Mother, this is Lady Talisa. She's been helping with the wounded. She's been very... helpful.

title: The Old Gods and the New
Name: catelyn
text: catelyn Lady Talisa.

title: The Old Gods and the New
Name: talisa
text: talisa Lady Stark.

title: The Old Gods and the New
Name: catelyn
text: catelyn Lady Talisa...?

title: The Old Gods and the New
Name: talisa
text: talisa Maegyr.

title: The Old Gods and the New
Name: catelyn
text: catelyn Maegyr? Forgive me, I do not know this name.

title: The Old Gods and the New
Name: talisa
text: talisa An uncommon name here. An old name in Volantis. Excuse me, my lady. Your Grace.

title: The Old Gods and the New
Name: robb
text: robb I've missed you.

title: The Old Gods and the New
Name: catelyn
text: catelyn Yes, you look positively forlorn.

title: The Old Gods and the New
Name: robb
text: robb You surprised me, that's all. I didn't think I'd see you today.

title: The Old Gods and the New
Name: catelyn
text: catelyn I wish that you were free to follow your heart.

title: The Old Gods and the New
Name: robb
text: robb I know.

title: The Old Gods and the New
Name: catelyn
text: catelyn You have inherited your father's responsibilities. I'm afraid they come at a cost. You are promised to another.

title: The Old Gods and the New
Name: catelyn
text: catelyn A debt that must be paid.

title: The Old Gods and the New
Name: robb
text: robb I haven't forgotten.

title: The Old Gods and the New
Name: roose
text: roose Your Grace. My lady. News from Winterfell.

title: The Old Gods and the New
Name: ygritte
text: ygritte Your brothers desert you? I can tell you which way to go.

title: The Old Gods and the New
Name: jon
text: jon We'll stop here. Too dark to go any farther today.

title: The Old Gods and the New
Name: ygritte
text: ygritte Here? There's no shelter here.

title: The Old Gods and the New
Name: jon
text: jon There's no shelter anywhere.

title: The Old Gods and the New
Name: ygritte
text: ygritte There is if you know where to look. The cold could kill us both. If you light a fire-

title: The Old Gods and the New
Name: jon
text: jon No fire.

title: The Old Gods and the New
Name: ygritte
text: ygritte But a fire is-

title: The Old Gods and the New
Name: ygritte
text: ygritte Have it your way.

title: The Old Gods and the New
Name: ygritte
text: ygritte We'll stay warmer if we stay close.

title: The Old Gods and the New
Name: ygritte
text: ygritte Bet you freeze to death before I do. Bet your life.

title: The Old Gods and the New
Name: ygritte
text: ygritte Think they're out looking for you?

title: The Old Gods and the New
Name: jon
text: jon Yes.

title: The Old Gods and the New
Name: ygritte
text: ygritte Think they'll find you?

title: The Old Gods and the New
Name: ygritte
text: ygritte You're brave. Stupid, but brave.

title: The Old Gods and the New
Name: jon
text: jon We start again at first light. Get some sleep.

title: The Old Gods and the New
Name: jon
text: jon Stop moving.

title: The Old Gods and the New
Name: ygritte
text: ygritte I'm just trying to get comfortable.

title: The Old Gods and the New
Name: jon
text: jon Stop it!

title: The Old Gods and the New
Name: jon
text: jon You're still moving.

title: The Old Gods and the New
Name: ygritte
text: ygritte Was I? I didn't notice that time.

title: The Old Gods and the New
Name: robb
text: robb This cannot be true.

title: The Old Gods and the New
Name: roose
text: roose We've had ravens from White Harbor, Barrowton and the Dreadfort. I'm afraid it is true.

title: The Old Gods and the New
Name: robb
text: robb Why? Why would Theon-

title: The Old Gods and the New
Name: roose
text: roose Because the Greyjoys are treasonous whores.

title: The Old Gods and the New
Name: robb
text: robb My brothers?

title: The Old Gods and the New
Name: roose
text: roose We've heard nothing of them. But Rodrik Cassel is dead.

title: The Old Gods and the New
Name: catelyn
text: catelyn I told you, never trust a Greyjoy!

title: The Old Gods and the New
Name: robb
text: robb I must go north at once.

title: The Old Gods and the New
Name: roose
text: roose There's still a war to win, Your Grace.

title: The Old Gods and the New
Name: robb
text: robb How can I call myself king if I can't hold my own castle? How can I ask men to follow me if I can't-

title: The Old Gods and the New
Name: roose
text: roose You are a king. And that means you don't have to do everything yourself.

title: The Old Gods and the New
Name: catelyn
text: catelyn Let me go and talk to Theon.

title: The Old Gods and the New
Name: robb
text: robb There will be no talk. He will die for this.

title: The Old Gods and the New
Name: roose
text: roose Theon holds the castle with a skeleton crew. Let me send word to my bastard at the Dreadfort. He can raise a few hundred men and retake Winterfell before the new moon. We have the Lannisters on the run. If you march all the way back north now, you'll lose what you gained. My boy would be honored to bring you Prince Theon's head.

title: The Old Gods and the New
Name: robb
text: robb Tell your son Bran and Rickon's safety is paramount. And Theon, I want him brought to me alive. I want to look him in the eye and ask him why. And then I'll take his head myself.

title: The Old Gods and the New
Name: theon
text: theon Why on earth would I trust the word of a lying little savage like you?

title: The Old Gods and the New
Name: osha
text: osha I'm no liar.

title: The Old Gods and the New
Name: theon
text: theon All wildlings are liars and savages with no loyalty to anything or anyone.

title: The Old Gods and the New
Name: osha
text: osha I done what I had to do to stay alive. I hate the Starks as well as you do. Let me serve you, my lord.

title: The Old Gods and the New
Name: theon
text: theon How? And don't tell me to put a spear in your hand.

title: The Old Gods and the New
Name: osha
text: osha There are other ways to serve, my lord.

title: The Old Gods and the New
Name: theon
text: theon I'm a prince now, and you'd do well-

title: The Old Gods and the New
Name: ahsa
text: ahsa There are other ways to serve, my prince.

title: The Old Gods and the New
Name: theon
text: theon Like what?

title: The Old Gods and the New
Name: osha
text: osha We know things, the free people.

title: The Old Gods and the New
Name: theon
text: theon You know things? Like what? How to eat dirt?

title: The Old Gods and the New
Name: osha
text: osha Other things.

title: The Old Gods and the New
Name: osha
text: osha Savage things.

title: The Old Gods and the New
Name: theon
text: theon Wait outside.

title: The Old Gods and the New
Name: theon
text: theon I always wondered what you had under there.

title: The Old Gods and the New
Name: osha
text: osha It comes at a price.

title: The Old Gods and the New
Name: theon
text: theon I'm not killing you. That's your price.

title: The Old Gods and the New
Name: osha
text: osha I already had that.

title: The Old Gods and the New
Name: theon
text: theon What do you want then, other than your miserable life?

title: The Old Gods and the New
Name: ahsa
text: ahsa What all free people want. My freedom.

title: The Old Gods and the New
Name: theon
text: theon Well, you shall have it, then. But only if you serve me well.

title: The Old Gods and the New
Name: sansa
text: sansa Ow!

title: The Old Gods and the New
Name: shae
text: shae Shh. It's not deep.

title: The Old Gods and the New
Name: sansa
text: sansa I thought they were going to kill me.

title: The Old Gods and the New
Name: shae
text: shae They thought so, too.

title: The Old Gods and the New
Name: sansa
text: sansa He hated me, the man who hit me. I saw it in his eyes. Hated me. He never met me before, but he wanted to hurt me.

title: The Old Gods and the New
Name: shae
text: shae Of course he did.

title: The Old Gods and the New
Name: sansa
text: sansa Why? Why would a stranger-

title: The Old Gods and the New
Name: shae
text: shae You are everything he will never have. Your horse eats better than his children. It doesn't matter now. He's dead.

title: The Old Gods and the New
Name: sansa
text: sansa I would have given them bread if I had it. I hate the king more than any of them.

title: The Old Gods and the New
Name: shae
text: shae Don't say these things. If the wrong people hear you-

title: The Old Gods and the New
Name: sansa
text: sansa But you're not the wrong people.

title: The Old Gods and the New
Name: shae
text: shae Don't trust anybody. Life is safer that way.

title: The Old Gods and the New
Name: guard
text: guard And where are you going?

title: The Old Gods and the New
Name: osha
text: osha I have something for you from Prince Theon.

title: The Old Gods and the New
Name: guard
text: guard What?

title: The Old Gods and the New
Name: osha
text: osha Me. He says I'm to make the rounds. And keep you warm.

title: The Old Gods and the New
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys The Spice King refuses me because I'm a bad investment. The Silk King won't support me because of his business with the Lannisters. Why offend his best customer? And the Copper King offers me a single ship on the condition that I lie with him for a night. Does he think I will whore myself for a boat?

title: The Old Gods and the New
Name: xaro
text: xaro When I came to this city, I had nothing. Truly nothing. I slept by the docks. And when I could find work loading the ships, I would eat. If not, I dreamed of food. Today, I am the richest man in Qarth. Do you think the path from poverty to wealth is always pure and honorable? I have done many things, Khaleesi, that a righteous man would condemn. And here I am, with no regrets.

title: The Old Gods and the New
Name: xaro
text: xaro Bar the gates. Ring the bells. Slowly, Khaleesi.

title: The Old Gods and the New
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys Where are they? Where are my dragons?

title: A Man Without Honor
Name: theon
text: theon A cripple? You let a cripple escape? The boy can't walk, but somehow he slipped past you?

title: A Man Without Honor
Name: black
text: black The giant must have took him.

title: A Man Without Honor
Name: theon
text: theon The giant? Hodor? Oh, that's all right, then. You let a halfwit escape with a cripple. And Rickon, too? The little one?

title: A Man Without Honor
Name: black
text: black Gone, along with the wildling woman. The one you were fucking.

title: A Man Without Honor
Name: theon
text: theon Right. Get the horses and the hounds.

title: A Man Without Honor
Name: man
text: man Come on, find the scent. Where they going?

title: A Man Without Honor
Name: dagmer
text: dagmer Halt!

title: A Man Without Honor
Name: theon
text: theon Enjoying your first hunt?

title: A Man Without Honor
Name: luwin
text: luwin So far, hunting seems very similar to riding, my lord.

title: A Man Without Honor
Name: theon
text: theon With hunting, there's blood at the end.

title: A Man Without Honor
Name: luwin
text: luwin They're little boys.

title: A Man Without Honor
Name: theon
text: theon I was a little boy when I was torn away from my home and brought here. So I kept my word. I never ran away. If I find them soon enough, I won't hurt them. Well, I'll hurt them, but I won't kill them.

title: A Man Without Honor
Name: luwin
text: luwin Those boys are of far more value to you alive than dead.

title: A Man Without Honor
Name: theon
text: theon They have no value to me missing.

title: A Man Without Honor
Name: luwin
text: luwin Robb will have sent a force to retake Winterfell by now.

title: A Man Without Honor
Name: theon
text: theon Robb's in the Riverlands. My sister's in Deepwood Motte. She'll get here long before they do. And Ned Stark always said 500 men could hold Winterfell again 10,000.

title: A Man Without Honor
Name: man
text: man We have a scent!

title: A Man Without Honor
Name: theon
text: theon The hounds have the scent. Come, Maester, don't look so grim. It's all just a game.

title: A Man Without Honor
Name: osha
text: osha We should have took more food.

title: A Man Without Honor
Name: bran
text: bran We couldn't risk going to the kitchens.

title: A Man Without Honor
Name: osha
text: osha Those people all love you. They would have given you whatever you needed.

title: A Man Without Honor
Name: bran
text: bran And if Theon found out, he'd hang them.

title: A Man Without Honor
Name: osha
text: osha The boy can't survive on walnuts.

title: A Man Without Honor
Name: rickon
text: rickon I'm fine.

title: A Man Without Honor
Name: osha
text: osha We've been walking since before sunrise. Even Hodor will tire.

title: A Man Without Honor
Name: hodor
text: hodor Hodor.

title: A Man Without Honor
Name: osha
text: osha Even you, sweet giant.

title: A Man Without Honor
Name: bran
text: bran Wait, I know that farm. I sent those two Winterfell orphans there.

title: A Man Without Honor
Name: rickon
text: rickon Jack and Billy. They'll give us some food.

title: A Man Without Honor
Name: bran
text: bran We can't risk it. If Theon tracks us here, he'll torture them until he finds out where we are.

title: A Man Without Honor
Name: rikon
text: rikon Billy climbs a tree better than anyone.

title: A Man Without Honor
Name: osha
text: osha You've never seen me climb a tree, little man.

title: A Man Without Honor
Name: bran
text: bran They'll be after us with hounds.

title: A Man Without Honor
Name: osha
text: osha We got a good start on them, but we can't outrun hounds forever.

title: A Man Without Honor
Name: ygritte
text: ygritte Did you pull a knife on me in the night?

title: A Man Without Honor
Name: ygritte
text: ygritte What's the matter? Can't be the first time you pressed your bone against a woman's arse.

title: A Man Without Honor
Name: jon
text: jon Let's move.

title: A Man Without Honor
Name: ygritte
text: ygritte It is the first time. How old are you, boy?

title: A Man Without Honor
Name: jon
text: jon I'm a man of the Night's Watch.

title: A Man Without Honor
Name: ygritte
text: ygritte You're a boy who's never been with a girl. Don't your stones start to hurt if your bone never gets-

title: A Man Without Honor
Name: jon
text: jon Don't call them that.

title: A Man Without Honor
Name: ygritte
text: ygritte What, stones? Or bone?

title: A Man Without Honor
Name: jon
text: jon Neither. Both.

title: A Man Without Honor
Name: jon
text: jon Move!

title: A Man Without Honor
Name: ygritte
text: ygritte I heard they get all swollen and bruised if you don't use them. Of course, maybe that's just what the lads say when they want me feeling sorry for them. As if I'd feel sorry for them. Are there no girl crows?

title: A Man Without Honor
Name: jon
text: jon There are no women of the Night's Watch, no.

title: A Man Without Honor
Name: ygritte
text: ygritte So the lads just do it with each other?

title: A Man Without Honor
Name: jon
text: jon No.

title: A Man Without Honor
Name: ygritte
text: ygritte Never?

title: A Man Without Honor
Name: jon
text: jon Never. We swore an oath.

title: A Man Without Honor
Name: ygritte
text: ygritte You have sheep at the Wall? With your hands, then? No wonder you're all so miserable.

title: A Man Without Honor
Name: jon
text: jon Would you please shut up?

title: A Man Without Honor
Name: ygritte
text: ygritte Would you please shut up? You think you're better than me, crow. I'm a free woman.

title: A Man Without Honor
Name: jon
text: jon You're a free woman?

title: A Man Without Honor
Name: ygritte
text: ygritte I might be your prisoner, but I'm a free woman.

title: A Man Without Honor
Name: jon
text: jon If you're my prisoner, you're not a free woman. That's what "prisoner" means.

title: A Man Without Honor
Name: ygritte
text: ygritte And you think you're free? You swore some stupid oath and now you can never touch a girl.

title: A Man Without Honor
Name: jon
text: jon It was my choice to say the words.

title: A Man Without Honor
Name: ygritte
text: ygritte So you don't like girls?

title: A Man Without Honor
Name: jon
text: jon Of course I like girls.

title: A Man Without Honor
Name: ygritte
text: ygritte But you chose never to touch them.

title: A Man Without Honor
Name: jon
text: jon That's the price you pay if you want to be a man of the Night's Watch.

title: A Man Without Honor
Name: ygritte
text: ygritte So instead of getting naked with a girl, you'd prefer to invade our lands-

title: A Man Without Honor
Name: jon
text: jon Invade your lands? Wildlings raid our lands all the time. Some of them tried to kill my little brother, a crippled boy!

title: A Man Without Honor
Name: ygritte
text: ygritte They're not your lands! We've been here the whole time. You lot came along and just put up a big wall and said it was yours.

title: A Man Without Honor
Name: jon
text: jon My father was Ned Stark. I have the blood of the First Men. My ancestors lived here, same as yours.

title: A Man Without Honor
Name: ygritte
text: ygritte So why are you fighting us?

title: A Man Without Honor
Name: man
text: man Go on. Now I want you to tell me what happened. Come on, this way. Come on, speak up. Speak up.

title: A Man Without Honor
Name: tywin
text: tywin Wolfsbane. A rare substance. This is no common assassin.

title: A Man Without Honor
Name: mountian
text: mountian We hanged twenty men last night.

title: A Man Without Honor
Name: tywin
text: tywin I don't care if you hanged a hundred. A man tried to kill me. I want his name and I want his head.

title: A Man Without Honor
Name: mountain
text: mountain We think it was an infiltrator from the Brotherhood Without Banners.

title: A Man Without Honor
Name: tywin
text: tywin Pretentious name for a band of outlaws. We can't allow rebels behind our lines to harass us with impunity. We look like fools and they look like heroes. That's how kings fall. I want them dead, every one.

title: A Man Without Honor
Name: mountain
text: mountain Killing them isn't the problem. It's finding them. Have you gone soft, Clegane? I always thought you had a talent for violence.

title: A Man Without Honor
Name: tywin
text: tywin Burn the villages, burn the farms. Let them know what it means to choose the wrong side.

title: A Man Without Honor
Name: tywin
text: tywin Mmm. Is that mutton?

title: A Man Without Honor
Name: arya
text: arya Yes, my lord.

title: A Man Without Honor
Name: tywin
text: tywin Don't like mutton.

title: A Man Without Honor
Name: arya
text: arya I'll bring something else.

title: A Man Without Honor
Name: tywin
text: tywin Leave it. Are you hungry?

title: A Man Without Honor
Name: arya
text: arya No.

title: A Man Without Honor
Name: tywin
text: tywin Of course you are. Eat.

title: A Man Without Honor
Name: arya
text: arya I'll eat in the kitchen later.

title: A Man Without Honor
Name: tywin
text: tywin It's bad manners to refuse a lordo s offer. Sit. Eat.

title: A Man Without Honor
Name: tywin
text: tywin You're small for your age. I suppose you've been underfed your whole life.

title: A Man Without Honor
Name: arya
text: arya I eat a lot. I just don't grow.

title: A Man Without Honor
Name: tywin
text: tywin Mmm. This will be my last war. Win or lose.

title: A Man Without Honor
Name: arya
text: arya Have you ever lost before?

title: A Man Without Honor
Name: tywin
text: tywin Do you think I'd be in my position if I had lost a war?

title: A Man Without Honor
Name: tywin
text: tywin But this is the one I'll be remembered for. The War of the Five Kings, they're calling it. My legacy will be determined in the coming months.

title: A Man Without Honor
Name: tywin
text: tywin Do you know what legacy means? It's what you pass down to your children and your children's children. It's what remains of you when you're gone. Harren the Black thought this castle would be his legacy. The greatest fortress ever built.

title: A Man Without Honor
Name: tywin
text: tywin The tallest towers, the strongest walls. The Great Hall had thirty-five hearths. Thirty-five. Can you imagine? Look at it now. A blasted ruin. Do you know what happened?

title: A Man Without Honor
Name: arya
text: arya Dragons?

title: A Man Without Honor
Name: tywin
text: tywin Yes. Dragons happened.

title: A Man Without Honor
Name: tywin
text: tywin Harrenhal was built to withstand an attack from the land. A million men could have marched on these walls, and a million men would have been repelled. But an attack from the air with dragon fire, Mmm-mmm. Harren and all his sons roasted alive within these walls. Aegon Targaryen changed the rules. That's why every child alive still knows his name

title: A Man Without Honor
Name: arya
text: arya Aegon and his sisters.

title: A Man Without Honor
Name: tywin
text: tywin Mmm?

title: A Man Without Honor
Name: arya
text: arya It wasn't just Aegon riding his dragon. It was Rhaenys and Visenya, too.

title: A Man Without Honor
Name: tywin
text: tywin Correct. A student of history, are you?

title: A Man Without Honor
Name: arya
text: arya Rhaenys rode Meraxes. Visenya rode Vhagar.

title: A Man Without Honor
Name: tywin
text: tywin I'm sure I knew that when I was a boy.

title: A Man Without Honor
Name: arya
text: arya Visenya Targaryen was a great warrior. She had a Valyrian steel sword she called Dark Sister.

title: A Man Without Honor
Name: tywin
text: tywin Hmm. She's a heroine of yours, I take it?

title: A Man Without Honor
Name: tywin
text: tywin Aren't most girls more interested in the pretty maidens from the songs? Jonquil with the flowers in her hair?

title: A Man Without Honor
Name: arya
text: arya Most girls are idiots.

title: A Man Without Honor
Name: tywin
text: tywin You remind me of my daughter. Where did you learn all this stuff about Visenya and her Valyrian steel sword?

title: A Man Without Honor
Name: arya
text: arya From my father.

title: A Man Without Honor
Name: tywin
text: tywin He was a well-read stonemason. Can't say I've ever met a literate stonemason.

title: A Man Without Honor
Name: arya
text: arya Have you met many stonemasons, my lord?

title: A Man Without Honor
Name: tywin
text: tywin Careful now, girl. I enjoy you, but be careful. Take that back to the kitchen. Eat what you want.

title: A Man Without Honor
Name: tywin
text: tywin And, girl.

title: A Man Without Honor
Name: tywin
text: tywin M'lord.

title: A Man Without Honor
Name: tywin
text: tywin Lowborn girls say "m'lord," not "my lord. " If you're going to pose as a commoner, you should do it properly.

title: A Man Without Honor
Name: arya
text: arya My mother served Lady Dustin for many years, my lord. She taught me how to speak proper Properly.

title: A Man Without Honor
Name: tywin
text: tywin You're too smart for your own good. Has anyone told you that?

title: A Man Without Honor
Name: arya
text: arya Yes.

title: A Man Without Honor
Name: tywin
text: tywin Go on.

title: A Man Without Honor
Name: sansa
text: sansa I beg pardon, ser. I should have come to you after to thank you for saving me. You were so brave.

title: A Man Without Honor
Name: sandor
text: sandor Brave? A dog doesn't need courage to chase off rats.

title: A Man Without Honor
Name: sansa
text: sansa Does it give you joy to scare people?

title: A Man Without Honor
Name: sandor
text: sandor No, it gives me joy to kill people.

title: A Man Without Honor
Name: sandor
text: sandor Spare me. You can't tell me Lord Eddard Stark of Winterfell never killed a man.

title: A Man Without Honor
Name: sansa
text: sansa It was his duty. He never liked it.

title: A Man Without Honor
Name: sandor
text: sandor Is that what he told you? He lied. Killing is the sweetest thing there is.

title: A Man Without Honor
Name: sansa
text: sansa Why are you always so hateful?

title: A Man Without Honor
Name: sandor
text: sandor You'll be glad of the hateful things I do someday when you're queen and I'm all that stands between you and your beloved king.

title: A Man Without Honor
Name: xaro
text: xaro I've demanded a meeting of the Thirteen. One of them did this or knows who did.

title: A Man Without Honor
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys You are one of the Thirteen.

title: A Man Without Honor
Name: xaro
text: xaro If I wanted your dragons, I would have taken them. They mean nothing to me on their own.

title: A Man Without Honor
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys Nothing? They're more valuable than anything in the world.

title: A Man Without Honor
Name: xaro
text: xaro Shall we look inside my vault and see what selling your dragons would buy me I cannot buy already? We will get them back.

title: A Man Without Honor
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys There is no we, so why would you help me get them back?

title: A Man Without Honor
Name: xaro
text: xaro I took you under my protection in front of the rulers of my city. A man is what others say he is and no more. If they say that Xaro Xhoan Daxos is a liar, my word is worth nothing. I cannot let this thing happen to you under my roof.

title: A Man Without Honor
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys But it did happen under your roof.

title: A Man Without Honor
Name: xaro
text: xaro Khaleesi, many times in my life, I have been-

title: A Man Without Honor
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys I don't care where you've been.

title: A Man Without Honor
Name: ygritte
text: ygritte You think we're savages because we don't live in stone castles. We can't make steel as good as yours, it's true, but We're free. If someone tried to tell us we couldn't lie down as man and woman, we'd shove a spear up his arse. We don't go serving some shit king who's only king because his father was.

title: A Man Without Honor
Name: jon
text: jon No. No, you serve Mance Rayder, the King beyond the Wall.

title: A Man Without Honor
Name: ygritte
text: ygritte We chose Mance Rayder to lead us. He was a crow, same as you, but he wanted to be free. You could be free, too. You don't need to live your whole life taking commands from old men. Wake up when you want to wake up. I could show you the streams to fish, the woods to hunt. Build yourself a cabin and find a woman to lie with in the night.

title: A Man Without Honor
Name: ygritte
text: ygritte You're a pretty lad. The girls would claw each other's eyes out to get naked with you.

title: A Man Without Honor
Name: jon
text: jon Walk.

title: A Man Without Honor
Name: ygritte
text: ygritte I could teach you how to do it.

title: A Man Without Honor
Name: jon
text: jon I know how to do it.

title: A Man Without Honor
Name: ygritte
text: ygritte You know nothing, Jon Snow.

title: A Man Without Honor
Name: robb
text: robb And what did she say?

title: A Man Without Honor
Name: alton
text: alton She admired your spirit, Your Grace.

title: A Man Without Honor
Name: robb
text: robb And what then?

title: A Man Without Honor
Name: alton
text: alton She, uh...

title: A Man Without Honor
Name: robb
text: robb If every man were held accountable for the actions of every distant relative, Ser Alton, we'd all hang.

title: A Man Without Honor
Name: alton
text: alton She tore the paper in half, Your Grace.

title: A Man Without Honor
Name: robb
text: robb You've acted with honor. I thank you for it. Lord Karstark, see that Ser Alton's pen is clean, and give him a hot supper.

title: A Man Without Honor
Name: rickard
text: rickard Ser Alton's pen is occupied, Your Grace. The prisoners from the Yellow Fork.

title: A Man Without Honor
Name: roose
text: roose Too many prisoners.

title: A Man Without Honor
Name: robb
text: robb Is there room for Ser Alton?

title: A Man Without Honor
Name: rickard
text: rickard Does he need to lie down?

title: A Man Without Honor
Name: robb
text: robb Have the men build him a new pen. Put him in with the Kingslayer for now. Have your boy watch over them.

title: A Man Without Honor
Name: rickard
text: rickard Torrhen.

title: A Man Without Honor
Name: robb
text: robb That will be all.

title: A Man Without Honor
Name: talisa
text: talisa Your Grace. A minute of your time?

title: A Man Without Honor
Name: talisa
text: talisa I've been treating your wounded men.

title: A Man Without Honor
Name: robb
text: robb And my enemies, as some of my bannermen are fond of mentioning.

title: A Man Without Honor
Name: talisa
text: talisa They're not my enemies.

title: A Man Without Honor
Name: robb
text: robb That's what I tell my bannermen.

title: A Man Without Honor
Name: talisa
text: talisa I've already run through the supplies I brought with me. Some are easily replaced. Egg yolks, turpentine, oil of roses.

title: A Man Without Honor
Name: robb
text: robb But some are not.

title: A Man Without Honor
Name: talisa
text: talisa I need silk for stitching.

title: A Man Without Honor
Name: talisa
text: talisa I need fennel root for those with fever, willow bark. Mostly I need milk of the poppy. You saw what it was like to amputate a foot without any. I assume there will be more loss of limb before this war is over.

title: A Man Without Honor
Name: robb
text: robb If you need help finding these-

title: A Man Without Honor
Name: talisa
text: talisa I know where to find them. I'm sorry, I shouldn't interrupt you.

title: A Man Without Honor
Name: robb
text: robb Continue, my lady.

title: A Man Without Honor
Name: talisa
text: talisa You're riding to the Crag to negotiate a surrender?

title: A Man Without Honor
Name: robb
text: robb Yes.

title: A Man Without Honor
Name: talisa
text: talisa The Crag will have a maester and he will have what I need.

title: A Man Without Honor
Name: robb
text: robb I expect he will.

title: A Man Without Honor
Name: talisa
text: talisa If I could write a list-

title: A Man Without Honor
Name: robb
text: robb Come with me to the Crag.

title: A Man Without Honor
Name: talisa
text: talisa I don't think that will be-

title: A Man Without Honor
Name: robb
text: robb Let the maester show you his stores. I want the wounded men to be treated well, all the wounded men.

title: A Man Without Honor
Name: woman
text: woman Children, come inside, quick. Come on.

title: A Man Without Honor
Name: child
text: child Hurry up!

title: A Man Without Honor
Name: man
text: man Can't find anything, ser. They've lost the scent.

title: A Man Without Honor
Name: theon
text: theon Try again.

title: A Man Without Honor
Name: man
text: man We've circled this farmhouse twice. There's no sign of them.

title: A Man Without Honor
Name: luwin
text: luwin We could start the search fresh in the morning, my lord.

title: A Man Without Honor
Name: theon
text: theon I'm looking at spending the rest of my life being treated like a fool and a eunuch by my own people. Ask yourself, is there anything I wouldn't do to stop that from happening? The hounds will find the scent again. I'll beat them until they do. I'll whip every man here until I have both those boys in hand. And once I've got them, the pampered little shits It's better to be cruel than weak.

title: A Man Without Honor
Name: man
text: man Prince Theon.

title: A Man Without Honor
Name: theon
text: theon Where are they?

title: A Man Without Honor
Name: winterfell
text: winterfell Who, m'lord?

title: A Man Without Honor
Name: theon
text: theon The Stark boys. Where are they?

title: A Man Without Honor
Name: winterfell
text: winterfell I don't know. I seen no one.

title: A Man Without Honor
Name: theon
text: theon Think harder.

title: A Man Without Honor
Name: winterfell
text: winterfell I swear, m'lord. I don't know.

title: A Man Without Honor
Name: dagmer
text: dagmer My lord, over here. I think I've found what we're looking for.

title: A Man Without Honor
Name: dagmer
text: dagmer Send the old man home.

title: A Man Without Honor
Name: theon
text: theon Go back to Winterfell. Take him back.

title: A Man Without Honor
Name: luwin
text: luwin Theon, don't do this.

title: A Man Without Honor
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys You came back.

title: A Man Without Honor
Name: jorah
text: jorah As soon as I heard. Do you know anything?

title: A Man Without Honor
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys Irri is dead.

title: A Man Without Honor
Name: jorah
text: jorah I know. She was a good-

title: A Man Without Honor
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys She's dead. She died alone. She died for me and I couldn't protect her.

title: A Man Without Honor
Name: jorah
text: jorah Doreah?

title: A Man Without Honor
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys We can't find her. She must be dead, too. I led my people out of the Red Waste and into the slaughterhouse.

title: A Man Without Honor
Name: jorah
text: jorah I should have been here.

title: A Man Without Honor
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys You went to find me a ship.

title: A Man Without Honor
Name: jorah
text: jorah My place is by your side. I shouldn't have left you alone with these people.

title: A Man Without Honor
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys These people"?

title: A Man Without Honor
Name: jorah
text: jorah They are not to be trusted.

title: A Man Without Honor
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys And who is to be trusted? Who are my people? The Targaryens? I only knew one, my brother, and he would have let a thousand men rape me if it had got him the crown. The Dothraki? Most of them turned on me the day that Khal Drogo fell from his horse.

title: A Man Without Honor
Name: jorah
text: jorah Your people are in Westeros.

title: A Man Without Honor
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys The people in Westeros don't know I'm alive.

title: A Man Without Honor
Name: jorah
text: jorah They will soon enough.

title: A Man Without Honor
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys And then what? They'll pray for my return? They'll wave dragon banners and shout my name? That's what my brother believed and he was a fool.

title: A Man Without Honor
Name: jorah
text: jorah You are not your brother. Trust me, Khaleesi.

title: A Man Without Honor
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys There it is. "Trust me. " And it's you I should trust, Ser Jorah? Only you? I don't need trust any longer. I don't want it and I don't have room for it.

title: A Man Without Honor
Name: jorah
text: jorah You are too young to be so-

title: A Man Without Honor
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys And you are too familiar.

title: A Man Without Honor
Name: jorah
text: jorah Forgive me, Khaleesi. No one can survive in this world without help. No one. Let me help you, please. Tell me how.

title: A Man Without Honor
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys Find my dragons.

title: A Man Without Honor
Name: ygritte
text: ygritte How long till we get back to your crows?

title: A Man Without Honor
Name: jon
text: jon We're close.

title: A Man Without Honor
Name: ygritte
text: ygritte What, a day? A half-day? You don't know, do you? Do you even know where they are?

title: A Man Without Honor
Name: ygritte
text: ygritte What do you think they'll say when they hear about you and me?

title: A Man Without Honor
Name: jon
text: jon Nothing happened between you and me.

title: A Man Without Honor
Name: ygritte
text: ygritte I swear it, Old Master King Crow, ser, we were only close together for warmth. And then I felt it, right up against me backside like a club. I can show you the bruise on me tailbone. And before I knew what was where, his his Well, it was all out in the open, all angry as you like. And I didn't want to want it, but oh, I did! And he spread me legs and ruined. The shame of it. Now I can never marry a perfumed lord. What will me poor savage father say?

title: A Man Without Honor
Name: jon
text: jon Turn back around.

title: A Man Without Honor
Name: ygritte
text: ygritte And I thought that we were done, but he said, ''Turn back around.'" I'll tell you what, Jon Snow. Since it's gonna be your word against mine, and since you can't talk about it without blushing, we may as well just-

title: A Man Without Honor
Name: jon
text: jon What, right here in the muck?

title: A Man Without Honor
Name: ygritte
text: ygritte I'll keep you warm enough.

title: A Man Without Honor
Name: ygritte
text: ygritte Are you that afraid of it?

title: A Man Without Honor
Name: jon
text: jon That's enough.

title: A Man Without Honor
Name: ygritte
text: ygritte It's nice and wet and warm.

title: A Man Without Honor
Name: jon
text: jon Enough!

title: A Man Without Honor
Name: ygritte
text: ygritte It don't have teeth.

title: A Man Without Honor
Name: ygritte
text: ygritte All right! All right. Gods, you're dull.

title: A Man Without Honor
Name: ygritte
text: ygritte Should have took me while you had the chance.

title: A Man Without Honor
Name: sansa
text: sansa No, no!

title: A Man Without Honor
Name: sansa
text: sansa No. Oh, no.

title: A Man Without Honor
Name: shae
text: shae It's all right. Give me that.

title: A Man Without Honor
Name: sansa
text: sansa If the Queen sees, I can have Joffrey's children now.

title: A Man Without Honor
Name: shae
text: shae Help me flip it over.

title: A Man Without Honor
Name: shae
text: shae Where are you going?

title: A Man Without Honor
Name: handmaiden
text: handmaiden To tell Her Grace.

title: A Man Without Honor
Name: shae
text: shae You'll say nothing to anyone. Do you understand?

title: A Man Without Honor
Name: cersei
text: cersei Your mother might have prepared you. You flowered, my dear. No more.

title: A Man Without Honor
Name: sansa
text: sansa My mother told me, but I thought it would be different.

title: A Man Without Honor
Name: cersei
text: cersei In what way?

title: A Man Without Honor
Name: sansa
text: sansa I thought it would be less messy.

title: A Man Without Honor
Name: cersei
text: cersei Wait until you birth a child.

title: A Man Without Honor
Name: cersei
text: cersei You're a woman now. Do you have any idea what that means?

title: A Man Without Honor
Name: sansa
text: sansa I'm fit to bear children for the king?

title: A Man Without Honor
Name: cersei
text: cersei A prospect that once delighted you, bringing little princes and princesses into the world, the greatest honor for a queen.

title: A Man Without Honor
Name: cersei
text: cersei Joffrey has always been difficult. Even his birth, I labored a day and a half to bring him into this world. You cannot imagine the pain. I screamed so loudly, I was sure Robert would hear me in the Kingswood.

title: A Man Without Honor
Name: sansa
text: sansa His Grace was not with you?

title: A Man Without Honor
Name: cersei
text: cersei Robert was hunting. That was his custom. Whenever my time was near, my royal husband would flee to the trees with his huntsmen and his hounds. And when he returned, he would present me with some pelts or a stag's head, and I would present him with a baby. Not that I wanted him there, mind you. I had Grand Maester Pycelle, an army of midwives, and I had my brother. When they told Jaime he wasn't allowed in the birthing room, he smiled and asked which one of them proposed to keep him out. Joffrey will show you no such devotion.

title: A Man Without Honor
Name: cersei
text: cersei You may never love the king, but you will love his children.

title: A Man Without Honor
Name: sansa
text: sansa I love His Grace with all my heart.

title: A Man Without Honor
Name: cersei
text: cersei That's so very touching to hear. Permit me to share some womanly wisdom with you on this very special day. The more people you love, the weaker you are. You'll do things for them that you know you shouldn't do. You'll act the fool to make them happy, to keep them safe. Love no one but your children. On that front, a mother has no choice.

title: A Man Without Honor
Name: sansa
text: sansa But shouldn't I love Joffrey, Your Grace?

title: A Man Without Honor
Name: cersei
text: cersei You can try, little dove.

title: A Man Without Honor
Name: jaime
text: jaime Who did you say your mother was again?

title: A Man Without Honor
Name: alton
text: alton Cinda Lannister.

title: A Man Without Honor
Name: jaime
text: jaime Is she the fat one?

title: A Man Without Honor
Name: alton
text: alton Well, perhaps she's gotten a little larger than she-

title: A Man Without Honor
Name: jaime
text: jaime No, no. There's only one fat Lannister. If she was your mother, you'd know it.

title: A Man Without Honor
Name: alton
text: alton I squired for you once, you know.

title: A Man Without Honor
Name: jaime
text: jaime When?

title: A Man Without Honor
Name: alton
text: alton The tournament, the day of Willem Frey's wedding.

title: A Man Without Honor
Name: jaime
text: jaime I went to Willem Frey's wedding?

title: A Man Without Honor
Name: alton
text: alton You did. Your squire had gotten so drunk the night before that he threw up.

title: A Man Without Honor
Name: jaime
text: jaime He threw up on his horse on the way to the tourney grounds. What was his name?

title: A Man Without Honor
Name: alton
text: alton Bryan.

title: A Man Without Honor
Name: jaime
text: jaime Poor lad. That was my brother's doing, I seem to recall. I remember you. You'd never squired for anyone before.

title: A Man Without Honor
Name: alton
text: alton That's right. I ran up and volunteered. "Let me, my lord. Let me." My father was furious. Afraid I'd embarrass our family in front of the Family.

title: A Man Without Honor
Name: jaime
text: jaime You didn't, though.

title: A Man Without Honor
Name: alton
text: alton You really remember?

title: A Man Without Honor
Name: jaime
text: jaime You knew when you were needed and when to go away. It's a rare talent. Most of my squires, they mean well, but young men with big jobs, they tend to overdo them.

title: A Man Without Honor
Name: alton
text: alton When I think back to that day-

title: A Man Without Honor
Name: guard
text: guard Shh!

title: A Man Without Honor
Name: jaime
text: jaime You were saying?
