title: A Man Without Honor
Name: alton
text: alton I- Never mind. It's embarrassing.

title: A Man Without Honor
Name: jaime
text: jaime More embarrassing than being chained to a post covered in your own shit?

title: A Man Without Honor
Name: alton
text: alton I remember everything about that day, your helmet, your horse, the rake lines in the dirt along the list, where the sun was in the sky when you knocked Balon from his horse, and the dent in your shield when you handed it back to me. I'll remember it all until I die. That was the best day of my life. And I remember being on the field after it was over. All the competitors were done. I was the last one out there. And I couldn't leave. I couldn't bring myself to go and sit with my family at a table so far on the edge of the feast you could barely even see the bride. And I couldn't bear to tell them what it had been like squiring for you, when I knew that they could never have the faintest idea what I was talking about.

title: A Man Without Honor
Name: jaime
text: jaime I understand completely.

title: A Man Without Honor
Name: alton
text: alton How could you? Sorry, I I didn't mean to doubt you.

title: A Man Without Honor
Name: jaime
text: jaime It's just that I, I was sixteen once. I also had to replace someone's squire on short notice.

title: A Man Without Honor
Name: alton
text: alton Which knight was it?

title: A Man Without Honor
Name: jaime
text: jaime Barristan Selmy. The fight against the Kingswood Outlaws. Before your time.

title: A Man Without Honor
Name: alton
text: alton What was he like?

title: A Man Without Honor
Name: jaime
text: jaime He was a painter. A painter who only used red. I couldn't imagine being able to fight like that, not back then. And to help him do that, to be a part of something that perfect. I don't need to explain how that felt, not to you.

title: A Man Without Honor
Name: alton
text: alton It's hard to put into words.

title: A Man Without Honor
Name: jaime
text: jaime It's like stepping into a dream you've been dreaming for as long as you can remember, and finding out that the dream is more real than your life.

title: A Man Without Honor
Name: alton
text: alton Leaving that battlefield was like being dragged off to prison.

title: A Man Without Honor
Name: alton
text: alton Did you squire for him again?

title: A Man Without Honor
Name: jaime
text: jaime No. I didn't have your gift. He couldn't take a step without stepping on me. I was awful, a complete liability. Until one of the outlaws decided to take on a sixteen-year-old squire.

title: A Man Without Honor
Name: jaime
text: jaime It's a good thing I am who I am. I'd have been useless at anything else. I'm not well-suited for imprisonment. Shocking, I know. Some men are. Ned Stark, I imagine he made an excellent prisoner right up until the end. Not me, though. My life has left me uniquely unfit for constraint.

title: A Man Without Honor
Name: alton
text: alton And have you thought about

title: A Man Without Honor
Name: jaime
text: jaime Of course. Every day.

title: A Man Without Honor
Name: alton
text: alton And?

title: A Man Without Honor
Name: jaime
text: jaime Good prisoners breed good jailers, apparently. The Starks are very careful.

title: A Man Without Honor
Name: jaime
text: jaime But there is a way, I think. It wasn't possible until now.

title: A Man Without Honor
Name: alton
text: alton What is it?

title: A Man Without Honor
Name: jaime
text: jaime It's actually quite simple.

title: A Man Without Honor
Name: alton
text: alton Well, let me help you.

title: A Man Without Honor
Name: jaime
text: jaime You'll only have to do one thing.

title: A Man Without Honor
Name: alton
text: alton Tell me.

title: A Man Without Honor
Name: jaime
text: jaime You'll have to die.

title: A Man Without Honor
Name: quaith
text: quaith Jorah the Andal. This man must sail past old Valyria. All who travel too close to the doom must have protection.

title: A Man Without Honor
Name: jorah
text: jorah I didn't come here for lessons.

title: A Man Without Honor
Name: quaith
text: quaith No, you came for the dragons.

title: A Man Without Honor
Name: jorah
text: jorah You have them? Where are they?

title: A Man Without Honor
Name: quaith
text: quaith Draw your sword. See what your steel is worth. You want to please the Mother of Dragons.

title: A Man Without Honor
Name: quaith
text: quaith You love her.

title: A Man Without Honor
Name: jorah
text: jorah Where are the dragons?

title: A Man Without Honor
Name: quaith
text: quaith Will you betray her again, Jorah the Andal?

title: A Man Without Honor
Name: quaith
text: quaith Will you betray her again?

title: A Man Without Honor
Name: jorah
text: jorah Never.

title: A Man Without Honor
Name: quaith
text: quaith The thief you seek is with her now.

title: A Man Without Honor
Name: spice
text: spice I did not leave the comfort of my home to come to yours and be called a thief.

title: A Man Without Honor
Name: xaro
text: xaro No one is calling you a thief. Who is she to accuse us?

title: A Man Without Honor
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys Please, they're my children. I'm begging you.

title: A Man Without Honor
Name: silk
text: silk Begging us? It wasn't very long ago you were threatening us.

title: A Man Without Honor
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys Without me, the dragons will die.

title: A Man Without Honor
Name: spice
text: spice It will be for the best. Your dragons will bring the world nothing but death and misery, my dear. If I knew where they were, I would not tell you.

title: A Man Without Honor
Name: pyat
text: pyat You are cruel, my friend. The Mother of Dragons is in the right. She must be reunited with her babies. I will help you, Khaleesi.

title: A Man Without Honor
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys How?

title: A Man Without Honor
Name: pyatt
text: pyatt I will take you to the House of the Undying where I have put them.

title: A Man Without Honor
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys You have my dragons?

title: A Man Without Honor
Name: pyat
text: pyat When I learned you were coming to our city, I made an arrangement with the King of Qarth. He procured them for me.

title: A Man Without Honor
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys But there is no King of Qarth.

title: A Man Without Honor
Name: xaro
text: xaro There is now. That was the other half of the arrangement.

title: A Man Without Honor
Name: xaro
text: xaro You would keep your gates and your minds closed to everything outside your walls, but Qarth cannot remain the greatest city that ever was if it refuses to change. I will open Qarth to the world as I have forced it to open itself to me.

title: A Man Without Honor
Name: spice
text: spice Your ambition is an inspiration. But like all upstarts, you overreach. Three dragons the size of cats and an alliance with a charlatan do not make you a king.

title: A Man Without Honor
Name: xaro
text: xaro An upstart and a charlatan? Empires have been built by less. Those on the margins often come to control the center, and those in the center make room for them, willingly or otherwise.

title: A Man Without Honor
Name: pyat
text: pyat The Mother of Dragons will be with her babies. She will give them her love and they will thrive by her side, forever.

title: A Man Without Honor
Name: pyattpree
text: pyattpree A mother should be with her children.

title: A Man Without Honor
Name: pyat
text: pyat Where will you run to, Daenerys Stormborn? Your dragons wait for you in the House of the Undying. Come see them.

title: A Man Without Honor
Name: jacks
text: jacks Lady Stark!

title: A Man Without Honor
Name: brienne
text: brienne No farther.

title: A Man Without Honor
Name: jacks
text: jacks Keep your hands off me, woman.

title: A Man Without Honor
Name: brienne
text: brienne Don't enter without an invitation, man.

title: A Man Without Honor
Name: jacks
text: jacks Forgive me. Lady Stark.

title: A Man Without Honor
Name: catelyn
text: catelyn What is it?

title: A Man Without Honor
Name: jacks
text: jacks They caught the Kingslayer.

title: A Man Without Honor
Name: man
text: man Kingslayer!

title: A Man Without Honor
Name: man
text: man Kill the fucking Kingslayer!

title: A Man Without Honor
Name: man
text: man Hang him!

title: A Man Without Honor
Name: man
text: man You'll die today.

title: A Man Without Honor
Name: man
text: man Justice for the Karstark.

title: A Man Without Honor
Name: man
text: man Gut him!

title: A Man Without Honor
Name: rickard
text: rickard Get back! I want his head! Any man who stands between a father and his vengeance asks for death.

title: A Man Without Honor
Name: catelyn
text: catelyn Lord Karstark, this man is our prisoner.

title: A Man Without Honor
Name: rickard
text: rickard This monster killed my son.

title: A Man Without Honor
Name: catelyn
text: catelyn And crippled mine. He will answer for his crimes, I promise you, but not here.

title: A Man Without Honor
Name: rickard
text: rickard I will have his head. And if you try and stop me

title: A Man Without Honor
Name: catelyn
text: catelyn You will strike me down? Have you forgotten me, ser? I am the widow of your liege, Lord Eddard Stark. I am the mother of your king!

title: A Man Without Honor
Name: rickard
text: rickard And where is our king now?

title: A Man Without Honor
Name: robb
text: robb You know very well.

title: A Man Without Honor
Name: rickard
text: rickard He has gone to the Crag to accept the surrender. Aye, gone to the Crag, but not to negotiate. He brought that foreign bitch with him.

title: A Man Without Honor
Name: catelyn
text: catelyn How dare you!

title: A Man Without Honor
Name: brienne
text: brienne Threatening my lady is an act of treason.

title: A Man Without Honor
Name: rickard
text: rickard Treason? How can it be treason to kill Lannisters?

title: A Man Without Honor
Name: catelyn
text: catelyn I understand your grief, my lord, better than most, I understand it. But in the name of my son, the King in the North, stand down.

title: A Man Without Honor
Name: rickard
text: rickard When your son returns, I will demand this murderer's head.

title: A Man Without Honor
Name: catelyn
text: catelyn Wise men do not make demands of kings.

title: A Man Without Honor
Name: rickard
text: rickard Fathers who love their sons do. I will have his head.

title: A Man Without Honor
Name: jaime
text: jaime Thank you for fighting on my behalf, Lady Stark. I would have come to your defense, but-

title: A Man Without Honor
Name: catelyn
text: catelyn Take him to the stockades. Bind him with every chain you can find!

title: A Man Without Honor
Name: jaime
text: jaime You've become a real she-wolf in your later years. There's not much fish left in you.

title: A Man Without Honor
Name: catelyn
text: catelyn And gag him!

title: A Man Without Honor
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion Since when do you light your own candles?

title: A Man Without Honor
Name: cersei
text: cersei Since I decided that I can't stand to look at any of my handmaidens for another instant.

title: A Man Without Honor
Name: cersei
text: cersei How many times can you read one raven scroll?

title: A Man Without Honor
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion Stannis Baratheon's fleet has been spotted sailing north past Tarth, two hundred ships.

title: A Man Without Honor
Name: cersei
text: cersei More than we have.

title: A Man Without Honor
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion Yes, that's more than we have. He'll be at our gates within five days, four if he has the wind.

title: A Man Without Honor
Name: cersei
text: cersei We have strong, high walls. We'll rain fire down on them from above.

title: A Man Without Honor
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion Rain fire on them from above." You're quoting Father, aren't you?

title: A Man Without Honor
Name: cersei
text: cersei Why not? He has a good mind for strategy, doesn't he?

title: A Man Without Honor
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion Call it tactics, not strategy. But, yes, he does have a good mind for it. The best mind, some would say. Sadly, he's not here. It's just you, me and Joffrey, the Lord of the Seven Kingdoms and Protector of the Realm.

title: A Man Without Honor
Name: cersei
text: cersei I'm sure you'll make a point eventually.

title: A Man Without Honor
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion He needs to start acting like a king. This war you started is coming to our doorstep. And if the entire city wants Joffrey dead

title: A Man Without Honor
Name: cersei
text: cersei I'm not the one giving the boy whores to abuse.

title: A Man Without Honor
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion I thought the girls might help him.

title: A Man Without Honor
Name: cersei
text: cersei Did you?

title: A Man Without Honor
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion I was wrong. If we can't control him

title: A Man Without Honor
Name: cersei
text: cersei Do you think I haven't tried? He doesn't listen to me.

title: A Man Without Honor
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion It's hard to put a leash on a dog once you've put a crown on its head.

title: A Man Without Honor
Name: cersei
text: cersei I always hoped he'd be like Jaime. He looks like him. In a certain light.

title: A Man Without Honor
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion The boy is more Robert than Jaime.

title: A Man Without Honor
Name: cersei
text: cersei Robert was a drunken fool, but he didn't enjoy cruelty. Sometimes I wonder. What? If this is the price for what we've done, for our sins.

title: A Man Without Honor
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion Sins?

title: A Man Without Honor
Name: cersei
text: cersei The Targaryens wed brother and sister for hundreds of years, I know. That's what Jaime and I would say to each other in our moments of doubt. It's what I told Ned Stark when he was stupid enough to confront me. Half the Targaryens went mad, didn't they? What's the saying? "Every time a Targaryen is born, the Gods flip a coin."

title: A Man Without Honor
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion You've beaten the odds. Tommen and Myrcella are good, decent children, both of them.

title: A Man Without Honor
Name: man
text: man Then why wait?

title: A Man Without Honor
Name: man
text: man We're sworn to the king.

title: A Man Without Honor
Name: man
text: man There's not a king.

title: A Man Without Honor
Name: man
text: man That's treason.

title: A Man Without Honor
Name: man
text: man So is saving Lannisters, yeah?

title: A Man Without Honor
Name: man
text: man Back off, you.

title: A Man Without Honor
Name: man
text: man No, I won't.

title: A Man Without Honor
Name: brienne
text: brienne Your son returns at dawn, my lady?

title: A Man Without Honor
Name: catelyn
text: catelyn So they say.

title: A Man Without Honor
Name: brienne
text: brienne The Kingslayer won't last the night. The more they drink, the angrier they'll get. And when the Karstarks draw their swords Who wants to die defending a Lannister?

title: A Man Without Honor
Name: catelyn
text: catelyn Come.

title: A Man Without Honor
Name: catelyn
text: catelyn I need to be alone with him.

title: A Man Without Honor
Name: guard
text: guard My lady, our orders-

title: A Man Without Honor
Name: catelyn
text: catelyn Your orders, which I just gave you, are to leave me alone with him.

title: A Man Without Honor
Name: jaime
text: jaime Come to say goodbye, Lady Stark? I believe it's my last night in this world. Is that a woman?

title: A Man Without Honor
Name: catelyn
text: catelyn Do you hear them out there? They want your head.

title: A Man Without Honor
Name: jaime
text: jaime Old Lord Karstark doesn't seem to like me.

title: A Man Without Honor
Name: catelyn
text: catelyn You strangled his son with your chains.

title: A Man Without Honor
Name: jaime
text: jaime Oh. Oh. Was he the one on guard duty? He was in my way. Any knight would have done the same.

title: A Man Without Honor
Name: catelyn
text: catelyn You are no knight. You have forsaken every vow you ever took.

title: A Man Without Honor
Name: jaime
text: jaime So many vows. They make you swear and swear. Defend the king, obey the king, obey your father, protect the innocent, defend the weak. But what if your father despises the king? What if the king massacres the innocent? It's too much. No matter what you do, you're forsaking one vow or another. Where did you find this beast?

title: A Man Without Honor
Name: catelyn
text: catelyn She is a truer knight than you will ever be, Kingslayer.

title: A Man Without Honor
Name: jaime
text: jaime Kingslayer. What a king he was. Here's to Aerys Targaryen, the Second of His Name, Lord of the Seven Kingdoms, Protector of the Realm, and to the sword I shoved in his back.

title: A Man Without Honor
Name: catelyn
text: catelyn You are a man without honor.

title: A Man Without Honor
Name: jaime
text: jaime Do you know, I've never been with any woman but Cersei. So in my own way, I have more honor than poor old dead Ned. What was the name of that bastard he fathered?

title: A Man Without Honor
Name: catelyn
text: catelyn Brienne.

title: A Man Without Honor
Name: jaime
text: jaime No, that wasn't it. Snow, a bastard from the North. Now, when When good old Ned came home with some whore's baby, did you pretend to love it? No. You're not very good at pretending. You're an honest woman. You hated that boy, didn't you? How could you not hate him? The walking, talking reminder that the honorable Lord Eddard Stark fucked another woman.

title: A Man Without Honor
Name: catelyn
text: catelyn Your sword.

title: A Man Without Honor
Name: theon
text: theon I told you what would happen. All of you. I told you what would happen if you served me loyally. And what would happen if you did not.

title: A Man Without Honor
Name: luwin
text: luwin What are you doing? What have you done?

title: A Man Without Honor
Name: theon
text: theon If there are any who still question whether your new lord means what he says, here is the answer to your question.

title: A Man Without Honor
Name: luwin
text: luwin No!

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: man
text: man Riders approaching!

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: mar
text: mar Open the gate!

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: yara
text: yara Why, it's the Prince of Winterfell.

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: theon
text: theon Envy isn't attractive.

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: yara
text: yara What envy?

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: theon
text: theon You should be proud of your brother's achievement. I took the great castle of Winterfell with twenty men.

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: yara
text: yara You're a great warrior. I saw the bodies above your gates. Which one gave you the tougher fight, the cripple or the six-year-old?

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: theon
text: theon I treated the Stark boys with honor, and they repaid me with treachery.

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: yara
text: yara You treated them with honor? By butchering them?

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: theon
text: theon Before I had to kill them- I treated them-

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: yara
text: yara You seized their home, as is your right. We're Ironborn, we take what we need.

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: theon
text: theon Exactly.

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: yara
text: yara Then you made them prisoners in their home and they ran away. Is that treachery? I'd call it bravery.

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: theon
text: theon They made me a promise

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: yara
text: yara Your little boy prisoners made you a promise and you got mad when they broke it? Are you the dumbest cunt alive?

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: theon
text: theon Don't call me

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: yara
text: yara A cunt. A dumb cunt who killed the only two Starks in Winterfell. You know how valuable those boys were?

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: theon
text: theon If I hadn't killed them, the Northerners would think me weak.

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: yara
text: yara You are weak. And you're stupid.

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: theon
text: theon I'm warning you.

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: yara
text: yara Go on, then. Warn me.

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: theon
text: theon You haven't brought enough men. How am I supposed to defend Winterfell with just this lot?

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: yara
text: yara You're not. I've come to bring you home. Father wants a word.

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: theon
text: theon Is this a joke? Winterfell is the heart of the North.

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: yara
text: yara Aye, it is, hundreds of miles from the sea. We're islanders, baby brother. Had you forgotten that? Our power comes from our ships. And now that you've decorated your walls with the bodies of the Stark boys, every man in the North wants to see you hanged. When Robb Stark finds out-

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: theon
text: theon He won't find out. We've killed all the ravens. We have all the horses. I've taken Winterfell. And I will keep Winterfell.

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: yara
text: yara Leave us.

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: yara
text: yara Theon, you're my blood. We both loved our mother. We both endured our father. Come home with me. Don't die here alone.

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: theon
text: theon I don't intend to die.

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: yara
text: yara You were a terrible baby, do you know that? Bawling all the time, never sleeping. And one night, you just wouldn't shut up, screaming like a dying pig. I walked over to your crib, I looked down at you. I wanted to strangle you. And you looked up at me and you stopped screaming. You smiled at me. Don't die so far from the sea.

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: ygritte
text: ygritte I've brought you a present, Lord of Bones.

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: lord
text: lord I already got one crow. Don't need two.

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: ygritte
text: ygritte Mance will want to question this one. Knows all about where the crows are and what they're planning.

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: lord
text: lord The Halfhand knows more. This one is just a little boy. Gut him.

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: ygritte
text: ygritte He could have killed me half a dozen times.

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: lord
text: lord And now he wishes he did. Gut him.

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: ygritte
text: ygritte He's a bastard of Winterfell, Ned Stark's son.

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: ygritte
text: ygritte Mance will want him.

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: lord
text: lord What does Mance want with a dead man's bastard?

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: ygritte
text: ygritte I don't know. I think he'll want to decide for himself.

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: lord
text: lord He runs, I'll chop his balls off.

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: ygritte
text: ygritte He runs, I'll do it meself.

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: ygritte
text: ygritte We're even now, Jon Snow.

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: jon
text: jon I couldn't do it. I had the sword on her neck, I just couldn't-

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: qhorin
text: qhorin I know.

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: jon
text: jon The others?

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: qhorin
text: qhorin When you didn't come back, we went looking for you. We found your tracks fast enough. But they found us before we found you.

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: jon
text: jon They died because of me.

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: qhorin
text: qhorin See that it wasn't for nothing.

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: wildling
text: wildling All right, up, lad.

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: wildling
text: wildling Come on, on your feet, now. Move it.

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: talisa
text: talisa Is she beautiful?

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: robb
text: robb I've never met her.

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: talisa
text: talisa What's her name?

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: robb
text: robb Frey, I suppose. I don't know her first name.

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: talisa
text: talisa I'm sure you'll be very happy.

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: talisa
text: talisa And you're marrying her for a bridge?

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: robb
text: robb An important bridge.

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: talisa
text: talisa Ah.

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: robb
text: robb It was before they killed my father. I still thought I could march south and rescue him in time, but only if I crossed that bridge.

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: talisa
text: talisa When I speak to people from the North, they all loved your father.

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: robb
text: robb He was the best man I ever met. I know children always think that about their fathers, but

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: talisa
text: talisa Children do not always think that about their fathers, believe me.

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: robb
text: robb He once told me that being a lord is like being a father, except you have thousands of children and you worry about all of them. The farmers plowing the fields are yours to protect. The charwomen scrubbing the floors, yours to protect. The soldiers you order into battle. He told me he woke with fear in the morning and went to bed with fear in the night. I didn't believe him. I asked him, "How can a man be brave if he's afraid?" "That is the only time a man can be brave," he told me.

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: talisa
text: talisa I wish I could have met him.

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: robb
text: robb He would have liked you.

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: talisa
text: talisa Most lords worry more about their gold and their glory than the charwomen scrubbing their floors.

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: robb
text: robb He didn't care much about gold or glory.

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: talisa
text: talisa And you? You think I'm fighting this war so they'll sing songs about me? I want to go home. I want the men following me to go home.

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: talisa
text: talisa Then why don't you?

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: robb
text: robb Because we'll never be safe until the Lannisters are defeated. And because I believe in justice.

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: talisa
text: talisa Chopping off Joffrey's head, you mean.

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: robb
text: robb That would be a start.

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: rider
text: rider Your Grace, milady. The Kingslayer, he escaped in the night.

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: robb
text: robb How? How?

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: robb
text: robb Tell me this isn't true.

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: robb
text: robb Why?

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: catelyn
text: catelyn For the girls.

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: robb
text: robb You betrayed me.

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: catelyn
text: catelyn Robb-

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: robb
text: robb No! You knew I would not allow it and you did it anyway.

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: catelyn
text: catelyn Bran and Rickon are captives in Winterfell. Sansa and Arya are captives in King's Landing. I have five children, and only one of them is free.

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: rickard
text: rickard I lost one son fighting by your son's side. I lost another to the Kingslayer, strangled with a chain. You commit treason because your children are prisoners? I would carve out my heart and offer it to the Father, if he would let my sons wake from their graves and step into a prison cell.

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: catelyn
text: catelyn I grieve for your sons, my lord.

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: rickard
text: rickard I don't want your grief. I want my vengeance. And you stole it from me.

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: catelyn
text: catelyn Killing Jaime Lannister would not buy life for your children, but returning him to King's Landing may buy life for mine.

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: robb
text: robb Jaime Lannister has played you for a fool. You've weakened our position. You've brought discord into our camp. And you did it all behind my back. Make sure she's guarded day and night.

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: catelyn
text: catelyn Robb. How many men did we send in pursuit of the Kingslayer?

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: soldier
text: soldier Forty, Your Grace.

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: robb
text: robb Send another forty with our fastest horses.

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: catelyn
text: catelyn Robb.

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: jaime
text: jaime Damn.

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: jaime
text: jaime You're much uglier in daylight. What's your name? I'm Jaime Lannister of Casterly Rock, son of Tywin.

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: jaime
text: jaime A captive knight has a right to know his captor's identity.

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: brienne
text: brienne Brienne of Tarth.

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: jaime
text: jaime Tarth, Tarth, Tarth. Crescent moons and starbursts. Lord Selwyn Tarth. Your father. Do you have any brothers and sisters, my lady? It's a long way to King's Landing. Might as well get to know one another.

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: jaime
text: jaime Have you known many men? I suppose not. Women? Horses? Ah.

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: jaime
text: jaime I didn't mean to give offense, my lady. Forgive me.

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: brienne
text: brienne Your crimes are past forgiveness, Kingslayer.

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: jaime
text: jaime Why do you hate me so much? Have I ever harmed you?

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: brienne
text: brienne You've harmed others, those you were sworn to protect, the weak, the innocent.

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: jaime
text: jaime Has anyone ever told you you're as boring as you are ugly?

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: brienne
text: brienne You will not provoke me to anger.

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: jaime
text: jaime I already have. Look at you. You're ready to chop my head off. Do you think you could? Do you think you could beat me in a fair fight?

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: brienne
text: brienne I've never seen you fight.

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: jaime
text: jaime The answer is no. There are three men in the kingdoms who might have a chance against me. You're not one of them.

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: brienne
text: brienne All my life men like you have sneered at me. And all my life I've been knocking men like you into the dust.

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: jaime
text: jaime If you're so confident, unlock my chains. Let's see what happens.

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: brienne
text: brienne Do you take me for an idiot? In!

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: jaime
text: jaime I took you for a fighter, a man Pardon. Woman of honor. Was I wrong? You're afraid.

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: brienne
text: brienne Maybe one day we'll find out, Kingslayer.

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: kevan
text: kevan King's Landing will fall an hour after Stannis lands his force. It's not too late for King Joffrey and Cersei and the court to ride west to safety.

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: tywin
text: tywin Surrender the Iron Throne?

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: kevan
text: kevan Better than seeing their heads mounted on the city gates. Stannis will execute them all.

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: tywin
text: tywin No, a king who runs will not be king for long. He's a Lannister. He'll stand and fight. Stannis, two days from the capital and the wolf at my doorstep.

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: kevan
text: kevan The scouts assure us Robb Stark remains north of Ashemark.

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: tywin
text: tywin Ha! The last time the scouts assured us of Stark's movement, he lured us into a trap. Which is why my son is his prisoner.

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: tywin
text: tywin Too close to Casterly Rock.

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: kevan
text: kevan He sent a splinter force to recapture Winterfell. The Greyjoys have done us a great favor. Stark won't risk marching on Casterly Rock until he's at full force.

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: tywin
text: tywin He's a boy and he's never lost a battle. He'll risk anything at any time because he doesn't know enough to be afraid.

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: tywin
text: tywin We'll ride at nightfall. I want a full night's march before he knows we're on the move. Clegane, you'll maintain a garrison here at Harrenhal. Track down this brotherhood and destroy them. The girl has proven herself a good servant. She'll stay on with you. See that he doesn't get drunk in the evenings. He's poor company when he's sober, but he's better at his work.

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: guard
text: guard You've got some questions to answer.

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: man
text: man Who killed Ser Amory?

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: man
text: man I don't know! Please!

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: man
text: man Give me the name. Take this one out for the crows.

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: man
text: man I told you, I don't know. Please.

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: rorge
text: rorge Look, it's Yoren's little cunt. Used to be a boy, now it's a girl.

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: arya
text: arya Where's Jaqen?

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: rorge
text: rorge Don't care. Where's your stick now, bitch? I promised to fuck you with it.

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: guard
text: guard Come on, time to kill some wolves.

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: hot
text: hot You need sour cherries to make it right. And the secret is you dry the stones, and then you break them with a mallet. That's where the real flavor is. You crush 'em up real fine. And then when you're finished, you sprinkle them over the piecrust.

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: hot
text: hot How would I know?

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: arya
text: arya I need him now. Lord Tywin's marching tonight.

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: gendry
text: gendry You need him?

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: arya
text: arya He's helping me.

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: hot
text: hot I saw him.

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: arya
text: arya Where?

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: hot
text: hot Ow!

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: hot
text: hot They went riding out the gates a few hours ago.

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: hot
text: hot On patrol. Let go of my ears.

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: hot
text: hot What do you want with him anyway?

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: quorin
text: quorin Mance is gonna march on the Wall. When he does, one brother inside his army will be worth a thousand fighting against it.

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: jon
text: jon They'll never trust me.

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: quorin
text: quorin They might. If you do what needs to be done.

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: jon
text: jon What?

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: quorin
text: quorin How does it feel knowing those men all died so you could skip through the snow with your little savage girl?

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: jon
text: jon I didn't.

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: quorin
text: quorin I should have known better, trusting a traitor's bastard.

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: lord
text: lord He's not yours to kill, crow.

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion Do you have to do that here?

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: bronn
text: bronn I like to keep me hands clean.

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion Yes, but do you have to do it here?

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion You should start wearing the gold cloak.

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: bronn
text: bronn I don't want to wear a gold cloak.

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion You're commander of the City Watch. You shouldn't be dressed like a common

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: bronn
text: bronn A cloak slows you down in a fight. Makes it hard to move quietly. And the gold catches the light, so you're nice and easy to spot at night.

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion Well, you're not sneaking through alleyways any longer. You're supposed to stand out.

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: bronn
text: bronn We had a deal and wearing a gold cloak wasn't part of it.

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion Fine, fine. No gold cloak.

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion What?

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: bronn
text: bronn What?

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion What? What? Why are you staring at me?

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: bronn
text: bronn You don't want me cleaning me nails. You don't want me looking your way. Why am I here?

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion To help me plan the defense of King's Landing.

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion Stannis will be here any day.

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: bronn
text: bronn And one of these explains how to beat him?

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion An History of the Great Sieges of Westeros. " By Archmaester Shevelathin. Shevelatesh.

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: bronn
text: bronn Chevalteesh. I'd swap all your books for a few good archers.

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: varys
text: varys My Lord Hand. Commander. I must compliment you on the gold cloaks' performance these last few weeks. Did you know there has been a marked drop in thievery?

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion I did not know. And how did you accomplish this marked drop in thievery?

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: bronn
text: bronn Me and the lads rounded up all the known thieves.

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion For questioning?

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: bronn
text: bronn No. It's just the unknown thieves we need to worry about now.

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion We talked about this.

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: bronn
text: bronn Aye, we talked about it. Have you ever been in a city under siege? Maybe this part's not in your books. See, it's not the fighting that kills most people. It's the starving. Foodo s worth more than gold. Noble ladies sell their diamonds for a sack of potatoes. Things get bad enough, the poor start eating each other.

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: bronn
text: bronn The thieves, they love a siege. Soon as the gates are sealed, they steal all the food. By the time it's all over, they're the richest men in town.

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: varys
text: varys Given the circumstances, my lord, I believe extreme measures are warranted.

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: varys
text: varys Ah. "The Great Sieges of Westeros." Thrilling subject. Shame Archmaester Ch'Vyalthan wasn't a better writer.

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion Stannis knows King's Landing. He knows where the walls are strongest, and he knows which gates are weakest. The Mud Gate. A good ram will batter it down in minutes, and it's only 50 yards from the water. That's where he'll land.

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: varys
text: varys And if Stannis does attack the Mud Gate, what is our plan?

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: bronn
text: bronn We could throw books at his men.

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: varys
text: varys We don't have that many books.

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: bronn
text: bronn We don't have that many men, either.

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: varys
text: varys What do we have?

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion Pig shit.

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: sam
text: sam I'm not cut out for this sort of work.

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: dolorous
text: dolorous I always imagined meself doing something much worse.

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: grenn
text: grenn We're digging latrine pits at the end of the world. I can't imagine anything much worse.

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: dolorous
text: dolorous You lack imagination.

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: sam
text: sam Where do you think Jon is right now?

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: dolorous
text: dolorous He went off with the Halfhand. He didn't come back. A betting man would go with dead.

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: sam
text: sam He's not dead. No, Jon's a great fighter.

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: grenn
text: grenn Well, he's better than me and a lot better than you.

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: sam
text: sam He's got a Valyrian steel sword.

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: eddision
text: eddision So did his father.

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: sam
text: sam And Qhorin Halfhand is the greatest ranger alive.

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: dolorous
text: dolorous Great rangers never get old is the problem. Shit ones neither. It's them in the middle that last a long time.

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: grenn
text: grenn What in seven hells is that?

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: sam
text: sam The First Men made these marks. Help me with it.

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: grenn
text: grenn Look.

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: dolorous
text: dolorous If you find something you're not supposed to, best thing to do is pretend you've never seen it.

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: sam
text: sam That's a Night's Watch cloak.

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: grenn
text: grenn It's been here a long time.

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: sam
text: sam Oh. Must be dragonglass.

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: grenn
text: grenn Dragonglass?

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: sam
text: sam The maesters call it obsidian.

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: grenn
text: grenn Why would a brother hide it here?

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: dolorous
text: dolorous I expect it's 'cause he wanted somebody to find it.

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: soldier
text: soldier Mind where you're going.

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: arya
text: arya I'm sorry. I'll-

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: arya
text: arya Where were you?

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: jaqen
text: jaqen A man has patrol duty.

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: arya
text: arya Tywin Lannister was right here, and now he's gone.

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: jaqen
text: jaqen A girl owes one more name. The Red God demands it. Give the man a name.

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: arya
text: arya How long after I give you the name does it take you to kill someone?

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: jaqen
text: jaqen A minute, an hour, a month. Death is certain, the time is not.

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: arya
text: arya He's taking his army to attack my brother. I need him dead right now.

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: jaqen
text: jaqen This a man cannot do.

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: arya
text: arya You promised you'd help me.

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: jaqen
text: jaqen Help was not promised, lovely girl. Only death. There must be others. Give a name, any name.

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: arya
text: arya And you'll kill them? Anybody?

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: jaqen
text: jaqen By the Seven New Gods and the Old Gods beyond counting, I swear it.

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: arya
text: arya All right. Jaqen H'ghar.

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: jaqen
text: jaqen A girl gives a man his own name?

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: arya
text: arya That's right.

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: jaqen
text: jaqen Gods are not mocked. This is no joking thing.

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: arya
text: arya I'm not joking. A man can go kill himself.

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: jaqen
text: jaqen Un-name me.

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: arya
text: arya No.

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: jaqen
text: jaqen Please?

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: arya
text: arya I'll un-name you.

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: jaqen
text: jaqen Thank you.

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: arya
text: arya If you help me and my friends escape.

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: jaqen
text: jaqen This would require more than one life. This is not part of our bargain.

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: arya
text: arya Fine, Jaqen H'ghar.

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: jaqen
text: jaqen A girl lacks honor. If I do this thing, a girl must obey.

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: arya
text: arya A girl will obey.

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: jaqen
text: jaqen A girl and her friends will walk through the gate at midnight.

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion Thank you, Podrick.

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: cersei
text: cersei Odd little boy.

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion I have a certain sympathy for odd little boys.

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: cersei
text: cersei You and Varys both.

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion Excellent lamprey pie. Were you slaving away in the kitchen all day? I hear Joffrey plans on fighting. An inspiration for the troops. The young king in his shining armor fighting to defend the capital against the wicked old rebel.

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: cersei
text: cersei He's only a boy.

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion Younger boys are off fighting his war.

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: cersei
text: cersei He's not ready.

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion What is he, seventeen? Remember Jaime at seventeen?

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: cersei
text: cersei Better than you. Some men have a gift for this sort of thing, some don't. His place is not on the battlefield.

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion It's not on the throne, either, sadly for all of us.

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: cersei
text: cersei Do you think I'm an idiot?

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion No, I'd say you possess above-average intelligence.

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: cersei
text: cersei You shipped off my only daughter. And now you want to send my eldest son to the battlefield to die.

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion He'll have his Kingsguard protecting him. He has the finest armor gold can buy. He needs to be out there. The men will fight more fiercely seeing their king fighting beside them instead of hiding behind his mother's skirts. Any dessert?

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: cersei
text: cersei Do you know why Varys is so dangerous?

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion Because he has thousands of spies in his employ. Because he knows everything we do before we do it.

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: cersei
text: cersei Because he doesn't have a cock.

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion Neither do you.

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: cersei
text: cersei Perhaps I'm dangerous, too. You, on the other hand, are as big a fool as every other man. That little worm between your legs does half your thinking.

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion It's not that little.

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion Why are you smiling?

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: cersei
text: cersei Because I'm happy.

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion And why are you happy?

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: cersei
text: cersei Because I have your little whore.

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion I thought you preferred blondes.

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: cersei
text: cersei Such a droll little fellow. Tell me, have you married this one yet? No? Good. Father will be so pleased.

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion Why do you care who I fuck?

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: cersei
text: cersei Because a Lannister always pays her debts. You stole my only daughter, you plot to have Joffrey killed.

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion This is madness. Stannis will be here in days. You need me.

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: cersei
text: cersei For what? Your skill in battle? Pretty thing, your whore. Lovely body. The bruises will heal in time.

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion Where did you find her?

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: cersei
text: cersei Varys isn't the only one who hears whispers. Really, a Lannister lion necklace? You need to hide your secret whores more carefully.

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion You've forgotten the most important thing about whores.

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: cersei
text: cersei Oh? Well, you're the expert. Tell me.

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion You don't buy them, you only rent them.

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: cersei
text: cersei You're usually a better liar, baby brother. This one you like. You like her very much. Could it be love? Don't worry, she'll be treated gently enough. Unless Joffrey is hurt. And then every wound he suffers, she'll suffer, too. And if he dies, there isn't a man alive who could devise a more painful death for your little cunt.

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion And how do I know you haven't killed her already?

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: cersei
text: cersei Would you like to see her? I thought you might. Ser Mandon, bring in my brother's whore.

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion I'm sorry they hurt you. You must be brave.

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion I promise I will free you.

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: ros
text: ros Don't forget me.

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion Never.

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion I will hurt you for this. A day will come when you think you're safe and happy, and your joy will turn to ashes in your mouth. And you will know the debt is paid.

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: cersei
text: cersei Get out.

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion Shae!

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: shae
text: shae I've been waiting all night. What is wrong?

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion You're beautiful.

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: shae
text: shae Then why do you look sad?

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion We have to be more careful.

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: shae
text: shae Don't be afraid. I can take care of myself.

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion There are people who want to hurt me.

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: shae
text: shae I know. I won't let them. I'll cut off their faces. I will.

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion I would kill for you. Do you know that? I expect I'll have to before this is over. You're mine.

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: shae
text: shae I'm yours.

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion Promise me.

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: shae
text: shae I'm yours and you are mine.

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: robb
text: robb Still no word?

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: roose
text: roose We've sent a dozen ravens. None have returned. My bastard is only a few days from Winterfell. Once he captures the castle

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: robb
text: robb Theon has my brothers. If we storm the castle

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: roose
text: roose He wouldn't dare hurt the boys. They're his only hope of escaping the North with his head.

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: robb
text: robb Send word to your son. Any Ironborn who surrender will be allowed to return safely to their homes.

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: roose
text: roose A touch of mercy is a virtue, Your Grace. Too much-

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: robb
text: robb Any Ironborn with the exception of Theon Greyjoy. He betrayed our cause. He betrayed me. And we will hunt him down no matter where he runs.

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: roose
text: roose I expect his countrymen will turn on him the minute they hear the offer.

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: talisa
text: talisa Your pardon, my lord. Your Grace.

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: roose
text: roose My lady.

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: talisa
text: talisa How are you?

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: robb
text: robb How am I? I've had to arrest my mother. The Lannisters have my sisters. The man I considered my closest friend has seized my home and my brothers. I'm fighting a war and I don't know if I should march south or north.

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: talisa
text: talisa I'm sorry. It was a stupid question. I'm sorry.

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: robb
text: robb No. Forgive me. You're being kind. I have no right.

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: talisa
text: talisa You have every right. You're a king.

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: robb
text: robb That's not the kind of king I want to be.

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: talisa
text: talisa What kind do you want to be?

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: robb
text: robb I don't know. The good kind. Most kings grew up as princes. They spend their whole lives preparing for the crown. I was raised to be Lord of Winterfell.

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: talisa
text: talisa I was raised to be a proper little lady, to play the harp and dance the latest steps and recite Valyrian poetry.

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: robb
text: robb I'd like to hear you play the harp.

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: talisa
text: talisa No. No, you would not.

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: robb
text: robb How did you go from reciting Valyrian poetry to sawing off men's feet?

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: talisa
text: talisa When I was twelve, my mother and father went to a wedding. Weddings in Volantis last for days, you know. And they left me with my little brother. The second afternoon they were gone was the hottest day in the three-year summer. We couldn't bear to be inside, so we ran down to the Rhoyne. Every child in Volantis was in the Rhoyne that day. The rich, the poor, we were all there. Naked, screaming, racing to the little islands. Drummers were playing for coppers on the east bank. I was treading water, talking to a friend, when I realized I hadn't seen my brother. I called his name. Then I started screaming his name. And then I saw him floating face down. My heart just stopped. I was I dragged him from the water. My friend helped me, I think. I don't even remember. He was so little. Then we pulled him onto the riverbank. And I screamed at him and I shook him. And he was dead. Just dead. A man ran over. He had a fish tattoo on his face. In Volantis, the slaves have tattoos. So you know what they are without having to talk to them. And this man worked on a fishing boat. And he pushed me out of the way. You have to understand, for a slave to push a highborn girl, that's death for the man, a terrible death. But he pushed me out of the way, and he started pressing on my brother's chest again and again and again, until my brother spat out half of the Rhoyne and cried out. And the man cradled his head and told him to be calm. I decided two things that day. I would not waste my years planning dances and masquerades with the other noble ladies. And when I came of age, I would never live in a slave city again. I'm sorry, Your Grace. You told me of your problems and I've blathered on.

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: robb
text: robb I don't want to marry the Frey girl.

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: talisa
text: talisa I don't want you to marry her. But you needed that bridge. I hope it's a very beautiful bridge.

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: hot
text: hot The sour cherries was all crushed up and ready.

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: gendry
text: gendry Shut up.

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: hot
text: hot Probably in the piecrust by now. In the oven. The nice, warm oven.

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: arya
text: arya Shut up. What did you bring?

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: yara
text: yara Shut up. What did you bring?

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: hot
text: hot The cheese could be better. I did get some nice sausages.

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: gendry
text: gendry What did he want us to do about those guards?

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: arya
text: arya He didn't say. He just said, "Walk through the gates."

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: gendry
text: gendry What about the guards?

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: arya
text: arya He didn't say anything about the guards.

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: gendry
text: gendry What, he left that bit out? It's a pretty important part, don't you think?

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: arya
text: arya We have to trust him.

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: gendry
text: gendry Trust him? You trusted him to fight with us when you set him free and he ran.

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: hot
text: hot I want to go back to the kitchens.

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: arya
text: arya Shut up. Stay here if you're afraid.

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: gendry
text: gendry Arry, don't.

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: man
text: man Away! Reset!

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: davos
text: davos If the wind holds, we'll reach King's Landing in a day.

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: stannis
text: stannis Will it hold?

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: davos
text: davos Can't make promises for the wind, Your Grace.

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: man
text: man Again, pull!

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: stannis
text: stannis I admire you, Ser Davos.

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: davos
text: davos I thank you, Your Grace.

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: stannis
text: stannis Pleased to hear it. Some highborn fools call you Onion Knight and think they insult you. So you take the onion for your sigil, sew it on your coat, fly the onion flag.

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: davos
text: davos My son wishes me to change it. Three mermen with tridents, something like that. I understand why the older families look down at me.

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: stannis
text: stannis Do you? Why?

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: davos
text: davos My father was a crabber.

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: stannis
text: stannis And?

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: davos
text: davos Well, sons of lords don't like to break bread with sons of crabbers. Our hands stink.

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: stannis
text: stannis And where were those lords when Storm's End starved?

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: davos
text: davos Many fought bravely for your brother. Many fought for the Mad King.

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: stannis
text: stannis You defend these men who insult you behind your back.

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: davos
text: davos Some are happy to do it to my face.

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: stannis
text: stannis We were forgotten. Robert and Ned Stark, they were the heroes. The glorious rebels marching from battle to battle, liberating towns from the yoke of the Mad King, while I held Storm's End with five hundred men.

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: davos
text: davos No one has forgotten, Your Grace.

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: stannis
text: stannis No? Robert did. He gave Storm's End to Renly after the war. Renly never fought a day in his life.

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: davos
text: davos He was only a boy.

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: stannis
text: stannis Then why'd he give him Storm's End?

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: stannis
text: stannis First, we ate the horses. We weren't riding anywhere, not with the castle surrounded. We couldn't feed them, so fine, the horses. Then the cats. Never liked cats. So fine. I do like dogs. Good animals. Loyal. But we ate them. Then the rats. The night before you slipped through, I thought my wife was dying. She couldn't speak anymore, she was so frail. And then you made it through the lines. Slipped right through in your little black sailboat with your onions.

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: davos
text: davos And potatoes. Some salted beef, I believe.

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: stannis
text: stannis Every man in Storm's End wanted to kiss you that night.

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: davos
text: davos I was relieved they did not.

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: stannis
text: stannis Robert told me to hold Storm's End, so I held it. Then he told me he was giving it to Renly, so I gave it up. Insult or no, I gave it up. Because Robert was my older brother, and he was the king and I've always done my duty. But now, I'm the rightful king by every law of Westeros. And when I sit the Iron Throne, you'll be my Hand.

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: davos
text: davos Your Grace, I pray I serve you well.

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: stannis
text: stannis I expect you'll be the first crabber's son to wear the badge.

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: joffrey
text: joffrey You're the Master of Whisperers. You're supposed to know everything.

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: varys
text: varys No man can be in all rooms at all times. I have many little birds in the North, my lord, but I haven't heard their songs since Theon Greyjoy captured Winterfell.

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: joffrey
text: joffrey The Stark forces are distracted. Now is the time to strike.

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion To strike? My dear nephew, you do see these men preparing the walls for siege? You do understand Stannis Baratheon sails this way?

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: joffrey
text: joffrey If my Uncle Stannis lands on the shores of King's Landing, I'll ride out to greet him.

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion A brave choice, Your Grace. I'm sure your men will line up behind you.

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: joffrey
text: joffrey They say Stannis never smiles. I'll give him a red smile from ear to ear.

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion Imagine Stannis' terror.

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: varys
text: varys I am trying.

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion You're an intelligent man. I'd like to think I'm an intelligent man.

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: varys
text: varys Oh, no one disputes that, my lord, not even the multitudes who despise you.

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion I wish we could converse as two honest, intelligent men.

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: varys
text: varys I wish we could, too.

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion What do you want? Tell me.

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: varys
text: varys If we're going to play, you'll have to start.

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion My brother was the youngest Kingsguard in history. My sister became queen at the age of nineteen. When I reached manhood, my father put me in charge of all the drains and cisterns in Casterly Rock.

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: varys
text: varys A most highborn plumber.

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion The water never flowed better. And all the shit found its way to the sea. I never expected to have any real power. So when my father named me acting Hand

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: varys
text: varys You're quite good at being Hand, you know? Jon Arryn and Ned Stark were good men. Honorable men. But they disdained the game and those who played. You enjoy the game.

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion I do. Last thing I expected.

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: varys
text: varys And you play it well.

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion I'd like to keep playing it. If Stannis breaches the gates, the game is over.

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: varys
text: varys They say he burns his enemies alive to honor the Lord of Light.

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion The Lord of Light wants his enemies burned, the Drowned God wants them drowned. Why are all the gods such vicious cunts? Where is the god of tits and wine?

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: varys
text: varys In the Summer Isles, they worship a fertility goddess with sixteen teats.

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion We should sail there immediately.

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: varys
text: varys This morning, I heard a song all the way from Qarth beyond the Red Waste. Daenerys Targaryen lives.

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion A girl at the edge of the world is the least of our problems.

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: varys
text: varys She has three dragons. But even if what they say is true, it'll be years before they are fully grown. And then there will be nowhere to hide.

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion One game at a time, my friend.

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: jorah
text: jorah Careful, Khaleesi. Xaro owns this city and the warlocks have a thousand eyes watching for you. I found one. A ship with a good captain. She leaves for Astapor tomorrow.

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys Astapor?

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: jorah
text: jorah We cannot stay here.

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys They have my dragons. A mother does not flee without her children.

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: jorah
text: jorah They're not your children. I know they call you the Mother of Dragons and I know you love them, but you didn't grow them in your womb. They didn't suckle at your breast. They are dragons, Khaleesi. And if we stay in Qarth, we'll die.

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys You should sail to Astapor. I'm sure you'll be safe there.

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: jorah
text: jorah You know I would die for you. I will never abandon you. I'm sworn to protect you, to serve.

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys Then serve me. If my dragons are in the House of the Undying, then take me there.

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: jorah
text: jorah That's what the warlock wants. He told you so himself. If you enter that place, you will never leave again. His magic is strong.

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys And what of my magic? You saw me step into the fire. You watched the witch burn. What did the flames do to me? Do you remember?

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: jorah
text: jorah Until my last breath, I will remember. After I have forgotten my mother's face.

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys They are my children. And they are the only children I will ever have. Take me to them.

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: theon
text: theon We should bury them.

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: dagmer
text: dagmer I'd leave 'em up a few more days. Sends a message.

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: theon
text: theon If they haven't got the damn message yet, a few more days won't help. As you say. But it don't hurt to let 'em rot a while longer.

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: dagmer
text: dagmer What's this?

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: theon
text: theon Gold for the farmer. For his trouble.

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: dagmer
text: dagmer His troubles are done. He's feeding the crops now.

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: dagmer
text: dagmer His wife, too. You want to keep a man silent, you silence him.

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: osha
text: osha Got as far as the farm and then doubled back. Walked through the stream to throw off the hounds. Hoped this would be the last place they'd think to look.

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: luwin
text: luwin You're right so far.

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: osha
text: osha Who was that out there hung up at the gates?

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: luwin
text: luwin Must have been the farmer's boys.

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: osha
text: osha He killed them and burned them and passed them off as the little lords?

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: luwin
text: luwin They mustn't know. Bran would blame himself.

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: osha
text: osha They'll never hear it from me. The little lads have suffered enough.

title: Blackwater
Name: matthos
text: matthos That's it. The tide's against us.

title: Blackwater
Name: davos
text: davos Aye, but we have the wind. She'll blow us straight to the gates.

title: Blackwater
Name: matthos
text: matthos You're coming home.

title: Blackwater
Name: davos
text: davos King's Landing hasn't been home for twenty years. I spent most of my life dodging the royal fleet. And now I'm sailing right at them.

title: Blackwater
Name: matthos
text: matthos This is the royal fleet. And you're not a smuggler anymore, you're the high captain.

title: Blackwater
Name: davos
text: davos Of course, there are several royal fleets at the moment.

title: Blackwater
Name: matthos
text: matthos Not after tonight. When the sun rises, Stannis will sit on the Iron Throne and you will be his Hand.

title: Blackwater
Name: davos
text: davos Gods be good.

title: Blackwater
Name: matthos
text: matthos God. Father, there is only one and he watches over us.

title: Blackwater
Name: davos
text: davos But not over them?

title: Blackwater
Name: matthos
text: matthos Over all of us. The people of King's Landing did not choose the false king, Joffrey Baratheon. They will be glad to see his head on a spike.

title: Blackwater
Name: davos
text: davos Well, first, we have to put it there.

title: Blackwater
Name: matthos
text: matthos Our ships outnumber theirs ten-to-one.

title: Blackwater
Name: davos
text: davos Our army outnumber theirs five-to-one. Those walls have never been breached, and the men guarding the walls, when they see you, they don't see a liberator, they see a stranger come to set their city on fire.

title: Blackwater
Name: matthos
text: matthos I have faith in the Lord of Light. I have faith in our cause. And I have faith in my captain.

title: Blackwater
Name: shae
text: shae Are you afraid, my lion?

title: Blackwater
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion If the city falls, Stannis will burn every Lannister he can find. Of course I'm afraid.

title: Blackwater
Name: shae
text: shae I won't let them hurt you.

title: Blackwater
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion I'm a Lannister. I don't have a choice in all this. But it's not your war.

title: Blackwater
Name: shae
text: shae It is now.

title: Blackwater
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion You can't fuck your way out of everything.

title: Blackwater
Name: shae
text: shae I have so far. Do you remember what you said when you met me in your tent? That I should make love to you like it was your last day on this earth.

title: Blackwater
Name: pycelle
text: pycelle As you know, Your Grace, it is not only the sworn duty of a maester to carry out the wishes of the house he serves, but also to offer guidance and counsel in times of war.

title: Blackwater
Name: cersei
text: cersei Your words are always wise and measured.

title: Blackwater
Name: pycelle
text: pycelle If you could - If anything, a maester's duties become more urgent in times of war and turmoil. I remember back in the days of King

title: Blackwater
Name: cersei
text: cersei You brought me something?

title: Blackwater
Name: pycelle
text: pycelle Yes. Essence of nightshade is as dangerous as it is efficacious. A single drop in a cup of wine suffices to soothe ragged nerves. Three drops will bring on a deep and dreamless sleep. Ten drops, however-

title: Blackwater
Name: cersei
text: cersei I know what ten drops will bring.

title: Blackwater
Name: pycelle
text: pycelle Your Grace, if I may ask-

title: Blackwater
Name: cersei
text: cersei You may not. You must have a lot of work to do. I'm sure many brave men will need your wisdom soon.

title: Blackwater
Name: pycelle
text: pycelle Yes. A siege is very-

title: Blackwater
Name: cersei
text: cersei Be careful on the stairs, Grand Maester. There are so many.

title: Blackwater
Name: pycelle
text: pycelle Your Grace.

title: Blackwater
Name: men
text: men And so he spoke / That Lord of Castamere / But now the rains weep o'er his halls / With no one there to hear / Yes, now the rains weep o'er his halls / And not a soul to hear-

title: Blackwater
Name: bronn
text: bronn To the boys!

title: Blackwater
Name: soldier
text: soldier Lannisters! Where'd you learn the Lannister song?

title: Blackwater
Name: bronn
text: bronn Drunk Lannisters.

title: Blackwater
Name: prostitute
text: prostitute You've got a pretty voice.

title: Blackwater
Name: bronn
text: bronn Thank you very much.

title: Blackwater
Name: prostitute
text: prostitute And I like your nose. How many times you break it?

title: Blackwater
Name: bronn
text: bronn Well, now let's see. First time, I was five. My mam smacked me with an iron poker.

title: Blackwater
Name: prostitute
text: prostitute Oh.

title: Blackwater
Name: bronn
text: bronn It wasn't me she was aiming at. She was trying for my little brother. Now he was a real pest.

title: Blackwater
Name: bronn
text: bronn Second time, I was nine. Got in a scrap with a few older boys. They won. Third time-

title: Blackwater
Name: bronn
text: bronn Eh, you don't want to know about the third time.

title: Blackwater
Name: prostitute
text: prostitute Poor nose.

title: Blackwater
Name: bronn
text: bronn Don't feel sorry for him. He'll be halfway up your arse before the night's through.

title: Blackwater
Name: bronn
text: bronn Welcome, friends. This roundo s on me.

title: Blackwater
Name: bronn
text: bronn I don't think he likes me.

title: Blackwater
Name: sandor
text: sandor You think you're a hard man?

title: Blackwater
Name: bronn
text: bronn I know it.

title: Blackwater
Name: bronn
text: bronn It's warm in here. We've got beautiful women and good brown ale. Plenty for everyone. And all you want is to put one of us in the cold ground with no women to keep us company.

title: Blackwater
Name: sandor
text: sandor Oh, there's women in the ground. I put some there myself. So have you. You like fucking and drinking and singing. But killing, killing's the thing you love. You're just like me.

title: Blackwater
Name: sandor
text: sandor Only smaller.

title: Blackwater
Name: bronn
text: bronn And quicker. Eh?

title: Blackwater
Name: sandor
text: sandor Your Lord Imp's going to miss you.

title: Blackwater
Name: bronn
text: bronn Aye I expect he will someday.

title: Blackwater
Name: man
text: man Here we are.

title: Blackwater
Name: bronn
text: bronn One more drink before the war? Shall we?

title: Blackwater
Name: varys
text: varys I've always hated the bells. They ring for horror. A dead king, a city under siege.

title: Blackwater
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion A wedding.

title: Blackwater
Name: varys
text: varys Exactly. Podrick, is that it?

title: Blackwater
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion Is that it?" Nice touch. As if you don't know the name of every boy in town.

title: Blackwater
Name: varys
text: varys I'm not entirely sure what you're suggesting.

title: Blackwater
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion I'm entirely sure you're entirely sure what I'm suggesting.

title: Blackwater
Name: varys
text: varys Do you trust him?

title: Blackwater
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion Oddly enough, I do.

title: Blackwater
Name: varys
text: varys Good.

title: Blackwater
Name: varys
text: varys The map you asked for.

title: Blackwater
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion There must be twenty miles of tunnels beneath the city.

title: Blackwater
Name: varys
text: varys Closer to fifty. The Targaryens built this city to withstand a siege and to provide escape if necessary.

title: Blackwater
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion I'm not escaping. Strange as it sounds, I'm the captain of the ship, and if the ship goes down, I go with her.

title: Blackwater
Name: varys
text: varys That is good to hear. Though I'm sure many captains say the same while their ship is afloat. You look well suited for battle, my lord.

title: Blackwater
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion Well, I'm not.

title: Blackwater
Name: varys
text: varys For all our sakes, I hope you are wrong. My little birds tell me that Stannis Baratheon has taken up with a red priestess from Asshai.

title: Blackwater
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion What of it?

title: Blackwater
Name: varys
text: varys You don't believe in the old powers, my lord?

title: Blackwater
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion Blood spells, curses, shape-shifting. What do you think?

title: Blackwater
Name: varys
text: varys I think you believe in what you see and in what those you trust have seen. You probably don't entirely trust me.

title: Blackwater
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion Mmm, don't take it personally. I don't entirely trust myself.

title: Blackwater
Name: varys
text: varys And yet I have seen things and heard things, things you have not, things I wish I had not. I don't believe I've ever told you how I was cut.

title: Blackwater
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion No, I don't believe you have.

title: Blackwater
Name: varys
text: varys One day, I will. The dark arts have provided Lord Stannis with his armies and paved his path to our door. For a man in service to such powers to sit on the Iron Throne, I can think of nothing worse. And tonight, I believe you are the only man who can stop him.

title: Blackwater
Name: matthos
text: matthos They're welcoming the new king.

title: Blackwater
Name: davos
text: davos I've never known bells to mean surrender. They want to play music with us? Let's play. Drums.

title: Blackwater
Name: matthos
text: matthos Drums!

title: Blackwater
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion Remember, wait till the ships-

title: Blackwater
Name: bronn
text: bronn The ships are in the bay.

title: Blackwater
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion They must be far enough in-

title: Blackwater
Name: bronn
text: bronn I know what "in" means. Do you know how to use that?
