Name: tywin
text: tywin What news of Jaime?

title: Walk of Punishment
Name: tywin
text: tywin Twenty thousand unwashed Northerns have known about his escape for weeks. Collectively, you control more spies and informants than the rest of the world combined. Do you mean to tell me that none of you has any notion of where he is?

title: Walk of Punishment
Name: varys
text: varys We are trying, my lord.

title: Walk of Punishment
Name: tywin
text: tywin Try harder. What do we have, then?

title: Walk of Punishment
Name: varys
text: varys Robb Stark and most of his bannermen are in Riverrun for the funeral of his grandfather Lord Hoster Tully. In Stark's absence, Roose Bolton holds Harrenhal, which would seem to make him Lord of Harrenhal, in practice if not in name.

title: Walk of Punishment
Name: tywin
text: tywin Well, let him have it. The name suits our purposes far more than that useless pile of rubble. The Lord of Harrenhal will make a worthy suitor for the widow Arryn.

title: Walk of Punishment
Name: petyr
text: petyr For which I am extremely grateful to you, my lord. Lady Arryn and I have known each other since we were children. She has always been positively predisposed toward me.

title: Walk of Punishment
Name: pycelle
text: pycelle A successful courtship would make Lord Baelish acting Lord of the Vale.

title: Walk of Punishment
Name: petyr
text: petyr Titles do seem to breed titles.

title: Walk of Punishment
Name: tywin
text: tywin You'll leave for the Eyrie as soon as possible and bring Lysa Arryn into the fold. Then the young wolf can add his own aunt to the list of people who have taken up arms against him.

title: Walk of Punishment
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion Far be it from me to hinder true love, but Lord Baelish's absence would present certain problems. The royal wedding may end up being the most expensive event in living memory. Summer has ended, hard days lie ahead. Not a good time to leave the crown's finances unattended.

title: Walk of Punishment
Name: tywin
text: tywin Fully agreed. Which is why I'm naming you new Master of Coin.

title: Walk of Punishment
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion Master of Coin?

title: Walk of Punishment
Name: tywin
text: tywin It would appear to be a position that best suits your talents.

title: Walk of Punishment
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion I'm quite good at spending money, but a lifetime of outrageous wealth hasn't taught me much about managing it.

title: Walk of Punishment
Name: cersei
text: cersei I have no doubt you will prove equal to this challenge.

title: Walk of Punishment
Name: pycelle
text: pycelle Hear, hear.

title: Walk of Punishment
Name: men
text: men He lifted her high in the air. He sniffed and roared and smelled her there. She kicked and wailed, a maid so fair. But he licked the honey from her hair. From there to here, from here to there. All black and brown and covered with hair. He smelled that girl in the summer air. The bear, the bear and the maiden fair.

title: Walk of Punishment
Name: jaime
text: jaime I hope you're pleased. If you had armed me, they never would have taken us.

title: Walk of Punishment
Name: brienne
text: brienne You were armed when we were taken.

title: Walk of Punishment
Name: jaime
text: jaime I was in chains if you recall. Our little match would have ended quite quick if my hands weren't bound.

title: Walk of Punishment
Name: brienne
text: brienne All my life I've been hearing, 'Jaime Lannister, what a brilliant swordsman.' You were slower than I expected. And more predictable.

title: Walk of Punishment
Name: jaime
text: jaime I've been sitting in a muddy pen wrapped in chains for the past year.

title: Walk of Punishment
Name: brienne
text: brienne And I'm a woman. I was still beating you.

title: Walk of Punishment
Name: jaime
text: jaime You were not beating me.

title: Walk of Punishment
Name: brienne
text: brienne Maybe you were as good as people said once. Or maybe people just love to overpraise a famous name.

title: Walk of Punishment
Name: jaime
text: jaime When we make camp tonight, you'll be raped. More than once. None of these fellows have ever been with a noblewoman. You'd be wise not to resist.

title: Walk of Punishment
Name: brienne
text: brienne Would I?

title: Walk of Punishment
Name: jaime
text: jaime They'll knock your teeth out.

title: Walk of Punishment
Name: brienne
text: brienne You think I care about my teeth?

title: Walk of Punishment
Name: jaime
text: jaime No, I don't think you care about your teeth. If you fight them, they will kill you. Do you understand? I'm the prisoner of value, not you. Let them have what they want. What does it matter?

title: Walk of Punishment
Name: brienne
text: brienne What does it matter?

title: Walk of Punishment
Name: jaime
text: jaime Close your eyes. Pretend they're Renly.

title: Walk of Punishment
Name: brienne
text: brienne If you were a woman, you wouldn't resist? You'd let them do what they wanted?

title: Walk of Punishment
Name: jaime
text: jaime If I was a woman, I'd make them kill me. But I'm not, thank the gods.

title: Walk of Punishment
Name: gendry
text: gendry If I had a proper forge, I could make it good as new.

title: Walk of Punishment
Name: thoros
text: thoros Doesn't have to look pretty. It just has to keep the arrows out of my heart.

title: Walk of Punishment
Name: arya
text: arya Why are you helping him? He takes us prisoner and now he's our friend?

title: Walk of Punishment
Name: thoros
text: thoros You're not our prisoner, little lady.

title: Walk of Punishment
Name: arya
text: arya What am I?

title: Walk of Punishment
Name: thoros
text: thoros Our guest. No one's put any chains on you.

title: Walk of Punishment
Name: arya
text: arya So I can walk away, then?

title: Walk of Punishment
Name: thoros
text: thoros These woods aren't safe for Ned Stark's daughter. You're lucky we found you.

title: Walk of Punishment
Name: sandor
text: sandor You think you're good with that bow, you little twat?

title: Walk of Punishment
Name: anguy
text: anguy Better than anyone you've ever met.

title: Walk of Punishment
Name: sandor
text: sandor A cowardo s weapon. I like to fight up close. I like to see a man's face when I put the steel in him.

title: Walk of Punishment
Name: anguy
text: anguy Why? So you can kiss him?

title: Walk of Punishment
Name: arya
text: arya You remember the last time you were here?

title: Walk of Punishment
Name: sandor
text: sandor Looks like every other shit inn on the road.

title: Walk of Punishment
Name: anguy
text: anguy Now, apologies, but you're one ugly fucker and I'd rather not see you no more.

title: Walk of Punishment
Name: anguy
text: anguy Watch your head. Off we go.

title: Walk of Punishment
Name: driver
text: driver Walk up!

title: Walk of Punishment
Name: arya
text: arya What are you doing? We're about to leave.

title: Walk of Punishment
Name: hot
text: hot I'm staying.

title: Walk of Punishment
Name: gendry
text: gendry You're what?

title: Walk of Punishment
Name: hot
text: hot I baked some brown bread for the innkeep and she said she never had better. Told Thoros she's keeping me as a payment for all the free meals she's given him. Anyway, it's not me the Brotherhood wants. My brother ain't no king. I'm not a Stark of "Winterhell".

title: Walk of Punishment
Name: arya
text: arya Winterfell.

title: Walk of Punishment
Name: hot
text: hot You sure?

title: Walk of Punishment
Name: arya
text: arya I'm sure.

title: Walk of Punishment
Name: hot
text: hot Well, I made you something.

title: Walk of Punishment
Name: arya
text: arya What is it?

title: Walk of Punishment
Name: hot
text: hot It's a wolf.

title: Walk of Punishment
Name: gendry
text: gendry Yes, it is.

title: Walk of Punishment
Name: arya
text: arya That's the tail?

title: Walk of Punishment
Name: hot
text: hot Yeah.

title: Walk of Punishment
Name: gendry
text: gendry Well, be safe.

title: Walk of Punishment
Name: hot
text: hot Yeah, you, too. Don't get stabbed.

title: Walk of Punishment
Name: gendry
text: gendry You don't burn your fingers.

title: Walk of Punishment
Name: arya
text: arya Good-bye, Hot Pie.

title: Walk of Punishment
Name: hot
text: hot Good-bye, Arry.

title: Walk of Punishment
Name: man
text: man Up you go, little lady.

title: Walk of Punishment
Name: arya
text: arya Hey, Hot Pie. It's really good.

title: Walk of Punishment
Name: catelyn
text: catelyn A person could almost be forgiven for forgetting we're at war.

title: Walk of Punishment
Name: brynden
text: brynden It often comforts me to think that even in war's darkest days, in most places in the world absolutely nothing is happening.

title: Walk of Punishment
Name: catelyn
text: catelyn I've missed you, Uncle. Father missed you, too, from the day you left. Maybe he never said it in so many words-

title: Walk of Punishment
Name: brynden
text: brynden Maybe? Your father was a stubborn old ox. I was surprised when he died. Didn't think death had the patience.

title: Walk of Punishment
Name: catelyn
text: catelyn I'm glad you were with him. I wish to the gods I had been. Did you make peace in the end?

title: Walk of Punishment
Name: brynden
text: brynden After thirty years of fighting, I don't think he remembered what started it. He asked me to stop calling myself Blackfish. He said it was an old joke and it was never funny to begin with. I told him people had been calling me Blackfish for so long, they don't remember my real name.

title: Walk of Punishment
Name: catelyn
text: catelyn Every time he would leave for the capital or fight in a campaign, I'd see him off. 'Wait for me, little Cat,' he'd say. 'Wait for me and I'll come back to you.' And I would sit at this window every day when the sun came up, waiting. I wonder how many times did Bran or Rickon stare across the moors of Winterfell waiting for me to return. I will never see them again.

title: Walk of Punishment
Name: brynden
text: brynden You mustn't think it. We don't know the truth. They could be in hiding. Robb believes they're alive. And he must go on believing. He's got to remain strong if he's to prevail. And you must remain strong for him.

title: Walk of Punishment
Name: martyn
text: martyn You're Robb Stark's wife.

title: Walk of Punishment
Name: talisa
text: talisa Hold still.

title: Walk of Punishment
Name: martyn
text: martyn Is it true what they say about him?

title: Walk of Punishment
Name: talisa
text: talisa I don't know. What do they say about him?

title: Walk of Punishment
Name: martyn
text: martyn That he can turn into a wolf at night.

title: Walk of Punishment
Name: talisa
text: talisa True.

title: Walk of Punishment
Name: martyn
text: martyn And he eats the flesh of his enemies.

title: Walk of Punishment
Name: talisa
text: talisa True. You're a Lannister, aren't you?

title: Walk of Punishment
Name: martyn
text: martyn Martyn Lannister.

title: Walk of Punishment
Name: talisa
text: talisa Martyn Lannister. You've nothing to fear. My husband doesn't eat children. Unless it's a full moon. It's not a full moon tonight, is it? See? Nothing to fear.

title: Walk of Punishment
Name: mance
text: mance Always the artists.

title: Walk of Punishment
Name: jon
text: jon It's only horses. No men.

title: Walk of Punishment
Name: ygritte
text: ygritte You said there was dead crows.

title: Walk of Punishment
Name: orell
text: orell There was.

title: Walk of Punishment
Name: mance
text: mance How many men were here?

title: Walk of Punishment
Name: jon
text: jon About three hundred.

title: Walk of Punishment
Name: mance
text: mance And you know what those men are now?

title: Walk of Punishment
Name: mance
text: mance We're all the same to them - meat for their army.

title: Walk of Punishment
Name: jon
text: jon Do you think anyone got away?

title: Walk of Punishment
Name: mance
text: mance It's not impossible. You don't go far betting against Mormont. But dead or alive, he took a big gamble coming north. And he lost. His best fighting men are dead. And whether he's Lord Commander of the Night's Watch or a blue-eyed corpse, he's a long way from home. Tormund. Climb the Wall. Take Orell and twenty good men. And take this one. He knows Castle Black's defenses better than any of us. And if he's useful, good. If not throw him off the Wall. See if crows can fly.

title: Walk of Punishment
Name: tormund
text: tormund We're finally going to war, old friend?

title: Walk of Punishment
Name: mance
text: mance Hide near Castle Black. When I give the signal, hit them in the night. They've got a big old wall to hide behind, but it only guards one side.

title: Walk of Punishment
Name: tormund
text: tormund We'll meet again.

title: Walk of Punishment
Name: mance
text: mance Aye. If you do your job. Ah.

title: Walk of Punishment
Name: orell
text: orell How will we see your signal?

title: Walk of Punishment
Name: mance
text: mance Send your eagle above the Wall every night. When it's time, I'm going to light the biggest fire the North has ever seen.

title: Walk of Punishment
Name: sam
text: sam Ghost?

title: Walk of Punishment
Name: craster
text: craster What have we here? Frozen crows?

title: Walk of Punishment
Name: jeor
text: jeor We've come a long way.

title: Walk of Punishment
Name: craster
text: craster Smaller flock than you went north with.

title: Walk of Punishment
Name: jeor
text: jeor We can talk inside.

title: Walk of Punishment
Name: craster
text: craster Oh, can we?

title: Walk of Punishment
Name: woman
text: woman They need some water.

title: Walk of Punishment
Name: woman
text: woman Tether it and I'll be inside.

title: Walk of Punishment
Name: craster
text: craster Keep your eyes where they belong. They're not for you.

title: Walk of Punishment
Name: karl
text: karl Bet you feed that pig better than you feed us.

title: Walk of Punishment
Name: craster
text: craster Aye, pig's got value to me. You should all be kissing my feet for letting you in. I'd have turned you all away if I wasn't a godly man.

title: Walk of Punishment
Name: jeor
text: jeor You are a godly man?

title: Walk of Punishment
Name: craster
text: craster I am. I got no fear of what's out there. When the white cold comes, your swords and cloaks and bloody fires won't help you. The only ones left will be those who are right with the gods. The real gods.

title: Walk of Punishment
Name: craster
text: craster Go tell her she can bite down on a rag or she can bite down on my fist. Women. That sow right there gave birth to a litter of eight. Barely a grunt. And she's almost as fat as this one here. Now why don't you dine on him? Carve off what you need as you go. Well, look at him. He's a walking feast.

title: Walk of Punishment
Name: woman
text: woman Here we are.

title: Walk of Punishment
Name: woman
text: woman Sharpen these for me, would ya?

title: Walk of Punishment
Name: woman
text: woman I see the head. Push.

title: Walk of Punishment
Name: woman
text: woman That's it. You're nearly there. One more push should do it.

title: Walk of Punishment
Name: gilly
text: gilly What is it? What is it?

title: Walk of Punishment
Name: ramsay
text: ramsay Keep quiet.

title: Walk of Punishment
Name: ramsay
text: ramsay If you can't ride, we don't stand a chance.

title: Walk of Punishment
Name: theon
text: theon I can ride.

title: Walk of Punishment
Name: ramsay
text: ramsay You're sure?

title: Walk of Punishment
Name: ramsay
text: ramsay Ride east. Follow the rising sun. Your sister's waiting for you.

title: Walk of Punishment
Name: theon
text: theon I'll make you a Lord of the Iron Islands for this.

title: Walk of Punishment
Name: ramsay
text: ramsay We're not in the Iron Islands. Go.

title: Walk of Punishment
Name: theon
text: theon Come on. Come on. Come on. Come on. Come on.

title: Walk of Punishment
Name: man
text: man Come on back.

title: Walk of Punishment
Name: stannis
text: stannis You refuse to tell me where you're going?

title: Walk of Punishment
Name: melisandre
text: melisandre I don't know yet. The fires will show me.

title: Walk of Punishment
Name: stannis
text: stannis How long will you be gone?

title: Walk of Punishment
Name: melisandre
text: melisandre I don't know.

title: Walk of Punishment
Name: stannis
text: stannis You're abandoning me.

title: Walk of Punishment
Name: melisandre
text: melisandre I will never abandon you. You are the Son of Fire. I am sworn to serve you.

title: Walk of Punishment
Name: stannis
text: stannis Then serve me.

title: Walk of Punishment
Name: melisandre
text: melisandre When I return, you will understand.

title: Walk of Punishment
Name: stannis
text: stannis My enemies think they've destroyed me. They're laughing at me the way Renly laughed at me. I want Joffrey dead. I want Robb Stark dead. Make me another son.

title: Walk of Punishment
Name: melisandre
text: melisandre I cannot.

title: Walk of Punishment
Name: stannis
text: stannis Why?

title: Walk of Punishment
Name: melisandre
text: melisandre You don't have the strength. It would kill you.

title: Walk of Punishment
Name: stannis
text: stannis I'm not so easily killed. Men have been trying for years.

title: Walk of Punishment
Name: stannis
text: stannis I want you.

title: Walk of Punishment
Name: melisandre
text: melisandre Your fires burn low, my king.

title: Walk of Punishment
Name: melisandre
text: melisandre There is another way. A better way.

title: Walk of Punishment
Name: stannis
text: stannis You told me your magic requires a king's blood.

title: Walk of Punishment
Name: melisandre
text: melisandre Yes.

title: Walk of Punishment
Name: stannis
text: stannis I'm the one true king.

title: Walk of Punishment
Name: melisandre
text: melisandre You are. But there are others with your blood in their veins. You will sit on the Iron Throne, but first there must be sacrifices. The Lord of Light demands it.

title: Walk of Punishment
Name: barristan
text: barristan The Walk of Punishment is a warning, Your Grace.

title: Walk of Punishment
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys To whom?

title: Walk of Punishment
Name: barristan
text: barristan To any slave who contemplates doing whatever these slaves did.

title: Walk of Punishment
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys Give me your water.

title: Walk of Punishment
Name: jorah
text: jorah Khaleesi, this man has been sentenced to death.

title: Walk of Punishment
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys Here, drink.

title: Walk of Punishment
Name: barristan
text: barristan Leave this place, Your Grace. Leave tonight, I beg you.

title: Walk of Punishment
Name: jorah
text: jorah And what is she to do for soldiers?

title: Walk of Punishment
Name: barristan
text: barristan We can find sellswords in Pentos and Myr.

title: Walk of Punishment
Name: jorah
text: jorah Is it 'we' already, Ser Barristan? If you want to sit on the throne your ancestors built, you must win it. That will mean blood on your hands before the thing is done.

title: Walk of Punishment
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys The blood of my enemies, not the blood of innocents.

title: Walk of Punishment
Name: jorah
text: jorah How many wars have you fought in, Ser Barristan?

title: Walk of Punishment
Name: barristan
text: barristan Three.

title: Walk of Punishment
Name: jorah
text: jorah Have you ever seen a war where innocents didn't die by the thousands?

title: Walk of Punishment
Name: jorah
text: jorah I was in King's Landing after the sack, khaleesi. You know what I saw? Butchery. Babies, children, old men. More women raped than you can count. There's a beast in every man and it stirs when you put a sword in his hand. But the Unsullied are not men. They do not rape. They do not put cities to the sword unless they're ordered to do so. If you buy them, the only men they'll kill are those you want dead.

title: Walk of Punishment
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys Do you disagree, Ser Barristan?

title: Walk of Punishment
Name: barristan
text: barristan When your brother Rhaegar led his army into battle at the Trident, men died for him because they believed in him, because they loved him, not because they'd been bought at a slaver's auction. I fought beside the last dragon on that day, Your Grace. I bled beside him.

title: Walk of Punishment
Name: jorah
text: jorah Rhaegar fought valiantly, Rhaegar fought nobly, and Rhaegar died.

title: Walk of Punishment
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys Did you know him well, Ser Barristan?

title: Walk of Punishment
Name: barristan
text: barristan I did, Your Grace. Finest man I ever met.

title: Walk of Punishment
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys I wish I had known him. But he was not the last dragon.

title: Walk of Punishment
Name: missandei
text: missandei All? Did this one's ears mishear, Your Grace?

title: Walk of Punishment
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys They did not. I want to buy them all.

title: Walk of Punishment
Name: missandei
text: missandei She wants to buy them all.

title: Walk of Punishment
Name: kraznys
text: kraznys She can't afford them. The slut thinks that she can flash her tits, and make us give her whatever she wants.

title: Walk of Punishment
Name: missandei
text: missandei There are eight thousand Unsullied in Astapor. Is this what you mean by all?

title: Walk of Punishment
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys Yes. eight thousand. And the ones still in training as well.

title: Walk of Punishment
Name: greizhen
text: greizhen If they fail on the battlefield, they will shame Astapor.

title: Walk of Punishment
Name: missandei
text: missandei Master Greizhen says they cannot sell half-trained boys. If they fail on the battlefield, they will bring shame upon all of Astapor.

title: Walk of Punishment
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys I will have them all or take none. Many will fall in battle. I'll need the boys to pick up the swords they drop.

title: Walk of Punishment
Name: kraznys
text: kraznys The slut cannot pay for all of this.

title: Walk of Punishment
Name: missandei
text: missandei Master Kraznys says you cannot afford this.

title: Walk of Punishment
Name: kraznys
text: kraznys Her ship will buy her a hundred Unsullied, no more.

title: Walk of Punishment
Name: missandei
text: missandei Your ship will buy you Because Master Kraznys is generous.

title: Walk of Punishment
Name: kraznys
text: kraznys And this is because I like the curve of her ass.

title: Walk of Punishment
Name: missandei
text: missandei The gold you have left is worth ten.

title: Walk of Punishment
Name: kraznys
text: kraznys What is left will buy her ten. I will give her twenty if it stops her ignorant whimpering.

title: Walk of Punishment
Name: missandei
text: missandei But good Master Kraznys will give you twenty.

title: Walk of Punishment
Name: kraznys
text: kraznys Her Dothraki smell of shit but will be useful as pig feed.

title: Walk of Punishment
Name: missandei
text: missandei The Dothraki you have with you-

title: Walk of Punishment
Name: kraznys
text: kraznys I will give her three for those.

title: Walk of Punishment
Name: missandei
text: missandei The Dothraki you have are not worth what they cost to feed, but Master Kraznys will give you three Unsullied for all of them.

title: Walk of Punishment
Name: kraznys
text: kraznys So, ask this beggar queen how will she pay for the remaining 7,877?

title: Walk of Punishment
Name: missandei
text: missandei Master Kraznys asks how you propose to pay for the remaining 7,877 unsullied.

title: Walk of Punishment
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys I have dragons. I'll give you one.

title: Walk of Punishment
Name: barristan
text: barristan You will win the throne with dragons, not slaves, Your Grace.

title: Walk of Punishment
Name: jorah
text: jorah Khaleesi, please.

title: Walk of Punishment
Name: kraznys
text: kraznys Three dragons.

title: Walk of Punishment
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys One.

title: Walk of Punishment
Name: kraznys
text: kraznys Two.

title: Walk of Punishment
Name: missandei
text: missandei They want the biggest one.

title: Walk of Punishment
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys Done.

title: Walk of Punishment
Name: kraznys
text: kraznys Done.

title: Walk of Punishment
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys I'll take you as well, now. You'll be Master Kraznys' gift to me. A token of a bargain well struck.

title: Walk of Punishment
Name: missandei
text: missandei She asks that you give me to her, as a present. She asks that you do this now.

title: Walk of Punishment
Name: jorah
text: jorah Khaleesi, a dragon is worth more than any army.

title: Walk of Punishment
Name: barristan
text: barristan Aegon Targaryen proved that.

title: Walk of Punishment
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys You're both here to advise me. I value your advice, but if you ever question me in front of strangers again, you'll be advising someone else. Is that understood?

title: Walk of Punishment
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys Do you have a name?

title: Walk of Punishment
Name: missandei
text: missandei This one's name is Missandei, Your Grace.

title: Walk of Punishment
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys Do you have a family? A mother and a father you'd return to if you had the choice?

title: Walk of Punishment
Name: missandei
text: missandei No, Your Grace. No family living.

title: Walk of Punishment
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys You belong to me now. It is your duty to tell me the truth.

title: Walk of Punishment
Name: missandei
text: missandei Yes, Your Grace. Lying is a great offense. Many of those on the Walk of Punishment were taken there for less.

title: Walk of Punishment
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys I offered water to one of the slaves dying on the Walk of Punishment. Do you know what he said to me? 'Let me die.'

title: Walk of Punishment
Name: missandei
text: missandei There are no masters in the grave, Your Grace.

title: Walk of Punishment
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys Is it true what Master Kraznys told me about the Unsullied? About their obedience?

title: Walk of Punishment
Name: missandei
text: missandei All questions have been taken from them. They obey, that is all. Once they are yours, they are yours. They will fall on their swords if you command it.

title: Walk of Punishment
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys And what about you? You know that I'm taking you to war. You may go hungry. You may fall sick. You may be killed.

title: Walk of Punishment
Name: missandei
text: missandei Valar morghulis.

title: Walk of Punishment
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys Yes, all men must die. But we are not men.

title: Walk of Punishment
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion A surprising place to keep the royal ledgers.

title: Walk of Punishment
Name: petyr
text: petyr I'm surprised you're surprised. This is the safest place in the city.

title: Walk of Punishment
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion Not for bastards.

title: Walk of Punishment
Name: ros
text: ros That's all of them, my lord.

title: Walk of Punishment
Name: petyr
text: petyr Thank you, my dear.

title: Walk of Punishment
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion Pod. Pod. Take them outside. I'll be there in a moment.

title: Walk of Punishment
Name: podrick
text: podrick Yes, my lord.

title: Walk of Punishment
Name: petyr
text: petyr I hear you owe that boy a significant debt.

title: Walk of Punishment
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion Only my life. Not all that significant, I'm afraid.

title: Walk of Punishment
Name: petyr
text: petyr You should have him knighted.

title: Walk of Punishment
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion If only the Master of Coin had such power.

title: Walk of Punishment
Name: petyr
text: petyr If only. I owe you a significant debt. Our redheaded friend. You secured her release when the queen detained her.

title: Walk of Punishment
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion Oh, that. Of course. A simple misunderstanding.

title: Walk of Punishment
Name: petyr
text: petyr Apparently, Her Grace believed that you two had some sort of special relationship.

title: Walk of Punishment
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion We don't. I did fuck her once.

title: Walk of Punishment
Name: petyr
text: petyr I know.

title: Walk of Punishment
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion But we don't.

title: Walk of Punishment
Name: petyr
text: petyr I know. But how would the queen get that idea?

title: Walk of Punishment
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion Why don't you ask her? Any advice for me on my new position?

title: Walk of Punishment
Name: petyr
text: petyr Keep a low profile.

title: Walk of Punishment
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion If I had a gold dragon for every time I heard that joke, I'd be richer than you are.

title: Walk of Punishment
Name: petyr
text: petyr Well, you are richer than I am.

title: Walk of Punishment
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion Good point.

title: Walk of Punishment
Name: petyr
text: petyr They're only numbers. Numbers on paper. Once you understand that, it's easy to make them behave. Trivial even. You want a real challenge? Try whores.

title: Walk of Punishment
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion I've tried quite a few. Well, lots of work to do. Enjoy the Eyrie.

title: Walk of Punishment
Name: bronn
text: bronn Come on, I'm here later. Come on.

title: Walk of Punishment
Name: bronn
text: bronn Tonight, then. Looks like dull reading.

title: Walk of Punishment
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion You think all reading is dull reading.

title: Walk of Punishment
Name: bronn
text: bronn It's an opinion I share with some of the finest men I know.

title: Walk of Punishment
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion The secret history of the Seven Kingdoms is written in these pages.

title: Walk of Punishment
Name: bronn
text: bronn Unless Lord Twatbeard made up a bunch of numbers to hide what he's really up to.

title: Walk of Punishment
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion Unless he made it all up, yes. Podrick, do keep up.

title: Walk of Punishment
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion Podrick.

title: Walk of Punishment
Name: podrick
text: podrick Yes, my lord?

title: Walk of Punishment
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion After a long consultation with my colleague Ser Bronn, I finally found a suitable reward for the services you've provided over and above what might be considered reasonable. Tell me, Pod, have you ever been with a woman?

title: Walk of Punishment
Name: podrick
text: podrick No, my lord.

title: Walk of Punishment
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion Wonderful. Genna specializes in first-timers.

title: Walk of Punishment
Name: bronn
text: bronn She's not bad with second-timers, either.

title: Walk of Punishment
Name: podrick
text: podrick Uh, my lord

title: Walk of Punishment
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion A fair enough repayment for putting your spear through my would-be killer's face, wouldn't you say?

title: Walk of Punishment
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion Now, as it happens, Marei is quite the spear handler herself. She's here to thank you for staying by my side as the battle raged all around me.

title: Walk of Punishment
Name: marei
text: marei He's handsome. You didn't tell me he was handsome.

title: Walk of Punishment
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion Kayla is famous from here to Volantis in certain circles. One of four women in the world who can perform a proper Meereenese Knot.

title: Walk of Punishment
Name: podrick
text: podrick My lord, I don't even

title: Walk of Punishment
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion She's here to thank you for being a thoroughly respectful fellow who's never once failed to address me as 'my lord.

title: Walk of Punishment
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion Be back in time for my supper.

title: Walk of Punishment
Name: bronn
text: bronn Pace yourself, lad.

title: Walk of Punishment
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion For years I've heard that Littlefinger is a magician. Whenever the crown needs money, he rubs his hands together and, poof, mountains of gold.

title: Walk of Punishment
Name: bronn
text: bronn Let me guess. He's not a magician.

title: Walk of Punishment
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion No.

title: Walk of Punishment
Name: bronn
text: bronn He's stealing it?

title: Walk of Punishment
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion Worse, he's borrowing it.

title: Walk of Punishment
Name: bronn
text: bronn What's wrong with that?

title: Walk of Punishment
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion We can't afford to pay it back, that's what's wrong with it. The crown owes millions to my father.

title: Walk of Punishment
Name: bronn
text: bronn Seeing as it's his grandson's ass on the throne, I imagine he'll forgive that debt.

title: Walk of Punishment
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion Forgive a debt, my father? For a man of the world, you're strangely naive.

title: Walk of Punishment
Name: bronn
text: bronn I've never borrowed money before. I'm not clear on the rules.

title: Walk of Punishment
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion Well, ahem, the basic principle is I lend you money, and after an agreed upon period of time, you return it with interest.

title: Walk of Punishment
Name: bronn
text: bronn And what if I don't?

title: Walk of Punishment
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion Well, you have to.

title: Walk of Punishment
Name: bronn
text: bronn But what if I don't?

title: Walk of Punishment
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion This is why I don't lend you money. Anyway, it's not my father I'm worried about. It's the Iron Bank of Braavos. We owe them tens of millions. If we fail to repay these loans, the bank will fund our enemies. One way or another, they always get their gold back.

title: Walk of Punishment
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion Ah, the return of the conquering hero. Does he have a little jaunt in his step?

title: Walk of Punishment
Name: bronn
text: bronn The lado s practically skipping.

title: Walk of Punishment
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion You were gone a long time. I trust you got your money's worth. Or should I say my money's worth?

title: Walk of Punishment
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion Oh, it was a gift, Podrick. This is more than I give you in a year.

title: Walk of Punishment
Name: bronn
text: bronn He's a squire. You don't pay him.

title: Walk of Punishment
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion Oh, then it's much more than I give you in a year.

title: Walk of Punishment
Name: podrick
text: podrick They wouldn't take it, my lord.

title: Walk of Punishment
Name: bronn
text: bronn Maybe they're trying to curry some favor with the new Master of Coin.

title: Walk of Punishment
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion Have you ever known a whore to turn down gold? They were happy enough to take it when I gave it to them.

title: Walk of Punishment
Name: bronn
text: bronn What did you tell them?

title: Walk of Punishment
Name: podrick
text: podrick I didn't tell them anything.

title: Walk of Punishment
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion What did you do to them?

title: Walk of Punishment
Name: podrick
text: podrick Lots of things.

title: Walk of Punishment
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion And they seemed to like these things?

title: Walk of Punishment
Name: bronn
text: bronn Of course they seemed to like it. They're paid to seem to like it.

title: Walk of Punishment
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion Only they weren't paid.

title: Walk of Punishment
Name: bronn
text: bronn What are you saying? These ladies enjoyed him so much, they gave him the time for free?

title: Walk of Punishment
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion Is that what you're telling us?

title: Walk of Punishment
Name: podrick
text: podrick doesn't deny it.>/i>

title: Walk of Punishment
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion Sit down, Podrick.

title: Walk of Punishment
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion We're going to need details. Copious details.

title: Walk of Punishment
Name: theon
text: theon Come on! Come on! Come on! Come on.

title: Walk of Punishment
Name: soldier
text: soldier Ha! Ha!

title: Walk of Punishment
Name: soldier
text: soldier You know how we deal with runaways here, do you?

title: Walk of Punishment
Name: soldier
text: soldier Take off his pants.

title: Walk of Punishment
Name: theon
text: theon No! No! No, no, no!

title: Walk of Punishment
Name: soldier
text: soldier I'm gonna fuck you into the dirt.

title: Walk of Punishment
Name: theon
text: theon No, please! No, no, no! No, don't!

title: Walk of Punishment
Name: theon
text: theon No, please! No! No!

title: Walk of Punishment
Name: soldier
text: soldier You little bastard.

title: Walk of Punishment
Name: ramsay
text: ramsay Come, my lord.

title: Walk of Punishment
Name: ramsay
text: ramsay You're a long way from home and winter is coming.

title: Walk of Punishment
Name: locke
text: locke I'll take the big bitch first. When she's good and wet, you lot can finish her off.

title: Walk of Punishment
Name: brienne
text: brienne My lord, I am Brienne of Tarth. Lady Catelyn Stark commanded me to deliver Ser Jaime to King's Landing.

title: Walk of Punishment
Name: locke
text: locke Catelyn Stark's a treasonous cunt. Orders were to take the Kingslayer alive. Nobody said shit about you.

title: Walk of Punishment
Name: man
text: man You're only making it worse.

title: Walk of Punishment
Name: locke
text: locke Take her over there where it's dark. I'd like a little privacy.

title: Walk of Punishment
Name: man
text: man Come on!

title: Walk of Punishment
Name: jaime
text: jaime You know who she is, don't you?

title: Walk of Punishment
Name: locke
text: locke A big dumb bitch from who cares where. Never been with a woman that big.

title: Walk of Punishment
Name: jaime
text: jaime She's Brienne of Tarth. Her father is Lord Selwyn Tarth. Heard of Tarth?

title: Walk of Punishment
Name: man
text: man I'm gonna cut your throat!

title: Walk of Punishment
Name: jaime
text: jaime They call it the Sapphire Isle. Do you know why? Every sapphire in Westeros was mined on Tarth. Sapphires are gemstones. The blue ones.

title: Walk of Punishment
Name: locke
text: locke I know what they are.

title: Walk of Punishment
Name: jaime
text: jaime Lord Selwyn would pay his daughter's weight in sapphires if she's returned to him. But only if she's alive, her honor unbesmirched.

title: Walk of Punishment
Name: locke
text: locke Bring her back here.

title: Walk of Punishment
Name: man
text: man Yes, my lord. Get up.

title: Walk of Punishment
Name: man
text: man Come on.

title: Walk of Punishment
Name: man
text: man Come on, on your feet.

title: Walk of Punishment
Name: locke
text: locke Unbesmirched.

title: Walk of Punishment
Name: jaime
text: jaime Not defiled.

title: Walk of Punishment
Name: locke
text: locke Fancy word for a fancy man.

title: Walk of Punishment
Name: jaime
text: jaime I hated to read as a child, but my father forced me to study the books every morning before I could practice with sword or horse. Two hours every day holed up in the maester's chambers. I learned a lot of fancy words.

title: Walk of Punishment
Name: locke
text: locke I bet you did.

title: Walk of Punishment
Name: locke
text: locke Your father, he'd pay your weight in gold to get you back?

title: Walk of Punishment
Name: jaime
text: jaime You'll be a rich man till the end of your days. And your sons will be rich men and their sons after them. Lands, titles- you'll have them all. The North can't win this war. You're a smart man. You understand that. We have the numbers. We have the gold.

title: Walk of Punishment
Name: locke
text: locke Aye, you have both.

title: Walk of Punishment
Name: jaime
text: jaime Fighting bravely for a losing cause is admirable. Fighting for a winning cause is far more rewarding.

title: Walk of Punishment
Name: locke
text: locke Hard to argue with that.

title: Walk of Punishment
Name: jaime
text: jaime Now that we're speaking together man to man, I wonder if you need to keep me chained to this tree. I'm not asking to be freed from my constraints, but if I could sleep lying down, my back would thank you for it. I'm not as young and resilient as I was once.

title: Walk of Punishment
Name: locke
text: locke None of us are. Unchain Ser Jaime from the tree.

title: Walk of Punishment
Name: man
text: man Come on, men.

title: Walk of Punishment
Name: locke
text: locke Suppose you'll be wanting something to eat.

title: Walk of Punishment
Name: jaime
text: jaime I'm famished, actually.

title: Walk of Punishment
Name: locke
text: locke I think we've got a spare partridge on the fire.

title: Walk of Punishment
Name: jaime
text: jaime Well, I do like partridge.

title: Walk of Punishment
Name: locke
text: locke Bring the bird over here and the carving knife. Will this work as a table, my lord?

title: Walk of Punishment
Name: jaime
text: jaime Oh, yes. Yes, this will do nic- ah!

title: Walk of Punishment
Name: locke
text: locke On the stump.

title: Walk of Punishment
Name: locke
text: locke You think you're the smartest man there is. That everyone alive has to bow and scrape and lick your boots.

title: Walk of Punishment
Name: jaime
text: jaime My father-

title: Walk of Punishment
Name: locke
text: locke And if you get in any trouble, all you've got to do is say 'my father' and that's it, all your troubles are gone.

title: Walk of Punishment
Name: jaime
text: jaime Don't.

title: Walk of Punishment
Name: locke
text: locke Have you got something to say?

title: Walk of Punishment
Name: locke
text: locke Careful. You don't want to say the wrong thing. You're nothing without your daddy, and your daddy ain't here. Never forget that.

title: Walk of Punishment
Name: locke
text: locke Here, this should help you remember.

title: Walk of Punishment
Name: end
text: end CREDITS

title: And Now His Watch Is Ended
Name: man
text: man How many of those fingers do you think we could shove up his ass?

title: And Now His Watch Is Ended
Name: locke
text: locke Depends if he's had any practice. Is that the sort of thing you and your sister go in for, Kingslayer? She loosened you up for us?

title: And Now His Watch Is Ended
Name: brienne
text: brienne He's going to fall. He's going to fall off his horse. Someone help him.

title: And Now His Watch Is Ended
Name: jaime
text: jaime Water. Water. Please, water. Wa-water. Water, please. Please. Please.

title: And Now His Watch Is Ended
Name: jaime
text: jaime If I die, you won't be getting-

title: And Now His Watch Is Ended
Name: locke
text: locke Oh, enough. Here.

title: And Now His Watch Is Ended
Name: locke
text: locke Can't say that I've ever seen a man drink horse piss that fast.

title: And Now His Watch Is Ended
Name: brienne
text: brienne Stop!

title: And Now His Watch Is Ended
Name: man
text: man Far enough.

title: And Now His Watch Is Ended
Name: locke
text: locke Do that again and I'll take your other hand.

title: And Now His Watch Is Ended
Name: man
text: man Come on, you.

title: And Now His Watch Is Ended
Name: varys
text: varys Oh, Lord Tyrion. Come in, come in.

title: And Now His Watch Is Ended
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion I hope we might speak. In confidence.

title: And Now His Watch Is Ended
Name: varys
text: varys Oh, always in confidence.

title: And Now His Watch Is Ended
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion About the events of the Blackwater. Perhaps this is the wrong time?

title: And Now His Watch Is Ended
Name: varys
text: varys Oh, no. It's a wonderful time.

title: And Now His Watch Is Ended
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion I thought one of your little birds might have knowledge of my sister's intentions to-

title: And Now His Watch Is Ended
Name: varys
text: varys End your life?

title: And Now His Watch Is Ended
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion I didn't inherit Littlefinger's spies along with his position, I'm afraid. Which is why I'm coming to you. I need proof.

title: And Now His Watch Is Ended
Name: varys
text: varys Proof? Will there be a trial?

title: And Now His Watch Is Ended
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion I need to know.

title: And Now His Watch Is Ended
Name: varys
text: varys I have no proof, only whispers. Before all this nastiness, I was going to tell you the story of how I was cut. Do you want to hear it still?

title: And Now His Watch Is Ended
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion I don't know. Do I?

title: And Now His Watch Is Ended
Name: varys
text: varys As a boy, I traveled with a troupe of actors through the Free Cities. One day in Myr, a certain man made my master an offer too tempting to refuse. I feared the man meant to use me as I'd heard some men used small boys. But what he wanted was far worse. He gave me a potion that made me powerless to move or speak, yet did nothing to dull my senses. With a hooked blade he sliced me, root and stem, chanting all the while. He burned my parts in a brazier. The flames turned blue and I heard a voice answer his call. I still dream of that night. Not of the sorcerer, not of his blade. I dream of the voice from the flames. Was it a god? A demon? A conjurer's trick? I don't know. But the sorcerer called and a voice answered. And ever since that day, I have hated magic and all those who practice it. But you can see why I was eager to aid in your fight against Stannis and his Red Priestess. A symbolic revenge of sorts.

title: And Now His Watch Is Ended
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion Yes, ahem. I feel the need for actual revenge against the actual person who tried to have me killed. Which will require a degree of influence, which-

title: And Now His Watch Is Ended
Name: varys
text: varys You do not possess at the moment.

title: And Now His Watch Is Ended
Name: varys
text: varys But influence is largely a matter of patience, I have found. Once I had served the sorcerer's purpose, he threw me out of his house to die. I resolved to live to spite him. I begged. I sold what parts of my body remained to me. I became an excellent thief and soon learned that the contents of a man's letters are more valuable than the contents of his purse. Step by step, one distasteful task after another, I made my way from the slums of Myr to the small council chamber. Influence grows like a weed. I tended mine patiently until its tendrils reached from the Red Keep all the way across to the far side of the world where I managed to wrap them around something very special.

title: And Now His Watch Is Ended
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion The sorcerer.

title: And Now His Watch Is Ended
Name: varys
text: varys Hello, my old friend. It's been a long time. I have no doubt the revenge you want will be yours in time if you have the stomach for it.

title: And Now His Watch Is Ended
Name: grenn
text: grenn When people talk about the Night's Watch, they never mention the shoveling.

title: And Now His Watch Is Ended
Name: dolorous
text: dolorous Or the shit.

title: And Now His Watch Is Ended
Name: grenn
text: grenn They tell you about honor, pardoning crimes, and protecting the realm, but shoveling really is most of it.

title: And Now His Watch Is Ended
Name: dolorous
text: dolorous And getting attacked or killed or worse. And that.

title: And Now His Watch Is Ended
Name: grenn
text: grenn But when you're not getting attacked or killed, usually you're shoveling.

title: And Now His Watch Is Ended
Name: dolorous
text: dolorous Oh, look. More shit. I was starting to wonder what to do with the rest of my day.

title: And Now His Watch Is Ended
Name: rast
text: rast We need to get out of here.

title: And Now His Watch Is Ended
Name: grenn
text: grenn When the Lord Commander says we go, we go.

title: And Now His Watch Is Ended
Name: rast
text: rast The Lord Commander told us to go to the Fist of the First Men. How'd that turn out for us?

title: And Now His Watch Is Ended
Name: dolorous
text: dolorous He had no way of knowing.

title: And Now His Watch Is Ended
Name: rast
text: rast We do now. We know what's out there.

title: And Now His Watch Is Ended
Name: grenn
text: grenn Craster's been out here surviving.

title: And Now His Watch Is Ended
Name: rast
text: rast So he's your new protector now? Our good friend Craster?

title: And Now His Watch Is Ended
Name: dolorous
text: dolorous We're like the sons he never had.

title: And Now His Watch Is Ended
Name: rast
text: rast Mormont isn't gonna save you. This lummox here isn't gonna save you. When the walkers come calling, Craster will serve us up like so many pigs. If we want to live we'll have to look out for ourselves.

title: And Now His Watch Is Ended
Name: gilly
text: gilly Shh, shh, shh.

title: And Now His Watch Is Ended
Name: gilly
text: gilly You woke him.

title: And Now His Watch Is Ended
Name: sam
text: sam I'm sorry. He's beautiful.

title: And Now His Watch Is Ended
Name: gilly
text: gilly Shh!

title: And Now His Watch Is Ended
Name: sam
text: sam He's beautiful. Does he have a name?

title: And Now His Watch Is Ended
Name: gilly
text: gilly No.

title: And Now His Watch Is Ended
Name: sam
text: sam Are you going to give him one?

title: And Now His Watch Is Ended
Name: gilly
text: gilly Why?

title: And Now His Watch Is Ended
Name: gilly
text: gilly Here.

title: And Now His Watch Is Ended
Name: sam
text: sam Gilly.

title: And Now His Watch Is Ended
Name: gilly
text: gilly You said to hold it for you until you came back. You're back.

title: And Now His Watch Is Ended
Name: sam
text: sam I wanted you to have it.

title: And Now His Watch Is Ended
Name: gilly
text: gilly I don't want your stupid thimble. I want to save my baby's life. Can you do that? Can you?

title: And Now His Watch Is Ended
Name: gilly
text: gilly I don't have time for you. I don't have time for anyone but him because he doesn't have much time.

title: And Now His Watch Is Ended
Name: jojen
text: jojen You have to go after him.

title: And Now His Watch Is Ended
Name: bran
text: bran How?

title: And Now His Watch Is Ended
Name: jojen
text: jojen You know how.

title: And Now His Watch Is Ended
Name: catelyn
text: catelyn Brandon.

title: And Now His Watch Is Ended
Name: bran
text: bran Mother.

title: And Now His Watch Is Ended
Name: catelyn
text: catelyn How many times have I told you? No climbing.

title: And Now His Watch Is Ended
Name: bran
text: bran Mother, I need to find it. It's here. It's calling me.

title: And Now His Watch Is Ended
Name: catelyn
text: catelyn I want you to promise me. No more climbing.

title: And Now His Watch Is Ended
Name: catelyn
text: catelyn Promise me. Promise me! Promise me!

title: And Now His Watch Is Ended
Name: bran
text: bran Mother! Mother!

title: And Now His Watch Is Ended
Name: catelyn
text: catelyn Promise me! Promise me, Bran! Promise me!

title: And Now His Watch Is Ended
Name: varys
text: varys Is he very large?

title: And Now His Watch Is Ended
Name: ros
text: ros No larger than usual, apparently. And yet they said that he was-

title: And Now His Watch Is Ended
Name: varys
text: varys Extraordinary.

title: And Now His Watch Is Ended
Name: ros
text: ros The most extraordinary man they've ever had. And they've had a lot of men.

title: And Now His Watch Is Ended
Name: varys
text: varys We're talking about the same Podrick? The quiet boy in Lord Tyrion's service? Seems a bit simple?

title: And Now His Watch Is Ended
Name: varys
text: varys What did he do to them?

title: And Now His Watch Is Ended
Name: ros
text: ros I don't know, my lord. The girls are usually quite descriptive.

title: And Now His Watch Is Ended
Name: varys
text: varys So what did they say?

title: And Now His Watch Is Ended
Name: ros
text: ros They said it was hard to describe.

title: And Now His Watch Is Ended
Name: varys
text: varys Huh. Prodigies appear in the oddest of places. And what did Littlefinger say about this loss of income?

title: And Now His Watch Is Ended
Name: ros
text: ros He was too preoccupied to notice. He's leaving for the Eyrie soon. I'm helping him prepare for his journey.

title: And Now His Watch Is Ended
Name: varys
text: varys Ah, yes, to pursue his enduring love of the Lady Arryn and the title that comes with her. Sad, really. Is that all it takes to make our friend lose interest in poor Sansa Stark?

title: And Now His Watch Is Ended
Name: ros
text: ros He hasn't spoken to her since the last time, as far as I know. But I don't think he's lost interest.

title: And Now His Watch Is Ended
Name: varys
text: varys What makes you say so?

title: And Now His Watch Is Ended
Name: ros
text: ros His shipboard inventory.

title: And Now His Watch Is Ended
Name: varys
text: varys Ah. You can read. Rare for a woman in your profession.

title: And Now His Watch Is Ended
Name: ros
text: ros Former profession.

title: And Now His Watch Is Ended
Name: varys
text: varys Of course. I'm missing something obvious you're about to point out?

title: And Now His Watch Is Ended
Name: ros
text: ros Two featherbeds. He's bringing two featherbeds for the cabin.

title: And Now His Watch Is Ended
Name: varys
text: varys Who is important enough to Littlefinger to merit a featherbed besides Littlefinger? Could he be bringing one of his girls?

title: And Now His Watch Is Ended
Name: ros
text: ros He's not interested in them, my lord.

title: And Now His Watch Is Ended
Name: varys
text: varys How do you know?

title: And Now His Watch Is Ended
Name: ros
text: ros Because I'm one of his girls.

title: And Now His Watch Is Ended
Name: varys
text: varys Prodigies in odd places indeed.

title: And Now His Watch Is Ended
Name: gendry
text: gendry What is this place?

title: And Now His Watch Is Ended
Name: thoros
text: thoros Somewhere neither wolves nor lions come prowling.

title: And Now His Watch Is Ended
Name: sandor
text: sandor You look like a bunch of swineherds.

title: And Now His Watch Is Ended
Name: anguy
text: anguy Some of us were swineherds. And some of us tanners and masons. That was before.

title: And Now His Watch Is Ended
Name: sandor
text: sandor You're still swineherds and tanners and masons. You think carrying a crooked spear makes you a soldier?

title: And Now His Watch Is Ended
Name: beric
text: beric No. Fighting in a war makes you a soldier.

title: And Now His Watch Is Ended
Name: sandor
text: sandor Beric Dondarrion? You've seen better days.

title: And Now His Watch Is Ended
Name: beric
text: beric And I won't see them again.

title: And Now His Watch Is Ended
Name: sandor
text: sandor Stark deserters. Baratheon deserters. You lot aren't fighting in a war. You're running from it.

title: And Now His Watch Is Ended
Name: beric
text: beric Last I heard, you were King Joffrey's guard dog. But here you are a thousand miles from home. Which of us is running?

title: And Now His Watch Is Ended
Name: sandor
text: sandor Untie these ropes and we'll find out. What are you doing leading a mob of peasants?

title: And Now His Watch Is Ended
Name: beric
text: beric Ned Stark ordered me to execute your brother in King Robert's name.

title: And Now His Watch Is Ended
Name: sandor
text: sandor Ned Stark is dead. King Robert is dead. My brother's alive.

title: And Now His Watch Is Ended
Name: sandor
text: sandor You're fighting for ghosts.

title: And Now His Watch Is Ended
Name: beric
text: beric That's what we are- ghosts waiting for you in the dark. You can't see us, but we see you. No matter whose cloak you wear- Lannister, Stark, Baratheon- you prey on the weak, the Brotherhood without Banners will hunt you down.

title: And Now His Watch Is Ended
Name: sandor
text: sandor You found god? Is that it?

title: And Now His Watch Is Ended
Name: beric
text: beric Aye. I've been reborn in the light of the one true god. As have we all. As would any man who's seen the things we've seen.

title: And Now His Watch Is Ended
Name: sandor
text: sandor If you mean to murder me, then bloody well get on with it.

title: And Now His Watch Is Ended
Name: thoros
text: thoros You'll die soon enough, dog. But it won't be murder, only justice.

title: And Now His Watch Is Ended
Name: anguy
text: anguy And a kinder fate than you deserve. Lions you call yourselves. At the Mummer's Ford, girls of seven years were raped and babes still on the breast were cut in two while their mothers watched.

title: And Now His Watch Is Ended
Name: sandor
text: sandor I wasn't at the Mummer's Ford. Dump your dead children at some other door.

title: And Now His Watch Is Ended
Name: thoros
text: thoros House Clegane was built upon dead children. I saw them lay Prince Aegon and Princess Rhaenys before the Iron Throne.

title: And Now His Watch Is Ended
Name: sandor
text: sandor Do you take me for my brother? Is being born Clegane a crime?

title: And Now His Watch Is Ended
Name: anguy
text: anguy Murder is a crime.

title: And Now His Watch Is Ended
Name: sandor
text: sandor I never touched the Targaryen babes. I never saw them, never smelled them, never heard them bawling. You want to cut my throat, get on with it! But don't call me murderer and pretend that you're not.

title: And Now His Watch Is Ended
Name: arya
text: arya You murdered Mycah. The butchers boy. My friend. He was twelve years old. He was unarmed. And you rode him down. You slung him over your horse like he was some deer.

title: And Now His Watch Is Ended
Name: sandor
text: sandor Aye, he was a bleeder.

title: And Now His Watch Is Ended
Name: beric
text: beric You don't deny killing this boy?

title: And Now His Watch Is Ended
Name: sandor
text: sandor I was Joffrey's sworn shield. The boy attacked the prince.

title: And Now His Watch Is Ended
Name: arya
text: arya That's a lie! I hit Joffrey. Mycah just ran away.

title: And Now His Watch Is Ended
Name: sandor
text: sandor Then I should have killed you. Not my place to question princes.

title: And Now His Watch Is Ended
Name: beric
text: beric You stand accused of murder. But no one here knows the truth of the charge, so it is not for us to judge you. Only the Lord of Light may do that now. I sentence you to trial by combat.

title: And Now His Watch Is Ended
Name: sandor
text: sandor So, who will it be? Should we find out if your fire god really loves you, priest? Or you, archer? What are you worth with a sword in your hand? Or is the little girl the bravest one here?

title: And Now His Watch Is Ended
Name: beric
text: beric Aye. She might be. But it's me you'll fight.

title: And Now His Watch Is Ended
Name: missandei
text: missandei The master says they are untested. He says you would be wise to blood them early. There are many small cities between here and there, cities ripe for sacking. Should you take captives, the masters will buy the healthy ones and for a good price.

title: And Now His Watch Is Ended
Name: missandei
text: missandei And who knows? In ten years, some of the boys you send them may be Unsullied in their turn. Thus all shall prosper.

title: And Now His Watch Is Ended
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys Is it done, then? They belong to me?

title: And Now His Watch Is Ended
Name: kraznys
text: kraznys It is done.

title: And Now His Watch Is Ended
Name: missandei
text: missandei It is done.

title: And Now His Watch Is Ended
Name: kraznys
text: kraznys She holds the whip.

title: And Now His Watch Is Ended
Name: missandei
text: missandei You hold the whip.

title: And Now His Watch Is Ended
Name: kraznys
text: kraznys The bitch has her army.

title: And Now His Watch Is Ended
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys Unsullied!

title: And Now His Watch Is Ended
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys Forward march!

title: And Now His Watch Is Ended
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys Halt!

title: And Now His Watch Is Ended
Name: kraznys
text: kraznys Tell the bitch her beast won't come.

title: And Now His Watch Is Ended
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys A dragon is not a slave.

title: And Now His Watch Is Ended
Name: kraznys
text: kraznys You speak Valyrian?

title: And Now His Watch Is Ended
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys I am Daenerys Stormborn of the House Targaryen, of the blood of Old Valyria. Valyrian is my mother tongue.

title: And Now His Watch Is Ended
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys Unsullied! Slay the masters, slay the soldiers, slay every man who holds a whip, but harm no child. Strike the chains off every slave you see!

title: And Now His Watch Is Ended
Name: kraznys
text: kraznys I am your master.

title: And Now His Watch Is Ended
Name: kraznys
text: kraznys Kill her! Kill her! Kill her!

title: And Now His Watch Is Ended
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys Dracarys.

title: And Now His Watch Is Ended
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys Unsullied! You have been slaves all your life. Today you are free. Any man who wishes to leave may leave, and no one will harm him. I give you my word. Will you fight for me? As free men?

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: thoros
text: thoros Lord, cast your light upon us.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: men
text: men Lord of Light, defend us.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: thoros
text: thoros Show us the truth. Strike this man down if he is guilty. Give strength to his sword if he is true. Lord of Light, give us wisdom. For the night is dark and full of terrors.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: men
text: men For the night is dark and full of terrors.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: thoros
text: thoros Get back.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: men
text: men Guilty. Guilty. Guilty. Guilty. Guilty. Guilty. Guilty. Guilty. Guilty. Guilty. Guilty. Guilty.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: arya
text: arya Kill him!

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: thoros
text: thoros Lord, cast your light upon this man, your servant. Bring him back from death and darkness. His flame has been extinguished. Restore it.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: thoros
text: thoros For the night is dark and full of terrors. Lord, cast-

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: gendry
text: gendry Arya, don't!

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: thoros
text: thoros Bring him back from death and darkness

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: arya
text: arya No! Let go of me! Let me go!

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: sandor
text: sandor Looks like their god likes me more than your butcher's boy.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: arya
text: arya Burn in hell!

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: beric
text: beric He will. But not today.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: tormund
text: tormund Orell says there are crows patrolling on the Wall. Tell me what you know.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: jon
text: jon There are four to a patrol- two builders to check for structural damage, two rangers to watch for enemies.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: orell
text: orell How often do these patrols go out?

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: jon
text: jon It varies. If I knew where on the Wall we were heading, I could tell you.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: orell
text: orell You'd like to know that.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: tormund
text: tormund There are nineteen castles guarding the Wall. How many are manned?

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: jon
text: jon Three.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: orell
text: orell You sure of that?

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: orell
text: orell Which three?

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: jon
text: jon Castle Black.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: orell
text: orell Aye, Castle Black. Everyone knows Castle Black. Which others?

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: jon
text: jon Eastwatch-by-the-Sea and the Shadow Tower.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: tormund
text: tormund How many men remain in Castle Black?

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: jon
text: jon A thousand.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: orell
text: orell Liar.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: jon
text: jon What happens to your eagle after I kill you? Does he drift away like a kite with his strings cut or does he just flop dead to the ground?

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: ygritte
text: ygritte He's no crow.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: orell
text: orell Just 'cause you want him inside you don't make him one of us.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: ygritte
text: ygritte I'm not afraid of you.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: tormund
text: tormund I like you, boy. But if you lie to me, I'll pull your guts out through your throat.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: jon
text: jon A thousand men.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: tormund
text: tormund We'll find out soon enough.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: jon
text: jon I don't need you to protect me.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: ygritte
text: ygritte Of course you do. Who stopped Rattleshirt when he was about to cut your throat? Who vouched for you with Mance? It seems you owe me a debt.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: jon
text: jon Give it back.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: ygritte
text: ygritte Well, I stole it. It's mine. If you want it, come steal it back.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: jon
text: jon Ygritte! Ygritte!

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: jon
text: jon Ygritte! Seven hells. Ygritte!

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: ygritte
text: ygritte Is Orell right? Are you still a crow? It's time you proved yourself.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: jon
text: jon Ygritte.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: ygritte
text: ygritte You swore some vows. I want you to break 'em. I want you to see me.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: ygritte
text: ygritte All of me.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: jon
text: jon We shouldn't.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: ygritte
text: ygritte We should.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: ygritte
text: ygritte Why are you still dressed? You know nothing, Jon Sno-

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: ygritte
text: ygritte That thing you did with your mouth- is that what lords do to their ladies in the South?

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: jon
text: jon I don't know. I just wanted to kiss you there is all.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: ygritte
text: ygritte Hmm.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: jon
text: jon You seemed to like it.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: ygritte
text: ygritte Aye, I liked it some. Who taught you that?

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: jon
text: jon There's been no one else. Only you.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: ygritte
text: ygritte A maid. You were a maid.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: jon
text: jon I was a man of the Night's Watch. How about you? Were you a maid?

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: ygritte
text: ygritte What do you think?

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: jon
text: jon Who was he?

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: ygritte
text: ygritte Just a boy. He came trading with his brothers. He had red hair like me. Kissed by fire. But he was weak. Not like you. That was the first one. Then there was this Thenn boy. Spoke no Common, but gods, he was built like a mammoth.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: jon
text: jon Yeah, thanks. I think I've heard enough. We'd best get back. Tormund-

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: ygritte
text: ygritte I'm not done with you yet.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: ygritte
text: ygritte How long's it been since you had a bath?

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: ygritte
text: ygritte Let's not go back. Let's stay here a while longer. I don't ever want to leave this cave, Jon Snow. Not ever.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: sandor
text: sandor I want my gold.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: thoros
text: thoros It says it clearly right there on that note you'll be repaid in full when the war is over.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: sandor
text: sandor Piss on that! You're nothing but thieves.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: anguy
text: anguy We're outlaws. Outlaws steal. You're lucky we didn't kill you.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: sandor
text: sandor Come try it, archer. I'll shove those arrows up your ass.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: arya
text: arya You can't let him go. He's a murderer. He's guilty.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: beric
text: beric Not in the eyes of god.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: arya
text: arya You can't!

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: beric
text: beric Enough! The judgment isn't ours to make.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: beric
text: beric Go in peace, Sandor Clegane. The Lord of Light isn't done with you yet.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: man
text: man Riders coming through!

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: man
text: man The Kingslayer.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: man
text: man Down!

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: locke
text: locke On your knees. Lord Bolton, I give you the Kingslayer.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: roose
text: roose Pick him up, Locke.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: roose
text: roose You've lost a hand.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: locke
text: locke No, my lord, he has it here.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: roose
text: roose Take this away.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: locke
text: locke Send it to his father?

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: roose
text: roose You'll hold your tongue unless you want to lose it.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: roose
text: roose Cut her free. Apologies, my lady. You're under my protection now.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: brienne
text: brienne Thank you, my lord.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: roose
text: roose Find suitable rooms for our guests. We'll speak later.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: jaime
text: jaime Lord Bolton.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: jaime
text: jaime Is there word from the capital?

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: roose
text: roose You haven't heard? Stannis Baratheon laid siege to King's Landing. Sailed into Blackwater Bay. Stormed the gates with thousands of men. And your sister How can I put this? Your sister is alive and well. Your father's forces prevailed.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: roose
text: roose Ser Jaime isn't well. Take him to Qyburn.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: jaime
text: jaime Will I die?

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: qyburn
text: qyburn No. The corruption has spread. I fear it must be cut away. The safest course would be to take the whole arm off.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: jaime
text: jaime Then you'll die. You're no maester. Where's your chain?

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: qyburn
text: qyburn The Citadel stripped me of it. They found some of my experiments too bold. I can leave your upper arm, make the cut at your elbow.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: jaime
text: jaime I don't need my right hand to kill you.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: qyburn
text: qyburn I can take away the rotting flesh and try and burn out the corruption - with boiling wine.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: jaime
text: jaime Mmm.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: qyburn
text: qyburn With any luck, that will suffice. You'll need milk of the poppy.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: jaime
text: jaime No milk of the poppy.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: qyburn
text: qyburn There will be pain.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: jaime
text: jaime I'll scream.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: qyburn
text: qyburn Quite a bit of pain.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: jaime
text: jaime I'll scream loudly.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: cersei
text: cersei Lord Baelish.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: petyr
text: petyr Your Grace.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: cersei
text: cersei I wonder if I might ask you for a favor.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: petyr
text: petyr Of course, Your Grace.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: cersei
text: cersei I have reason to believe that House Tyrell do not hold the crown's best interests at heart.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: petyr
text: petyr I see. And have you shared these suspicions with Lord Tywin?

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: cersei
text: cersei My father's a practical man. He appreciates facts.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: petyr
text: petyr Myself, I often find them a hindrance.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: cersei
text: cersei And he appreciates those who aid his family, as you well know. He's almost as generous to those who help us as he is unpleasant towards those who don't. You have a good working relationship with the Tyrells. I thought you might look into it before you leave the capital.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: petyr
text: petyr I shall do my best.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: cersei
text: cersei Thank you. And your best will prove better than when I asked you to locate Arya Stark?

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: petyr
text: petyr I assure you that it will.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: olenna
text: olenna Gods, boy, that's enough. We're not in a tavern.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: podrick
text: podrick Pardon, my lady.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: olenna
text: olenna No need to speak. Are there any figs? Fetch some. I always take figs midafternoon. They help move the bowels. To what do I owe this summons?

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion Thank you for seeing me, my lady. I had hoped we might discuss a few financial matters.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: olenna
text: olenna I climbed all those steps to discuss financial matters?

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion It's the royal wedding. I'm told you had a hand in planning it.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: olenna
text: olenna Naturally.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion It's shaping up to be a very involved affair. The word extravagant has been used.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: olenna
text: olenna What good is the word extravagant if it can't be used to describe a royal wedding?

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion I understand that.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: olenna
text: olenna Good.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion But, as Master of Coin, it falls upon me to calculate the cost for the crown. As of now, it's a huge expense.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: olenna
text: olenna And?

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion And we're at war, Lady Olenna.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: olenna
text: olenna Oh, I'd nearly forgotten.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion Yes, and maintaining supply lines-

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: olenna
text: olenna I can't think how it slipped my mind. What is it, twelve thousand infantrymen the Tyrell family has supplied? Two thousand in support. Provisions so this city might survive the winter. A million bushels of wheat. Half a million bushels each of barley, oats, and rye. Twenty thousand head of cattle. Fifty thousand sheep. You don't have to lecture me about wartime expenses. I'm quite familiar with them.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion And we are so grateful for your contributions which are necessary for the preservation of the realm.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: olenna
text: olenna As is a royal wedding. The people are hungry for more than just food. They crave distractions. And if we don't provide them, they'll create their own. And their distractions are likely to end with us being torn to pieces. A royal wedding is much safer. Wouldn't you say?

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion I would.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: olenna
text: olenna And traditionally paid for by the royal family.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: olenna
text: olenna I was told you were drunk, impertinent, and thoroughly debauched. You can imagine my disappointment at finding nothing but a browbeaten bookkeeper. Where did you go for them, Volantis?

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion My lady-

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: olenna
text: olenna Oh, very well. I won't have it said that House Tyrell refuses to play its part. We'll pay for half the expenses and the celebrations will go on as planned. Is that sufficient?

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion Quite sufficient. Thank you.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: olenna
text: olenna Very good, then. That's settled. Good day.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion Give me that.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: arya
text: arya What are you doing?

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: gendry
text: gendry Just mending Lord Beric's armor.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: arya
text: arya Why?

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: gendry
text: gendry I'm going to stay on and smith for the Brotherhood.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: arya
text: arya Have you lost your mind? When the Lannisters find this place, you think they'll spare the smiths? They'll cave your head in with your own helmet.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: gendry
text: gendry The Lannisters wanted to kill me long before I joined the Brotherhood.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: arya
text: arya You don't have to do this.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: gendry
text: gendry I want to. They need good men.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: arya
text: arya Robb needs good men, too. We're leaving tomorrow. And then you-

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: gendry
text: gendry What? Serve him? I've served men my entire life. I served Master Mott at King's Landing and he sold me to the Watch. I served Lord Tywin at Harrenhal, wondering every day if I'd get tortured or killed. I'm done serving.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: arya
text: arya You just said you were serving Lord Beric.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: gendry
text: gendry He may be their leader, but they chose him. These men are brothers. They're a family. I've never had a family.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: arya
text: arya I can be your family.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: gendry
text: gendry You wouldn't be my family. You'd be 'my lady'.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: martyn
text: martyn Willem. Willem!

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: willem
text: willem Is this a rescue?

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: rickard
text: rickard Lannister filth! Take him!

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: martyn
text: martyn Please, I didn't do anything. I'm just a squire. Please-

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: robb
text: robb Bring them in.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: robb
text: robb Is that all of them? It took five of you to murder two unarmed squires?

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: rickard
text: rickard Not murder, Your Grace. Vengeance.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: robb
text: robb Vengeance? Those boys didn't kill your sons. I saw Harrion die on the battlefield and Torrhen-

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: rickard
text: rickard Was strangled by the Kingslayer. They were his kin.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: robb
text: robb They were boys! Look at them.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: rickard
text: rickard Tell your mother to look at them. She killed them as much as I.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: robb
text: robb My mother had nothing to do with this. This was your treason.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: rickard
text: rickard It's treason to free your enemies. In war, you kill your enemies. Did your father not teach you that, boy?

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: robb
text: robb Leave him.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: rickard
text: rickard Aye. Leave me to the king. He wants to give me a scolding before he sets me free. That's how he deals with treason. Our King in the North. Or should I call him the King Who Lost the North?

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: robb
text: robb Escort Lord Karstark to the dungeon. Hang the rest.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: man
text: man Mercy, sire! I didn't kill anyone. I only watched for the guards.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: robb
text: robb This one was only the watcher. Hang him last so he can watch the others die.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: man
text: man Please! Please, no. They made me do it! They made me! They made me!

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: edmure
text: edmure Word of this can't leave Riverrun. They were Tywin Lannister's nephews. The Lannisters pay their debts. They never stop talking about it.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: robb
text: robb Would you make me a liar as well as a murderer?

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: edmure
text: edmure It wouldn't be lying. We will bury them and remain silent until the war is done.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: robb
text: robb I'm not fighting for justice if I don't serve justice to murderers in my ranks, no matter how highborn. He has to die.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: catelyn
text: catelyn The Karstarks are Northmen. They won't forgive the killing of their lord.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: talisa
text: talisa Your mother's right. If you do this, the Karstarks will abandon you.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: robb
text: robb You tended to their wounds. You brought them supper. Now they're dead.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: talisa
text: talisa And more boys will keep dying until this war is over. You need Karstark men to end it.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: catelyn
text: catelyn Spare his life. Keep him as a hostage.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: edmure
text: edmure A hostage. Tell the Karstarks that as long as they remain loyal, he will not be harmed.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: rickard
text: rickard The blood of the First Men flows through my veins as much as yours, boy. I fought the Mad King for your father. I fought Joffrey for you. We are kin- Stark and Karstark.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: robb
