text: robb That didn't stop you from betraying me. And it won't save you now.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: rickard
text: rickard I don't want it to save me. I want it to haunt you to the end of your days.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: robb
text: robb Kneel, my lord.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: robb
text: robb Rickard Karstark, Lord of Karhold, here in sight of gods and men, I sentence you to die. Would you speak a final word?

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: rickard
text: rickard Kill me and be cursed. You are no king of mine.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: arya
text: arya Joffrey. Cersei. Ilyn Payne. Ser Meryn. The Hound. What are you going to do with me?

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: thoros
text: thoros At first light we'll ride for Riverrun. Your brother's there now. He'll make a contribution to our cause and you can go home.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: arya
text: arya I'm a hostage and you're selling me.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: thoros
text: thoros Don't think of it that way.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: arya
text: arya But it is that way.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: thoros
text: thoros It is. And it isn't.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: arya
text: arya More is than isn't.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: thoros
text: thoros Beric admired your father a great deal, you know. He wanted to refuse your ransom altogether.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: arya
text: arya So why don't you?

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: thoros
text: thoros We need the gold.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: beric
text: beric Do I frighten you, child?

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: arya
text: arya No.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: beric
text: beric You're angry with me. And I don't blame you. But letting him go was the right thing. I have more reason than most to want him hanged.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: arya
text: arya I thought he killed you.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: beric
text: beric He did.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: arya
text: arya But how?

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: beric
text: beric Thoros how many times have you brought me back?

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: thoros
text: thoros It's the Lord of Light brings you back. I'm just the lucky drunk who says the words.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: beric
text: beric How many times?

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: thoros
text: thoros Five, I think. No, this makes six.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: beric
text: beric Six.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: thoros
text: thoros There was the first time- the Mountain. Show her. Lance right through the chest.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: beric
text: beric Then I was stabbed in the belly.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: thoros
text: thoros Then it was an arrow in the back. And that axe in the side.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: beric
text: beric Then the Lannisters caught me and executed me for treason. Was it a hanging or a dagger in the eye?

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: thoros
text: thoros Both. Fuckers couldn't decide.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: thoros
text: thoros And the Hound makes six.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: beric
text: beric Second time I've been killed by a Clegane.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: thoros
text: thoros You'd think you'd learn. It's not getting any easier, you know.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: beric
text: beric I know. Every time I come back, I'm a bit less. Pieces of you get chipped away.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: arya
text: arya Could you bring back a man without a head? Not six times. Just once.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: thoros
text: thoros I don't think it works that way, child.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: beric
text: beric He was a good man, Ned Stark. He's at rest now, somewhere. I would never wish my life upon him.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: arya
text: arya I would. You're alive.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: selyse
text: selyse Lord, cast your light upon me. Protect me in the darkness. Burn away my sins. Help me serve you. Use me as you will. For the night is dark and full of terrors.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: selyse
text: selyse I have prayed day and night for you to come to me.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: stannis
text: stannis My lady.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: stannis
text: stannis I meant to come sooner. The battle-

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: selyse
text: selyse I know of your troubles, My king. The Lady Melisandre has told me everything.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: stannis
text: stannis Yes, of course.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: selyse
text: selyse You mustn't despair. Your claim is true. You will be victorious.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: stannis
text: stannis I believed that once.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: selyse
text: selyse You are the one godo s champion and the finest man I've ever known.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: stannis
text: stannis Selyse. I've broken a sacred vow. I've sinned.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: selyse
text: selyse No.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: stannis
text: stannis I've wronged you. I have shamed you.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: selyse
text: selyse You're doing godo s work.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: stannis
text: stannis You don't understand. The Red Woman- the Lady Melisandre-

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: selyse
text: selyse I know, Stannis. The Lady Melisandre has told me everything. No act done in service of the Lord of Light can ever be a sin. When she told me, I wept with joy.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: selyse
text: selyse Oh, my sweet boys. Petyr, Tommard, Edric. I thank god every day for bringing Melisandre to us. She gave you a son. I gave you - nothing.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: stannis
text: stannis That's not true.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: selyse
text: selyse So you've come to see her as well? There is no need. You must keep away from such distractions.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: stannis
text: stannis She's my daughter. I want to see her.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: selyse
text: selyse You are a king. You don't need my permission.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: shireen
text: shireen Under the sea I know, I know/ Oh, oh, oh

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: shireen
text: shireen The birds have scales / And the fish take wing / I know, I know / Oh, oh, oh

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: stannis
text: stannis Shireen.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: shireen
text: shireen Father!

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: stannis
text: stannis You've grown since I last saw you.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: shireen
text: shireen Mother said you fought in a battle. Did you win?

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: stannis
text: stannis No.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: shireen
text: shireen Did the Onion Knight come back with you?

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: stannis
text: stannis He did. He fought bravely.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: shireen
text: shireen He hasn't come to visit me. He said he'd bring me back a present from the capital.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: stannis
text: stannis He won't be visiting, child.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: shireen
text: shireen Why not? He's my friend. Look.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: shireen
text: shireen He made this for me. But don't tell Mother I have it. It's a secret. Mother doesn't like the Onion Knight.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: stannis
text: stannis Ser Davos is a traitor. He's rotting in a dungeon cell for his crime. Best forget him.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: jaime
text: jaime Not so hard. You'll scrub the skin off.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: brienne
text: brienne What are you doing here?

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: jaime
text: jaime I need a bath. Help me out of these rags.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: jaime
text: jaime Now get out.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: brienne
text: brienne There's another tub.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: jaime
text: jaime This one suits me fine. Don't worry. I'm not interested. If I faint, pull me out. I don't intend to be the first Lannister to die in a bathtub.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: brienne
text: brienne Why should I care how you die?

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: jaime
text: jaime You swore a solemn vow, remember? You're supposed to get me to King's Landing in one piece. Not going so well, is it? No wonder Renly died with you guarding him.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: jaime
text: jaime That was unworthy. Forgive me. You protected me better than most-

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: brienne
text: brienne Don't you mock me.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: jaime
text: jaime I'm apologizing. I'm sick of fighting. Let's call a truce.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: brienne
text: brienne You need trust to have a truce.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: jaime
text: jaime I trust you.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: jaime
text: jaime There it is. There's the look. I've seen it for seventeen years on face after face. You all despise me. Kingslayer. Oathbreaker. A man without honor. You've heard of wildfire?

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: brienne
text: brienne Of course.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: jaime
text: jaime The Mad King was obsessed with it. He loved to watch people burn, the way their skin blackened and blistered and melted off their bones. He burned lords he didn't like. He burned Hands who disobeyed him. He burned anyone who was against him. Before long, half the country was against him. Aerys saw traitors everywhere. So he had his pyromancer place caches of wildfire all over the city- beneath the Sept of Baelor and the slums of Flea Bottom. Under houses, stables, taverns. Even beneath the Red Keep itself. Finally, the day of reckoning came. Robert Baratheon marched on the capital after his victory at the Trident. But my father arrived first with the whole Lannister army at his back, promising to defend the city against the rebels. I knew my father better than that. He's never been one to pick the losing side. I told the Mad King as much. I urged him to surrender peacefully. But the king didn't listen to me. He didn't listen to Varys who tried to warn him. But he did listen to Grand Maester Pycelle, that grey, sunken cunt. 'You can trust the Lannisters,' he said. 'The Lannisters have always been true friends of the crown.' So we opened the gates and my father sacked the city. Once again, I came to the king, begging him to surrender. He told me to bring him my father's head. Then he turned to his pyromancer. 'Burn them all,' he said. 'Burn them in their homes. Burn them in their beds.' Tell me, if your precious Renly commanded you to kill your own father and stand by while thousands of men, women, and children burned alive, would you have done it? Would you have kept your oath then?

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: jaime
text: jaime First, I killed the pyromancer. And then when the king turned to flee, I drove my sword into his back. 'Burn them all,' he kept saying. 'Burn them all.' I don't think he expected to die. He- he meant to burn with the rest of us and rise again, reborn as a dragon to turn his enemies to ash. I slit his throat to make sure that didn't happen. That's where Ned Stark found me.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: brienne
text: brienne If this is true why didn't you tell anyone? Why didn't you tell Lord Stark?

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: jaime
text: jaime Stark? You think the honorable Ned Stark wanted to hear my side? He judged me guilty the moment he set eyes on me. By what right does the wolf judge the lion? By what right?

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: brienne
text: brienne Help! Help! The Kingslayer!

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: jaime
text: jaime Jaime. My name is Jaime.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: shireen
text: shireen Onion Knight. Ser Onion Knight.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: davos
text: davos Princess? Gods, what are you doing here?

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: shireen
text: shireen Shh, you'll wake Bert.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: davos
text: davos Bert?

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: shireen
text: shireen He's the fat one. He's on guard duty tonight. He likes to drink wine and sleep a lot.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: davos
text: davos Go back to your room. You're not supposed to be here. If your father knew-

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: shireen
text: shireen he said you Were a traitor. Are you?

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: davos
text: davos I am, child. I disobeyed my king, your father, and now I'm paying the price.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: shireen
text: shireen I don't care. You're my friend. You must get bored down here. I brought you something to read. It's about Aegon and his dragons. Aegon used to live here. Did you know that? And the Targaryens built this castle.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: davos
text: davos Aye. So they did.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: shireen
text: shireen You can hide the book under your cloak. It's a good one. I'll bring you more.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: davos
text: davos Thank you, my lady. I'm sure it's a fine book, but it's wasted on me.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: shireen
text: shireen Take it. I have more.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: davos
text: davos My lady, I can't read the words.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: shireen
text: shireen You can't?

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: shireen
text: shireen I'll teach you. I'll come when Bert's on duty and teach you.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: davos
text: davos No. No. No.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: shireen
text: shireen It's easy. It'll be fun.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: davos
text: davos Go. We can't.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: shireen
text: shireen Why not? What will they do, lock us in cells?

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: davos
text: davos I wouldn't know where to start.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: shireen
text: shireen At the beginning. This word is Aegon. When you see A, E, and G together like that, it sounds like egg. And the title of the whole book is 'An History of Aegon the Conqueror and His Conquest of Westeros.'

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: jorah
text: jorah It was a bitch of a siege.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: barristan
text: barristan Mm, you were first through the breach at Pyke?

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: jorah
text: jorah The second. Thoros of Myr went in alone, waving that flaming sword of his.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: barristan
text: barristan Thoros of Myr. Bloody madman. Robert knighted you after the battle?

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: jorah
text: jorah Proudest moment of my life. One knee in the dust, the king's sword on my shoulder, listening to the words. 'In the name of the Warrior, I charge you to be brave.' All I could think of was how badly I had to piss.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: jorah
text: jorah In full plate metal for sixteen hours. Never occurred to me till the fighting was over. I was very nearly the first man knighted to piss on the king's boots.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: barristan
text: barristan Robert would have laughed. He was a good man, a great warrior. And a terrible king. I burned away my years fighting for terrible kings.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: jorah
text: jorah You swore an oath.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: barristan
text: barristan Yes. And a man of honor keeps his vows, even if he's serving a drunk or a lunatic. Just once in my life before it's over, I want to know what it's like to serve with pride, to fight for someone I believe in. Do you believe in her?

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: jorah
text: jorah With all my heart.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys These are the ones?

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: missandei
text: missandei Yes, khaleesi. The officers.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys You did not choose this life. But you are free men now. And free men make their own choices. Have you selected your own leader from amongst your ranks?

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys Remove your helmet

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: grey
text: grey This one has the honor.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys What is your name?

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: grey
text: grey Grey Worm.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys Grey Worm.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: missandei
text: missandei All Unsullied boys are given new names when they are cut- Grey Worm, Red Flea, Black Rat. Names that remind them what they are- vermin.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys From this day forward you will choose your own names. You will tell your fellow soldiers to do the same. Throw away your slave name. Choose the name your parents gave you, or any other. A name that gives you pride.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: grey
text: grey Grey Worm" gives me pride. It is a very lucky name. The name this one was born with was cursed. That was the name he had when he was taken as a slave. But Grey Worm is the name this one had the day Daenerys Stormborn set him free.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: jorah
text: jorah King Robert wanted her dead.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: barristan
text: barristan Of course he wanted her dead. She's a Targaryen. The last Targaryen.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: jorah
text: jorah I suppose no one on the small council could speak sense to him.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: barristan
text: barristan I didn't sit on the small council.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: jorah
text: jorah No? Doesn't the Lord of the Kingsguard traditionally-

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: barristan
text: barristan Traditionally, yes, but I killed a dozen of Robert's friends during his rebellion.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: barristan
text: barristan He didn't want advice on how to govern from a man who had fought for the Mad King. Can't say I minded much. I always hated the politics.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: jorah
text: jorah Yeah, I imagine I would, too. Hours spent jabbering about backstabbings - and betrayals the world over.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: barristan
text: barristan Mm-hmm.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: jorah
text: jorah Still, she'll have to wade through that muck if she wants to rule the Seven Kingdoms.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: barristan
text: barristan She'll have good men around her to advise her, men with experience.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: jorah
text: jorah Which men do you have in mind?

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: barristan
text: barristan Forgive me, Ser Jorah, for what I'm about to say, but your reputation in Westeros has suffered over the years.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: jorah
text: jorah It suffered for a reason. I sold men into slavery.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: barristan
text: barristan I don't know if your presence by her side will help our cause when we go home.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: jorah
text: jorah Our cause? Forgive me, Ser Barristan, but I was busy defending the khaleesi against King Robert's assassins while you were still bowing to the man.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: barristan
text: barristan We both want her to rule. Am I wrong?

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: jorah
text: jorah You only joined us a few days ago. I can't speak to your intentions.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: barristan
text: barristan If we're truly her loyal servants, we will do whatever needs to be done, no matter the cost, no matter our pride.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: jorah
text: jorah You're not Lord here. You're just another exile. And I take my orders from the queen.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: talisa
text: talisa Come to bed.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: robb
text: robb You were right.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: robb
text: robb The Karstarks are gone. Almost half our forces. Tywin Lannister knows what he needs to do to make us unravel. Nothing. Only wait.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: talisa
text: talisa Don't let him.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: robb
text: robb What can I do? Attack King's Landing? There's nothing he'd like better. He'd crush us in a day.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: talisa
text: talisa We could ride north. Take your land back from the Greyjoys. Wait out the winter.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: robb
text: robb Winter could last five years. Once my bannermen are home again, sitting by the fire, surrounded by their families, warm and safe, they'll never ride south again. When I gathered my lords together, we had a purpose, a mission. Now we're like a band of bickering children.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: talisa
text: talisa Give them a new purpose.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: robb
text: robb What?

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: talisa
text: talisa Oh, I don't know. I don't even know where Winterfell is.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: robb
text: robb Here. And we're here. King's Landing-

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: talisa
text: talisa What is it?

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: robb
text: robb I can't force them to meet us in the field and I can't attack them where they're strongest, but I can attack them where they're not.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: robb
text: robb And Casterly Rock can't run away. I'm going to take their home away from them.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: talisa
text: talisa Can you do it?

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: robb
text: robb I need men to replace the Karstarks who marched home. There is only one person in this kingdom with that kind of army who hasn't already sided with the Lannisters. The man whose daughter I was supposed to marry- Walder Frey.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: sansa
text: sansa He's such a splendid fighter. Do you have any idea when we might

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: margaery
text: margaery I'll plant the seed as soon as Joffrey and I are married. It should grow quickly.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: sansa
text: sansa Joffrey won't let me leave. He's got too many reasons to keep me here.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: margaery
text: margaery And only one to let you go. Because it will please me.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: loras
text: loras Squire!

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: olyvar
text: olyvar Well fought, ser.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: loras
text: loras That was no fight. I don't know you.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: olyvar
text: olyvar Olyver, if it please you.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: olyvar
text: olyvar I should like to see you spar with a proper partner, ser.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: loras
text: loras How did you know?

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: olyvar
text: olyvar Know what?

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: loras
text: loras That I wanted to.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: loras
text: loras My lord, I'll have you know I'm to be married soon and even my intended hasn't the slightest notion.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: olyvar
text: olyvar They rarely do, in my experience.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: loras
text: loras You have a good deal of experience, do you?

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: olyvar
text: olyvar With the husbands.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: petyr
text: petyr That didn't take long.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: olyvar
text: olyvar Well, it took long enough. It seems our Knight of Flowers is engaged to be wed.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: petyr
text: petyr Is he? And who's the lucky girl?

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: petyr
text: petyr She may not be the grandest ship in the world or the fastest, but she's mine. I've always wanted a ship. Now I want a dozen. Strange, isn't it?

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: sansa
text: sansa What is?

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: petyr
text: petyr It doesn't matter what we want, once we get it, then we want something else. Your hair is different.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: sansa
text: sansa Is it?

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: petyr
text: petyr Lady Margaery wears it that way.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: sansa
text: sansa Many ladies wear it this way.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: petyr
text: petyr I have good news. I'll be leaving the city soon.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: sansa
text: sansa You still want me to come with you?

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: petyr
text: petyr It's not a question of what I want. It's what you want. You want to go home, don't you?

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: sansa
text: sansa Of course. More than anything. But maybe it would be better to wait. I've been thinking how dangerous it would be. Not just for me, but for you. You've been so kind. I'd feel terrible if anything happened to you. I can't tell you how touched I am by your concern for my welfare.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: petyr
text: petyr I hope you know that I'm your friend, Sansa. Your true friend.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: sansa
text: sansa I do, Lord Baelish.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: petyr
text: petyr Petyr.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: sansa
text: sansa Petyr.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: petyr
text: petyr If you wish to stay, then of course you will stay.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: petyr
text: petyr We'll speak again when I return.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: tywin
text: tywin You're late.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion What's she doing here?

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: tywin
text: tywin Our business concerns her, too. Sit.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion You'll be pleased to learn that after one conversation with Olenna Tyrell, I've saved the crown hundreds of thousands on this wedding.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: tywin
text: tywin Never mind that now. We have something important to discuss.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion I'm Master of Coin. Saving money is important.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion Stop that. You're making me uncomfortable.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: tywin
text: tywin Your sister has learned that your new friends the Tyrells are plotting to marry Sansa Stark to Ser Loras.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion Very well. She's a lovely girl. Missing some of Loras' favorite bits, but I'm sure they'll make do.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: tywin
text: tywin Your jokes are not appreciated.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion It wasn't my best, but-

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: tywin
text: tywin I bring them into the royal fold and this is how they repay me, by trying to steal the key to the North out from under me.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion Sansa is the key to the North? I seem to remember she has an older brother.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: tywin
text: tywin The Karstarks have marched home. The young wolf has lost half his army. His days are numbered. Theon Greyjoy murdered both his brothers. That makes Sansa Stark the heir to Winterfell. And I am not about to hand her over to the Tyrells.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion The Tyrell army is helping us to win this war. Do you really think it's wise to refuse them?

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: tywin
text: tywin There's nothing to refuse. This is a plot. Plots are not public knowledge. And the Tyrells won't carry this one out until after Joffrey's wedding. We need to act first and kill this union in its crib.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion And how do we do that?

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: tywin
text: tywin We find Sansa Stark a different husband.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion Wonderful.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: cersei
text: cersei Yes, it is.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion You can't mean it.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: tywin
text: tywin I can and I do.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion Joffrey has made this poor girl's life miserable since the day he took her father's head. Now she's finally free of him and you give her to me? That's cruel even for you.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: tywin
text: tywin Do you intend on mistreating her? The girl's happiness is not my concern, nor should it be yours.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion She's a child!

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: cersei
text: cersei She's flowered, I assure you. She and I have discussed it at length.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: tywin
text: tywin There, you see? You will wed her, bed her, and put a child in her. Surely you're capable of that.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion And if I refuse?

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: tywin
text: tywin You wanted to be rewarded for your valor in battle. Sansa Stark is a finer reward than you could ever dare hope for. And it is past time you were wed.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion I was wed. Or don't you remember?

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: tywin
text: tywin Only too well.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: cersei
text: cersei You should be thanking the gods for this. This is more than you deserve.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: tywin
text: tywin Tyrion will do as he's bid. As will you.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: cersei
text: cersei What do you mean?

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: tywin
text: tywin You'll marry Ser Loras.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: cersei
text: cersei I will not.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: tywin
text: tywin The boy is heir to Highgarden. Tyrion will secure the North, you will secure the Reach.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: cersei
text: cersei No, I won't do it.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: tywin
text: tywin Yes, you will. You're still fertile. You need to marry again and breed.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: cersei
text: cersei I am Queen Regent, not some broodmare.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: tywin
text: tywin You're my daughter! You will do as I command and you will marry Loras Tyrell and put an end to the disgusting rumors about you once and for all.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: cersei
text: cersei Father, don't make me do it again, please.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: tywin
text: tywin Not another word. My children. You've disgraced the Lannister name for far too long.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: shireen
text: shireen It's always summer / Under the sea / I know I know / Oh, oh, oh. / The birds have scales / And the fish take wing / I know I know / Oh, oh, oh. / The rain is dry / and snow falls up / I know, I know / Oh, oh, oh. / The stones crack open / The water burns / The shadows come to dance / My lord / The shadows come to play / The shadows come to dance / My lord / The shadows come to stay.

title: The Climb
Name: gilly
text: gilly You've got too much wood in there.

title: The Climb
Name: sam
text: sam But the more wood, the bigger the fire.

title: The Climb
Name: gilly
text: gilly It needs to breathe. Take off that big log.

title: The Climb
Name: sam
text: sam Huh. You know your fires.

title: The Climb
Name: gilly
text: gilly Someone built your fires for you growing up?

title: The Climb
Name: sam
text: sam It doesn't get so cold down in the Reach. And there were servants, of course.

title: The Climb
Name: gilly
text: gilly I knew you were highborn.

title: The Climb
Name: sam
text: sam Oh, I found something at the Fist of the First Men. Buried treasure. Thousands of years old. I think.

title: The Climb
Name: gilly
text: gilly What does it do?

title: The Climb
Name: sam
text: sam I'm not sure that it does anything. It's beautiful, though, isn't it?

title: The Climb
Name: gilly
text: gilly How much longer?

title: The Climb
Name: sam
text: sam Not so far. A few more days.

title: The Climb
Name: gilly
text: gilly Is the Wall as big as they say?

title: The Climb
Name: sam
text: sam Bigger. So big you can't even see the top sometimes. It's hidden in clouds.

title: The Climb
Name: gilly
text: gilly You're playing with me.

title: The Climb
Name: sam
text: sam I'm not. It's seven hundred feet high, all made of ice. On a warm day you can see it weeping. Castle Black is nice enough. They keep a fire burning in the long hall day and night. And Hobb makes venison stew with onions. Very tasty. Sometimes, one of the brothers will sing. Dareon sings best.

title: The Climb
Name: gilly
text: gilly Do you sing?

title: The Climb
Name: sam
text: sam No. No, no, no. Not very well.

title: The Climb
Name: gilly
text: gilly Sing me a song.

title: The Climb
Name: sam
text: sam Oh, all right. Let's see.

title: The Climb
Name: sam
text: sam Oh ahem. The father's face is stern and strong / He sits and judges right from wrong / He weighs our lives, the short and long / And loves the little children / The mother gives the gift of life / And watches over every wife / Her gentle smile ends all strife /And she loves her little children.

title: The Climb
Name: osha
text: osha That's not how you skin a rabbit.

title: The Climb
Name: meera
text: meera I know how to skin a rabbit.

title: The Climb
Name: osha
text: osha Not by the looks of it.

title: The Climb
Name: osha
text: osha You grow up north of the Wall, you learn the proper way to handle game.

title: The Climb
Name: meera
text: meera I didn't see any game before I got here.

title: The Climb
Name: osha
text: osha If I had a bow, I could have shot a dozen rabbits.

title: The Climb
Name: meera
text: meera Well, I made this bow myself. Guess you don't learn how to do that north of the Wall.

title: The Climb
Name: osha
text: osha You learn how to use your fists, though.

title: The Climb
Name: meera
text: meera Oh, you're gonna punch the rabbits to death?

title: The Climb
Name: osha
text: osha I had someone else in mind.

title: The Climb
Name: meera
text: meera Well, someone else is sitting right here.

title: The Climb
Name: bran
text: bran You're both very good at skinning rabbits.

title: The Climb
Name: osha
text: osha Some of us are just a little better.

title: The Climb
Name: meera
text: meera Well, some of us would say thank you when someone else hunts down their breakfast for them. Or don't they teach you to say thank you north of the Wall?

title: The Climb
Name: osha
text: osha You've got a big mouth, girl, and too many teeth.

title: The Climb
Name: bran
text: bran Stop it!

title: The Climb
Name: hodor
text: hodor Hodor.

title: The Climb
Name: bran
text: bran You've been fighting since you met. Just stop it.

title: The Climb
Name: osha
text: osha Lady Reed here's got a stick so far up her ass, it's a wonder her feet touch the ground.

title: The Climb
Name: bran
text: bran You've been nasty to her every day. Of course she's nasty back.

title: The Climb
Name: osha
text: osha Me? It's my fault? First time I met her, she put a knife to my throat.

title: The Climb
Name: bran
text: bran First time I met you, you held a knife at me. We can't fight each other. We'll never make it to the Wall. I want you both to make peace.

title: The Climb
Name: meera
text: meera Your way of skinning rabbits is quicker than mine.

title: The Climb
Name: osha
text: osha I said so, didn't I?

title: The Climb
Name: bran
text: bran Osha!

title: The Climb
Name: osha
text: osha You're a good little hunter.

title: The Climb
Name: meera
text: meera Thank you. See? Not so hard, is it? Thank you.

title: The Climb
Name: osha
text: osha Don't push me.

title: The Climb
Name: meera
text: meera Shh. I'm right here with you.

title: The Climb
Name: rickon
text: rickon What's happening?

title: The Climb
Name: meera
text: meera I'm right here with you.

title: The Climb
Name: rickon
text: rickon What's wrong with him?

title: The Climb
Name: meera
text: meera The visions take their toll.

title: The Climb
Name: bran
text: bran He's having one now?

title: The Climb
Name: jojen
text: jojen I saw Jon Snow.

title: The Climb
Name: bran
text: bran You saw him? At Castle Black?

title: The Climb
Name: jojen
text: jojen He was on the wrong side of the Wall surrounded by enemies.

title: The Climb
Name: tormund
text: tormund Used to be you couldn't find a tree within a mile of the Wall. Crows would come out every morning with axes.

title: The Climb
Name: orell
text: orell Your flock gets smaller every year.

title: The Climb
Name: jon
text: jon You ever climbed it before?

title: The Climb
Name: ygritte
text: ygritte No. But Tormundo s done it half a hundred times. You're afraid.

title: The Climb
Name: jon
text: jon Aren't you?

title: The Climb
Name: ygritte
text: ygritte Aye. It's a long way up and a long way down. But I've waited my whole life to see the world from up there. Here, sit down.

title: The Climb
Name: ygritte
text: ygritte I brought a pair for you. They're too big for you, but they're good.

title: The Climb
Name: jon
text: jon You kill someone for them?

title: The Climb
Name: ygritte
text: ygritte Nah. I didn't kill him, but I bet his balls are still bruised.

title: The Climb
Name: ygritte
text: ygritte He wasn't good to me the way you're good to me. He didn't do that thing you do with your tongue.

title: The Climb
Name: jon
text: jon Can we not talk about that here?

title: The Climb
Name: ygritte
text: ygritte Can we not talk about that here? I'm Jon Snow. I've killed dead men and Qhorin Halfhand, but I'm scared of naked girls.

title: The Climb
Name: jon
text: jon Did I seem scared the other day?

title: The Climb
Name: ygritte
text: ygritte You were trembling like a leaf.

title: The Climb
Name: jon
text: jon Only in the beginning.

title: The Climb
Name: ygritte
text: ygritte Only in the beginning. You're a proper lover, Jon Snow. And don't worry. Your secret's safe with me.

title: The Climb
Name: jon
text: jon What secret?

title: The Climb
Name: ygritte
text: ygritte Do you think I'm as dumb as all those girls in silk dresses you knew growing up? You're loyal and you're brave. You didn't stop being a crow the day you walked into Mance Rayder's tent.

title: The Climb
Name: ygritte
text: ygritte But I'm your woman now, Jon Snow. You're going to be loyal to your woman. The Night's Watch don't care if you live or die. Mance Rayder don't care if I live or die. We're just soldiers in their armies and there's plenty more to carry on if we go down.

title: The Climb
Name: ygritte
text: ygritte It's you and me that matters to me and you. Don't ever betray me.

title: The Climb
Name: jon
text: jon I won't.

title: The Climb
Name: ygritte
text: ygritte Cause I'll cut your pretty cock right off and wear it 'round my neck.

title: The Climb
Name: tormund
text: tormund Sink your metal deep and make sure it holds before taking your next step. And if you fall, don't scream. You don't want that to be the last thing she remembers.

title: The Climb
Name: arya
text: arya Joffrey. Cersei. Ilyn Payne.

title: The Climb
Name: anguy
text: anguy You're good. You're not as good as you think you are.

title: The Climb
Name: arya
text: arya Face, tits, balls- I hit 'em right where I wanted to.

title: The Climb
Name: anguy
text: anguy Aye, but you took your sweet time of it. You won't be fighting straw men, little lady. Show me your position.

title: The Climb
Name: anguy
text: anguy Keep your elbow high. You want your back doing the hard labor. You're holding. Never hold.

title: The Climb
Name: arya
text: arya What?

title: The Climb
Name: anguy
text: anguy Your muscles tense up when you hold. Pull the string back to the center of your chin and release. Never hold.

title: The Climb
Name: arya
text: arya But I have to aim.

title: The Climb
Name: anguy
text: anguy Never aim.

title: The Climb
Name: arya
text: arya Never aim?

title: The Climb
Name: anguy
text: anguy Your eye knows where it wants the arrow to go. Trust your eye.

title: The Climb
Name: arya
text: arya There's someone out there.

title: The Climb
Name: anguy
text: anguy That's about far enough.

title: The Climb
Name: melisandre
text: melisandre We come as friends.

title: The Climb
Name: anguy
text: anguy Begging your pardon, m'lady, but we'll be the judge of that.

title: The Climb
Name: melisandre
text: melisandre Valar morghulis.

title: The Climb
Name: thoros
text: thoros Valar dohaeris. I don't see many priestesses of R'hollor in the Riverlands.

title: The Climb
Name: melisandre
text: melisandre You are Thoros of Myr.

title: The Climb
Name: melisandre
text: melisandre The High Priest gave you a mission. Turn King Robert away from his idols and towards the Lord of Light. What happened?

title: The Climb
Name: thoros
text: thoros I failed.

title: The Climb
Name: melisandre
text: melisandre You quit, you mean. The heathen continue to slaughter each other and you continue to get drunk.

title: The Climb
Name: thoros
text: thoros You worship Him in your way, and I'll worship Him in mine. Do you speak the common tongue?

title: The Climb
Name: thoros
text: thoros My friends here don't speak High Valyrian. Why are you here, my lady?

title: The Climb
Name: beric
text: beric Forgive my manners. I don't see many ladies these days.

title: The Climb
Name: thoros
text: thoros Lucky for the ladies.

title: The Climb
Name: melisandre
text: melisandre How many times has the Lord brought him back?

title: The Climb
Name: thoros
text: thoros Six.

title: The Climb
Name: melisandre
text: melisandre That's not possible.

title: The Climb
Name: thoros
text: thoros The Lord has smiled upon me.

title: The Climb
Name: melisandre
text: melisandre You should not have this power.

title: The Climb
Name: thoros
text: thoros I have no power. I ask the Lord for His favor, and He responds as He will.

title: The Climb
Name: thoros
text: thoros I've always been a terrible priest. Drank too much rum. Fucked all the whores in King's Landing. It's a terrible thing to say, but by the time I came to Westeros, I didn't believe in our Lord. I decided that He, that all the gods, were stories we told the children to make them behave. So I wore the robes and every now and then I'd recite the prayers, but it was just for show. A spectacle for the locals. Until the Mountain drove a lance through this one's heart. I knelt beside his cold body and said the old words. Not because I believed in them, but he was my friend and he was dead. And they were the only words I knew. And for the first time in my life, the Lord replied. Beric's eyes opened and I knew the truth. Our god is the one true god. And all men must serve Him.

title: The Climb
Name: melisandre
text: melisandre You've been to the other side.

title: The Climb
Name: beric
text: beric The other side? There is no other side. I have been to the darkness, my lady. He sent you to us for a reason.

title: The Climb
Name: melisandre
text: melisandre You have someone He needs.

title: The Climb
Name: anguy
text: anguy Bodkin point. Penetrates plate at two hundred yards. Can you make 'em?

title: The Climb
Name: gendry
text: gendry Yeah, nothing tricky about it. Just need decent steel.

title: The Climb
Name: anguy
text: anguy I'll get you the steel.

title: The Climb
Name: man
text: man Come on.

title: The Climb
Name: arya
text: arya I don't like that woman.

title: The Climb
Name: anguy
text: anguy That's 'cause you're a girl.

title: The Climb
Name: arya
text: arya What does that have to do with anything?

title: The Climb
Name: beric
text: beric Forgive me, lad.

title: The Climb
Name: arya
text: arya What are you doing? Let go of him.

title: The Climb
Name: arya
text: arya Tell them to stop. Come on. He wants to be one of you. He wants to join the Brotherhood. Stop them!

title: The Climb
Name: beric
text: beric We serve the Lord of Light and the Lord of Light needs this boy.

title: The Climb
Name: arya
text: arya Did the Lord of Light tell you that or did she?

title: The Climb
Name: arya
text: arya You're not doing this for your god. You're doing it for gold.

title: The Climb
Name: thoros
text: thoros We're doing it for both, girl. We can't defend the people without weapons and horses and food. And we can't get weapons and horses and food without gold.

title: The Climb
Name: gendry
text: gendry You told me this was a Brotherhood. You told me I could be one of you.

title: The Climb
Name: melisandre
text: melisandre You are more than they can ever be. They're just foot soldiers in the great war. You will make kings rise and fall.

title: The Climb
Name: arya
text: arya You're a witch. You're going to hurt him.

title: The Climb
Name: melisandre
text: melisandre I see a darkness in you. And in that darkness, eyes staring back at me- brown eyes, blue eyes, green eyes. Eyes you'll shut forever. We will meet again.

title: The Climb
Name: ygritte
text: ygritte You staring at my ass, Jon Snow?

title: The Climb
Name: tormund
text: tormund Look out!

title: The Climb
Name: ygritte
text: ygritte You all right?

title: The Climb
Name: tormund
text: tormund Just seeing if you can take a hit, lad.

title: The Climb
Name: ramsay
text: ramsay Sorry. Were you sleeping?

title: The Climb
Name: theon
text: theon Wa-

title: The Climb
Name: ramsay
text: ramsay Wa-? Wa-? Water? You want some water. I wish I had some for you.

title: The Climb
Name: ramsay
text: ramsay So let's play a game. Which body part do you need the least?

title: The Climb
Name: theon
text: theon Please.

title: The Climb
Name: ramsay
text: ramsay Please is not a body part.

title: The Climb
Name: theon
text: theon I'll tell you everything, please.

title: The Climb
Name: ramsay
text: ramsay But you've already told me everything. Remember? Your daddy was mean to you. The Starks didn't appreciate you. One good bit, though. The Stark boys, they're still alive. Wouldn't that be a hunt to remember? You failed, but I'm a better hunter than you.

title: The Climb
Name: ramsay
text: ramsay Now how about your little finger? You don't use that for much, do you? No? Good. Let's start with that.

title: The Climb
Name: ramsay
text: ramsay You've been wondering why you're here. Haven't you? Where you are. Who I am. Why I'm doing this to you. So guess. If you guess right, I'll tell you. By the old gods and the new, I swear it. You win the game if you can figure out who I am and why I'm torturing you and I win the game if you beg me to cut off your finger.

title: The Climb
Name: theon
text: theon If I win, you'll let me go?

title: The Climb
Name: ramsay
text: ramsay If you think this has a happy ending, you haven't been paying attention.

title: The Climb
Name: ramsay
text: ramsay You say please again and you'll wish you hadn't. You first. Where are we?

title: The Climb
Name: theon
text: theon The North.

title: The Climb
Name: ramsay
text: ramsay Too vague.

title: The Climb
Name: theon
text: theon Deepwood Motte.

title: The Climb
Name: ramsay
text: ramsay Terrible guess.

title: The Climb
Name: ramsay
text: ramsay Now, where?

title: The Climb
Name: theon
text: theon Last Hearth.

title: The Climb
Name: ramsay
text: ramsay Do I look like a fucking Umber to you?

title: The Climb
Name: theon
text: theon Karhold!

title: The Climb
Name: ramsay
text: ramsay Karhold? How did you know that? Did you see any banners flying when we came in?

title: The Climb
Name: theon
text: theon No. It was just a guess.

title: The Climb
Name: ramsay
text: ramsay Very good, Lord Theon. And who am I?

title: The Climb
Name: theon
text: theon Torrhen Karstark.

title: The Climb
Name: ramsay
text: ramsay He's dead. Strangled by the Kingslayer.

title: The Climb
Name: theon
text: theon He was your brother. Your father is Lord Rickard Karstark.

title: The Climb
Name: theon
text: theon You swore to tell me if I-

title: The Climb
Name: ramsay
text: ramsay You're right.

title: The Climb
Name: theon
text: theon Lord Rickard Karstark is Robb Stark's bannerman. I betrayed Robb. That's why you're torturing me.

title: The Climb
Name: ramsay
text: ramsay Yes. You win.

title: The Climb
Name: ramsay
text: ramsay Of course, you forgot to ask one question. You forgot to ask if I'm a liar.

title: The Climb
Name: ramsay
text: ramsay I'm afraid I am.

title: The Climb
Name: ramsay
text: ramsay Everything I told you is a lie.

title: The Climb
Name: ramsay
text: ramsay This isn't happening to you for a reason. Well, one reason- I enjoy it.

title: The Climb
Name: theon
text: theon Please, cut it off! Cut it off! Cut it off!

title: The Climb
Name: ramsay
text: ramsay I win.

title: The Climb
Name: robb
text: robb Thank you for riding here so quickly. I know travel isn't easy in these times.

title: The Climb
Name: black
text: black The roads are crawling with cutthroats and bandits. But when the King of the North summons us, we come.

title: The Climb
Name: lothar
text: lothar Our father has instructed us to tell you that his alliance with the North can continue if his terms are met. Lord Frey requires a formal apology for your violation of your sacred oath to marry one of his daughters.

title: The Climb
Name: robb
text: robb Of course. He deserves as much. I was in the wrong.

title: The Climb
Name: black
text: black As restitution for this betrayal, he demands Harrenhal and all its attendant lands.

title: The Climb
Name: edmure
text: edmure I don't think that's-

title: The Climb
Name: robb
text: robb We are fighting for the North. Harrenhal is not in the North. It is his once the war is over and we have no further strategic need for it.

title: The Climb
Name: black
text: black And there's something else.

title: The Climb
Name: robb
text: robb We will do whatever we can to give Lord Frey what he needs.

title: The Climb
Name: black
text: black Not what, whom.

title: The Climb
Name: edmure
text: edmure What?

title: The Climb
Name: edmure
text: edmure No.

title: The Climb
Name: lothar
text: lothar Our father requires Lord Edmure to wed one of his daughters- Roslin.

title: The Climb
Name: edmure
text: edmure How old is she?

title: The Climb
Name: lothar
text: lothar Nineteen.

title: The Climb
Name: edmure
text: edmure Could I see her first?

title: The Climb
Name: black
text: black You want to count her teeth? We depart for the Twins in the morning. We need an answer before we leave and a wedding not more than a fortnight thereafter or this alliance is at an end.

title: The Climb
Name: brynden
text: brynden Your father does realize we're in the middle of a war?

title: The Climb
Name: lothar
text: lothar Father is old. It will put his heart at peace if he could see her wed to a good husband.

title: The Climb
Name: black
text: black And his recent experience has made him wary of long engagements.

title: The Climb
Name: robb
text: robb He has every right to be. Please excuse us while we discuss it.

title: The Climb
Name: edmure
text: edmure Why should I let that old ferret choose my bride for me? At the very least, I should be offered the same choice you were. I'm his liege lord.

title: The Climb
Name: robb
text: robb He's a proud man and we've wounded him.

title: The Climb
Name: edmure
text: edmure I didn't wound him. My answer is no.

title: The Climb
Name: brynden
text: brynden Listen to me and listen very carefully. You-

title: The Climb
Name: edmure
text: edmure The laws of gods and men are very clear. No man can compel another man to marry.

title: The Climb
Name: brynden
text: brynden The laws of my fist are about to compel your teeth.

title: The Climb
Name: robb
text: robb It's all right. You heard him. If you refuse, our alliance with the Freys is dead.

title: The Climb
Name: edmure
text: edmure He's wanted me for one of his daughters since I was 12. He's not gonna stop wanting it now. When I say no, he will come back and offer me a daughter of my choosing.

title: The Climb
Name: catelyn
text: catelyn You're willing to risk our freedom and our lives for a chance at a prettier wife?

title: The Climb
Name: robb
text: robb I have a war to fight. We can't win it without them. I have no time to haggle. You said you wanted to make amends for the Stone Mill.

title: The Climb
Name: brynden
text: brynden You recall that heroic engagement?

title: The Climb
Name: edmure
text: edmure I had something less permanent in mind.

title: The Climb
Name: robb
text: robb I've won every battle, but I'm losing this war. If we don't do this and do it now, we're lost.

title: The Climb
Name: edmure
text: edmure I'll marry her.

title: The Climb
Name: robb
text: robb You're paying for my sins, Uncle. It's not fair or right. I'll remember it.

title: The Climb
Name: roose
text: roose I see my men have finally found you something appropriate to wear.

title: The Climb
Name: brienne
text: brienne Yes. Most kind of them. You're a Stark bannerman, Lord Bolton. I am acting on Lady Stark's orders to return Jaime Lannister to King's Landing.

title: The Climb
Name: roose
text: roose When King Robb left Harrenhal, his mother was his prisoner. If she wasn't his mother, he'd have hanged her for treason.

title: The Climb
Name: roose
text: roose I should send you back to Robb Stark.

title: The Climb
Name: jaime
text: jaime You should. But instead, you're sitting here watching me fail at dinner. Why might that be?

title: The Climb
Name: roose
text: roose Wars cost money. Many people would pay a great deal for you.

title: The Climb
Name: jaime
text: jaime We both know who would pay the most. Or make you pay the most if he found out you had captured me and sent me back up north for a summary execution.

title: The Climb
Name: roose
text: roose You're right. Perhaps the safest thing to do is to kill you both and burn your bodies.

title: The Climb
Name: jaime
text: jaime It would be, if you honestly believed my father would never find out about it.

title: The Climb
Name: roose
text: roose King Robb is keeping your father quite busy. He doesn't have time for anything else.

title: The Climb
Name: jaime
text: jaime He'll make time for you.

title: The Climb
Name: roose
text: roose As soon as you're well enough to travel, I will allow you to go to King's Landing as restitution for the mistakes my soldiers made. And you will swear to tell your father the truth, that I had nothing to do with your maiming.

title: The Climb
Name: jaime
text: jaime Shall we drink on it?

title: The Climb
Name: roose
text: roose I don't partake.

title: The Climb
Name: jaime
text: jaime You do understand how suspicious that is to ordinary people?

title: The Climb
Name: jaime
text: jaime Very well. My lady, may our journey continue without further incident.

title: The Climb
Name: roose
text: roose Oh, she won't be going with you.

title: The Climb
Name: brienne
text: brienne I am charged with bringing Ser Jaime to-

title: The Climb
Name: roose
text: roose You are charged with abetting treason.

title: The Climb
Name: jaime
text: jaime I'm afraid I must insist.

title: The Climb
Name: roose
text: roose You're in no place to insist on anything. I would have hoped you'd learned your lesson about overplaying your position.

title: The Climb
Name: olenna
text: olenna Impossible.

title: The Climb
Name: tywin
text: tywin Why?

title: The Climb
Name: olenna
text: olenna My grandson is the pride of Highgarden. The most desirable bachelor in all seven kingdoms. Your daughter-

title: The Climb
Name: tywin
text: tywin Is rich, the most beautiful woman in all seven kingdoms and the mother of the king.

title: The Climb
Name: olenna
text: olenna Old.

title: The Climb
Name: tywin
text: tywin Old?

title: The Climb
Name: olenna
text: olenna Old. I'm something of an expert on the subject. Her change will be upon her before long. I'll spare you the details of what will happen then. You men may have a stomach for bloodshed and slaughter, but this is another matter entirely.

title: The Climb
Name: tywin
text: tywin The years punish us as well, I promise you that. My stomach remains quite strong, however. The only thing that might turn it are details of your grandson's nocturnal activities. Do you deny them?

title: The Climb
Name: olenna
text: olenna Oh, not at all. A sword swallower through and through.

title: The Climb
Name: tywin
text: tywin And a boy with his affliction should be grateful for the opportunity to marry the most beautiful woman in the kingdoms and remove the stain from his name.

title: The Climb
Name: olenna
text: olenna Did you grow up with boy cousins, Lord Tywin? Sons of your father's bannermen, squires, stable boys?

title: The Climb
Name: tywin
text: tywin Of course.

title: The Climb
Name: olenna
text: olenna And you never-

title: The Climb
Name: tywin
text: tywin No.

title: The Climb
Name: olenna
text: olenna Not once? Not in any way?

title: The Climb
Name: tywin
text: tywin Never.

title: The Climb
Name: olenna
text: olenna I congratulate you upon your restraint. But it's a natural thing, two boys having a go at each other beneath the sheets.

title: The Climb
Name: tywin
text: tywin Perhaps Highgarden has a high tolerance for unnatural behavior.

title: The Climb
Name: olenna
text: olenna I wouldn't say that. True, we don't tie ourselves in knots over a discreet bit of buggery, but brothers and sisters- where I come from, that stain would be very difficult to wash out.

title: The Climb
Name: tywin
text: tywin I will not breathe further life into a malicious lie by discussing it.

title: The Climb
Name: olenna
text: olenna Lie or not, you must admit many people find it quite convincing. Convincing enough to put swords in their hands and send them off to kill Lannisters and Tyrells thanks to our new affiliation.

title: The Climb
Name: tywin
text: tywin I don't care what people believe. And neither do you.

title: The Climb
Name: olenna
text: olenna As an authority on myself, I must disagree.

title: The Climb
Name: tywin
text: tywin Now, if the rumors about my children were true, then Joffrey is no king at all and House Tyrell is throwing its prized flower into the dirt.

title: The Climb
Name: olenna
text: olenna And if Cersei is too old to give Loras children, we're throwing another prized flower into the dirt. It is a chance we simply cannot take.

title: The Climb
Name: tywin
text: tywin The uncertainty makes you uncomfortable. All right. I'll remove it for you.

title: The Climb
Name: tywin
text: tywin If you refuse to marry Loras to Cersei, I will name him to the Kingsguard. I'm sure you're familiar with the Kingsguard vows. He will never marry. He will never have children.

title: The Climb
Name: olenna
text: olenna Oh

title: The Climb
Name: tywin
text: tywin The Tyrell name will fade. And Highgarden will go to the children of Joffrey and Margaery.

title: The Climb
Name: olenna
text: olenna You would have your grandson protected by someone who disgusts you?

title: The Climb
Name: tywin
text: tywin I would have my grandson protected by a skilled warrior who takes his vows seriously. So, shall I draw up the order? Or do you consent to this marriage?

title: The Climb
Name: olenna
text: olenna It's a rare enough thing- a man who lives up to his reputation.

title: The Climb
Name: orell
text: orell No!

title: The Climb
Name: orell
text: orell We've gotta cut them loose!

title: The Climb
Name: tormund
text: tormund No!

title: The Climb
Name: jon
text: jon Take my hand!

title: The Climb
Name: sansa
text: sansa That's a wonderful pin.

title: The Climb
Name: loras
text: loras Oh, it's more of a brooch, really. Though I suppose a brooch is a sort of pin, so

title: The Climb
Name: sansa
text: sansa I'm very happy about

title: The Climb
Name: loras
text: loras Uh, yes. I-I am as well.

title: The Climb
Name: sansa
text: sansa I feel like I'm in a dream.

title: The Climb
Name: loras
text: loras Yes, me, too. Definitely. I've dreamed of a large wedding since I was quite young. The guests, the food, the tournaments. And the bride, of course. The most beautiful bride in the world in a beautiful gown of gold and green brocade with fringed sleeves. Have you ever been to Highgarden, my lady?

title: The Climb
Name: sansa
text: sansa No. I had never left Winterfell before I came to King's Landing. But it sounds wonderful. I can't wait to see it. And to leave this place.

title: The Climb
Name: loras
text: loras It's terrible, isn't it? The most terrible place there is.

title: The Climb
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion I don't suppose there's anything we can do about this.

title: The Climb
Name: cersei
text: cersei We can have them both killed.

title: The Climb
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion It's hard to say which of the four of us is getting the worst of this arrangement. Probably Sansa. Though Loras will certainly come to know a deep and singular misery.

title: The Climb
Name: cersei
text: cersei Father doesn't discriminate. We're all being shipped off to hell together.

title: The Climb
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion On a boat you built.

title: The Climb
Name: cersei
text: cersei The Tyrells were plotting to undermine our family. I did what I did to protect our family.

title: The Climb
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion I'm your family. A member of your family who has actively contributed to that family's survival. Whether or not you or Father or anyone else wants to admit it.

title: The Climb
Name: cersei
text: cersei I do admit it. If it weren't for your trick with the wildfire, Stannis would have sacked the city before Father got here. Our heads would still be rotting on the city gate.

title: The Climb
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion Trying to have me killed is an odd way of saying thank you. There are two people in King's Landing who can give an order to a Kingsguard. Did you or did you not order Ser Mandon to kill me during the Battle of the Blackwater?

title: The Climb
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion The impulse I understand. He hates me because I'm the only one who tells him what he really is. So, fair enough. He wants me dead. But his stupidity? He could have had me poisoned and no one would have known. But the king orders a Kingsguard to murder the Hand of the King in full view of his own army. The boy's an idiot.

title: The Climb
Name: cersei
text: cersei What do you want me to say?

title: The Climb
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion I want you to tell me if my life is still in danger.

title: The Climb
Name: cersei
text: cersei Probably. But not from Joffrey. He won't do anything now Father's here.

title: The Climb
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion Seven kingdoms united in fear of Tywin Lannister.

title: The Climb
Name: cersei
text: cersei Not the Tyrells. Soon they won't need to be afraid of him. Joffrey will belong to Margaery, the little doe-eyed whore. And so will his children and their children. History will be taken from our hands.

title: The Climb
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion You may escape, at least. Once Jaime gets back, Ser Loras may come down with a terrible case of sword through bowels.

title: The Climb
Name: cersei
text: cersei When Jaime gets back, yes. But when do we think that's going to be? He's out there somewhere.

title: The Climb
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion Jaime or not, I'm truly fucked.

title: The Climb
Name: cersei
text: cersei Who's going to tell her?

title: The Climb
Name: sansa
text: sansa Do you think people will like it?

title: The Climb
Name: shae
text: shae I don't think they will even notice it.

title: The Climb
Name: sansa
text: sansa You're right. It's not my wedding. Anyway, from what I can tell, the dressmakers in Highgarden will be far superior to the ones in King's Landing. They'd never make me anything as dull as this for my wedding. Loras likes green and gold brocade.

title: The Climb
Name: shae
text: shae I'm sure he does.

title: The Climb
Name: sansa
text: sansa Will they let me invite my family?

title: The Climb
Name: shae
text: shae They haven't asked my opinion.

title: The Climb
Name: sansa
text: sansa But do you think they will?

title: The Climb
Name: shae
text: shae No.

title: The Climb
Name: maid
text: maid Lady Sansa, Lord Tyrion to see you. Should I-

title: The Climb
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion I beg your pardon, my lady.

title: The Climb
Name: sansa
text: sansa Good afternoon, Lord Tyrion. I was just trying on a gown for King Joffrey's wedding.

title: The Climb
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion Yes, it should be quite a wedding. I need to speak with you, Lady Sansa.

title: The Climb
Name: sansa
text: sansa Of course.

title: The Climb
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion Alone, if I may.

title: The Climb
Name: shae
text: shae Why do you need to speak to her alone?

title: The Climb
Name: sansa
text: sansa Shae. Please excuse her, Lord Tyrion. She's not from here. But I trust her, even though she tells me not to.

title: The Climb
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion Sometimes we think we want to hear something and it's only afterwards when it's too late that we realize we wished we'd heard it under entirely different circumstances.

title: The Climb
Name: sansa
text: sansa It's all right, really.

title: The Climb
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion How to begin? It's- this- this- this is awkward.

title: The Climb
Name: varys
text: varys A thousand blades taken from the hands of Aegon's fallen enemies, forged in the fiery breath of Balerion the Dread.

title: The Climb
Name: petyr
text: petyr There aren't. There aren't even two hundred. I've counted.

title: The Climb
Name: varys
text: varys Ha, I'm sure you have. Ugly old thing. Yet it has a certain appeal. The Lysa Arryn of chairs. Shame you had to settle for your second choice.

title: The Climb
Name: petyr
text: petyr Early days, my friend. It is flattering, really, you feeling such dread at the prospect of me getting what I want.

title: The Climb
Name: varys
text: varys Thwarting you has never been my primary ambition, I promise you. Although who doesn't like to see their friends fail now and then?

title: The Climb
Name: petyr
text: petyr You're so right. For instance, when I thwarted your plan to give Sansa Stark to the Tyrells. If I'm going to be honest, I did feel an unmistakable sense of enjoyment there. But your confidant, the one who fed you information about my plans, the one you swore to protect, you didn't bring her any enjoyment. And she didn't bring me any enjoyment. She was a bad investment on my part. Luckily, I have a friend who wanted to try something new. Something daring. And he was so grateful to me for providing this fresh experience.

title: The Climb
Name: varys
text: varys I did what I did for the good of the realm.

title: The Climb
Name: petyr
text: petyr The realm? Do you know what the realm is? It's the thousand blades of Aegon's enemies. A story we agree to tell each other over and over till we forget that it's a lie.

title: The Climb
Name: varys
text: varys But what do we have left once we abandon the lie? Chaos. A gaping pit waiting to swallow us all.

title: The Climb
Name: petyr
text: petyr Chaos isn't a pit. Chaos is a ladder.

title: The Climb
Name: petyr
text: petyr Many who try to climb it fail and never get to try again. The fall breaks them.

title: The Climb
Name: petyr
text: petyr And some are given a chance to climb, but they refuse. They cling to the realm or the gods or love. Illusions. Only the ladder is real. The climb is all there is.

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: ygritte
text: ygritte How far are we?

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: jon
text: jon About a week, I think.

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: ygritte
text: ygritte You think? You don't know?

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: jon
text: jon When we went to Castle Black, we took the Kingsroad.

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: ygritte
text: ygritte You and your roads. Is that how you lot do your fighting? You march down the road banging drums and waving banners?

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: jon
text: jon Most of the time, yes.

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: ygritte
text: ygritte How do the men holding the banners fight?

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: jon
text: jon They don't, really. It's a great honor to carry your house sigil.

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: ygritte
text: ygritte And the drummers- is that a great honor, too?

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: jon
text: jon Usually it's the young boys banging the drums.

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: ygritte
text: ygritte So what good are they?

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: jon
text: jon They help the men march.

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: ygritte
text: ygritte How?

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: jon
text: jon Well, it's- it's the rhythm.

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: ygritte
text: ygritte Oh, you mean right foot, left foot, right foot, left foot, right foot? You need help remembering that? When Mance gives the signal and we hit Castle Black, we won't be banging on drums to let them know we're coming.

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: jon
text: jon No. No, you're just gonna light the biggest fire the North has ever seen to let them know you're coming.

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: ygritte
text: ygritte You know nothing, Jon Snow.

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: orell
text: orell She's right, you don't.

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: jon
text: jon I know you cut me loose on the Wall.

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: orell
text: orell Cut her loose, too. Do you see her sulking about it? That's because she understands the way things are.

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: jon
text: jon And are you gonna share it with me? The deep wisdom you found inside the head of a bird?

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: orell
text: orell People work together when it suits them. They're loyal when it suits them. They love each other when it suits them. And they kill each other when it suits them. She knows that, you don't. Which is why you'll never hold onto her.

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: brynden
text: brynden That rain will cost us another day.

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: robb
text: robb Frey will wait. He knows we're coming.

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: catelyn
text: catelyn Lord Walder is prickly by nature.

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: brynden
text: brynden Prickly? That what you call it? Might be the least pleasant man I've ever met.

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: catelyn
text: catelyn Yes, and that is why-

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: brynden
text: brynden I've seen wet shits I liked better than Walder Frey. Apologies, Your Grace. Spent too many years around lancers and pikemen.

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: talisa
text: talisa I've spent the last two years nursing wounded men, watching them bleed and die. I'm not afraid of wet shits.

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: catelyn
text: catelyn Lord Frey will take this delay as a slight.

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: edmure
text: edmure He can take it as he likes. He's getting the wedding he wanted.

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: catelyn
text: catelyn He's getting a wedding. It was a king he wanted.

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: robb
text: robb Edmure is the best match a Frey has had in the history of their house. We should all get some sleep.

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: robb
text: robb If you don't put some clothes on, I can't promise I won't attack you again.

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: talisa
text: talisa Attack. Attack.

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: robb
text: robb Who are you writing?

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: talisa
text: talisa My mother.

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: robb
text: robb Is that Valyrian?

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: talisa
text: talisa Gaaa.

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: robb
text: robb Gaaa? Say hello for me.

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: talisa
text: talisa Rytsas.

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: robb
text: robb Ritsas.

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: talisa
text: talisa That was close enough.

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: robb
text: robb Does she know her daughter's a queen?

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: talisa
text: talisa Not yet.

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: robb
text: robb That will be a surprise, I expect.

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: talisa
text: talisa Many surprises for her.

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: robb
text: robb How am I supposed to sit here planning a war when you're over there looking like that?

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: talisa
text: talisa Will you come with me one day to Volantis? When all this is over?

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: robb
text: robb I will.

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: talisa
text: talisa I promise. I know she'd love to meet you. And her grandchild.

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: robb
text: robb What, now? Are you certain?

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: talisa
text: talisa Are you angry with me?

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: robb
text: robb Angry? You're my queen.

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: talisa
text: talisa And I have your little prince or princess inside me.

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: robb
text: robb Maybe one of each.

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: talisa
text: talisa Don't get greedy.

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: talisa
text: talisa Can you leave the war for one night?

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: robb
text: robb I love you. Do you hear me? I love you.

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: tormund
text: tormund Most men fuck like dogs.

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: tormund
text: tormund No grace, no skill. A few dozen thrusts and done. You need to be patient. Give her time. Your cock shouldn't go near her till she's slick as a baby seal. And then you go inside, but slowly. Don't jam it in like you're spearing a pig. Come on! Hey, come on.

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: orell
text: orell You think he loves you, is that it? What did he tell you? He's gonna make you his lady and live with you in some castle?

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: ygritte
text: ygritte No, he didn't tell me anything. He barely talks.

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: orell
text: orell I've seen you two whispering in the night, giggling like a pair of girls.

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: ygritte
text: ygritte What, you're jealous?

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: orell
text: orell Of course I'm jealous. You should be with one of your own.

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: ygritte
text: ygritte And you're one of my own? I've never heard a kind word from your mouth.

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: orell
text: orell You would if you were mine. I'd tell you that you're beautiful and fierce and wild. I'd be good to you. You love him?

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: orell
text: orell Cause he's pretty? Is that it? You like his pretty hair and his pretty eyes? You think pretty is gonna make you happy?

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: ygritte
text: ygritte Don't touch me.

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: orell
text: orell You won't love him so much when you find out what he really is.

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: sansa
text: sansa Growing up at Winterfell, all I ever wanted was to escape, to come here to the capital. See the southern knights and their painted armor and King's Landing after dark- all the candles burning in all those windows. I'm stupid. A stupid little girl with stupid dreams who never learns.

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: margaery
text: margaery Come on. Come walk with me.

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: margaery
text: margaery I remember the first time I saw you in the throne room. I'd never seen anyone who looked so unhappy. I want very much for you to be happy, Sansa, and so does my grandmother.

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: margaery
text: margaery You would have been happy at Highgarden. But women in our position must make the best of our circumstances.

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: sansa
text: sansa How do I make the best of my circumstances? I have to marry him.

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: margaery
text: margaery Has Lord Tyrion mistreated you?

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: sansa
text: sansa No.

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: margaery
text: margaery Has he been kind to you?

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: sansa
text: sansa He's tried.

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: margaery
text: margaery You don't want him, though.

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: sansa
text: sansa He's a Lannister.

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: margaery
text: margaery Far from the worst Lannister, wouldn't you say?

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: sansa
text: sansa I'm sorry. Here I am complaining to you.

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: margaery
text: margaery My son will be king Sons learn from their mothers. I plan to teach mine a great deal. And your son, if I'm not mistaken, your son might be the Lord of Casterly Rock and the North someday. What?

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: sansa
text: sansa My son with him. I'll have to- we'll have to-

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: margaery
text: margaery If it's the pain you're worried about-

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: sansa
text: sansa I'm not afraid of the pain. Not after what Joffrey's done to me.

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: margaery
text: margaery What is it, then? He's rather good-looking even with the scar. Especially with the scar.

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: sansa
text: sansa He's a dwarf. And Loras- Loras.

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: margaery
text: margaery Some women like tall men. Some like short men. Some like hairy men. Some like bald men. Gentle men, rough men, ugly men, pretty men, pretty girls. Most women don't know what they like until they've tried it. And, sadly, so many of us get to try so little before we're old and gray. Tyrion may surprise you. From what I've heard, he's quite experienced.

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: sansa
text: sansa And that's a good thing?

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: margaery
text: margaery It can be. We're very complicated, you know. Pleasing us takes practice.

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: sansa
text: sansa How do you know all this? Did your mother teach you?

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: margaery
text: margaery Yes, sweet girl. My mother taught me.

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion She's a child.

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: bronn
text: bronn She's a foot taller than you.

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion A tall child.

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: bronn
text: bronn What's the youngest you've ever had?

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion Not that young.

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: bronn
text: bronn How much older?

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion Older.

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: bronn
text: bronn You're a lord, she's a lady. And a beauty at that. I don't see the problem.

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion Shae isn't going to like it.

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: bronn
text: bronn Shae is a whore. Are you gonna marry her? Eh? How did marrying a whore work out for you the first time?

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion I should never have told you about that.

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: bronn
text: bronn You want Shae, keep her. Wed one and bed the other. All you have to do is get a son in the Stark girl. He'll be Lord of Winterfell one day. You can rule the North in his name. You'll have two women and a whole kingdom of your own.

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion Two women to despise me and a whole kingdom to join them.

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: bronn
text: bronn You waste time trying to get people to love you, you'll end up the most popular dead man in town. You want to fuck that Stark girl. You just don't want to admit it.

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion I don't pay you to put evil notions in my head. The ones already there don't need company.

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: bronn
text: bronn You pay me to kill people who bother you. Evil notions come free.

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: tywin
text: tywin Your Grace.

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: joffrey
text: joffrey Grandfather.

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
