Name: tywin
text: tywin You wanted to speak to me?

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: joffrey
text: joffrey Yes. I'd like a report on the meetings of my small council.

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: tywin
text: tywin You're welcome to attend the meetings of your small council, Your Grace. Any or all of them.

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: joffrey
text: joffrey I've been very busy. Many important matters require a king's attention.

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: tywin
text: tywin Of course.

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: joffrey
text: joffrey You've been holding the council meetings in the Tower of the Hand instead of the small council chamber.

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: tywin
text: tywin I have, yes.

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: joffrey
text: joffrey May I ask why?

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: tywin
text: tywin The Tower of the Hand is where I work. To walk from there to here would take time, time I could otherwise spend productively.

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: joffrey
text: joffrey So if I wanted to attend a council meeting, I would now have to climb all the stairs in the Tower of the Hand?

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: tywin
text: tywin We could arrange to have you carried.

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: joffrey
text: joffrey Tell me about the Targaryen girl in the east and her dragons.

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: tywin
text: tywin Where did you hear about this?

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: joffrey
text: joffrey Is it true?

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: tywin
text: tywin Apparently so.

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: joffrey
text: joffrey Don't you think we ought to do something about it?

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: tywin
text: tywin When I was Hand of the King under your father's predecessor, the skulls of all the Targaryen dragons were kept in this room. The skull of the last of them was right here. It was the size of an apple.

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: joffrey
text: joffrey And the biggest was the size of a carriage.

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: tywin
text: tywin Yes, and the creature to whom it belonged died 300 years ago. Curiosities on the far side of the world are no threat to us.

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: joffrey
text: joffrey But how do we know these dragons are just curiosities and not the beasts that brought the whole world to heel?

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: tywin
text: tywin Because we have been told as much by the many experts who serve the realm by counseling the king on matters about which he knows nothing.

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: joffrey
text: joffrey But I haven't been counseled.

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: tywin
text: tywin You are being counseled at this very moment.

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: joffrey
text: joffrey I should be consulted about such things.

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: tywin
text: tywin From now on, I will see to it that you are appropriately consulted on important matters whenever necessary. Your Grace.

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: jorah
text: jorah Yunkai. The Yellow City.

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: barristan
text: barristan The Yunkish train bed slaves, not soldiers. We can defeat them.

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: jorah
text: jorah On the field, with ease. But they won't meet us on the field. They have provisions, patience, and strong walls. If they're wise, they'll hide behind those walls and chip away at us, man by man.

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys I don't want half my army killed before I've crossed the Narrow Sea.

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: jorah
text: jorah We don't need Yunkai, khaleesi. Taking this city will not bring you any closer to Westeros or the Iron Throne.

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys How many slaves are there in Yunkai?

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: jorah
text: jorah Two hundred thousand if not more.

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys Then we have Two hundred thousand reasons to take the city.

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys Send a man to the city gates. Tell the slavers I will receive them here, and accept their surrender. Otherwise, Yunkai will suffer the same fate as Astapor.

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: missandei
text: missandei Now comes the noble Razdal mo Eraz of that ancient and honorable house, master of men and speaker to savages, to offer terms of peace.

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: missandei
text: missandei Noble lord, you are in the presence of Daenerys Stormborn of House Targaryen, Queen of the Andals and the First Men, Khaleesi of the Great Grass Sea, Breaker of Chains, and Mother of Dragons.

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys You may approach. Sit.

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: missandei
text: missandei Will the noble lord take refreshment?

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: radzal
text: radzal Ancient and glorious is Yunkai. Our empire was old before dragons stirred in old Valyria. Many an army has broken against our walls. You shall find no easy conquest here, khaleesi.

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys Good. My Unsullied need practice. I was told to blood them early.

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: radzal
text: radzal If blood is your desire, blood shall flow. But why? 'Tis true you have committed savageries in Astapor. But the Yunkai are a forgiving and generous people.

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: radzal
text: radzal The wise masters of Yunkai have sent a gift for the silver queen.

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: radzal
text: radzal There is far more than this awaiting you on the deck of your ship.

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys My ship?

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: radzal
text: radzal Yes, khaleesi. As I said, we are a generous people. You shall have as many ships as you require.

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys And what do you ask in return?

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: radzal
text: radzal All we ask is that you make use of these ships. Sail them back to Westeros where you belong and leave us to conduct our affairs in peace.

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys I have a gift for you as well. Your life.

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: radzal
text: radzal My life?

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys And the lives of your wise masters. But I also want something in return. You will release every slave in Yunkai. Every man, woman, and child shall be given as much food, clothing, and property as they can carry as payment for their years of servitude. Reject this gift, and I shall show you no mercy.

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: radzal
text: radzal You are mad. We are not Astapor or Qarth. We are Yunkai and we have powerful friends. Friends who would take great pleasure in destroying you. Those who survive, we shall enslave once more. Perhaps we'll make a slave of you as well.

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: radzal
text: radzal You swore me safe conduct.

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys I did, but my dragons made no promises. And you threatened their mother.

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: radzal
text: radzal Take the gold.

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys My gold. You gave it to me, remember? And I shall put it to good use. You'd be wise to do the same with my gift to you. Now get out.

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: barristan
text: barristan The Yunkish are a proud people. They will not bend.

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys And what happens to things that don't bend? He said he had powerful friends. Who was he talking about?

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: jorah
text: jorah I don't know.

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys Find out.

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: shae
text: shae Chains?

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion Solid gold from the mines outside Lannisport. Smithed in Casterly Rock.

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: shae
text: shae Golden chains.

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion You could buy a ship with these.

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: shae
text: shae Do I need a ship?

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion What?

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: shae
text: shae Am I going somewhere?

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion Of course you're not going anywhere.

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: shae
text: shae So, am I invited to your wedding?

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion I didn't ask for this marriage. I didn't want it.

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: shae
text: shae No? She's a beautiful girl. You said so yourself.

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion That doesn't mean that- this is duty, not desire.

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: shae
text: shae Is that what you will tell yourself when you fuck her?

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion I don't have a choice. My father-

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: shae
text: shae Does not rule the world. We can still go across the Narrow Sea.

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion What would I do there? Juggle? I am a Lannister of Casterly Rock.

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: shae
text: shae And I'm Shae the funny whore.

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion My feelings for you have not changed. I will marry Sansa Stark and do my duty by her.

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: shae
text: shae While I empty her chamber pot and lick your cock when you're bored?

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion I swear to you it will not be like that.

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair

text: osha You don't know. None of you know. None of you have been up there. I had a man once. A good man. Bruni, his name was. I was his and he was mine. But one night Bruni disappears. People said he left me, but I knew him. He'd never leave me. Not for long.

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: osha
text: osha I knew he'd come back. And he did. He came in through the back of the hut. Only it wasn't Bruni. Not really. His skin was pale like a dead man's. His eyes bluer than clear sky. He came at me, grabbed me by the neck and squeezed so hard I could feel the life slipping out of me. I don't know how I got the knife. When I did, I stuck it deep into his heart. And he hardly seemed to notice. I had to burn our hut down with him inside. I didn't ask the gods what it meant. I didn't need to. I already knew. It meant the North was no place for men to be. Not anymore. I promised your maester I'd get you to Castle Black and no further.

title: Second Sons

title: Second Sons
Name: barristan
text: barristan Men who fight for gold have neither honor nor loyalty. They cannot be trusted.

title: Second Sons

title: Second Sons
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys You know these men?

title: Second Sons
Name: jorah
text: jorah Only by the broken swords on their banners. They're called the Second Sons. A company led by a Braavosi named Mero, "The Titan's Bastard."

Name: jorah

Name: daenerys

title: Second Sons
Name: daenerys

title: Second Sons
Name: daenerys

Name: jorah

title: Second Sons
Name: barristan

title: Second Sons
Name: daario

Name: mero

title: Second Sons
Name: jorah

title: Second Sons
Name: mero

Name: daenerys
text: daenerys We have no slaves here.

title: Second Sons
Name: mero

title: Second Sons
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys Give me your Second Sons and I may not have you gelded. Ser Barristan, how many men fight for the Second Sons?

title: Second Sons
Name: barristan

title: Second Sons
Name: daenerys

title: Second Sons
Name: barristan

title: Second Sons
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys I'm only a young girl, new to the ways of war, but perhaps a seasoned captain like yourself can explain to me how you propose to defeat us.

title: Second Sons
Name: daario
text: daario I hope the old man is better with a sword than he is with a lie. You have eight thousand Unsullied.

title: Second Sons
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys You're very young to be a captain.

title: Second Sons
Name: prendahl
text: prendahl He's not a captain. He's a lieutenant.

title: Second Sons
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys Even if your numbers are right, you must admit the odds don't favor your side.

title: Second Sons
Name: mero

title: Second Sons
Name: jorah
text: jorah The Second Sons have faced worse odds and run.

title: Second Sons
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys Or you could fight for me.

title: Second Sons
Name: mero
text: mero We've taken the slavers' gold. We fight for Yunkai.

title: Second Sons
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys I would pay you as much and more.

title: Second Sons
Name: prendahl
text: prendahl Our contract is our bond. If we break our bond, no one will hire the Second Sons again.

title: Second Sons
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys Ride with me and you'll never need another contract. You'll have gold and castles and lordships of your choosing when I take back the Seven Kingdoms.

title: Second Sons
Name: daario
text: daario You have no ships. You have no siege weapons. You have no cavalry.

title: Second Sons
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys A fortnight ago, I had no army. A year ago, I had no dragons. You have two days to decide.

title: Second Sons
Name: mero
text: mero Show me your cunt. I want to see if it's worth fighting for.

title: Second Sons
Name: grey
text: grey My Queen, shall I slice out his tongue for you?

title: Second Sons
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys These men are our guests. You seem to be enjoying my wine. Perhaps you'd like a flagon to help you ponder.

title: Second Sons
Name: mero
text: mero Only a flagon? And what are my brothers in arms to drink?

title: Second Sons
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys A barrel, then.

title: Second Sons
Name: mero
text: mero Good. The Titan's Bastard does not drink alone. In the Second Sons, we share everything. After the battle, maybe we'll all share you.

title: Second Sons
Name: mero
text: mero I'll come looking for you when this is over.

title: Second Sons
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys Ser Barristan, if it comes to battle, kill that one first.

title: Second Sons
Name: barristan
text: barristan Gladly, Your Grace.

title: Second Sons
Name: stannis
text: stannis Half Robert, half lowborn.

title: Second Sons
Name: melisandre
text: melisandre Show the boy to his chambers. Have the maids draw him a bath and find him some decent clothes. I'll come visit you soon.

title: Second Sons
Name: stannis
text: stannis What do you mean to do with him?

title: Second Sons
Name: melisandre
text: melisandre You know what I mean to do with him.

title: Second Sons
Name: stannis
text: stannis Then why bathe him and dress him in fine clothes? If it needs to be done, do it. Don't torture the boy.

title: Second Sons
Name: melisandre
text: melisandre Have you ever slaughtered a lamb, my king?

title: Second Sons
Name: stannis
text: stannis No.

title: Second Sons
Name: melisandre
text: melisandre If the lamb sees the knife, she panics. Her panic seeps into her meat, darkens it, fouls the flavor.

title: Second Sons
Name: stannis
text: stannis You've slaughtered many lambs?

title: Second Sons
Name: melisandre
text: melisandre And none have seen the blade.

title: Second Sons
Name: davos
text: davos And tho- and thowg V-v-visenya Targaryen rod- rode Vhagar- Vhag-' Fuck me. 'Visenya Targaryen rode Vhagar, the smallest of the dragons, though still large enog- enough- enough to swallow a horse whole.

title: Second Sons
Name: davos
text: davos Your Grace.

title: Second Sons
Name: stannis
text: stannis They feeding you enough?

title: Second Sons
Name: davos
text: davos Two meals a day. Cold for breakfast, hot for supper. I cannot complain.

title: Second Sons
Name: stannis
text: stannis You don't belong in a place like this.

title: Second Sons
Name: davos
text: davos Well, it's sad to say, but I've seen worse.

title: Second Sons
Name: stannis
text: stannis Yeah.

title: Second Sons
Name: davos
text: davos I'm sorry about your son. Didn't get the chance to tell you before. Good lad. Loyal lad.

title: Second Sons
Name: stannis
text: stannis Melisandre's returned.

title: Second Sons
Name: davos
text: davos I didn't know she'd been gone.

title: Second Sons
Name: stannis
text: stannis Came back with a bastard boy. Robert's bastard boy.

title: Second Sons
Name: davos
text: davos Why?

title: Second Sons
Name: stannis

title: Second Sons
Name: davos
text: davos She's going to kill him.

title: Second Sons
Name: stannis
text: stannis Sacrifice him.

title: Second Sons
Name: davos
text: davos Forgive me, Your Grace, I'm not a learned man, but is there a difference between kill and sacrifice? The boy is your nephew.

title: Second Sons
Name: stannis
text: stannis What of it? We're at war. Why should I spare the son of some tavern slut Robert bedded one drunken night?

title: Second Sons
Name: davos
text: davos Because he has your blood in his veins.

title: Second Sons
Name: stannis
text: stannis So did Renly.

title: Second Sons
Name: davos
text: davos Renly wronged you. Renly declared himself king when the throne belonged to you. He raised an army, stole your bannermen. This boy has done you no harm. He's an innocent.

title: Second Sons
Name: stannis
text: stannis How many boys live in Westeros? How many girls? How many men? How many women?The darkness will devour them all, she says. The night that never ends. Unless I triumph. I never asked for this. No more than I asked to be king. We do not choose our destiny, but we must do our duty, no? Great or small, we must do our duty. What's one bastard boy against a kingdom?

title: Second Sons
Name: davos
text: davos Your Grace, why did you come to see me today?

title: Second Sons
Name: stannis
text: stannis I came to free you. If you swear never to raise your hand to the Lady Melisandre again.

title: Second Sons
Name: davos
text: davos I swear it. I can't swear never to speak against her.

title: Second Sons
Name: stannis
text: stannis You have little regard for your own life.

title: Second Sons
Name: davos
text: davos Quite little, Your Grace. Verging on none. You could have freed me yesterday or tomorrow, but you came to me now before this boy is put to the knife because you knew I'd counsel restraint. You came to hear me say it because you believe it yourself. You're not a man who slaughters innocents for gain or glory. When my son was five he said to me, 'I don't ever want to die. ' I wanted to say to him, 'You won't, child. You won't ever.' I hated the idea of him lying awake in the dark, afraid. I think mothers and fathers made up the gods because they wanted their children to sleep through the night.

title: Second Sons
Name: stannis
text: stannis I saw a vision in the flames. A great battle in the snow. I saw it. And you saw whatever she gave birth to. I never believed, but when you see the truth, when it's right there in front of you as real as these iron bars, how can you deny her god is real?

title: Second Sons
Name: prendahl
text: prendahl Little dragon bitch. She talks too much.

title: Second Sons
Name: daario
text: daario You talk too much.

title: Second Sons
Name: mero

title: Second Sons

Name: mero
text: mero My cock will find a way. Tell him. Is there any place that my cock can't reach?

title: Second Sons
Name: mero
text: mero Daario Naharis, the whore who doesn't like whores.

title: Second Sons
Name: daario
text: daario I like them very much. I just refuse to pay them. And I'm no whore, my friend.

title: Second Sons
Name: mero
text: mero She sells her sheath and you sell your blade. What's the difference?

title: Second Sons
Name: daario
text: daario I fight for beauty.

title: Second Sons
Name: prendahl
text: prendahl For beauty?

title: Second Sons
Name: mero
text: mero We fight for gold.

title: Second Sons
Name: daario
text: daario The gods gave men two gifts to entertain ourselves before we die- the thrill of fucking a woman who wants to be fucked and the thrill of killing a man who wants to kill you.

title: Second Sons
Name: mero
text: mero You'll die young.

title: Second Sons
Name: prendahl
text: prendahl What do we do about the dragon girl? We can't beat eight thousand Unsullied on the battlefield.

title: Second Sons
Name: mero
text: mero There won't be a battle. And we don't have to deal with her eunuchs. We only have to deal with her.

title: Second Sons
Name: prendahl
text: prendahl She's well guarded.

title: Second Sons
Name: mero
text: mero Tonight's a new moon. One of us slips into her camp past her Unsullied and her knights.

title: Second Sons
Name: prendahl
text: prendahl Which one of us?

title: Second Sons
Name: mero
text: mero Close your eyes, love.

title: Second Sons
Name: mero
text: mero Three coins. A coin from Meereen, a coin from Volantis, and a coin from Braavos. The Braavosi does the deed. One for each of us, darling. No peeking.

title: Second Sons
Name: daario
text: daario Do you hear me? Follow my voice. I'm right here.

title: Second Sons
Name: daario
text: daario You have something for me?

title: Second Sons
Name: daario
text: daario Valar morghulis.

title: Second Sons
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion Lady Sansa.

title: Second Sons
Name: sansa
text: sansa You look very handsome, my lord.

title: Second Sons
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion Oh, yes. The husband of your dreams. But you do look glorious. Perhaps we could have a moment alone. Do you mind? Podrick, could you escort Lady Stark's handmaiden?

title: Second Sons
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion My lady, I want you to know I didn't ask for this.

title: Second Sons
Name: sansa
text: sansa I hope I will not disappoint you, my lord.

title: Second Sons
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion No, don't. You don't have to speak to me as a prisoner anymore. You won't be a prisoner after today. You'll be my wife. I suppose that's a different kind of prison. I just wanted to say- I'm just trying to say, very badly- I just- just want to say I know how you feel.

title: Second Sons
Name: sansa
text: sansa I doubt that very much, my lord.

title: Second Sons
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion You're right. I have no idea how you feel. And you have no idea how I feel.

title: Second Sons
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion But I promise you one thing, my lady. I won't ever hurt you. Do you drink wine?

title: Second Sons
Name: sansa
text: sansa When I have to.

title: Second Sons
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion Well, today you have to.

title: Second Sons
Name: margaery
text: margaery You look radiant, Your Grace.

title: Second Sons
Name: cersei
text: cersei Radiant? Why radiant?

title: Second Sons
Name: margaery
text: margaery It's the word that came to mind.

title: Second Sons
Name: margaery
text: margaery We're going to be sisters soon. We should be friends.

title: Second Sons
Name: cersei
text: cersei You're a musical girl, aren't you? I imagine you have a lovely voice.

title: Second Sons
Name: margaery
text: margaery A better dancer than a singer, I'm afraid.

title: Second Sons
Name: cersei
text: cersei Ah, but you know the song 'The Rains of Castamere'?

title: Second Sons
Name: margaery
text: margaery Of course. They play it so often here at court.

title: Second Sons
Name: cersei
text: cersei So you know the story of House Reyne of Castamere?

title: Second Sons
Name: margaery
text: margaery Not as well as you, I'm sure.

title: Second Sons
Name: cersei
text: cersei House Reyne was a powerful family. Very wealthy. The second wealthiest in Westeros. Aren't the Tyrells the second wealthiest family in Westeros now?

title: Second Sons
Name: cersei
text: cersei Of course, ambitious climbers don't want to stop on the second highest rung. If only you could take that final step, you'd see further than all the rest. You'd be alone with nothing but blue sky above you. So Lord Reyne built a castle as grand as Casterly Rock. He gave his wife diamonds larger than any my mother ever wore. And finally one day, he rebelled against my father. Do you know where House Reyne is now?

title: Second Sons
Name: margaery
text: margaery Gone.

title: Second Sons
Name: cersei
text: cersei Gone. A gentle word. Why not say slaughtered? Every man, woman, and child put to the sword.

title: Second Sons
Name: cersei
text: cersei I remember seeing their bodies hanging high above the gates of Casterly Rock. My father let them rot up there all summer. It was a long summer. 'And now the rains weep o'er their halls, and not a soul to hear.'

title: Second Sons
Name: cersei
text: cersei If you ever call me sister again, I'll have you strangled in your sleep.

title: Second Sons
Name: sansa
text: sansa What are you doing?

title: Second Sons
Name: joffrey
text: joffrey Your father's gone. As the father of the realm, it is my duty to give you away to your husband.

title: Second Sons
Name: septon
text: septon You may now cloak the bride and bring her under your protection.

title: Second Sons
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion Could you-

title: Second Sons
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion Thank you.

title: Second Sons
Name: septon
text: septon Your Grace, Your Grace, my lords, my ladies, we stand here in the sight of gods and men to witness the union of man and wife. One flesh, one heart, one soul, now and forever.

title: Second Sons
Name: melisandre
text: melisandre Have you ever seen one like it?

title: Second Sons
Name: gendry
text: gendry I've never seen anything like any of this. Not in my life.

title: Second Sons
Name: melisandre
text: melisandre It's shocking, isn't it, the first time you encounter real wealth? When I was your age, I lived on one bowl of stew a day. And stew is a kind word for it.

title: Second Sons
Name: gendry
text: gendry In Flea Bottom we called them bowls of brown. We'd pretend that the meat in them was chicken. We knew it wasn't chicken.

title: Second Sons
Name: melisandre
text: melisandre Here, taste this.

title: Second Sons
Name: melisandre
text: melisandre You think I'm trying to poison you?

title: Second Sons
Name: gendry
text: gendry That's good.

title: Second Sons
Name: gendry
text: gendry That's really good.

title: Second Sons
Name: melisandre
text: melisandre Where do you think it's from?

title: Second Sons
Name: gendry
text: gendry I couldn't even guess.

title: Second Sons
Name: melisandre
text: melisandre Doesn't matter, does it? It's the real thing or it's not. You only need a tongue to tell the difference. Go on, have some more. You still don't trust it. You think this is all a mistake and that you'll have to pay somehow for every bite you take.

title: Second Sons
Name: gendry
text: gendry That thought had crossed my mind, yeah.

title: Second Sons
Name: melisandre
text: melisandre There are no mistakes. Not for us.

title: Second Sons
Name: gendry
text: gendry I'm a mistake. I'm only here because my father grabbed my mother instead of the girl next to her in the tavern.

title: Second Sons
Name: melisandre
text: melisandre Your father chose your mother because the Lord of Light willed it. He willed it so you could be here right now with a power inside you you can't even begin to understand. And He brought me here to draw it from you and birth it into the world. We're both a part of His plan. He wants this for us. No, He demands this of us.

title: Second Sons
Name: gendry
text: gendry I don't understand. This- this doesn't seem very religious.

title: Second Sons
Name: melisandre
text: melisandre According to whom? The Silent Sisters? With their stern looks, muzzled mouths, and dried-up cunts? What have their gods done for you? Hmm? When you pray to them, what's their answer? A god is real or he's not. You only need eyes to see.

title: Second Sons
Name: melisandre
text: melisandre Death is coming for everyone and everything. A darkness that will swallow the dawn. And we can stop it, you and I.

title: Second Sons
Name: melisandre
text: melisandre Let me show you what you have inside you. Come fight death with me.

title: Second Sons
Name: gendry
text: gendry What are you doing?

title: Second Sons
Name: melisandre
text: melisandre You have to trust me.

title: Second Sons
Name: gendry
text: gendry What-? Get it away. Get it off me.

title: Second Sons
Name: melisandre
text: melisandre Don't fight, don't fight. They won't take much.

title: Second Sons
Name: gendry
text: gendry Why are you doing this?

title: Second Sons
Name: melisandre
text: melisandre I told you there's power in the blood of kings. And you have so much blood.

title: Second Sons
Name: gendry
text: gendry No. No, no, no, no! Not there. Not there!

title: Second Sons
Name: melisandre
text: melisandre You can blame Ser Davos. He didn't believe in the power of king's blood. He wanted a demonstration.

title: Second Sons
Name: gendry
text: gendry Please. Please, Your Grace. My lord!

title: Second Sons
Name: stannis
text: stannis The usurper Robb Stark. The usurper Balon Greyjoy. The usurper Joffrey Baratheon.

title: Second Sons
Name: olenna
text: olenna So their son will be your nephew. After you're wed to Cersei, of course. And you will be the king's stepfather and brother-in-law. When you marry the king, Joffrey's mother will become his sister-in-law and your son will be Loras' nephew? Grandson? I'm not sure. But your brother will become your father-in-law. That much is beyond dispute.

title: Second Sons
Name: sansa
text: sansa Will you pardon me, my lord?

title: Second Sons
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion Of course. Of course. En-enjoy.

title: Second Sons
Name: cersei
text: cersei Perhaps you could talk to your bride-to-be instead.

title: Second Sons
Name: joffrey
text: joffrey I've got a lifetime for that.

title: Second Sons
Name: cersei
text: cersei Stay.

title: Second Sons
Name: tywin
text: tywin You seem rather drunk.

title: Second Sons
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion Rather less than I plan to be. Isn't it a man's duty to be drunk at his own wedding?

title: Second Sons
Name: tywin
text: tywin This isn't about your wedding. Renly Baratheon had a wedding. Your wife needs a child, a Lannister child, as soon as possible.

title: Second Sons
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion And?

title: Second Sons
Name: tywin
text: tywin If you're going to give her one, you need to perform.

title: Second Sons
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion What did you once call me? A drunken little lust-filled beast.

title: Second Sons
Name: tywin
text: tywin More than once.

title: Second Sons
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion There you have it. Nothing to worry about. Drinking and lust, no man can match me in these things. I am the god of tits and wine. I shall build a shrine to myself at the next brothel I visit.

title: Second Sons
Name: tywin
text: tywin You can drink, you can joke, you can engage in juvenile attempts to make your father uncomfortable, but you will do your duty.

title: Second Sons
Name: loras
text: loras Well, my father once told me-

title: Second Sons
Name: cersei
text: cersei Nobody cares what your father once told you.

title: Second Sons
Name: joffrey
text: joffrey Congratulations, my lady.

title: Second Sons
Name: sansa
text: sansa Thank you, Your Grace.

title: Second Sons
Name: joffrey
text: joffrey Well, you've done it. You've married a Lannister. Soon you'll have a Lannister baby. It's a dream come true for you, isn't it? What a glorious day.

title: Second Sons
Name: sansa
text: sansa Yes, Your Grace.

title: Second Sons
Name: joffrey
text: joffrey I suppose it doesn't really matter which Lannister puts the baby into you. Maybe I'll pay you a visit tonight after my uncle passes out. How'd you like that?

title: Second Sons
Name: joffrey
text: joffrey You wouldn't? That's all right. Ser Meryn and Ser Boros will hold you down.

title: Second Sons
Name: joffrey
text: joffrey Time for the bedding ceremony.

title: Second Sons
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion There will be no bedding ceremony.

title: Second Sons
Name: joffrey
text: joffrey Where's your respect for tradition, Uncle? Come, everyone. Pick her up and carry her to her wedding bed. Get rid of her gown. She won't be needing it any longer. Ladies, attend to my uncle. He's not heavy.

title: Second Sons
Name: joffrey
text: joffrey There will be if I command it.

title: Second Sons
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion Then you'll be fucking your own bride with a wooden cock.

title: Second Sons
Name: joffrey
text: joffrey What did you say? What did you say?

title: Second Sons
Name: tywin
text: tywin I believe we can dispense with the bedding, Your Grace. I'm sure Tyrion did not mean to threaten the king.

title: Second Sons
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion A bad joke, Your Grace. Made out of envy of your own royal manhood. Mine is so small. My poor wife won't even know I'm there.

title: Second Sons
Name: tywin
text: tywin Your uncle is clearly quite drunk, Your Grace.

title: Second Sons
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion I am. Guilty. But- but it is my wedding night.

title: Second Sons
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion My tiny drunk cock and I have a job to do. Come, wife.

title: Second Sons
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion I vomited on a girl once in the middle of the act. Not proud of it. But I think honesty is important between a man and wife, don't you agree? Come, I'll tell you all about it. Put you in the mood.

title: Second Sons
Name: sansa
text: sansa Is that wise, my lord?

title: Second Sons
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion Tyrion, Sansa. My name is Tyrion.

title: Second Sons
Name: sansa
text: sansa Is that wise, Tyrion?

title: Second Sons
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion Nothing was ever wiser.

title: Second Sons
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion Astoundingly long.

title: Second Sons
Name: sansa
text: sansa What?

title: Second Sons
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion Neck. You have one. How old are you exactly?

title: Second Sons
Name: sansa
text: sansa Fourteen.

title: Second Sons
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion Well, talk won't make you any older. My lord father has commanded me to consummate this marriage.

title: Second Sons
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion Stop. I can't. I could, I won't.

title: Second Sons
Name: sansa
text: sansa But your father-

title: Second Sons
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion If my father wants someone to get fucked, I know where he can start. I won't share your bed. Not until you want me to.

title: Second Sons
Name: sansa
text: sansa What if I never want you to?

title: Second Sons
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion And so my watch begins.

title: Second Sons
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys Ninteen

title: Second Sons
Name: missandei
text: missandei Yes, Your Grace.

title: Second Sons
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys How can anyone speak nineteen languages?

title: Second Sons
Name: missandei
text: missandei It only took Your Grace a year to learn Dothraki reasonably well.

title: Second Sons
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys Yes, well, it was either learn Dothraki or grunt at my husband and hope- what do you mean reasonably well?

title: Second Sons
Name: missandei
text: missandei Dothraki is difficult for the mouth to master. So guttural and harsh.

title: Second Sons
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys Drogo said I spoke Dothroaki like one born to it. It gave him great pride.

title: Second Sons
Name: missandei
text: missandei Athjahakar.

title: Second Sons
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys Athjahaka.

title: Second Sons

text: missandei Ath-ja-hakar.

title: Second Sons
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys Athjahakar.

title: Second Sons
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys Well, I suppose I'm a bit out of practice.

title: Second Sons
Name: missandei
text: missandei Your High Valyrian is very good, Your Grace. The gods could not devise a more perfect tongue. It is the only proper language for poetry.

title: Second Sons
Name: daario
text: daario No screaming or she dies.

title: Second Sons
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys What do you want?

title: Second Sons
Name: daario
text: daario You.

title: Second Sons
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys Let her go.

title: Second Sons
Name: daario
text: daario Don't scream, lovely girl.

title: Second Sons
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys You were sent here to kill me?

title: Second Sons
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys So why haven't you?

title: Second Sons
Name: daario
text: daario I don't want to.

title: Second Sons
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys What do your captains have to say about that?

title: Second Sons
Name: daario
text: daario You should ask them.

title: Second Sons
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys Why?

title: Second Sons
Name: daario
text: daario We had philosophical differences.

title: Second Sons
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys Over what?

title: Second Sons
Name: daario
text: daario Your beauty. It meant more to me than it did to them.

title: Second Sons
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys You're a strange man.

title: Second Sons
Name: daario
text: daario I'm the simplest man you'll ever meet. I only do what I want to do.

title: Second Sons
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys And this is supposed to impress me?

title: Second Sons
Name: daario
text: daario Yes.

title: Second Sons
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys Why would I trust a man who murders his comrades?

title: Second Sons
Name: daario
text: daario They ordered me to murder you. I told them I preferred not to. They told me I had no choice. I told them I am Daario Naharis. I always have a choice. They drew their swords and I drew mine.

title: Second Sons
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys Will you fight for me?

title: Second Sons
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys Swear to me.

title: Second Sons
Name: daario
text: daario The Second Sons are yours and so is Daario Naharis. My sword is yours, my life is yours, my heart is yours.

title: Second Sons
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion You really ought to knock.

title: Second Sons
Name: shae
text: shae I brought your breakfast.

title: Second Sons
Name: sam
text: sam It's getting dark. We could stay here for the night.

title: Second Sons
Name: sam
text: sam How hard can it be to build a fire?

title: Second Sons
Name: gilly
text: gilly It doesn't matter. Come under the furs. We can keep each other warm.

title: Second Sons
Name: sam
text: sam He winked at me before.

title: Second Sons
Name: gilly
text: gilly I doubt it.

title: Second Sons
Name: sam
text: sam I saw him wink at me.

title: Second Sons
Name: gilly
text: gilly He blinked.

title: Second Sons
Name: sam
text: sam I suppose it's a rather philosophical difference between a wink and a blink.

title: Second Sons
Name: gilly
text: gilly A what?

title: Second Sons
Name: sam
text: sam Well, I mean, there's no real difference.

title: Second Sons
Name: gilly
text: gilly A wink is on purpose.

title: Second Sons
Name: sam
text: sam You thought of a name yet? It would be easier to refer to him if he had a name.

title: Second Sons
Name: gilly
text: gilly Sometimes do you talk fancy on purpose to confuse me?

title: Second Sons
Name: sam
text: sam What? No. This is just the way I talk.

title: Second Sons
Name: gilly
text: gilly I'll build that fire.

title: Second Sons
Name: sam
text: sam Don't you think he should have a name?

title: Second Sons
Name: gilly
text: gilly I don't know many boys' names.

title: Second Sons
Name: sam
text: sam Let's see, there's Duncan, Kevan, Jo,n Guymon, Feldan, Tristifer.

title: Second Sons
Name: gilly
text: gilly Craster.

title: Second Sons
Name: sam
text: sam Uh, yes. Maybe that's not-

title: Second Sons
Name: gilly
text: gilly Mormont.

title: Second Sons
Name: sam
text: sam That's a lovely idea, but Mormont's a last name.

title: Second Sons
Name: gilly
text: gilly Why is it a last name?

title: Second Sons
Name: sam
text: sam Well, it's a family name. For instance, I'm Samwell Tarly. Samwell is my birth name and Tarly is my family name. You see? So my father is also a Tarly.

title: Second Sons
Name: gilly
text: gilly His name is Samwell Tarly, too?

title: Second Sons
Name: sam
text: sam No, Randyll Tarly.

title: Second Sons
Name: gilly
text: gilly Randyll is a handsome name.

title: Second Sons
Name: sam
text: sam Please don't name him Randyll.

title: Second Sons
Name: gilly
text: gilly Is your father cruel like mine?

title: Second Sons
Name: sam
text: sam Different manner of cruel.

title: Second Sons
Name: gilly
text: gilly Not Randyll, then.

title: Second Sons
Name: gilly
text: gilly Don't. Don't go out there.

title: Second Sons
Name: sam
text: sam I'll be back. I just want to look.

title: Second Sons
Name: sam
text: sam Go inside. Go back inside. I'll-

title: Second Sons
Name: gilly
text: gilly It's come for the baby.

title: Second Sons
Name: sam
text: sam Stay back!

title: Second Sons
Name: sam
text: sam You stay back!

title: Second Sons
Name: gilly
text: gilly No, you can't have him! No!

title: Second Sons
Name: gilly
text: gilly No!

title: The Rains of Castamere
Name: catelyn
text: catelyn Are you sure about this?

title: The Rains of Castamere
Name: robb
text: robb No.

title: The Rains of Castamere
Name: catelyn
text: catelyn It's dangerous.

title: The Rains of Castamere
Name: robb
text: robb If we take Tywin's castle from him, the lords of Westeros will realize he's not invincible. Take his home, take his gold, take his power.

title: The Rains of Castamere
Name: catelyn
text: catelyn Why are you telling me?

title: The Rains of Castamere
Name: robb
text: robb You begged me not to send Theon to negotiate with his father and I ignored your advice.

title: The Rains of Castamere
Name: robb
text: robb Now Winterfell is burned to the ground. The North is overrun with Ironborn and Bran and Rickon are gone.

title: The Rains of Castamere
Name: robb
text: robb So, Casterly Rock? I'm asking your advice.

title: The Rains of Castamere
Name: catelyn
text: catelyn We have enough men?

title: The Rains of Castamere
Name: robb
text: robb If Walder Frey cooperates.

title: The Rains of Castamere
Name: catelyn
text: catelyn If reinforcements arrive from King's Landing, before we take the castle, we'll be caught between Tywin's army and the sea.

title: The Rains of Castamere
Name: robb
text: robb We'll lose the war and die the way father died. Or worse.

title: The Rains of Castamere
Name: catelyn
text: catelyn Show them how it feels to lose what they love.

title: The Rains of Castamere
Name: walder
text: walder My honored guests, be welcome within my walls and at my table. I extend to you my hospitality and protection in the light of the Seven.

title: The Rains of Castamere
Name: robb
text: robb We thank you for your hospitality, my lord.

title: The Rains of Castamere
Name: robb
text: robb I have come to make my apologies, my lord, and to beg your forgiveness.

title: The Rains of Castamere
Name: walder
text: walder Don't beg my forgiveness, your Grace. It wasn't me you spurned, it was my girls.

title: The Rains of Castamere
Name: walder
text: walder One of them was supposed to be queen, now none of them are.

title: The Rains of Castamere
Name: walder
text: walder This is Arwyn, my daughter. My daughter Walda, my daughter Derwa, my daughter Waldra.

title: The Rains of Castamere
Name: walder
text: walder My eldest granddaughters Ginia and Neila.

title: The Rains of Castamere
Name: walder
text: walder Serra and Sarra, granddaughters, twins. You could have had either. Could have had both for all I care.

title: The Rains of Castamere
Name: walder
text: walder My granddaughter Marianne. My granddaughter Freya. My granddaughter...W-W-Wertha? Waldra? Waldina?

title: The Rains of Castamere
Name: merry
text: merry I'm Merry.

title: The Rains of Castamere
Name: walder
text: walder Fine. And here's my youngest daughter Shirei, though she hasn't bled yet. Clearly you don't have the patience for all that.

title: The Rains of Castamere
Name: robb
text: robb My ladies. All men should keep their word, kings most of all. I was pledged to marry one of you and I broke that vow. The fault is not with you. Any man would be lucky to have any one of you. I did what I did not to slight you, but because I loved another. I know these words cannot set right the wrong I have done to you and your house. I beg your forgiveness and pledge to do all I can to make amends so the Freys of the Crossing and the Starks of Winterfell may once again be friends.

title: The Rains of Castamere
Name: walder
text: walder Very good.

title: The Rains of Castamere
Name: walder
text: walder There she is. Come closer, let me have a look at you.

title: The Rains of Castamere
Name: walder
text: walder Still can't see you. Old eyes.

title: The Rains of Castamere
Name: walder
text: walder Love. That's what the Starks of Winterfell call it, eh? Heh. Very honorable, I call it a pretty face. Mmmm, very pretty. Prettier than this lot, that's for sure. Very shapely as well. Oh, you try to hide her under that dress. If you wanted to hide her, you shouldn't have brought her here in the first place.

title: The Rains of Castamere
Name: walder
text: walder I can always see what's going on beneath a dress. Been at this a long time. I bet when you take that dress off, everything stays right where it is. Doesn't drop an inch.

title: The Rains of Castamere
Name: walder
text: walder Your king says he betrayed me for love. I say he betrayed me for firm tits and a tight fit.

title: The Rains of Castamere
Name: walder
text: walder And I can respect that. When I was your age, I'd have broken fifty oaths to get into that without a second thought. Well, I've enough room in the hall for you lot. We'll set up tents outside with food and ale for the rest of your men.

title: The Rains of Castamere
Name: robb
text: robb Thank you, my lord.

title: The Rains of Castamere
Name: walder
text: walder Well, let's get ready. The wine will flow red and the music will play loud and we'll put this mess behind us.

title: The Rains of Castamere
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys Where?

title: The Rains of Castamere
Name: daario
text: daario There.

title: The Rains of Castamere
Name: daario
text: daario There, it's a back gate. My men use it when they visit Yunkai's bed slaves.

title: The Rains of Castamere
Name: jorah
text: jorah Your men but not you?

title: The Rains of Castamere
Name: daario
text: daario I have no interest in slaves. A man cannot make love to property.

title: The Rains of Castamere
Name: daario
text: daario This is where we enter the city. Very few guards, they know me. They let me inside.

title: The Rains of Castamere
Name: barristan
text: barristan We're not gonna sneak an army through a back gate.

title: The Rains of Castamere
Name: daario
text: daario I kill the guards. I take your two best men and lead them through the back streets, which I know well, and open the front gates.

title: The Rains of Castamere
Name: daario
text: daario Then comes the army. Once the walls are breached, the city will fall in hours.

title: The Rains of Castamere
Name: jorah
text: jorah Or perhaps you'll lead Grey Worm and me to the slaughter, cutting the head off our army. The masters of Yunkai will pay you your fee and you won't have to split it three ways cause you've already slaughtered your partners.

title: The Rains of Castamere
Name: daario
text: daario You have a very suspicious mind. In my experience, only dishonest people think this way.

title: The Rains of Castamere
Name: jorah
text: jorah You command the Unsullied. What do you think?

title: The Rains of Castamere
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys Lo jention mirre nūmāzme ēza, iderenna qopsa verdagon issa.

title: The Rains of Castamere
Name: grey
text: grey I trust him.

title: The Rains of Castamere
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys You leave tonight.

title: The Rains of Castamere
Name: jorah
text: jorah Very good. We'll prepare.

title: The Rains of Castamere
Name: barristan
text: barristan Ser Jorah. You can use an extra sword.

title: The Rains of Castamere
Name: jorah
text: jorah You're the Queensguard, Ser Barristan. Your place is by the Queen. If we are truly her loyal servants, we'll do whatever needs to be done. No matter the cost, no matter our pride.

title: The Rains of Castamere
Name: sam
text: sam We're west of Castle Black, but the Nightfort's closest to us. It was the first castle on the Wall. The Watch abandoned it during the reign of King Jaehaerys I. Too big, impossible to maintain. Other than Castle Black itself, the Nightfort's the perfect castle for us. It's got a secret sally port, the Black Gate, as old as the Wall itself. No one's used it for centuries, most likely. It leads through the Wall right down into the Nightfort, if no one knows how to find it, which, it just so happens I do.

title: The Rains of Castamere
Name: gilly
text: gilly How do you know all that?

title: The Rains of Castamere
Name: sam
text: sam I read about it in a very old book.

title: The Rains of Castamere
Name: gilly
text: gilly You know all that from staring at marks on paper?

title: The Rains of Castamere
Name: sam
text: sam Yes.

title: The Rains of Castamere
Name: gilly
text: gilly You're like a wizard.

title: The Rains of Castamere
Name: gilly
text: gilly Our father used to tell us that no wildling ever looked upon the Wall and lived. Here we are. Alive.

title: The Rains of Castamere
Name: sandor
text: sandor Remember what happens to children who run. I'm your father and I'll do the talking.

title: The Rains of Castamere
Name: pig
text: pig The roads have gone right to hell, haven't they? Cracked three spokes this morning.

title: The Rains of Castamere
Name: sandor
text: sandor Need a hand?

title: The Rains of Castamere
Name: pig
text: pig Need about eight hands.

title: The Rains of Castamere
Name: pig
text: pig Got to get this salt pork to The Twins in time for the wedding.

title: The Rains of Castamere
Name: pig
text: pig Many thanks.

title: The Rains of Castamere
Name: arya
text: arya Don't! Don't kill him.

title: The Rains of Castamere
Name: sandor
text: sandor Dead rats don't squeak.

title: The Rains of Castamere
Name: arya
text: arya You're so dangerous, aren't you? Saying scary things to little girls. Killing little boys and old people. A real hard man you are.

title: The Rains of Castamere
Name: sandor
text: sandor More than anyone you know.

title: The Rains of Castamere
Name: arya
text: arya You're wrong. I know a killer. A real killer.

title: The Rains of Castamere
Name: sandor
text: sandor That so?

title: The Rains of Castamere
Name: arya
text: arya You'd be like a kitten to him. He'd kill you with his little finger.

title: The Rains of Castamere
Name: sandor
text: sandor That him?

title: The Rains of Castamere
Name: arya
text: arya No.

title: The Rains of Castamere
Name: sandor
text: sandor Good.

title: The Rains of Castamere
Name: arya
text: arya Don't kill him! Please. Please don't.

title: The Rains of Castamere
Name: sandor
text: sandor You're very kind. Someday it'll get you killed.

title: The Rains of Castamere
Name: osha
text: osha Where are we?

title: The Rains of Castamere
Name: bran
text: bran The Gift, I think. Brandon The Builder gave all this land south of the Wall to the Night's Watch for their sustenance and support. Maester Luwin taught me that.

title: The Rains of Castamere
Name: jojen
text: jojen Doesn't seem to be supporting anyone at the moment.

title: The Rains of Castamere
Name: meera
text: meera It's good land and there's no war up here. Why leave?

title: The Rains of Castamere
Name: bran
text: bran Wildlings.

title: The Rains of Castamere
Name: bran
text: bran Sorry. But they come over the Wall and raid, steal, carry off women.

title: The Rains of Castamere
Name: rickon
text: rickon Old Nan said they turn your skull into a cup and make you drink your own blood from it.

title: The Rains of Castamere
Name: rickon
text: rickon That's what Old Nan said.

title: The Rains of Castamere
Name: jojen
text: jojen There's a storm coming.

title: The Rains of Castamere
Name: bran
text: bran I don't see any.

title: The Rains of Castamere
Name: meera
text: meera It's as good a place to shelter as any.

title: The Rains of Castamere
Name: osha
text: osha We can drink some blood while we wait. I don't need much.

title: The Rains of Castamere
Name: orell
text: orell Only one old man and eight good horses.

title: The Rains of Castamere
Name: tormund
text: tormund What's one old man doing with eight horses?

title: The Rains of Castamere
Name: jon
text: jon He breeds them for the Watch.

title: The Rains of Castamere
Name: ygritte
text: ygritte How's he keep folks from stealing them?

title: The Rains of Castamere
Name: jon
text: jon The Watch protects him.

title: The Rains of Castamere
Name: orell
text: orell Not today they don't. He's selling horses, he's got some gold in there.

title: The Rains of Castamere
Name: tormund
text: tormund And proper steel.

title: The Rains of Castamere
Name: orell
text: orell Let's carve him up.

title: The Rains of Castamere
Name: jon
text: jon We just take the horses and go. The old man's no threat.

title: The Rains of Castamere
Name: orell
text: orell I keep telling you.

title: The Rains of Castamere
Name: ygritte
text: ygritte He's an old man. A spear through the heart's a better way to die than coughing up your last with no one but your horses to hear.

title: The Rains of Castamere
Name: jon
text: jon The Watch might send a few men looking for a horse thief. They'll send a lot more to hunt down murderers.

title: The Rains of Castamere
Name: tormund
text: tormund I hope so. Killing crows in their castle is tough. Killing them out here in the open, that's what we do.

title: The Rains of Castamere
Name: tormund
text: tormund Spread out. Surround the hut and move in.

title: The Rains of Castamere
Name: jon
text: jon Ygritte!

title: The Rains of Castamere
Name: tormund
text: tormund Clear the barn!

title: The Rains of Castamere
Name: arya
text: arya No one's going to believe you're a hog farmer if you eat them all.

title: The Rains of Castamere
Name: sandor
text: sandor Best part of the animal.

title: The Rains of Castamere
Name: sandor
text: sandor Don't worry, they're still there.

title: The Rains of Castamere
Name: arya
text: arya I know they're still there.

title: The Rains of Castamere
Name: sandor
text: sandor You check every five minutes like you're afraid they're gonna move.

title: The Rains of Castamere
Name: arya
text: arya I'm not afraid.

title: The Rains of Castamere
Name: sandor
text: sandor Of course you are. You're almost there and you're afraid you won't make it. The closer you get, the worse the fear gets. No point in trying to hide behind that face. I know fear when I see it. Seen it a lot.

title: The Rains of Castamere
Name: arya
text: arya I knew fear when I saw it in you. You're afraid of fire.

title: The Rains of Castamere
Name: arya
text: arya When Beric's sword went up in flames, you looked like a scared little girl.

title: The Rains of Castamere
Name: arya
text: arya And I know why, too. I heard what your brother did to you. Pressed your face to the fire like you're a nice juicy mutton chop.

title: The Rains of Castamere
Name: sandor
text: sandor That give you some ideas?

title: The Rains of Castamere
Name: arya
text: arya Might do.

title: The Rains of Castamere
Name: sandor
text: sandor Go ahead then. You might get away. Might even make it there on your own. They're just over the river. The closest you've been to family since Ilyn Payne snipped your daddy's neck.

title: The Rains of Castamere
Name: arya
text: arya Someday I'm gonna put a sword through your eye and out the back of your skull.

title: The Rains of Castamere
Name: bran
text: bran How are we going to get past the Wall? My uncle said it's 700 feet high.

title: The Rains of Castamere
Name: bran
text: bran How did you get past it?

title: The Rains of Castamere
Name: osha
text: osha Got in a boat and rowed past the Bay of Seals.

title: The Rains of Castamere
Name: bran
text: bran It would take us two months to get to the Bay of Seals.

title: The Rains of Castamere
Name: osha
text: osha Some climb straight up the ice.

title: The Rains of Castamere
Name: bran
text: bran Even Hodor's not strong enough to climb the Wall with me on his back.

title: The Rains of Castamere
Name: hodor
text: hodor Hodor!

title: The Rains of Castamere
Name: jojen
text: jojen Nineteen castles guard the Wall. Only three are still manned.

title: The Rains of Castamere
Name: jojen
text: jojen One of those abandoned fortresses will give us a way through.

title: The Rains of Castamere
Name: bran
text: bran My uncle said the gates were sealed with ice and stone when the castles were deserted.

title: The Rains of Castamere
Name: meera
text: meera Well, we'll have to open them up again.

title: The Rains of Castamere
Name: old
text: old Whoa, whoa, whoa!

title: The Rains of Castamere
Name: meera
text: meera There's a rider out there.

title: The Rains of Castamere
Name: jojen
text: jojen Just one?

title: The Rains of Castamere
Name: meera
text: meera There's more.

title: The Rains of Castamere
Name: osha
text: osha It's just thunder, sweet giant.

title: The Rains of Castamere
Name: hodor
text: hodor Hodor.

title: The Rains of Castamere
Name: old
text: old I yield. I yield.

title: The Rains of Castamere
Name: jojen
text: jojen Wildlings.

title: The Rains of Castamere
Name: osha
text: osha Where's Shaggydog and Summer?

title: The Rains of Castamere
Name: bran
text: bran Hunting.

title: The Rains of Castamere
Name: jojen
text: jojen Shhh, quiet, Hodor.

title: The Rains of Castamere
Name: jojen
text: jojen Make him shut up. If they hear us…

title: The Rains of Castamere
Name: bran
text: bran To Hodor] Hush, Hodor. No, no more Hodoring.

title: The Rains of Castamere
Name: bran
text: bran Hodor, calm down.

title: The Rains of Castamere
Name: osha
text: osha You need to keep quiet.

title: The Rains of Castamere
Name: jojen
text: jojen They're gonna hear us.

title: The Rains of Castamere
Name: bran
text: bran Hodor, be quiet.

title: The Rains of Castamere
Name: bran
text: bran Hodor, calm down. Hodor, be quiet!

title: The Rains of Castamere
Name: meera
text: meera What did you do?

title: The Rains of Castamere
Name: bran
text: bran Nothing. I don't know.

title: The Rains of Castamere
Name: rickon
text: rickon What's That?

title: The Rains of Castamere
Name: osha
text: osha That's a horse dying.

title: The Rains of Castamere
Name: wildling
text: wildling Bring them over here.

title: The Rains of Castamere
Name: wildling
text: wildling That was the last of them. The rest are dead.

title: The Rains of Castamere
Name: orell
text: orell I heard shouting up there.

title: The Rains of Castamere
Name: tormund
text: tormund Thunder.

title: The Rains of Castamere
Name: orell
text: orell I know the difference between shouting and thunder.

title: The Rains of Castamere
Name: tormund
text: tormund Maybe it's ghosts.

title: The Rains of Castamere
Name: tormund
text: tormund That won't help you, grandpa.

title: The Rains of Castamere
Name: tormund
text: tormund Where you riding?

title: The Rains of Castamere
Name: old
text: old Doesn't matter now, does it?

title: The Rains of Castamere
Name: tormund
text: tormund No, it doesn't matter now.

title: The Rains of Castamere
Name: orell
text: orell Cut his throat or he'll tell the crows we're here.

title: The Rains of Castamere
Name: tormund
text: tormund You understand.

title: The Rains of Castamere
Name: old
text: old Let me stand at least.

title: The Rains of Castamere
Name: old
text: old Let me go with a bit of dignity.

title: The Rains of Castamere
Name: orell
text: orell Make the crow kill him. You're one of us now. Prove it.

title: The Rains of Castamere
Name: jojen
text: jojen The wolves are out there.

title: The Rains of Castamere
Name: bran
text: bran I can't do it by choice. I don't know how. It happens in my dreams.

title: The Rains of Castamere
Name: jojen
text: jojen You're a warg, Bran. It's in your blood.

title: The Rains of Castamere
Name: bran
text: bran I can't.

title: The Rains of Castamere
Name: jojen
text: jojen You just did, with him.

title: The Rains of Castamere
Name: jojen
text: jojen A wolf is nothing compared to that.

title: The Rains of Castamere
Name: old
text: old She looks sharp.

title: The Rains of Castamere
Name: ygritte
text: ygritte Do it. Do it.

title: The Rains of Castamere
Name: orell
text: orell Told ya. He's still one of them.

title: The Rains of Castamere
Name: tormund
text: tormund Go on, boy.

title: The Rains of Castamere
Name: tormund
text: tormund Go on!

title: The Rains of Castamere
Name: orell
text: orell He's a crow. He'll always be a crow. And here's his crow wife guarding him. He'll stab us in the back first chance he gets.

title: The Rains of Castamere
Name: tormund
text: tormund Kill him!

title: The Rains of Castamere
Name: tormund
text: tormund He's one of them!

title: The Rains of Castamere
Name: ygritte
text: ygritte No!

title: The Rains of Castamere
Name: tormund
text: tormund Do you hear me?

title: The Rains of Castamere
Name: tormund
text: tormund You're not gonna die for one of them.

title: The Rains of Castamere
Name: jojen
text: jojen Do it. They'll find us if you don't.

title: The Rains of Castamere
Name: jon
text: jon You were right the whole time.

title: The Rains of Castamere
Name: daario
text: daario When you hear a songbirdo s whistle, you come. I'm a great whistler, the greatest in the land.

title: The Rains of Castamere
Name: daario
text: daario Daario Naharis.

title: The Rains of Castamere
Name: daario
text: daario That one was quick.

title: The Rains of Castamere
Name: jorah
text: jorah There may be others.

title: The Rains of Castamere
Name: daario
text: daario I doubt it. The Yunkish prefer to let their slaves do their fighting for them.

title: The Rains of Castamere
Name: jorah
text: jorah That's what you call a few guards?

title: The Rains of Castamere
Name: roslin
text: roslin Lord Edmure, I hope I'm not a disappointment to you.

title: The Rains of Castamere
Name: edmure
text: edmure You're a delight to me, my lady.

title: The Rains of Castamere
Name: septon
text: septon You may now cloak the bride and bring her under your protection.

title: The Rains of Castamere
Name: septon
text: septon In the sight of the Seven, I hereby seal these two souls, binding them as one for eternity. Look upon each other and say the words.

title: The Rains of Castamere
Name: edmure
text: edmure Father, Smith, Warrior, Mother, Maiden, Crone, Stranger. I am hers and she is mine from this day until the end of my days.

title: The Rains of Castamere
Name: meera
text: meera Is that safe?

title: The Rains of Castamere
Name: osha
text: osha They're long gone.

title: The Rains of Castamere
Name: bran
text: bran You were right. I can get inside Summer's mind whenever I want.

title: The Rains of Castamere
Name: jojen
text: jojen Of course you can. North of the Wall there are wildlings who can control all sorts of animals. But you did a lot more than that. You got inside Hodor's mind.

title: The Rains of Castamere
Name: bran
text: bran They can't do that north of the Wall?

title: The Rains of Castamere
Name: jojen
text: jojen No one can do that. Anywhere.

title: The Rains of Castamere
Name: bran
text: bran When I was looking through Summer's eyes, I saw Jon.

title: The Rains of Castamere
Name: rickon
text: rickon Where?

title: The Rains of Castamere
Name: bran
text: bran He was with the wildlings. They tried to kill him but he got away.

title: The Rains of Castamere
Name: osha
text: osha He'll be heading back to Castle Black then. That's where we should go.

title: The Rains of Castamere
Name: bran
text: bran For all we know, Castle Black's already under attack. If this many wildlings got through-

title: The Rains of Castamere
Name: osha
text: osha I already told you. I'm not going north of the Wall.

title: The Rains of Castamere
Name: bran
text: bran Everything Jojen told me is true. You saw what I did to Hodor. I have to find the three-eyed raven.

title: The Rains of Castamere
Name: osha
text: osha Listen to me, little lord.

title: The Rains of Castamere
Name: bran
text: bran Don't worry, I'm not asking you to come with me. It won't be safe for Rickon.

title: The Rains of Castamere
Name: rickon
text: rickon Me? I'm coming with you.

title: The Rains of Castamere
Name: bran
text: bran No. You and Osha and Shaggydog head for the Last Hearth. The Umbers are our bannermen. They'll protect you.

title: The Rains of Castamere
Name: rickon
text: rickon I'm coming with you. I'm your brother. I have to protect you.

title: The Rains of Castamere
Name: bran
text: bran Right now, I have to protect you.

title: The Rains of Castamere
Name: bran
text: bran Robb's at war and I'm going beyond the Wall. If something happens to us, you're the heir to Winterfell.

title: The Rains of Castamere
Name: bran
text: bran Will you know how to find the last Hearth?

title: The Rains of Castamere
Name: osha
text: osha You Southerners build your big castles and you never move. You're easy to find.

title: The Rains of Castamere
Name: rickon
text: rickon We're not Southerners.

title: The Rains of Castamere
Name: rickon
text: rickon And I don't want to leave you.

title: The Rains of Castamere
Name: osha
text: osha Shhh. Come here, little soldier. You and me, we're gonna have some adventures.

title: The Rains of Castamere
Name: bran
text: bran You don't have to do any of this.

title: The Rains of Castamere
Name: osha
text: osha Your family took me in and was good to me when they had no cause to be. Shhh. We'll be fine, you and me. The Umbers are great warriors. Even I heard about them growing up. They'll teach you how to swing a sword.

title: The Rains of Castamere
Name: rickon
text: rickon I know how to swing a sword.

title: The Rains of Castamere
Name: bran
text: bran You're leaving now? It's the middle of the night.

title: The Rains of Castamere
Name: osha
text: osha I learned to walk in darkness.

title: The Rains of Castamere
Name: osha
text: osha Say your good-byes, little man.

title: The Rains of Castamere
Name: osha
text: osha Keep this one safe. He means the world to me.

title: The Rains of Castamere
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys We've been waiting a long time. Haven't we? Well I don't know, you tell me. How long does it take to sack a city?

title: The Rains of Castamere
Name: jorah
text: jorah It was just as you said. They did not believe until it was too late. Their slave soldiers threw down their spears and surrendered.

title: The Rains of Castamere
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys And Daario Naharis?

title: The Rains of Castamere
Name: daario
text: daario The city is yours, my queen.

title: The Rains of Castamere
Name: talisa
text: talisa They're good, aren't they?

title: The Rains of Castamere
Name: lothar
text: lothar They ought to be because they cost enough.

title: The Rains of Castamere
Name: blackfish
text: blackfish Look at the crowd there.

title: The Rains of Castamere
Name: catelyn
text: catelyn He complained about this marriage the entire ride from Riverrun and now look at him.

title: The Rains of Castamere
Name: blackfish
text: blackfish The Godo s love to reward a fool.

title: The Rains of Castamere
Name: catelyn
text: catelyn Uncle.

title: The Rains of Castamere
Name: blackfish
text: blackfish What? He's my nephew, I love him. And he's a damned fool.

title: The Rains of Castamere
Name: catelyn
text: catelyn Don't you drink, Lord Bolton?

title: The Rains of Castamere
Name: roose
text: roose Never do, my lady. Dulls the senses.

title: The Rains of Castamere
Name: blackfish
text: blackfish That's the point. Didn't you marry one of these Frey girls?

title: The Rains of Castamere
Name: roose
text: roose Aye. Lord Walder let me choose any of his granddaughters and promised me the girl's weight in silver as a dowry. So I have a fat, young bride.

title: The Rains of Castamere
Name: catelyn
text: catelyn I hope she makes you very happy.

title: The Rains of Castamere
Name: roose
text: roose Well, she's made me very rich.

title: The Rains of Castamere
Name: blackfish
text: blackfish Pardon, my lord, my lady. I need to find a tree to piss on.

title: The Rains of Castamere
Name: robb
text: robb My mother's alone with Roose Bolton. I should rescue her.

title: The Rains of Castamere
Name: talisa
text: talisa Your mother is less in need of rescue than any woman I've ever met.

title: The Rains of Castamere
Name: robb
text: robb Be kind. She's finally starting to like you.

title: The Rains of Castamere
Name: talisa
text: talisa And I like her. But if she had her way, I would be back in Volantis, playing my harp and you would be sitting over there , eating blackberries out of Roslin Frey's hand.

title: The Rains of Castamere
Name: robb
text: robb Perhaps I've made a terrible mistake.

title: The Rains of Castamere
Name: robb
text: robb Striking your king is an act of treason.

title: The Rains of Castamere
Name: talisa
text: talisa No, don't. Don't insult them.

title: The Rains of Castamere
Name: walder
text: walder Your Grace.

title: The Rains of Castamere
Name: walder
text: walder The Septon has prayed his prayers, some words were said and Lord Edmure has wrapped my daughter in a cloak. But they are not yet man and wife. A sword needs a sheath . And a wedding needs a bedding . What does my sire say?

title: The Rains of Castamere
Name: everybody
text: everybody To bed! To bed! To bed!

title: The Rains of Castamere
Name: robb
text: robb If you think the time is right, Lord Walder, by all means, let us bed them.

title: The Rains of Castamere
Name: edmure
text: edmure Ho-ho! Careful now, ladies. Once you set that monster free, there's no caging him again .

title: The Rains of Castamere
Name: catelyn
text: catelyn Poor girl.

title: The Rains of Castamere
Name: roose
text: roose Every bride suffers the same. I'm sure you endured yours with grace.

title: The Rains of Castamere
Name: catelyn
text: catelyn Oh, Ned forbade it. He said it wouldn't be right if he broke a man's jaw on our wedding night.

title: The Rains of Castamere
Name: talisa
text: talisa That is a very strange custom.

title: The Rains of Castamere
Name: robb
text: robb I suppose it does seem strange from a foreigner's perspective.

title: The Rains of Castamere
Name: talisa
text: talisa It seems normal to you?

title: The Rains of Castamere
Name: robb
text: robb It's tradition. Without the bedding ceremony, there's no real proof the lord and lady consummated their marriage.

title: The Rains of Castamere
Name: talisa
text: talisa No, but there are other ways of providing proof.

title: The Rains of Castamere
Name: robb
text: robb Boy or girl?

title: The Rains of Castamere
Name: talisa
text: talisa I don't know. But if it's a boy, I know what we should name him.

title: The Rains of Castamere
Name: robb
text: robb Oh, do you? It seems to me the father should have some say in his son's naming.

title: The Rains of Castamere
Name: talisa
text: talisa Eddard. Don't you want to teach little Ned Stark how to ride horses?

title: The Rains of Castamere
Name: robb
text: robb I do.

title: The Rains of Castamere
Name: sandor
text: sandor Whoa, whoa, whoa, whoa.

title: The Rains of Castamere
Name: frey
text: frey Where are you going?

title: The Rains of Castamere
Name: sandor
text: sandor Got salt pork for the feast.

title: The Rains of Castamere
Name: frey
text: frey The feast is over.

title: The Rains of Castamere
Name: sandor
text: sandor It doesn't sound like it's over.

title: The Rains of Castamere
Name: frey
text: frey If I tell you it's over, it's over. Turn this cart around and get the hell out of here.

title: The Rains of Castamere
Name: sandor
text: sandor Got pig's feet, too .

title: The Rains of Castamere
Name: frey
text: frey Are you soft in the head? Turn this cart around!

title: The Rains of Castamere
Name: walder
text: walder I feel I've been remiss in my duties.

title: The Rains of Castamere
Name: walder
text: walder I've given you meat and wine and music but I haven't shown you the hospitality you deserve. My king has married and I owe my new queen a wedding gift.

title: The Rains of Castamere
Name: catelyn
text: catelyn Robb!

title: The Rains of Castamere
Name: man
text: man You ready to head home to Winterfell, eh?

title: The Rains of Castamere
Name: man
text: man Feast over yet, is it?

title: The Rains of Castamere
Name: frey
text: frey Aye, it's over!

title: The Rains of Castamere
Name: sandor
text: sandor It's too late.

title: The Rains of Castamere
Name: walder
text: walder The King in the North arises, heh heh.

title: The Rains of Castamere
Name: catelyn
text: catelyn Lord Walder! Lord Walder, enough! Let it end! Please! He is my son! My first son! Let him go and I swear that we will forget this! I swear it by the Old Gods and New! We will take no vengeance.

title: The Rains of Castamere
Name: walder
text: walder You already swore me one oath right here in my castle. You swore by all the Gods, your son would marry my daughter!

title: The Rains of Castamere
Name: catelyn
text: catelyn Take me for a hostage but let Robb go! Robb, get up! Get up and walk out! Please! Please!

title: The Rains of Castamere
Name: walder
text: walder And why I would let him do that?

title: The Rains of Castamere
Name: catelyn
text: catelyn On my honor as a Tully, on my honor as a Stark, let him go or I will cut your wife's throat!

title: The Rains of Castamere
Name: walder
text: walder I'll find another.

title: The Rains of Castamere
Name: robb
text: robb Mother.

title: The Rains of Castamere
Name: roose
text: roose The Lannisters send their regards.

title: Mhysa
Name: man
text: man It's too late.

title: Mhysa
Name: man
text: man Yah! Yah!

title: Mhysa
Name: man
text: man Go, move out!

title: Mhysa
Name: frey
text: frey The King in the North! The King in the North! The King in the North! The King in the North!

title: Mhysa
Name: frey
text: frey The King in the North! The King in the North!

title: Mhysa
Name: frey
text: frey Here comes the King in the North! Here comes the King in the North!

title: Mhysa
Name: frey
text: frey Here comes

title: Mhysa
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion Hmm. Ser Eldrick Sarsfield and Lord Desmond Crakehall. Ser Eldrick Sarsfield and Lord Desmond Crakehall.

title: Mhysa
Name: sansa
text: sansa What are you doing?

title: Mhysa
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion I have a list.

title: Mhysa
Name: sansa
text: sansa A list of people you mean to kill?

title: Mhysa
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion For laughing at me? Do I look like Joffrey to you? No, death seems a bit extreme. Fear of death, on the other hand-

title: Mhysa
Name: sansa
text: sansa You should learn to ignore them.

title: Mhysa
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion My lady, people have been laughing at me far longer than they've been laughing at you. I'm the Halfman, the Demon Monkey, the Imp.

title: Mhysa
Name: sansa
text: sansa You're a Lannister. I am the disgraced daughter of the traitor Ned Stark.

title: Mhysa
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion The disgraced daughter and the Demon Monkey. We're perfect for each other.

title: Mhysa
Name: sansa
text: sansa So how should we punish them?

title: Mhysa
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion Who? Whom?

title: Mhysa
Name: sansa
text: sansa Ser Eldrick Sarsfield and Lord Desmond Crakehall.

title: Mhysa
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion Ah. I could speak to Lord Varys and learn their perversions. Anyone named Desmond Crakehall must be a pervert.

title: Mhysa
Name: sansa
text: sansa I hear that you're a pervert.

title: Mhysa
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion I am the Imp. I have certain standards to maintain.

title: Mhysa
Name: sansa
text: sansa We could sheep shift Lord Desmondo s bed. You cut a little hole in his mattress and you stuff sheep dung inside. Then you sew up the hole and make his bed again. His room will stink, but he won't know where it's coming from.

title: Mhysa
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion Lady Sansa!

title: Mhysa
Name: sansa
text: sansa My sister used to do that when she was angry with me. And she was always angry with me.

title: Mhysa
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion Why sheep shift?

title: Mhysa
Name: sansa
text: sansa That's the vulgar word for dung.

title: Mhysa
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion My lady-

title: Mhysa
Name: sansa
text: sansa Well, you asked me.

title: Mhysa
Name: girl
text: girl Oh! That's him!

title: Mhysa
Name: podrick
text: podrick My lord, my lady. Your father has called a meeting of the small council.

title: Mhysa
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion Killed a few puppies today?

title: Mhysa
Name: joffrey
text: joffrey Show him. Come on, show him.

title: Mhysa
Name: pycelle
text: pycelle Oh, apologies, my lord. Old fingers.

title: Mhysa
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion Roslin caught a fine fat trout. Her brothers gave her a pair of wolf pelts for her wedding. Signed Walder Frey.' Is that bad poetry or is it supposed to mean something?

title: Mhysa
Name: joffrey
text: joffrey Robb Stark is dead. And his bitch mother. Write back to Lord Frey. Thank him for his service and command him to send Robb Stark's head. I'm going to serve it to Sansa at my wedding feast.

title: Mhysa
Name: varys
text: varys Your Grace, Lady Sansa is your aunt by marriage.

title: Mhysa
Name: cersei
text: cersei A joke. Joffrey did not mean it.

title: Mhysa
Name: joffrey
text: joffrey Yes, I did. I'm going to have it served to Sansa at my wedding feast.

title: Mhysa
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion No. She is no longer yours to torment.

title: Mhysa
Name: joffrey
text: joffrey Everyone is mine to torment. You'd do well to remember that, you little monster.

title: Mhysa
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion Oh, I'm a monster. Perhaps you should speak to me more softly, then. Monsters are dangerous and just now kings are dying like flies.

title: Mhysa
Name: joffrey
text: joffrey I could have your tongue out for saying that.

title: Mhysa
Name: cersei
text: cersei Let him make his threats. Hmm? He's a bitter little man.

title: Mhysa
Name: pycelle
text: pycelle Lord Tyrion should apologize immediately. Unacceptable, disrespectful, and in very bad taste.

title: Mhysa
Name: joffrey
text: joffrey I am the king! I will punish you.

title: Mhysa
Name: tywin
text: tywin Any man who must say, 'I am the king' is no true king. I'll make sure you understand that when I've won your war for you.

title: Mhysa
Name: joffrey
text: joffrey My father won the real war. He killed Prince Rhaegar. He took the crown while you hid under Casterly Rock!

title: Mhysa
Name: tywin
text: tywin The king is tired. See him to his chambers.

title: Mhysa
Name: cersei
text: cersei Come along.

title: Mhysa
Name: joffrey
text: joffrey I'm not tired.

title: Mhysa
Name: cersei
text: cersei We have so much to celebrate. A wedding to plan. You must rest.

title: Mhysa
Name: tywin
text: tywin Grand Maester, perhaps some essence of nightshade to help him sleep.

title: Mhysa
Name: joffrey
text: joffrey I'm not tired!

title: Mhysa
Name: cersei
text: cersei Come.

title: Mhysa
Name: tywin
text: tywin Not you.

title: Mhysa
Name: tyrion
