text: tyrion You just sent the most powerful man in Westeros to bed without his supper.

title: Mhysa
Name: tywin
text: tywin You're a fool if you believe he's the most powerful man in Westeros.

title: Mhysa
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion A treasonous statement. Joffrey is king.

title: Mhysa
Name: tywin
text: tywin You really think a crown gives you power?

title: Mhysa
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion No. I think armies give you power.

title: Mhysa
Name: tywin
text: tywin Mm-hmm.

title: Mhysa
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion Robb Stark had one, never lost a battle, and you defeated him all the same.

title: Mhysa
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion Oh, I know. Walder Frey gets all the credit. Or the blame, I suppose, depending on your allegiance. Walder Frey is many things, but a brave man? No. He never would have risked such an action if he didn't have certain assurances.

title: Mhysa
Name: tywin
text: tywin Which he got from me. Do you disapprove?

title: Mhysa
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion I'm all for cheating. This is war.

title: Mhysa
Name: tywin
text: tywin But to slaughter them at a wedding. Explain to me why it is more noble to kill ten thousand men in battle than a dozen at dinner.

title: Mhysa
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion So that's why you did it? To save lives?

title: Mhysa
Name: tywin
text: tywin To end the war. To protect the family. Do you want to write a song for the dead Starks? Go ahead, write one. I'm in this world a little while longer to defend the Lannisters, to defend my blood.

title: Mhysa
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion The Northerners will never forget.

title: Mhysa
Name: tywin
text: tywin Good. Let them remember what happens when they march on the south. All the Stark men are dead. Winterfell is a ruin. Roose Bolton will be named Warden of the North until your son by Sansa comes of age.

title: Mhysa
Name: tywin
text: tywin I believe you still have some work to do on that score.

title: Mhysa
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion Do you think she'll open her legs for me after I tell her how we murdered her mother and brother?

title: Mhysa
Name: tywin
text: tywin One way or another, you will get that girl pregnant.

title: Mhysa
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion I will not rape her.

title: Mhysa
Name: tywin
text: tywin Shall I explain to you in one easy lesson how the world works?

title: Mhysa
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion Use small words. I'm not as bright as you.

title: Mhysa
Name: tywin
text: tywin The house that puts family first will always defeat the house that puts the whims and wishes of its sons and daughters first. A good man does everything in his power to better his family's position regardless of his own selfish desires.

title: Mhysa
Name: tywin
text: tywin Does that amuse you?

title: Mhysa
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion No, it's a very good lesson. Only it's easy for you to preach utter devotion to family when you're making all the decisions.

title: Mhysa
Name: tywin
text: tywin Easy for me, is it?

title: Mhysa
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion When have you ever done something that wasn't in your interest but solely for the benefit of the family?

title: Mhysa
Name: tywin
text: tywin The day that you were born. I wanted to carry you into the sea and let the waves wash you away. Instead, I let you live. And I brought you as my son. Because you're a Lannister.

title: Mhysa
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion Sansa.

title: Mhysa
Name: meera
text: meera It's empty.

title: Mhysa
Name: jojen
text: jojen Let's find a place to sleep.

title: Mhysa
Name: hodor
text: hodor Hodor. Hodor.

title: Mhysa
Name: bran
text: bran Don't, Hodor.

title: Mhysa
Name: bran
text: bran Maybe we shouldn't stay.

title: Mhysa
Name: meera
text: meera You'd rather be out there?

title: Mhysa
Name: bran
text: bran There are a lot of stories about this place. Horrible stories.

title: Mhysa
Name: jojen
text: jojen I always quite liked the horrible stories.

title: Mhysa
Name: bran
text: bran So did I. Once.

title: Mhysa
Name: bran
text: bran You ever heard about the Rat Cook?

title: Mhysa
Name: meera
text: meera No. Who's he?

title: Mhysa
Name: bran
text: bran Just a cook in the Night's Watch. He was angry at the king for something, I don't remember. When the king was visiting the Nightfort, the cook killed the king's son, cooked him into a big pie with onions, carrots, mushrooms and bacon. That night he served the pie to the king. He liked the taste of his son so much, he asked for a second slice. The gods turned the cook into a giant white rat who could only eat his own young. He's been roaming the Nightfort ever since, devouring his own babies. But no matter what he does, he's always hungry.

title: Mhysa
Name: meera
text: meera If the gods turned every killer into a giant white rat-

title: Mhysa
Name: bran
text: bran It wasn't for murder the gods cursed the Rat Cook or for serving the king's son in a pie. He killed a guest beneath his roof. That's something the gods can't forgive.

title: Mhysa
Name: walder
text: walder The late Walder Frey,' old Hoster called me because I didn't get my men to the Trident in time for battle. He thought he was witty. Look at us now, Tully. You're dead, your daughter Catelyn's dead, your grandson's dead, your son spent his wedding night in a dungeon, and I'm Lord of Riverrun.

title: Mhysa
Name: roose
text: roose The Blackfish escaped.

title: Mhysa
Name: walder
text: walder An old man on the run with no allies. I have Tywin Lannister backing me. Who does he have?

title: Mhysa
Name: roose
text: roose As you say.

title: Mhysa
Name: walder
text: walder They all laughed at me, all those high lords. They all thought they were better than me. Ned Stark, Hoster Tully. People snigger when I marry a young girl, but who said a word when Jon Arryn married the little Tully bitch?

title: Mhysa
Name: roose
text: roose You'll be needing a new young girl.

title: Mhysa
Name: walder
text: walder Yeah. Got that to look forward to.

title: Mhysa
Name: walder
text: walder And you, the Warden of the North. No more Starks to bow and scrape to. Must have been torture following that stupid boy all over the country.

title: Mhysa
Name: roose
text: roose He ignored my advice at every turn. If he'd been a trifle less arrogant-

title: Mhysa
Name: walder
text: walder Calling himself the Young Wolf. How's that for pomposity?

title: Mhysa
Name: walder
text: walder Well, here's to the Young Wolf!

title: Mhysa
Name: roose
text: roose Forever young.

title: Mhysa
Name: walder
text: walder Will you move to Winterfell now that the war's over?

title: Mhysa
Name: roose
text: roose At some point perhaps. But Winterfell's in ruins.

title: Mhysa
Name: walder
text: walder Yeah. What happened up there? I heard the Greyjoy boy seized the place. I heard he killed all the ravens. And after that, nothing.

title: Mhysa
Name: roose
text: roose I sent my bastard Ramsay to root him out. Robb Stark offered amnesty for the Ironborn if they gave us Theon.

title: Mhysa
Name: walder
text: walder Oh. And?

title: Mhysa
Name: roose
text: roose Ramsay delivered the terms. The Ironborn turned on Theon as we knew they would. They handed him over trussed and hooded. But Ramsay- well Ramsay has his own way of doing things.

title: Mhysa
Name: ramsay
text: ramsay Well, the girls weren't lying. You had a good-sized cock.

title: Mhysa
Name: ramsay
text: ramsay What? No. Pork sausage. You think I'm some sort of savage?

title: Mhysa
Name: ramsay
text: ramsay People talk about phantom limbs. An amputee might have an itch where his foot used to be. So I've always wondered do eunuchs have a phantom cock?

title: Mhysa
Name: ramsay
text: ramsay Next time you think about naked girls, would you feel an itch?

title: Mhysa
Name: ramsay
text: ramsay Sorry. I shouldn't make jokes. My mother taught me not to throw stones at cripples.

title: Mhysa
Name: ramsay
text: ramsay But my father taught me to aim for their head.

title: Mhysa
Name: theon
text: theon Kill me.

title: Mhysa
Name: ramsay
text: ramsay Sorry, what?

title: Mhysa
Name: ramsay
text: ramsay A little louder.

title: Mhysa
Name: theon
text: theon Kill me!

title: Mhysa
Name: ramsay
text: ramsay You're no good to me dead. We need you.

title: Mhysa
Name: ramsay
text: ramsay You don't look like a Theon Greyjoy anymore. That's a name for a lord. But you're not a lord, are you? You're just meat.

title: Mhysa
Name: ramsay
text: ramsay Stinking meat.

title: Mhysa
Name: ramsay
text: ramsay You reek. Reek! That's a good name for you. What's your name?

title: Mhysa
Name: theon
text: theon Theon Greyjoy.

title: Mhysa
Name: ramsay
text: ramsay What's your name?

title: Mhysa
Name: theon
text: theon Th- Theon Greyjoy.

title: Mhysa
Name: theon
text: theon Please.

title: Mhysa
Name: ramsay
text: ramsay What is your name?!

title: Mhysa
Name: theon
text: theon Reek. My name is Reek.

title: Mhysa
Name: bran
text: bran Hodor.

title: Mhysa
Name: sam
text: sam Don't kill me!

title: Mhysa
Name: meera
text: meera Who are you?

title: Mhysa
Name: gilly
text: gilly Sam! Sam!

title: Mhysa
Name: meera
text: meera Who are you?!

title: Mhysa
Name: gilly
text: gilly Gilly. Don't hurt us.

title: Mhysa
Name: jojen
text: jojen Where are you going?

title: Mhysa
Name: sam
text: sam To Castle Black. I'm a brother of the Night's Watch.

title: Mhysa
Name: bran
text: bran My brother, he's in the Night's-

title: Mhysa
Name: jojen
text: jojen Shush.

title: Mhysa
Name: sam
text: sam Who's your brother?

title: Mhysa
Name: jojen
text: jojen Doesn't matter.

title: Mhysa
Name: sam
text: sam You're Jon's brother. The one who fell from the window.

title: Mhysa
Name: bran
text: bran No, I'm not.

title: Mhysa
Name: sam
text: sam I've been around Ghost enough to know a direwolf when I see one. And I've heard all about Hodor.

title: Mhysa
Name: hodor
text: hodor Hodor.

title: Mhysa
Name: sam
text: sam I'd be dead if it wasn't for Jon. If you're his brother, you're my brother, too. And anything I can do to help you, I will.

title: Mhysa
Name: bran
text: bran Take us north of the Wall.

title: Mhysa
Name: sam
text: sam What? Why in the world would you want to go-

title: Mhysa
Name: bran
text: bran I don't want to. I have to.

title: Mhysa
Name: jojen
text: jojen How did you get through the Wall?

title: Mhysa
Name: meera
text: meera Does the well lead to an underground river? Is that how you came here?

title: Mhysa
Name: sam
text: sam Come with us. There are steps carved into the south side of the Wall. Hodor can carry you to the top. We'll walk straight to Castle Black.

title: Mhysa
Name: gilly
text: gilly Come with us. There's nothing north but death.

title: Mhysa
Name: sam
text: sam If Jon is alive, then Castle Black's where he'll be. It's the safest place for you.

title: Mhysa
Name: jojen
text: jojen There's nowhere safe any longer. You know that.

title: Mhysa
Name: sam
text: sam What I know is what I saw. And if you saw it, too, you'd run the other way.

title: Mhysa
Name: jojen
text: jojen You saw the White Walkers and the army of the dead.

title: Mhysa
Name: sam
text: sam How do you know all that?

title: Mhysa
Name: jojen
text: jojen The Night's Watch can't stop them. The kings of Westeros and all their armies can't stop them.

title: Mhysa
Name: sam
text: sam But you're going to stop them?

title: Mhysa
Name: bran
text: bran Please, Sam. I have to go north. I have to.

title: Mhysa
Name: balon
text: balon Balon Greyjoy, Lord of the Iron Islands and invader of the North. I give you until the full moon to order all Ironborn scum out of the North and back to those shit-stained rocks you call a home.

title: Mhysa
Name: balon
text: balon On the first night of the full moon, I will hunt down every islander still in our lands and flay them living the way I flayed the twenty Ironborn scum I found at Winterfell. In the box you'll find a special gift- Theon's favorite toy. He cried when I took it away from him.'

title: Mhysa
Name: balon
text: balon Leave the North now or more boxes will follow with more Theon. Signed Ramsay Snow, natural-born son of Roose Bolton, Lord of the Dreadfort and Warden of the North.' Get that out of my sight.

title: Mhysa
Name: balon
text: balon Theon disobeyed my orders.

title: Mhysa
Name: balon
text: balon The boy is a fool. He cannot further the Greyjoy line. I will not give up the lands I have seized, the strongholds I have taken. Get this away from me.

title: Mhysa
Name: yara
text: yara He's your son.

title: Mhysa
Name: balon
text: balon Son? He's not a man anymore.

title: Mhysa
Name: yara
text: yara He's your son. He's my brother. He's a Greyjoy.

title: Mhysa
Name: balon
text: balon Watch yourself. I've made my decision.

title: Mhysa
Name: yara
text: yara And I've made mine. I'm going to pick the fastest ship in our fleet.

title: Mhysa
Name: yara
text: yara I'm going to choose the fifty best killers on the Iron Islands.

title: Mhysa
Name: man
text: man Get those ropes!

title: Mhysa
Name: yara
text: yara I'm going to sail up the Narrow Sea all the way to the Weeping Water. I'm going to march on the Dreadfort. I'm going to find my little brother and I'm going to bring him home.

title: Mhysa
Name: bran
text: bran What is it?

title: Mhysa
Name: jojen
text: jojen Dragonglass.

title: Mhysa
Name: sam
text: sam We found them at the Fist. Someone buried them a long time ago. Someone wanted us to find them.

title: Mhysa
Name: bran
text: bran Why? What are they for?

title: Mhysa
Name: sam
text: sam Killing White Walkers.

title: Mhysa
Name: meera
text: meera How do you know that?

title: Mhysa
Name: gilly
text: gilly The Walker came for my baby. And Sam-

title: Mhysa
Name: meera
text: meera But no one's killed a White Walker in thousands of years.

title: Mhysa
Name: sam
text: sam Well, I suppose someone had to be the first.

title: Mhysa
Name: bran
text: bran Take it, Hodor.

title: Mhysa
Name: sam
text: sam And the archer. I got lucky with one of them. There are more. Many more. And for every one of them, the dead men, more than you could count. I wish you'd come with us.

title: Mhysa
Name: bran
text: bran I wish I could. I really do.

title: Mhysa
Name: davos
text: davos How are you keeping?

title: Mhysa
Name: gendry
text: gendry Great. Never better.

title: Mhysa
Name: davos
text: davos It was just a bit of blood.

title: Mhysa
Name: gendry
text: gendry I should have known. Every time a highborn asks my name, it's trouble. We're not really people to you, are we? Just a million different ways to get what you want.

title: Mhysa
Name: davos
text: davos I'm not a highborn.

title: Mhysa
Name: gendry
text: gendry She called you Ser. I heard it.

title: Mhysa
Name: davos
text: davos A recent state of affairs. I was born in Flea Bottom just like you.

title: Mhysa
Name: gendry
text: gendry Sure, you were. You're my friend. You're here to help.

title: Mhysa
Name: davos
text: davos I lived below the Street of Flour.

title: Mhysa
Name: gendry
text: gendry How far below? How close to the Red Keep were you?

title: Mhysa
Name: davos
text: davos The shit that poured from their privy pipes flowed down the side of Aegon's Hill along Tanner's Row and right in front of my front door on Gin Alley.

title: Mhysa
Name: gendry
text: gendry Gin Alley.

title: Mhysa
Name: davos
text: davos The Street of Steel, with your armor and your knights? Pfft. You lived in the fancy part of town. And here we are now. Two boys from Flea Bottom in the castle of a king.

title: Mhysa
Name: gendry
text: gendry Yeah, we've come a long way. We're all the same, really. She went to great pains to point that out to me.

title: Mhysa
Name: davos
text: davos If you mistrust fancy people so much, why were you in such a hurry to trust her?

title: Mhysa
Name: gendry
text: gendry You're me. Never been with a woman. Never talked to a woman, really. And then she comes at you- big words, no clothes. What would you have done?

title: Mhysa
Name: davos
text: davos She does know her way around a man's head, I'll give her that.

title: Mhysa
Name: gendry
text: gendry So how'd you become a lord?

title: Mhysa
Name: davos
text: davos Oh, that's a long story.

title: Mhysa
Name: gendry
text: gendry Better not, then. I'm a bit busy.

title: Mhysa
Name: davos
text: davos Many years ago I helped King Stannis out of a difficult situation. He rewarded me with a lordship. And this.

title: Mhysa
Name: gendry
text: gendry You see? Highborns.

title: Mhysa
Name: davos
text: davos I didn't want to be a lord. I nearly didn't accept.

title: Mhysa
Name: gendry
text: gendry Why did you?

title: Mhysa
Name: davos
text: davos I did it for my son. I didn't want him to step over a river of shit every time he stepped through his front door. I wanted him to have a better life.

title: Mhysa
Name: gendry
text: gendry Does he?

title: Mhysa
Name: davos
text: davos He's dead.

title: Mhysa
Name: gendry
text: gendry How'd he die?

title: Mhysa
Name: davos
text: davos Following me.

title: Mhysa
Name: varys
text: varys When did you come to this strange country?

title: Mhysa
Name: shae
text: shae When I was thirteen.

title: Mhysa
Name: varys
text: varys You were only a child.

title: Mhysa
Name: shae
text: shae I stopped being a child when I was nine. My mother made sure of that.

title: Mhysa
Name: varys
text: varys You've been a good influence on our mutual friend, you know. He used to drink from sundown to sunup, visit three brothels a night, gamble away his father's money. Now it's just the drinking.

title: Mhysa
Name: shae
text: shae And now I'm his wife's servant. I brush her hair and clip her nails and empty her chamber pot.

title: Mhysa
Name: varys
text: varys She is a sweet young thing. None of this is her fault.

title: Mhysa
Name: shae
text: shae I love that girl. I would kill for her. Do you think that makes it easier for me?

title: Mhysa
Name: varys
text: varys No, I expect not.

title: Mhysa
Name: shae
text: shae She's young and she's beautiful and highborn.

title: Mhysa
Name: varys
text: varys We break bread with them, but that doesn't make us family. We've learned their language, but we'll never be their countrymen. If you let yourself believe that a foreign girl with no name could spend her life with the son of Tywin Lannister-

title: Mhysa
Name: shae
text: shae I have a name.

title: Mhysa
Name: varys
text: varys You have one name. As do I. Here only the family name matters.

title: Mhysa
Name: shae
text: shae What do you want from me, Lord Varys?

title: Mhysa
Name: varys
text: varys Diamonds. I'd tell you to beware carrying so much wealth, but you know how to protect yourself. Get on one of those ships. Sail to Pentos or Lys or Myr. You can buy a house with these diamonds, a very large house. Hire servants. Start a new life, a good life, far from here. The mysterious foreign beauty. You'll have suitors lining up.

title: Mhysa
Name: shae
text: shae Why do you want me to leave?

title: Mhysa
Name: varys
text: varys Tyrion Lannister is one of the few people alive who could make this country a better place. He has the mind for it, he has the will, he has the right last name. And you- you are a complication. I know you love him. And I know it's true love not bought by gold and silver. I'm not asking you to leave him for money. I'm asking you to leave because your presence in the capital endangers him. This will never be your home, my lady. Find a true home somewhere far from here while there's still time.

title: Mhysa
Name: shae
text: shae Lord Varys.

title: Mhysa
Name: shae
text: shae If he wants me to leave, he can tell me himself.

title: Mhysa
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion Keep up.

title: Mhysa
Name: podrick
text: podrick I don't think I can, my lord.

title: Mhysa
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion It's not easy being drunk all the time. Everyone would do it if it were easy.

title: Mhysa
Name: cersei
text: cersei Leave.

title: Mhysa
Name: cersei
text: cersei So, enjoying married life? An unhappy wife is a wine merchant's best friend.

title: Mhysa
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion She doesn't deserve this.

title: Mhysa
Name: cersei
text: cersei Deserve? Be careful with that. Start trying to work out who deserves what and before long you'll spend the rest of your days weeping for each and every person in the world.

title: Mhysa
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion There's nothing worse than a late-blooming philosopher.

title: Mhysa
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion Will you be facing your marriage to Ser Loras with the same philosophical spirit?

title: Mhysa
Name: cersei
text: cersei I won't be marrying Ser Loras.

title: Mhysa
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion I seem to remember saying something similar about my own marriage.

title: Mhysa
Name: cersei
text: cersei You're not me. You want to make things better for Sansa? Give her a child.

title: Mhysa
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion So you can tell Father it was you who finally talked me into it?

title: Mhysa
Name: cersei
text: cersei So she can have some happiness in her life.

title: Mhysa
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion You have children. How happy would you say you are?

title: Mhysa
Name: cersei
text: cersei Not very. But if it weren't for my children, I'd have thrown myself from the highest window in the Red Keep. They're the reason I'm alive.

title: Mhysa
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion Even Joffrey?

title: Mhysa
Name: cersei
text: cersei Even Joffrey. He was all I had once. Before Myrcella was born. I used to spend hours looking at him. His wisps of hair. His tiny little hands and feet. He was such a jolly little fellow. You always hear the terrible ones were terrible babies. 'We should have known. Even then we should have known.' It's nonsense. Whenever he was with me, he was happy. And no one can take that away from me, not even Joffrey- how it feels to have someone. Someone of your own.

title: Mhysa
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion How long does it go on?

title: Mhysa
Name: cersei
text: cersei Until we've dealt with all our enemies.

title: Mhysa
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion Every time we deal with an enemy, we create two more.

title: Mhysa
Name: cersei
text: cersei Then I suppose it will go on for quite a long time.

title: Mhysa
Name: frey
text: frey I'm telling you, that's what she did. Sounded like a cow in heat.

title: Mhysa
Name: frey
text: frey Aye, not for long.

title: Mhysa
Name: frey
text: frey That's right. Black Walder shut her up right quick. None of the Starks had much to say about the end of that meal.

title: Mhysa
Name: frey
text: frey I'll tell you what, though. The hardest thing was getting that wolf's head to stay on the body.

title: Mhysa
Name: frey
text: frey You sewed it on?

title: Mhysa
Name: frey
text: frey I did.

title: Mhysa
Name: frey
text: frey I bet there were a thousand men claiming they were the one.

title: Mhysa
Name: frey
text: frey It was me. And Malcolm and Talbott. Well, the thing was so heavy, it fell off the first time. Took the skin right with it. What we ended up having to do was hook the needle right under the collarbone. Give it a nice firm mooring and-

title: Mhysa
Name: frey
text: frey What do you want?

title: Mhysa
Name: arya
text: arya Mind if I keep warm?

title: Mhysa
Name: frey
text: frey Fuck off.

title: Mhysa
Name: arya
text: arya But I'm hungry.

title: Mhysa
Name: frey
text: frey Does fuck off mean something different where you're from?

title: Mhysa
Name: arya
text: arya I've got money.

title: Mhysa
Name: frey
text: frey What kind of coin is that?

title: Mhysa
Name: arya
text: arya It's worth a lot.

title: Mhysa
Name: arya
text: arya Sorry.

title: Mhysa
Name: frey
text: frey Little shit.

title: Mhysa
Name: frey
text: frey Fool!

title: Mhysa
Name: sandor
text: sandor Where did you get the knife?

title: Mhysa
Name: arya
text: arya From you.

title: Mhysa
Name: sandor
text: sandor Is that the first man you've killed?

title: Mhysa
Name: arya
text: arya The first man.

title: Mhysa
Name: sandor
text: sandor Next time you're going to do something like that, tell me first.

title: Mhysa
Name: arya
text: arya Valar morghulis.

title: Mhysa
Name: jon
text: jon Ygritte, you know I didn't have a choice. You always knew who I was, what I am.

title: Mhysa
Name: jon
text: jon I have to go home now. I know you won't hurt me.

title: Mhysa
Name: ygritte
text: ygritte You know nothing, Jon Snow.

title: Mhysa
Name: jon
text: jon I do know some things. I know I love you.

title: Mhysa
Name: jon
text: jon I know you love me. But I have to go home now.

title: Mhysa
Name: sam
text: sam I know how this must look. What I meant was-

title: Mhysa
Name: gilly
text: gilly I swear to you, my lord-

title: Mhysa
Name: maester
text: maester I'm not a lord, my dear. Not for many, many years. Every man who joins the Night's Watch renounces all former titles. Among other things. What is your name?

title: Mhysa
Name: gilly
text: gilly Gilly.

title: Mhysa
Name: maester
text: maester Ah, for the gillyflower. Lovely.

title: Mhysa
Name: gilly
text: gilly Yes, my-

title: Mhysa
Name: sam
text: sam Maester.

title: Mhysa
Name: gilly
text: gilly Master.

title: Mhysa
Name: maester
text: maester And the child?

title: Mhysa
Name: sam
text: sam She hasn't chosen a name yet.

title: Mhysa
Name: gilly
text: gilly His name is Sam.

title: Mhysa
Name: maester
text: maester Tarly do you remember the oath you swore when you joined this order?

title: Mhysa
Name: sam
text: sam He's not my child, Maester Aemon. She's one of Craster's wives. I remember every word of the oath. Night gathers and my watch begins. I am the shield that guards the realms of men. The realms of men. That means her as well as us. We didn't build five hundred miles of ice walls seve hundred feet high to keep men out. The night is gathering, Maester Aemon. I've seen it. It's coming for all of us.

title: Mhysa
Name: maester
text: maester Gilly, you and your son will be our guests for the time being. We certainly cannot send you back beyond the Wall.

title: Mhysa
Name: gilly
text: gilly Thank you Maester. I can cook and clean and I can-

title: Mhysa
Name: maester
text: maester Good. Samwell, fetch a quill and inkwell. I hope your penmanship is better than your swordplay.

title: Mhysa
Name: sam
text: sam Miles better.

title: Mhysa
Name: maester
text: maester We had forty-four ravens at last count. Make sure they're all fed. Every one of them flies tonight.

title: Mhysa
Name: davos
text: davos To His Grace King Stannis Baratheon. Invaded- inv- invit- invited to the name day celebration for Rylene Florent on the first nigit-

title: Mhysa
Name: shireen
text: shireen Night.

title: Mhysa
Name: davos
text: davos First night of the full moon.' Why is there a G in night?

title: Mhysa
Name: shireen
text: shireen I don't know. There just is.

title: Mhysa
Name: davos
text: davos Well, your father's not going to go to that.

title: Mhysa
Name: shireen
text: shireen My books are better than these boring scrolls. You could read about Balerion the Dread. They say you can still see his skull in the dungeons beneath the Red Keep. I'd like to see that someday.

title: Mhysa
Name: davos
text: davos I've been trying to stay out of those dungeons my whole life.

title: Mhysa
Name: shireen
text: shireen His fangs were as long as bastard swords.

title: Mhysa
Name: davos
text: davos Aye, old Balerion's definitely better than anything your cousin Rylene's got on offer. But now that I'm your father's Hand again, I have to keep him informed. The king does not have time for this drudgery. 'To all the lords and knobble men of Westeros.'

title: Mhysa
Name: shireen
text: shireen Noblemen.

title: Mhysa
Name: davos
text: davos Noblemen of Westeros, the Nig- the Night's Watch implores-

title: Mhysa
Name: shireen
text: shireen What is it?

title: Mhysa
Name: shireen
text: shireen Why are they ringing the bells? Are we being attacked?

title: Mhysa
Name: davos
text: davos Stay here. Bar the door.

title: Mhysa
Name: stannis
text: stannis The usurper Robb Stark is dead. Betrayed by his bannerman.

title: Mhysa
Name: davos
text: davos And you take credit because you dropped a leech into the fire?

title: Mhysa
Name: melisandre
text: melisandre I take no credit. I have faith and my faith has been rewarded.

title: Mhysa
Name: davos
text: davos Your Grace, the world has got so far bent. I've seen things crawl out of nightmares, but my eyes were open. I don't know if Robb Stark died because of the Red Woman's sorcery or because at war men die all the time, but I do know that uniting the Seven Kingdoms with blood magic is wrong. It is evil. And you are not an evil man.

title: Mhysa
Name: stannis
text: stannis Do you know who had this table carved and painted, Ser Davos?

title: Mhysa
Name: davos
text: davos Aegon Targaryen.

title: Mhysa
Name: stannis
text: stannis And do you know how Aegon Targaryen conquered Westeros?

title: Mhysa
Name: davos
text: davos On the back of his dragon, Balerion the Dread.

title: Mhysa
Name: stannis
text: stannis He had a smaller fleet than the kings he faced and a smaller army, but he had three dragons. Dragons are magic, Ser Davos. My enemies have made my kingdom bleed. I will not forget that. I will not forgive that. I will punish them with any arms at my disposal.

title: Mhysa
Name: davos
text: davos You do not need to burn the boy. If what you say is true, a drop of his blood killed Robb Stark-

title: Mhysa
Name: melisandre
text: melisandre And our king is still no closer to the Iron Throne. A great gift requires a great sacrifice.

title: Mhysa
Name: davos
text: davos His name is Gendry. He's a good lad. A poor lad from Flea Bottom who happens to be your nephew.

title: Mhysa
Name: stannis
text: stannis What is the life of one bastard boy against a kingdom?

title: Mhysa
Name: davos
text: davos Everything.

title: Mhysa
Name: stannis
text: stannis The boy must die.

title: Mhysa
Name: gendry
text: gendry What are you doing?

title: Mhysa
Name: davos
text: davos You're leaving.

title: Mhysa
Name: gendry
text: gendry Is this some kind of trick?

title: Mhysa
Name: davos
text: davos Yes, but not on you.

title: Mhysa
Name: davos
text: davos Aim for that star. Don't stop. There's bread and water. Go slow with it. If you finish it off, no matter how thirsty you get, don't drink seawater.

title: Mhysa
Name: gendry
text: gendry I know not to drink seawater.

title: Mhysa
Name: davos
text: davos Row for a full day and night and you'll reach Rook's Rest. You'll want to stop there. Don't. She'll find you.

title: Mhysa
Name: gendry
text: gendry Where should I go?

title: Mhysa
Name: davos
text: davos You must keep the coast on your left side until you reach King's Landing.

title: Mhysa
Name: gendry
text: gendry The gold cloaks are looking for me.

title: Mhysa
Name: davos
text: davos They were looking for me for twenty years. Do they know your face?

title: Mhysa
Name: gendry
text: gendry No.

title: Mhysa
Name: davos
text: davos I'd worry more about the Red Woman.

title: Mhysa
Name: davos
text: davos The other way.

title: Mhysa
Name: davos
text: davos You ever been in a boat before?

title: Mhysa
Name: gendry
text: gendry You know how to swim?

title: Mhysa
Name: davos
text: davos Don't fall out. Go on.

title: Mhysa
Name: gendry
text: gendry Why are you doing this?

title: Mhysa
Name: davos
text: davos Because it's right. And because I'm a slow learner.

title: Mhysa
Name: davos
text: davos When you get to Flea Bottom, have a bowl of brown for me.

title: Mhysa
Name: guard
text: guard Horse approaching! Halt! Halt!

title: Mhysa
Name: sam
text: sam Jon! Jon! Jon, it's us.

title: Mhysa
Name: pyp
text: pyp I don't think he can see us.

title: Mhysa
Name: jon
text: jon Pyp? Sam?

title: Mhysa
Name: sam
text: sam Hush, now. You're home. Carry him inside. Gently.

title: Mhysa
Name: man
text: man Out of the way. Step aside, country boy. People working here.

title: Mhysa
Name: jaime
text: jaime Cersei.

title: Mhysa
Name: stannis
text: stannis You don't deny it?

title: Mhysa
Name: davos
text: davos No. I let him go.

title: Mhysa
Name: melisandre
text: melisandre Your mercy saved the boy's life. You feel good about that?

title: Mhysa
Name: davos
text: davos Aye, I do.

title: Mhysa
Name: melisandre
text: melisandre You saved one innocent. How many tens of thousands have you doomed?

title: Mhysa
Name: davos
text: davos There has got to be another way.

title: Mhysa
Name: stannis
text: stannis What other way?! Tell us about this other way.

title: Mhysa
Name: davos
text: davos I don't know, Your Grace. I can't see the future in the fire.

title: Mhysa
Name: stannis
text: stannis Very well, Ser Davos Seaworth. I, Stannis of the House Baratheon, First of My Name, Rightful King of the Andals and the First Men, sentence you to die.

title: Mhysa
Name: davos
text: davos I understand. But since you haven't yet unnamed me Hand of the King, it is my duty to advise you against it. You're gonna need me.

title: Mhysa
Name: melisandre
text: melisandre Take him away.

title: Mhysa
Name: stannis
text: stannis Why am I gonna need you?

title: Mhysa
Name: melisandre
text: melisandre My king.

title: Mhysa
Name: davos
text: davos It's from Maester Aemon of the Night's Watch. Their Lord Commander is dead. Took a ranging party north and never made it back. One lad did, though. What he saw beyond the Wall- it's coming for all of us.

title: Mhysa
Name: stannis
text: stannis When did you learn to read?

title: Mhysa
Name: davos
text: davos Matthos taught me before he died so I could be of better service to you.

title: Mhysa
Name: melisandre
text: melisandre This War of Five Kings means nothing. The true war lies to the north, my king. Death marches on the Wall. Only you can stop him.

title: Mhysa
Name: davos
text: davos You can't stop him alone. You need someone to rebuild your army for you, someone to convince this lord and that lord to fight for you, to bring sellswords and pirates to your side.

title: Mhysa
Name: stannis
text: stannis I've made my decision.

title: Mhysa
Name: melisandre
text: melisandre He's right. You need him. He has a part to play in the war to come.

title: Mhysa
Name: stannis
text: stannis You see, Ser Davos? You've been saved by that fire god you like to mock. You're in his army now.

title: Mhysa
Name: barristan
text: barristan They will come, Your Grace. When they're ready.

title: Mhysa
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys Perhaps they didn't want to be conquered.

title: Mhysa
Name: jorah
text: jorah You didn't conquer them. You liberated them.

title: Mhysa
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys People learn to love their chains.

title: Mhysa
Name: missandei
text: missandei This is Daenerys Targaryen, the Stormborn, the Unburnt, the Queen of the Seven Kingdoms of Westeros, Mother of Dragons. It is to her you owe your freedom

title: Mhysa
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys No.

title: Mhysa
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys You do not owe me your freedom. I cannot give it to you. Your freedom is not mine to give. It belongs to you and you alone. If you want it back, you must take it for yourselves. Each and every one of you.

title: Mhysa
Name: man
text: man Mhysa!

title: Mhysa
Name: daughter
text: daughter Mhysa!

title: Mhysa
Name: crowd
text: crowd Mhysa! Mhysa! Mhysa! Mhysa! Mhysa!

title: Mhysa
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys What does it mean?

title: Mhysa
Name: missandei
text: missandei It is old Ghiscari, khaleesi. It means 'mother'.

title: Mhysa
Name: crowd
text: crowd Mhysa! Mhysa! Mhysa.

title: Mhysa
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys It's all right. These people won't hurt me.

title: Mhysa
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys Fly.

title: Mhysa
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys Let me pass

title: Mhysa
Name: crowd
text: crowd Mhysa! Mhysa! Mhysa. Mhysa!

title: Two Swords
Name: jaime
text: jaime Magnificent.

title: Two Swords
Name: tywin
text: tywin Mm-hmm.

title: Two Swords
Name: jaime
text: jaime Looks fresh-forged.

title: Two Swords
Name: tywin
text: tywin It is.

title: Two Swords
Name: jaime
text: jaime No one's made a Valyrian steel sword since the Doom of Valyria.

title: Two Swords
Name: tywin
text: tywin There are three living smiths who know how to rework Valyrian steel. The finest of them was in Volantis. Came here to King's Landing at my invitation.

title: Two Swords
Name: jaime
text: jaime Where did you get this much Valyrian steel?

title: Two Swords
Name: tywin
text: tywin From someone who no longer had need of it.

title: Two Swords
Name: jaime
text: jaime You've wanted one of these in the family for a long time.

title: Two Swords
Name: tywin
text: tywin And now we have two.

title: Two Swords
Name: jaime
text: jaime Two?

title: Two Swords
Name: tywin
text: tywin The original weapon was absurdly large. Plenty of steel for two swords.

title: Two Swords
Name: jaime
text: jaime Well, thank you. It's glorious.

title: Two Swords
Name: tywin
text: tywin You'll have to train your left hand.

title: Two Swords
Name: jaime
text: jaime Any decent swordsman knows how to use both hands.

title: Two Swords
Name: tywin
text: tywin You'll never be as good.

title: Two Swords
Name: jaime
text: jaime No. But as long as I'm better than everyone else, I suppose it doesn't matter.

title: Two Swords
Name: tywin
text: tywin You can't serve in the Kingsguard with one hand.

title: Two Swords
Name: jaime
text: jaime Where's that written? I can and I will. The Kingsguard oath is for life.

title: Two Swords
Name: tywin
text: tywin The war is over. The king is safe. The king is never safe.

title: Two Swords
Name: jaime
text: jaime How many people in this city alone would love to see his head on a pike?

title: Two Swords
Name: tywin
text: tywin Other knights protected the king while you were a prisoner. They will continue to do so when you go home.

title: Two Swords
Name: jaime
text: jaime Home?

title: Two Swords
Name: tywin
text: tywin You'll return to Casterly Rock and rule in my stead.

title: Two Swords
Name: jaime
text: jaime You are the Lord of Casterly Rock.

title: Two Swords
Name: tywin
text: tywin I am the King's Hand. My place is here. I don't expect to see the Rock again before I die.

title: Two Swords
Name: jaime
text: jaime You know what they call me? Kingslayer. Oathbreaker. Man without honor. Now you want me to break another sacred vow.

title: Two Swords
Name: tywin
text: tywin You won't be breaking anything. There is a precedent to relieve a Kingsguard of his duties. The king will exercise that prerogative.

title: Two Swords
Name: jaime
text: jaime No.

title: Two Swords
Name: tywin
text: tywin No?

title: Two Swords
Name: tywin
text: tywin I don't believe I asked you a question.

title: Two Swords
Name: jaime
text: jaime There's my answer.

title: Two Swords
Name: tywin
text: tywin If you think your bloody honor comes before...

title: Two Swords
Name: jaime
text: jaime My bloody honor is beyond repair, but my answer is still no. I don't want Casterly Rock. I don't want a wife. I don't want children.

title: Two Swords
Name: tywin
text: tywin What do you want?

title: Two Swords
Name: jaime
text: jaime Supper would be nice.

title: Two Swords
Name: tywin
text: tywin For 40 years I've tried to teach you. If you haven't learned by now, you never will. Go. If serving as a glorified bodyguard is the sum of your ambition, go serve.

title: Two Swords
Name: jaime
text: jaime I suppose you want the sword back.

title: Two Swords
Name: tywin
text: tywin Keep it.

title: Two Swords
Name: tywin
text: tywin A one-handed man with no family needs all the help he can get.

title: Two Swords
Name: bronn
text: bronn How many Dornishmen does it take to fuck a goat?

title: Two Swords
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion Please don't.

title: Two Swords
Name: bronn
text: bronn Seems to me the smart place to meet travelers is in a tavern. That way, one party is late, the other party can drink some ale inside.

title: Two Swords
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion This is the Prince of Dorne we're waiting for, not one of your sellsword friends.

title: Two Swords
Name: bronn
text: bronn If he's so damned important, how come they sent you to meet him?

title: Two Swords
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion There's bad blood between the Martells of Dorne and the Lannisters of Casterly Rock. Has been for years.

title: Two Swords
Name: bronn
text: bronn And just in case the Martells of Dorne are looking to spill some Lannister blood, it may as well be yours, eh?

title: Two Swords
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion No need for cynicism. I happen to be an accomplished diplomat.

title: Two Swords
Name: bronn
text: bronn Oh.

title: Two Swords
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion Ah, here we are.

title: Two Swords
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion Can you read the sigils?

title: Two Swords
Name: bronn
text: bronn Yellow balls?

title: Two Swords
Name: podrick
text: podrick Wild lemons on a purple field, House Dalt of Lemonwood. A vulture grasping a baby in it's talons, House Blackmont. A crowned skull, the Manwoodys of Kingsgrave.

title: Two Swords
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion Boy knows his Dornish Houses.

title: Two Swords
Name: bronn
text: bronn I need a sigil.

title: Two Swords
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion And House Martell, a red sun pierced by a spear?

title: Two Swords
Name: podrick
text: podrick I don't see it, my lord.

title: Two Swords
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion Well met, my lords. His Grace King Joffrey welcomes you in his name. My lord father, the King's Hand, sends his greetings as well. I am Tyrion Lannister of Casterly Rock, Master of Coin. Forgive me. I don't see Prince Doran in your company.

title: Two Swords
Name: dornish
text: dornish The prince's health forces him to remain at Sunspear. He sends his brother Prince Oberyn to attend the royal wedding in his stead.

title: Two Swords
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion Yes, the king will be delighted to enjoy the company of a warrior as renowned as Prince Oberyn at his wedding feast.

title: Two Swords
Name: dornish
text: dornish Will he?

title: Two Swords
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion And where is Prince Oberyn?

title: Two Swords
Name: dornish
text: dornish Arrived before dawn. Not a man for welcome parties, our prince.

title: Two Swords
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion Very well. My lords, these fine men from the City Watch will escort you to your quarters in the Red Keep.

title: Two Swords
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion You must be weary after such a long journey.

title: Two Swords
Name: bronn
text: bronn Some accomplished diplomacy that was. Now where?

title: Two Swords
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion We must find Prince Oberyn before he kills somebody or several somebodies.

title: Two Swords
Name: bronn
text: bronn How do you plan on finding a single Dornishman in a city this big?

title: Two Swords
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion You're famous for fucking half of Westeros. You just arrived at the capital after two weeks of bad roads, where would you go?

title: Two Swords
Name: bronn
text: bronn I'd probably go to sleep, but I'm getting old.

title: Two Swords
Name: oberyn
text: oberyn Look at this one. How lovely is she?

title: Two Swords
Name: ellaria
text: ellaria Beautiful. But pale.

title: Two Swords
Name: oberyn
text: oberyn They like them pale in the capital. Shows they don't work the fields.

title: Two Swords
Name: oberyn
text: oberyn You like?

title: Two Swords
Name: ellaria
text: ellaria Timid. Timid bores me.

title: Two Swords
Name: oberyn
text: oberyn You're a bit of mischief, aren't you?

title: Two Swords
Name: oberyn
text: oberyn I think she likes you. ELLARIA" She has good taste.

title: Two Swords
Name: oberyn
text: oberyn You're not timid, are you?

title: Two Swords
Name: ellaria
text: ellaria Not timid.

title: Two Swords
Name: oberyn
text: oberyn Do you like women?

title: Two Swords
Name: whore
text: whore When they look like her, my lord.

title: Two Swords
Name: ellaria
text: ellaria This one will do nicely.

title: Two Swords
Name: olyvar
text: olyvar Very good, my lady.

title: Two Swords
Name: ellaria
text: ellaria Oh, I'm not a lady.

title: Two Swords
Name: olyvar
text: olyvar A term of courtesy in this establishment.

title: Two Swords
Name: ellaria
text: ellaria A lie anywhere. Why not use the right words? I'm a bastard. She is a whore. And you're what? A procurer.

title: Two Swords
Name: olyvar
text: olyvar Any of the others?

title: Two Swords
Name: oberyn
text: oberyn The two girls can leave.

title: Two Swords
Name: oberyn
text: oberyn You stay.

title: Two Swords
Name: olyvar
text: olyvar I'm afraid I'm not an offer, my lord.

title: Two Swords
Name: oberyn
text: oberyn Everyone who works for Littlefinger is an offer. Take off your clothes. We'll be here a while.

title: Two Swords
Name: olyvar
text: olyvar My lord.

title: Two Swords
Name: oberyn
text: oberyn I am a prince, boy. Have you ever been with a prince?

title: Two Swords
Name: olyvar
text: olyvar Can't say I have. I'm wildly expensive.

title: Two Swords
Name: oberyn
text: oberyn Take off your clothes.

title: Two Swords
Name: olyvar
text: olyvar Which way do you like it?

title: Two Swords
Name: oberyn
text: oberyn My way .

title: Two Swords
Name: morgan
text: morgan And so he spoke and so he spoke That Lord of Castamere. And now the rains

title: Two Swords
Name: ellaria
text: ellaria Oberyn.

title: Two Swords
Name: morgan
text: morgan Weep o'er his hall...

title: Two Swords
Name: ellaria
text: ellaria Oberyn, don't.

title: Two Swords
Name: morgan
text: morgan With no one there to hear Yes, not the rains weep o'er his hall And not a soul to hear.

title: Two Swords
Name: morgans
text: morgans You lost, friend?

title: Two Swords
Name: oberyn
text: oberyn Forgive me for staring. I don't see many Lannisters where I'm from.

title: Two Swords
Name: morgans
text: morgans I don't see many Dornishmen in the capital.

title: Two Swords
Name: oberyn
text: oberyn We don't like the smell.

title: Two Swords
Name: ellaria
text: ellaria Come with me, lover.

title: Two Swords
Name: morgan
text: morgan Gods, look at this one.

title: Two Swords
Name: olyvar
text: olyvar Sirs, if you follow me, I'll arrange for a private room.

title: Two Swords
Name: morgan
text: morgan Why are you wasting a woman like this on a Dornishman? Bring him a shaved goat and a bottle of olive oil.

title: Two Swords
Name: oberyn
text: oberyn Do you know why all the world hates a Lannister?

title: Two Swords
Name: oberyn
text: oberyn You think your gold and your lions and your gold lions make you better than everyone. May I tell you a secret? You're not a golden lion. You're just a pink little man who is far too slow on the draw.

title: Two Swords
Name: oberyn
text: oberyn Longsword is a bad option in close quarters. When I pull my blade, your friend starts bleeding. Quite a lot, I'm afraid. So many veins in the wrist.

title: Two Swords
Name: oberyn
text: oberyn He'll live if you get him help straightaway. So, decisions.

title: Two Swords
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion Prince Oberyn, forgive the intrusion. We heard there might be...

title: Two Swords
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion trouble.

title: Two Swords
Name: oberyn
text: oberyn Apologies, my love.

title: Two Swords
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion I'm here to welcome you to the capital.

title: Two Swords
Name: oberyn
text: oberyn Ellaria Sand, my paramour. The king's own Uncle Imp. Tyrion, son of Tywin Lannister.

title: Two Swords
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion If there's anything I can do to make your stay...

title: Two Swords
Name: oberyn
text: oberyn What are you? His hired killer?

title: Two Swords
Name: bronn
text: bronn It started that way, aye. Now I'm a knight.

title: Two Swords
Name: oberyn
text: oberyn How did that come to pass?

title: Two Swords
Name: bronn
text: bronn Killed the right people, I suppose.

title: Two Swords
Name: oberyn
text: oberyn We'll need a few more girls. Girls, yes?

title: Two Swords
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion Oh, I partook. Now I'm married.

title: Two Swords
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion Prince Oberyn, if I may, a word in private?

title: Two Swords
Name: oberyn
text: oberyn Seems I visited the Lannister brothel by mistake.

title: Two Swords
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion Oh, they take all kinds.

title: Two Swords
Name: oberyn
text: oberyn Even Dornishmen.

title: Two Swords
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion The king is very grateful that you traveled all this way for his wedding.

title: Two Swords
Name: oberyn
text: oberyn Let us speak truth here. Joffrey is insulted. I am only the second son after all.

title: Two Swords
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion Well, speaking as a fellow second son, I have grown rather used to being the family insult.

title: Two Swords
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion Why did you come to King's Landing, Prince Oberyn?

title: Two Swords
Name: oberyn
text: oberyn I was invited to the royal wedding.

title: Two Swords
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion I thought we were speaking truth.

title: Two Swords
Name: oberyn
text: oberyn The last time I was in the capital was many years ago. Another wedding. My sister Elia and Rhaegar Targaryen, the Last Dragon. My sister loved him. She bore his children. Swaddled them, rocked them, fed them at her own breast. Elia wouldn't let the wet nurse touch them. And beautiful, noble Rhaegar Targaryen left her for another woman. That started a war and the war ended right here when your father's army took the city...

title: Two Swords
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion I wasn't actually present.

title: Two Swords
Name: oberyn
text: oberyn And butchered those children. My nephew and niece. Carved them up and wrapped them in Lannister cloaks. And my sister, you know what they did to her?

title: Two Swords
Name: oberyn
text: oberyn I'm asking you a question.

title: Two Swords
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion I've heard rumors.

title: Two Swords
Name: oberyn
text: oberyn So have I. The one I keep hearing is that Gregor Clegane the Mountain raped Elia and split her in half with his great sword.

title: Two Swords
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion I wasn't there. I don't know what happened.

title: Two Swords
Name: oberyn
text: oberyn If the Mountain killed my sister, your father gave the order. Tell your father I'm here. And tell him the Lannisters aren't the only ones who pay their debts.

title: Two Swords
Name: jorah
text: jorah They're dragons, Khaleesi. They can never be tamed. Not even by their mother.

title: Two Swords
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys Ser Barristan.

title: Two Swords
Name: barristan
text: barristan Your Grace.

title: Two Swords
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys Where's Daario Naharis? Where's Grey Worm?

title: Two Swords
Name: barristan
text: barristan Gambling, Your Grace.

title: Two Swords
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys Gambling?

title: Two Swords
Name: crowd
text: crowd Mhysa. Mhysa. Mhysa...

title: Two Swords
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys How long have they been at it?

title: Two Swords
Name: missandei
text: missandei Since midnight, Your Grace.

title: Two Swords
Name: daario
text: daario Ser Worm is stronger than he looks. But I can see his arms beginning to shake.

title: Two Swords
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys What's the prize to winning this stupid contest?

title: Two Swords
Name: daario
text: daario The honor of riding by your side on the road to Meereen.

title: Two Swords
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys That honor goes to Ser Jorah and Ser Barristan as neither of them kept me waiting this morning. You two will ride in the rear guard and protect the livestock.

title: Two Swords
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys The last man holding his sword can find a new queen to fight for.

title: Two Swords
Name: daario
text: daario You like this girl? Must be frustrating.

title: Two Swords
Name: grey
text: grey You are not a smart man, Daario Naharis.

title: Two Swords
Name: daario
text: daario I'd rather have no brains and two balls.

title: Two Swords
Name: shae
text: shae You need to eat something.

title: Two Swords
Name: shae
text: shae Pigeon pie.

title: Two Swords
Name: sansa
text: sansa No, thank you.

title: Two Swords
Name: shae
text: shae Lemon cakes?

title: Two Swords
Name: shae
text: shae You love lemon cakes.

title: Two Swords
Name: shae
text: shae Tell her she needs to eat.

title: Two Swords
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion My lady, you do need to eat.

title: Two Swords
Name: sansa
text: sansa I don't need to eat.

title: Two Swords
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion If I could have a moment alone with my wife.

title: Two Swords
Name: shae
text: shae She needs to eat.

title: Two Swords
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion I can't let you starve.

title: Two Swords
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion I swore to protect you.

title: Two Swords
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion My lady, I am your husband. Let me help you.

title: Two Swords
Name: sansa
text: sansa How can you help me?

title: Two Swords
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion I don't know, but I can try.

title: Two Swords
Name: sansa
text: sansa I lie awake all night staring at the canopy thinking about how they died.

title: Two Swords
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion I could get you essence of nightshade to help you sleep.

title: Two Swords
Name: sansa
text: sansa Do you know what they did to my brother? How they sewed his direwolf's head onto his body? And my mother. They say they cut her throat to the bone and threw her body in the river.

title: Two Swords
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion What happened to your family was a terrible crime. I didn't know your brother. He seemed like a good man, but I didn't know him. Your mother, on the other hand, I admired her. She wanted to have me executed, but I admired her. She was a strong woman. And she was fierce when it came to protecting her children. Sansa. Your mother would want you to carry on. You know it's true.

title: Two Swords
Name: sansa
text: sansa Will you pardon me, my lord? I'd like to visit the godswood.

title: Two Swords
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion Of course. Of course. Prayer can be helpful, I hear.

title: Two Swords
Name: sansa
text: sansa I don't pray anymore. It's the only place I can go where people don't talk to me.

title: Two Swords
Name: shae
text: shae My lion.

title: Two Swords
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion What are you doing?

title: Two Swords
Name: shae
text: shae What does it look like I'm doing? Come here.

title: Two Swords
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion How many times have I told you? You can't visit me here.

title: Two Swords
Name: shae
text: shae I know. I know. We have come to a dangerous place. Have you forgotten me? Do you know how long it's been?

title: Two Swords
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion Of course I haven't forgotten.

title: Two Swords
Name: shae
text: shae I want you. Don't you want me?

title: Two Swords
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion Things are a bit tense right now.

title: Two Swords
Name: shae
text: shae What things?

title: Two Swords
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion My nephew the king wants to murder me. My wife hates me because my father murdered her family. Oberyn Martell wants to murder everyone whose last name is Lannister.

title: Two Swords
Name: shae
text: shae You need to relax.

title: Two Swords
Name: shae
text: shae Don't you want to relax?

title: Two Swords
Name: shae
text: shae What's wrong?

title: Two Swords
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion I told you. It's not a good time.

title: Two Swords
Name: shae
text: shae It's never a good time. You have your child bride now.

title: Two Swords
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion Shae.

title: Two Swords
Name: shae
text: shae Do you love her?

title: Two Swords
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion Love her? I barely know her. She's a child. She despises me.

title: Two Swords
Name: shae
text: shae That's not an answer.

title: Two Swords
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion Of course I don't love her.

title: Two Swords
Name: shae
text: shae You tried to ship me away.

title: Two Swords
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion Ship you away?

title: Two Swords
Name: shae
text: shae Give me diamonds and make me disappear.

title: Two Swords
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion What in the world are you talking about?

title: Two Swords
Name: shae
text: shae If you want me to leave, just say it. Say it!

title: Two Swords
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion Shh. I don't know what you're talking about.

title: Two Swords
Name: shae
text: shae You want me to stay?

title: Two Swords
Name: qyburn
text: qyburn A work of art, really. The craftsmanship is excellent.

title: Two Swords
Name: jaime
text: jaime You like it so much, you're welcome to chop off your own hand and take it.

title: Two Swords
Name: cersei
text: cersei Such an ingrate. I spent days with the goldsmith - getting the details just right.

title: Two Swords
Name: jaime
text: jaime Days?

title: Two Swords
Name: cersei
text: cersei Better part of an afternoon. There, how does that feel?

title: Two Swords
Name: jaime
text: jaime Uh... a hook would be more practical.

title: Two Swords
Name: cersei
text: cersei Elegant, I think.

title: Two Swords
Name: cersei
text: cersei Thank you for your help with the other matter.

title: Two Swords
Name: qyburn
text: qyburn The symptoms have abated?

title: Two Swords
Name: cersei
text: cersei Gone completely. I am in your debt, Maester Qyburn.

title: Two Swords
Name: qyburn
text: qyburn Not a maester, Your Grace, but happy to help whenever I can.

title: Two Swords
Name: jaime
text: jaime Odd little man.

title: Two Swords
Name: cersei
text: cersei I've grown rather fond of him. He's quite talented, you know?

title: Two Swords
Name: jaime
text: jaime What symptoms?

title: Two Swords
Name: cersei
text: cersei Symptoms that are not your concern.

title: Two Swords
Name: jaime
text: jaime You let him touch you?

title: Two Swords
Name: cersei
text: cersei You jealous?

title: Two Swords
Name: jaime
text: jaime I'm surprised. You never let Pycelle near you.

title: Two Swords
Name: cersei
text: cersei You think I'd let that old lecher put his hands on me? He smells like a dead cat.

title: Two Swords
Name: jaime
text: jaime I'm not sure I've ever smelled a dead cat.

title: Two Swords
Name: cersei
text: cersei Well, they smell like Pycelle.

title: Two Swords
Name: jaime
text: jaime You drink more than you used to.

title: Two Swords
Name: cersei
text: cersei Yes.

title: Two Swords
Name: jaime
text: jaime Why?

title: Two Swords
Name: cersei
text: cersei Let's see, you started a brawl in the streets with Ned Stark and disappeared from the capital. My husband died in a tragic hunting accident.

title: Two Swords
Name: jaime
text: jaime It must have been traumatic for you.

title: Two Swords
Name: cersei
text: cersei My only daughter was shipped off to Dorne. We suffered through a siege.

title: Two Swords
Name: jaime
text: jaime A rather short siege.

title: Two Swords
Name: cersei
text: cersei A rather short siege that I didn't expect to survive. And now I'm marrying my eldest son to a wicked little bitch from Highgarden while I'm supposed to marry her brother, a renowned pillow biter. So...

title: Two Swords
Name: jaime
text: jaime Father disowned me today.

title: Two Swords
Name: cersei
text: cersei He can't disown you. You're all he's got.

title: Two Swords
Name: jaime
text: jaime You're forgetting Tyrion.

title: Two Swords
Name: cersei
text: cersei You don't really plan on staying in the Kingsguard, do you?

title: Two Swords
Name: jaime
text: jaime Staying in the Kingsguard means I live right here in the Red Keep with you.

title: Two Swords
Name: cersei
text: cersei Not now.

title: Two Swords
Name: jaime
text: jaime I want... Not now? When? I've been back for weeks.

title: Two Swords
Name: jaime
text: jaime Something's changed.

title: Two Swords
Name: cersei
text: cersei Everything's changed. You come back after all this time with no apologies and one hand and expect everything to be the same?

title: Two Swords
Name: jaime
text: jaime What do you want me to apologize for?

title: Two Swords
Name: cersei
text: cersei For leaving me.

title: Two Swords
Name: jaime
text: jaime You think I wanted to be taken prisoner?

title: Two Swords
Name: cersei
text: cersei Don't know what you wanted. You weren't here. You left me alone.

title: Two Swords
Name: jaime
text: jaime Every day I was a prisoner, I plotted my escape. Every day. I murdered people so I could be here with you.

title: Two Swords
Name: cersei
text: cersei You took too long.

title: Two Swords
Name: jaime
text: jaime I... What are you saying?

title: Two Swords
Name: cersei
text: cersei I'm saying you took too long.

title: Two Swords
Name: cersei
text: cersei Come in.

title: Two Swords
Name: jaime
text: jaime Go away.

title: Two Swords
Name: marei
text: marei Forgive me, Your Grace. You told me to come at once if there was anything important.

title: Two Swords
Name: tormund
text: tormund You plan on killing all the crows yourself?

title: Two Swords
Name: ygritte
text: ygritte Do you plan on sitting here scratching your balls till winter?

title: Two Swords
Name: tormund
text: tormund We wait for Mance's orders.

title: Two Swords
Name: ygritte
text: ygritte You sent a man over the Wall at the full moon. If he's not back yet, he's not coming back.

title: Two Swords
Name: tormund
text: tormund And what is it you want? March on Castle Black with just this lot? Your pretty crow said 1,000 men are nesting there.

title: Two Swords
Name: ygritte
text: ygritte Yeah, well, he's a liar.

title: Two Swords
Name: tormund
text: tormund He is? Shouldn't it be "he was"? You said you put three arrows in him.

title: Two Swords
Name: ygritte
text: ygritte I did.

title: Two Swords
Name: tormund
text: tormund I've seen you slip a shaft through a rabbit's eye at 200 yards. If that boy's still walking, it's 'cause you let him go.

title: Two Swords
Name: tormund
text: tormund Thenns. I fucking hate Thenns.

title: Two Swords
Name: tormund
text: tormund Mance sent you?

title: Two Swords
Name: tormund
text: tormund How did you find us?

title: Two Swords
Name: tormund
text: tormund You came from the south, not the north.

title: Two Swords
Name: warg
text: warg Took a detour. Got some supper from a village down that way.

title: Two Swords
Name: styr
text: styr Why does the meat down here taste so much better than it does on our side of the Wall?

title: Two Swords
Name: tormund
text: tormund Help yourself.

title: Two Swords
Name: styr
text: styr Maybe everything's just better fed down here.

title: Two Swords
Name: styr
text: styr Fat and lazy. Easier for us, hmm?

title: Two Swords
Name: styr
text: styr You didn't see us coming? Lost your warg? And that baby crow you had with you, lost him too?

title: Two Swords
Name: tormund
text: tormund I'll answer to Mance. I won't answer to you.

title: Two Swords
Name: styr
text: styr She yours?

title: Two Swords
Name: ygritte
text: ygritte I'm not anybody's.

title: Two Swords
Name: styr
text: styr Too scrawny. Not like those crows at Castle Black.

title: Two Swords
Name: styr
text: styr Think of them stuck in their larders stuffing their faces with ham and blood sausage and stew, getting nice and fat and marbled.

title: Two Swords
Name: styr
text: styr I know we've had our differences, Tormund, but just one time before you die, you really ought to try crow.

title: Two Swords
Name: officer
text: officer Draw. Loose.

title: Two Swords
Name: jon
text: jon Last time I saw him, he was in the courtyard at Winterfell. "He said, " Next time I see you, you'll be all in black." I was jealous of Robb my whole life. The way my father looked at him, I wanted that. He was better than me at everything... fighting and hunting and riding and girls. Gods, the girls loved him. I wanted to hate him, but I never could.

title: Two Swords
Name: sam
text: sam Sometimes I want to hate you.

title: Two Swords
Name: sam
text: sam Well, you're better than me at everything. Except reading.

title: Two Swords
Name: sam
text: sam They're... they're ready for you.

title: Two Swords
Name: jon
text: jon He's wanted to hang me for a while. Now's his chance.

title: Two Swords
Name: sam
text: sam No one's going to hang you. You've done nothing wrong.

title: Two Swords
Name: jon
text: jon I've done plenty wrong.

title: Two Swords
Name: alliser
text: alliser So you admit you murdered Qhorin Halfhand?

title: Two Swords
Name: jon
text: jon I didn't murder him.

title: Two Swords
Name: alliser
text: alliser No? You put your sword through a brother of the Night's Watch. What do you call that?

title: Two Swords
Name: jon
text: jon He wanted me to kill him.

title: Two Swords
Name: janos
text: janos A bastard son of a traitor. What would you expect?

title: Two Swords
Name: jon
text: jon The Halfhand believed our only chance to stop Mance was to get a man inside his army.

title: Two Swords
Name: alliser
text: alliser Don't talk about the Halfhand as if you knew him. He was my brother.

title: Two Swords
Name: jon
text: jon Then you'd know he'd do anything to defend the Wall. The free folk would have boiled him alive, but letting me kill him...

title: Two Swords
Name: janos
text: janos The free folk? Listen to him. He even talks like a wildling now.

title: Two Swords
Name: jon
text: jon Aye, I talk like a wildling. I ate with the wildlings. I climbed the Wall with the wildlings. I... I laid with a wildling girl.

title: Two Swords
Name: janos
text: janos You admit to breaking your vows, then?

title: Two Swords
Name: jon
text: jon I do.

title: Two Swords
Name: janos
text: janos The law is the law. The boy must die.

title: Two Swords
Name: maester
text: maester If we beheaded every ranger who lay with a girl, the Wall would be manned by headless men.

title: Two Swords
Name: alliser
text: alliser There's a difference between sneaking off to the Mole's Town brothel and sleeping with the enemy.

title: Two Swords
Name: jon
text: jon While we sit here debating which rules I broke, Mance Rayder marches on the Wall with an army of 100,000.

title: Two Swords
Name: alliser
text: alliser Impossible. You can't get 50 wildlings together before they start killing each other.

title: Two Swords
Name: jon
text: jon 100,000. He's united the Thenns, the Hornfoots, the ice-river clans. He has giants fighting for him.

title: Two Swords
Name: janos
text: janos Giants?

title: Two Swords
Name: jon
text: jon Have you ever been beyond the Wall, ser?

title: Two Swords
Name: janos
text: janos I commanded the City Watch of King's Landing, boy.

title: Two Swords
Name: jon
text: jon And now you're here. You must not have been very good at your job.

title: Two Swords
Name: janos
text: janos How dare you?!

title: Two Swords
Name: jon
text: jon There's a band of wildlings south of the Wall already led by Tormund Giantsbane. I killed their warg and three others. They shot me full of arrows. Their orders are to attack Castle Black from the south when Mance hits it from the north. The signal for the attack will be a bonfire. Mance said it would be the greatest fire the North has ever seen. That's the truth. All the truth.

title: Two Swords
Name: jon
text: jon Do you intend to execute me or am I free to go?

title: Two Swords
Name: maester
text: maester None of us are free. We are men of the Night's Watch. But we won't be taking your head today, Jon Snow. Go on.

title: Two Swords
Name: alliser
text: alliser I am acting commander here, Maester Aemon.

title: Two Swords
Name: maester
text: maester Yes, you are.

title: Two Swords
Name: alliser
text: alliser And I don't trust the bastard.

title: Two Swords
Name: maester
text: maester He told the truth.

title: Two Swords
Name: alliser
text: alliser And you always know when a man's telling a lie? How did you acquire this magical power?

title: Two Swords
Name: maester
text: maester I grew up in King's Landing.

title: Two Swords
Name: olenna
text: olenna No. No. You're a queen, not an ox.

title: Two Swords
Name: olenna
text: olenna Your grandfather gave me a necklace just like this one for my 51st nameday.

title: Two Swords
Name: margaery
text: margaery The wedding is in a fortnight, Grandmother. You can't say no to everything.

title: Two Swords
Name: olenna
text: olenna Nonsense.

title: Two Swords
Name: olenna
text: olenna My little dears. Go and speak to the jewelers of King's Landing. Tell them who you are, tell them who sent you. The one who brings me the best necklace will get to keep the next best.

title: Two Swords
Name: olenna
text: olenna The Margaery Tyrell who walks into the sept a fortnight from now will inspire 1,000 songs. Now, how sad it will be if she's wearing rubbish like that.

title: Two Swords
Name: margaery
text: margaery Perhaps I should just let Joffrey choose it for me. End up with a string of dead sparrow heads around my neck.

title: Two Swords
Name: olenna
text: olenna You watch that. Even here, even with me.

title: Two Swords
Name: olenna
text: olenna My word.

title: Two Swords
Name: brienne
text: brienne My lady. My lady. Please pardon me for interrupting. My name is Brienne of Tarth.

title: Two Swords
Name: olenna
text: olenna We know who you are. We've heard all about you. But hearing is one thing. Aren't you just marvelous? Absolutely singular.

title: Two Swords
Name: olenna
text: olenna I hear you knocked my grandson into the dirt like the silly little boy he is.

title: Two Swords
Name: brienne
text: brienne My lady, I know this is a very busy time for you, but if I could just have a moment.

title: Two Swords
Name: olenna
text: olenna You dare not refuse.

title: Two Swords
Name: margaery
text: margaery A shadow?

title: Two Swords
Name: brienne
text: brienne A shadow with the face of Stannis Baratheon. I swear to you by all the gods it was Stannis. He plunged his sword through Renly's heart and disappeared. One day, my lady, I will avenge our king.

title: Two Swords
Name: margaery
text: margaery Joffrey is our king now.

title: Two Swords
Name: brienne
text: brienne I meant no offense.

title: Two Swords
Name: margaery
text: margaery And you've given none.

title: Two Swords
Name: jaime
text: jaime All the Kingsguard will be on duty, of course. Ser Boros will be stationed here. Ser Preston will be stationed here beside the primary entertainment. Your Grace?

title: Two Swords
Name: joffrey
text: joffrey Yes, yes, one guard at the... the thing. Go on.

title: Two Swords
Name: jaime
text: jaime Ser Meryn will guard Lady Margaery and Tommen.

title: Two Swords
Name: meryn
text: meryn I've always guarded the king himself, my lord. Ever since your absence.

title: Two Swords
Name: jaime
text: jaime And I thank you for it, Ser Meryn. All very good. I don't expect any trouble.

title: Two Swords
Name: meryn
text: meryn The people love their king. They know who keeps them fed.

title: Two Swords
Name: jaime
text: jaime Margaery Tyrell, I've heard.

title: Two Swords
Name: joffrey
text: joffrey By my leave. They know I saved the city. They know I won the war.

title: Two Swords
Name: jaime
text: jaime The war's not won. Not while Stannis lives.

title: Two Swords
Name: joffrey
text: joffrey I broke Stannis on the Blackwater. Pity you weren't there to help, Uncle.

title: Two Swords
Name: jaime
text: jaime My apologies, Your Grace. I was rather busy.

title: Two Swords
Name: joffrey
text: joffrey Busy getting captured.

title: Two Swords
Name: jaime
text: jaime So this is the famous "Book of Brothers"? All the great deeds of all the great Kingsguard. Ser Arthur Dayne. The Sword of the Morning. Led the attack on the Kingswood Brotherhood. Defeated the Smiling Knight in single combat. Ser Duncan the Tall. Four pages for Ser Duncan. He must have been quite a man.

title: Two Swords
Name: jaime
text: jaime So they say.

title: Two Swords
Name: joffrey
text: joffrey Ser Jaime Lannister.

title: Two Swords
Name: joffrey
text: joffrey Someone forgot to write down all your great deeds.

title: Two Swords
Name: jaime
text: jaime There's still time.

title: Two Swords
Name: joffrey
text: joffrey Is there? For a 40-year-old knight with one hand? How can you protect me with that?

title: Two Swords
Name: jaime
text: jaime I use my left hand now, Your Grace. Makes for more of a contest.

title: Two Swords
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys Have you ever been to Meereen?

title: Two Swords
Name: missandei
text: missandei Several times, Your Grace, with Master Kraznys.

title: Two Swords
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys And?

title: Two Swords
Name: missandei
text: missandei They say 1,000 slaves died building the Great Pyramid of Meereen.

title: Two Swords
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys And now an army of former slaves is marching to her gates. You think the Great Masters are worried?

title: Two Swords
Name: missandei
text: missandei If they're smart, Your Grace.

title: Two Swords
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys You were told to ride at the back of the train.

title: Two Swords
Name: daario
text: daario Yes, my queen. But I need to speak to you about something important. A matter of strategy.

title: Two Swords
Name: missandei
text: missandei Your Grace.

title: Two Swords
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys All right, what is this matter of strategy?

title: Two Swords
Name: daario
text: daario A dusk rose.

title: Two Swords
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys Would you like to walk at the back of the train instead of riding?

title: Two Swords
Name: daario
text: daario And this one's called lady's lace.

title: Two Swords
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys Would you like to walk without shoes?

title: Two Swords
Name: daario
text: daario You have to know a land to rule it. It's plants, it's rivers, it's roads, it's people. Dusk rose tea eases fever. Everyone in Meereen knows that. Especially the slaves who have to make the tea. If you want them to follow you, you have to become a part of their world. Strategy.

title: Two Swords
Name: daario
text: daario Harpy's Gold. No tea from this one. Beautiful but poisonous.

title: Two Swords
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys You are a gambler, aren't you?

title: Two Swords
Name: daario
text: daario Your Grace.

title: Two Swords
Name: jorah
text: jorah There's one on every mile marker between here and Meereen.

title: Two Swords
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys How many miles are there between here and Meereen?

title: Two Swords
Name: barristan
text: barristan 163, Your Grace. I'll tell our men to ride ahead and bury them. You don't need to see this.

title: Two Swords
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys You will do no such thing. I will see each and every one of their faces. Remove her collar before you bury her.

title: Two Swords
Name: brienne
text: brienne There she is.

title: Two Swords
Name: jaime
text: jaime Yes, there she is.

title: Two Swords
Name: brienne
text: brienne And? You made a promise.

title: Two Swords
Name: jaime
text: jaime To return the Stark girls to their mother who is now dead.

title: Two Swords
Name: brienne
text: brienne To keep them safe.

title: Two Swords
Name: jaime
text: jaime Well, Arya Stark hasn't been seen since her father was killed. Where do you think she is? My money's on dead. There's a certain safety in death, wouldn't you say? And Sansa Stark is now Sansa Lannister. Bit of a complication.

title: Two Swords
Name: brienne
text: brienne A complication does not release you from a vow.

title: Two Swords
Name: jaime
text: jaime What do you want me to do? Kidnap my sister-in-law? And take her where? Where would she be safer than here?

title: Two Swords
Name: brienne
text: brienne Look me in the eye and tell me that you think she'll be safe in King's Landing.

title: Two Swords
Name: jaime
text: jaime Are you sure we're not related? Ever since I've returned, every Lannister I've seen has been a miserable pain in my ass. Maybe you're a Lannister, too. You've got the hair for it if not the looks.

title: Two Swords
Name: ser
text: ser It's all right. It's all right. It's all right.

title: Two Swords
Name: sansa
text: sansa You're drunk.

title: Two Swords
Name: ser
text: ser Yes. I have good reason to be. Once I was a knight. Now I'm only a fool. Don't you know me?

title: Two Swords
Name: sansa
text: sansa Ser Dontos. The king's nameday celebration. I'm sorry. I should have remembered.

title: Two Swords
Name: ser
text: ser I can't accept your apology. I may be a fool, but I'm a living fool, thanks to you.

title: Two Swords
Name: sansa
text: sansa Anyone would have done the same.

title: Two Swords
Name: ser
text: ser But only you did. I can never repay you. You gave me my life. But this, this is worth more than my life.

title: Two Swords
Name: ser
text: ser It belonged to my mother and her mother before her. House Hollard was strong once. House on the rise. That's all that's left of those days, thanks to a few sad, fat drunks like me.

title: Two Swords
Name: sansa
text: sansa I can't take it. It's very, very kind of you, but I can't.

title: Two Swords
Name: ser
text: ser I don't have anything else left. That's all. Take it. Wear it. Let my name have one more moment in the sun before it disappears from the world.

title: Two Swords
Name: sansa
text: sansa I'll wear it with pride, Ser Dontos.

title: Two Swords
Name: ser
text: ser Yeah.

title: Two Swords
Name: arya
text: arya When am I going to get a horse of my own?

title: Two Swords
Name: sandor
text: sandor The little lady wants a pony.

title: Two Swords
Name: arya
text: arya The little lady wants away from your stench.

title: Two Swords
Name: sandor
text: sandor Horses aren't easy to come by. Even if they were, you think I'm gonna put you on your own horse? Watch the only thing of value I've got in the world ride away?

title: Two Swords
Name: arya
text: arya Why don't you have any money? Didn't you steal anything from Joffrey before you left?

title: Two Swords
Name: sandor
text: sandor No.

title: Two Swords
Name: arya
text: arya You're not very smart, are you?

title: Two Swords
Name: sandor
text: sandor I'm not a thief.

title: Two Swords
Name: arya
text: arya You're fine with murdering little boys, but thieving is beneath you?

title: Two Swords
Name: sandor
text: sandor A man's got to have a code.

title: Two Swords
Name: arya
text: arya You think I'm gonna escape? Where would I go? I'd be dead by nightfall without you. My family's gone. I've got no one.

title: Two Swords
Name: sandor
text: sandor You've got an aunt in the Vale. Your rich Aunt Lysa. After I sell you to her, maybe she'll have enough left over to buy you that pony you want so much.

title: Two Swords
Name: arya
text: arya I'm hungry. You're hungry.

title: Two Swords
Name: sandor
text: sandor Five horses, five men. More than I feel like killing on an empty stomach.

title: Two Swords
Name: arya
text: arya I know him. The small one. His name is Polliver. He captured us and took us to Harrenhal.

title: Two Swords
Name: arya
text: arya He killed Lommy.

title: Two Swords
Name: sandor
text: sandor What the fuck's a Lommy?

title: Two Swords
Name: arya
text: arya He was my friend. Polliver stole my sword and put it right through his neck. He's still got it.

title: Two Swords
Name: sandor
text: sandor Got what?

title: Two Swords
Name: arya
text: arya My sword Needle.

title: Two Swords
Name: sandor
text: sandor Needle? Of course you named your sword.

title: Two Swords
Name: arya
text: arya Lots of people name their swords.

title: Two Swords
Name: sandor
text: sandor Lots of cunts.

title: Two Swords
Name: sandor
text: sandor What are you... get back here.

title: Two Swords
Name: arya
text: arya My brother gave me that sword.

title: Two Swords
Name: sandor
text: sandor Get back here.

title: Two Swords
Name: arya
text: arya He killed my friend.

title: Two Swords
Name: sandor
text: sandor I don't care if he ate your friend. We're not going in there.

title: Two Swords
Name: man
text: man Come on, give it up.

title: Two Swords
Name: man
text: man Come here.

title: Two Swords
Name: man
text: man Let's have a feel there.

title: Two Swords
Name: man
text: man Leave it.

title: Two Swords
Name: innkeeper
text: innkeeper Please, she's a good girl.

title: Two Swords
Name: polliver
