text: polliver Shut your mouth and pour us more ale and we may not take her with us when we're done with her.

title: Two Swords
Name: polliver
text: polliver I know you.

title: Two Swords
Name: polliver
text: polliver You're the Hound.

title: Two Swords
Name: polliver
text: polliver Pour our new friend some ale. What brings you so far north?

title: Two Swords
Name: sandor
text: sandor I could ask the same of you. What are you doing up here?

title: Two Swords
Name: polliver
text: polliver Just keeping the king's peace.

title: Two Swords
Name: sandor
text: sandor No need. The war's over.

title: Two Swords
Name: polliver
text: polliver So I've heard. Stannis defeated at the Blackwater. Robb Stark killed at the Twins. And where am I for all of it? Stuck with your brother. Meaning no offense.

title: Two Swords
Name: sandor
text: sandor None taken.

title: Two Swords
Name: polliver
text: polliver He's good, the Mountain is. Best at what he does. But torture, torture, torture, torture. You spend enough time putting the hammer to people, you start to feel like a carpenter making chairs. Drains the fun right out of it. And what's life without a little fun?

title: Two Swords
Name: polliver
text: polliver But I don't need to tell you that, eh?

title: Two Swords
Name: sandor
text: sandor She's all right. I've had better.

title: Two Swords
Name: polliver
text: polliver You know what? You should come with us. His kind, they've always got something hidden away somewhere. Gold, silver, more daughters. Always something if you know how to make them talk. And there's plenty of him between here and King's Landing. You could do well for yourself. We certainly have been.

title: Two Swords
Name: sandor
text: sandor I'm not going to King's Landing.

title: Two Swords
Name: polliver
text: polliver Think about it. We could do whatever we like wherever we go. These are the king's colors. No one's standing in his way now. Which means no one's standing in ours.

title: Two Swords
Name: sandor
text: sandor Fuck the king.

title: Two Swords
Name: polliver
text: polliver When I heard that Joffrey's dog had tucked tail and run from the Battle of the Blackwater, I didn't believe it. But here you are.

title: Two Swords
Name: sandor
text: sandor Here I am. Bring me one of those chickens.

title: Two Swords
Name: polliver
text: polliver You got money to pay for it?

title: Two Swords
Name: sandor
text: sandor You paid for it?

title: Two Swords
Name: polliver
text: polliver No. But we're the king's men. So, you got money?

title: Two Swords
Name: sandor
text: sandor Not a penny.

title: Two Swords
Name: sandor
text: sandor I'll still take that chicken.

title: Two Swords
Name: polliver
text: polliver Tell you what. We'll trade you. One of our little chickens for one of yours. Give us a go at your friend. Lowell there likes them a bit broken in.

title: Two Swords
Name: sandor
text: sandor You're a talker. Listening to talkers makes me thirsty.

title: Two Swords
Name: sandor
text: sandor Ah. And hungry. Think I'll take two chickens.

title: Two Swords
Name: polliver
text: polliver You don't seem to understand the situation.

title: Two Swords
Name: sandor
text: sandor I understand that if any more words come pouring out of your cunt mouth, I'm gonna have to eat every fucking chicken in this room.

title: Two Swords
Name: polliver
text: polliver You lived your life for the king. You're gonna die for some chickens?

title: Two Swords
Name: sandor
text: sandor Someone is.

title: Two Swords
Name: arya
text: arya Something wrong with your leg, boy?

title: Two Swords
Name: polliver
text: polliver What? What do you mean?

title: Two Swords
Name: arya
text: arya Can you walk? I've got to carry you?

title: Two Swords
Name: polliver
text: polliver Carry me?

title: Two Swords
Name: arya
text: arya Fine little blade.

title: Two Swords
Name: arya
text: arya Maybe I'll pick my teeth with it.

title: The Lion and the Rose
Name: ramsay
text: ramsay Tansy! Tansy! Tansy!

title: The Lion and the Rose
Name: ramsay
text: ramsay Tansy! Tansy!

title: The Lion and the Rose
Name: ramsay
text: ramsay There you are.

title: The Lion and the Rose
Name: myranda
text: myranda I can't see her, Ramsay.

title: The Lion and the Rose
Name: ramsay
text: ramsay Tansy!

title: The Lion and the Rose
Name: ramsay
text: ramsay If you make it out of the woods, you win! Run, Tansy, run!

title: The Lion and the Rose
Name: ramsay
text: ramsay Tansy.

title: The Lion and the Rose
Name: myranda
text: myranda Where is she?

title: The Lion and the Rose
Name: ramsay
text: ramsay Tansy, Tansy, Tansy!

title: The Lion and the Rose
Name: ramsay
text: ramsay Good girls. Down, girls. Down. Well done. You, too.

title: The Lion and the Rose
Name: myranda
text: myranda I only wounded her.

title: The Lion and the Rose
Name: ramsay
text: ramsay You brought her down. That's what matters. A fine shot. Wasn't it, Reek?

title: The Lion and the Rose
Name: theon
text: theon A fine shot, master. My lady.

title: The Lion and the Rose
Name: tansy
text: tansy Please, my lord. It hurts.

title: The Lion and the Rose
Name: ramsay
text: ramsay Oh, sweet. Don't cry. It will be over soon.

title: The Lion and the Rose
Name: myranda
text: myranda She thinks she's pretty. Let me put one through her face.

title: The Lion and the Rose
Name: ramsay
text: ramsay We have to reward the hounds, love. They did all the hard work.

title: The Lion and the Rose
Name: tansy
text: tansy Why? I did whatever you asked.

title: The Lion and the Rose
Name: ramsay
text: ramsay But you made Myranda feel jealous.

title: The Lion and the Rose
Name: myranda
text: myranda Me jealous of her?

title: The Lion and the Rose
Name: tansy
text: tansy My lord, please.

title: The Lion and the Rose
Name: ramsay
text: ramsay You can see that your presence has become a bit of a problem.

title: The Lion and the Rose
Name: ramsay
text: ramsay Rip her! Rip her! Rip her!

title: The Lion and the Rose
Name: ramsay
text: ramsay Not so pretty now.

title: The Lion and the Rose
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion Your new hand, it's nicer than the old one. Wouldn't you agree, Pod?

title: The Lion and the Rose
Name: podrick
text: podrick Is it solid gold?

title: The Lion and the Rose
Name: jaime
text: jaime Gilded steel.

title: The Lion and the Rose
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion You're not eating. Why is no one eating? My wife wastes away and my brother starves himself.

title: The Lion and the Rose
Name: jaime
text: jaime I'm not hungry.

title: The Lion and the Rose
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion You lost a hand, not a stomach. Try the boar. Cersei can't get enough of it since one killed Robert for her.

title: The Lion and the Rose
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion A toast. To the proud Lannister children. The dwarf, the cripple, and the mother of madness.

title: The Lion and the Rose
Name: jaime
text: jaime Oh!

title: The Lion and the Rose
Name: podrick
text: podrick I'll clean it up.

title: The Lion and the Rose
Name: jaime
text: jaime No, I'll do it. Leave us.

title: The Lion and the Rose
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion It's only wine.

title: The Lion and the Rose
Name: jaime
text: jaime I can't fight anymore.

title: The Lion and the Rose
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion What about your left?

title: The Lion and the Rose
Name: jaime
text: jaime I can hold a sword, but all my instincts are wrong. How can I protect the king when I can hardly wipe my own ass?

title: The Lion and the Rose
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion You're the Lord Commander now. Command. Let others do the fighting. When was the last time Father used a sword?

title: The Lion and the Rose
Name: jaime
text: jaime I'm not Father. I'm the Kingslayer. When people find out I can't slay a pigeon...

title: The Lion and the Rose
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion Train, then. Learn to fight with your other hand.

title: The Lion and the Rose
Name: jaime
text: jaime With whom? You? Men talk. Soon as someone discovers I can't fight, he'll tell everyone.

title: The Lion and the Rose
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion You need a proper, discreet swordsman. As it happens, I have just the one.

title: The Lion and the Rose
Name: jaime
text: jaime My brother tells me you can keep your mouth shut. Unusual talent for a sellsword.

title: The Lion and the Rose
Name: bronn
text: bronn He tells me you shit gold just like your father.

title: The Lion and the Rose
Name: jaime
text: jaime Is this place safe?

title: The Lion and the Rose
Name: bronn
text: bronn There's this knight, Leygood, got thunderbolts on his shield.

title: The Lion and the Rose
Name: jaime
text: jaime Uh-huh.

title: The Lion and the Rose
Name: bronn
text: bronn Right here is where I fuck his wife. She's a screamer, that one. If they don't hear her, they won't hear us.

title: The Lion and the Rose
Name: bronn
text: bronn I've never seen Valyrian steel before. She's a beauty. The problem is, if you fight with an edged blade, I'll have to.

title: The Lion and the Rose
Name: bronn
text: bronn And if I fight with an edged blade, I'll have no one left to pay me.

title: The Lion and the Rose
Name: jaime
text: jaime I haven't used a sparring sword since I was nine.

title: The Lion and the Rose
Name: jaime
text: jaime Ah! Bold warrior you are, attacking a man when his guardo s down.

title: The Lion and the Rose
Name: bronn
text: bronn Best time to attack a man.

title: The Lion and the Rose
Name: bronn
text: bronn Mind yourself. JAIME; If I still had my right hand...

title: The Lion and the Rose
Name: bronn
text: bronn Plan on growing it back?

title: The Lion and the Rose
Name: jaime
text: jaime Come on, then.

title: The Lion and the Rose
Name: man
text: man Open the gates!

title: The Lion and the Rose
Name: man
text: man Riders coming in! Let's get these horses seen to!

title: The Lion and the Rose
Name: ramsay
text: ramsay Father. Welcome home.

title: The Lion and the Rose
Name: roose
text: roose Walda, this is Ramsay Snow, my bastard.

title: The Lion and the Rose
Name: ramsay
text: ramsay A pleasure, Mother.

title: The Lion and the Rose
Name: walda
text: walda Hello.

title: The Lion and the Rose
Name: roose
text: roose See that the horses are fed, watered, and rubbed down. And take Lady Walda to her chambers.

title: The Lion and the Rose
Name: woman
text: woman This way, my lady.

title: The Lion and the Rose
Name: roose
text: roose Where is your prize?

title: The Lion and the Rose
Name: ramsay
text: ramsay With the hounds. I'll have a look at him.

title: The Lion and the Rose
Name: ramsay
text: ramsay I hear you took a hand from the Kingslayer.

title: The Lion and the Rose
Name: locke
text: locke Word travels. How he screamed. You would have loved it.

title: The Lion and the Rose
Name: ramsay
text: ramsay Father.

title: The Lion and the Rose
Name: roose
text: roose What did you do to him?

title: The Lion and the Rose
Name: ramsay
text: ramsay I trained him. He was a slow learner, but he learned.

title: The Lion and the Rose
Name: roose
text: roose You flayed him.

title: The Lion and the Rose
Name: ramsay
text: ramsay Peeled a few bits. Removed a few others.

title: The Lion and the Rose
Name: roose
text: roose This was Balon Greyjoy's son and heir.

title: The Lion and the Rose
Name: ramsay
text: ramsay We've been flaying our enemies for a thousand years. The flayed man is on our banners.

title: The Lion and the Rose
Name: roose
text: roose My banners, not yours. You're not a Bolton. You're a Snow. Tywin Lannister has given me the North. But he won't lift a finger to help me take it. As long as the Ironborn hold Moat Cailin, our armies are trapped south of the Neck. Theon was a valuable hostage, not your plaything. I wanted to trade him for Moat Cailin.

title: The Lion and the Rose
Name: ramsay
text: ramsay I already asked. Lord Greyjoy refused. Savages have no-

title: The Lion and the Rose
Name: roose
text: roose You sent terms to Balon Greyjoy without my consent?

title: The Lion and the Rose
Name: ramsay
text: ramsay You made me acting Lord of the Dreadfort. I acted.

title: The Lion and the Rose
Name: roose
text: roose I had to smuggle myself into my own lands thanks to the Greyjoys. I needed Theon. I needed him whole.

title: The Lion and the Rose
Name: ramsay
text: ramsay Theon was our enemy. But Reek, Reek will never betray us.

title: The Lion and the Rose
Name: roose
text: roose I placed far too much trust in you.

title: The Lion and the Rose
Name: ramsay
text: ramsay Reek, how could you let me stand before my father unshaven? It's disrespectful.

title: The Lion and the Rose
Name: theon
text: theon I'm sorry, my lord.

title: The Lion and the Rose
Name: ramsay
text: ramsay Give him the razor.

title: The Lion and the Rose
Name: ramsay
text: ramsay If I'm not a Bolton, Father, what does it matter?

title: The Lion and the Rose
Name: ramsay
text: ramsay Go on, Reek. A nice close shave.

title: The Lion and the Rose
Name: ramsay
text: ramsay Reek, tell Father where are Bran and Rickon Stark?

title: The Lion and the Rose
Name: theon
text: theon I don't know, my lord.

title: The Lion and the Rose
Name: roose
text: roose You murdered them and displayed their corpses at Winterfell.

title: The Lion and the Rose
Name: ramsay
text: ramsay Reek, did you murder the Stark boys?

title: The Lion and the Rose
Name: theon
text: theon No, my lord. Just two farm boys.

title: The Lion and the Rose
Name: ramsay
text: ramsay And crisped them so no one would know.

title: The Lion and the Rose
Name: theon
text: theon Yes, my lord.

title: The Lion and the Rose
Name: ramsay
text: ramsay The Starks have always ruled the North. If Bran and Rickon are alive, the country will rally to their side now that Robb Stark is gone.

title: The Lion and the Rose
Name: ramsay
text: ramsay Oh, that's right, Reek. Robb Stark is dead. Sorry. I know he was like a brother to you. But my father put a knife through his heart. How do you feel about that?

title: The Lion and the Rose
Name: roose
text: roose You ready for a hunt?

title: The Lion and the Rose
Name: meryn
text: meryn Always. Find those boys and I'll give you a thousand acres and a holdfast.

title: The Lion and the Rose
Name: locke
text: locke Your pet rat have any thoughts on which way they went after Winterfell?

title: The Lion and the Rose
Name: theon
text: theon Jon Snow is at Castle Black.

title: The Lion and the Rose
Name: locke
text: locke Who the fuck is Jon Snow?

title: The Lion and the Rose
Name: roose
text: roose Their bastard brother. He could be sheltering them. He may know where they are.

title: The Lion and the Rose
Name: ramsay
text: ramsay Even if he doesn't, he's half Stark himself. Could be a threat.

title: The Lion and the Rose
Name: roose
text: roose You want to prove yourself a Bolton? Gather whatever men you can and ride for Moat Cailin. Bring this creature of yours. Maybe he'll be of some use. Take the Moat for the family, for our family, and I'll reconsider your position.

title: The Lion and the Rose
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion Lord Varys. Breakfasting with the king?

title: The Lion and the Rose
Name: varys
text: varys I'm afraid foreigners aren't welcome at such exclusive affairs.

title: The Lion and the Rose
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion Oh, to be foreign.

title: The Lion and the Rose
Name: varys
text: varys Ahem.

title: The Lion and the Rose
Name: varys
text: varys Shae has been noticed. Sansa's maid saw you with her. She already told your sister. It's only a matter of time before your father hears.

title: The Lion and the Rose
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion So I'm guilty of being seen with my own wife's handmaiden. My father will ask you if there's anything more and you'll tell him some clever lie.

title: The Lion and the Rose
Name: varys
text: varys No, I will not. How long do you imagine your father and sister would let me live if they suspected me of lying? I have no pet sellsword to protect me. No legendary brother to avenge me. Only little birds who whisper in my ear.

title: The Lion and the Rose
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion Forgive me if I don't weep for you.

title: The Lion and the Rose
Name: varys
text: varys No one weeps for spiders or whores. I have friends across the sea who could help her.

title: The Lion and the Rose
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion She won't leave. I've told her this is a dangerous place so many times, she no longer believes it.

title: The Lion and the Rose
Name: varys
text: varys Your father has promised to hang the next whore he finds you with. Have you ever known your father to make an idle threat?

title: The Lion and the Rose
Name: mace
text: mace From House Tyrell and the people of the Reach, Your Grace, it is my honor to present you with this wedding cup.

title: The Lion and the Rose
Name: mace
text: mace May you and my daughter Margaery drink deep and live long.

title: The Lion and the Rose
Name: joffrey
text: joffrey A handsome goblet, my lord. Or shall I call you Father?

title: The Lion and the Rose
Name: mace
text: mace I shall be honored, Your Grace.

title: The Lion and the Rose
Name: cersei
text: cersei She's the whore I told you about. The dark-haired one.

title: The Lion and the Rose
Name: tywin
text: tywin Have her brought to the Tower of the Hand before the wedding.

title: The Lion and the Rose
Name: joffrey
text: joffrey A book?

title: The Lion and the Rose
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion The Lives of Four Kings." Grand Maester Kaeth's history of the reigns of Daeron the Young Dragon, Baelor the Blessed, Aegon the Unworthy, and Daeron the Good. A book every king should read.

title: The Lion and the Rose
Name: joffrey
text: joffrey Now that the war is won, we should all find time for wisdom. Thank you, Uncle.

title: The Lion and the Rose
Name: tywin
text: tywin One of only two Valyrian steel swords in the capital, Your Grace, freshly forged in your honor.

title: The Lion and the Rose
Name: pycelle
text: pycelle Careful, Your Grace. Nothing cuts like Valyrian steel.

title: The Lion and the Rose
Name: joffrey
text: joffrey So they say.

title: The Lion and the Rose
Name: joffrey
text: joffrey Such a great sword should have a name. What shall I call her?

title: The Lion and the Rose
Name: man
text: man Stormbringer.

title: The Lion and the Rose
Name: man
text: man Terminus.

title: The Lion and the Rose
Name: man
text: man Widow's Wail.

title: The Lion and the Rose
Name: man
text: man Wolfsbane.

title: The Lion and the Rose
Name: joffrey
text: joffrey Widow's Wail. I like that. Every time I use it, it'll be like cutting off Ned Stark's head all over again.

title: The Lion and the Rose
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion Don't.

title: The Lion and the Rose
Name: shae
text: shae You want me on the desk? What's wrong, my lion?

title: The Lion and the Rose
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion Don't call me that.

title: The Lion and the Rose
Name: shae
text: shae What should I call you?

title: The Lion and the Rose
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion I'm afraid our friendship can't continue.

title: The Lion and the Rose
Name: shae
text: shae Our friendship?

title: The Lion and the Rose
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion There's a ship waiting in the harbor bound for Pentos.

title: The Lion and the Rose
Name: shae
text: shae What?

title: The Lion and the Rose
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion You'll have your own cabin, of course, and, across the Narrow Sea, a house, servants.

title: The Lion and the Rose
Name: shae
text: shae What is this?

title: The Lion and the Rose
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion I'm a married man. My wife has suffered a great deal, as you well know. I don't want her to suffer anymore on my account. I need to uphold my vows.

title: The Lion and the Rose
Name: shae
text: shae She doesn't want you.

title: The Lion and the Rose
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion I need to do right by her.

title: The Lion and the Rose
Name: shae
text: shae You don't want her.

title: The Lion and the Rose
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion By our children.

title: The Lion and the Rose
Name: shae
text: shae What are you afraid of?

title: The Lion and the Rose
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion I'm not afraid.

title: The Lion and the Rose
Name: shae
text: shae You are. You are afraid of your father and your sister. You're going to run from them all your life?

title: The Lion and the Rose
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion I need you to leave.

title: The Lion and the Rose
Name: shae
text: shae I'm not afraid of them. I'm not going to run.

title: The Lion and the Rose
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion Shae.

title: The Lion and the Rose
Name: shae
text: shae We will fight them together. It's like you said, I am yours and you are mine.

title: The Lion and the Rose
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion You're a whore! Sansa is fit to bear my children and you are not. I can't be in love with a whore. I can't have children with a whore. How many men have you been with? Five hundred? Five thousand?

title: The Lion and the Rose
Name: shae
text: shae How many whores have you been with?

title: The Lion and the Rose
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion I have enjoyed my time with all of them and I have enjoyed my time with you most of all. But now that time is over.

title: The Lion and the Rose
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion You'll have a comfortable life in Pentos. Bronn will escort you to your ship.

title: The Lion and the Rose
Name: melisandre
text: melisandre Hear us now. Accept these tokens of our faith, my lord, and lead us from the darkness.

title: The Lion and the Rose
Name: axell
text: axell Sire, I served you well.

title: The Lion and the Rose
Name: melisandre
text: melisandre Lord of Light, show us the way...

title: The Lion and the Rose
Name: axell
text: axell Selyse, you're my sister!

title: The Lion and the Rose
Name: selyse
text: selyse Yours are the stars that guide us.

title: The Lion and the Rose
Name: axell
text: axell Tell him! Tell him!

title: The Lion and the Rose
Name: melisandre
text: melisandre Lord of Light, protect us, for the night is dark and full of terrors.

title: The Lion and the Rose
Name: selyse
text: selyse Did you see? Their souls. It was their souls. Our lord took them. Did you see?

title: The Lion and the Rose
Name: davos
text: davos Lord Florent was your brother by law.

title: The Lion and the Rose
Name: stannis
text: stannis He was an infidel.

title: The Lion and the Rose
Name: davos
text: davos He worshipped the gods of his fathers and their fathers before him. They were the gods of your fathers, too.

title: The Lion and the Rose
Name: stannis
text: stannis I ordered him to tear down his idols. He disobeyed.

title: The Lion and the Rose
Name: davos
text: davos How many ships did he bring to your 'cause? How many men?

title: The Lion and the Rose
Name: stannis
text: stannis A good deal more than you.

title: The Lion and the Rose
Name: selyse
text: selyse Did you see, Ser Davos? They're with our lord now. Their sins all burned away. Did you see?

title: The Lion and the Rose
Name: davos
text: davos I'm sure they're more than grateful, my queen.

title: The Lion and the Rose
Name: stannis
text: stannis Meat's off.

title: The Lion and the Rose
Name: selyse
text: selyse Our larders are almost empty.

title: The Lion and the Rose
Name: stannis
text: stannis Serve fish, then. We're on an island.

title: The Lion and the Rose
Name: selyse
text: selyse You hate fish.

title: The Lion and the Rose
Name: stannis
text: stannis I hate a good many things, but I suffer them all the same.

title: The Lion and the Rose
Name: selyse
text: selyse When Storm's End was under siege and I was starving, Stannis boiled soup for me from books. The binding glue is made from horses. One morning, he shot two seagulls on the beach. I've never tasted anything as good as grilled seagull. Do you remember?

title: The Lion and the Rose
Name: stannis
text: stannis Of course I remember.

title: The Lion and the Rose
Name: selyse
text: selyse Have you ever known true hunger, my lady?

title: The Lion and the Rose
Name: melisandre
text: melisandre It's all I knew when I was a child.

title: The Lion and the Rose
Name: selyse
text: selyse Until you found the Lord of Light?

title: The Lion and the Rose
Name: melisandre
text: melisandre Until he found me.

title: The Lion and the Rose
Name: selyse
text: selyse I fear for our daughter's soul.

title: The Lion and the Rose
Name: melisandre
text: melisandre Every mother should fear for her childo s soul.

title: The Lion and the Rose
Name: selyse
text: selyse She's a stubborn little beast.

title: The Lion and the Rose
Name: stannis
text: stannis She's a child.

title: The Lion and the Rose
Name: selyse
text: selyse You barely know her. You think she's sweet because she smiles when you visit. She's sullen and stubborn and sinful. Why else would the Lord of Light have seen fit to mark her face? She needs the rod.

title: The Lion and the Rose
Name: stannis
text: stannis She's my daughter. You will not strike her.

title: The Lion and the Rose
Name: selyse
text: selyse As you command. Perhaps the Lady Melisandre could speak with her.

title: The Lion and the Rose
Name: shireen
text: shireen Come in.

title: The Lion and the Rose
Name: melisandre
text: melisandre Were you sleeping, Princess?

title: The Lion and the Rose
Name: melisandre
text: melisandre Did you watch the ceremony on the beach?

title: The Lion and the Rose
Name: shireen
text: shireen I heard it.

title: The Lion and the Rose
Name: melisandre
text: melisandre And it frightened you?

title: The Lion and the Rose
Name: shireen
text: shireen Ser Axell was my uncle. He was always kind to me.

title: The Lion and the Rose
Name: melisandre
text: melisandre They're in a better place now, Princess. The fire cleansed them of the sins of the world.

title: The Lion and the Rose
Name: shireen
text: shireen But they screamed.

title: The Lion and the Rose
Name: melisandre
text: melisandre Women scream when they give birth. Afterward they are filled with joy.

title: The Lion and the Rose
Name: shireen
text: shireen Afterward they aren't ash and bone.

title: The Lion and the Rose
Name: melisandre
text: melisandre You have so many questions, don't you? So did I when I was a child. I was much like you. Only I wasn't a princess.

title: The Lion and the Rose
Name: shireen
text: shireen And you didn't have this.

title: The Lion and the Rose
Name: melisandre
text: melisandre No. But I suffered in other ways, sweet girl, believe me. What do you know of the gods?

title: The Lion and the Rose
Name: shireen
text: shireen I read "The Seven-Pointed Star."

title: The Lion and the Rose
Name: melisandre
text: melisandre Lies and fables. Septons speak of seven gods. There are but two... a god of light and love and joy and a god of darkness, evil, and fear. Eternally at war.

title: The Lion and the Rose
Name: shireen
text: shireen There are no seven heavens and no seven hells?

title: The Lion and the Rose
Name: melisandre
text: melisandre There's only one hell, Princess. The one we live in now.

title: The Lion and the Rose
Name: hodor
text: hodor Hodor.

title: The Lion and the Rose
Name: bran
text: bran Why did you wake me?

title: The Lion and the Rose
Name: meera
text: meera You've been gone for hours.

title: The Lion and the Rose
Name: bran
text: bran I was hungry.

title: The Lion and the Rose
Name: meera
text: meera We're all hungry.

title: The Lion and the Rose
Name: bran
text: bran I was just eating.

title: The Lion and the Rose
Name: jojen
text: jojen Summer was eating. Your body can't live on the food your wolf consumes. Spending too much time in Summer's skin is dangerous. You're not a direwolf, Bran.

title: The Lion and the Rose
Name: jojen
text: jojen Must be glorious, though. To run, to leap, to hunt. To be whole. I know that's tempting, but if you're trapped in Summer for too long, you'll forget what it was to be human.

title: The Lion and the Rose
Name: meera
text: meera You'd forget us, Bran. You'd forget your mother and father. You'd forget your brothers and sisters. You'd forget Winterfell. You'd forget you. And if we lose you, we lose everything.

title: The Lion and the Rose
Name: bran
text: bran Hodor, take me to the tree.

title: The Lion and the Rose
Name: threeeyed
text: threeeyed Look for me... beneath the tree.

title: The Lion and the Rose
Name: cersei
text: cersei He saw us.

title: The Lion and the Rose
Name: threeeyed
text: threeeyed North.

title: The Lion and the Rose
Name: bran
text: bran I know where we have to go.

title: The Lion and the Rose
Name: septon
text: septon Let it be known that Margaery of House Tyrell and Joffrey of the Houses Lannister and Baratheon are one heart, one flesh, one soul. Cursed be he who would seek to tear them asunder.

title: The Lion and the Rose
Name: joffrey
text: joffrey With this kiss, I pledge my love.

title: The Lion and the Rose
Name: sansa
text: sansa We have a new queen.

title: The Lion and the Rose
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion Better her than you.

title: The Lion and the Rose
Name: tywin
text: tywin Bit much, wouldn't you say?

title: The Lion and the Rose
Name: olenna
text: olenna It feels proportionate.

title: The Lion and the Rose
Name: tywin
text: tywin Proportionate to what?

title: The Lion and the Rose
Name: olenna
text: olenna The expected extravagance.

title: The Lion and the Rose
Name: tywin
text: tywin People who spend their money on this sort of nonsense tend not to have it for long.

title: The Lion and the Rose
Name: olenna
text: olenna You ought to try enjoying something before you die. You might find it suits you.

title: The Lion and the Rose
Name: olenna
text: olenna Not now, Mace. Lord Tywin and I are speaking.

title: The Lion and the Rose
Name: olenna
text: olenna Anyway, I don't know what you're complaining about. I'm paying my share.

title: The Lion and the Rose
Name: tywin
text: tywin Shall we stick golden roses in half the meat pies to commemorate your generosity?

title: The Lion and the Rose
Name: olenna
text: olenna No, your heartfelt thank you is its own reward. I would imagine I'd be hearing it again before long. Wars are rather expensive. "The Iron Bank will have it's due." How they love to remind everyone. Almost as much as you Lannisters with your debts.

title: The Lion and the Rose
Name: tywin
text: tywin I'm not worried about the Iron Bank.

title: The Lion and the Rose
Name: olenna
text: olenna We both know you're smarter than that. Come, Tywin, let us celebrate young love.

title: The Lion and the Rose
Name: bronn
text: bronn All taken care of.

title: The Lion and the Rose
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion You saw her board the ship?

title: The Lion and the Rose
Name: bronn
text: bronn Aye, she's on it.

title: The Lion and the Rose
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion You saw the ship sail away?

title: The Lion and the Rose
Name: bronn
text: bronn No one knows she's there but you, me, and Varys.

title: The Lion and the Rose
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion How do you know?

title: The Lion and the Rose
Name: bronn
text: bronn Because if someone follows me without an invitation, I'm the last person they ever follow.

title: The Lion and the Rose
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion There's someone following you?

title: The Lion and the Rose
Name: bronn
text: bronn She's gone. I know you don't want to believe it, but she is. Now, go drink till it feels like you did the right thing.

title: The Lion and the Rose
Name: oberyn
text: oberyn Hello.

title: The Lion and the Rose
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion Hello.

title: The Lion and the Rose
Name: oberyn
text: oberyn Not you.

title: The Lion and the Rose
Name: olenna
text: olenna You look exquisite, child. The wind has been at you, though. I haven't had the opportunity to tell you how sorry I was to hear about your brother. War is war, but killing a man at a wedding, horrid. What sort of monster would do such a thing? As if men need more reasons to fear marriage.

title: The Lion and the Rose
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion My lady. My lady.

title: The Lion and the Rose
Name: olenna
text: olenna Lord Tyrion, you see? Not as bad as all that. Perhaps if your pauper husband were to sell his mule and his last pair of shoes, he might be able to afford to bring you to Highgarden for a visit. Now that peace has come and all is right with the world, it would do you good to see some of it. You must excuse me. It's time I ate some of this food I paid for.

title: The Lion and the Rose
Name: musician
text: musician A coat of gold / Or a coat of red / A lion still has claws And mine, my lord...

title: The Lion and the Rose
Name: joffrey
text: joffrey Very good. Very good. Off you go.

title: The Lion and the Rose
Name: margaery
text: margaery My love, why don't we make the announcement?

title: The Lion and the Rose
Name: joffrey
text: joffrey Everyone. The queen would like to say a few words.

title: The Lion and the Rose
Name: margaery
text: margaery We are so fortunate to enjoy this marvelous food and drink. Not all among us are so lucky. To thank the gods for bringing the recent war to a just end, King Joffrey has decreed that the leftovers from our feast be given to the poorest in his city.

title: The Lion and the Rose
Name: cersei
text: cersei You're an example to us all.

title: The Lion and the Rose
Name: loras
text: loras Ser Jaime, I'm very sorry.

title: The Lion and the Rose
Name: jaime
text: jaime Ser Loras, it's quite all right. Your sister looks very beautiful.

title: The Lion and the Rose
Name: loras
text: loras As does yours.

title: The Lion and the Rose
Name: jaime
text: jaime So, looking forward to your wedding?

title: The Lion and the Rose
Name: loras
text: loras Yes, very much.

title: The Lion and the Rose
Name: jaime
text: jaime Our fathers are both rather keen on the prospect.

title: The Lion and the Rose
Name: loras
text: loras They certainly are.

title: The Lion and the Rose
Name: jaime
text: jaime Perhaps they should get married. If you were to marry Cersei, she'd murder you in your sleep. If you somehow managed to put a child in her first, she'd murder him, too, long before he drew his first breath. Luckily for you, none of this will happen because you'll never marry her.

title: The Lion and the Rose
Name: loras
text: loras And neither will you.

title: The Lion and the Rose
Name: brienne
text: brienne Your Grace. My king. My queen.

title: The Lion and the Rose
Name: margaery
text: margaery Lady Brienne. So good of you to come.

title: The Lion and the Rose
Name: brienne
text: brienne I'm no lady, Your Grace.

title: The Lion and the Rose
Name: cersei
text: cersei Did you just bow?

title: The Lion and the Rose
Name: brienne
text: brienne Apologies, Your Grace. I never did master the curtsy.

title: The Lion and the Rose
Name: joffrey
text: joffrey You're the one who put a sword through Renly Baratheon.

title: The Lion and the Rose
Name: margaery
text: margaery That's not true, my love. Brienne had nothing to do with it.

title: The Lion and the Rose
Name: joffrey
text: joffrey A shame. I'd knight the man that put an end to that deviant's life.

title: The Lion and the Rose
Name: brienne
text: brienne I just wanted to congratulate you both and wish you good fortune. The country has been at war too long. I hope your reign is long and peaceful.

title: The Lion and the Rose
Name: joffrey
text: joffrey Yes, yes.

title: The Lion and the Rose
Name: margaery
text: margaery Thank you. I hope we see more of you.

title: The Lion and the Rose
Name: cersei
text: cersei Lady Brienne. You're Lord Selwyn Tarth's daughter. That makes you a lady whether you want to be or not.

title: The Lion and the Rose
Name: brienne
text: brienne As you say, Your Grace.

title: The Lion and the Rose
Name: cersei
text: cersei I owe you my gratitude. You returned my brother safely to King's Landing.

title: The Lion and the Rose
Name: brienne
text: brienne In truth, he rescued me, Your Grace. More than once.

title: The Lion and the Rose
Name: cersei
text: cersei Did he? Haven't heard that story before.

title: The Lion and the Rose
Name: brienne
text: brienne Not such a fascinating story, I'm afraid.

title: The Lion and the Rose
Name: cersei
text: cersei I'm sure you have many fascinating stories. Sworn to Renly Baratheon. Sworn to Catelyn Stark. And now my brother. Must be exciting to flit from one camp to the next serving whichever lord or lady you fancy.

title: The Lion and the Rose
Name: brienne
text: brienne I don't serve your brother, Your Grace.

title: The Lion and the Rose
Name: cersei
text: cersei But you love him.

title: The Lion and the Rose
Name: brienne
text: brienne Your Grace.

title: The Lion and the Rose
Name: pycelle
text: pycelle No, no, come to my chambers and I will examine you personally.

title: The Lion and the Rose
Name: cersei
text: cersei She'll do no such thing.

title: The Lion and the Rose
Name: pycelle
text: pycelle Oh, Your Grace. Yes, well, this young lady sought my advice...

title: The Lion and the Rose
Name: cersei
text: cersei You should see Qyburn. He's quite good.

title: The Lion and the Rose
Name: maid
text: maid Your Grace.

title: The Lion and the Rose
Name: pycelle
text: pycelle Qyburn? Deplorable man. Brought shame on the Citadel with his repugnant experiments.

title: The Lion and the Rose
Name: cersei
text: cersei More repugnant than your gnarled fingers on that girl's thighs?

title: The Lion and the Rose
Name: pycelle
text: pycelle Your Grace, I am a man of learning.

title: The Lion and the Rose
Name: cersei
text: cersei My little brother had you sent to the Black Cells when you annoyed him. What do you think I could do to you if you annoyed me?

title: The Lion and the Rose
Name: pycelle
text: pycelle I never meant to annoy anyone.

title: The Lion and the Rose
Name: cersei
text: cersei But you are. You annoy me right now. Every breath you draw in my presence annoys me. So here's what I want you to do. I want you to leave my presence. Leave this wedding right now. Go to the kitchens and instruct them that all the leftovers from the feast will be brought to the kennels.

title: The Lion and the Rose
Name: pycelle
text: pycelle Your Grace, Queen Margaery-

title: The Lion and the Rose
Name: cersei
text: cersei The queen is telling you the leftovers will feed the dogs or you will.

title: The Lion and the Rose
Name: joffrey
text: joffrey A gold dragon to whoever knocks my fool's hat off.

title: The Lion and the Rose
Name: tywin
text: tywin You're in rather a good mood.

title: The Lion and the Rose
Name: cersei
text: cersei I suppose I am.

title: The Lion and the Rose
Name: tywin
text: tywin I won't ask why.

title: The Lion and the Rose
Name: cersei
text: cersei Small pleasures.

title: The Lion and the Rose
Name: oberyn
text: oberyn Your Grace. Lord Tywin.

title: The Lion and the Rose
Name: tywin
text: tywin Prince Oberyn.

title: The Lion and the Rose
Name: oberyn
text: oberyn I don't believe you have met Ellaria. This is the Lord Hand Tywin Lannister and Cersei Lannister, the Queen Regent. I suppose it is former Queen Regent now. Lord Hand and Lady Cersei, Ellaria Sand.

title: The Lion and the Rose
Name: ellaria
text: ellaria My lord. My lady.

title: The Lion and the Rose
Name: tywin
text: tywin Charmed.

title: The Lion and the Rose
Name: cersei
text: cersei Can't say I've ever met a Sand before.

title: The Lion and the Rose
Name: ellaria
text: ellaria We are everywhere in Dorne. I have 10,000 brothers and sisters.

title: The Lion and the Rose
Name: oberyn
text: oberyn Bastards are born of passion, aren't they? We don't despise them in Dorne.

title: The Lion and the Rose
Name: cersei
text: cersei No? How tolerant of you.

title: The Lion and the Rose
Name: oberyn
text: oberyn I expect it is a relief, Lady Cersei, giving up your regal responsibilities. Wearing the crown for so many years must have left your neck a bit crooked.

title: The Lion and the Rose
Name: cersei
text: cersei I suppose you'll never know, Prince Oberyn. It's a shame your older brother couldn't attend the wedding.

title: The Lion and the Rose
Name: tywin
text: tywin Please give him our regards. With any luck, the gout will abate with time and he will be able to walk again.

title: The Lion and the Rose
Name: oberyn
text: oberyn They call it the rich man's disease. A wonder you don't have it.

title: The Lion and the Rose
Name: tywin
text: tywin Noblemen in my part of the country don't enjoy the same lifestyle as our counterparts in Dorne.

title: The Lion and the Rose
Name: oberyn
text: oberyn People everywhere have their differences. In some places, the highborn frown upon those of low birth. In other places, the rape and murder of women and children is considered distasteful. What a fortunate thing for you, former Queen Regent, that your daughter Myrcella has been sent to live in the latter sort of place.

title: The Lion and the Rose
Name: joffrey
text: joffrey Everyone, silence! Clear the floor. There's been too much amusement here today. A royal wedding is not an amusement. A royal wedding is history. The time has come for all of us to contemplate our history. My lords... my ladies...

title: The Lion and the Rose
Name: joffrey
text: joffrey I give you. King Joffrey... Renly, Stannis, Robb Stark, Balon Greyjoy. The War of the Five Kings.

title: The Lion and the Rose
Name: renly
text: renly I'm the rightful king.

title: The Lion and the Rose
Name: robb
text: robb King in the North!

title: The Lion and the Rose
Name: joffrey
text: joffrey Yes!

title: The Lion and the Rose
Name: balon
text: balon Traitor. You're a traitor.

title: The Lion and the Rose
Name: joffrey
text: joffrey For the Seven Kingdoms!

title: The Lion and the Rose
Name: joffrey
text: joffrey Let the war begin.

title: The Lion and the Rose
Name: stannis
text: stannis Renly, you're no king.

title: The Lion and the Rose
Name: balon
text: balon Away, degenerate. Away. Away.

title: The Lion and the Rose
Name: renly
text: renly Ooh, careful.

title: The Lion and the Rose
Name: stannis
text: stannis Go on.

title: The Lion and the Rose
Name: renly
text: renly I want you to be my prince. Stannis!

title: The Lion and the Rose
Name: balon
text: balon Who's got the gold now, Stark?

title: The Lion and the Rose
Name: robb
text: robb I am the rightful king.

title: The Lion and the Rose
Name: balon
text: balon Challenge me, ruffian.

title: The Lion and the Rose
Name: robb
text: robb Take that.

title: The Lion and the Rose
Name: balon
text: balon I'm drowning. I'm drowning.

title: The Lion and the Rose
Name: robb
text: robb I am the King in the North!

title: The Lion and the Rose
Name: stannis
text: stannis Not wildfire!

title: The Lion and the Rose
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion Pay each of them 20 gold when this is done.

title: The Lion and the Rose
Name: podrick
text: podrick Yes, my lord.

title: The Lion and the Rose
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion We'll have to find another way to thank the king.

title: The Lion and the Rose
Name: joffrey
text: joffrey Charge!

title: The Lion and the Rose
Name: joffrey
text: joffrey Ready, again.

title: The Lion and the Rose
Name: robb
text: robb I am the King in the North! - Charge!

title: The Lion and the Rose
Name: joffrey
text: joffrey Charge! Yes!

title: The Lion and the Rose
Name: joffrey
text: joffrey Your head!

title: The Lion and the Rose
Name: joffrey
text: joffrey Fine gentlemen.

title: The Lion and the Rose
Name: joffrey
text: joffrey Well fought. Well fought. Here you are. Champion's purse. Though you're not the champion yet, are you? A true champion defeats all the challengers. Surely there are others out there who still dare to challenge my reign. Uncle. How about you? I'm sure they have a spare costume.

title: The Lion and the Rose
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion One taste of combat was enough for me, Your Grace. I would like to keep what remains of my face. I think you should fight him. This was but a poor imitation of your own bravery on the field of battle. I speak as a firsthand witness. Climb down from the high table with your new Valyrian sword and show everyone how a true king wins his throne. Be careful, though. This one is clearly mad with lust. It would be a tragedy for the king to lose his virtue hours before his wedding night.

title: The Lion and the Rose
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion A fine vintage. Shame that it spilled.

title: The Lion and the Rose
Name: joffrey
text: joffrey It did not spill.

title: The Lion and the Rose
Name: margaery
text: margaery My love, come back to me. It's time for my father's toast.

title: The Lion and the Rose
Name: joffrey
text: joffrey Well, how does he expect me to toast without wine? Uncle, you can be my cup-bearer seeing as you're too cowardly to fight.

title: The Lion and the Rose
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion Your Grace does me a great honor.

title: The Lion and the Rose
Name: joffrey
text: joffrey It's not meant as an honor.

title: The Lion and the Rose
Name: joffrey
text: joffrey Bring me my goblet.

title: The Lion and the Rose
Name: joffrey
text: joffrey What good is an empty cup? Fill it.

title: The Lion and the Rose
Name: joffrey
text: joffrey Kneel. Kneel before your king.

title: The Lion and the Rose
Name: joffrey
text: joffrey Kneel. I said... kneel!

title: The Lion and the Rose
Name: margaery
text: margaery Look, the pie.

title: The Lion and the Rose
Name: joffrey
text: joffrey My queen.

title: The Lion and the Rose
Name: margaery
text: margaery Wonderful. Wonderful. My hero.

title: The Lion and the Rose
Name: sansa
text: sansa Can we leave now?

title: The Lion and the Rose
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion Let's find out.

title: The Lion and the Rose
Name: joffrey
text: joffrey Uncle. Where are you going? You're my cup-bearer, remember?

title: The Lion and the Rose
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion I thought I might change out of these wet clothes, Your Grace.

title: The Lion and the Rose
Name: joffrey
text: joffrey No, no, no. No, you're perfect the way you are. Serve me my wine.

title: The Lion and the Rose
Name: joffrey
text: joffrey Well, hurry up. This pie is dry.

title: The Lion and the Rose
Name: joffrey
text: joffrey Mm, good. Needs washing down.

title: The Lion and the Rose
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion If it please Your Grace, Lady Sansa is very tired.

title: The Lion and the Rose
Name: joffrey
text: joffrey No. No, you'll wait here... un...

title: The Lion and the Rose
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion Your Grace?

title: The Lion and the Rose
Name: joffrey
text: joffrey It's nothing.

title: The Lion and the Rose
Name: margaery
text: margaery He's choking!

title: The Lion and the Rose
Name: olenna
text: olenna Help the poor boy.

title: The Lion and the Rose
Name: olenna
text: olenna Idiots, help your king.

title: The Lion and the Rose
Name: jaime
text: jaime Move away!

title: The Lion and the Rose
Name: jaime
text: jaime Joffrey! Joffrey!

title: The Lion and the Rose
Name: cersei
text: cersei Help him! Someone help him!

title: The Lion and the Rose
Name: cersei
text: cersei Joffrey!

title: The Lion and the Rose
Name: ser
text: ser Come with me now.

title: The Lion and the Rose
Name: cersei
text: cersei Joffrey! Joffrey!

title: The Lion and the Rose
Name: ser
text: ser If you want to live, we have to leave.

title: The Lion and the Rose
Name: cersei
text: cersei Don't touch him!

title: The Lion and the Rose
Name: cersei
text: cersei Joffrey. Please, Joffrey. Joffrey, what is it? Help him!

title: The Lion and the Rose
Name: cersei
text: cersei My son.

title: The Lion and the Rose
Name: man
text: man He's gone. Our king is gone.

title: The Lion and the Rose
Name: cersei
text: cersei He did this. He poisoned my son, your king. Take him. Take him! Take him! Take him!

title: Breaker of Chains
Name: cersei
text: cersei You did this. You did this!

title: Breaker of Chains
Name: ser
text: ser We have to leave.

title: Breaker of Chains
Name: cersei
text: cersei Take him! Take him!

title: Breaker of Chains
Name: cersei
text: cersei Where is his wife? Where's Sansa?

title: Breaker of Chains
Name: tywin
text: tywin Find her. Bar the gates of the city. Seize every ship in the harbor.

title: Breaker of Chains
Name: cersei
text: cersei Where is she?!

title: Breaker of Chains
Name: tywin
text: tywin No one leaves the capital! No one!

title: Breaker of Chains
Name: ser
text: ser Get in.

title: Breaker of Chains
Name: sansa
text: sansa Where are we going?

title: Breaker of Chains
Name: ser
text: ser Somewhere safe.

title: Breaker of Chains
Name: ser
text: ser Up you go, my lady. You'll be fine. You're stronger than you know.

title: Breaker of Chains
Name: sansa
text: sansa Lord Baelish?

title: Breaker of Chains
Name: petyr
text: petyr Petyr... Are you hurt, my lady?

title: Breaker of Chains
Name: petyr
text: petyr Good. Good. I'm sure you've had quite a fright. Rest easy. The worst is past. Ser Dontos shouts up from his boat.

title: Breaker of Chains
Name: ser
text: ser Lord Baelish. I promised I'd get her to you safely.

title: Breaker of Chains
Name: petyr
text: petyr Softly, my friend... Voices carry over water.

title: Breaker of Chains
Name: ser
text: ser I should get back before someone thinks to look for me. LITTLEFINGER First you'll want your pay. 10,000 was it?

title: Breaker of Chains
Name: ser
text: ser Wait!

title: Breaker of Chains
Name: petyr
text: petyr Shh. You don't want the queen to hear, do you? 1,000 gold cloaks are searching for you. And if they found you, how do you think they would punish the girl who murdered the king?

title: Breaker of Chains
Name: sansa
text: sansa I didn't murder anyone.

title: Breaker of Chains
Name: petyr
text: petyr I know. I know. But you must admit it looks suspicious. The king who executed your father, who tormented you for years, and you fled the scene of his murder.

title: Breaker of Chains
Name: sansa
text: sansa Why did you kill him?

title: Breaker of Chains
Name: petyr
text: petyr Because he was a drunk and a fool and I don't trust drunk fools.

title: Breaker of Chains
Name: sansa
text: sansa He saved me.

title: Breaker of Chains
Name: petyr
text: petyr Saved you? My lady, he followed my orders. Every one of them. And he did it all for gold. Money buys a man's silence for a time. A bolt in the heart buys it forever.

title: Breaker of Chains
Name: sansa
text: sansa He was helping me because I saved his life.

title: Breaker of Chains
Name: petyr
text: petyr Yes, and he gave you a priceless necklace that once belonged to his grandmother. The last legacy of House Hollard.

title: Breaker of Chains
Name: petyr
text: petyr I had it made a few weeks ago. What did I once tell you about the capital?

title: Breaker of Chains
Name: sansa
text: sansa We're all liars here.

title: Breaker of Chains
Name: petyr
text: petyr Come, my lady. I know you've had a difficult day. But you're safe now. I promise you that. You're safe with me and sailing home.

title: Breaker of Chains
Name: margaery
text: margaery So am I the queen?

title: Breaker of Chains
Name: olenna
text: olenna More than you were with Renly. Less than you would have been if Joffrey had done you the courtesy of consummating the marriage before dying. In any case, this would not be an opportune moment to press the issue.

title: Breaker of Chains
Name: margaery
text: margaery Clawing at his own throat, looking to his mother to make stop... it was horrible.

title: Breaker of Chains
Name: olenna
text: olenna The world is overflowing with horrible things. But they're all a tray of cakes next to death. They brought me your grandfather's body when he died, you know? Made me look at it.

title: Breaker of Chains
Name: margaery
text: margaery What was it like?

title: Breaker of Chains
Name: olenna
text: olenna They took me to the Great Hall and there he was. The man I'd married and suffered to father my children. A great doughy lump I'd sat next to at endless dinners and tedious gatherings. There he was... lying on a table.

title: Breaker of Chains
Name: margaery
text: margaery One of my husbands preferred the company of men and was stabbed through the heart. Another was happiest torturing animals and was poisoned at our wedding feast... I must be cursed.

title: Breaker of Chains
Name: olenna
text: olenna Nonsense. Your circumstances have improved markedly. You may not have enjoyed watching him die, but you enjoyed it more than you would have enjoyed being married to him, I can promise you that.

title: Breaker of Chains
Name: margaery
text: margaery But I would have been the queen.

title: Breaker of Chains
Name: olenna
text: olenna Our alliance with the Lannisters remains every bit as necessary to them as it is unpleasant for us. You did wonderful work on Joffrey. The next one should be easier.

title: Breaker of Chains
Name: tywin
text: tywin Your brother is dead. Do you know what that means?

title: Breaker of Chains
Name: tywin
text: tywin I'm not trying to trick you.

title: Breaker of Chains
Name: tommen
text: tommen It means I'll become king.

title: Breaker of Chains
Name: tywin
text: tywin Yes, you will become king. What kind of king do you think you'll be?

title: Breaker of Chains
Name: tommen
text: tommen A good king?

title: Breaker of Chains
Name: tywin
text: tywin Mm, I think so as well. You've got the right temperament for it. But what makes a good king? Hmm? What is a good king's single most important quality?

title: Breaker of Chains
Name: cersei
text: cersei This is hardly the place or the time.

title: Breaker of Chains
Name: tommen
text: tommen Holiness?

title: Breaker of Chains
Name: tywin
text: tywin Hmm. Baelor the Blessed was holy. And pious. He built this sept. He also named a six-year-old boy high septon because he thought the boy could work miracles. He ended up fasting himself into an early grave because food was of this world and this world was sinful.

title: Breaker of Chains
Name: tommen
text: tommen Justice.

title: Breaker of Chains
Name: tywin
text: tywin Yeah. A good king must be just. Orys I was just. Everyone applauded his reforms. Nobles and commoners alike. But he wasn't just for long. He was murdered in his sleep after less than a year by his own brother. Was that truly just of him? To abandon his subjects to an evil that he was too gullible to recognize?

title: Breaker of Chains
Name: tommen
text: tommen No.

title: Breaker of Chains
Name: tywin
text: tywin No.

title: Breaker of Chains
Name: tommen
text: tommen What about strength?

title: Breaker of Chains
Name: tywin
text: tywin Yes. Strength. King Robert was strong. He won the rebellion and crushed the Targaryen dynasty. And he attended three small council meetings in 17 years. He spent his time whoring and hunting and drinking until the last two killed him. So, we have a man who starves himself to death, a man who lets his own brother murder him, and a man who thinks that winning and ruling are the same thing. What do they all lack?

title: Breaker of Chains
Name: tommen
text: tommen Wisdom.

title: Breaker of Chains
Name: tywin
text: tywin Yes!

title: Breaker of Chains
Name: tommen
text: tommen Wisdom is what makes a good king.

title: Breaker of Chains
Name: tywin
text: tywin Yes. But what is wisdom? Hmm? A house with great wealth and fertile lands asks you for your protection against another house with a strong Navy that could one day oppose you. How do you know which choice is wise and which isn't? You've any experience of treasuries and granaries or shipyards and soldiers?

title: Breaker of Chains
Name: tywin
text: tywin No. Of course not. A wise king knows what he knows and what he doesn't. You're young. A wise young king listens to his counselors and heeds their advice until he comes of age. And the wisest kings continue to listen to them long afterwards... Your brother was not a wise king. Your brother was not a good king. If he had been, perhaps he'd still be alive. Now, as the king, you will have to marry. Do you understand why?

title: Breaker of Chains
Name: tommen
text: tommen A king needs a queen.

title: Breaker of Chains
Name: tywin
text: tywin Yes, but why? To further the family line. Do you know how that happens?

title: Breaker of Chains
Name: tommen
text: tommen Yes.

title: Breaker of Chains
Name: tywin
text: tywin Yes, but has anyone explained the details to you?

title: Breaker of Chains
Name: tommen
text: tommen I don't think so. It's all relatively straightforward.

title: Breaker of Chains
Name: jaime
text: jaime How are you?

title: Breaker of Chains
Name: tommen
text: tommen I'm all right.

title: Breaker of Chains
Name: jaime
text: jaime You are. You will be. I'll see to that.

title: Breaker of Chains
Name: jaime
text: jaime Please give the queen a moment alone with her son.

title: Breaker of Chains
Name: septon
text: septon Yes, my lord. All of you.

title: Breaker of Chains
Name: cersei
text: cersei It was Tyrion. He killed him. He told me he would. "A day will come when you think you are safe and happy and your joy will turn to ashes in your mouth." That's what he said to me. You saw it. You saw Joff point at him just before he...

title: Breaker of Chains
Name: jaime
text: jaime I don't know what I saw.

title: Breaker of Chains
Name: cersei
text: cersei Avenge him. Avenge our son. Kill Tyrion.

title: Breaker of Chains
Name: jaime
text: jaime Tyrion's my brother. Our brother. There'll be a trial. We'll get to the truth of what happened.

title: Breaker of Chains
Name: cersei
text: cersei I don't want a trial. He'll squirm his way to freedom given the chance. I want him dead. Please, Jaime. You have to. He was our son. Our baby boy.

title: Breaker of Chains
Name: jaime
text: jaime You're a hateful woman. Why have the gods made me love a hateful woman?

title: Breaker of Chains
Name: cersei
text: cersei Jaime, not here, please. Please.

title: Breaker of Chains
Name: cersei
text: cersei Stop it. Stop it. Stop.

title: Breaker of Chains
Name: jaime
text: jaime No.

title: Breaker of Chains
Name: cersei
text: cersei Stop it. Stop.

title: Breaker of Chains
Name: cersei
text: cersei Stop. Stop. It's not right.

title: Breaker of Chains
Name: cersei
text: cersei It's not right. It's not right.

title: Breaker of Chains
Name: jaime
text: jaime I don't care.

title: Breaker of Chains
Name: cersei
text: cersei Don't.

title: Breaker of Chains
Name: cersei
text: cersei Don't. Jaime, don't.

title: Breaker of Chains
Name: arya
text: arya Gonna rain soon. Where are we?

title: Breaker of Chains
Name: sandor
text: sandor Near Fairmarket, I think.

title: Breaker of Chains
Name: arya
text: arya You think? You don't have a map?

title: Breaker of Chains
Name: sandor
text: sandor No, I don't have a map.

title: Breaker of Chains
Name: arya
text: arya Maybe we should get one.

title: Breaker of Chains
Name: sandor
text: sandor Just point out the next map shop you see and I'll buy you one.

title: Breaker of Chains
Name: arya
text: arya How far is it to the Eyrie?

title: Breaker of Chains
Name: sandor
text: sandor Far.

title: Breaker of Chains
Name: arya
text: arya And you're sure we're going the right way?

title: Breaker of Chains
Name: sandor
text: sandor Believe me, girl, I want you there as soon as I can. Get my gold, be on my way.

title: Breaker of Chains
Name: arya
text: arya On your way where?

title: Breaker of Chains
Name: sandor
text: sandor Why do you care? Might book passage across the Narrow Sea. Fight as a sellsword. Second Sons, could be. Seems like a good fit for me.

title: Breaker of Chains
Name: arya
text: arya I'd like to see Braavos one day.

title: Breaker of Chains
Name: sandor
text: sandor Why Braavos?

title: Breaker of Chains
Name: arya
text: arya I have friends there.

title: Breaker of Chains
Name: sandor
text: sandor I doubt it.

title: Breaker of Chains
Name: farmer
text: farmer Seven blessings to you.

title: Breaker of Chains
Name: sandor
text: sandor What do you want?

title: Breaker of Chains
Name: farmer
text: farmer What do I want? This is my land.

title: Breaker of Chains
Name: sandor
text: sandor If I'm standing on it, it's my land.

title: Breaker of Chains
Name: arya
text: arya We were just watering the horses. We'll be on our way. Forgive my father. He was wounded fighting in the war. Our cottage burned down while he was gone and my mother with it.

title: Breaker of Chains
Name: arya
text: arya He's never been the same.

title: Breaker of Chains
Name: farmer
text: farmer Which house did he fight for?

title: Breaker of Chains
Name: arya
text: arya The Tullys of Riverrun.

title: Breaker of Chains
Name: farmer
text: farmer There's a storm coming. You'll be wanting a roof tonight. There's fresh hay in the barn. And Sally here makes rabbit stew just like her mom used to do. We don't have much, but any man that bled for House Tully is welcome to it.

title: Breaker of Chains
Name: farmer
text: farmer We ask the Father to judge us with mercy accepting our human frailty. We ask the Mother to bless our crops so we may feed ourselves and all who come to our door. We ask the Warrior to give us courage in these days of strife and turmoil. We ask the Maiden to protect Sally's virtue to keep her from the clutches of depravity.

title: Breaker of Chains
Name: sandor
text: sandor You got to do all seven of the fuckers?

title: Breaker of Chains
Name: arya
text: arya Father!

title: Breaker of Chains
Name: farmer
text: farmer We ask the Smith to strengthen our hands and our backs so we may finish the work required of us. We ask the Crone to guide us on our journey from darkness to darkness.

title: Breaker of Chains
Name: sandor
text: sandor And we ask the Stranger not to kill us in our beds tonight for no damn reason at all.

title: Breaker of Chains
Name: arya
text: arya I'm so sorry.

title: Breaker of Chains
Name: arya
text: arya Really good.

title: Breaker of Chains
Name: farmer
text: farmer Did you fight at the Twins?

title: Breaker of Chains
Name: sandor
text: sandor Call that a fight? Slaughtering livestock more like.

title: Breaker of Chains
Name: farmer
text: farmer The Red Wedding they're calling it. Walder Frey committed sacrilege that day. He shared bread and salt with the Starks. He offered them guest right.

title: Breaker of Chains
Name: sandor
text: sandor Guest right don't mean much anymore.

title: Breaker of Chains
Name: farmer
text: farmer It means something to me. The gods will have their vengeance. Frey will burn in the seventh hell for what he did. Things were different when Hoster Tully ruled the Riverlands. We had good years and bad years, same as anyone. But we were safe. Now with the Freys, raiders come plundering, steal our food, steal our silver. I was gonna send Sally north to stay with my brother, but the north's no better. The whole country's gone sour.

title: Breaker of Chains
Name: sandor
text: sandor You got any ale?

title: Breaker of Chains
Name: farmer
text: farmer Afraid not.

title: Breaker of Chains
Name: sandor
text: sandor How can a man not keep ale in his home?

title: Breaker of Chains
Name: farmer
text: farmer You look like you could really swing that sword. A real warrior with proper training. Those raiders wouldn't stand a chance against you. How would it be if you stayed on till the new moon? I could use a man to help with the farmwork. Sally does what she can, but she can't lift a bale of hay. And if any thieves came looking for easy pickings, one look at you, I'd bet they'd run the other way. Meaning no offense.

title: Breaker of Chains
Name: sandor
text: sandor What'll you pay? I don't have much. But I have hidden a bit of silver from the bandits. Fair wages for fair work?

title: Breaker of Chains
Name: sandor
text: sandor Fair wages for fair work.

title: Breaker of Chains
Name: arya
text: arya What did you do?!

title: Breaker of Chains
Name: sandor
text: sandor Get your horse saddled.

title: Breaker of Chains
Name: arya
text: arya You told me you weren't a thief.

title: Breaker of Chains
Name: sandor
text: sandor I wasn't.

title: Breaker of Chains
Name: arya
text: arya He took us in. He fed us and you...

title: Breaker of Chains
Name: sandor
text: sandor Aye, he took us in. He's a good man and his daughter makes a nice stew. And they'll both be dead come winter.

title: Breaker of Chains
Name: arya
text: arya You don't know that.

title: Breaker of Chains
Name: sandor
text: sandor I do know it. He's weak. He can't protect himself. They'll both be dead come winter. Dead men don't need silver.

title: Breaker of Chains
Name: arya
text: arya You're the worst shit in the Seven Kingdoms.

title: Breaker of Chains
Name: sandor
text: sandor There's plenty worse than me. I just understand the way things are. How many Starks they got to behead before you figure it out?

title: Breaker of Chains
Name: ranger
text: ranger Raper. Raper. Horse thief. Ninth born son. Raper. Thief. Thief and raper.

title: Breaker of Chains
Name: alliser
text: alliser There he is, Sam the Slayer.

title: Breaker of Chains
Name: janos
text: janos Going to visit your wildling whore?

title: Breaker of Chains
Name: sam
text: sam She's not a whore.

title: Breaker of Chains
Name: janos
text: janos No? Maybe I'll give her a copper tonight and find out.

title: Breaker of Chains
Name: sam
text: sam They all think I'm lying.

title: Breaker of Chains
Name: gilly
text: gilly About what?

title: Breaker of Chains
Name: sam
text: sam Killing the white Walker.

title: Breaker of Chains
Name: gilly
text: gilly You're not lying. I'll never forget the way it screamed.

title: Breaker of Chains
Name: sam
text: sam But you're the only one that saw it. And they all think you're just a...

title: Breaker of Chains
Name: gilly
text: gilly A what?

title: Breaker of Chains
Name: sam
text: sam Well, a wildling.

title: Breaker of Chains
Name: gilly
text: gilly My father hated that word.

title: Breaker of Chains
Name: sam
text: sam It's not a very nice word, I suppose.

title: Breaker of Chains
Name: gilly
text: gilly I don't know. It makes me sound a bit dangerous, doesn't it?

title: Breaker of Chains
Name: sam
text: sam So... are you all right? No one bothering you?

title: Breaker of Chains
Name: gilly
text: gilly I get a lot of looks. I hear them making their jokes. But no one's touched me if that's what you mean.

title: Breaker of Chains
Name: sam
text: sam I worry about it sometimes. All the time.

title: Breaker of Chains
Name: gilly
text: gilly Why do you worry about it?

title: Breaker of Chains
Name: sam
text: sam 100 men, one woman.

title: Breaker of Chains
Name: gilly
text: gilly They've got other things to think about.

title: Breaker of Chains
Name: sam
text: sam That's the only thing they think about.

title: Breaker of Chains
Name: gilly
text: gilly You're being silly.

title: Breaker of Chains
Name: sam
text: sam I'm not being silly. There's 100 men lying awake at night picturing you.

title: Breaker of Chains
Name: gilly
text: gilly What about you?

title: Breaker of Chains
Name: sam
text: sam What about me? Gilly? I worry about you.

title: Breaker of Chains
Name: gilly
text: gilly Thank you.

title: Breaker of Chains
Name: sam
text: sam For what?

title: Breaker of Chains
Name: gilly
text: gilly For worrying about me.

title: Breaker of Chains
Name: sam
text: sam I don't know if you're safe here. They're my brothers, but some of them were thieves before they came here. Some of them were rapers. You saw what they did at your father's keep.

title: Breaker of Chains
Name: gilly
text: gilly So what are you saying?

title: Breaker of Chains
Name: sam
text: sam Maybe you'd be safer in Mole's Town.

title: Breaker of Chains
Name: gilly
text: gilly Are you bored of me?

title: Breaker of Chains
Name: sam
text: sam Bored of you? I... I want to protect you.

title: Breaker of Chains
Name: gilly
text: gilly I'll get these to Hobb. Keep an eye on little Sam.

title: Breaker of Chains
Name: davos
text: davos Your Grace.

title: Breaker of Chains
Name: stannis
text: stannis You're a literary man now. What do you make of that?

title: Breaker of Chains
Name: davos
text: davos Joffrey?

title: Breaker of Chains
Name: stannis
text: stannis The usurper Joffrey Baratheon. I said those words when I tossed a leech into the fire. A leech filled with bastard blood. A bastard you set free. I am now faced with a great opportunity and I am powerless to take advantage of it.

title: Breaker of Chains
Name: davos
text: davos I will find you an army, Your Grace. I've been working day and night...

title: Breaker of Chains
Name: stannis
text: stannis What progress have you made?

title: Breaker of Chains
Name: davos
text: davos I've rallied House Peasebury to your 'cause.

title: Breaker of Chains
Name: stannis
text: stannis House Peasebury.

title: Breaker of Chains
Name: davos
text: davos House Musgood.

title: Breaker of Chains
Name: stannis
text: stannis House Musgood.

title: Breaker of Chains
Name: davos
text: davos And House Haigh.

title: Breaker of Chains
Name: stannis
text: stannis House Haigh. They don't have enough men between them to raid a pantry.

title: Breaker of Chains
Name: davos
text: davos Westeros is not the world, Your Grace. We need to look east for ships and men. 10,000 skilled soldiers fight for the Golden Company.

title: Breaker of Chains
Name: stannis
text: stannis The Golden Company?

title: Breaker of Chains
Name: davos
text: davos They've never broken a contract.

title: Breaker of Chains
Name: stannis
text: stannis They're sellswords.

title: Breaker of Chains
Name: davos
text: davos We're willing to use blood magic to put you on the throne, but we're not willing to pay men to fight? Now the Red Woman's magic is real. Her visions and prophecies may be, too, but I've never heard of visions and prophecies winning a war. Soldiers win wars. Soldiers on the ground. It's dirty on the ground.

title: Breaker of Chains
Name: stannis
text: stannis We don't have any gold.

title: Breaker of Chains
Name: davos
text: davos Not yet.

title: Breaker of Chains
Name: stannis
text: stannis If I do not press my claim, my claim will be forgotten. I will not become a page in someone else's history book. I'm running out of time, Ser Davos. Which means you're running out of time. -

title: Breaker of Chains
Name: shireen
text: shireen You're late.

title: Breaker of Chains
Name: davos
text: davos I'm sorry, Princess.

title: Breaker of Chains
Name: shireen
text: shireen I thought you weren't coming.

title: Breaker of Chains
Name: davos
text: davos The Hand of the King doesn't have much leisure time.

title: Breaker of Chains
Name: shireen
text: shireen You won't be a very good Hand if you see the word knight and say "ka-nigit."

title: Breaker of Chains
Name: davos
text: davos That happened once, weeks ago. You're your father's daughter, no mistake. Bloody relentless, the both of you.

title: Breaker of Chains
Name: shireen
text: shireen It's a new one today. Lots of tricky words. But I think you can manage.

title: Breaker of Chains
Name: shireen
text: shireen You'll never read well if you move your lips. That's how children do it.

title: Breaker of Chains
Name: davos
text: davos The Life and Adventures of Elyo Grivas. First Sword of Braavos.

title: Breaker of Chains
Name: davos
text: davos Thank you very much.

title: Breaker of Chains
Name: shireen
text: shireen I like this one. It's full of sword fights and pirates. You were a pirate once.

title: Breaker of Chains
Name: davos
text: davos No, I was never a pirate. I was a smuggler.

title: Breaker of Chains
Name: shireen
text: shireen What's the difference?

title: Breaker of Chains
Name: davos
text: davos Well, if you're a famous smuggler, you're not doing it right.

title: Breaker of Chains
Name: shireen
text: shireen My father says a criminal is a criminal.

title: Breaker of Chains
Name: davos
text: davos Your father lacks an appreciation of the finer points of bad behavior. So do the Braavosi.

title: Breaker of Chains
Name: shireen
text: shireen You've sailed to Braavos?

title: Breaker of Chains
Name: davos
text: davos Of course. Almost got beheaded by a First Sword of Braavos. I tried to explain to him the difference between pirates and smugglers, but he didn't seem any more interested in the distinction than your father. I suppose if you work for the Iron Bank of Braavos and each one of your gold barges is worth half a kingdom, you tend not to be overly concerned with the kind of distinction...

title: Breaker of Chains
Name: shireen
text: shireen What was that for?

title: Breaker of Chains
Name: davos
text: davos I need you to write a message.

title: Breaker of Chains
Name: shireen
text: shireen You should write it yourself. It's good practice.

title: Breaker of Chains
Name: davos
text: davos It's too important for me. I need a smart person to do it. Go on.

title: Breaker of Chains
Name: davos
text: davos To the offices of the Iron Bank of Braavos from Stannis Baratheon the one true king of Westeros.

title: Breaker of Chains
Name: shireen
text: shireen But that's not you.

title: Breaker of Chains
Name: davos
text: davos I need to get their attention. Go on. Write.

title: Breaker of Chains
Name: sam
text: sam He's seen some adventures, hasn't he?

title: Breaker of Chains
Name: moles
text: moles Precious little thing.

title: Breaker of Chains
Name: moles
text: moles What's his name?

title: Breaker of Chains
Name: gilly
text: gilly Sam.

title: Breaker of Chains
Name: moles
text: moles Lovely. That the daddy?

title: Breaker of Chains
Name: gilly
text: gilly No.

title: Breaker of Chains
Name: moles
text: moles Where's the daddy?

title: Breaker of Chains
Name: gilly
text: gilly He's dead.

title: Breaker of Chains
Name: moles
text: moles Oh. Where you from?

title: Breaker of Chains
Name: gilly
text: gilly North of here.

title: Breaker of Chains
Name: moles
text: moles North of here? You a fucking wildling?

title: Breaker of Chains
Name: moles
text: moles Only room and board?

title: Breaker of Chains
Name: sam
text: sam That's right. She'll clean and cook and look after the other girls' babies.

title: Breaker of Chains
Name: moles
text: moles Could find other work for her, too.

title: Breaker of Chains
Name: sam
text: sam No other work.

title: Breaker of Chains
Name: moles
text: moles There'd be money. Give you a piece of it.

title: Breaker of Chains
Name: sam
text: sam I promise to come back and visit whenever I can. You'll be safer here. Who's gonna protect you at Castle Black? Me?

title: Breaker of Chains
Name: gilly
text: gilly You protected me north of the Wall.

title: Breaker of Chains
Name: sam
text: sam This is different. They're brothers of the Night's Watch and I can't just stab them in the back and I can't run away, which is what we did at Craster's.

title: Breaker of Chains
Name: sam
text: sam You have to trust me. It's for the best.

title: Breaker of Chains
Name: gilly
text: gilly Best for you.

title: Breaker of Chains
Name: sam
text: sam Oh, Gilly. Please don't.

title: Breaker of Chains
Name: oberyn
text: oberyn Greedy.

title: Breaker of Chains
Name: ellaria
text: ellaria No?

title: Breaker of Chains
Name: olyvar
text: olyvar I'm sorry. You're lovely, I just never acquired the taste.

title: Breaker of Chains
Name: oberyn
text: oberyn You're calling my beauty an acquired taste?

title: Breaker of Chains
Name: ellaria
text: ellaria That's quite all right, lover. It's more for you.

title: Breaker of Chains
Name: oberyn
text: oberyn Your loss.

title: Breaker of Chains
Name: olyvar
text: olyvar You like them both the same? Boys and girls?

title: Breaker of Chains
Name: oberyn
text: oberyn Does that surprise you?

title: Breaker of Chains
Name: olyvar
text: olyvar Everyone has a preference.

title: Breaker of Chains
Name: oberyn
text: oberyn Then everyone is missing half the worldo s pleasure. The gods made that and it delights me. The gods made this and it delights me. When it comes to war, I fight for Dorne. When it comes to love, I don't choose sides.

title: Breaker of Chains
Name: olyvar
text: olyvar I hope I have as much stamina when I'm your age.

title: Breaker of Chains
Name: oberyn
text: oberyn What are you, 25?

title: Breaker of Chains
Name: ellaria
text: ellaria Children.

title: Breaker of Chains
Name: oberyn
text: oberyn Someday, if you're lucky, you will wake up and realize you are old. That pretty ass of yours will sag. Your belly will grow soft and your back will ache in the night and gray hairs will sprout from your ears. No one will want you anymore. Make sure you fucked your fill before that day.

title: Breaker of Chains
Name: olyvar
text: olyvar Did you?

title: Breaker of Chains
Name: ellaria
text: ellaria He is a prince of Dorne. Girls and boys will line up to fuck him till the day he dies.

title: Breaker of Chains
Name: oberyn
text: oberyn They will all have to line up behind you.

title: Breaker of Chains
Name: tywin
text: tywin Prince Oberyn.

title: Breaker of Chains
Name: oberyn
text: oberyn Lord Tywin.

title: Breaker of Chains
Name: tywin
text: tywin May we have the room?

title: Breaker of Chains
Name: ellaria
text: ellaria Call my name if you need me, lover.

title: Breaker of Chains
Name: oberyn
text: oberyn Would you like to sit?

title: Breaker of Chains
Name: tywin
text: tywin No, thank you.

title: Breaker of Chains
Name: oberyn
text: oberyn Some wine?

title: Breaker of Chains
Name: oberyn
text: oberyn I'm sorry about your grandson.

title: Breaker of Chains
Name: tywin
text: tywin Are you?

title: Breaker of Chains
Name: oberyn
text: oberyn I don't believe that a child is responsible for the sins of his father. Or his grandfather. An awful way to die.

title: Breaker of Chains
Name: tywin
text: tywin Which way is that?

title: Breaker of Chains
Name: oberyn
text: oberyn Are you interrogating me, Lord Tywin?

title: Breaker of Chains
Name: tywin
text: tywin Some believe the king choked.

title: Breaker of Chains
Name: oberyn
text: oberyn Some believe the sky is blue because we live inside the eye of a blue-eyed giant. The king was poisoned.

title: Breaker of Chains
Name: tywin
text: tywin I hear you studied poisons at the Citadel.

title: Breaker of Chains
Name: oberyn
text: oberyn I did. This is why I know.

title: Breaker of Chains
Name: tywin
text: tywin Your hatred for my family is rather well known. You arrive at the capital, an expert in poisoning, some days later my grandson dies of poisoning.

title: Breaker of Chains
Name: oberyn
text: oberyn Rather suspicious. Why haven't you thrown me in a dungeon?

title: Breaker of Chains
Name: tywin
text: tywin You spoke with Tyrion in this very brothel on the day that you arrived. What did you discuss?

title: Breaker of Chains
Name: oberyn
text: oberyn You think we conspired together?

title: Breaker of Chains
Name: tywin
text: tywin What did you discuss?

title: Breaker of Chains
Name: oberyn
text: oberyn The death of my sister.

title: Breaker of Chains
Name: tywin
text: tywin For which you blame me.

title: Breaker of Chains
Name: oberyn
text: oberyn She was raped and murdered by the Mountain. The Mountain follows your orders. Of course I blame you.

title: Breaker of Chains
Name: tywin
text: tywin Here I stand unarmed, unguarded. Should I be concerned?

title: Breaker of Chains
Name: oberyn
text: oberyn You are unarmed and unguarded because you know me better than that. I am a man of reason. If I cut your throat today, I will be drawn and quartered tomorrow.

title: Breaker of Chains
Name: tywin
text: tywin Men at war commit all kinds of crimes without their superiors' knowledge.

title: Breaker of Chains
Name: oberyn
text: oberyn So you deny involvement in Elia's murder?

title: Breaker of Chains
Name: tywin
text: tywin Categorically.

title: Breaker of Chains
Name: oberyn
text: oberyn I would like to speak with the Mountain.

title: Breaker of Chains
Name: tywin
text: tywin I'm sure he would enjoy speaking with you.

title: Breaker of Chains
