Name: oberyn
text: oberyn He might not enjoy it as much as he thinks he would.

title: Breaker of Chains
Name: tywin
text: tywin I could arrange for this meeting.

title: Breaker of Chains
Name: oberyn
text: oberyn But you want something in return.

title: Breaker of Chains
Name: tywin
text: tywin There will be a trial for my son. And as custom dictates, three judges will render a verdict. I will preside. Mace Tyrell will serve as the second judge. I would like you to be the third.

title: Breaker of Chains
Name: oberyn
text: oberyn Why?

title: Breaker of Chains
Name: tywin
text: tywin Not long ago, the Tyrells sided with Renly Baratheon. Declared themselves enemies of the throne. Now they are our strongest allies.

title: Breaker of Chains
Name: oberyn
text: oberyn Well, you made the Tyrell girl a queen. Asking me to judge at your son's trial isn't quite as tempting.

title: Breaker of Chains
Name: tywin
text: tywin I will also invite you to sit on the small council to serve as one of the new king's principal advisors.

title: Breaker of Chains
Name: oberyn
text: oberyn I never realized you had such respect for Dorne, Lord Tywin.

title: Breaker of Chains
Name: tywin
text: tywin We are not the Seven Kingdoms until Dorne returns to the fold. The king is dead. The Greyjoys are in open rebellion. A wildling army marches on the Wall. And in the East, a Targaryen girl has three dragons. Before long, she will turn her eyes to Westeros. Only the Dornish managed to resist Aegon Targaryen and his dragons.

title: Breaker of Chains
Name: oberyn
text: oberyn You're saying you need us? That must be hard for you to admit.

title: Breaker of Chains
Name: tywin
text: tywin We need each other. You help me serve justice to the king's assassins and I will help you serve justice to Elia's.

title: Breaker of Chains
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion Podrick. Apologies for the stench.

title: Breaker of Chains
Name: podrick
text: podrick I brought you some wine, my lord, but they took it from me.

title: Breaker of Chains
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion A noble effort.

title: Breaker of Chains
Name: podrick
text: podrick They didn't find the candles, though. A quill, some parchment, duck sausage, almonds, and some hard cheese.

title: Breaker of Chains
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion You're a good lad. Any word of Shae?

title: Breaker of Chains
Name: podrick
text: podrick I've heard nothing, my lord.

title: Breaker of Chains
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion I suppose that's a good thing. What are they saying about me out there?

title: Breaker of Chains
Name: podrick
text: podrick You're to stand trial in a fortnight for murdering the king.

title: Breaker of Chains
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion Do you believe I murdered Joffrey?

title: Breaker of Chains
Name: podrick
text: podrick No, my lord. You didn't?

title: Breaker of Chains
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion No. Gods, no. The world is a better place without him, but I had nothing to do with it. I would like to think if I were arranging a royal assassination, I'd plan it in such a way that I wouldn't be standing there gawking like a fool when the king died. Trial in a fortnight. Have they announced the judges yet?

title: Breaker of Chains
Name: podrick
text: podrick Your father.

title: Breaker of Chains
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion Of course.

title: Breaker of Chains
Name: podrick
text: podrick Mace Tyrell.

title: Breaker of Chains
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion Who will vote exactly as my father tells him to vote.

title: Breaker of Chains
Name: podrick
text: podrick And Prince Oberyn of Dorne.

title: Breaker of Chains
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion Oberyn? Give it to my father. He never fails to take advantage of a family tragedy.

title: Breaker of Chains
Name: podrick
text: podrick I'm supposed to get a list of names from you, my lord. Anyone who might testify on your behalf.

title: Breaker of Chains
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion Oh, I can call my own witnesses? How generous of them. Very well, my wife. Sansa.

title: Breaker of Chains
Name: podrick
text: podrick My lord, she's gone.

title: Breaker of Chains
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion Gone?

title: Breaker of Chains
Name: podrick
text: podrick No one's seen her since the wedding. You don't think she...

title: Breaker of Chains
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion No one had more 'cause to kill Joffrey than Sansa, but the girl is no assassin. Whoever killed the king wanted me to lose my head for it. And with my wife's disappearance, it makes me seem that much more guilty. Podrick.

title: Breaker of Chains
Name: podrick
text: podrick Yes, my lord?

title: Breaker of Chains
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion They'll be following you now.

title: Breaker of Chains
Name: podrick
text: podrick Who will?

title: Breaker of Chains
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion I don't know. They. They. The ominous they. The man pulling the strings. Or woman. My father. Maybe Joffrey was too much work for him. Sweet Tommen will be so much easier to handle. Whenever something bad happens to me, I assume it's my sister that had a hand in it. But say what you will of Cersei, she loves her children. She is the only one I'm certain had nothing to do with this murder. Which makes it unique as King's Landing murders go.

title: Breaker of Chains
Name: podrick
text: podrick Any other witnesses, my lord?

title: Breaker of Chains
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion Varys could vouch for me if he dared.

title: Breaker of Chains
Name: podrick
text: podrick He's already been called as a witness for the queen.

title: Breaker of Chains
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion Of course. Fetch Bronn. I have a job for him.

title: Breaker of Chains
Name: podrick
text: podrick I've already asked, my lord. They won't let him see you.

title: Breaker of Chains
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion Why not?

title: Breaker of Chains
Name: podrick
text: podrick They say he's a known cutthroat and your close associate. He's under investigation himself.

title: Breaker of Chains
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion And my brother? Will they at least allow me to see Jaime?

title: Breaker of Chains
Name: podrick
text: podrick I'll ask, my lord.

title: Breaker of Chains
Name: podrick
text: podrick There's something else, my lord. A man, I didn't know his face, he came to ask if I'd testify against you. Said I'd be named Ser Podrick Payne if I told the judges you'd bought a poison called the Strangler.

title: Breaker of Chains
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion Ser Podrick Payne? Has a nice ring to it. What did you tell him?

title: Breaker of Chains
Name: podrick
text: podrick I didn't tell them anything, my lord.

title: Breaker of Chains
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion Are you going to accept their offer?

title: Breaker of Chains
Name: podrick
text: podrick My lord.

title: Breaker of Chains
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion Testifying against me wasn't a suggestion. If they can't tempt you with honey, they'll choose something less sweet.

title: Breaker of Chains
Name: podrick
text: podrick You've been good to me, my lord.

title: Breaker of Chains
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion Pod, the trial's in a fortnight. They'll want an answer before that.

title: Breaker of Chains
Name: podrick
text: podrick I already gave them an answer, my lord.

title: Breaker of Chains
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion I will not have you dying on my behalf. Do you hear me? If I have to take that long walk to the executioner's block, I don't want to see your head already mounted.

title: Breaker of Chains
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion Pod, I am giving you an order. Go and find my brother. Tell him I need him. And get yourself out of King's Landing before it's too late. Pod! This is farewell.

title: Breaker of Chains
Name: podrick
text: podrick Farewell, my lord.

title: Breaker of Chains
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion Pod. There has never lived a more loyal squire.

title: Breaker of Chains
Name: olly
text: olly Mother says it's time to eat.

title: Breaker of Chains
Name: guymon
text: guymon What's she got boiling? Wait. Wait. Let me guess.

title: Breaker of Chains
Name: olly
text: olly Potatoes.

title: Breaker of Chains
Name: guymon
text: guymon Potatoes. Well, no one boils a potato better than your mom. Has she got...

title: Breaker of Chains
Name: man
text: man The wildlings!

title: Breaker of Chains
Name: ollys
text: ollys Guymon! Hide. Hide!

title: Breaker of Chains
Name: styr
text: styr You know how to get to Castle Black?

title: Breaker of Chains
Name: olly
text: olly Yes. Yes.

title: Breaker of Chains
Name: styr
text: styr Those your parents? Open your eyes. I'm going to eat them. Do you hear me? I'm going to eat your dead mama and I'm going to eat your dead papa. Go tell the crows at Castle Black.

title: Breaker of Chains
Name: yarwyck
text: yarwyck We need to teach them a lesson about the way we deal with their kind.

title: Breaker of Chains
Name: men
text: men Aye! Aye!

title: Breaker of Chains
Name: yarwyck
text: yarwyck Three dozen bodies with slit throats tossed off the top of the Wall. Seems like that would be a good lesson.

title: Breaker of Chains
Name: men
text: men Aye!

title: Breaker of Chains
Name: alliser
text: alliser If we go after them, we'll be giving them what they want. They want to draw us out, pick us off a few at a time.

title: Breaker of Chains
Name: maester
text: maester We have just over 100 men. And that's including stewards and builders. And me. We can't afford to lose a single man. We must remember our first responsibility. We are the watchers on the Wall.

title: Breaker of Chains
Name: pyp
text: pyp There's got to be a way to protect them.

title: Breaker of Chains
Name: alliser
text: alliser You're a champion of the common people, Lord Snow. What do you say to Brother Pyp's proposition?

title: Breaker of Chains
Name: jon
text: jon Mance Rayder is coming. If the wildlings breach the Wall, they'll roll over everything and everyone for 1,000 Miles before they reach an army that can stop them.

title: Breaker of Chains
Name: alliser
text: alliser We need to shore up Castle Black and we need to defend the Wall. That is our job.

title: Breaker of Chains
Name: pyp
text: pyp Rangers returning.

title: Breaker of Chains
Name: jon
text: jon Help him.

title: Breaker of Chains
Name: dolorous
text: dolorous Thought you'd have blue eyes by now.

title: Breaker of Chains
Name: alliser
text: alliser What took you so long?

title: Breaker of Chains
Name: grenn
text: grenn We were held up.

title: Breaker of Chains
Name: alliser
text: alliser By what?

title: Breaker of Chains
Name: grenn
text: grenn Chains.

title: Breaker of Chains
Name: dolorous
text: dolorous We were guests of the mutineers at Craster's Keep.

title: Breaker of Chains
Name: jon
text: jon And the mutineers stayed?

title: Breaker of Chains
Name: dolorous
text: dolorous They're not going anywhere. They've got Craster's food and his wives. Poor girls. Never thought they'd miss their daddy. Karl's running things now. He's the one who put a knife through Craster's mouth.

title: Breaker of Chains
Name: jon
text: jon We need to ride north and kill them all.

title: Breaker of Chains
Name: alliser
text: alliser We just went over this, boy. -Justice can wait.

title: Breaker of Chains
Name: jon
text: jon It's not about justice. I told the wildlings we had over 1,000 men at Castle Black alone. Karl and the others know the truth as well as we do. How long do you think they'll keep that information to themselves when the wildlings are peeling their fingernails off? Mance has all he needs to crush us, he just doesn't know it yet. As soon as he gets his hands on them, he will. Then he'll throw his full strength at us. And even if every one of us kills 100 wildlings, there's still not a thing we can do to stop them.

title: Breaker of Chains
Name: pyp
text: pyp I don't think I can kill 100 wildlings.

title: Breaker of Chains
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys Are they attacking?

title: Breaker of Chains
Name: jorah
text: jorah A single rider. A champion of Meereen. They want you to send your own champion against him.

title: Breaker of Chains
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys What is he doing?

title: Breaker of Chains
Name: barristan
text: barristan I believe he means to...

title: Breaker of Chains
Name: missandei
text: missandei He says that we're an army of men without man parts. He claims you are no woman at all, but a man who... hides his cock in his own asshole.

title: Breaker of Chains
Name: barristan
text: barristan Ignore him, Your Grace. These are meaningless words.

title: Breaker of Chains
Name: jorah
text: jorah They're not meaningless if half the city you intend to take is listening to them.

title: Breaker of Chains
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys I have something to say to the people of Meereen. First, I will need this one to be quiet. Do I have a champion?

title: Breaker of Chains
Name: grey
text: grey Allow me this honor, mother of dragons. I will not disappoint you.

title: Breaker of Chains
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys You are the commander of the Unsullied. I cannot risk you.

title: Breaker of Chains
Name: barristan
text: barristan Your Grace, I've won more single combats than any man alive.

title: Breaker of Chains
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys Which is why you must remain by my side.

title: Breaker of Chains
Name: jorah
text: jorah I've been by your side longer than any of them, Khaleesi. Let me stand for you today as well.

title: Breaker of Chains
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys You are my most trusted advisor, my most valued general, and my dearest friend. I will not gamble with your life.

title: Breaker of Chains
Name: daario
text: daario I was the last to join your army. I'm not your general or a member of your Queensguard or the commander of your Unsullied. My mother was a whore. I come from nothing. And before long, I will return to nothing. Let me kill this man for you.

title: Breaker of Chains
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys Very well. You have quite an audience. Make it worth their while.

title: Breaker of Chains
Name: missandei
text: missandei He is very brave, Your Grace.

title: Breaker of Chains
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys Yes, win or lose, as long as the whole city is watching.

title: Breaker of Chains
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys You sure you don't want a horse?

title: Breaker of Chains
Name: daario
text: daario Why would I want a horse?

title: Breaker of Chains
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys Horses are faster than men.

title: Breaker of Chains
Name: daario
text: daario Horses are dumber than men.

title: Breaker of Chains
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys I am Daenerys Stormborn.

title: Breaker of Chains
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys Your Masters may have told you lies about me, or they may have told you nothing. It does not matter. I have nothing to say to them. Only to you. First I went to Astapor. Those who were slaves in Astapor now stand behind me, free. Next I went to Yunkai. Those who were slaves in Yunkai now stand behind me, free. Now I have come to Meereen. I am not your enemy. Your enemy is beside you.

title: Breaker of Chains
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys Your enemy steals and murders your children. Your enemy has nothing for you but chains and suffering and commands. I do not bring commands. I bring you a choice. And I bring your enemies what they deserve. Forward!

title: Breaker of Chains
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys Fire!

title: Oathkeeper
Name: grey
text: grey My name is Grey Worm. I come from the Summer "Ills."

title: Oathkeeper
Name: missandei
text: missandei Isles. Summer Isles.

title: Oathkeeper
Name: grey
text: grey Summer Isles.

title: Oathkeeper
Name: missandei
text: missandei I am from an island called Naath.

title: Oathkeeper
Name: grey
text: grey When they took you?

title: Oathkeeper
Name: missandei
text: missandei When did they take me?" I was five years old.

title: Oathkeeper
Name: grey
text: grey You remember your home?

title: Oathkeeper
Name: missandei
text: missandei I remember when they rowed us away from shore. How white the beaches were. How tall the trees. And I remember my village burning. Smoke rising into the sky. Do you remember your home?

title: Oathkeeper
Name: grey
text: grey Unsullied. Always Unsullied. Before Unsullied, nothing.

title: Oathkeeper
Name: missandei
text: missandei That's not true. Perhaps one day you will return to the Summer Isles.

title: Oathkeeper
Name: grey
text: grey I don't want return.

title: Oathkeeper
Name: missandei
text: missandei Kill the masters.

title: Oathkeeper
Name: grey
text: grey Kill the masters.

title: Oathkeeper
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys How are the lessons coming?

title: Oathkeeper
Name: missandei
text: missandei Very well, Your Grace.

title: Oathkeeper
Name: grey
text: grey Missandei is teacher good, my queen.

title: Oathkeeper
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys You'll have to continue later. It's time.

title: Oathkeeper
Name: mossador
text: mossador You heard her! She said she came to free us.

title: Oathkeeper
Name: elder
text: elder You are a fool. The masters are too strong.

title: Oathkeeper
Name: mossador
text: mossador She will protect us. She defeated the masters' champion.

title: Oathkeeper
Name: mossador
text: mossador She has a great army. You want to live the rest of your days in chains?

title: Oathkeeper
Name: meereen
text: meereen I want to live. You saw what they did to those children. What do you think they'll do to us?

title: Oathkeeper
Name: elder
text: elder I've been through two slave revolts, boy. They always end the same way

title: Oathkeeper
Name: grey
text: grey All men must die.

title: Oathkeeper
Name: grey
text: grey But I promise you, a single day of freedom is worth more than a lifetime in chains.

title: Oathkeeper
Name: elder
text: elder Who are you?

title: Oathkeeper
Name: grey
text: grey This one is called Grey Worm. I was taken as a baby by the Masters of Astapor, raised and trained as Unsullied. Now I fight for Daenerys, the Mother of Dragons and Breaker of Chains.

title: Oathkeeper
Name: elder
text: elder You are Unsullied? They taught you how to fight before you could walk. We are not soldiers.

title: Oathkeeper
Name: meereen
text: meereen We have no training, weapons.

title: Oathkeeper
Name: grey
text: grey There are three slaves in this city for every Master. No one can give you your freedom, brothers. If you want it, you must take it.

title: Oathkeeper
Name: slaves
text: slaves Mhysa! Mhysa! Mhysa!

title: Oathkeeper
Name: slaves
text: slaves Mhysa! Mhysa! Mhysa! Mhysa!

title: Oathkeeper
Name: slaves
text: slaves Mhysa! Mhysa!

title: Oathkeeper
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys Remind me, Ser Jorah, how many children did the Great Masters nail to mileposts?

title: Oathkeeper
Name: jorah
text: jorah 163, Khaleesi.

title: Oathkeeper
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys Yes, that was it.

title: Oathkeeper
Name: barristan
text: barristan Your Grace, may I have a word? The city is yours. All these people,they're your subjects now. Sometimes it is better to answer injustice with mercy.

title: Oathkeeper
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys I will answer injustice with justice.

title: Oathkeeper
Name: jaime
text: jaime What the hell was that?

title: Oathkeeper
Name: bronn
text: bronn That was me knocking your ass to the dirt with your own hand.

title: Oathkeeper
Name: jaime
text: jaime You're a rare talent. When you're fighting cripples, anyway.

title: Oathkeeper
Name: bronn
text: bronn You learned to fight like a good little boy. I'll bet that thrust through the MadKing's back was pretty as a picture. You want to fight pretty or you want to win?

title: Oathkeeper
Name: jaime
text: jaime You talk to my brother this way?

title: Oathkeeper
Name: bronn
text: bronn All the time. He got used to it.

title: Oathkeeper
Name: jaime
text: jaime Do you think he did it?

title: Oathkeeper
Name: bronn
text: bronn No. Oh, he hated the little twat, sure. But who didn't? And poison's not his style. Or murder, for that matter. You want to know for sure, why don't you ask him?

title: Oathkeeper
Name: bronn
text: bronn You haven't been to see him yet, eh?

title: Oathkeeper
Name: jaime
text: jaime We're done for today.

title: Oathkeeper
Name: bronn
text: bronn Your brother ever tell you how I came into his service?

title: Oathkeeper
Name: jaime
text: jaime You stood for him in his trial by combat at the Eyrie.

title: Oathkeeper
Name: bronn
text: bronn Aye. But only when Lady Arryn demanded the trial take place that day. You were his first choice. He named you for his champion because he knew you would ride day and night to come fight for him. You gonna fight for him now?

title: Oathkeeper
Name: jaime
text: jaime To tell you the truth, this isn't so bad. Four walls. A pot to piss in. I was chained to a wooden post covered in my own shit for months.

title: Oathkeeper
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion Is that supposed to make me feel better?

title: Oathkeeper
Name: jaime
text: jaime Maybe a bit. I'm sorry I didn't come sooner.

title: Oathkeeper
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion It's complicated, yes. So how is our sister?

title: Oathkeeper
Name: jaime
text: jaime How do you think? Her son died in her arms.

title: Oathkeeper
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion Her son?

title: Oathkeeper
Name: jaime
text: jaime Don't. You know what's coming?

title: Oathkeeper
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion My trial for regicide.Yes, I know. I know the whole bloody country thinks I'm guilty. I know that one of my three judges has wished me dead more times than I can count. And that judge is my father. As for Cersei, well, she's probably working on a way to avoid a trial altogether by having me killed.

title: Oathkeeper
Name: jaime
text: jaime Now that you mention it, she did ask.

title: Oathkeeper
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion So, should I turn around and close my eyes?

title: Oathkeeper
Name: jaime
text: jaime Depends. Did you do it?

title: Oathkeeper
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion The Kingslayer brothers. You like it? I like it. You're really asking if I killed your son?

title: Oathkeeper
Name: jaime
text: jaime Are you really asking if I'd kill my brother? How can I help you?

title: Oathkeeper
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion Well, you could set me free.

title: Oathkeeper
Name: jaime
text: jaime You know I can't.

title: Oathkeeper
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion Then there's really nothing else to say.

title: Oathkeeper
Name: jaime
text: jaime What do you want me to do? Kill the guards? Sneak you out of the city in the back of a cart? I'm the Lord Commander of the Kingsguard.

title: Oathkeeper
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion Sorry, I'd forgotten. I'd hate for you to do something inappropriate.

title: Oathkeeper
Name: jaime
text: jaime Inappropriate? You're accused of killing the king.Freeing you is treason.

title: Oathkeeper
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion Except I didn't do it.

title: Oathkeeper
Name: jaime
text: jaime Which is why we're having a trial. A trial. If the killer threw himself before the Iron Throne, confessed to his crimes, and gave irrefutable evidence of his guilt, it wouldn't matter to Cersei. She won't rest until my heado s on a spike.

title: Oathkeeper
Name: jaime
text: jaime Not just yours. She's offering a knighthood to whomever finds Sansa Stark.

title: Oathkeeper
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion Sansa couldn't have done this. She had more reason than anyone in the Seven Kingdoms. Do you think it's a coincidence she disappeared the same night Joffrey died?

title: Oathkeeper
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion No, but... Sansa's not a killer. Not yet, anyway.

title: Oathkeeper
Name: sansa
text: sansa Where are you taking me?

title: Oathkeeper
Name: petyr
text: petyr I'm getting married to your Aunt Lysa. She's waiting for us at the Eyrie. You'll be safe there.

title: Oathkeeper
Name: sansa
text: sansa Did you kill Joffrey?

title: Oathkeeper
Name: petyr
text: petyr Did I kill Joffrey? I've been in the Vale for weeks.

title: Oathkeeper
Name: sansa
text: sansa I know it was you.

title: Oathkeeper
Name: petyr
text: petyr And who helped me with this conspiracy?

title: Oathkeeper
Name: sansa
text: sansa Well, there was Ser Dontos. You used him to get me out of King's Landing, but you would never trust him to kill the king.

title: Oathkeeper
Name: petyr
text: petyr Why not?

title: Oathkeeper
Name: sansa
text: sansa Because you're too smart to trust a drunk.

title: Oathkeeper
Name: petyr
text: petyr Then perhaps it was your husband.

title: Oathkeeper
Name: sansa
text: sansa No.

title: Oathkeeper
Name: petyr
text: petyr How do you know?

title: Oathkeeper
Name: sansa
text: sansa I just do.

title: Oathkeeper
Name: petyr
text: petyr You're right. He wasn't involvedi n Joffrey's death. But you were. Do you remember that lovely necklace Dontos gave you? I don't suppose you noticed that a stone was missing after the feast.

title: Oathkeeper
Name: sansa
text: sansa The poison. I don't understand. The Lannisters gave you wealth, power. Joffrey made you the Lord of Harrenhal.

title: Oathkeeper
Name: petyr
text: petyr A man with no motive is a man no one suspects. Always keep your foes confused. If they don't know who you are or what you want, they can't know what you plan to do next.

title: Oathkeeper
Name: sansa
text: sansa I don't believe you. If they catch you, they'll put your head on a spike just like my father's. You'd risk that just to confuse them?

title: Oathkeeper
Name: petyr
text: petyr So many men they risk so little. They spend their lives avoiding danger. And then they die. I'd risk everything to get what I want.

title: Oathkeeper
Name: sansa
text: sansa And what do you want?

title: Oathkeeper
Name: petyr
text: petyr Everything. My friendship with the Lannisters was productive. But Joffrey, a vicious boy with a crown on his head, is not a reliable ally. And who could trust a friend like that?

title: Oathkeeper
Name: sansa
text: sansa Who could trust you?

title: Oathkeeper
Name: petyr
text: petyr I don't want friends like me. My new friends are predictable. Very reasonable people. As for what happened to Joffrey, well, that was something my new friends wanted very badly. Nothing like a thoughtful gift to make a new friendship grow strong.

title: Oathkeeper
Name: margaery
text: margaery I can't believe you're going. Leaving me alone here with these people.

title: Oathkeeper
Name: olenna
text: olenna The time has come, my dear. There's nothing more tedious than a trial. Except perhaps these gardens. If I have to take one more leisurely stroll through these gardens, I'll fling myself from the cliffs.

title: Oathkeeper
Name: olenna
text: olenna Have you been to see Tommen yet?

title: Oathkeeper
Name: margaery
text: margaery No. Have they even agreed to the match? No one tells me anything.

title: Oathkeeper
Name: olenna
text: olenna I wasn't originally meant to marry your grandfather Luthor, you know. He was engaged to my sister, your great-aunt Viola. I was to be given to some Targaryen or other. Marrying a Targaryen was all the rage back then. But the momentI saw my intended, with his twitchy little ferret's face and ludicrous silver hair, I knew he wouldn't do. So the evening before Luthor was to propose to my sister, I got lost on my way back from my embroidery lesson and happened upon his chamber.

title: Oathkeeper
Name: olenna
text: olenna How absentminded of me.

title: Oathkeeper
Name: margaery
text: margaery Mm-hmm.

title: Oathkeeper
Name: olenna
text: olenna The following morning, Luthor never made it down the stairs to propose to my sister 'cause the boy couldn't bloody walk.

title: Oathkeeper
Name: olenna
text: olenna And once he could, the only thing he wanted was what I'd given him the night before. I was good. I was very, very good. You are even better. But you need to act quickly. Cersei may be vicious, but she's not stupid. She'll turn the boy against you as soon as she can. And by the time you're married, it'll be too late. Luckily for you ,the Queen Regent is rather distracted at the moment, mourning her dear departed boy. Accusing her brother of his murder, which he didn't commit.

title: Oathkeeper
Name: margaery
text: margaery Well, he could have done.

title: Oathkeeper
Name: olenna
text: olenna He could have done,but he didn't.

title: Oathkeeper
Name: margaery
text: margaery You don't know, Grandmother.

title: Oathkeeper
Name: olenna
text: olenna But I do know. You don't think I'd let you marry that beast, do you?

title: Oathkeeper
Name: margaery
text: margaery What? I don't understand.

title: Oathkeeper
Name: olenna
text: olenna Shh. Don't you worry yourself about all that. You just do what needs to be done.

title: Oathkeeper
Name: jon
text: jon Bring it through! And again.

title: Oathkeeper
Name: jon
text: jon Very nice. Good.

title: Oathkeeper
Name: jon
text: jon A lot of wildlings fight with a weapon in each hand. First thing you want to do is disarm them to try and even the odds.

title: Oathkeeper
Name: jon
text: jon Let's see what you can do.

title: Oathkeeper
Name: jon
text: jon Olly, you just watch for now.

title: Oathkeeper
Name: olly
text: olly I can fight.

title: Oathkeeper
Name: jon
text: jon Have you ever held a sword before? OLLY I was the best archer in our hamlet.

title: Oathkeeper
Name: olly
text: olly I was!

title: Oathkeeper
Name: grenn
text: grenn I believe you. We'll go hunting for rabbits one day. Right now, watch and learn.

title: Oathkeeper
Name: jon
text: jon You two. Take it slow, try and disarm each other.

title: Oathkeeper
Name: jon
text: jon You know how to fight. You could have gone easier on him.

title: Oathkeeper
Name: locke
text: locke He wouldn't have learned anything that way.

title: Oathkeeper
Name: alliser
text: alliser Lord Snow. What do you think you're doing?

title: Oathkeeper
Name: jon
text: jon Grenn and I were helping them.

title: Oathkeeper
Name: alliser
text: alliser Grenn's a ranger.You're a steward. Maybe you forgot that while you were off with your wildling bitch, but I didn't.

title: Oathkeeper
Name: jon
text: jon Someone has to train them.

title: Oathkeeper
Name: alliser
text: alliser And that someone isn't you. Go find a chamber pot to empty. Go on. Do it. You traitor's bastard. Give me an excuse. Mormont's not hereto protect you now.

title: Oathkeeper
Name: alliser
text: alliser Get back to work. Now! I said now!

title: Oathkeeper
Name: janos
text: janos The bastardo s well-liked.You're not.

title: Oathkeeper
Name: alliser
text: alliser You think I care if they like me? We're at war.

title: Oathkeeper
Name: janos
text: janos For now. But you can't be acting commander forever. There will be a choosing. The old maester will insist on it. You might reconsider his request to marchon Craster's. Let the mutineer stake care of Snow. Or you might be taking orders from him the rest of your life.

title: Oathkeeper
Name: locke
text: locke A bastard, eh? Took you for highborn.

title: Oathkeeper
Name: jon
text: jon My father was highborn. My mother wasn't.

title: Oathkeeper
Name: locke
text: locke Name's Locke.

title: Oathkeeper
Name: jon
text: jon Jon Snow.

title: Oathkeeper
Name: jon
text: jon You fight well.

title: Oathkeeper
Name: locke
text: locke What brought you up here? A sense of duty. I wanted to do my part for the safety of the realm. I was a game warden in the Stormlands. Fed a prized partridge to my hungry kids. I was stupid enough to get caught. Chose the Wall over losing my hand. Figured I wouldn't have to suck up to any highborn cunts here.

title: Oathkeeper
Name: alliser
text: alliser Come on, get on with it. What are you waiting for? Summer?

title: Oathkeeper
Name: locke
text: locke Guess I was wrong.

title: Oathkeeper
Name: jaime
text: jaime You sent for me, Your Grace?

title: Oathkeeper
Name: cersei
text: cersei Your Grace. How formal of you. How many Kingsguards are posted outside Tommen's door?

title: Oathkeeper
Name: jaime
text: jaime Ser Boros is on duty tonight. Tomorrow I believe...

title: Oathkeeper
Name: cersei
text: cersei So one? You have one man guarding the future king?

title: Oathkeeper
Name: jaime
text: jaime I promise you Tommen's safe. We're protecting him.

title: Oathkeeper
Name: cersei
text: cersei The way you protected Joffrey? Why did Catelyn Stark set you free?

title: Oathkeeper
Name: jaime
text: jaime What?

title: Oathkeeper
Name: cersei
text: cersei I've been wondering for months. Ever since that great cow brought you back to the capital. Why did she set you free?

title: Oathkeeper
Name: jaime
text: jaime You know why. She'd hoped I'd send her daughters back to her.

title: Oathkeeper
Name: cersei
text: cersei She hoped or did you promise?

title: Oathkeeper
Name: jaime
text: jaime I swore by all the gods that if her daughters were alive, I'd return them to her.

title: Oathkeeper
Name: cersei
text: cersei So you made a sacred vow to the enemy.

title: Oathkeeper
Name: jaime
text: jaime I wanted to get back to you. Should I have told hert o fuck off?

title: Oathkeeper
Name: cersei
text: cersei You didn't mean it, then? You have no loyalty to Catelyn Stark?

title: Oathkeeper
Name: jaime
text: jaime Catelyn Stark's dead. So if I told you to leave the capital right now and find Sansa, if I told you to find that murderous little bitch and bring me her head, would you do it?

title: Oathkeeper
Name: cersei
text: cersei I know you went to see Tyrion. That creature who murdered our son.

title: Oathkeeper
Name: jaime
text: jaime I had to see him. I had to know for myself.

title: Oathkeeper
Name: cersei
text: cersei And?

title: Oathkeeper
Name: jaime
text: jaime He didn't do it, Cersei.

title: Oathkeeper
Name: cersei
text: cersei You've always pitied him. Our poor little brother. Abused by the world. Despised by his father and sister. He'd kill us all if he could. I want four men at Tommen's door day and night. That will be all, Lord Commander.

title: Oathkeeper
Name: tommen
text: tommen Ser Pounce?

title: Oathkeeper
Name: tommen
text: tommen How did you get past the Kingsguard?

title: Oathkeeper
Name: margaery
text: margaery Kingsguard.

title: Oathkeeper
Name: tommen
text: tommen I don't think you're supposed to be here. Mother doesn't allow me to have visitors at night.

title: Oathkeeper
Name: margaery
text: margaery I'm not a visitor, Your Grace. Word has itI'm to be your bride.

title: Oathkeeper
Name: margaery
text: margaery Did you know that people in arranged marriages often never meet until their wedding day? Before we decide to spend our lives together, we ought to get to know one another. Don't you think?

title: Oathkeeper
Name: tommen
text: tommen Yes. But if my mother found out...

title: Oathkeeper
Name: margaery
text: margaery It can be our secret. Hmm? If we're going to be man and wife, we'll have a few secrets from her, I hope. So, Your Grace...

title: Oathkeeper
Name: tommen
text: tommen Yes? Tell me a secret.

title: Oathkeeper
Name: margaery
text: margaery Hello. Aren't you a proper fellow?

title: Oathkeeper
Name: tommen
text: tommen That's Ser Pounce.

title: Oathkeeper
Name: margaery
text: margaery Very handsome.

title: Oathkeeper
Name: tommen
text: tommen Joffrey didn't like him. He threatened to skin him alive and mix his innards up in my food so I wouldn't know I was eating him.

title: Oathkeeper
Name: margaery
text: margaery That's very cruel. You don't strike me as cruel.

title: Oathkeeper
Name: tommen
text: tommen No. I don't think I am.

title: Oathkeeper
Name: margaery
text: margaery That's a relief. Because you know what happens when we marry?

title: Oathkeeper
Name: tommen
text: tommen We say our vows in front of the High Septon. And after the ceremony, there's a feast.

title: Oathkeeper
Name: margaery
text: margaery When we marry, I become yours. Forever. It's getting late. I should go. May I come and visit you again? All right, then.

title: Oathkeeper
Name: margaery
text: margaery Remember, our little secret.

title: Oathkeeper
Name: brienne
text: brienne Ser Jaime Lannister. Knighted and named to the Kingsguard in his 16th year. At the sack of King's Landing, murdered his king Aerys II. Pardoned by Robert Baratheon. Thereafter known as the Kingslayer.

title: Oathkeeper
Name: jaime
text: jaime It's the duty of the Lord Commander to fill those pages. And there's still room left on mine.

title: Oathkeeper
Name: brienne
text: brienne Valyrian steel.

title: Oathkeeper
Name: jaime
text: jaime Mmm. It's yours.

title: Oathkeeper
Name: brienne
text: brienne I can't accept this.

title: Oathkeeper
Name: jaime
text: jaime It was reforged from Ned Stark's sword. You'll use it to defend Ned Stark's daughter. You swore an oath to return the Stark girls to their mother. Lady Stark's dead. Arya's probably dead, too, but there's still a chance to find Sansa and get her somewhere safe. I've got something else for you.

title: Oathkeeper
Name: jaime
text: jaime I hope I got your measurements right.

title: Oathkeeper
Name: brienne
text: brienne I'll find her. For Lady Catelyn. And for you.

title: Oathkeeper
Name: jaime
text: jaime I almost forgot. I have one more gift.

title: Oathkeeper
Name: brienne
text: brienne I don't need a squire.

title: Oathkeeper
Name: jaime
text: jaime Of course you do.

title: Oathkeeper
Name: brienne
text: brienne He'll slow me down.

title: Oathkeeper
Name: jaime
text: jaime My brother owes him a debt. He's not safe here. You're keeping him from harm. It's chivalry.

title: Oathkeeper
Name: podrick
text: podrick I won't slow you down, ser... my lady. I promise I'll serve you well.

title: Oathkeeper
Name: jaime
text: jaime See? He's a good lad.You'll get along.

title: Oathkeeper
Name: bronn
text: bronn Compliments of Lord Tyrion. His axe from the Blackwater.

title: Oathkeeper
Name: bronn
text: bronn What are you waiting for, a kiss? Ready the lady's horse.

title: Oathkeeper
Name: jaime
text: jaime They say the best swords have names. Any ideas?

title: Oathkeeper
Name: brienne
text: brienne Oathkeeper.

title: Oathkeeper
Name: jaime
text: jaime Good-bye, Brienne.

title: Oathkeeper
Name: podrick
text: podrick Come on, move.

title: Oathkeeper
Name: sam
text: sam I should neverhave taken her away.

title: Oathkeeper
Name: jon
text: jon She wasn't safe here.

title: Oathkeeper
Name: sam
text: sam She's not safe out there. I should have known. You told us there were wildlings south of the Wall. If they're raiding the smaller villages, Mole's Town could be next.

title: Oathkeeper
Name: jon
text: jon Castle Black could be next.

title: Oathkeeper
Name: sam
text: sam I should go back for Gilly.

title: Oathkeeper
Name: jon
text: jon We have orders. No one's to leave the castle.

title: Oathkeeper
Name: sam
text: sam I remember when you disobeyed orders and rode south to help Robb.

title: Oathkeeper
Name: jon
text: jon And I remember who came after me and brought me home. I know how hard it is, Sam, believe me. When you told me about Bran going beyond the Wall, all I could think about was getting my strength back so I could go and find him.

title: Oathkeeper
Name: sam
text: sam I wish I could have convinced him to come back with me. I tried. Really, I did.

title: Oathkeeper
Name: jon
text: jon How fast could they travel? A crippled boy being pulled on a sledge by a simpleton?

title: Oathkeeper
Name: sam
text: sam I don't know. They'd pass wildling villages. They could try to find shelter at one of them.

title: Oathkeeper
Name: jon
text: jon The wildlings have joined up with Mance. Every village or sheltered place will be deserted. Except...

title: Oathkeeper
Name: sam
text: sam Craster's? You think Bra nmight have found...

title: Oathkeeper
Name: locke
text: locke Snow. I don't mean to interrupt. Thorne wants to see you.

title: Oathkeeper
Name: alliser
text: alliser Your foray to Craster's Keep, I'll sanction it. But I won't order anyone to go with you. Volunteers only.

title: Oathkeeper
Name: jon
text: jon Thank you, Ser Alliser.

title: Oathkeeper
Name: jon
text: jon Ahem, brothers.

title: Oathkeeper
Name: jon
text: jon I'm going beyond the Wallto Craster's Keep. I'm going to capture the mutineers holed up there or kill them. I'm asking for volunteers to come with me. There's 60 miles of wilderness between here and Craster's and Mance Rayder has an army bearing down on us, but we have to do this. Our survival may depend on us getting to these mutineers before Mance does. They know the Wall. They know our defenses. If Mance learns what they know, we're lost. But if that's not enough, then consider this. If the Night's Watch are truly brothers, then Lord Commander Mormont was our father. He lived and died for the Watch and he was betrayed by his own men. Stabbed in the back by cowards. He deserved far better. All we can give him now is justice. Who will join me?

title: Oathkeeper
Name: jon
text: jon I can't let a recruit come north of the Wall.

title: Oathkeeper
Name: locke
text: locke Then let me say my vows. If it's a fight you're heading for, then you need men who know how.

title: Oathkeeper
Name: jon
text: jon Thank you, brothers.

title: Oathkeeper
Name: woman
text: woman No, don't. Don't, please.

title: Oathkeeper
Name: woman
text: woman Please don't. Ow! You're hurting me.

title: Oathkeeper
Name: tanner
text: tanner Karl Tanner from Gin Alley drinking wine from the skull of Jeor fucking Mormont.

title: Oathkeeper
Name: tanner
text: tanner Any command for us, Lord Commander? What's that? Fuck 'em till they're dead?

title: Oathkeeper
Name: tanner
text: tanner Did you hear that, boys? Fuck 'em till they're dead.

title: Oathkeeper
Name: tanner
text: tanner Rast.

title: Oathkeeper
Name: tanner
text: tanner Go outside and feed the beast.

title: Oathkeeper
Name: rast
text: rast We should kill that thing.

title: Oathkeeper
Name: tanner
text: tanner You should shuty our fucking hole, ugly little cunt. You look likea fucking ballsack. Ugly. Look at your stupid cunt face. I could piss in any gutte rand soak five of you. Know how much they paid me to kill a man in King's Landing? Seven silvers. They told me a man's name and that man never saw daylight again. None of them cocksuckers got away from me.

title: Oathkeeper
Name: tanner
text: tanner Haven't lost a fight since I was nine. Maybe it's time. What do you think, eh?

title: Oathkeeper
Name: tanner
text: tanner Maybe you're the man. Eh, cunt?

title: Oathkeeper
Name: tanner
text: tanner I was a fucking legend in Gin Alley. A fucking legend! I would take any knight... any knight, any time. Fucking cunts in steel plate. Fucking cowards.

title: Oathkeeper
Name: women
text: women A gift for the gods.- A gift for the gods. A gift for the gods.

title: Oathkeeper
Name: tanner
text: tanner What the fuck is that?

title: Oathkeeper
Name: sissy
text: sissy Craster's last child. A boy.

title: Oathkeeper
Name: tanner
text: tanner What am I supposed to do with him? What did Craster do with 'em? Kill 'em before they could grow up and do the same to him? All right.

title: Oathkeeper
Name: tanner
text: tanner Don't need another mouth to feed. Hand him over.

title: Oathkeeper
Name: sissy
text: sissy He didn't kill them. He offered them.

title: Oathkeeper
Name: tanner
text: tanner To who?

title: Oathkeeper
Name: sissy
text: sissy To the gods. The white walkers.

title: Oathkeeper
Name: women
text: women A gift for the gods.A gift for the gods. A gift for the gods.A gift for the gods. A gift for the gods.A gift for the gods.

title: Oathkeeper
Name: tanner
text: tanner Shut up!

title: Oathkeeper
Name: tanner
text: tanner So... if it worked for him... Let's give the walkers what they want.

title: Oathkeeper
Name: tanner
text: tanner Rast is headed that way.

title: Oathkeeper
Name: rast
text: rast Pink-eyed fuck. You thirsty?

title: Oathkeeper
Name: rast
text: rast Fuck!

title: Oathkeeper
Name: hodor
text: hodor Hodor.

title: Oathkeeper
Name: bran
text: bran Do you hear that?

title: Oathkeeper
Name: meera
text: meera Is that a baby?

title: Oathkeeper
Name: jojen
text: jojen It's coming.

title: Oathkeeper
Name: bran
text: bran I'm going out there.

title: Oathkeeper
Name: meera
text: meera No, we need to stay together.

title: Oathkeeper
Name: bran
text: bran I'm going.

title: Oathkeeper
Name: jojen
text: jojen Bran. Bran.

title: Oathkeeper
Name: hodor
text: hodor Hodor. Hodor. Hodor.

title: Oathkeeper
Name: meera
text: meera Bran, what happened?

title: Oathkeeper
Name: bran
text: bran Summer, he's hurt. They've caught him in a trap.

title: Oathkeeper
Name: meera
text: meera Who?

title: Oathkeeper
Name: bran
text: bran I didn't see, but they have my brother's wolf. They have Ghost.

title: Oathkeeper
Name: bran
text: bran They're Night's Watch. Look. Jon might be here.

title: Oathkeeper
Name: meera
text: meera If Jon was here, why would they put his wolf in a cage?

title: Oathkeeper
Name: meera
text: meera They might have been Night'sWatch once, not anymore. We're not safe here.We need to go.

title: Oathkeeper
Name: bran
text: bran No.

title: Oathkeeper
Name: meera
text: meera Bran, we need to go now.

title: Oathkeeper
Name: bran
text: bran I'm not leaving without Summer.

title: Oathkeeper
Name: meera
text: meera Can you remember where the cage was?

title: Oathkeeper
Name: bran
text: bran The east side of the keep.

title: Oathkeeper
Name: meera
text: meera If I'm not backsoon, we'll meet...

title: Oathkeeper
Name: rast
text: rast If I was your size, I'd be king of the fucking world.

title: Oathkeeper
Name: tanner
text: tanner Help him up.

title: Oathkeeper
Name: tanner
text: tanner This is nice. Fine leather. You're no wildling. Important. Highborn. Who are you?

title: Oathkeeper
Name: tanner
text: tanner You see, where I come from, a commoner like me slaps a little lord like you, I'd lose my right hand. But we're a long way from home, aren't we? And the two of you, fancy-looking folks north of the Wall creeping through the woods. Isn't that a bit odd?

title: Oathkeeper
Name: tanner
text: tanner I like your curly hair. My mom had curls like that. Beautiful brown curls. Why'd you drag a crippled boy all the way up here?

title: Oathkeeper
Name: tanner
text: tanner See you haven't played this game before. A highborn hostage, that's valuable. But three of them, that's a lot of mouths to feed.

title: Oathkeeper
Name: rast
text: rast What the fuck's wrong with him?

title: Oathkeeper
Name: tanner
text: tanner Come here.

title: Oathkeeper
Name: meera
text: meera No, please. Please.Please, let me help him.

title: Oathkeeper
Name: tanner
text: tanner Who are you?

title: Oathkeeper
Name: meera
text: meera Please.

title: Oathkeeper
Name: bran
text: bran I'm Brandon Stark! I'm Brandon Stark of Winterfell.

title: Oathkeeper
Name: rast
text: rast It's Jon Snow's brother.

title: Oathkeeper
Name: meera
text: meera It's Meera. It's Meera.I'm right here.

title: Oathkeeper
Name: tanner
text: tanner And I thought this was gonnabe another boring day.

title: Oathkeeper
Name: meera
text: meera I'm right here.

title: First of His Name
Name: septon
text: septon May the Warrior grant him courage and protect him in these perilous times. May the Smith grant him strength that he might bear this heavy burden. And may the Crone, she that knows the fate of all men, show him the path he must walk and guide him through the dark places that lie ahead. In the light of the Seven, I now proclaim Tommen of the House Baratheon First of His Name. King of the Andals and the First Men and Lord of the Seven Kingdoms. Long may he reign!

title: First of His Name
Name: all
text: all Long may he reign!

title: First of His Name
Name: septon
text: septon Special day.

title: First of His Name
Name: pycelle
text: pycelle Your Grace.

title: First of His Name
Name: varys
text: varys Your Grace.

title: First of His Name
Name: man
text: man Your Grace.

title: First of His Name
Name: margaery
text: margaery Your Grace.

title: First of His Name
Name: cersei
text: cersei There he is.

title: First of His Name
Name: margaery
text: margaery Long may he reign.

title: First of His Name
Name: cersei
text: cersei Long may he reign.

title: First of His Name
Name: margaery
text: margaery He sits the throne like he was born to it.

title: First of His Name
Name: cersei
text: cersei Yes. He wasn't, though, was he?

title: First of His Name
Name: margaery
text: margaery No, he wasn't.

title: First of His Name
Name: cersei
text: cersei You still mourn for Joffrey?

title: First of His Name
Name: margaery
text: margaery He was my husband. My king.

title: First of His Name
Name: cersei
text: cersei He would have been your nightmare.

title: First of His Name
Name: margaery
text: margaery Your Grace, I feel...

title: First of His Name
Name: cersei
text: cersei You knew exactly what he was. I did, too. You never love anything in the world the way you love your first child. Doesn't matter what they do. And what he did, it shocked me. Do you think I'm easily shocked?

title: First of His Name
Name: margaery
text: margaery No.

title: First of His Name
Name: cersei
text: cersei The things he did shocked me. He's only a boy. A good boy. A decent boy. He always has been. Who was the last decent king, I wonder? He could be the first man who sits on that throne in fifty years to actually deserve it.

title: First of His Name
Name: margaery
text: margaery It would be some consolation, wouldn't it? For all the horror that put him there.

title: First of His Name
Name: cersei
text: cersei He will need help... if he's going to rule well.

title: First of His Name
Name: margaery
text: margaery He has you.

title: First of His Name
Name: cersei
text: cersei A mother is not enough. You're still interested in being queen, I take it?

title: First of His Name
Name: margaery
text: margaery Oh. After all that's happened... It sounds strange, I know, but I am... I haven't even given any thought to it, what comes next. It would be a great honor, of course. But I will have to speak to my father about it.

title: First of His Name
Name: cersei
text: cersei Yes, speak to your father. I'll speak to mine.

title: First of His Name
Name: margaery
text: margaery We may be faced with an alarming number of weddings soon.

title: First of His Name
Name: margaery
text: margaery I won't even know what to call you. Sister? Or Mother? Hmm.

title: First of His Name
Name: jorah
text: jorah King Joffrey Baratheon is dead. Murdered at his own wedding.

title: First of His Name
Name: barristan
text: barristan And we have taken the Meereenese Navy, Your Grace.

title: First of His Name
Name: daario
text: daario The Second Sons took the Meereenese Navy.

title: First of His Name
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys Who told you to take the Navy?

title: First of His Name
Name: daario
text: daario No one.

title: First of His Name
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys So why did you do it?

title: First of His Name
Name: daario
text: daario I heard you liked ships.

title: First of His Name
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys How many ships?

title: First of His Name
Name: barristan
text: barristan Ninety-three, Your Grace.

title: First of His Name
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys How many men can they carry?

title: First of His Name
Name: barristan
text: barristan Ninety-three hundred, not counting sailors.

title: First of His Name
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys Would that be enough to take King's Landing?

title: First of His Name
Name: jorah
text: jorah The Lannisters have more.

title: First of His Name
Name: barristan
text: barristan They've been fighting Joffrey's wars for years. They're tired, dispersed. And now their king is dead. Eight thousand Unsullied, two thousand Second Sons sailing into Blackwater Bay and storming the gates without warning.

title: First of His Name
Name: jorah
text: jorah It's hard to say. It could be enough. But we're not fighting to make you Queen of King's Landing. Ten thousand men can't conquer Westeros.

title: First of His Name
Name: barristan
text: barristan The old houses will flock to our queen when she crosses the Narrow Sea.

title: First of His Name
Name: jorah
text: jorah The old houses will flock to whichever side they think will win, as they always have.

title: First of His Name
Name: jorah
text: jorah There's other news. From Yunkai. Without the Unsullied to enforce your rule, the Wise Masters have retaken control of the city. They've re-enslaved the freedmen who stayed behind and sworn to take revenge against you. And in Astapor, the council you installed to rule over the city has been overthrown by a butcher named Cleon who's declared himself "His Imperial Majesty."

title: First of His Name
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys Please leave me. Not you, Jorah.

title: First of His Name
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys It appears my liberation of Slaver's Bay isn't going quite as planned.

title: First of His Name
Name: jorah
text: jorah You could sail for Westeros and leave it all behind. A boy sits on the Iron Throne. A boy many believe to be a bastard with no right to it. They've never been more vulnerable.

title: First of His Name
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys You counseled me against rashness once in Qarth. I didn't listen. That all worked out well.

title: First of His Name
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys How can I rule seven kingdoms if I can't control Slaver's Bay? Why should anyone trust me? Why should anyone follow me?

title: First of His Name
Name: jorah
text: jorah You're a Targaryen. You're the Mother of Dragons.

title: First of His Name
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys I need to be more than that. I will not let those I have freed slide back into chains. I will not sail for Westeros.

title: First of His Name
Name: jorah
text: jorah What, then?

title: First of His Name
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys I will do what queens do. I will rule.

title: First of His Name
Name: petyr
text: petyr Pull up your hood. A memorable shade.

title: First of His Name
Name: sansa
text: sansa But how would they know?

title: First of His Name
Name: petyr
text: petyr You know what kind of stories poor men enjoy the most? Ones about rich girls they'll never meet.

title: First of His Name
Name: sansa
text: sansa Is this the only way into the Eyrie?

title: First of His Name
Name: petyr
text: petyr The mountains are impassable. If you want to get to the Eyrie, you need to go through the Bloody Gate. It doesn't matter how large your army is, if you attack this gate, you do it on this road, three men abreast and get slaughtered like goats. The first Lords of the Vale didn't have much, but they had these mountains and they knew how to use them. And the fortress they built here has never been overcome. Not once in a thousand years. Know your strengths, use them wisely, and one man can be worth ten thousand.

title: First of His Name
Name: knight
text: knight Who would pass the Bloody Gate?

title: First of His Name
Name: petyr
text: petyr Lord Petyr Baelish and his niece, Alayne.

title: First of His Name
Name: knight
text: knight Stand to.

title: First of His Name
Name: knight
text: knight Stand to!

title: First of His Name
Name: knight
text: knight Welcome back, Lord Baelish.

title: First of His Name
Name: robin
text: robin Uncle Petyr!

title: First of His Name
Name: petyr
text: petyr My lord.

title: First of His Name
Name: petyr
text: petyr Oh. I have brought you a gift.

title: First of His Name
Name: lysa
text: lysa Lord Baelish.

title: First of His Name
Name: petyr
text: petyr My lady.

title: First of His Name
Name: robin
text: robin Look what Uncle Petyr brought me.

title: First of His Name
Name: lysa
text: lysa A beautiful gift for a beautiful boy.

title: First of His Name
Name: sansa
text: sansa It's a pleasure to make your acquaintance, Lady Arryn. My name is Al...

title: First of His Name
Name: lysa
text: lysa Oh, do take down that hood, child. Don't you think know who you are? You think I'd let my intended leave the Eyrie on urgent business without knowing what that business was? I let him go so he could bring you here to me.

title: First of His Name
Name: lysa
text: lysa My flesh and blood.

title: First of His Name
Name: sansa
text: sansa It's wonderful to meet you, Aunt Lysa.

title: First of His Name
Name: lysa
text: lysa You mustn't call me that in front of anyone else.

title: First of His Name
Name: sansa
text: sansa Of course. I understand.

title: First of His Name
Name: lysa
text: lysa No one can know you're here. It would put us in a very precarious position.

title: First of His Name
Name: sansa
text: sansa I would never say a thing.

title: First of His Name
Name: lysa
text: lysa The Lannisters want to destroy us. They've been trying for years. Now they know what it feels like.

title: First of His Name
Name: robin
text: robin Mummy said they killed your mother and they chopped off your brother's head.

title: First of His Name
Name: sansa
text: sansa They did, and my father's.

title: First of His Name
Name: robin
text: robin They killed my father, too, with poison. I wanted to make the little Lannister baby man fly, but Mother said I couldn't.

title: First of His Name
Name: sansa
text: sansa Make him fly?

title: First of His Name
Name: robin
text: robin Through the Moon Door.

title: First of His Name
Name: lysa
text: lysa And on top of everything else, they made you marry that filthy troll.

title: First of His Name
Name: sansa
text: sansa They did. They made us both. Lord Tyrion didn't want to.

title: First of His Name
Name: lysa
text: lysa I don't believe that for a moment. Did he force himself on you?

title: First of His Name
Name: sansa
text: sansa No. We never...

title: First of His Name
Name: lysa
text: lysa Good. Robin, this is your cousin Sansa. But you're not to call her Sansa in front of anyone but Uncle Petyr and myself. Do you understand? Sansa, this is my son Robin.

title: First of His Name
Name: sansa
text: sansa It's a pleasure to meet you, Robin.

title: First of His Name
Name: lysa
text: lysa Robin, show Sansa to her chamber. Take the back stairs.

title: First of His Name
Name: petyr
text: petyr Go. We'll speak soon.

title: First of His Name
Name: lysa
text: lysa What took you so long?

title: First of His Name
Name: petyr
text: petyr Arranging for the ascension of King Tommen I, extricating Sansa, getting her here alive.

title: First of His Name
Name: lysa
text: lysa She's here. We've spent more than enough time on her for one evening.

title: First of His Name
Name: lysa
text: lysa Let's get married tonight.

title: First of His Name
Name: petyr
text: petyr Ought we not... inform the Lords of the Vale about the ceremony?

title: First of His Name
Name: lysa
text: lysa There's only one Lord of the Vale. The others can all hang. Lurking and simpering on the stairs like buzzards the moment my husband died, trying to get their claws in me.

title: First of His Name
Name: petyr
text: petyr I do think that we could wait until...

title: First of His Name
Name: lysa
text: lysa I'm done waiting, Petyr. We had our wedding night many years ago. Or don't you remember?

title: First of His Name
Name: petyr
text: petyr Like it was yesterday.

title: First of His Name
Name: lysa
text: lysa What wife would do for you the things I've done for you? What wife would trust you the way I've trusted you? When you gave me those drops and told me to pour them into Jon's wine, my husbando s wine... when you told me to write a letter to Cat telling her it was the Lannisters...

title: First of His Name
Name: petyr
text: petyr The deed is done. Faded into nothing. Only speaking of it can make it real.

title: First of His Name
Name: petyr
text: petyr Tonight it is, then.

title: First of His Name
Name: petyr
text: petyr Let me bathe and dress for the occasion. Once I'm presentable, I'll call on the septon immediately.

title: First of His Name
Name: lysa
text: lysa I'm warning you. I'm going to scream when my husband makes love to me. I'm going to scream so loud, they'll hear me clear across the Narrow Sea.

title: First of His Name
Name: tywin
text: tywin When will the wedding take place in your mind?

title: First of His Name
Name: cersei
text: cersei As soon as decency permits. After we've allowed Tommen the appropriate time to mourn his brother and Margaery to mourn her husband.

title: First of His Name
Name: tywin
text: tywin A fortnight?

title: First of His Name
Name: cersei
text: cersei That seems reasonable.

title: First of His Name
Name: tywin
text: tywin No jugglers, no jousting dwarves, no seventy-seven-course meals.

title: First of His Name
Name: tywin
text: tywin And your wedding to Loras?

title: First of His Name
Name: cersei
text: cersei Shortly after Tommen's.

title: First of His Name
Name: tywin
text: tywin Shortly?

title: First of His Name
Name: cersei
text: cersei A fortnight.

title: First of His Name
Name: tywin
text: tywin I know you don't like them. I didn't like your husband. Used to pat me on the back a lot. I didn't trust him.

title: First of His Name
Name: cersei
text: cersei We had that in common.

title: First of His Name
Name: tywin
text: tywin You don't need to make formal alliances with people you trust.

title: First of His Name
Name: cersei
text: cersei Then whom can we trust?

title: First of His Name
Name: tywin
text: tywin Ourselves alone.

title: First of His Name
Name: tywin
text: tywin The Tyrells are our only true rivals in terms of resources and we need them on our side.

title: First of His Name
Name: cersei
text: cersei Robert wasn't particularly rich.

title: First of His Name
Name: tywin
text: tywin Robert had me funding him. Wars swallow gold like a pit in the earth.

title: First of His Name
Name: cersei
text: cersei I suppose that explains why we did so well in the last one.

title: First of His Name
Name: tywin
text: tywin Do you know how much gold was mined in the Westerlands this past year?

title: First of His Name
Name: cersei
text: cersei Haven't a clue.

title: First of His Name
Name: tywin
text: tywin Go on, your best guess.

title: First of His Name
Name: cersei
text: cersei Pounds, tons, ounces?

title: First of His Name
Name: tywin
text: tywin Doesn't matter. The answer is the same.

title: First of His Name
Name: cersei
text: cersei That can't be.

title: First of His Name
Name: tywin
text: tywin Our last working mine ran dry three years ago.

title: First of His Name
Name: cersei
text: cersei Then how do we pay for anything?

title: First of His Name
Name: tywin
text: tywin The crown owes the Iron Bank of Braavos a tremendous amount of money.

title: First of His Name
Name: cersei
text: cersei How much?

title: First of His Name
Name: tywin
text: tywin A tremendous amount.

title: First of His Name
Name: cersei
text: cersei There must be someone at the Iron Bank you can speak to, come to some arrangement.

title: First of His Name
Name: tywin
text: tywin The Iron Bank is the Iron Bank. There is no someone.

title: First of His Name
Name: cersei
text: cersei Someone does work there. It is comprised of people.

title: First of His Name
Name: tywin
text: tywin And a temple is comprised of stones. One stone crumbles and another takes its place. And the temple holds its form for a thousand years or more. That's what the Iron Bank is... a temple. We all live in its shadow and almost none of us know it. You can't run from them. You can't cheat them. You can't sway them with excuses. If you owe them money and you don't want to crumble yourself, you pay it back. Vesting the Tyrells in the crown will help a great deal in this respect.

title: First of His Name
Name: cersei
text: cersei It's for the good of the family, I understand that. I'm not sure my brothers do.

title: First of His Name
Name: tywin
text: tywin I know you're building a strong case against Tyrion. And as a mother, that is your right. But as a judge, I cannot discuss the trial with you.

title: First of His Name
Name: cersei
text: cersei I respect that. We don't need to discuss it.

title: First of His Name
Name: cersei
text: cersei The Lannister legacy is the only thing that matters. You've started wars to protect this family. Turned your back on Jaime for refusing to contribute to its future. What does Tyrion deserve for lighting that future on fire?

title: First of His Name
Name: arya
text: arya Joffrey. Cersei. Walder Frey. Meryn Trant. Tywin Lannister. The Red Woman. Beric Dondarrion. Thoros of Myr. Ilyn Payne. The Mountain.

title: First of His Name
Name: sandor
text: sandor Would you shut up?

title: First of His Name
Name: arya
text: arya I can't sleep until I say the names.

title: First of His Name
Name: sandor
text: sandor The names of every fucking person in Westeros?

title: First of His Name
Name: arya
text: arya Only the ones I'm going to kill.

title: First of His Name
Name: sandor
text: sandor Hate's as good a thing as any to keep a person going. Better than most. We come across my brother, maybe we can both cross a name off our list.

title: First of His Name
Name: arya
text: arya If he were here right now, what would you do?

title: First of His Name
Name: sandor
text: sandor I'd tell him to shut the fuck up so I can get some sleep. Go on, get it over with, your list of doomed men.

title: First of His Name
Name: arya
text: arya I'm almost done. Only one name left.

title: First of His Name
Name: sandor
text: sandor Go on.

title: First of His Name
Name: arya
text: arya The Hound.

title: First of His Name
Name: sansa
text: sansa Thank you.

title: First of His Name
Name: lysa
text: lysa Your mother always had a sweet tooth, you know?

title: First of His Name
Name: sansa
text: sansa Really?

title: First of His Name
Name: lysa
text: lysa Oh, yes. At suppertime, she would go straight for honey cakes, candied almonds, custard. Anything sweet. Eventually, your grandfather had to assign a septa to watch her at meals. Cat was the firstborn daughter after all. It was important that she remain desirable so Father could arrange a good match for her and she was starting to get fat.

title: First of His Name
Name: sansa
text: sansa My mother, fat? She never let me have my pudding until I'd finished all my proper food.

title: First of His Name
Name: lysa
text: lysa This is before she married your father and moved to the North. By the time you were born, your father's austerity had become hers. Marriage changes people. I didn't mean for you to stop. Go on, enjoy them. How do you like them?

title: First of His Name
Name: sansa
text: sansa They're delicious. Where did you get the lemons? You can't grow them up here.

title: First of His Name
Name: lysa
text: lysa Oh, gods, no. Petyr had three crates brought all the way from King's Landing. He knew you liked lemon cakes. He's so kind. He really cares for you. Think where you'd be without him. In their clutches and tried for murder.

title: First of His Name
Name: sansa
text: sansa Yes. I'm very lucky.

title: First of His Name
Name: lysa
text: lysa He feels responsible for you.

title: First of His Name
Name: sansa
text: sansa Oh, I know he does. I'm so grateful.

title: First of His Name
Name: lysa
text: lysa Why? Why does he feel responsible for you?

title: First of His Name
Name: sansa
text: sansa Well, I'm half Tully. He loved your family so much.

title: First of His Name
Name: lysa
text: lysa Loved your mother.

title: First of His Name
Name: sansa
text: sansa No.

title: First of His Name
Name: lysa
text: lysa That's what you wanted to say.

title: First of His Name
Name: sansa
text: sansa He loves you, Aunt Lysa. He's married to you.

title: First of His Name
Name: lysa
text: lysa Your mother never loved him. Never. Cat always went straight for the sweetest thing. The most obvious thing. Your Uncle Brandon. Your handsome, arrogant, cruel Uncle Brandon. He almost killed Petyr in a duel. And your mother loved him anyway. And now Petyr is risking his life to save you, the daughter of a woman who didn't love him no more than those whores in his brothels. Has he told you about them?

title: First of His Name
Name: lysa
text: lysa He hasn't told you about the vile things they do with their bodies? The vile things they let him do with their bodies?

title: First of His Name
Name: sansa
text: sansa No, never.

title: First of His Name
Name: lysa
text: lysa Are you pregnant?

title: First of His Name
Name: sansa
text: sansa What? No, I told you. Lord Tyrion and I never-

title: First of His Name
Name: lysa
text: lysa I wasn't asking about Tyrion. What have you let Petyr do with your body?

title: First of His Name
Name: sansa
text: sansa Aunt Lysa, no, I-

title: First of His Name
Name: lysa
text: lysa Your young, pretty body.

title: First of His Name
Name: sansa
text: sansa Nothing. I'm a virgin.

title: First of His Name
Name: lysa
text: lysa Don't lie to me.

title: First of His Name
Name: sansa
text: sansa You're hurting me.

title: First of His Name
Name: lysa
text: lysa I'll know if you lie.

title: First of His Name
Name: sansa
text: sansa I'm a virgin, I swear it. He loves you, Aunt Lysa. All he says is that I'm stupid. I'm a stupid little girl with stupid dreams who never learns and I'm a terrible liar, so I should always tell the truth. And I swear to you that he has never touched me. Not once, not ever.

title: First of His Name
Name: lysa
text: lysa Shh. Shh. Shh. It's all right. It will all be all right. You'll be a widow soon. They'll execute that dwarf for murdering the king and you'll be free to marry Robin. You'll be the Lady of the Vale. Hmm.

title: First of His Name
Name: brienne
text: brienne Didn't they teach you how to ride a horse?

title: First of His Name
Name: podrick
text: podrick Yes, my lady, when I was young. There wasn't much call for it with Lord Tyrion, though. He preferred litters.

title: First of His Name
Name: brienne
text: brienne Perhaps you should have stayed with him. It's not going to be a pleasant journey for you. It could take weeks to get to the Wall, depending on the weather.

title: First of His Name
Name: podrick
text: podrick That's a long way off.

title: First of His Name
Name: brienne
text: brienne Well, Lady Sansa's brother's at Castle Black. If I were her, that's where I'd go. Feel free to stop at any point.

title: First of His Name
Name: podrick
text: podrick Never, my lady. I'm your squire.

title: First of His Name
Name: brienne
text: brienne I've made it this far in the world without a squire. I don't see why I need one now.

title: First of His Name
Name: podrick
text: podrick All knights have squires, my lady.

title: First of His Name
Name: brienne
text: brienne I'm not a knight. And I'm not a slaver, either. I don't own you.

title: First of His Name
Name: podrick
text: podrick I swore an oath, my lady.

title: First of His Name
Name: brienne
text: brienne I am releasing you from that oath. That means you could leave.

title: First of His Name
Name: podrick
text: podrick I know.

title: First of His Name
Name: brienne
text: brienne What do you think will happen if you leave?

title: First of His Name
Name: podrick
text: podrick They'll say I wasn't a very good squire.

title: First of His Name
Name: sandor
text: sandor The hell you doing?

title: First of His Name
Name: arya
text: arya Practicing.

title: First of His Name
Name: sandor
text: sandor What, ways to die?

title: First of His Name
Name: arya
text: arya No one's going to kill me.

title: First of His Name
Name: sandor
text: sandor They will if you nance around like that. That's no way to fight.

title: First of His Name
Name: arya
text: arya It's not fighting. It's water dancing.

title: First of His Name
Name: sandor
text: sandor Dancing? Maybe you ought to put on a dress. Who taught you that shite?

title: First of His Name
Name: arya
text: arya The greatest swordsman who ever lived. Syrio Forel, the First Sword to the Sealord of Braavos.

title: First of His Name
Name: sandor
text: sandor Braavos. Greasy-haired little bastard, I bet. They all are.

title: First of His Name
Name: arya
text: arya What do you know about anything?

title: First of His Name
Name: sandor
text: sandor I bet his hair is greasier than Joffrey's cunt.

title: First of His Name
Name: arya
text: arya It was not.

title: First of His Name
Name: sandor
text: sandor Was? He dead?

title: First of His Name
Name: arya
text: arya Yes.

title: First of His Name
Name: sandor
text: sandor How?

title: First of His Name
Name: arya
text: arya He was killed.

title: First of His Name
Name: sandor
text: sandor Who by?

title: First of His Name
Name: arya
text: arya Meryn Trant. That's why Ser Meryn-

title: First of His Name
Name: sandor
text: sandor Meryn Trant? The greatest swordsman who ever lived killed by Meryn fucking Trant?

title: First of His Name
Name: arya
text: arya He was outnumbered.

title: First of His Name
Name: sandor
text: sandor Any boy whore with a sword could beat three Meryn Trants.

title: First of His Name
Name: arya
text: arya Syrio didn't have a sword. Or armor. Just a stick.

title: First of His Name
Name: sandor
text: sandor The greatest swordsman who ever lived didn't have a sword? All right. You have a sword. Let's see what he taught you. Go on, do it for your Braavosi friend. Dead like all the rest of your friends.

title: First of His Name
Name: sandor
text: sandor Your friendo s dead and Meryn Trant's not 'cause Trant had armor and a big fucking sword.

title: First of His Name
Name: oberyn
text: oberyn Your Grace.

title: First of His Name
Name: cersei
text: cersei Prince Oberyn. Writing letters?

title: First of His Name
Name: oberyn
text: oberyn A poem, actually.

title: First of His Name
Name: cersei
text: cersei May I show you the gardens?

title: First of His Name
Name: oberyn
text: oberyn I couldn't very well refuse a royal escort.

title: First of His Name
Name: cersei
text: cersei No, you couldn't.

title: First of His Name
Name: cersei
text: cersei I didn't realize you were a poet.

title: First of His Name
Name: oberyn
text: oberyn Not a very good one.

title: First of His Name
Name: cersei
text: cersei For your paramour?

title: First of His Name
Name: oberyn
text: oberyn For one of my daughters.

title: First of His Name
Name: cersei
text: cersei You have several, don't you?

title: First of His Name
Name: oberyn
text: oberyn Eight.

title: First of His Name
Name: cersei
text: cersei Eight? Eight daughters?

title: First of His Name
Name: oberyn
text: oberyn The fifth is difficult. I named her after my sister Elia.

title: First of His Name
Name: cersei
text: cersei Beautiful name.

title: First of His Name
Name: oberyn
text: oberyn Yes. But I can't say it without turning sad. And after I turn sad, I grow angry.

title: First of His Name
Name: cersei
text: cersei Perhaps that's why she's difficult. The gods love their stupid jokes, don't they?

title: First of His Name
Name: oberyn
text: oberyn Which joke is that?

title: First of His Name
Name: cersei
text: cersei You're a prince of Dorne. A legendary fighter. A brilliant man feared throughout Westeros. But you could not save your sister. I'm a Lannister. Queen for nineteen years. Daughter of the most powerful man alive. But I could not save my son. What good is power if you cannot protect the ones you love?

title: First of His Name
Name: oberyn
text: oberyn We can avenge them.

title: First of His Name
Name: cersei
text: cersei Yes, we can avenge them.

title: First of His Name
Name: oberyn
text: oberyn You really believe Tyrion murdered your son?

title: First of His Name
Name: cersei
text: cersei I know he did.

title: First of His Name
Name: oberyn
text: oberyn We will have a trial and we will learn the truth.

title: First of His Name
Name: cersei
text: cersei We'll have a trial, anyway. I haven't seen my daughter in over a year.

title: First of His Name
Name: oberyn
text: oberyn The last time I saw her, she was swimming with two of my girls in the Water Gardens. Laughing in the sun.

title: First of His Name
Name: cersei
text: cersei I want to believe that. I want to believe she's happy.

title: First of His Name
Name: oberyn
text: oberyn You have my word. We don't hurt little girls in Dorne.

title: First of His Name
Name: cersei
text: cersei Everywhere in the world, they hurt little girls. Would you bring her a gift for me? I wasn't there for her name day. I don't know when I'll see her again.

title: First of His Name
Name: oberyn
text: oberyn Anything at all.

title: First of His Name
Name: cersei
text: cersei The best shipwrights in King's Landing have been working on it for months. Myrcella loves the open water.

title: First of His Name
Name: oberyn
text: oberyn I will have it sailed down to Sunspear for her.

title: First of His Name
Name: cersei
text: cersei Please tell her... her mother misses her very much.

title: First of His Name
Name: podrick
text: podrick Oh, no, no, no.

title: First of His Name
Name: podrick
text: podrick No, no, no, no.

title: First of His Name
Name: podrick
text: podrick Hells. Gods.

title: First of His Name
Name: brienne
text: brienne Did you remove the skin?

title: First of His Name
Name: podrick
text: podrick No, my lady.

title: First of His Name
Name: brienne
text: brienne Have you ever cooked a rabbit before?

title: First of His Name
Name: brienne
text: brienne Did you ever cook anything for Lord Tyrion?

title: First of His Name
Name: podrick
text: podrick No, my lady. That was the cooks.

title: First of His Name
Name: brienne
text: brienne What are you doing?

title: First of His Name
Name: podrick
text: podrick I'm helping you with your armor.

title: First of His Name
Name: brienne
text: brienne I've been removing my own armor for quite some time, thank you very much.

title: First of His Name
Name: brienne
text: brienne What exactly did you do for Lord Tyrion?

title: First of His Name
Name: podrick
text: podrick I brought him his meals and cleared his table when he was finished. I kept his clothing and linens clean. Carried his messages and returned the replies. Mostly I poured wine.

title: First of His Name
Name: brienne
text: brienne Oh. Whilst in Lord Tyrion's service, did you ever do anything remotely related to combat?

title: First of His Name
Name: podrick
text: podrick I killed a man.

title: First of His Name
Name: brienne
text: brienne Who?

title: First of His Name
Name: podrick
text: podrick A Kingsguard. He tried to kill Lord Tyrion at the Blackwater.

title: First of His Name
Name: brienne
text: brienne How did you kill a Kingsguard?

title: First of His Name
Name: podrick
text: podrick I pushed a spear through the back of his head.

title: First of His Name
Name: brienne
text: brienne Bloody ridiculous. Help me with these straps.

title: First of His Name
Name: rast
text: rast Hey. Hey, get up. Get up.

title: First of His Name
Name: man
text: man That's it lad, put it inside. Get the fire going again. We're all freezing.

title: First of His Name
Name: man
text: man Aye. What we need is a girl there.

title: First of His Name
Name: man
text: man I've got to have a piss.

title: First of His Name
Name: man
text: man Now keep quiet.

title: First of His Name
Name: meera
text: meera You need water.

title: First of His Name
Name: jojen
text: jojen It doesn't matter.

title: First of His Name
Name: meera
text: meera Of course it matters.

title: First of His Name
Name: jojen
text: jojen You mustn't let anything stop you.

title: First of His Name
Name: bran
text: bran They already have stopped me.

title: First of His Name
Name: jojen
text: jojen No. You're not here. You're far from here.

title: First of His Name
Name: meera
text: meera What does that mean?

title: First of His Name
Name: jojen
text: jojen At the hill. A great weirwood tree.

title: First of His Name
Name: bran
text: bran You've seen it, too.

title: First of His Name
Name: jojen
