title: The Children
Name: stannis
text: stannis I'll have thousands of your men in chains by nightfall, I'll have nowhere to put them and nothing to feed them. I'm not here to slaughter beat dogs. Their fate depends on their king.

title: The Children
Name: mance
text: mance All the same, we do not kneel.

title: The Children
Name: stannis
text: stannis Take these men away.

title: The Children
Name: davos
text: davos What are men of the Night's Watch doing in a Wildling camp?

title: The Children
Name: jon
text: jon I was sent to discuss terms with the king beyond the wall.

title: The Children
Name: davos
text: davos You're speaking to the one true king boy. You'll address him as your grace.

title: The Children
Name: jon
text: jon I know he's the king. My father died for him. My name is Jon Snow, your grace. I'm Ned Stark's son.

title: The Children
Name: stannis
text: stannis Your father was an honorable man.

title: The Children
Name: jon
text: jon He was, your grace.

title: The Children
Name: stannis
text: stannis What do you think he'd have done with him?

title: The Children
Name: jon
text: jon I was this man's prisoner once. He couldo ve tortured me, he couldo ve killed me, but he spared my life. I think my father wouldo ve taken him prisoner, listened to what he had to say.

title: The Children
Name: stannis
text: stannis Very well. *to Davos* Take him.

title: The Children
Name: jon
text: jon Your grace. If my father'd seen the things that I've seen, he'd also tell you to burn the dead before nightfall. All of them.

title: The Children
Name: pycelle
text: pycelle I would suggest milk of the poppy to ease his pain but he is completely insensate.

title: The Children
Name: cersei
text: cersei Bloody Martells.

title: The Children
Name: pycelle
text: pycelle The cause appears to be manticore venom.

title: The Children
Name: qyburn
text: qyburn It is, yes, manticore.

title: The Children
Name: pycelle
text: pycelle I've read a good deal about it. It's a horrible poison, usually Mantari in origin. Oh! Yes, yes. There's nothing to be done.

title: The Children
Name: qyburn
text: qyburn Yes there is.

title: The Children
Name: pycelle
text: pycelle May I ask what you think you're doing?

title: The Children
Name: qyburn
text: qyburn Saving him.

title: The Children
Name: pycelle
text: pycelle Your grace. I wish it were otherwise, but Ser Gregor is beyond saving. Well, well beyond. This man is not even a Maester, let alone Grand Maester.

title: The Children
Name: qyburn
text: qyburn That's for the best. No Maester knows how to save him.

title: The Children
Name: pycelle
text: pycelle That is exactly the sort of arrogance that had him expelled from the citadel, your grace. His curiosity was deemed dangerous and unnatural. Rightly so in my opinion.

title: The Children
Name: cersei
text: cersei You're dismissed, Grand Maester.

title: The Children
Name: pycelle
text: pycelle Your grace. This is my laboratory!

title: The Children
Name: cersei
text: cersei Not anymore.

title: The Children
Name: cersei
text: cersei You can save him?

title: The Children
Name: qyburn
text: qyburn Difficult to say, your grace, but if my past work is any guide. We stand a chance.

title: The Children
Name: cersei
text: cersei Do everything you can. Come to me with anything you need.

title: The Children
Name: qyburn
text: qyburn Thank you, your grace. You should know, the process may change him, somewhat.

title: The Children
Name: cersei
text: cersei Will it weaken him?

title: The Children
Name: qyburn
text: qyburn Oh no.

title: The Children
Name: cersei
text: cersei Very well then.

title: The Children
Name: tywin
text: tywin Not another word. We've been over this, the matter's closed.

title: The Children
Name: cersei
text: cersei I'm opening it again.

title: The Children
Name: tywin
text: tywin You are betrothed to Loras Tyrell. Still betrothed to Loras Tyrell and you will marry Loras Tyrell as soon as Tommen marries Margaery.

title: The Children
Name: cersei
text: cersei I will not.

title: The Children
Name: tywin
text: tywin Jaime cannot marry or inherit lands. Tyrion's sentence will be carried out tomorrow. You have, on several occasions, made great claims about your commitment to this family's future. Your role in that future is more vital now than it ever was.

title: The Children
Name: cersei
text: cersei I don't care. I will stay in King's Landing where I belong with my son, the king.

title: The Children
Name: tywin
text: tywin When you were nine years old, I was called to the capital. I decided to take your brother with me and not you. You insisted that you would not be left at Casterly Rock under any circumstances and if you recall-

title: The Children
Name: cersei
text: cersei I'm not interested in hearing another one of your smug stories about the time you won. This isn't going to be one of those times.

title: The Children
Name: tywin
text: tywin Do you think you'll be the first person dragged into a sept to be married against her will?

title: The Children
Name: cersei
text: cersei When you marched into the throne room to tell me we'd won the Battle at Blackwater, do you remember?! I was sitting on the iron throne with Tommen. I was about to give him essence of nightshade, that's how far I was willing to go when I thought someone awful had come to take my son away. Someone awful is coming to take him away.

title: The Children
Name: tywin
text: tywin No.

title: The Children
Name: cersei
text: cersei Joffrey is dead. Myrcella's been sold like livestock. And now you want to ship me off to Highgarden and steal my boy, my last boy. Margaery will dig her claws in and you will dig your claws in and you will fight over him like beasts until you rip him apart. I will burn our house to the ground before I let that happen.

title: The Children
Name: tywin
text: tywin And how will you do that?

title: The Children
Name: cersei
text: cersei I'll tell everyone the truth.

title: The Children
Name: tywin
text: tywin And what truth would that be?

title: The Children
Name: cersei
text: cersei You don't know, do you? You never believed it. How is that possible? What am I saying, of course it's possible. How can someone so consumed by the idea of his family have any conception what his actual family was doing? We were right there in front of you and you didn't see us. One look in the past twenty years, one real look and you wouldo ve known.

title: The Children
Name: tywin
text: tywin Known what?

title: The Children
Name: cersei
text: cersei Everything they say is true. About Jaime and me.

title: The Children
Name: tywin
text: tywin No, no, no, no, no.

title: The Children
Name: cersei
text: cersei Your legacy is a lie.

title: The Children
Name: tywin
text: tywin I don't believe you.

title: The Children
Name: cersei
text: cersei Yes you do.

title: The Children
Name: cersei
text: cersei Jaime.

title: The Children
Name: jaime
text: jaime You won. One fewer brother. Must be proud of yourself. There's really nothing you wouldn't do, is there?

title: The Children
Name: cersei
text: cersei For my family, no. I would do things for my family you couldn't imagine.

title: The Children
Name: jaime
text: jaime Tyrion is your family.

title: The Children
Name: cersei
text: cersei He's not.

title: The Children
Name: jaime
text: jaime You don't get to choose.

title: The Children
Name: cersei
text: cersei I do, so do you. You can choose the creature that killed our mother to come into this world-

title: The Children
Name: jaime
text: jaime Are you really mad enough to blame him for that? He didn't decide to kill her. He was an infant.

title: The Children
Name: cersei
text: cersei A disease doesn't decide to kill you, all the same you cut it out before it does. What do you decide? What do you choose?

title: The Children
Name: jaime
text: jaime The things I did to get back to you, to endure all that, only to find you-

title: The Children
Name: cersei
text: cersei I choose you.

title: The Children
Name: jaime
text: jaime Those are words.

title: The Children
Name: cersei
text: cersei Yes. Like the ones I just said to father. I told him.

title: The Children
Name: jaime
text: jaime Told him what?

title: The Children
Name: cersei
text: cersei I told him about us.

title: The Children
Name: jaime
text: jaime You told him?

title: The Children
Name: cersei
text: cersei I told him I wouldn't marry Loras Tyrell. I told him I'm staying right here with Tommen, with you.

title: The Children
Name: jaime
text: jaime You think he'll just accept that?

title: The Children
Name: cersei
text: cersei Go and ask him.

title: The Children
Name: jaime
text: jaime What did you say?

title: The Children
Name: cersei
text: cersei I don't want to talk about Tywin Lannister. I don't choose Tywin Lannister, I don't love Tywin Lannister. I love my brother. I love my lover. People will whisper, they'll make their jokes. Let them. They're all so small I can't even see them. I only see what matters.

title: The Children
Name: jaime
text: jaime Someone will walk in.

title: The Children
Name: cersei
text: cersei I don't care.

title: The Children
Name: missandei
text: missandei in Valyrian* You stand before Daenerys Stormborn, the Unburnt, Queen of Mereen, Queen of the Andals and the Rhoynar and the First Men. Khaleesi of the Great Grass Sea, Breaker of Chains and Mother of Dragons.

title: The Children
Name: fennesz
text: fennesz in Valyrian* Thank you for seeing me, your grace. My name is Fennesz. I can speak the common tongue if you wish.

title: The Children
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys You speak it very well.

title: The Children
Name: fennesz
text: fennesz Before you freed me, I belonged to Master Mighdal. I was tutor to his children. I taught them languages and history. They know a great deal about your family because of me. Little Calla is only seven, but she admires you very much.

title: The Children
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys I hope I can prove worthy of her admiration. What can I do for you?

title: The Children
Name: fennesz
text: fennesz When you took the city, the children begged me not to leave the house. But Master Mighdal and I agreed that I must. So I lost my home. Now I live on the streets.

title: The Children
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys I have outfitted mess halls to feed all former slaves and barracks to shelter them.

title: The Children
Name: fennesz
text: fennesz I do not mean to offend, your grace. I went to one of these places. The young prey on the old. Take what they want and beat us if we resist.

title: The Children
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys My Unsullied will make them safe again in short order my friend, this I promise you.

title: The Children
Name: fennesz
text: fennesz Even if they are safe, who would I be there? What purpose would I serve? With my master, I was a teacher. I had the respect and love of these children.

title: The Children
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys What is it that you want from me?

title: The Children
Name: fennesz
text: fennesz Your grace, I ask you to let me sell myself back to Master Mighdal.

title: The Children
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys You want to return to a man who owned you, like a goat or a chair?

title: The Children
Name: fennesz
text: fennesz Please, your grace, the young may rejoice in the new world you've built for them. But for those of us too old to change there is only fear and squalor. I am not alone. There are many outside waiting to beg the same-

title: The Children
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys I did not take this city to preside over the injustice I fought to destroy. I took it to bring people freedom. But freedom means making your own choices. I will allow you to sign a contract with your former master. It may not cover a period lasting longer than a year.

title: The Children
Name: fennesz
text: fennesz Thank you, your grace. Thank you.

title: The Children
Name: barristan
text: barristan The masters will take advantage of this situation. The men serving them will be slaves in all but name.

title: The Children
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys Approach my friend.

title: The Children
Name: man
text: man in Low Valyrian* I do not understand, my queen. I do not understand, my queen.

title: The Children
Name: missandei
text: missandei in Low Valyrian* The Queen says you may approach.

title: The Children
Name: man
text: man crying, speaking Low Valyrian*

title: The Children
Name: missandei
text: missandei translating* I have brought you. He came from the sky. The black one. The winged shadow. He came from the sky and...

title: The Children
Name: missandei
text: missandei translating* My girl. My little girl.

title: The Children
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys What was her name?

title: The Children
Name: missandei
text: missandei Zala, your grace.

title: The Children
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys How old was she?

title: The Children
Name: missandei
text: missandei Three.

title: The Children
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys Three. *in Valyrian* And still no word on Drogon?

title: The Children
Name: grey
text: grey in Valyrian* Sailors saw him flying over the Black Cliffs three days ago, my queen. Nothing since then.

title: The Children
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys in Valyrian* Meet me in the catacombs.

title: The Children
Name: aemon
text: aemon They came to us from White Harbor and Barrowton, from Fairmarket and King's Landing, from north and south, from east and west. They died protecting men, women, and children who will never know their names. It is for us to remember them. Our brothers, we shall never see their like again.

title: The Children
Name: all
text: all And now their watch is ended.

title: The Children
Name: aemon
text: aemon And now their watch is ended.

title: The Children
Name: tormund
text: tormund Your old blind man patched me up. Why?

title: The Children
Name: jon
text: jon He's sworn to treat all wounded men, friend or foe.

title: The Children
Name: tormund
text: tormund You want me alive so you can torture me?

title: The Children
Name: jon
text: jon No one's going to torture you.

title: The Children
Name: tormund
text: tormund So how do we die? Hanging? Beheading? Drop us from the top of the wall?

title: The Children
Name: jon
text: jon I don't know what happens to the prisoners.

title: The Children
Name: tormund
text: tormund Who decides?

title: The Children
Name: jon
text: jon I suppose Stannis does.

title: The Children
Name: tormund
text: tormund He your king now?

title: The Children
Name: jon
text: jon I don't have a king.

title: The Children
Name: tormund
text: tormund You spent too much time with us, Jon Snow. You can never be a kneeler again.

title: The Children
Name: jon
text: jon We're gonna burn the bodies of your dead. Do you want to say any words over them?

title: The Children
Name: tormund
text: tormund Words? What kind of words?

title: The Children
Name: jon
text: jon Funeral words. I don't know how the Free Folk do it.

title: The Children
Name: tormund
text: tormund Do what?

title: The Children
Name: jon
text: jon Say farewell.

title: The Children
Name: tormund
text: tormund The dead can't hear us, boy.

title: The Children
Name: tormund
text: tormund Snow. Did you love her? She loved you.

title: The Children
Name: jon
text: jon She told you?

title: The Children
Name: tormund
text: tormund No. All she ever talked about was killing you. That's how I know. She belongs in the North. The real North. You understand me?

title: The Children
Name: meera
text: meera We can stop, we can rest.

title: The Children
Name: jojen
text: jojen We'll rest with the three-eyed raven.

title: The Children
Name: meera
text: meera We're not going to make it.

title: The Children
Name: jojen
text: jojen We're already here.

title: The Children
Name: bran
text: bran Jojen. Jojen! Look, Jojen, look.

title: The Children
Name: meera
text: meera JOJEN! Hold on!

title: The Children
Name: bran
text: bran Help them! Now!

title: The Children
Name: meera
text: meera Hold on to me!

title: The Children
Name: hodor
text: hodor Hodor...

title: The Children
Name: bran
text: bran Help them!

title: The Children
Name: jojen
text: jojen Bran! Save yourself, now!

title: The Children
Name: girl
text: girl Come with me, Brandon Stark!

title: The Children
Name: girl
text: girl He is lost. Come with me, or die with him.

title: The Children
Name: jojen
text: jojen Go with them.

title: The Children
Name: girl
text: girl They cannot follow us. The power that moves them is powerless here.

title: The Children
Name: bran
text: bran Who are you?

title: The Children
Name: girl
text: girl The First Men called us The Children, but we were born long before them. Come, he waits for you.

title: The Children
Name: bran
text: bran You're the three-eyed raven.

title: The Children
Name: old
text: old I have been many things. Now, I am what you see.

title: The Children
Name: meera
text: meera My brother, he led us to you, and now he…

title: The Children
Name: old
text: old He knew what would happen. From the moment he left, he knew, and he went anyway.

title: The Children
Name: meera
text: meera How do you know?

title: The Children
Name: old
text: old I've been watching you. All of you, all of your lives, with a thousand eyes and one. Now you've come to me at last, Brandon Stark, though the hour is late.

title: The Children
Name: bran
text: bran I didn't want anyone to die for me.

title: The Children
Name: old
text: old He died so that you could find what you have lost.

title: The Children
Name: bran
text: bran You're going to help me walk again?

title: The Children
Name: old
text: old You'll never walk again. But you will fly.

title: The Children
Name: brienne
text: brienne Podrick. Podrick! Where are the horses?

title: The Children
Name: podrick
text: podrick I hobbled them last night.

title: The Children
Name: brienne
text: brienne What sort of hobble?

title: The Children
Name: podrick
text: podrick A figure-eight, like you taught me.

title: The Children
Name: brienne
text: brienne If you did it like I taught you then the horses would be here.

title: The Children
Name: podrick
text: podrick Thieves, maybe?

title: The Children
Name: brienne
text: brienne It's at least thirty miles to the Eyrie from here. You're carrying the saddle bags.

title: The Children
Name: arya
text: arya People coming. You can shit later, there's people coming!

title: The Children
Name: brienne
text: brienne Morning!

title: The Children
Name: arya
text: arya Morning.

title: The Children
Name: brienne
text: brienne I like your sword. Are we getting close to the bloody gate?

title: The Children
Name: arya
text: arya About ten more miles.

title: The Children
Name: brienne
text: brienne Did you hear that Podrick? Only about ten more miles to the Bloody Gate.

title: The Children
Name: arya
text: arya Are you a knight?

title: The Children
Name: brienne
text: brienne No.

title: The Children
Name: arya
text: arya But you know how to use that sword.

title: The Children
Name: brienne
text: brienne I do.

title: The Children
Name: arya
text: arya Does it have a name?

title: The Children
Name: brienne
text: brienne Oathkeeper.”

title: The Children
Name: arya
text: arya Mine's “Needle.”

title: The Children
Name: brienne
text: brienne Good name.

title: The Children
Name: arya
text: arya Who taught you how to fight?

title: The Children
Name: brienne
text: brienne My father.

title: The Children
Name: arya
text: arya Mine never wanted to. Said fighting was for boys.

title: The Children
Name: brienne
text: brienne Mine said the same. But I kept fighting the boys anyway. Kept losing. Finally my father said, “If you're going to do it, you might as well do it right.”

title: The Children
Name: brienne
text: brienne Seven blessings. I'm Brienne of Tarth, this is Podrick Payne.

title: The Children
Name: sandor
text: sandor You want something?

title: The Children
Name: podrick
text: podrick That's Sandor Clegane- the Hound.

title: The Children
Name: brienne
text: brienne You're Arya Stark.

title: The Children
Name: sandor
text: sandor I asked if you wanted something.

title: The Children
Name: brienne
text: brienne I swore to your mother I would bring you home to her.

title: The Children
Name: arya
text: arya My mother's dead.

title: The Children
Name: brienne
text: brienne I know. I wish I couldo ve been there to protect her.

title: The Children
Name: arya
text: arya You're not a northerner.

title: The Children
Name: brienne
text: brienne I know, but I swore a sacred vow to protect her.

title: The Children
Name: arya
text: arya Why didn't you?

title: The Children
Name: brienne
text: brienne She commanded me to bring Jaime Lannister back to King's Landing.

title: The Children
Name: sandor
text: sandor You're paid by the Lannisters. You're here for the bounty on me.

title: The Children
Name: brienne
text: brienne I'm not paid by the Lannisters.

title: The Children
Name: sandor
text: sandor No? Fancy sword you've got there. Where'd you get it? I've been looking at Lannister gold all my life. Go on, Brienne of fucking Tarth, tell me that's not Lannister gold.

title: The Children
Name: brienne
text: brienne Jaime Lannister gave me this sword.

title: The Children
Name: arya
text: arya The Bloody Gate's ten miles.

title: The Children
Name: brienne
text: brienne I swore to your mother by the Old Gods and the New -

title: The Children
Name: arya
text: arya I don't care what you swore!

title: The Children
Name: brienne
text: brienne Arya!

title: The Children
Name: sandor
text: sandor You heard the girl! She's not coming with you.

title: The Children
Name: brienne
text: brienne She is.

title: The Children
Name: sandor
text: sandor You're not a good listener. Valyrian steel-- I've always wanted some Valyrian steel.

title: The Children
Name: brienne
text: brienne Come with me Arya. I'll take you to safety.

title: The Children
Name: sandor
text: sandor Safety?! Where the fuck's that? Her aunt in the Eyrie's dead. Her mother's dead, her father's dead, her brother's dead. Winterfell's a pile of rubble. There's no safety, you dumb bitch. If you don't know that by now, you're the wrong one to watch over her.

title: The Children
Name: brienne
text: brienne And that's what you're doing? Watching over her?

title: The Children
Name: sandor
text: sandor Aye, that's what I'm doing.

title: The Children
Name: brienne
text: brienne I have no wish to kill you Ser.

title: The Children
Name: sandor
text: sandor I'm not a knight.

title: The Children
Name: brienne
text: brienne Arya! Arya! ARYA! Where is she?

title: The Children
Name: podrick
text: podrick She was just here...

title: The Children
Name: brienne
text: brienne Why weren't you watching her?

title: The Children
Name: podrick
text: podrick I was watching you I thought you migth need some help…

title: The Children
Name: brienne
text: brienne Which way Pod? Which way did she go?

title: The Children
Name: podrick
text: podrick Ah, I think that way.

title: The Children
Name: sandor
text: sandor You're still here? [Coughs] Big bitch saved you.

title: The Children
Name: arya
text: arya I don't need saving.

title: The Children
Name: sandor
text: sandor No, not you. You're a real killer. With your water dancing, and your needle.

title: The Children
Name: arya
text: arya You're gonna die?

title: The Children
Name: sandor
text: sandor Unless there's a Maester hiding behind that rock, aye, I'm done. I'd skin you alive for wine. [Arya offers water.] Fuck water! Killed by a woman. I bet you liked that. Go on, go after her. She'll help you. Going out alone, you won't last a day out there.

title: The Children
Name: arya
text: arya I'll last longer than you.

title: The Children
Name: sandor
text: sandor You remember where the heart is? Fuck it. I'm ready. Go on, girl. Another name off your list. You kept promising me. I cut down your butcher's boy, the ginger. He was begging for mercy. Please sir, please don't kill me, please, please. Bled all over my horse. Saddle stunk of butcher's boy for weeks. And your sister, your pretty sister. I shouldo ve taken her. That night the Blackwater burned, I shouldo ve fucked her bloody. At least I'd have one happy memory! Do I have to beg you? Do it. Do it.

title: The Children
Name: sandor
text: sandor Kill me. Kill me! Kill me! Kill me!

title: The Children
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion Oh, get on with it you son of a whore.

title: The Children
Name: jaime
text: jaime Is that any way to speak about our mother?

title: The Children
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion What're you doing?

title: The Children
Name: jaime
text: jaime What do you think I'm doing? The galley's waiting in the bay bound for the Free Cities.

title: The Children
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion Who's helping you?

title: The Children
Name: jaime
text: jaime Varys.

title: The Children
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion Varys?

title: The Children
Name: jaime
text: jaime You have more friends than you thought.

title: The Children
Name: jaime
text: jaime There's a locked door at the top of the stairs. Knock on it twice, and then twice again. Varys will open.

title: The Children
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion I suppose this is goodbye, then.

title: The Children
Name: jaime
text: jaime Farewell, little brother.

title: The Children
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion Jaime, thank you. For my life.

title: The Children
Name: jaime
text: jaime Quickly now.

title: The Children
Name: woman
text: woman Tywin… my lion...

title: The Children
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion I'm sorry. I'm sorry.

title: The Children
Name: tywin
text: tywin Tyrion! Put down the crossbow. Who released you? Ah, your brother ,I expect. He always had a soft spot for you. Come, we'll go and talk in my chambers. Is this how you want to speak to me? Shaming your father has always given you pleasure…

title: The Children
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion All my life, you've wanted me dead.

title: The Children
Name: tywin
text: tywin Yes. But you refused to die. I respect that, even admire it. You fight for what's yours. I'd never let them execute you; is that what you fear? I'd never let Illyn Payne take your head. You're a Lannister. You're my son.

title: The Children
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion I loved her.

title: The Children
Name: tywin
text: tywin Who?

title: The Children
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion Shae.

title: The Children
Name: tywin
text: tywin Bah, Tyrion. Put down that crossbow.

title: The Children
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion I murdered her. With my own hands.

title: The Children
Name: tywin
text: tywin It doesn't matter.

title: The Children
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion It doesn't matter?

title: The Children
Name: tywin
text: tywin She was a whore!

title: The Children
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion Say that word again.

title: The Children
Name: tywin
text: tywin And what? You'll kill your own father in the privy? No. You're my son. Enough of this nonsense…

title: The Children
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion I am your son, and you sentenced me to die. You knew I didn't poison Joffrey, but you sentenced me all the same. Why?

title: The Children
Name: tywin
text: tywin Enough. We'll go back to my chambers and speak with some dignity.

title: The Children
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion I can't go back there. She's in there.

title: The Children
Name: tywin
text: tywin What, are you afraid of a dead whore?

title: The Children
Name: tywin
text: tywin You shot me. You're no son of mine.

title: The Children
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion I am your son. I have always been your son.

title: The Children
Name: varys
text: varys What have you done? Quickly. Trust me, my friend, I've brought you this far.

title: The Children
Name: arya
text: arya I want to see the captain.

title: The Children
Name: captain
text: captain You're seeing him.

title: The Children
Name: arya
text: arya I want to go north, to the wall.

title: The Children
Name: captain
text: captain No you don't.

title: The Children
Name: arya
text: arya I can pay.

title: The Children
Name: captain
text: captain There is nothing in the north but ice and war and pirates.

title: The Children
Name: arya
text: arya I wouldn't need a cabin. Please, I could work, scrubbing the floors, or…

title: The Children
Name: captain
text: captain I'm not going north, child, we're going home.

title: The Children
Name: arya
text: arya Where's home?

title: The Children
Name: captain
text: captain The Free City of Braavos.

title: The Children
Name: arya
text: arya Wait, I have something else.

title: The Children
Name: captain
text: captain More silver won't make a difference.

title: The Children
Name: arya
text: arya It's not silver, it's iron.

title: The Children
Name: arya
text: arya Valar morghulis.

title: The Children
Name: captain
text: captain How did you… valar dohaeris. Of course, you shall have a cabin.

title: The Wars to Come
Name: melara
text: melara We shouldn't be out here alone.

title: The Wars to Come
Name: cersei
text: cersei Why not?

title: The Wars to Come
Name: melara
text: melara If your father hears…

title: The Wars to Come
Name: cersei
text: cersei He'll never know we've been gone.

title: The Wars to Come
Name: melara
text: melara But if he finds out…

title: The Wars to Come
Name: cersei
text: cersei You don't need to be afraid of my father.

title: The Wars to Come
Name: melara
text: melara Are you sure?

title: The Wars to Come
Name: cersei
text: cersei Yes.

title: The Wars to Come
Name: melara
text: melara We shouldn't go in.

title: The Wars to Come
Name: cersei
text: cersei Of course we should.

title: The Wars to Come
Name: maggy
text: maggy Get out. Get out!

title: The Wars to Come
Name: melara
text: melara Let's go…

title: The Wars to Come
Name: cersei
text: cersei No.

title: The Wars to Come
Name: maggy
text: maggy Listen to your friend.

title: The Wars to Come
Name: cersei
text: cersei They said that you were terrifying. With cat's teeth and three eyes. You're not terrifying. You're boring.

title: The Wars to Come
Name: maggy
text: maggy You don't know what I am.

title: The Wars to Come
Name: cersei
text: cersei I know you're a witch and you can see the future. Tell me mine.

title: The Wars to Come
Name: maggy
text: maggy Everybody wants to know their future. Until they know their future.

title: The Wars to Come
Name: cersei
text: cersei This is my father's land. My land. Tell me my future or I'll have your two boring eyes gouged out of your head.

title: The Wars to Come
Name: maggy
text: maggy Your blood. Give me a taste.

title: The Wars to Come
Name: maggy
text: maggy Three questions you get. You won't like the answers.

title: The Wars to Come
Name: cersei
text: cersei I've been promised to the prince. When will we marry?

title: The Wars to Come
Name: maggy
text: maggy You'll never wed the prince. You'll wed the king.

title: The Wars to Come
Name: cersei
text: cersei But I will be queen?

title: The Wars to Come
Name: maggy
text: maggy Oh yes, you'll be queen. For a time. In comes another. Younger, more beautiful, to cast you down and take all you hold dear.

title: The Wars to Come
Name: cersei
text: cersei Will the king and I have children?

title: The Wars to Come
Name: maggy
text: maggy No. The king will have 20 children, and you will have 3.

title: The Wars to Come
Name: cersei
text: cersei That doesn't make sense.

title: The Wars to Come
Name: maggy
text: maggy Gold will be their crowns. Gold their shrouds.

title: The Wars to Come
Name: melara
text: melara Come on, we have to go. We have to go! Cersei!

title: The Wars to Come
Name: priest
text: priest Your grace, we are honored by your presence. The mourners are waiting.

title: The Wars to Come
Name: cersei
text: cersei They will keep waiting. I want a moment alone with him.

title: The Wars to Come
Name: priest
text: priest But your grace, many of these lords and ladies have travelled day and night to be here…

title: The Wars to Come
Name: priest
text: priest From all seven kingdoms…

title: The Wars to Come
Name: cersei
text: cersei They will wait.

title: The Wars to Come
Name: cersei
text: cersei He never wanted you to be a King's Guard, but here you are, protecting his dead body.

title: The Wars to Come
Name: jaime
text: jaime What he built. The towers. He built it for us. He meant it for us. They're going to try to take it away, all of it.

title: The Wars to Come
Name: cersei
text: cersei They?

title: The Wars to Come
Name: jaime
text: jaime All of them out there are enemies. They're waiting a night to make sure he's really dead and as soon as they see the stones on his eyes they'll set to work on tearing us apart.

title: The Wars to Come
Name: cersei
text: cersei They had nothing to do with it. The man who murdered our father, he tore us apart, he's the enemy. I've been telling you for years, you've been defending him for years…

title: The Wars to Come
Name: jaime
text: jaime This is exactly what they want.

title: The Wars to Come
Name: cersei
text: cersei and now our father is dead. And that little monster is out there somewhere drawing breath. Did you set him free?

title: The Wars to Come
Name: cersei
text: cersei Tyrion may be a monster but at least he killed our father on purpose. You killed him by mistake. With stupidity. You're a man of action, aren't you? When it occurs to you to do something you do it, nevermind the consequences. Take a look. Look at the consequences. Here they are. He loved you more than anyone in this world.

title: The Wars to Come
Name: varys
text: varys Apologies.

title: The Wars to Come
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion I still don't see why I had to stay in this fucking crate once we set sail.

title: The Wars to Come
Name: varys
text: varys I saved your life. If they catch you, they catch me. I cannot say I feel overly guilty about leaving you in that “fucking crate”.

title: The Wars to Come
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion Do you know what it's like to stuff your shit through one of those air holes?

title: The Wars to Come
Name: varys
text: varys No. I only know what it's like to pick up your shit and throw it overboard.

title: The Wars to Come
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion Pentos?

title: The Wars to Come
Name: varys
text: varys The home of my colleague. Ilyrio Mopatis. A merchant. He and I met many years ago, through mutual friends. A group of people who saw Robert Baratheon for the disaster he was. We tried to do what was best for the realm by supporting the Targaryen restoration. And thus began the chain of mistakes that has led us both here. Things have gotten worse, not better. Westeros needs to be saved from itself.

title: The Wars to Come
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion Much better.

title: The Wars to Come
Name: varys
text: varys My lord?

title: The Wars to Come
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion I don't think I am anymore. A lord. Are you a lord if you kill your father? I don't suppose they revoke your nobility for killing a whore. That has to be happen all the time.

title: The Wars to Come
Name: varys
text: varys You already drank yourself across the Narrow Sea.

title: The Wars to Come
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion In a box. Why stop now?

title: The Wars to Come
Name: varys
text: varys Because we are talking about the future of our country.

title: The Wars to Come
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion The future is shit. Just like the past.

title: The Wars to Come
Name: prostitute
text: prostitute You want the same? Same as always?

title: The Wars to Come
Name: white
text: white You… you don't have to.

title: The Wars to Come
Name: prostitute
text: prostitute Habit.

title: The Wars to Come
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys Sons of the Harpy?

title: The Wars to Come
Name: barristan
text: barristan Yes, your grace. They left it on the body.

title: The Wars to Come
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys They've never killed before.

title: The Wars to Come
Name: barristan
text: barristan It was only a matter of time, your grace. Conquerors are always met with resistance.

title: The Wars to Come
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys I didn't conquer them. Their own people did.

title: The Wars to Come
Name: mossador
text: mossador They do not see us as people, Your Grace.

title: The Wars to Come
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys Then they will have to learn to see things differently, Mossador. He did not risk his life fighting for freedom so cowards in masks could take it away. And I did not take up residence in this pyramid so I could watch the city below decline into chaos. What was the name of the man you lost?

title: The Wars to Come
Name: grey
text: grey White Rat, your grace.

title: The Wars to Come
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys I want him buried with honor. Publicly. In the Temple of the Graces.

title: The Wars to Come
Name: barristan
text: barristan The Sons of the Harpy will hear that message.

title: The Wars to Come
Name: mossador
text: mossador Make them very angry.

title: The Wars to Come
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys Angry snakes lash out. Makes chopping off their heads that much easier. Find the men who did this and bring them to me.

title: The Wars to Come
Name: missandei
text: missandei Torgo Nudho.

title: The Wars to Come
Name: grey
text: grey Missandei hin Naath.

title: The Wars to Come
Name: missandei
text: missandei I wanted to speak with you.

title: The Wars to Come
Name: grey
text: grey Why do you come?

title: The Wars to Come
Name: missandei
text: missandei White Rat, the Unsullied who… I have heard they found his body in a brothel. I have heard that more than one Unsullied has been known to visit Meereen's brothels. May I ask you why? Why would an Unsullied go to a brothel?

title: The Wars to Come
Name: grey
text: grey I do not know. I must go.

title: The Wars to Come
Name: jon
text: jon Get your shield up.

title: The Wars to Come
Name: olly
text: olly It's too heavy.

title: The Wars to Come
Name: jon
text: jon If it wasn't heavy it wouldn't stop a sword, now get it up.

title: The Wars to Come
Name: jon
text: jon Come. Try it again. Drive at me. Keep your shield up. Or I'll ring your head like a bell.

title: The Wars to Come
Name: gilly
text: gilly Shouldn't you be training, too?

title: The Wars to Come
Name: sam
text: sam Well, I'm hardly a new recruit. How many brothers can say they've killed a white walker and a Thenn? I might be the first in history!

title: The Wars to Come
Name: alliser
text: alliser These men need a firm hand. Always have. They're poachers and thieves.

title: The Wars to Come
Name: alliser
text: alliser Not soldiers.

title: The Wars to Come
Name: gilly
text: gilly That one hates me.

title: The Wars to Come
Name: sam
text: sam If Ser Alliser is chosen as the new Lord Commander… he hates the wildlings.

title: The Wars to Come
Name: sam
text: sam All the wildlings.

title: The Wars to Come
Name: gilly
text: gilly Don't let them send us away.

title: The Wars to Come
Name: sam
text: sam It's not a sure thing. Ser Denys Mallister has commanded the Shadow Tower for 20 years, and people say he's a good man. He's running against Ser Alliser--

title: The Wars to Come
Name: gilly
text: gilly Sam! Don't let them send us away.

title: The Wars to Come
Name: sam
text: sam I told you. Wherever you go, I go, too.

title: The Wars to Come
Name: gilly
text: gilly You can't leave, they'll execute you.

title: The Wars to Come
Name: jon
text: jon Good, good, pivot! Don't forget to pivot! Shield up!

title: The Wars to Come
Name: melisandre
text: melisandre The king wants a word.

title: The Wars to Come
Name: jon
text: jon You're not cold, my lady?

title: The Wars to Come
Name: melisandre
text: melisandre Never. The Lordo s fire lives within me, Jon Snow.

title: The Wars to Come
Name: melisandre
text: melisandre Feel.

title: The Wars to Come
Name: melisandre
text: melisandre Are you a virgin?

title: The Wars to Come
Name: jon
text: jon No.

title: The Wars to Come
Name: melisandre
text: melisandre Good.

title: The Wars to Come
Name: melisandre
text: melisandre Your grace. The bastard of Winterfell.

title: The Wars to Come
Name: stannis
text: stannis You know who rules at Winterfell now?

title: The Wars to Come
Name: jon
text: jon Roose Bolton.

title: The Wars to Come
Name: stannis
text: stannis The traitor who plunged a dagger into Robb Stark's heart. Don't you want to avenge him?

title: The Wars to Come
Name: jon
text: jon I want a great many things, your grace. But I'm a sworn brother of the Night's Watch now.

title: The Wars to Come
Name: davos
text: davos I've been talking to your sworn brothers. Many of them love you.

title: The Wars to Come
Name: jon
text: jon They're good men.

title: The Wars to Come
Name: davos
text: davos Many don't. You were seen taking the body of a wildling girl north of the Wall. Why?

title: The Wars to Come
Name: jon
text: jon It's where she belonged.

title: The Wars to Come
Name: davos
text: davos Some of the Night's Watch feel you have too much affection for the wildlings.

title: The Wars to Come
Name: jon
text: jon They were born on the wrong side of the wall. That doesn't make them monsters.

title: The Wars to Come
Name: stannis
text: stannis No matter. I shall take back the North from the thieves who stole it. Tywin Lannister is dead. He can't protect them now. I shall mount Roose Bolton's head on a spike. But if I'm to take Winterfell I'll need more men.

title: The Wars to Come
Name: jon
text: jon The men of the Night's Watch are sworn to play no part--

title: The Wars to Come
Name: stannis
text: stannis I'm not talking about the damn Night's Watch. I'm talking about the wildlings.

title: The Wars to Come
Name: jon
text: jon Your grace, you want the wildlings to march in your army?

title: The Wars to Come
Name: stannis
text: stannis If they swear to follow me, I'll pardon them. We'll take Winterfell. Once the North is won, I'll declare them citizens of the realm. I'll give them land to live on.

title: The Wars to Come
Name: davos
text: davos It's a fair offer. More than fair.

title: The Wars to Come
Name: stannis
text: stannis I'll offer them their lives and their freedom if Mance kneels before me and swears his loyalty.

title: The Wars to Come
Name: jon
text: jon I don't think that's likely.

title: The Wars to Come
Name: stannis
text: stannis You admire him, don't you?

title: The Wars to Come
Name: jon
text: jon I respect him.

title: The Wars to Come
Name: stannis
text: stannis He likes you. Convince him to bend the knee...

title: The Wars to Come
Name: jon
text: jon Your grace…

title: The Wars to Come
Name: stannis
text: stannis or he burns.

title: The Wars to Come
Name: jon
text: jon How much time do I have?

title: The Wars to Come
Name: stannis
text: stannis Nightfall. The sun drops fast this time of year. Hurry, Jon Snow.

title: The Wars to Come
Name: master
text: master Sword up! Attack, my lord! Attack! Don't cross your feet!

title: The Wars to Come
Name: yohn
text: yohn My sons have had swords in their hands from the time they could walk. This one…

title: The Wars to Come
Name: petyr
text: petyr Lord Arryn will never be a great warrior.

title: The Wars to Come
Name: royce
text: royce Great warrior? He sings a sword like a girl with palsy.

title: The Wars to Come
Name: squire
text: squire My lord.

title: The Wars to Come
Name: master
text: master Sword up, my lord!

title: The Wars to Come
Name: petyr
text: petyr Some boys develop more slowly. He's still young.

title: The Wars to Come
Name: royce
text: royce He's 13. Boys go to war at 13.

title: The Wars to Come
Name: petyr
text: petyr He has other gifts.

title: The Wars to Come
Name: royce
text: royce Does he?

title: The Wars to Come
Name: petyr
text: petyr The gift of a great name. Sometimes that's all one needs.

title: The Wars to Come
Name: sansa
text: sansa Goodbye Lord Royce, and thank you for all you've done for me.

title: The Wars to Come
Name: royce
text: royce I have done nothing more than my duty, my lady.

title: The Wars to Come
Name: petyr
text: petyr I have no doubt that upon my return, Robin's skills will have improved immeasurably.

title: The Wars to Come
Name: royce
text: royce He'll be safe here. As for his skills, I make no promises.

title: The Wars to Come
Name: podrick
text: podrick Will we head north at some point? He said Sansa had a brother at Castle Black. We're a few days ride from the Kingsroad, but that will take us--

title: The Wars to Come
Name: brienne
text: brienne Us? The only reason you're here is that Jaime Lannister told me you weren't safe in the capital. You're hundreds of miles from King's Landing. No one knows what you look like. No one cares. You're safe.

title: The Wars to Come
Name: podrick
text: podrick But I'm you're squire.

title: The Wars to Come
Name: brienne
text: brienne Do you even know what a squire is?

title: The Wars to Come
Name: podrick
text: podrick An attendant to a knight?

title: The Wars to Come
Name: brienne
text: brienne I'm not a knight. That means you're not a squire.

title: The Wars to Come
Name: podrick
text: podrick Well, where would I go?

title: The Wars to Come
Name: brienne
text: brienne I don't care, I'm not your mother.

title: The Wars to Come
Name: podrick
text: podrick You swore to find the Stark girls.

title: The Wars to Come
Name: brienne
text: brienne I found Arya. She didn't want my protection.

title: The Wars to Come
Name: podrick
text: podrick Sansa still might.

title: The Wars to Come
Name: brienne
text: brienne Will you shut your mouth? I didn't ask for advice. I don't want anyone following me. I'm not a leader. All I ever wanted is to fight for a Lord I believed in. The good lords are dead and the rest are monsters.

title: The Wars to Come
Name: sansa
text: sansa You told Lord Royce we were going to the Fingers.

title: The Wars to Come
Name: petyr
text: petyr I did.

title: The Wars to Come
Name: sansa
text: sansa But we're heading west.

title: The Wars to Come
Name: petyr
text: petyr We are.

title: The Wars to Come
Name: sansa
text: sansa If he wanted to betray us, he already would have.

title: The Wars to Come
Name: petyr
text: petyr Lord Royce may be as honorable as he thinks he is, but he's not alone in that castle. Do you trust all those knights and ladies, stable boys and serving girls?

title: The Wars to Come
Name: sansa
text: sansa No. Do you trust the carriage driver or the knights escorting us?

title: The Wars to Come
Name: petyr
text: petyr No. But I pay them well, and they've seen what happens to men who disappoint me.

title: The Wars to Come
Name: sansa
text: sansa So where are we going? To a land where you trust everyone?

title: The Wars to Come
Name: petyr
text: petyr So a land so far from here, even Cersei Lannister can't get her hands on you.

title: The Wars to Come
Name: loras
text: loras It was such a deep, deep shock to us all. Your father was a force to be reckoned with. He truly was. I wouldn't presume to claim to have known him as such…

title: The Wars to Come
Name: loras
text: loras But just being in his presence was enough to make it so clear just how formidable a person you were dealing with. What a… what a force to be reckoned with.

title: The Wars to Come
Name: cersei
text: cersei Thank you so much for your kind words.

title: The Wars to Come
Name: grand
text: grand Deepest condolences, your grace. This tragedy… I never trusted Varys. I often warned…

title: The Wars to Come
Name: lancel
text: lancel Your grace.

title: The Wars to Come
Name: cersei
text: cersei Cousin Lancel. I hardly recognized you.

title: The Wars to Come
Name: lancel
text: lancel My deepest sympathies.

title: The Wars to Come
Name: kevan
text: kevan I apologize for my son's appearance.

title: The Wars to Come
Name: cersei
text: cersei Uncle, it's quite alright.

title: The Wars to Come
Name: kevan
text: kevan They call themselves sparrows. Bloody fanatics. Religion has its place, of course, but at a certain point… They never would have come to the capital when Tywin was alive.

title: The Wars to Come
Name: cersei
text: cersei I'm sure he'll grow out of it. Whatever it is. Excuse me.

title: The Wars to Come
Name: kevan
text: kevan Of course.

title: The Wars to Come
Name: cersei
text: cersei Your wounds from the Blackwater seem to have healed.

title: The Wars to Come
Name: lancel
text: lancel It wasn't my wounds that needed healing.

title: The Wars to Come
Name: cersei
text: cersei What can I do for you?

title: The Wars to Come
Name: lancel
text: lancel You can forgive me.

title: The Wars to Come
Name: cersei
text: cersei What could you possibly have done to warrant my forgiveness?

title: The Wars to Come
Name: lancel
text: lancel I led you into the darkness.

title: The Wars to Come
Name: cersei
text: cersei I doubt you've ever led anyone anywhere.

title: The Wars to Come
Name: lancel
text: lancel I tempted you into our unnatural relations. And, of course, there was the king. His boar hunt. His wine.

title: The Wars to Come
Name: cersei
text: cersei I don't know what you're talking about.

title: The Wars to Come
Name: lancel
text: lancel I'm a different person now. I found peace in the light of the Seven. You can too. They watch over all of us, ready to dole out mercy… or justice. Their world is at hand. I will pray for your father's soul.

title: The Wars to Come
Name: cersei
text: cersei The day Tywin Lannister's soul needs your help…

title: The Wars to Come
Name: olyvar
text: olyvar It looks like Dorne.

title: The Wars to Come
Name: loras
text: loras No it doesn't.

title: The Wars to Come
Name: olyvar
text: olyvar It does. That's the Sunspear bit right there. And that's where the mountains are. And over here is… Sunsnake? Stonespear?

title: The Wars to Come
Name: loras
text: loras Sandstone.

title: The Wars to Come
Name: olyvar
text: olyvar Yes. Yes, Sandstone. Just there.

title: The Wars to Come
Name: loras
text: loras Fine.

title: The Wars to Come
Name: loras
text: loras It's Dorne.

title: The Wars to Come
Name: olyvar
text: olyvar We should go there. I think we would have a lovely time.

title: The Wars to Come
Name: loras
text: loras Judging by my experience, that would be wonderful. Dorne, Highgarden. Anywhere but here.

title: The Wars to Come
Name: margaery
text: margaery We're late for dinner as it is.

title: The Wars to Come
Name: loras
text: loras You're very respectful.

title: The Wars to Come
Name: margaery
text: margaery I'm very hungry.

title: The Wars to Come
Name: margaery
text: margaery What's your name?

title: The Wars to Come
Name: olyvar
text: olyvar Olyvar, my lady.

title: The Wars to Come
Name: margaery
text: margaery I'm afraid my brother is keeping the king waiting, Olyvar.

title: The Wars to Come
Name: margaery
text: margaery Perhaps you might consider being a bit more discreet?

title: The Wars to Come
Name: loras
text: loras Why? They all know about me anyway. Everybody knows everything about everyone. What's the point in trying to keep a secret in a place like this?

title: The Wars to Come
Name: margaery
text: margaery In any event… you shouldn't keep your intended waiting.

title: The Wars to Come
Name: loras
text: loras My intended? Please. Tywin's dead. That means no one can force Cersei to marry me.

title: The Wars to Come
Name: margaery
text: margaery Lucky you.

title: The Wars to Come
Name: loras
text: loras Unlucky you.

title: The Wars to Come
Name: margaery
text: margaery You think I want that woman married to my brother?

title: The Wars to Come
Name: loras
text: loras If she doesn't marry me, she doesn't go to Highgarden. Which means she stays in King's Landing. Which means you're trapped here with Cersei Lannister as your mother-by-law.

title: The Wars to Come
Name: margaery
text: margaery Perhaps.

title: The Wars to Come
Name: loras
text: loras Perhaps?

title: The Wars to Come
Name: margaery
text: margaery Perhaps?

title: The Wars to Come
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion Eunuch, the spider, the master of whisperers.

title: The Wars to Come
Name: varys
text: varys Imp, half-man.

title: The Wars to Come
Name: varys
text: varys There are faster ways to kill yourself.

title: The Wars to Come
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion Not for a coward.

title: The Wars to Come
Name: varys
text: varys You are many things, my friend, but not a coward.

title: The Wars to Come
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion You never told me why you set me free.

title: The Wars to Come
Name: varys
text: varys Your brother asked me to.

title: The Wars to Come
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion You could have said no.

title: The Wars to Come
Name: varys
text: varys Refuse the Kingslayer? A dangerous proposition.

title: The Wars to Come
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion Not as dangerous as releasing me. You risked your life, your position, everything. Why? You're not family, you owe me nothing.

title: The Wars to Come
Name: varys
text: varys I didn't do it for you. I did it for the Seven Kingdoms.

title: The Wars to Come
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion A drunken dwarf will never be the savior of the Seven Kingdoms.

title: The Wars to Come
Name: varys
text: varys I don't believe in saviors. I believe men of talent have a role to play in the war to come.

title: The Wars to Come
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion You're going to have to find another soldier. I'm done with Westeros and Westeros is done with me.

title: The Wars to Come
Name: varys
text: varys You have many admirable qualities, self-pity is not one of them. Any fool with a bit of luck can find himself born into power. But earning it for yourself, that takes work.

title: The Wars to Come
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion I'm not well-suited for work.

title: The Wars to Come
Name: varys
text: varys I think you are. You have your father's instinct for politics, and you have compassion.

title: The Wars to Come
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion Compassion? Yes. I killed my lover with my bare hands. I shot my own father with a crossbow.

title: The Wars to Come
Name: varys
text: varys I never said you were perfect.

title: The Wars to Come
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion What is it you want exactly?

title: The Wars to Come
Name: varys
text: varys Peace. Prosperity. A land where the powerful do not prey on the powerless.

title: The Wars to Come
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion Where the castles are made of gingerbread and the moats are filled with blackberry wine. The powerful have always preyed on the powerless, that's how they became powerful in the first place.

title: The Wars to Come
Name: varys
text: varys Perhaps. And perhaps we've grown so used to horror we assume there's no other way. If you sat on the Iron Throne, would you spread misery throughout the land?

title: The Wars to Come
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion I will never sit on the Iron Throne.

title: The Wars to Come
Name: varys
text: varys No, you won't. But you could help another climb those steps and take that seat. The Seven Kingdoms need someone stronger than Tommen, but gentler than Stannis. A monarch who can intimidate the high lord and inspire the people. A ruler loved by millions with a powerful army and the right family name.

title: The Wars to Come
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion Good luck finding him.

title: The Wars to Come
Name: varys
text: varys Who said anything about him? You have a choice my friend. You can stay here at Ilyrio's palace and drink yourself to death, or you can ride with me to Mereen, meet Daenerys Targaryen, and decide if the world is worth fighting for.

title: The Wars to Come
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion Can I drink myself to death on the road to Meereen?

title: The Wars to Come
Name: daario
text: daario When did the Unsullied start patrolling the streets of Meereen? Looks like your friends haven't been behaving themselves.

title: The Wars to Come
Name: hizdahr
text: hizdahr The mission to Yunkai was a resounding success. The Wise Masters of Yunkai have agreed to cede power to a council of elders, made up of both the freedmen and the former slaveholders. All matters of consequence will be brought to you for review.

title: The Wars to Come
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys Good.

title: The Wars to Come
Name: hizdahr
text: hizdahr They did ask for some concessions.

title: The Wars to Come
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys Concessions?

title: The Wars to Come
Name: hizdahr
text: hizdahr Politics is the art of compromise, your grace.

title: The Wars to Come
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys I'm not a politician. I'm a queen.

title: The Wars to Come
Name: hizdahr
text: hizdahr Forgive me. You're right, of course. Still, it's easier to rule happy subjects than angry ones.

title: The Wars to Come
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys I don't expect the Wise Masters to be happy. Slavery made them rich, I ended slavery.

title: The Wars to Come
Name: hizdahr
text: hizdahr They do not ask for the return of slavery. They ask for the re-opening of the fighting pits.

title: The Wars to Come
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys The fighting pits? Where slaves fought slaves to the death?

title: The Wars to Come
Name: hizdahr
text: hizdahr In the new world that you've brought to us, free men would fight free men.

title: The Wars to Come
Name: hizdahr
text: hizdahr The pitfighters that you liberated plead for this opportunity. Bring some here and ask them yourself.

title: The Wars to Come
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys No fighting pits.

title: The Wars to Come
Name: hizdahr
text: hizdahr Opening them would show the people of Yunkai and Meereen that you respect their traditions.

title: The Wars to Come
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys I do not respect the tradition of human cockfighting.

title: The Wars to Come
Name: hizdahr
text: hizdahr If you--

title: The Wars to Come
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys How many times must I say no before you understand?

title: The Wars to Come
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys Whatever he wants from me he's not going to get it. If he really believes I'm going to reopen the fighting pits…

title: The Wars to Come
Name: daario
text: daario You should reopen the fighting pits.

title: The Wars to Come
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys What?

title: The Wars to Come
Name: daario
text: daario My mother was a whore, I told you that. She liked to drink pear brandy. The older she got, the less she made selling her body, the more she wanted to drink. So one day when I was 12, she sold me to a slaver she fucked the night before.

title: The Wars to Come
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys Why?

title: The Wars to Come
Name: daario
text: daario I was a bad child. I wasn't big, but I was quick. And I loved to fight. So they sold me to a man in Tolos who trained fighters for the pits. I had my first match when I was 16.

title: The Wars to Come
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys You were sold into slavery, forced to fight to the death for the amusement of the masters, and you're defending the fighting pits?

title: The Wars to Come
Name: daario
text: daario I'm only here because of those pits. I learned to fight like a Dothraki screamer, a Norvoshi priest, a Westerosi knight. Soon I was famous. 10,000 men and women screamed my name when I stepped into the pit. I made so much money for my master he set me free when I died. I joined the Second Sons, and then I met you.

title: The Wars to Come
Name: daario
text: daario You're the queen. Everyone's too afraid of you to speak truth. Everyone but me. You've made thousands of enemies all across the world. As soon as they see weakness, they'll attack. Show your strength here, now.

title: The Wars to Come
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys That's why I have the Unsullied patrolling the streets.

title: The Wars to Come
Name: daario
text: daario Anyone with a chest full of gold can buy an army of Unsullied. You're not the Mother of Unsullied. You're the Mother of Dragons.

title: The Wars to Come
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys I don't want another childo s bones dropped at my feet. No one's seen Drogon in weeks. For all I know he's flown halfway across the world. I can't control them anymore.

title: The Wars to Come
Name: daario
text: daario A dragon queen with no dragons is not a queen.

title: The Wars to Come
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys Viserion? Rhaegal?

title: The Wars to Come
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys Easy. Easy. Easy.

title: The Wars to Come
Name: mance
text: mance So here we are.

title: The Wars to Come
Name: jon
text: jon Here we are.

title: The Wars to Come
Name: mance
text: mance When we first met you were my prisoner. And now, for our last meeting…

title: The Wars to Come
Name: jon
text: jon This doesn't have to be our last meeting.

title: The Wars to Come
Name: mance
text: mance No, but it will be.

title: The Wars to Come
Name: jon
text: jon You know what Stannis wants?

title: The Wars to Come
Name: mance
text: mance He wants me to bend the knee. And he wants the free folk to fight for him. I'll give him this much

title: The Wars to Come
Name: jon
text: jon Shouldn't a king be bold?

title: The Wars to Come
Name: mance
text: mance Oh, aye. I respect him. If he gets what he wants, I expect he'll be a better ruler than the fools sitting on the Iron Throne the last hundred years. But I'll never serve him.

title: The Wars to Come
Name: jon
text: jon You told me you weren't here to conquer. You told me your people have bled enough.

title: The Wars to Come
Name: mance
text: mance That's right. But I don't want them bleeding for Stannis Baratheon either.

title: The Wars to Come
Name: jon
text: jon You spent your life convincing 90 clans to come together for the first time in history. Thenns and Hornfoots, the ice-river clans, even the giants. A life's work uniting them. You didn't do it for power. You didn't do it for glory. You brought them together to save them because none of them will survive the winter, not if they're north of the wall. Isn't their survival more important than your pride?

title: The Wars to Come
Name: mance
text: mance Pride? Fuck my pride. This isn't about that.

title: The Wars to Come
Name: jon
text: jon Then bend the knee and save your people.

title: The Wars to Come
Name: mance
text: mance They followed me because they respected me. Because they believed in me. The moment I kneel for a Southern king that's all gone.

title: The Wars to Come
Name: jon
text: jon And how many tens of thousands are out there right now? How many women? How many children? And you won't go out and rescue them because why? You're afraid of looking afraid.

title: The Wars to Come
Name: mance
text: mance Oh, I am afraid. No shame in that. How will they do it? Beheading? Hanging?

title: The Wars to Come
Name: jon
text: jon They'll burn you alive.

title: The Wars to Come
Name: mance
text: mance Bad way to go. I'll be honest with you, I don't want to die. And burnt to death, I don't want people to remember me like that. Scorched and screaming. But it's better than betraying everything I believe.

title: The Wars to Come
Name: jon
text: jon And what happens to your people? You preserve your dignity and die standing, and they'll sing songs about you. “You'd rather burn than kneel. The great hero.” Until winter comes, and the white walkers come for us all, and there's no one left to sing.

title: The Wars to Come
Name: mance
text: mance You're a good lad. Truly, you are. But if you can't understand why I won't enlist my people in a foreigner's war, there's no point explaining.

title: The Wars to Come
Name: jon
text: jon I think you're making a terrible mistake.

title: The Wars to Come
Name: mance
text: mance The freedom to make my own mistakes was all I ever wanted.

title: The Wars to Come
Name: stannis
text: stannis Mance Rayder, you've been called the King Beyond the Wall. Westeros only has one king. Bend the knee, I promise you mercy.

title: The Wars to Come
Name: stannis
text: stannis Kneel and live.

title: The Wars to Come
Name: mance
text: mance This was my home for many years. I wish you good fortune in the wars to come.

title: The Wars to Come
Name: melisandre
text: melisandre Man or woman, young or old, lord or peasant, our choices are the same. We choose light, or we choose darkness. We choose good, or we choose evil. We choose the true god or the false.

title: The Wars to Come
Name: melisandre
text: melisandre Free folk, there is only one true king, and his name is Stannis. Here stands the king of lies. Behold the fate of those who choose the darkness.

title: The House of Black and White
Name: braavosi
text: braavosi In the old times, whenever Braavos stood in danger, the titan would step with fire in his eyes. He'd wade into the sea and smash the enemies.

title: The House of Black and White
Name: arya
text: arya He's just a statue.

title: The House of Black and White
Name: man
text: man Don't be afraid. He's announcing our arrival.

title: The House of Black and White
Name: arya
text: arya I'm not afraid.

title: The House of Black and White
Name: man
text: man The House of Black and White

title: The House of Black and White
Name: man
text: man Here, I leave you.

title: The House of Black and White
Name: arya
text: arya Thank you for bringing me.

title: The House of Black and White
Name: man
text: man Any man of Braavos would have done the same. Valar morghulis.

title: The House of Black and White
Name: arya
text: arya Valar dohaeris.

title: The House of Black and White
Name: arya
text: arya Hello. Valar Morghulis.

title: The House of Black and White
Name: arya
text: arya Jaqen H'ghar gave me this.

title: The House of Black and White
Name: old
text: old No one here by that name.

title: The House of Black and White
Name: arya
text: arya Please. I crossed the Narrow Sea. I have nowhere else to go.

title: The House of Black and White
Name: old
text: old You have everywhere else to go.

title: The House of Black and White
Name: arya
text: arya But wait!

title: The House of Black and White
Name: arya
text: arya Cersei, Walder Frey, The Mountain, Meryn Trant. Cersei, Walder Frey, The Mountain, Meryn Trant.

title: The House of Black and White
Name: arya
text: arya The Mountain, Meryn Trant.

title: The House of Black and White
Name: podrick
text: podrick Must be good food if it's crowded.

title: The House of Black and White
Name: waitress
text: waitress Ale? Ale?

title: The House of Black and White
Name: sansa
text: sansa Before we left, a maester gave you a raven scroll.

title: The House of Black and White
Name: petyr
text: petyr You are becoming an observant young lady.

title: The House of Black and White
Name: sansa
text: sansa My mother used to say, "dark wings, dark words".

title: The House of Black and White
Name: petyr
text: petyr An old saying. Inaccurate in this case.

title: The House of Black and White
Name: sansa
text: sansa So it was good news.?

title: The House of Black and White
Name: petyr
text: petyr My marriage proposal has been accepted.

title: The House of Black and White
Name: sansa
text: sansa I thought you still mourn the death of my beloved Aunt Lysa.

title: The House of Black and White
Name: waitress
text: waitress Ale?

title: The House of Black and White
Name: sansa
text: sansa I'll have some.

title: The House of Black and White
Name: podrick
text: podrick My lady!

title: The House of Black and White
Name: brienne
text: brienne What is it?

title: The House of Black and White
Name: podrick
text: podrick Sansa Stark. Don't look!

title: The House of Black and White
Name: brienne
text: brienne You sure?

title: The House of Black and White
Name: podrick
text: podrick She's dyed her hair, but it's her. She's sitting with Petyr Baelish.

title: The House of Black and White
Name: brienne
text: brienne Littlefinger?

title: The House of Black and White
Name: podrick
text: podrick A bunch of knights with him.

title: The House of Black and White
Name: brienne
text: brienne Bunch? What's a bunch? 100? 6? 20?

title: The House of Black and White
Name: podrick
text: podrick 10, I think. Too many. My lady, I don't think this is the right--

title: The House of Black and White
Name: brienne
text: brienne Ready the horses.

title: The House of Black and White
Name: podrick
text: podrick We only have one horse.

title: The House of Black and White
Name: brienne
text: brienne Find more.

title: The House of Black and White
Name: petyr
text: petyr Do you like the taste?

title: The House of Black and White
Name: sansa
text: sansa I don't see what all the fuss is about. Why do men love it so much?

title: The House of Black and White
Name: petyr
text: petyr It gives some men courage.

title: The House of Black and White
Name: sansa
text: sansa Does it give you courage?

title: The House of Black and White
Name: guard
text: guard That's far enough.

title: The House of Black and White
Name: brienne
text: brienne Lord Baelish, Lady Sansa, my name is Brienne of Tarth.

title: The House of Black and White
Name: petyr
text: petyr We've met. With Renly Baratheon. What did he say about you? He said, "You're a loyalty comes free of charge." Someone appears to have paid quite a bit for it since then.

title: The House of Black and White
Name: brienne
text: brienne Lady Sansa, before your mother's death, I was her sworn sword. I gave my word I would find you and protect you. I will shield your back and keep your council, and give my life for yours if need be. I swear it by the old gods and the new.

title: The House of Black and White
Name: petyr
text: petyr Please, Lady Brienne. No need for such formality. You are Catelyn Stark's sworn sword?

title: The House of Black and White
Name: brienne
text: brienne I was.

title: The House of Black and White
Name: petyr
text: petyr Strange. I knew Cat from the time we were children. She never mentioned you.

title: The House of Black and White
Name: brienne
text: brienne It was after Renly's murder.

title: The House of Black and White
Name: petyr
text: petyr Ah, yes. You were accused of killing him.

title: The House of Black and White
Name: brienne
text: brienne I tried to save him.

title: The House of Black and White
Name: petyr
text: petyr But you were accused.

title: The House of Black and White
Name: brienne
text: brienne By men who didn't see what happened.

title: The House of Black and White
Name: petyr
text: petyr Then what did happen?

title: The House of Black and White
Name: brienne
text: brienne He was murdered by a shadow. A shadow with a face of Stannis Baratheon.

title: The House of Black and White
Name: petyr
text: petyr A shadow? With a face? This woman swore to protect Renly; she failed. She swore to protect your mother; she failed. Why would I want somebody with your history of failure guiding Lady Sansa?

title: The House of Black and White
Name: brienne
text: brienne Why should you have any say in her affairs?

title: The House of Black and White
Name: petyr
text: petyr Because I am her uncle. I married her Aunt Lysa shortly before my belovedo s untimely death. We're family now, and you're an outsider. Forgive me, Lady Brienne, but experiences made me wary of outsiders.

title: The House of Black and White
Name: brienne
text: brienne Lady Sansa, if we can have a word alone--

title: The House of Black and White
Name: sansa
text: sansa No.

title: The House of Black and White
Name: brienne
text: brienne Please, my lady. If I could explain--

title: The House of Black and White
Name: sansa
text: sansa I saw you at Joffrey's wedding bowing to the king.

title: The House of Black and White
Name: brienne
text: brienne Neither of us wanted to be there. Sometimes we don't have a choice.

title: The House of Black and White
Name: sansa
text: sansa And sometimes we do. You should leave.

title: The House of Black and White
Name: petyr
text: petyr We don't want our new friend wandering the countryside alone. The roads of these parts aren't safe. Why don't you stay?

title: The House of Black and White
Name: knight
text: knight He asked you to stay.

title: The House of Black and White
Name: guard
text: guard After her!

title: The House of Black and White
Name: brienne
text: brienne Podrick!

title: The House of Black and White
Name: podrick
text: podrick Stop, stop, stop! That's a good boy.

title: The House of Black and White
Name: knight
text: knight I guess that means you're unarmed.

title: The House of Black and White
Name: brienne
text: brienne Down, Podrick, down!

title: The House of Black and White
Name: brienne
text: brienne Podrick?

title: The House of Black and White
Name: podrick
text: podrick Yes, my lady?

title: The House of Black and White
Name: brienne
text: brienne You can stand now.

title: The House of Black and White
Name: podrick
text: podrick Yes, my lady. Sansa Stark?

title: The House of Black and White
Name: brienne
text: brienne Wary of strangers, as she should me. I saw her riding on the East Trail with Littlefinger. We'll follow them.

title: The House of Black and White
Name: podrick
text: podrick My lady, if those Stark girls refused your service, maybe you're released from your vow.

title: The House of Black and White
Name: brienne
text: brienne I swore to their mother I'd protect those girls.

title: The House of Black and White
Name: podrick
text: podrick If they don't want your protection--

title: The House of Black and White
Name: brienne
text: brienne Do you think she's safe from Littlefinger?

title: The House of Black and White
Name: podrick
text: podrick No, my lady.

title: The House of Black and White
Name: brienne
text: brienne Get your horse.

title: The House of Black and White
Name: jaime
text: jaime A summons from the queen.

title: The House of Black and White
Name: cersei
text: cersei There are only two like it in the world

title: The House of Black and White
Name: jaime
text: jaime It's a threat.

title: The House of Black and White
Name: cersei
text: cersei Of course it's a threat! Our daughter's in Dorne surrounded by people who hate our family. "It's a threat."

title: The House of Black and White
Name: jaime
text: jaime No note.

title: The House of Black and White
Name: cersei
text: cersei They blame us for the death of Oberyn and his sister, and every other tragedy that's befallen their cursed country. I will burn their cities to the ground if they touch her!

title: The House of Black and White
Name: jaime
text: jaime Softer.

title: The House of Black and White
Name: cersei
text: cersei What?

title: The House of Black and White
Name: jaime
text: jaime Not so loud.

title: The House of Black and White
Name: cersei
text: cersei Our daughter's in danger, and you're worried I'm speaking too loudly!

title: The House of Black and White
Name: jaime
text: jaime The world can't know knows she's our daughter.

title: The House of Black and White
Name: cersei
text: cersei Then don't call her your daughter. You've never been a father to her.

title: The House of Black and White
Name: jaime
text: jaime If I was the father to any of my children, they'd be stoned in the streets.

title: The House of Black and White
Name: cersei
text: cersei And what has your caution brought? Our eldest child murdered at his own wedding. Our only daughter shipped off to Dorne. Our baby boy sent to marry that smirking whore from Highgarden.

title: The House of Black and White
Name: jaime
text: jaime I'll make things better.

title: The House of Black and White
Name: cersei
text: cersei You never made anything better.

title: The House of Black and White
Name: jaime
text: jaime I'm going to Dorne. I'll bring our daughter home.

title: The House of Black and White
Name: cersei
text: cersei You can't just ask Prince Doran to give her back! She's promised his son.

title: The House of Black and White
Name: jaime
text: jaime I'm not going to ask him anything.

title: The House of Black and White
Name: cersei
text: cersei You go there with an army, it's an act of war.

title: The House of Black and White
Name: jaime
text: jaime No army. Do you know where they're keeping her?

title: The House of Black and White
Name: cersei
text: cersei Oberyn mentioned the Water Gardens.

title: The House of Black and White
Name: jaime
text: jaime I'll find her. Is there anything else, your grace?

title: The House of Black and White
Name: cersei
text: cersei You're going to Dorne? A one-handed man? Alone?

title: The House of Black and White
Name: jaime
text: jaime I never said I was going alone.

title: The House of Black and White
Name: lollys
text: lollys No sunflowers. I don't like yellow. Roses are very nice, definitely roses. And music. I adore music. But no flutes, I hate flutes! We can have a harp if you like, but no flutes. Then there's the food. Food is the most important thing, don't you agree? We're going to need pigeon pies. That's what they eat in the capital, don't they?

title: The House of Black and White
Name: lollys
text: lollys Don't they?

title: The House of Black and White
Name: bronn
text: bronn Don't who?

title: The House of Black and White
Name: lollys
text: lollys People eat pigeon pie in the capital.

title: The House of Black and White
Name: bronn
text: bronn They certainly do, my dear. They certainly do.

title: The House of Black and White
Name: bronn
text: bronn It's a fine place, isn't it? A fine place. I never thought I'd end up settling down in a place like this.

title: The House of Black and White
Name: lollys
text: lollys You won't.

title: The House of Black and White
Name: bronn
text: bronn Pardon?

title: The House of Black and White
Name: lollys
text: lollys We won't get to live at Stokeworth. When Mother dies, my sister gets the castle because she's older.

title: The House of Black and White
Name: bronn
text: bronn Oh.

title: The House of Black and White
Name: lollys
text: lollys She hates me. She calls me mean names, and sometimes even still she pulls my hair when Mother isn't looking.

title: The House of Black and White
Name: bronn
text: bronn You know what I think? I think you're a good person. And your sister is a mean person.

title: The House of Black and White
Name: lollys
text: lollys She is.

title: The House of Black and White
Name: bronn
text: bronn I've been all over the world. And if there's one thing I've learned, it's that meanness comes around. People like your sister, they always get what's coming to them eventually. One way or another.

title: The House of Black and White
Name: lollys
text: lollys Who's that?

title: The House of Black and White
Name: bronn
text: bronn Jaime fucking Lannister.

title: The House of Black and White
Name: bronn
text: bronn Ser Jaime.

title: The House of Black and White
Name: jaime
text: jaime Ser Bronn of the Blackwater.

title: The House of Black and White
Name: bronn
text: bronn I was very sorry to hear about your father.

title: The House of Black and White
Name: jaime
text: jaime Thank you.

title: The House of Black and White
Name: bronn
text: bronn This is my betrothed, Lollys.

title: The House of Black and White
Name: jaime
text: jaime A pleasure.

title: The House of Black and White
Name: bronn
text: bronn Run along, love.

title: The House of Black and White
Name: jaime
text: jaime Beautiful bride you've chosen. When were you planning on getting married?

title: The House of Black and White
Name: bronn
text: bronn Just get on with it.

title: The House of Black and White
Name: jaime
text: jaime On with what?

title: The House of Black and White
Name: bronn
text: bronn What you're here for. There's no way this little visit could possibly mean anything good for me.

title: The House of Black and White
Name: jaime
text: jaime It's very good for you.

title: The House of Black and White
Name: bronn
text: bronn Lollys will be marrying Ser Wyllis Bracken.

title: The House of Black and White
Name: jaime
text: jaime Mmm.

title: The House of Black and White
Name: bronn
text: bronn We made a deal, your sister and I.

title: The House of Black and White
Name: jaime
text: jaime I would have advised against that.
