title: The House of Black and White
Name: bronn
text: bronn How is this good for me?

title: The House of Black and White
Name: jaime
text: jaime Cause you're going to come with me and help me with something important. And when we return, I'm going to give you a much better girl, and a much better castle.

title: The House of Black and White
Name: bronn
text: bronn Return from where?

title: The House of Black and White
Name: jaime
text: jaime As far south as south goes.

title: The House of Black and White
Name: trystane
text: trystane My future queen.

title: The House of Black and White
Name: areo
text: areo The prince does not wish to be disturbed.

title: The House of Black and White
Name: ellaria
text: ellaria Remove myself from my path, or I'll take that long axe and shove it--

title: The House of Black and White
Name: doran
text: doran Captain. Let her pass.

title: The House of Black and White
Name: ellaria
text: ellaria Your brother was murdered, and you sit here at the Water Gardens, staring at the sky and doing nothing.

title: The House of Black and White
Name: doran
text: doran Oberyn was slain during a trial by combat. By law, that is not murder.

title: The House of Black and White
Name: ellaria
text: ellaria Your brother--

title: The House of Black and White
Name: doran
text: doran You don't have to remind me. He was my brother long before he was anything to you.

title: The House of Black and White
Name: ellaria
text: ellaria What will you do about his death.

title: The House of Black and White
Name: doran
text: doran I will bury him. I will mourn for him.

title: The House of Black and White
Name: ellaria
text: ellaria You would have me go to war?

title: The House of Black and White
Name: doran
text: doran You would have me go to war?

title: The House of Black and White
Name: ellaria
text: ellaria The whole country would have you go to war.

title: The House of Black and White
Name: doran
text: doran Then we are lucky the whole country does not decide.

title: The House of Black and White
Name: ellaria
text: ellaria The Sand Snakes are with me. They have the love of their people. They will avenge your father while you sit here in your chair doing nothing.

title: The House of Black and White
Name: ellaria
text: ellaria Oberyn is dead. And this Lannister girl skips about the Water Gardens eating our food, breathing our air. How many of your brothers and sisters do they have to kill?

title: The House of Black and White
Name: doran
text: doran I loved my brother. And you made him very happy. For that you will always have a place in my heart. But we do not mutilate little girls for vengeance. Not here. Not while I rule.

title: The House of Black and White
Name: ellaria
text: ellaria And how long will that be?

title: The House of Black and White
Name: daario
text: daario The Unsullied are too conspicuous.

title: The House of Black and White
Name: daario
text: daario Anyone can see you coming from a mile off. Of course you haven't found any Sons of the Harpy. You haven't, have you?

title: The House of Black and White
Name: daario
text: daario My Second Sons, on the other hand, they drink, they whore, fight in the streets--they blend in. They overhear things in taverns, follow people from the taverns to nice, quiet alleys, break a few fingers, overhear a few more things. Before you know it...

title: The House of Black and White
Name: grey
text: grey No one here. We go.

title: The House of Black and White
Name: daario
text: daario In a hurry? You're afraid?

title: The House of Black and White
Name: grey
text: grey Unsullied fear nothing.

title: The House of Black and White
Name: daario
text: daario Right. That's your problem. You understood fear once, long ago, but you've forgotten what it means. Someone who's forgotten fear has forgotten how to hide.

title: The House of Black and White
Name: daario
text: daario Fear is useful that way.

title: The House of Black and White
Name: mossador
text: mossador Sons of the Harpy, they want to put a collar back on my neck. On all of our necks. Please, Your Grace, you must kill him.

title: The House of Black and White
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys It would send a message.

title: The House of Black and White
Name: barristan
text: barristan I think you should exercise restraint, Your Grace.

title: The House of Black and White
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys Why?

title: The House of Black and White
Name: barristan
text: barristan For one thing, he may have valuable information.

title: The House of Black and White
Name: daario
text: daario The Son of the Harpy has no more valuable information.

title: The House of Black and White
Name: barristan
text: barristan How do you know that?

title: The House of Black and White
Name: daario
text: daario Because I questioned him.

title: The House of Black and White
Name: hizdahr
text: hizdahr And the information you did get, he is young and poor.

title: The House of Black and White
Name: mossador
text: mossador He is born free.

title: The House of Black and White
Name: hizdahr
text: hizdahr Why should he want to bring back slavery? What did it do for him?

title: The House of Black and White
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys Perhaps the only thing that gave him pride was knowing that there was someone lower than he was.

title: The House of Black and White
Name: mossador
text: mossador They pay him. Great families afraid to do a thing. They pay poor man to do it for them.

title: The House of Black and White
Name: hizdahr
text: hizdahr And how do you know this?

title: The House of Black and White
Name: mossador
text: mossador Everyone knows this.

title: The House of Black and White
Name: hizdahr
text: hizdahr I don't know it, and I'm the head of a great family.

title: The House of Black and White
Name: barristan
text: barristan We do not know what this man did or didn't do. Give him a trial, at least. A fair trial. Show all of the citizens of Meereen that you are better than those who would depose. Teach them a better way.

title: The House of Black and White
Name: mossador
text: mossador I do not know the place from where Old Ser comes. Things maybe are different there, I hope. But here, in Meereen, before Daenerys Stormborn, they own us. So we learn much about them or we do not live long. They teach me what they are. Mercy, fair trial

title: The House of Black and White
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys Thank you all for your counsel.

title: The House of Black and White
Name: barristan
text: barristan Your Grace, a word, please, I beg you.

title: The House of Black and White
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys About what?

title: The House of Black and White
Name: barristan
text: barristan About your father. About the Mad King.

title: The House of Black and White
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys The Mad King? You're here to remind me of my enemies' lies? Consider me reminded.

title: The House of Black and White
Name: barristan
text: barristan Your Grace, I served in his Kingsguard. I was at his side from the first. Your enemies did not lie.

title: The House of Black and White
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys Go on.

title: The House of Black and White
Name: barristan
text: barristan When the people rose in revolt against him, your father set their towns and castles aflame. He murdered sons in front of their fathers. He burned men alive with Wildfire, and laughed as they screamed. And his efforts to stamp out dissent led to rebellion that killed every Targaryen except two.

title: The House of Black and White
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys I'm not my father.

title: The House of Black and White
Name: barristan
text: barristan No, Your Grace. Thank the gods. But the Mad King gave his enemies the justice he thought they deserved. And each time it made him feel powerful and right. Until the very end.

title: The House of Black and White
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys I will not have the Son of the Harpy executed without a fair trial.

title: The House of Black and White
Name: barristan
text: barristan Your Grace.

title: The House of Black and White
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion There's a bug.

title: The House of Black and White
Name: varys
text: varys Yes, best be careful. You might accidentally consume some solid food.

title: The House of Black and White
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion When I agreed to come with you, did I misrepresent my intentions? Besides, what is there for me to do inside this fucking box?

title: The House of Black and White
Name: varys
text: varys You don't like it?

title: The House of Black and White
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion I want to take a walk.

title: The House of Black and White
Name: varys
text: varys You can't. Cersei has offered a lordship to the man who brings her your head.

title: The House of Black and White
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion She ought to offer her cunt. Best part of her for the best part of me. Well, I suppose a box is as good a place for me as anywhere.

title: The House of Black and White
Name: varys
text: varys Are we really going to spend the entire road to Volantis talking about the futility of everything?

title: The House of Black and White
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion You're right. No point. The road to Volantis? You said we were going to Meereen. What's in Volantis?

title: The House of Black and White
Name: varys
text: varys The road to Meereen.

title: The House of Black and White
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion And what do you hope to find at the end of the road to Meereen?

title: The House of Black and White
Name: varys
text: varys I told you. A ruler.

title: The House of Black and White
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion We've already got a ruler. Everywhere has already got a ruler. Every pile of shit on the side of every road has someone's banner hanging from it.

title: The House of Black and White
Name: varys
text: varys You were quite good, you know. At ruling. During your brief tenure as Hand.

title: The House of Black and White
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion I didn't rule. I was a servant.

title: The House of Black and White
Name: varys
text: varys Still, a man of talent.

title: The House of Black and White
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion Managed to kill a lot of people.

title: The House of Black and White
Name: varys
text: varys Yes, but showed great promise in other areas as well.

title: The House of Black and White
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion She wanted me to leave King's Landing. She begged me. I wouldn't go.

title: The House of Black and White
Name: varys
text: varys Why?

title: The House of Black and White
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion Cause I liked it. Power. Even as a servant.

title: The House of Black and White
Name: varys
text: varys People follow leaders. And they will never follow us. They find us repulsive.

title: The House of Black and White
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion I find us repulsive.

title: The House of Black and White
Name: varys
text: varys And we find them repulsive, which is why we surround ourselves with large, comfortable boxes to keep them away. And yet, no matter what we do, people like you and me are never really satisfied inside the box. Not for long.

title: The House of Black and White
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion You're right. Let's go for a walk.

title: The House of Black and White
Name: varys
text: varys No.

title: The House of Black and White
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion How many dwarves are there in the world? Is Cersei going to kill them all?

title: The House of Black and White
Name: cersei
text: cersei Not him.

title: The House of Black and White
Name: meryn
text: meryn Are you trying to deceive your Queen? Shall I throw them in a cell, Your Grace?

title: The House of Black and White
Name: cersei
text: cersei That won't be necessary, Ser Meryn. I don't want to dissuade the other hunters. Mistakes will be made.

title: The House of Black and White
Name: hunters
text: hunters Thank you, Your Grace. Thank you.

title: The House of Black and White
Name: cersei
text: cersei Take the head.

title: The House of Black and White
Name: qyburn
text: qyburn Pardon me, Your Grace. I would take it, if you don't mind. It could prove useful for my work.

title: The House of Black and White
Name: cersei
text: cersei Very good.

title: The House of Black and White
Name: qyburn
text: qyburn Over there will be fine.

title: The House of Black and White
Name: meryn
text: meryn You heard the man. Over there.

title: The House of Black and White
Name: kevan
text: kevan You're the Hand of the King?

title: The House of Black and White
Name: cersei
text: cersei No, Uncle. Clearly it would not be appropriate for a woman to assume that role. I'm merely advising my son until he comes of age and chooses a Hand for himself.

title: The House of Black and White
Name: mace
text: mace Your Grace, I would be willing to serve provisionally as the King's Hand until he becomes old enough--

title: The House of Black and White
Name: cersei
text: cersei You're a good man, Lord Tyrell, but I don't imagine you'll have the time. In addition to being Master of Ships, the king has appointed you Master of Coin.

title: The House of Black and White
Name: mace
text: mace Oh, Your Grace.

title: The House of Black and White
Name: cersei
text: cersei He called your experience and wisdom in financial matters unparalleled. He said he would be honored to have you represent the crown's interests in the same.

title: The House of Black and White
Name: mace
text: mace The honor is all mine, Your Grace.

title: The House of Black and White
Name: pycelle
text: pycelle Your Grace, in the past on several occasions, a Grand Maester has served as the King's Hand.

title: The House of Black and White
Name: cersei
text: cersei The King has named Qyburn the new Master of Whisperers.

title: The House of Black and White
Name: pycelle
text: pycelle Your Grace, him? This man? This embarrassment to the Citadel? Your Grace, what qualifications can he possibly have for this post?

title: The House of Black and White
Name: cersei
text: cersei The qualification of loyalty, Grand Maester. That's far more than the eunuch ever had. Far more than many ever have.

title: The House of Black and White
Name: pycelle
text: pycelle I must say I cannot see--

title: The House of Black and White
Name: cersei
text: cersei Uncle Kevan, in light of your position as commander of the Lannister armies, it would please the king if you would serve as his Master of War. No man living better deserves the title.

title: The House of Black and White
Name: kevan
text: kevan That is kind of you to say. I would like to hear it from the king himself.

title: The House of Black and White
Name: cersei
text: cersei The king is very busy at this moment.

title: The House of Black and White
Name: kevan
text: kevan He should be here, learning what it means to rule.

title: The House of Black and White
Name: cersei
text: cersei He is learning. On this occasion, in his capacity as ruler, he's asked me to speak on his behalf.

title: The House of Black and White
Name: kevan
text: kevan I returned to the capital to pay my respects to my brother. And to you. And to serve the king. I did not return to the capital to serve as your puppet. To watch you stack the small council with sycophants. Sending your own brother away so he wouldn't be--

title: The House of Black and White
Name: cersei
text: cersei My brother has left the capital to lead a sensitive diplomatic mission.

title: The House of Black and White
Name: kevan
text: kevan What mission?

title: The House of Black and White
Name: cersei
text: cersei That is not your concern as Master of War.

title: The House of Black and White
Name: kevan
text: kevan I do not recognize your authority to dictate what is and is not my concern. You are the Queen Mother. Nothing more.

title: The House of Black and White
Name: cersei
text: cersei You would abandon your king in his time of need?

title: The House of Black and White
Name: kevan
text: kevan If he wants to send for me, I will be waiting for him. At Casterly Rock.

title: The House of Black and White
Name: shireen
text: shireen Come on. You know this one. It looks like an animal.

title: The House of Black and White
Name: gilly
text: gilly Snake. Snake... S! It's an S!

title: The House of Black and White
Name: shireen
text: shireen Right, very good!

title: The House of Black and White
Name: sam
text: sam Hmm! Did you know that the youngest Lord Commander in history, Osric Stark, was elected at the age of 10?

title: The House of Black and White
Name: gilly
text: gilly I know "S".

title: The House of Black and White
Name: shireen
text: shireen You'll learn, I promise. I taught Ser Davos, and old people are terrible at learning new things.

title: The House of Black and White
Name: gilly
text: gilly Well, you're a wonderful teacher. Very patient!

title: The House of Black and White
Name: sam
text: sam I only said that the more time you spend practicing, the faster you'll be able to read.

title: The House of Black and White
Name: gilly
text: gilly That's alright. We're doing just fine. I'm sure you and Ostrich Stark have a lot to talk about.

title: The House of Black and White
Name: gilly
text: gilly How old were you when you learned to read?

title: The House of Black and White
Name: shireen
text: shireen Three.

title: The House of Black and White
Name: sam
text: sam Three?! Who taught you, your mother?

title: The House of Black and White
Name: shireen
text: shireen No. Old Maester Cressen did. I had a lot of time to practice. My mother kept me inside because...

title: The House of Black and White
Name: gilly
text: gilly What do you call it in the South, what happened to your face?

title: The House of Black and White
Name: shireen
text: shireen Greyscale. What do you call it north of the Wall?

title: The House of Black and White
Name: gilly
text: gilly I don't know. But two of my sisters had it. They both died. How did they cure you?

title: The House of Black and White
Name: shireen
text: shireen I don't remember. I was a baby. Lots of people came and tried, I think. Whatever they did, it went away. What happened to your sisters?

title: The House of Black and White
Name: gilly
text: gilly My father made them move out of the keep into the huts outside. None of us were allowed to go near them. But we heard them. Especially at night. They started to sound... not like themselves.

title: The House of Black and White
Name: sam
text: sam Did you ever see them?

title: The House of Black and White
Name: gilly
text: gilly Only once at the end. They were covered with it. Their faces, their arms. They acted like animals. My father had to drag them out to the woods on a rope.

title: The House of Black and White
Name: shireen
text: shireen What did he do to them in the woods?

title: The House of Black and White
Name: shireen
text: shireen Mother.

title: The House of Black and White
Name: selyse
text: selyse Leave us.

title: The House of Black and White
Name: sam
text: sam Your Grace.

title: The House of Black and White
Name: selyse
text: selyse You need to stay away from that girl.

title: The House of Black and White
Name: shireen
text: shireen Why?

title: The House of Black and White
Name: selyse
text: selyse She's a wildling.

title: The House of Black and White
Name: shireen
text: shireen Her name's Gilly. She's nice. I'm teaching her to read.

title: The House of Black and White
Name: selyse
text: selyse She's a wildling. Your father defeated their people. He executed her king for treason. They could strike at him by striking at you.

title: The House of Black and White
Name: shireen
text: shireen Gilly wouldn't do that.

title: The House of Black and White
Name: selyse
text: selyse You have no idea what people will do. All your books and you still don't know.

title: The House of Black and White
Name: stannis
text: stannis I ordered Mance Rayder burnt at the stake. You prevented that order from being carried out. You showed mercy to Mance Rayder. A king's word is law. Perhaps you should ask Ser Davos how much mercy I show to lawbreakers. Show too much kindness, people won't fear you. If people don't fear you, they don't follow you.

title: The House of Black and White
Name: jon
text: jon With respect, Your Grace, the free folk will never follow you, no matter what you do. You're the man who burned their king alive.

title: The House of Black and White
Name: stannis
text: stannis Who then? You?

title: The House of Black and White
Name: jon
text: jon No. Only one of their own.

title: The House of Black and White
Name: stannis
text: stannis Do you know this wretched girl Lyanna Mormont?

title: The House of Black and White
Name: jon
text: jon The Lord Commander's niece.

title: The House of Black and White
Name: stannis
text: stannis Lady of Bear Island, and a child of 10. I asked her to commit her house to my cause, that's her response.

title: The House of Black and White
Name: jon
text: jon Bear Island knows no king but the King in the North, whose name is Stark.

title: The House of Black and White
Name: stannis
text: stannis That amuses you?

title: The House of Black and White
Name: jon
text: jon I apologize, Your Grace. Northerners can be a bit like the free folk. Loyal to their own.

title: The House of Black and White
Name: stannis
text: stannis I know. My brother Robert went on often and loudly about how difficult it was to control them - even with your father's help.

title: The House of Black and White
Name: davos
text: davos Tonight, the Night's Watch elect a new Lord Commander. Ser Alliser Thorne is going to win.

title: The House of Black and White
Name: jon
text: jon Most likely.

title: The House of Black and White
Name: davos
text: davos Unpleasant man. He thinks you're a traitor. What's your life going to be like on the Wall with Thorne in command?

title: The House of Black and White
Name: jon
text: jon Unpleasant, I expect.

title: The House of Black and White
Name: stannis
text: stannis Your bravery made him look weak. He'll punish you for it. I don't punish men for bravery. I reward them.

title: The House of Black and White
Name: jon
text: jon I don't doubt it, Your Grace. But I'm a brother of the Night's Watch. I've pledged them my life, my honor, my sword. I don't know what I have left to give you.

title: The House of Black and White
Name: stannis
text: stannis You can give me the North.

title: The House of Black and White
Name: jon
text: jon I can't. Even if I wanted to, I'm a bastard. A Snow.

title: The House of Black and White
Name: stannis
text: stannis Kneel before me. Lay your sword at my feet. Pledge me your service and you'll rise again as Jon Stark, Lord of Winterfell.

title: The House of Black and White
Name: sam
text: sam He'll make you a Stark with the stroke of a pen?

title: The House of Black and White
Name: jon
text: jon It's the first thing I ever remember wanting. I'd daydream that my father would ask the king, and just like that I would never be the bastard of Winterfell again.

title: The House of Black and White
Name: sam
text: sam You deserve this. You do. I couldn't be happier for you.

title: The House of Black and White
Name: jon
text: jon I'm going to refuse him.

title: The House of Black and White
Name: sam
text: sam But you'd be Lord of Winterfell.

title: The House of Black and White
Name: jon
text: jon I swore a vow to the Night's Watch. If I don't take my own word seriously, what sort of Lord of Winterfell would I be?

title: The House of Black and White
Name: alliser
text: alliser Crowded. You'd think we were serving venison stew.

title: The House of Black and White
Name: aemon
text: aemon Does anyone wish to speak for candidates before we cast our tokens for the 998th Lord Commander of the Night's Watch?

title: The House of Black and White
Name: janos
text: janos Ser Alliser Thorne is not just a knight, he's a man of true nobility. He was acting commander when the Wall came under attack, and led us to victory against the wildlings.

title: The House of Black and White
Name: men
text: men Hear, hear.

title: The House of Black and White
Name: janos
text: janos He's a veteran of 100 battles and has been a defender of the Watch and the Wall almost all of his life. He's the only true choice.

title: The House of Black and White
Name: aemon
text: aemon Is there anyone else?

title: The House of Black and White
Name: shadow
text: shadow Ser Denys Mallister joined the Watch as a boy and has served loyally longer than any other ranger. Through 10 winters he served. As commander of the Shadow Tower, he kept the wildlings away. We could do no better.

title: The House of Black and White
Name: aemon
text: aemon If there's no one else, we will begin the voting. The triangular tokens count for Ser Alliser Thorne. The square tokens for Ser Denys Mallister. Each brother will--

title: The House of Black and White
Name: sam
text: sam Maester Aemon.

title: The House of Black and White
Name: aemon
text: aemon Samwell Tarly. Go on.

title: The House of Black and White
Name: janos
text: janos Sam the Slayer.

title: The House of Black and White
Name: janos
text: janos Another wildling lover just like his friend Jon Snow. How's your lady love Slayer?

title: The House of Black and White
Name: sam
text: sam Her name is Gilly. Brother Slynt knows her quite well. They cowered together in the larder during the battle for the Wall.

title: The House of Black and White
Name: janos
text: janos Lies!

title: The House of Black and White
Name: sam
text: sam A wildling girl, a baby, and Lord Janos. I found him there when the battle was over in a puddle of his own making.

title: The House of Black and White
Name: sam
text: sam Whilst Lord Janos was hiding with the women and children, Jon Snow was leading.

title: The House of Black and White
Name: sam
text: sam Ser Alliser fought bravely, it is true. And when he was wounded, it is Jon who saved us. He took charge of the wall's defense. He killed the Magnar of the Thenns. He went North to deal with Mance Rayder, knowing it almost certainly meant his own death. Before that, he led the mission to avenge Lord Commander Mormont. Mormont himself chose Jon to be his steward. He saw something in Jon, and now we've all seen it, too. He may be young, but he's the commander we turned to when the night was darkest.

title: The House of Black and White
Name: alliser
text: alliser I can't argue with any of that. But who does Jon Snow want to command? Night's Watch or the wildlings? Everyone knows he loved a wildling girl and spoke with Mance Rayder many times. What would have happened in that tent between those two old friends if Stannis's army hadn't come along? We all saw him put the King-beyond-the-Wall out of his misery. Do you want to choose a man who has fought the wildlings all his life, or a man who makes love to them?

title: The House of Black and White
Name: aemon
text: aemon It is time.

title: The House of Black and White
Name: brother
text: brother It appears to be a tie, Maester.

title: The House of Black and White
Name: brothers
text: brothers Jon Snow! Jon Snow! Jon Snow! Jon Snow!

title: The House of Black and White
Name: man
text: man You. You!

title: The House of Black and White
Name: man
text: man What have you got there?

title: The House of Black and White
Name: man
text: man I said--

title: The House of Black and White
Name: arya
text: arya Turn around and go. Turn around and go.

title: The House of Black and White
Name: man
text: man That's a nice little sword. Worth 100 pieces, a sword like that.

title: The House of Black and White
Name: arya
text: arya Nothing's worth anything to dead men.

title: The House of Black and White
Name: men
text: men Quickly, go, go!

title: The House of Black and White
Name: arya
text: arya Who are you? Why were they scared of you?

title: The House of Black and White
Name: old
text: old You lost this.

title: The House of Black and White
Name: arya
text: arya You said there was no Jaqen H'ghar here.

title: The House of Black and White
Name: jaqen
text: jaqen There isn't. A man is not Jaqen H'ghar.

title: The House of Black and White
Name: arya
text: arya Well who are you then?

title: The House of Black and White
Name: jaqen
text: jaqen No one. And that is who a girl must become.

title: The House of Black and White
Name: harpy
text: harpy She doesn't belong here. And no matter how many of your traitors call her "Mhysa", she will never be your mother.

title: The House of Black and White
Name: mossador
text: mossador For you, Mhysa. You wanted the Harpy dead, but your hands were tied. I set you free, as you did all of us.

title: The House of Black and White
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys He was our prisoner, awaiting trial. You had no right.

title: The House of Black and White
Name: mossador
text: mossador He would rather rip your city apart than see slaves lifted from the dirt.

title: The House of Black and White
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys There are no more slaves. There are no more Masters.

title: The House of Black and White
Name: mossador
text: mossador Then who lives in the Pyramids? Who wears gold masks and murders your children? When Grey Worm came to us, I was the first to take up the knife for you. I remember the look on my father's face as I struck down his Master, who had traded his infant son for a dog. My father died in the fighting. If we allow the Sons of the Harpy to return us to chains, he never lived.

title: The House of Black and White
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys The Harpy's life was not yours to take. Once, the Masters were the law--

title: The House of Black and White
Name: mosador
text: mosador and now you are the law!

title: The House of Black and White
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys The law is the law. Take him.

title: The House of Black and White
Name: crowd
text: crowd Mhysa! Myhsa!

title: The House of Black and White
Name: hizdahr
text: hizdahr She should have cut off the traitor's head in the Great Pyramid and been done with it.

title: The House of Black and White
Name: daario
text: daario Which is what I keep telling her to do to you.

title: The House of Black and White
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys You opened your gates to me because I promised you freedom and justice. One cannot exist without the other.

title: The House of Black and White
Name: crowd
text: crowd Brother! Brother!

title: The House of Black and White
Name: mossador
text: mossador Mhysa, please! Forgive me!

title: The House of Black and White
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys A citizen of Meereen was awaiting trial and this man murdered him. The punishment is death.

title: The House of Black and White
Name: crowd
text: crowd Mercy! Mercy!

title: The House of Black and White
Name: mossador
text: mossador Mhysa...

title: The House of Black and White
Name: crowd
text: crowd Mhysa...

title: The House of Black and White
Name: barristan
text: barristan I'll stand guard outside your door tonight, Your Grace.

title: The House of Black and White
Name: grey
text: grey We all guard tonight.

title: The House of Black and White
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys Leave me.

title: The House of Black and White
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys Drogon...

title: The House of Black and White
Name: end
text: end EPISODE

title: High Sparrow
Name: man
text: man Valar morghulis.

title: High Sparrow
Name: jaqen
text: jaqen Valar dohaeris.

title: High Sparrow
Name: arya
text: arya I've been sweeping this floor for days.

title: High Sparrow
Name: jaqen
text: jaqen Good.

title: High Sparrow
Name: arya
text: arya I didn't come here to sweep floors.

title: High Sparrow
Name: jaqen
text: jaqen No? Why come, then?

title: High Sparrow
Name: arya
text: arya You said that I could be your apprentice. You said you'd teach me how to a Faceless Man.

title: High Sparrow
Name: jaqen
text: jaqen A man teaches a girl. . Valar dohaeris. All men must serve. Faceless men, most of all. .

title: High Sparrow
Name: arya
text: arya I want to serve. .

title: High Sparrow
Name: jaqen
text: jaqen A girl wants to serve herself. Here we serve the Many-Faced God, to serve well. A girl must become no-one.

title: High Sparrow
Name: arya
text: arya Which one is the Many-Faced God? I see the Stranger. I see the Drowned God. I see the Weirwood Face.

title: High Sparrow
Name: jaqen
text: jaqen There is only one god. A girl knows his name. And all men know his gift.

title: High Sparrow
Name: arya
text: arya Where are they taking him?

title: High Sparrow
Name: bystanders
text: bystanders Queen Margaery! Queen Margaery! Queen Margaery!

title: High Sparrow
Name: margaery
text: margaery I am his/hers, and she/he is mine. From this day, until the end of my days.

title: High Sparrow
Name: tommen
text: tommen Did I hurt you?

title: High Sparrow
Name: margaery
text: margaery No. You were lovely.

title: High Sparrow
Name: tommen
text: tommen It all happened so fast.

title: High Sparrow
Name: margaery
text: margaery Yes. .

title: High Sparrow
Name: tommen
text: tommen I was scared maybe I hurt you, it sounded

title: High Sparrow
Name: margaery
text: margaery No, no, no. You're very sweet. The sweetest king who ever lived.

title: High Sparrow
Name: tommen
text: tommen This is what I want to do all day, every day for the rest of my life.

title: High Sparrow
Name: margaery
text: margaery Wouldn't that be glorious? . Shouldn't we rest a little while? Just to catch our breath, there's no rush, is there?

title: High Sparrow
Name: tommen
text: tommen Of course not. Are you hungry? Shall I have them bring you some cake or pomegranate juice?

title: High Sparrow
Name: margaery
text: margaery No, I'm fine. I just want you all to myself. I want to know everything there is to know about King Tommen First of His Name.

title: High Sparrow
Name: tommen
text: tommen King Tommen. It still sounds strange to me. Does Queen Margaery sound strange to you?

title: High Sparrow
Name: margaery
text: margaery So strange… Husband.

title: High Sparrow
Name: tommen
text: tommen Wife. . Sometimes it feels odd. I'm the king, I've married the most beautiful woman in the world, , and it's all because my brother died.

title: High Sparrow
Name: margaery
text: margaery I understand. But it's not your fault, you know that, don't you? You mustn't feel guilty.

title: High Sparrow
Name: tommen
text: tommen I don't feel guilty. That's what's odd.

title: High Sparrow
Name: tommen
text: tommen Do you like to sail?

title: High Sparrow
Name: margaery
text: margaery I love to sail.

title: High Sparrow
Name: tommen
text: tommen I do, too.

title: High Sparrow
Name: margaery
text: margaery I think we're going to be very happy, you and I.

title: High Sparrow
Name: margaery
text: margaery Living in a tower so high, it touches the clouds. Of course my grandmother couldn't wait to go home. The capital is not for everyone, I suppose. Does your mother like it here?

title: High Sparrow
Name: tommen
text: tommen I don't think so. She told me never to trust anyone in King's Landing.

title: High Sparrow
Name: margaery
text: margaery It's so wonderful to have her watching over you. A lioness guiding her cub. .

title: High Sparrow
Name: tommen
text: tommen Well, but I'm a man now.

title: High Sparrow
Name: margaery
text: margaery You are. And the king. . But you'll always be her baby-boy.

title: High Sparrow
Name: tommen
text: tommen I suppose.

title: High Sparrow
Name: margaery
text: margaery I adore how she has always been so generous with me, so kind. And the horror she's had to injure. . Losing her husband, her eldest child and her father. It's no wonder she's so protective of you. She'll never let you out of her sight.

title: High Sparrow
Name: cersei
text: cersei You look very much in love. The first days of marriage are often so blissful. She's certainly very pretty, isn't she? Like a doll, she smiles quite a lot. Do you think she's intelligent? I can't quite tell. Not that it matters.

title: High Sparrow
Name: tommen
text: tommen Do you ever miss Casterly Rock?

title: High Sparrow
Name: cersei
text: cersei There's nothing for me in Casterly Rock.

title: High Sparrow
Name: tommen
text: tommen That's where you grew up. . You always told me that you liked the people there better. You said that King's Landing smelled of horse dung and sour milk.

title: High Sparrow
Name: cersei
text: cersei Why are we speaking of Casterly Rock?

title: High Sparrow
Name: tommen
text: tommen The way that you talked about it, I always thought that you missed it. That you... That it was your real home.

title: High Sparrow
Name: cersei
text: cersei This is my real home now. Where my family lives.

title: High Sparrow
Name: tommen
text: tommen I want you to be happy, mother.

title: High Sparrow
Name: cersei
text: cersei I know that. I know you do, my sweet boy.

title: High Sparrow
Name: tommen
text: tommen But wouldn't you be happier in Casterly Rock?

title: High Sparrow
Name: margaery
text: margaery I said, "Darling, surely 4 times is enough, are you trying to set a new record?" . And he said, "Well, what is the record? I'm sure we can break it."

title: High Sparrow
Name: margaery
text: margaery Mother! . Welcome.

title: High Sparrow
Name: cersei
text: cersei Don't you look lovely. Marriage agrees with you.

title: High Sparrow
Name: margaery
text: margaery Can we bring you anything to eat or drink? I wish we had some wine for you. It's a bit early in the day for us.

title: High Sparrow
Name: cersei
text: cersei No, no. I, I can't stay. I just wanted to let you know if, there is ever anything I can do for you.

title: High Sparrow
Name: margaery
text: margaery You are very sweet.

title: High Sparrow
Name: cersei
text: cersei Tommen seems quite taken with his new queen.

title: High Sparrow
Name: margaery
text: margaery I absolutely adore him. You raised a gallant young man. I'm forever grateful.

title: High Sparrow
Name: cersei
text: cersei Good. Good. I'm glad to hear you're happy.

title: High Sparrow
Name: margaery
text: margaery Ecstatic. I really am. Exhausted, to be honest, but what can I expect, he is half lion, half stag. .

title: High Sparrow
Name: cersei
text: cersei I'll leave you to it then. .

title: High Sparrow
Name: margaery
text: margaery Oh, forgive me, I haven't been at Court for long, I get so confused. What's the proper way to address you now? Queen Mother or Dowager Queen?

title: High Sparrow
Name: cersei
text: cersei There's no need for such formalities.

title: High Sparrow
Name: margaery
text: margaery In any event, judging from the King's enthusiasm, the Queen Mother will be a Queen Grandmother soon.

title: High Sparrow
Name: cersei
text: cersei Won't that be a lovely day.

title: High Sparrow
Name: margaery
text: margaery Can you imagine the celebrations? They'll ring the bells all day and night.

title: High Sparrow
Name: cersei
text: cersei Remember. Anything you need.

title: High Sparrow
Name: roose
text: roose We can't hold the North with terror alone.

title: High Sparrow
Name: ramsay
text: ramsay You can't hold the North if you let these lesser lords insult us.

title: High Sparrow
Name: roose
text: roose I sent you there to collect taxes, not bodies.

title: High Sparrow
Name: ramsay
text: ramsay Lord Cerwyn refused to pay. Said the Warden of the North would always be a Stark, and he'd be damned if he kissed a traitor's boot.

title: High Sparrow
Name: roose
text: roose He left you no choice.

title: High Sparrow
Name: ramsay
text: ramsay I flayed him living, along with his wife and brother. Made his son watch.

title: High Sparrow
Name: roose
text: roose And?

title: High Sparrow
Name: ramsay
text: ramsay The new Lord Cerwyn paid his taxes.

title: High Sparrow
Name: roose
text: roose I have something important to tell you. Stop eating and listen.

title: High Sparrow
Name: roose
text: roose We don't have enough men to hold the North if the other Houses rise up against us. Do you understand that?

title: High Sparrow
Name: ramsay
text: ramsay Our pact with the Lannisters protects -

title: High Sparrow
Name: roose
text: roose I had a pact with Tywin Lannister, and Tywin Lannister is dead. The remaining Lannisters are a thousand miles away dealing with that fact. They've never once in the history of the Seven Kingdoms sent their army this far north. If you think they will for us, you're a fool. We become a great house by entering in alliances with other houses, and parleying those alliances into greater power. The best way to forge a lasting alliance isn't by peeling a man's skin off. The best way is marriage. . Now that you're a Bolton by royal decree, it's time you married a suitable bride. And as it happens, I found the perfect girl to solidify our hold in the North.

title: High Sparrow
Name: sansa
text: sansa That's Moat Cailin.

title: High Sparrow
Name: petyr
text: petyr Yes. A bit shabby, isn't it? You've been here before.

title: High Sparrow
Name: sansa
text: sansa On our way down to King's Landing, with my father and Arya and… where are you taking me?

title: High Sparrow
Name: petyr
text: petyr Home.

title: High Sparrow
Name: sansa
text: sansa The Boltons have Winterfell. . The marriage proposal, it wasn't for you?

title: High Sparrow
Name: petyr
text: petyr No.

title: High Sparrow
Name: sansa
text: sansa Roose Bolton murdered my brother. He betrayed my family!

title: High Sparrow
Name: petyr
text: petyr He did.

title: High Sparrow
Name: sansa
text: sansa He serves the Lannisters.

title: High Sparrow
Name: petyr
text: petyr For now.

title: High Sparrow
Name: sansa
text: sansa I won't go.

title: High Sparrow
Name: petyr
text: petyr Winterfell is your home.

title: High Sparrow
Name: sansa
text: sansa Not anymore.

title: High Sparrow
Name: petyr
text: petyr Always. You're a Stark. Dyeing your hair doesn't change that. You're Sansa Stark. The eldest surviving child of Ned and Catelyn Stark. Your place is in the North.

title: High Sparrow
Name: sansa
text: sansa I can't marry him. You can't make me. He's a traitor. A murderer.

title: High Sparrow
Name: petyr
text: petyr You're not marrying Roose Bolton. No, you'll be marrying his son and heir, Ramsay. One day he'll be Warden of the North and you will -

title: High Sparrow
Name: sansa
text: sansa No!

title: High Sparrow
Name: petyr
text: petyr Sansa -

title: High Sparrow
Name: sansa
text: sansa No, you can't make me. I will starve myself. I will die before I have to go there.

title: High Sparrow
Name: petyr
text: petyr I won't force you to do anything. Don't you know by now how much I care for you? Say the word and we turn the horses round, but listen to me. Listen. . You've been running all your life. Terrible things happened to your family and you weep. You sit alone in a darkened room, mourning their fates. You've been a bystander to tragedy from the day they executed your father. Stop being a bystander, do you hear me? Stop running. There's no justice in the world. Not unless we make it. You loved your family. Avenge them.

title: High Sparrow
Name: podrick
text: podrick How do we get through there?

title: High Sparrow
Name: brienne
text: brienne We don't. We go around. .

title: High Sparrow
Name: podrick
text: podrick It sets miles out of the way. We'll lose sight of them.

title: High Sparrow
Name: brienne
text: brienne Doesn't matter. I know where they're going.

title: High Sparrow
Name: brienne
text: brienne Aren't you getting a bit old to be a squire? How did you end up squiring for the Imp?

title: High Sparrow
Name: podrick
text: podrick He hates that nickname.

title: High Sparrow
Name: brienne
text: brienne Well, he's not here to complain about it, is he?

title: High Sparrow
Name: podrick
text: podrick I squired for a knight name Ser Lorimer during the War of the Five Kings. One night, he had a bit too much to drink. And he was famished, so he borrowed a ham.

title: High Sparrow
Name: brienne
text: brienne He borrowed it?

title: High Sparrow
Name: podrick
text: podrick He wasn't a thief. He was drunk and hungry and he wasn't thinking. I was drunk too. He gave me half the ham. Next morning, one of the guards saw him passed out, under a wagon, with the ham bone still in his hand. They hanged the man afternoon. They tied the noose for me too, but, Lord Tywin heard my family name was Payne. So he pardoned me, and sent me to King's Landing to squire for his son.

title: High Sparrow
Name: brienne
text: brienne As punishment. For both of you.

title: High Sparrow
Name: podrick
text: podrick It didn't seem that way. Lord Tyrion was always very good to me.

title: High Sparrow
Name: brienne
text: brienne Yes, all of your lords were very kind to you. All except me. Sorry you have to squire such a nasty person.

title: High Sparrow
Name: podrick
text: podrick I'm not sorry. You're the best fighter I've ever seen. You beat The Hound. I'm proud to be your squire.

title: High Sparrow
Name: brienne
text: brienne I'm sorry I'm always snapping at you.

title: High Sparrow
Name: podrick
text: podrick If you wouldn't snap at me I wouldn't learn anything.

title: High Sparrow
Name: brienne
text: brienne You want to be a knight, Pod?

title: High Sparrow
Name: podrick
text: podrick Yes.

title: High Sparrow
Name: brienne
text: brienne Starting tomorrow, we'll train with the sword twice a day, before we ride in the morning and after we camp for the evening. . And I'm going to show you how to ride properly.

title: High Sparrow
Name: podrick
text: podrick Thank you.

title: High Sparrow
Name: brienne
text: brienne I can't knight you, but I can teach you how to fight.

title: High Sparrow
Name: podrick
text: podrick I suppose that's more important.

title: High Sparrow
Name: podrick
text: podrick You weren't a knight, but you were a Kingsguard to Renly Baratheon, weren't you?

title: High Sparrow
Name: brienne
text: brienne I was.

title: High Sparrow
Name: podrick
text: podrick Lord Tyrion said he was a good man.

title: High Sparrow
Name: brienne
text: brienne He was.

title: High Sparrow
Name: podrick
text: podrick But how did you end up serving Renly?

title: High Sparrow
Name: brienne
text: brienne When I was a girl, my father held a ball. I'm his only living child, so he wants to make a good match for me. He invited dozens of young lords to Tarth. I didn't want to go, but he dragged me to the ballroom. . And it was wonderful. None of the boys noticed how mulish and tall I was. The shoved each other, and threatened to duel if they thought it was their turn to dance. And whispered in my ear how they wanted to marry me and take me back to their castles. . My father smiled at me and I smiled at him. I'd never been so happy. . Till I saw a few of the boys sniggering. And then they all started to laugh, they couldn't keep the game going any longer. They were toying with me. ‘Brienne the Beauty', they called me. Great joke. And I realized I was the ugliest girl alive. A great lumbering beast. I tried to run away, but Renly Baratheon took me in his arms. “Don't let them see your tears,” he told me. “They're nasty little shits. The nasty little shits aren't worth crying over.” He danced with me and none of the other boys could say a word. And he was the king's brother after all.

title: High Sparrow
Name: podrick
text: podrick But wasn't he... Lord Tyrion said he was...

title: High Sparrow
Name: brienne
text: brienne Yes, Pod, he liked men, I'm not an idiot. He didn't love me, he didn't want me, he danced with me because he was kind and he wouldn't see me hurt. He saved me from being a joke. From that day until his last day. And I couldn't save him in return. Nothing's more hateful than failing to protect the one you love. One day, I will avenge King Renly.

title: High Sparrow
Name: podrick
text: podrick But you said a shadow murdered him. How do you fight a shadow?

title: High Sparrow
Name: brienne
text: brienne A shadow with the face of Stannis Baratheon. I know it was Stannis. I know it in my heart. Stannis is a man, not a shadow. And a man can be killed.

title: High Sparrow
Name: stannis
text: stannis Lord Commander.

title: High Sparrow
Name: jon
text: jon Your Grace.

title: High Sparrow
Name: stannis
text: stannis I'd like to speak alone.

title: High Sparrow
Name: jon
text: jon Olly is my steward now, as I was Lord Commander Mormont's. I want him to attend my meetings, to learn from men with experience. One day, he might command.

title: High Sparrow
Name: stannis
text: stannis Very well. . Have you considered my offer?

title: High Sparrow
Name: jon
text: jon I have. And I thank you for it. You do me great honor. All my life I wanted to be Jon Stark.

title: High Sparrow
Name: stannis
text: stannis Say the word and you will be.

title: High Sparrow
Name: jon
text: jon But I have to refuse you. I'm Lord Commander of the Night's Watch. My place is here.

title: High Sparrow
Name: stannis
text: stannis I'm giving you a chance to avenge your family. To take back the castle where you grew up. To rule the North.

title: High Sparrow
Name: jon
text: jon I wish I could fight beside you. Believe me, I do. But I swore a sacred vow at the Godswood. I pledged my life to the Night's Watch.

title: High Sparrow
Name: stannis
text: stannis You're as stubborn as your father. And as honorable.

title: High Sparrow
Name: jon
text: jon I can imagine no higher praise.

title: High Sparrow
Name: stannis
text: stannis I didn't mean it as praise. Honor got your father killed. . But if your mindo s made up, I won't try to persuade you.

title: High Sparrow
Name: jon
text: jon May I ask, Your Grace, how long you plan to stay at Castle Black?

title: High Sparrow
Name: stannis
text: stannis Are you bored of us already?

title: High Sparrow
Name: jon
text: jon You saved us from Mance Rayder's army. We will never forget that. But it's a question of survival. The Night's Watch can't continue to feed your men and the wildling prisoners indefinitely. Winter is coming.

title: High Sparrow
Name: stannis
text: stannis I know it. We march on Winterfell within the fortnight. Before the snows trap us here.

title: High Sparrow
Name: jon
text: jon And the wildlings?

title: High Sparrow
Name: stannis
text: stannis They'd rather burn than fight for me, so be it. I leave their fate to you. You could execute them, that's the safest course. . Or you could see if this Tormund fellow is more willing to compromise than Mance ever was. I assume the brothers of the Night's Watch would rather see the wildlings dead.

title: High Sparrow
Name: jon
text: jon Most of the brothers, yes. There's little love for the free folk here. .

title: High Sparrow
Name: stannis
text: stannis You're the Lord Commander. Your decision.

title: High Sparrow
Name: stannis
text: stannis You have many enemies in Castle Black. Have you considered sending Alliser Thorne elsewhere? Give him command of Eastwatch-by-the-Sea.

title: High Sparrow
Name: jon
text: jon I heard it was best to keep your enemies close.

title: High Sparrow
Name: stannis
text: stannis Whoever said that didn't have many enemies.

title: High Sparrow
Name: davos
text: davos He sees something in you. . Might not be apparent from his tone, but it's the truth. He believes in you.

title: High Sparrow
Name: jon
text: jon I'm sorry I disappointed him.

title: High Sparrow
Name: davos
text: davos The king is a complicated man. But he wants what's right for the Seven Kingdoms.

title: High Sparrow
Name: jon
text: jon As long as he's ruling them.

title: High Sparrow
Name: davos
text: davos He's the one true king. He has the blood right to that throne.

title: High Sparrow
Name: jon
text: jon I've sworn to stay clear of the politics of the Seven Kingdoms.

title: High Sparrow
Name: davos
text: davos Have you now? . How does the Night's Watch vow go again? I bet you've got it memorized since you got here.

title: High Sparrow
Name: olly
text: olly Night gathers and now my watch begins -

title: High Sparrow
Name: davos
text: davos Not that bit, the bit at the end.

title: High Sparrow
Name: olly
text: olly I'm the sword in the darkness, the watcher on the walls, the shield that guards the realm of men. I pledge my life -

title: High Sparrow
Name: davos
text: davos Wait, that's enough. “The shield that guards the realm of men.” That's what you swore to be. Now I'm not a learned man, but the best way of helping the most people might not be sitting in a frozen castle at the edge of the world. It just might mean wading in the muck, getting your boots dirty, and doing what needs to be doing.

title: High Sparrow
Name: jon
text: jon And what needs to be done?

title: High Sparrow
Name: davos
text: davos As long as the Boltons rule the North, , the North will suffer. Just one man's opinion.

title: High Sparrow
Name: arya
text: arya What do you want?

title: High Sparrow
Name: waif
text: waif Who are you?

title: High Sparrow
Name: arya
text: arya What?

title: High Sparrow
Name: waif
text: waif You, who walk in here with a coin you never earned, whose value you do not respect. . Who are you?

title: High Sparrow
Name: arya
text: arya No one.

title: High Sparrow
Name: arya
text: arya Ow! Cunt!

title: High Sparrow
Name: waif
text: waif A lie, a sad little lie. Who are you?

title: High Sparrow
Name: arya
text: arya I told you, I'm no - . Do that again and -

title: High Sparrow
Name: arya
text: arya You're about to find out.

title: High Sparrow
Name: jaqen
text: jaqen What are you doing?

title: High Sparrow
Name: waif
text: waif We were only playing. The game of faces.

title: High Sparrow
Name: jaqen
text: jaqen A girl is not ready.

title: High Sparrow
Name: waif
text: waif Clearly not.

title: High Sparrow
Name: arya
text: arya I am ready.

title: High Sparrow
Name: jaqen
text: jaqen For what? For whatever you want. To be a Faceless Man. To be no one.

title: High Sparrow
Name: jaqen
text: jaqen Whose sword is that? It belongs to Arya Stark. Arya Stark's sword, Arya Stark's clothes, Arya Stark's stolen silver. A man wonders how is it that no one came to be surrounded by Arya Stark's things?

title: High Sparrow
Name: arya
text: arya What do we do with them after we wash them?

title: High Sparrow
Name: man
text: man Open gates!

title: High Sparrow
Name: roose
text: roose Lady Sansa, welcome.

title: High Sparrow
Name: sansa
text: sansa Lord Bolton.

title: High Sparrow
Name: roose
text: roose May I introduce my son, , Ramsay Bolton?

title: High Sparrow
Name: ramsay
text: ramsay It's an honor to meet you, my Lady.

title: High Sparrow
Name: woman
text: woman I'll bring you a bowl of hot water. You must want to wash.

title: High Sparrow
Name: sansa
text: sansa Thank you.

title: High Sparrow
Name: woman
text: woman Welcome home, Lady Stark. The North remembers.

title: High Sparrow
Name: jon
text: jon Sam. . Maester Aemon?

title: High Sparrow
Name: sam
text: sam He apologizes for not being here. He's not feeling well.

title: High Sparrow
Name: jon
text: jon Take good care of him. . Brothers. As you all know too well, it's long past time to dig a new latrine pit. . First Builder Yarwyck and I have decided to appoint a latrine captain to oversee this crucial task. . Brian. Seems like a good job for a ginger.

title: High Sparrow
Name: jon
text: jon Ser Alliser. . You have more experience than any other soldier at Castle Black. You proved your valour many times over, while defending the Wall from the wildling attack. I name you First Ranger.

title: High Sparrow
Name: jon
text: jon Lord Janos. I'm giving you command of Greyguard.

title: High Sparrow
Name: janos
text: janos Greyguard is a ruin.

title: High Sparrow
Name: jon
text: jon Yes, the fort is in a sorry state. Restore it as best you can. First Builder Yarwyck can spare ten of his -

title: High Sparrow
Name: janos
text: janos I was charged with the defense of King's Landing when you were soiling your swaddling clothes. Keep your ruin.

title: High Sparrow
Name: sam
text: sam Alright, alright! Enough of that.

title: High Sparrow
Name: jon
text: jon You mistake me, my Lord. That was a command, not an offer. Pack your arms and armour, say your farewells, and ride for Greyguard.

title: High Sparrow
Name: janos
text: janos I will not go meekly off to freeze and die! Give it to one of the fools who cast a stone for you. I will not have it. Do you hear me, boy? I will not have it!

title: High Sparrow
Name: jon
text: jon Are you refusing to obey my order?

title: High Sparrow
Name: janos
text: janos You can stick your order up your bastard arse.

title: High Sparrow
Name: jon
text: jon Take Lord Janos outside.

title: High Sparrow
Name: jon
text: jon Olly, bring me my sword.

title: High Sparrow
Name: janos
text: janos You cannot do this! Get your hands off me! . Scum, all of you! If the boy thinks he can frighten me, he's mistaken, yes, very mistaken.

title: High Sparrow
Name: janos
text: janos A disgrace! I have friends, important friends in the capital! You'll see!

title: High Sparrow
Name: jon
text: jon If you have any last words, my Lord, now is the time.

title: High Sparrow
Name: janos
text: janos I was wrong. You're the Lord Commander! We all serve you. I'm sorry. Not only for this, for all I've done and said. I was wrong! . My Lord, please, mercy! Mercy! I'll go! I will! Please. I'm afraid. I've always been afraid.

title: High Sparrow
Name: olyvar
text: olyvar You have served us well, my son.

title: High Sparrow
Name: septon
text: septon Thank you, Father.

title: High Sparrow
Name: olyvar
text: olyvar Which of the Seven will you worship today?

title: High Sparrow
Name: septon
text: septon The Maiden.

title: High Sparrow
Name: olyvar
text: olyvar Where is the Maiden?

title: High Sparrow
Name: septon
text: septon And the Stranger.

title: High Sparrow
Name: olyvar
text: olyvar Two is extra, you realize?

title: High Sparrow
Name: septon
text: septon Yes, yes.

title: High Sparrow
Name: olyvar
text: olyvar What are you doing? This establishment belong to Lord Petyr Baelish. You can't -

title: High Sparrow
Name: lancel
text: lancel You have profaned our faith. The faith of our fathers and forefathers.

title: High Sparrow
Name: septon
text: septon I am the High Septon of the -

title: High Sparrow
Name: lancel
text: lancel You are a sinner. And you shall be punished.

title: High Sparrow
Name: crowd
text: crowd Sinner! Sinner! Sinner!

title: High Sparrow
Name: man
text: man Repent!

title: High Sparrow
Name: crowd
text: crowd Sinner! Sinner! Sinner! Sinner! Sinner! Sinner!

title: High Sparrow
Name: man
text: man Shame on you!

title: High Sparrow
Name: crowd
text: crowd Sinner! Sinner!

title: High Sparrow
Name: septon
text: septon Your Grace, , Grandmaester, Lord Tyrell, , uh…

title: High Sparrow
Name: qyburn
text: qyburn It doesn't matter. .

title: High Sparrow
Name: septon
text: septon As the High Septon of the Faith of the Seven I give voice to the will of the Gods and am their foremost servant in this world. An insult to me is an insult to the Gods. An assault on my person, is an assault on our very religion.

title: High Sparrow
Name: cersei
text: cersei You were assaulted?

title: High Sparrow
Name: septon
text: septon I was, by those fanatics who call themselves ‘sparrows'. They humiliated me, they they beat me, they left me naked and bleeding on the cobblestones. I am lucky to be alive.

title: High Sparrow
Name: qyburn
text: qyburn I heard this all began in Littlefinger's brothel.

title: High Sparrow
Name: mace
text: mace High Septon, this is a rather shocking thing to hear.

title: High Sparrow
Name: septon
text: septon I tend to both the highest born, and the lowliest amongst us. Even prostitutes may earn the mercy of the Mother.

title: High Sparrow
Name: qyburn
text: qyburn So you were administering to the needs of these devout prostitutes?

title: High Sparrow
Name: pycelle
text: pycelle A man's private affairs ought to stay private!

title: High Sparrow
Name: cersei
text: cersei What do you want from us, High Septon?

title: High Sparrow
Name: septon
text: septon Justice! I ask that you protect our Faith by arresting these criminals and throwing them in the black cells. I ask that you execute their leader, this so-called High Sparrow. He's a threat to everything we hold sacred. If he goes unpunished -

title: High Sparrow
Name: cersei
text: cersei And where do I find this man? This High Sparrow?

title: High Sparrow
Name: meryn
text: meryn I don't think this is a good idea, Your Grace.

title: High Sparrow
Name: cersei
text: cersei Nonsense, Ser Meryn. These are deeply religious people. . Where can I find the High Sparrow?

title: High Sparrow
Name: man
text: man Seven blessings.

title: High Sparrow
Name: man
text: man Thank you.

title: High Sparrow
Name: man
text: man Just a little more...

title: High Sparrow
Name: woman
text: woman Thank you ever so for the soup!

title: High Sparrow
Name: cersei
text: cersei A young man said I would find the High Sparrow back here. Where is he?

title: High Sparrow
Name: sparrow
text: sparrow High Sparrow? Sounds ridiculous, doesn't it? Like Lord Duckling, or King Turtle. . So, it's meant to. We're often stuck with the names our enemies give to us. . The notion that we are all equal in the eyes of Seven doesn't sit well with some, so they belittle me.

title: High Sparrow
Name: woman
text: woman Seven blessings to you.

title: High Sparrow
Name: sparrow
text: sparrow Seven blessings to you, my dear. It's only a name, quite an easy burden to wear. Far easier than hers. .

title: High Sparrow
Name: cersei
text: cersei Why no shoes?

title: High Sparrow
Name: sparrow
text: sparrow Because I gave them away to someone who needed them more. We all do that. It stops us from forgetting what we really are.

title: High Sparrow
Name: cersei
text: cersei Is that why you came to King's Landing? To remind everyone?

title: High Sparrow
Name: sparrow
text: sparrow Everyone? I have a hard enough job reminding myself. Oh, I tell them no one's special. And they think I'm special for telling them so.

title: High Sparrow
Name: cersei
text: cersei Perhaps they're right.

title: High Sparrow
Name: sparrow
text: sparrow It would be comforting to believe that, wouldn't it? The Gods sent you here to tempt me? I hope not. I had assumed you'd only come here to arrest me. For that incident with the High Septon.

title: High Sparrow
Name: cersei
text: cersei An unacceptable way to treat the chosen representative of the Gods in this world, wouldn't you say?

title: High Sparrow
Name: sparrow
text: sparrow Hypocrisy is a boil. Lancing a is never pleasant. Although, they could have been more careful with the blade.

title: High Sparrow
Name: cersei
text: cersei The High Septon came to speak to me today. He doesn't want me to arrest you, he wants me to execute you.

title: High Sparrow
Name: sparrow
text: sparrow I wouldn't presume to know your thoughts on the matter.

title: High Sparrow
Name: cersei
text: cersei My thoughts on the matter align with your own. The High Septon's behaviour was corrosive, as was his attitude. Having a man like that reside in the Sept eats away the Faith from the inside. So now he resides in the Red Keep's dungeons instead. . The Faith and the Crown are the two pillars that hold up this world. If one collapses, so does the other. We must do everything necessary to protect one another.

title: High Sparrow
Name: qyburn
text: qyburn Your Grace.

title: High Sparrow
Name: cersei
text: cersei Send a raven with this message to Littlefinger in the Eyrie, or wherever he's slithering about. .

title: High Sparrow
Name: qyburn
text: qyburn At once, Your Grace. .

title: High Sparrow
Name: cersei
text: cersei How's your work coming along?

title: High Sparrow
Name: qyburn
text: qyburn Very well.

title: High Sparrow
Name: cersei
text: cersei You've made progress?

title: High Sparrow
Name: qyburn
text: qyburn More than I've expected. Still a way to go, but…

title: High Sparrow
Name: cersei
text: cersei Very good. I'll leave you to it then. Make sure Littlefinger is clear on the meaning of the word "immediately".

title: High Sparrow
Name: qyburn
text: qyburn Shh. Easy, friend.

title: High Sparrow
Name: ramsay
text: ramsay She really is lovely. I hope I can make her happy.

title: High Sparrow
Name: petyr
text: petyr I hope so too. I've become quite fond of Lady Sansa during our travels together. She's suffered enough.

title: High Sparrow
Name: ramsay
text: ramsay I'll never hurt her. You have my word.

title: High Sparrow
Name: petyr
text: petyr I've heard very little about you. Which makes you quite a rare thing, as lords go.

title: High Sparrow
Name: ramsay
text: ramsay I haven't been a lord very long. I was a bastard.

title: High Sparrow
Name: roose
text: roose And you're not anymore. Allow me a moment alone with Lord Baelish.

title: High Sparrow
Name: ramsay
text: ramsay Yes, father. And thank you, Lord Baelish. I'm forever in your debt. .

title: High Sparrow
Name: petyr
text: petyr He seems pleased.

title: High Sparrow
Name: roose
text: roose Shouldn't he be?

title: High Sparrow
Name: petyr
text: petyr I assure you she's still a virgin. Tyrion never consummated the marriage. By the law of the land, she's no man's wife. Inspect her, if you must.

title: High Sparrow
Name: roose
text: roose I leave that to the brothel keeper. It's her name I need, not her virtue.

title: High Sparrow
Name: petyr
text: petyr Then I have delivered everything I've promised.

title: High Sparrow
Name: roose
text: roose And you prepared for the consequences. When the Lannisters hear I've wed Sansa Stark to Ramsay.

title: High Sparrow
Name: petyr
text: petyr The Lannister name doesn't mean what it once did. Tywin is dead. He kept his house in power through sheer will. Without him, Jaime has one hand and no allies, Tommen is a soft boy, not a king to fear.

title: High Sparrow
Name: roose
text: roose The Queen will be enraged.

title: High Sparrow
Name: petyr
text: petyr Queen Margaery adores Sansa. Cersei is Queen Mother, a title whose importance wanes with each passing day.

title: High Sparrow
Name: roose
text: roose And yet she still has friends. Men in important places, whom she can ask for favours. . A message for you, from Cersei Lannister. A rider arrived from Eyrie, shortly before dawn. Apparently, she thinks you're still in the Vale.

title: High Sparrow
Name: petyr
text: petyr A message for me, you say. Strange that the seal is broken.

title: High Sparrow
Name: roose
text: roose I'm sure you understand my position, Lord Baelish. If you received word in the night from the Queen Mother, it does make me question our new alliance. The Lannisters made you one of the great lords of Westeros. Yet, here you are in the North, undermining them. Why gamble with your position?

title: High Sparrow
Name: petyr
text: petyr Every ambitious move is a gamble. You gambled when you drove a dagger into Robb Stark's heart. It appears that your gamble paid off. You're Warden of the North.

title: High Sparrow
Name: roose
text: roose I had Tywin Lannister backing. Who supports me now? You?

title: High Sparrow
Name: petyr
text: petyr The Eyrie is mine. The last time the lords of the Eyrie formed an alliance with the lords of the North, they brought down the greatest dynasty this world has ever known. I'd like to borrow one of your birds. Cersei will expect a reply.

title: High Sparrow
Name: roose
text: roose I'd like to read the reply.

title: High Sparrow
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion I have to get out of this wheelhouse.

title: High Sparrow
Name: varys
text: varys Volantis is a large city.

title: High Sparrow
Name: varys
text: varys The likelihood of you being spotted here increases a hundredfold.

title: High Sparrow
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion Mm, I have to get out of this wheelhouse.

title: High Sparrow
Name: varys
text: varys I'm not sure how many new ways I can find of saying this.

title: High Sparrow
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion I will not be of any use to Daenerys Targaryen if I lose my mind. I can't remember the last face I saw that wasn't yours.

title: High Sparrow
Name: varys
text: varys It's a perfectly good face.

title: High Sparrow
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion I'm losing my mind.

title: High Sparrow
Name: varys
text: varys If anyone recognizes you, you'll lose more than that.

title: High Sparrow
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion Look, we are thousands of miles from Westeros. . What am I? . One more drunk dwarf.

title: High Sparrow
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion Slaves.

title: High Sparrow
Name: varys
text: varys Yes. The Volantene masters are very organized. . Flies for dung shovelers. . Hammers for builders. . Tears for whores. Lest they forget.

title: High Sparrow
Name: priestess
text: priestess Lord cast your light upon us.

title: High Sparrow
Name: crowd
text: crowd Lord cast your light upon us.

title: High Sparrow
Name: priestess
text: priestess For the night is dark and full of terrors.

title: High Sparrow
Name: varys
text: varys We should keep moving.

title: High Sparrow
Name: crowd
text: crowd For the night is dark and full of terrors.

title: High Sparrow
Name: priestess
text: priestess I was once as you are now.

title: High Sparrow
Name: priestess
text: priestess Bought and sold, , scourged and branded...

title: High Sparrow
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion The only red priest we had in King's Landing was Thoros of Myr. This one's much better looking.

title: High Sparrow
Name: priestess
text: priestess The Lord of Light hears your voice. He hears the king as he hears the slave; he hears the Stone Men in their misery...

title: High Sparrow
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion Stone men. Good luck stopping this spread of grayscale with prayer. You'd have better luck dancing away the plague. .

title: High Sparrow
Name: priestess
text: priestess He has sent you a saviour! From the fire she was reborn to remake the world! The Dragon Queen!

title: High Sparrow
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion We're going to meet the Saviour! You should have told me. Who doesn't want to meet the Saviour?

title: High Sparrow
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion Come on. Let's find a brothel.

title: High Sparrow
Name: man
text: man It's good luck to rub a dwarf's head.

title: High Sparrow
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion It's even better luck to suck a dwarf's cock.

title: High Sparrow
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion See? We blend right in. Just two more travellers, mad with lust.

title: High Sparrow
Name: varys
text: varys Thank you.

title: High Sparrow
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion Curious... hair. .

title: High Sparrow
Name: man
text: man The mother of dragons!

title: High Sparrow
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion It appears you're not the only Targaryen supporter.

title: High Sparrow
Name: varys
text: varys Someone who inspires priests and whores is worth taking seriously.

title: High Sparrow
Name: man
text: man What makes you worth that much?

title: High Sparrow
Name: blonde
text: blonde I'm magic. .

title: High Sparrow
Name: man
text: man I bet you bloody are.

title: High Sparrow
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion Well, , she's taken.

title: High Sparrow
Name: varys
text: varys Where're you going?

title: High Sparrow
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion I need to speak to someone with hair.

title: High Sparrow
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion Hello?

title: High Sparrow
Name: black
text: black Hello.

title: High Sparrow
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion You've got no drink.

title: High Sparrow
Name: black
text: black You've got no money.

title: High Sparrow
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion Do I look like a man without money? . Never trust looks. Until quite recently, I was one of the richest men in the world. . But who needs wealth when you can make a woman laugh? . I always pay my debts, I'm well known for it.

title: High Sparrow
Name: black
text: black You like her? They all like her. They all want to fuck a queen.

title: High Sparrow
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion That's because they've never met a queen.

title: High Sparrow
Name: black
text: black You're just saying that.

title: High Sparrow
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion You know how to spot a liar. If I could pick any girl here, I would pick you.

title: High Sparrow
Name: black
text: black Why?

title: High Sparrow
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion Because you have a skeptical mind.

title: High Sparrow
Name: black
text: black Alright, then. I'm warning you. We're gonna have to wash you first.

title: High Sparrow
Name: black
text: black Come on.

title: High Sparrow
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion I'm, I'm sorry, I can't.

title: High Sparrow
Name: black
text: black Of course you can. You're shy.

title: High Sparrow
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion I'm not.

title: High Sparrow
Name: black
text: black Have another drink.

title: High Sparrow
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion Gladly, but this, I can't do. Believe me, no one is more shocked than I am. I hope it passes. What will I do in my spare time? I'll go for a piss, that's a start.

title: High Sparrow
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion No need to worry, I was just - . Oh, I thought you were someone else. Shows almost over. I'm sure the girls inside will be happy to oblige.

title: High Sparrow
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion You made some kind of mistake. Why don't you tell me what you think you are doing and -

title: High Sparrow
Name: jorah
text: jorah I'm taking you to the Queen.

title: High Sparrow
Name: end
text: end EPISODE

title: Sons of the Harpy
Name: jaime
text: jaime Is that Estermont?

title: Sons of the Harpy
Name: captain
text: captain Tarth, Ser Jaime. . The Sapphire Isle.

title: Sons of the Harpy
Name: bronn
text: bronn Why are we on a merchant ship? Why no Lannister sails?

title: Sons of the Harpy
Name: jaime
text: jaime This ship's sailing to Oldtown. We'll get off earlier, not far from Sunspear. Row ourselves to the Dornish shores in the night.

title: Sons of the Harpy
Name: bronn
text: bronn You ever been to Dorne?

title: Sons of the Harpy
Name: jaime
text: jaime No.

title: Sons of the Harpy
Name: bronn
text: bronn I have. The Dornish are crazy. All they want to do is fight and fuck. Fuck and fight.

title: Sons of the Harpy
Name: jaime
text: jaime You should be happy to go back. .

title: Sons of the Harpy
Name: bronn
text: bronn There's nothing like a good fight to get you in the mood for fucking. . And there's nothing like a fuck-mad Dornish girl to clear your head for the next fight. It's how the two work together. And we're gonna do a lot of fighting, I am sure. Well, I am. But I don't imagine we'll get to stick around for the rest. Not after we've kidnapped their princess.

title: Sons of the Harpy
Name: jaime
text: jaime We are not kidnapping their princess. We are rescuing my niece, bringing her back to the family,

title: Sons of the Harpy
Name: bronn
text: bronn Your niece?

title: Sons of the Harpy
Name: bronn
text: bronn I've been doing this sort of thing a long time. I'm good at it. .

title: Sons of the Harpy
Name: jaime
text: jaime That's why you're here.

title: Sons of the Harpy
Name: bronn
text: bronn I know. Why are you here? Why not send 40 of me, or an army? Unlike most folks, you actually got one.

title: Sons of the Harpy
Name: jaime
text: jaime Because I don't want to start a war.

title: Sons of the Harpy
Name: bronn
text: bronn That still doesn't explain why you're doing it.

title: Sons of the Harpy
Name: jaime
text: jaime It has to be me.

title: Sons of the Harpy
Name: bronn
text: bronn If I'm putting something of a lit together, a one-handed man, , who happens to be one of the most recognizable faces in Westeros, is not -

title: Sons of the Harpy
Name: bronn
text: bronn You set your brother free, didn't you? I bet your sister didn't like that.

title: Sons of the Harpy
Name: jaime
text: jaime Varys set him free.

title: Sons of the Harpy
Name: bronn
text: bronn Well, if you ever see the little fucker, , give him my regards.

title: Sons of the Harpy
Name: jaime
text: jaime He murdered my father. If I ever see him, I'll split him in two. And then I'll give him your regards.

title: Sons of the Harpy
Name: mace
text: mace The Iron Bank has called one tenth of the Crown's debts. Given the expense of rebuilding the royal -

title: Sons of the Harpy
Name: cersei
text: cersei How much can the Crown afford?

title: Sons of the Harpy
Name: mace
text: mace With winter coming, half what they ask. Less.

title: Sons of the Harpy
Name: cersei
text: cersei You're the Master of Coin. How do we pay them?

title: Sons of the Harpy
Name: mace
text: mace Well, House Tyrell could front the gold, and the the Crown will pay us back in time, or I'll have words with my daughter.

title: Sons of the Harpy
Name: cersei
text: cersei You've already given us too much. . No, we must arrange better terms with the Iron Bank.

title: Sons of the Harpy
Name: mace
text: mace Absolutely.

title: Sons of the Harpy
Name: cersei
text: cersei In person.

title: Sons of the Harpy
Name: mace
text: mace Me? .

title: Sons of the Harpy
Name: cersei
text: cersei We must send an envoy to the Iron Bank, someone of importance, to show these bankers our respect. As the King's Master of Coin, I can think of no one more qualified.

title: Sons of the Harpy
Name: mace
text: mace I will be honored, Your Grace.

title: Sons of the Harpy
Name: cersei
text: cersei The King has expressed concern about his father-in-law's safety on this voyage. . He's ordered Ser Meryn to personally lead your escort.

title: Sons of the Harpy
Name: mace
text: mace My very own Kingsguard? Please express -

title: Sons of the Harpy
Name: cersei
text: cersei Safe travels, Lord Tyrell.

title: Sons of the Harpy
Name: mace
text: mace Of course, of course, . I'll give your regards to the Titan of Braavos.

title: Sons of the Harpy
Name: pycelle
text: pycelle The Small Council grows smaller and smaller.

title: Sons of the Harpy
Name: cersei
text: cersei Not small enough.

title: Sons of the Harpy
Name: cersei
text: cersei May I offer you some wine, Your Holiness?

title: Sons of the Harpy
Name: sparrow
text: sparrow No. .

title: Sons of the Harpy
Name: cersei
text: cersei The old High Septon would have asked the vintage. .

title: Sons of the Harpy
Name: sparrow
text: sparrow I could say that our minds are temples to the Seven and should be kept pure. But the truth is, , I don't like the taste.

title: Sons of the Harpy
Name: cersei
text: cersei Hmm.

title: Sons of the Harpy
Name: sparrow
text: sparrow How may I serve?

title: Sons of the Harpy
Name: cersei
text: cersei All over Westeros we hear about septs being burned. Silent sisters raped. Bodies of holy men piled in the streets.

title: Sons of the Harpy
Name: sparrow
text: sparrow Wars teach people to obey the sword, not the Gods.

title: Sons of the Harpy
Name: cersei
text: cersei Perhaps the Gods need a sword of their own. . In the days before the Targaryens, the Faith Militant dispensed the justice of the Seven.

title: Sons of the Harpy
Name: sparrow
text: sparrow Well, the Faith Militant was disarmed more than two centuries ago.

title: Sons of the Harpy
Name: cersei
text: cersei If I explain the holy purpose to my son, the king, I have no doubt he will sign a decree arming the believers you felt worthy.

title: Sons of the Harpy
Name: sparrow
text: sparrow An army that defends the bodies and souls of the common people.

title: Sons of the Harpy
Name: cersei
text: cersei An army and service to the Gods themselves. And to you, of course. As the chosen representative of the Seven.

title: Sons of the Harpy
Name: sparrow
text: sparrow An honor I never expected. Or indeed, ever wished for.

title: Sons of the Harpy
Name: cersei
text: cersei Which is why you were chosen. . You and I both know how the world works. Too often the wicked are the wealthiest, beyond the reach of justice. The king himself cannot always punish those who deserve it most.

title: Sons of the Harpy
Name: sparrow
