text: trystane He won't. You've waited long enough. I want you to be my wife now. What is it?

title: Unbowed, Unbent, Unbroken
Name: myrcella
text: myrcella Do you want to marry me because our families arranged it, or do you…

title: Unbowed, Unbent, Unbroken
Name: myrcella
text: myrcella We can't. Not yet.

title: Unbowed, Unbent, Unbroken
Name: trystane
text: trystane Why not?

title: Unbowed, Unbent, Unbroken
Name: myrcella
text: myrcella You know why not. Someone will see.

title: Unbowed, Unbent, Unbroken
Name: trystane
text: trystane You are going to be my wife. I am going to be your husband. We are allowed to walk through the gardens together.

title: Unbowed, Unbent, Unbroken
Name: myrcella
text: myrcella How many other girls have you walked through these gardens?

title: Unbowed, Unbent, Unbroken
Name: trystane
text: trystane I like the way your eyes go squinty when you're jealous.

title: Unbowed, Unbent, Unbroken
Name: myrcella
text: myrcella They don't go squinty, and you didnt answer the question.

title: Unbowed, Unbent, Unbroken
Name: doran
text: doran They make a lovely couple. A Lannister and a Martell. They have no idea how dangerous that is. We must protect them.

title: Unbowed, Unbent, Unbroken
Name: areo
text: areo Yes, my prince.

title: Unbowed, Unbent, Unbroken
Name: doran
text: doran You have not had to use that axe of yours in a very long time. I hope you remember how.

title: Unbowed, Unbent, Unbroken
Name: areo
text: areo I remember how.

title: Unbowed, Unbent, Unbroken
Name: bronn
text: bronn The Dornishman's wife was as fair as the sun and her kisses were warmer than spring. The Dornishman's blade it was made of black steel and its kiss was a terrible thing. The Dornishman's wife would sing as she bathed in a voice that was sweet as a peach...

title: Unbowed, Unbent, Unbroken
Name: jaime
text: jaime Alright, thats enough.

title: Unbowed, Unbent, Unbroken
Name: bronn
text: bronn I'm coming to the best part.

title: Unbowed, Unbent, Unbroken
Name: jaime
text: jaime We're trying to blend in. We don't want everyone in Dorne to hear your accent.

title: Unbowed, Unbent, Unbroken
Name: bronn
text: bronn This song really is all about the ending.

title: Unbowed, Unbent, Unbroken
Name: jaime
text: jaime It can wait. Up there.

title: Unbowed, Unbent, Unbroken
Name: jaime
text: jaime That's the Water Gardens.

title: Unbowed, Unbent, Unbroken
Name: bronn
text: bronn Once we got the princess, then what?

title: Unbowed, Unbent, Unbroken
Name: jaime
text: jaime I like to improvise.

title: Unbowed, Unbent, Unbroken
Name: bronn
text: bronn That explains the golden hand.

title: Unbowed, Unbent, Unbroken
Name: ellaria
text: ellaria Unbowed, unbent, unbroken. For Oberyn.

title: Unbowed, Unbent, Unbroken
Name: sand
text: sand For Oberyn.

title: Unbowed, Unbent, Unbroken
Name: bronn
text: bronn Well, she's made herself at home.

title: Unbowed, Unbent, Unbroken
Name: jaime
text: jaime Myrcella.

title: Unbowed, Unbent, Unbroken
Name: myrcella
text: myrcella Uncle Jaime? I don't understand, what are you doing here?

title: Unbowed, Unbent, Unbroken
Name: jaime
text: jaime Let's speak in private.

title: Unbowed, Unbent, Unbroken
Name: trystane
text: trystane I am Trystane Martell.

title: Unbowed, Unbent, Unbroken
Name: myrcella
text: myrcella Trystane is my intended.

title: Unbowed, Unbent, Unbroken
Name: jaime
text: jaime Excellent. Good to meet you.

title: Unbowed, Unbent, Unbroken
Name: trystane
text: trystane We weren't expecting you, Ser Jaime.

title: Unbowed, Unbent, Unbroken
Name: bronn
text: bronn Why don't you let them have some time alone, son?

title: Unbowed, Unbent, Unbroken
Name: bronn
text: bronn Let's not do something stupid.

title: Unbowed, Unbent, Unbroken
Name: myrcella
text: myrcella No!

title: Unbowed, Unbent, Unbroken
Name: bronn
text: bronn That was something stupid.

title: Unbowed, Unbent, Unbroken
Name: jaime
text: jaime We have to go, Myrcella, now.

title: Unbowed, Unbent, Unbroken
Name: myrcella
text: myrcella You hurt him!

title: Unbowed, Unbent, Unbroken
Name: jaime
text: jaime You'll be fine, I promise, but we have to--

title: Unbowed, Unbent, Unbroken
Name: bronn
text: bronn Oh for fuck's sake.

title: Unbowed, Unbent, Unbroken
Name: obara
text: obara You're coming with me.

title: Unbowed, Unbent, Unbroken
Name: myrcella
text: myrcella I don't want to!

title: Unbowed, Unbent, Unbroken
Name: obara
text: obara I wasn't asking, princess.

title: Unbowed, Unbent, Unbroken
Name: areo
text: areo Drop you weapons!

title: Unbowed, Unbent, Unbroken
Name: obara
text: obara I am Obara Sand. Daughter of Oberyn Martell. I fight for Dorne. Who do you fight for?

title: Unbowed, Unbent, Unbroken
Name: areo
text: areo Drop your weapons!

title: Unbowed, Unbent, Unbroken
Name: areo
text: areo When you were whole, it would have been a good fight.

title: Unbowed, Unbent, Unbroken
Name: bronn
text: bronn You fight pretty good for a little girl.

title: Unbowed, Unbent, Unbroken
Name: rider
text: rider Halt!

title: Unbowed, Unbent, Unbroken
Name: olenna
text: olenna Oh! You can smell the shit from 5 miles away. Well, why are we stopped, go on.

title: Unbowed, Unbent, Unbroken
Name: olenna
text: olenna Rumors and gossip, that's all they got. It's theater, nothing more. If they arrested all the pillow biters in King's Landing there'd be no room left in the dungeons for anyone else.

title: Unbowed, Unbent, Unbroken
Name: margaery
text: margaery Everyone knew about him and Renly.

title: Unbowed, Unbent, Unbroken
Name: olenna
text: olenna Renly Baratheon shagged half the stable boys in the Seven Kingdoms. Everyone knew. No one cared.

title: Unbowed, Unbent, Unbroken
Name: margaery
text: margaery But he was the king's brother.

title: Unbowed, Unbent, Unbroken
Name: olenna
text: olenna And Loras is the queen's brother. No, no, no, no, this is unacceptable.

title: Unbowed, Unbent, Unbroken
Name: margaery
text: margaery Cersei is behind this.

title: Unbowed, Unbent, Unbroken
Name: olenna
text: olenna Of course she is. She wants to drag our names through the dirt. Put us in our place. Get some rest, dear, you look appalling. Let me deal with Cersei Lannister.

title: Unbowed, Unbent, Unbroken
Name: olenna
text: olenna Your Grace, I have travelled a long way.

title: Unbowed, Unbent, Unbroken
Name: cersei
text: cersei You must be exhausted.

title: Unbowed, Unbent, Unbroken
Name: olenna
text: olenna Put the pen down, dear, we all know you aren't writing anything.

title: Unbowed, Unbent, Unbroken
Name: cersei
text: cersei Ah, yes, the famously tart-tongued queen of thorns.

title: Unbowed, Unbent, Unbroken
Name: olenna
text: olenna And the famous tart Queen Cersei.

title: Unbowed, Unbent, Unbroken
Name: cersei
text: cersei Beg your pardon.

title: Unbowed, Unbent, Unbroken
Name: olenna
text: olenna I know you're behind this absurd incarceration of my grandson.

title: Unbowed, Unbent, Unbroken
Name: cersei
text: cersei If you apologize for that comment perhaps--

title: Unbowed, Unbent, Unbroken
Name: olenna
text: olenna You'll get your apology when I get Loras.

title: Unbowed, Unbent, Unbroken
Name: cersei
text: cersei I was as shocked as anyone when The Faith arrested Ser Loras. I have no love for these fanatics. But what can the queen mother do?

title: Unbowed, Unbent, Unbroken
Name: olenna
text: olenna Has the crown suddenly stopped needing the troops, gold, and wheat my house supplies?

title: Unbowed, Unbent, Unbroken
Name: cersei
text: cersei I assure you our alliance with House Tyrell remains--

title: Unbowed, Unbent, Unbroken
Name: olenna
text: olenna Do you expect the alliance to continue after you've thrown our future into prison?

title: Unbowed, Unbent, Unbroken
Name: cersei
text: cersei As I said, i didn't imprison anyone. As for your veiled threats--

title: Unbowed, Unbent, Unbroken
Name: olenna
text: olenna What veil?

title: Unbowed, Unbent, Unbroken
Name: cersei
text: cersei The Lannister-Tyrell alliance brought peace to a war-torn country. Do you really want to see the Seven Kingdoms slide back into warfare?

title: Unbowed, Unbent, Unbroken
Name: olenna
text: olenna I didn't trust your father. I didn't particularly like him. But I respected him. He was no fool. He understood that sometimes we must work with our rivals rather than destroy them.

title: Unbowed, Unbent, Unbroken
Name: cersei
text: cersei House Lannister has no rival. The High Septon has called for an inquest, not a trial. Just a small hearing to determine whether the charges against Loras have merit, which I'm sure they don't. Loras will be freed, our happy alliance will continue, and we'll forget this unfortunate conversation ever happened. Good day, Lady Olenna.

title: Unbowed, Unbent, Unbroken
Name: sparrow
text: sparrow You are aware of the rumors concerning you and Renly?

title: Unbowed, Unbent, Unbroken
Name: loras
text: loras I don't pay attention to rumors.

title: Unbowed, Unbent, Unbroken
Name: sparrow
text: sparrow You were said to be despondent when he died. Witnesses said that you refused to leave his bedside, even as Stannis' army closed in

title: Unbowed, Unbent, Unbroken
Name: loras
text: loras He was my friend. He was my king.

title: Unbowed, Unbent, Unbroken
Name: sparrow
text: sparrow Wasn't Joffrey your king? He was anointed by the 7, not Renly.

title: Unbowed, Unbent, Unbroken
Name: loras
text: loras I was wrong to support Renly's claim. I know that. But I was forgiven by Joffrey. I fought for him at the Battle of the Blackwater.

title: Unbowed, Unbent, Unbroken
Name: sparrow
text: sparrow Wearing Renly's armor.

title: Unbowed, Unbent, Unbroken
Name: loras
text: loras Why does it matter what I wore?

title: Unbowed, Unbent, Unbroken
Name: sparrow
text: sparrow Do you deny all of the charges against you? Fornication, buggery, blasphemy.

title: Unbowed, Unbent, Unbroken
Name: loras
text: loras Of course I deny them.

title: Unbowed, Unbent, Unbroken
Name: sparrow
text: sparrow You never lay with Renly Baratheon.

title: Unbowed, Unbent, Unbroken
Name: loras
text: loras Never.

title: Unbowed, Unbent, Unbroken
Name: sparrow
text: sparrow Nor any other man.

title: Unbowed, Unbent, Unbroken
Name: sparrow
text: sparrow That will be all Ser Loras.

title: Unbowed, Unbent, Unbroken
Name: olenna
text: olenna Well I think that's quite enough of that.

title: Unbowed, Unbent, Unbroken
Name: sparrow
text: sparrow Faith calls Queen Margaery forward.

title: Unbowed, Unbent, Unbroken
Name: margaery
text: margaery You call me forward?

title: Unbowed, Unbent, Unbroken
Name: sparrow
text: sparrow Yes. We have some questions for you.

title: Unbowed, Unbent, Unbroken
Name: margaery
text: margaery I am the queen.

title: Unbowed, Unbent, Unbroken
Name: sparrow
text: sparrow You are. And according to Law of the Seven, neither kings nor queens are exempt from testimony at a holy inquest.

title: Unbowed, Unbent, Unbroken
Name: sparrow
text: sparrow How do you respond to these charges against your brother?

title: Unbowed, Unbent, Unbroken
Name: margaery
text: margaery They are lies.

title: Unbowed, Unbent, Unbroken
Name: sparrow
text: sparrow All of them?

title: Unbowed, Unbent, Unbroken
Name: margaery
text: margaery All of them.

title: Unbowed, Unbent, Unbroken
Name: sparrow
text: sparrow Queen Margaery, in the presence of the gods, do you swear that your brother is innocent of these charges against him, to the best of your knowledge?

title: Unbowed, Unbent, Unbroken
Name: margaery
text: margaery Yes, I swear it.

title: Unbowed, Unbent, Unbroken
Name: sparrow
text: sparrow Thank you, your grace.

title: Unbowed, Unbent, Unbroken
Name: sparrow
text: sparrow Do you know this man?

title: Unbowed, Unbent, Unbroken
Name: olyvar
text: olyvar Yes, very well. He is Ser Loras Tyrell, heir to Highgarden.

title: Unbowed, Unbent, Unbroken
Name: sparrow
text: sparrow How did you come to meet?

title: Unbowed, Unbent, Unbroken
Name: olyvar
text: olyvar I squired for him. He took a liking to me. He summoned me to his chamber the first day we met.

title: Unbowed, Unbent, Unbroken
Name: sparrow
text: sparrow And what occurred in his chamber?

title: Unbowed, Unbent, Unbroken
Name: olyvar
text: olyvar We engaged in intimate relations.

title: Unbowed, Unbent, Unbroken
Name: sparrow
text: sparrow You laid with him?

title: Unbowed, Unbent, Unbroken
Name: olyvar
text: olyvar That night and many others.

title: Unbowed, Unbent, Unbroken
Name: loras
text: loras Liar! He's a liar!

title: Unbowed, Unbent, Unbroken
Name: sparrow
text: sparrow Is there anyone else who can support your claim?

title: Unbowed, Unbent, Unbroken
Name: olyvar
text: olyvar Yes, yes, Queen Margaery. She walked in on us once not long ago. She didn't seem surprised.

title: Unbowed, Unbent, Unbroken
Name: cersei
text: cersei This testimony is an insult to a great house. Why should The Faith or anyone else take the word of a squire over the heir to Highgarden?

title: Unbowed, Unbent, Unbroken
Name: olyvar
text: olyvar He has a birthmark, your grace. Quite high on his thigh, wine-colored, and roughly the shape of Dorne.

title: Unbowed, Unbent, Unbroken
Name: loras
text: loras Liar!

title: Unbowed, Unbent, Unbroken
Name: olenna
text: olenna What are you doing? Let us pass.

title: Unbowed, Unbent, Unbroken
Name: sparrow
text: sparrow The Faith is satisfied that there is enough evidence to bring a formal trial for Ser Loras... and Queen Margaery.

title: Unbowed, Unbent, Unbroken
Name: margaery
text: margaery What?

title: Unbowed, Unbent, Unbroken
Name: sparrow
text: sparrow Bearing false witness before the gods is as grave a sin as any. Take her.

title: Unbowed, Unbent, Unbroken
Name: margaery
text: margaery Tommen! Tommen!

title: Unbowed, Unbent, Unbroken
Name: margaery
text: margaery You can't do this, I am the queen! Tommen, Tommen! I am your queen, how dare you!

title: Unbowed, Unbent, Unbroken
Name: sansa
text: sansa What do you want?

title: Unbowed, Unbent, Unbroken
Name: myranda
text: myranda Lord Ramsay sent me to draw your bath, my lady. You want to be clean and fresh for your new husband don't you?

title: Unbowed, Unbent, Unbroken
Name: myranda
text: myranda You're so beautiful. But if you need to keep him happy. Ramsay gets bored easily. You dont want to end up like... Well, like the others.

title: Unbowed, Unbent, Unbroken
Name: sansa
text: sansa What others?

title: Unbowed, Unbent, Unbroken
Name: myranda
text: myranda I shouldn't gossip. It's good to see the red again. No point in hiding anymore.

title: Unbowed, Unbent, Unbroken
Name: myranda
text: myranda Let's see. There was Kiera. The blacksmith's daughter. She was tall. Like you. Lovely figure. But she talked and talked and talked and… Ramsay got tired of that. Then there was Violet. She had gorgeous blond hair. But she got pregnant and, well, that was boring. Then Tamsay. Such a sweet girl. Of course sweet girls get a bit dull after a while, don't they? Ramsay let me come with him on that hunt.

title: Unbowed, Unbent, Unbroken
Name: sansa
text: sansa Hunt?

title: Unbowed, Unbent, Unbroken
Name: myranda
text: myranda Mm. Have you ever seen a body after the dogs have been at it? Not so pretty. But it's your wedding day, why am I talking about such things?

title: Unbowed, Unbent, Unbroken
Name: sansa
text: sansa What was your name again?

title: Unbowed, Unbent, Unbroken
Name: myranda
text: myranda Myranda.

title: Unbowed, Unbent, Unbroken
Name: sansa
text: sansa And how long have you loved him, Myranda. Did you imagine that he would be with you forever, is that it? Then I came along and ruined it. I am Sansa Stark of Winterfell. This is my home and you can't frighten me.

title: Unbowed, Unbent, Unbroken
Name: myranda
text: myranda Are you done with your bath, my lady?

title: Unbowed, Unbent, Unbroken
Name: sansa
text: sansa Go. I can finish on my own.

title: Unbowed, Unbent, Unbroken
Name: sansa
text: sansa Yes?

title: Unbowed, Unbent, Unbroken
Name: theon
text: theon I've come to escort you to the Godswood, my lady. If you please, my lady, will you take my arm?

title: Unbowed, Unbent, Unbroken
Name: sansa
text: sansa No.

title: Unbowed, Unbent, Unbroken
Name: theon
text: theon Lord Ramsay, he said I'm to take your arm.

title: Unbowed, Unbent, Unbroken
Name: sansa
text: sansa I'm not touching you.

title: Unbowed, Unbent, Unbroken
Name: theon
text: theon Please. He'll punish me.

title: Unbowed, Unbent, Unbroken
Name: sansa
text: sansa Do you think I care what he does to you.

title: Unbowed, Unbent, Unbroken
Name: roose
text: roose Who comes before the Old Gods this night?

title: Unbowed, Unbent, Unbroken
Name: theon
text: theon Sansa of the House Stark comes here to be wed. A woman grown, trueborn and noble. She comes to beg the blessings of the gods. Who comes to claim her?

title: Unbowed, Unbent, Unbroken
Name: ramsay
text: ramsay Ramsay of House Bolton. Heir to the Dreadfort and Winterfell. Who gives her?

title: Unbowed, Unbent, Unbroken
Name: theon
text: theon Theon of House Greyjoy. Who was… who was her father's ward.

title: Unbowed, Unbent, Unbroken
Name: roose
text: roose Lady Sansa, will you take this man?

title: Unbowed, Unbent, Unbroken
Name: sansa
text: sansa I take this man.

title: Unbowed, Unbent, Unbroken
Name: ramsay
text: ramsay Are you pleased my lady?

title: Unbowed, Unbent, Unbroken
Name: ramsay
text: ramsay Good. I want you to be happy. My father said you're still a virgin.

title: Unbowed, Unbent, Unbroken
Name: sansa
text: sansa Yes.

title: Unbowed, Unbent, Unbroken
Name: ramsay
text: ramsay Why? Why are you still a virgin? Afraid of dwarves?

title: Unbowed, Unbent, Unbroken
Name: sansa
text: sansa Lord Tyrion was kind, he was gentle, he never touched me.

title: Unbowed, Unbent, Unbroken
Name: ramsay
text: ramsay You're not lying to me?

title: Unbowed, Unbent, Unbroken
Name: sansa
text: sansa No, my lord.

title: Unbowed, Unbent, Unbroken
Name: ramsay
text: ramsay Lying to your husband on his wedding night, that would be a very bad way to start a marriage. We are man and wife now, we should be honest with each other, don't you think?

title: Unbowed, Unbent, Unbroken
Name: sansa
text: sansa Yes sir.

title: Unbowed, Unbent, Unbroken
Name: ramsay
text: ramsay Good. Now take off your clothes.

title: Unbowed, Unbent, Unbroken
Name: ramsay
text: ramsay Oh, no no no. You stay here Reek. You watch. Do I need to ask a second time? I hate asking a second time.

title: Unbowed, Unbent, Unbroken
Name: ramsay
text: ramsay Reek? I told you to watch.

title: Unbowed, Unbent, Unbroken
Name: ramsay
text: ramsay You've known Sansa since she was a girl. Now watch her become a woman.

title: Unbowed, Unbent, Unbroken
Name: end
text: end EPISODE

title: The Gift
Name: jon
text: jon First Ranger, you have command of Castle Black.

title: The Gift
Name: alliser
text: alliser Lord Commander, it is my duty to tell you I believe this mission to be reckless, foolhardy, and an insult to all of the Brothers that have died fighting the wildlings.

title: The Gift
Name: jon
text: jon As always, thank you for your honesty.

title: The Gift
Name: sam
text: sam Safe travels, Lord Commander.

title: The Gift
Name: jon
text: jon Thank you, Sam.

title: The Gift
Name: sam
text: sam Oh, and…

title: The Gift
Name: sam
text: sam It's Dragonglass. It's what I used to kill the White Walker. I hope you don't need them.

title: The Gift
Name: jon
text: jon Me too.

title: The Gift
Name: aemon
text: aemon There he is. That laugh. Egg! Egg laughed like that. One of the first things I remember about him.

title: The Gift
Name: sam
text: sam His little brother, Aegon. He became king.

title: The Gift
Name: aemon
text: aemon And before that, he was a jolly fellow. Like this one.

title: The Gift
Name: aemon
text: aemon Get him south, Gillyflower. Before it's too late.

title: The Gift
Name: sansa
text: sansa Theon, wait.

title: The Gift
Name: theon
text: theon Not Theon, my lady. Reek.

title: The Gift
Name: sansa
text: sansa Help me.

title: The Gift
Name: theon
text: theon You're his wife now.

title: The Gift
Name: sansa
text: sansa Theon

title: The Gift
Name: theon
text: theon Do what he says. Do what he says or he'll hurt you.

title: The Gift
Name: sansa
text: sansa He already hurts me every night. All day I'm locked in this room and every night he comes. It can't be worse.

title: The Gift
Name: theon
text: theon It can. It can always be worse.

title: The Gift
Name: sansa
text: sansa What did he do to you?

title: The Gift
Name: theon
text: theon Please…

title: The Gift
Name: sansa
text: sansa You betrayed my family!

title: The Gift
Name: theon
text: theon I'm sorry. I'm sorry!

title: The Gift
Name: sansa
text: sansa You have to help me!

title: The Gift
Name: theon
text: theon He'll see us. You don't know him.

title: The Gift
Name: sansa
text: sansa My family still has friends in the North. All I have to do is give a signal and they'll rescue me. Climb to the top of the Broken Tower, light this candle, and put it in the window. Promise me, Theon.

title: The Gift
Name: theon
text: theon Reek, my lady, Reek!

title: The Gift
Name: sansa
text: sansa Your name is Theon Greyjoy. Last surviving son of Balon Greyjoy, Lord of the Iron Islands, do you hear me? Theon. Promise me.

title: The Gift
Name: ramsay
text: ramsay Yes, Reek?

title: The Gift
Name: aemon
text: aemon Egg! Egg! Mothers looking for you! Egg!

title: The Gift
Name: gilly
text: gilly Get some sleep, Sam. You'll have to speak for him tomorrow.

title: The Gift
Name: sam
text: sam You don't know that.

title: The Gift
Name: gilly
text: gilly Get some sleep. I'll watch over him.

title: The Gift
Name: sam
text: sam I'll stay too. He's always been good to me. I can't leave him now.

title: The Gift
Name: aemon
text: aemon Egg! Egg.. I dreamed... that I was old

title: The Gift
Name: sam
text: sam His name was Aemon Targaryen. He came to us from King's Landing, a Maester of the Citadel, chained and sworn. And a sworn brother of the Night's Watch, ever faithful. No man was wiser or gentler or kinder. At the Wall a dozen Lord Commanders came and went during his years of service, but he was always there to counsel them. He was the blood of the dragon, but now his fire has gone out. And now his watch has ended.

title: The Gift
Name: brothers
text: brothers And now his watch has ended.

title: The Gift
Name: alliser
text: alliser You're losing all your friends, Tarly.

title: The Gift
Name: ramsay
text: ramsay My beautiful wife.

title: The Gift
Name: ramsay
text: ramsay When my father told me we were marrying I half expected a fat, bearded beast. Do you know how pleased I was when I saw you? You've made me very happy.

title: The Gift
Name: ramsay
text: ramsay Our scouts report that Stannis Baratheon rides for Winterfell. He's a respected commander. His troops are loyal and battle tested. He's hired thousands of foreign sell swords to bolster his army. But this storm was a stroke of luck for us northerners. Our people are used to fighting in frost. His army's out there now, suffering in the snow. One day I'll be Lord of Winterfell, and Warden of the North. You'll be my Lady and Wardeness.

title: The Gift
Name: sansa
text: sansa But isn't your step mother pregnant?

title: The Gift
Name: ramsay
text: ramsay What of it?

title: The Gift
Name: sansa
text: sansa What happens if she has a boy?

title: The Gift
Name: ramsay
text: ramsay Then I'll have a baby brother.

title: The Gift
Name: sansa
text: sansa But he'll be the heir.

title: The Gift
Name: ramsay
text: ramsay I'm Lord Bolton's eldest son.

title: The Gift
Name: sansa
text: sansa But you're a bastard, a true born will always have the stronger claim.

title: The Gift
Name: ramsay
text: ramsay I've been naturalized by a royal decree of--

title: The Gift
Name: sansa
text: sansa Tommen Baratheon. Another bastard.

title: The Gift
Name: ramsay
text: ramsay Bastards can rise high in the world. Like your half-brother Jon Snow. Born The Bastard of Winterfell, now the Lord Commander of the Night's Watch.

title: The Gift
Name: ramsay
text: ramsay You didn't know? Yes, he's done very well for himself. Ah. I near forgot why I asked you to join me. Come, my lady.

title: The Gift
Name: ramsay
text: ramsay Your Northern friend. Reek told me you wanted to leave.

title: The Gift
Name: ramsay
text: ramsay Why? Winterfell is your home and I am your husband.

title: The Gift
Name: ramsay
text: ramsay Tough old bird. Everyone talks when I start beating them. But this one. Her heart gave out before I got to her face. We do breed them tough in the North. Bring my wife back to her chamber. It's far too cold out here for a lady. You should hold on to your candles. The nights are so long now.

title: The Gift
Name: davos
text: davos 40 horses died in the night. We'll lose more come sunset. We're running out of food. We can't open the supply line until the snow clears.

title: The Gift
Name: stannis
text: stannis What else?

title: The Gift
Name: davos
text: davos The Stormcrows rode off last night.

title: The Gift
Name: stannis
text: stannis 500 men.

title: The Gift
Name: stannis
text: stannis Sell swords, loyal to nothing but gold.

title: The Gift
Name: davos
text: davos We still have a hard march to Wintefell and we won't be marching anywhere in this weather.

title: The Gift
Name: stannis
text: stannis And?

title: The Gift
Name: davos
text: davos This isn't our time, we should head back to Castle Black when the snow clears.

title: The Gift
Name: stannis
text: stannis I retreated from King's Landing, Ser Davos. If I retreat again, I become “The King Who Ran.”

title: The Gift
Name: davos
text: davos Your Grace..

title: The Gift
Name: stannis
text: stannis Winter is coming. Those arent just the Stark words, it's a fact. If we march back to Castle Black, we winter at Castle Black. And who can say how many years this winter will last.

title: The Gift
Name: davos
text: davos It's better to wait for the right time than to risk everything.

title: The Gift
Name: stannis
text: stannis This is the right time, and I will risk everything. Because if I don't, we've lost. We march to victory or we march to defeat, but we go forward only forward,

title: The Gift
Name: davos
text: davos Your Grace.

title: The Gift
Name: stannis
text: stannis I've trusted in your visions, in your prophecies for years.

title: The Gift
Name: melisandre
text: melisandre You saw it yourself, my king, when you stared into the flames. A great battle in the snow.

title: The Gift
Name: stannis
text: stannis I don't know what I saw.

title: The Gift
Name: melisandre
text: melisandre You do know. Trust yourself.

title: The Gift
Name: stannis
text: stannis And you, do you trust yourself?

title: The Gift
Name: melisandre
text: melisandre I trust in the Lord.

title: The Gift
Name: stannis
text: stannis Are you sure?

title: The Gift
Name: melisandre
text: melisandre I have seen myself walk along the battlements of Wintefell. I have seen the flayed men banners lowered to the ground.

title: The Gift
Name: melisandre
text: melisandre But sometimes sacrifices must be made to ensure victory. I have shown you the power of king's blood. The Usurper Robb Stark. The Usurper Joffrey Baratheon.

title: The Gift
Name: stannis
text: stannis We don't have Robert's bastard here.

title: The Gift
Name: melisandre
text: melisandre No, we have someone better, and your blood runs through her veins.

title: The Gift
Name: stannis
text: stannis Have you lost your mind?

title: The Gift
Name: melisandre
text: melisandre Do you doubt me still? After all that you've seen?

title: The Gift
Name: stannis
text: stannis There must be another way. Leeches or something.

title: The Gift
Name: melisandre
text: melisandre There is only one way. You must become king before the Long Night begins. Only you can lead the living against the dead. All your life has led us to this moment. To this decision.

title: The Gift
Name: stannis
text: stannis She's my daughter.

title: The Gift
Name: stannis
text: stannis Get out.

title: The Gift
Name: derryk
text: derryk The beauty from beyond The Wall.

title: The Gift
Name: bran
text: bran Where are you going, huh? Aren't we better looking than the fat man?

title: The Gift
Name: derryk
text: derryk The question is, is she pretty down south in the real world, or is she pretty because she's the only girl here?

title: The Gift
Name: bran
text: bran Even in White Harbor, I'd want a kiss.

title: The Gift
Name: derryk
text: derryk Come on love, give us a kiss.

title: The Gift
Name: gilly
text: gilly Leave me alone.

title: The Gift
Name: derryk
text: derryk If you were my girl I wouldn't leave you alone.

title: The Gift
Name: bran
text: bran One little kiss.

title: The Gift
Name: derryk
text: derryk Come on, give him a kiss.

title: The Gift
Name: bran
text: bran A man gets lonely guarding the Wall.

title: The Gift
Name: bran
text: bran There's no need to be rude.

title: The Gift
Name: derryk
text: derryk We just want a little affection.

title: The Gift
Name: sam
text: sam Get your hands off her. Brother Derryk. Brother Brand. I believe you both have guard duty tonight.

title: The Gift
Name: bran
text: bran Sam the Slayer. Are you gonna slay me with that sword?

title: The Gift
Name: derryk
text: derryk Look at his hands shaking.

title: The Gift
Name: sam
text: sam Gilly go on, Get back to your room and lock the door.

title: The Gift
Name: sam
text: sam I'm warning you.

title: The Gift
Name: derryk
text: derryk Come on! Come on!

title: The Gift
Name: derryk
text: derryk You lying sack of shit! Killed a White Walker, eh? You fatass fuck. Come on, get up. He's your hero. He's a hog!

title: The Gift
Name: gilly
text: gilly Leave him alone!

title: The Gift
Name: derryk
text: derryk Stubborn little wilding bitch aren't ya?

title: The Gift
Name: gilly
text: gilly Sam! Sam! Sam!

title: The Gift
Name: bran
text: bran Alright. Hold still.

title: The Gift
Name: sam
text: sam I said get your hands off her.

title: The Gift
Name: bran
text: bran You're gonna get yourself killed.

title: The Gift
Name: derryk
text: derryk Roll over. Jon Snow's not here to save you.

title: The Gift
Name: sam
text: sam I killed a White Walker. I killed a Thenn. I'll take my chances with you.

title: The Gift
Name: gilly
text: gilly Sam!

title: The Gift
Name: sam
text: sam I'm alright.

title: The Gift
Name: gilly
text: gilly You're not.

title: The Gift
Name: sammy
text: sammy Just a bit woozy.

title: The Gift
Name: gilly
text: gilly The next time you see something like that you leave it alone.

title: The Gift
Name: sam
text: sam I will not. They wouldo ve… I don't know what they would have done

title: The Gift
Name: gilly
text: gilly I know they would have killed you if Ghost hadn't come.

title: The Gift
Name: sam
text: sam No. They were tiring out. I had them in the palm of my hand.

title: The Gift
Name: gilly
text: gilly Don't be stupid Sam, you're not a fighter.

title: The Gift
Name: sam
text: sam What kind of man would I be if I ran away when I saw someone hurting you?

title: The Gift
Name: gilly
text: gilly Just promise me that whatever happens you'll take care of little Sam.

title: The Gift
Name: sam
text: sam Of course I will. And I'll take care of you, too.

title: The Gift
Name: gilly
text: gilly I need more water.

title: The Gift
Name: sam
text: sam Stay. Please.

title: The Gift
Name: gilly
text: gilly Am I hurting you?

title: The Gift
Name: gilly
text: gilly Are you sure?

title: The Gift
Name: sam
text: sam Oh. Oh my.

title: The Gift
Name: malko
text: malko A rare find for the fighting pits, my friends. Not your usual street tough old drunken pirate. This one's a Westerosi knight from an ancient house, trained in sword and lance. he fought beside the Stag King Robert on the far side of the Narrow Sea. He was first from the breach during the siege of Pyke, slaughtering 50 men with his flaming sword. He killed the great Khal Drogo in single combat. Betrayed by his woman, he sold himself into slavery to repay his debts. Bidding begins at 12 gold honors.

title: The Gift
Name: malko
text: malko 13. Do I have 14?

title: The Gift
Name: malko
text: malko 15? 15 golds honors. Do I have 16?

title: The Gift
Name: slave
text: slave 20.

title: The Gift
Name: malko
text: malko Sold!

title: The Gift
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion Wait! You have to buy me as well.

title: The Gift
Name: buyer
text: buyer Why?

title: The Gift
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion We're a team. I'm a great fighter, too.

title: The Gift
Name: malko
text: malko He's funny. You have to give him that.

title: The Gift
Name: buyer
text: buyer Alright. He's funny.

title: The Gift
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion Thank you my Lord. Thank you.

title: The Gift
Name: buyer
text: buyer Yes.

title: The Gift
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion My Lord, if I may. I've heard Mereen's become a free city. You might run into trouble if you try to fight slaves in the fighting pits. Now if you were to fight free men who were paid a wage…

title: The Gift
Name: buer
text: buer Here's your wages, funny man. It'll last the rest of your life.

title: The Gift
Name: daario
text: daario How long before the king of Mereen comes to claim my pillow?

title: The Gift
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys Don't be ridiculous. My marriage to Hizdahr is political. I think he's smart enough to understand that.

title: The Gift
Name: daario
text: daario I think the Sons of the Harpy have stopped killing because their leader was made king.

title: The Gift
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys Are you jealous?

title: The Gift
Name: daario
text: daario Do you think I'm petty enough to speak ill of a man just because he represents competition?

title: The Gift
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys I do.

title: The Gift
Name: daario
text: daario You're right. My motivations are entirely impure.

title: The Gift
Name: daario
text: daario Doesn't make me wrong.

title: The Gift
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys You told me yourself, I can't fight enemies within and without. So when enemies from without come knocking, I need the city of Mereen behind me. I have no choice.

title: The Gift
Name: daario
text: daario Everyone has a choice. Even slaves have a choice. Death or slavery.

title: The Gift
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys So what else can I do?

title: The Gift
Name: daario
text: daario Marry me instead.

title: The Gift
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys Even if I wanted to do such an inadviseable thing, I couldn't.

title: The Gift
Name: daario
text: daario Why not? You're our queen, you can do as you like.

title: The Gift
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys No. I can't

title: The Gift
Name: daario
text: daario Then you are the only person in Mereen who's not free.

title: The Gift
Name: daario
text: daario I know I'm here to serve my queen and not to give advice, but can I make one more suggestion?

title: The Gift
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys Of course

title: The Gift
Name: daario
text: daario On the day of the Great Games, gather all the great masters, and wise masters, and worthy masters you can find, and slaughter them all.

title: The Gift
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys I am a queen. Not a butcher.

title: The Gift
Name: daario
text: daario All rulers are either butchers or meat.

title: The Gift
Name: olenna
text: olenna You there! Where would I find the High Septon, or High Sparrow, or whatever bloody fool name he's got.

title: The Gift
Name: sparrow
text: sparrow It's not as good a name as Queen of Thorns, I'll admit.

title: The Gift
Name: olenna
text: olenna You should have the decency to stand when you talk to a lady.

title: The Gift
Name: sparrow
text: sparrow You should have the decency to kneel before the gods

title: The Gift
Name: olenna
text: olenna Don't spar with me little fellow.

title: The Gift
Name: sparrow
text: sparrow For me, it's the knees. You?

title: The Gift
Name: olenna
text: olenna Hips.

title: The Gift
Name: sparrow
text: sparrow Huh.

title: The Gift
Name: olenna
text: olenna A man of the people, is that your game? It's an old game. dull and unconvincing. A man of the people who does Cersei's dirty work for her.

title: The Gift
Name: sparrow
text: sparrow The people always do the dirty work.

title: The Gift
Name: olenna
text: olenna Spare me the homilies, I can smell a fraud from a mile away.

title: The Gift
Name: sparrow
text: sparrow A useful talent.

title: The Gift
Name: olenna
text: olenna I'm here for my grandson and granddaughter.

title: The Gift
Name: sparrow
text: sparrow Your grandson and granddaughter swore sacred vows and lied. The Father judges us all. Sons of high lords, sons of fishermen. If you break his laws you will be punished.

title: The Gift
Name: olenna
text: olenna Don't you walk away from me.

title: The Gift
Name: sparrow
text: sparrow You don't give commands here, Lady Olenna.

title: The Gift
Name: olenna
text: olenna What is it you want? Gold? I'll make you the richest septon who ever lived.

title: The Gift
Name: olenna
text: olenna What then?

title: The Gift
Name: sparrow
text: sparrow I imagine this is strange for you. Everyone you meet has a hidden motive, and you pride yourself on slitting in and out. But I'm telling you a simple truth

title: The Gift
Name: olenna
text: olenna How do they communicate their demands? By raven or horse?

title: The Gift
Name: sparrow
text: sparrow By the holy text. The seven pointed star. If you don't have one in your library I'll give you my own.

title: The Gift
Name: olenna
text: olenna I've read the seven pointed star.

title: The Gift
Name: sparrow
text: sparrow Then you'll remember the passages concerning buggery and perjury. Your grandchildren will be punished in the same manner as anyone who breaks the sacred laws.

title: The Gift
Name: olenna
text: olenna Half the men, women, and children in this foul city break the sacred laws. You live among murderers, thieves, and rapists. And yet you punish Loras for shagging and Margaery for defending her brother?

title: The Gift
Name: sparrow
text: sparrow Yes. The Gods' laws must be applied to all equally.

title: The Gift
Name: olenna
text: olenna If it's equality you want then so be it. When House Tyrell stops sending our crops to the capital, everyone here will starve. And I'll make sure the hungry know who to blame,

title: The Gift
Name: sparrow
text: sparrow Have you ever served the field, Lady Olenna? Have you ever reaped the grain? Has anyone in House Tyrell? A lifetime of wealth and power has left you blind in one eye. You are the few. We are the many. And when the many stop fearing the few…

title: The Gift
Name: squire
text: squire Lady Olenna.

title: The Gift
Name: cersei
text: cersei Starving yourself won't make things any better for her, my love.

title: The Gift
Name: tommen
text: tommen She's in a prison cell and there's nothing I can do. I am the king! The queen is in prison and there's nothing I can do!

title: The Gift
Name: cersei
text: cersei No matter who you are, no matter how strong you are, sooner or later, you'll face circumstances beyond your control.

title: The Gift
Name: tommen
text: tommen I'll call in the army. I'll take back the sept and kill every last one of them. I'll start a war if I have to.

title: The Gift
Name: cersei
text: cersei You know as well as I do who the first casualty in that war would be.

title: The Gift
Name: tommen
text: tommen I love her. I love her. I can't help her.

title: The Gift
Name: cersei
text: cersei We must be strong for those we love. We cannot give in to despair.

title: The Gift
Name: tommen
text: tommen I will speak to the high sparrow. There must be something--

title: The Gift
Name: cersei
text: cersei Let me speak to him on your behalf. The king cannot dirty sully himself negotiating with an unwashed fanatic.

title: The Gift
Name: cersei
text: cersei Your happiness is all I want in this world

title: The Gift
Name: tommen
text: tommen I know.

title: The Gift
Name: cersei
text: cersei No you don't. You can't possibly. Not until you have children of your own. I would do anything for you. Anything to keep you from harm. I would burn cities to the ground. That is all that matters. You and your sister. From the moment you came into this world, my boy. My only boy.

title: The Gift
Name: areo
text: areo Prince Doran hopes this satisfies your concerns about the princess's wellbeing.

title: The Gift
Name: myrcella
text: myrcella You looked different when I left. You had more hair.

title: The Gift
Name: jaime
text: jaime And more hands. How's Trystane?

title: The Gift
Name: myrcella
text: myrcella He'll be alright.

title: The Gift
Name: jaime
text: jaime I'm sorry for that. It wasn't supposed to happen that way.

title: The Gift
Name: myrcella
text: myrcella Why is it happening at all?

title: The Gift
Name: jaime
text: jaime Your mother's worried about you. Threats have been made. Dorne is too dangerous for you. I've come to take you home.

title: The Gift
Name: myrcella
text: myrcella This is my home, this has been my home for years. I didn't want to come here but she told me to. I did what she said, I did my duty and now she's forcing me to go back?

title: The Gift
Name: jaime
text: jaime It's for your own good. These are complicated matters.

title: The Gift
Name: myrcella
text: myrcella It's not complicated at all, it's simple. I love Trystane, I'm going to marry him, and we're staying right here.

title: The Gift
Name: jaime
text: jaime I don't understand.

title: The Gift
Name: myrcella
text: myrcella Of course you don't! You don't know me!

title: The Gift
Name: bronn
text: bronn Brothers oh brothers, my days here are done, the Dornishman's taken my life. Bur what does it matter, for all men must die, and I've tasted the Dornishman's wife! Yes I've tasted the Dornishman's wife!

title: The Gift
Name: tyene
text: tyene He's got a good voice.

title: The Gift
Name: obara
text: obara We're lucky he's a singer. If he were a fighter we might have been in trouble.

title: The Gift
Name: bronn
text: bronn It's against my code to hurt a woman.

title: The Gift
Name: obara
text: obara It's amazing how many men we beat seem to have this code.

title: The Gift
Name: bronn
text: bronn I wouldn't say you beat me.

title: The Gift
Name: tyene
text: tyene How's your arm?

title: The Gift
Name: bronn
text: bronn Wonderful. Wouldn't feel right to leave Dorne without a new scar.

title: The Gift
Name: tyene
text: tyene You think you're leaving Dorne?

title: The Gift
Name: bronn
text: bronn No great hurry. Dornish women are the most beautiful women in the world.

title: The Gift
Name: tyene
text: tyene Thank you.

title: The Gift
Name: bronn
text: bronn I said Dornish women. I didn't say you.

title: The Gift
Name: tyene
text: tyene I'm not the most beautiful woman you've ever seen?

title: The Gift
Name: bronn
text: bronn I've seen quite a few women in all the Seven Kingdoms.

title: The Gift
Name: tyene
text: tyene Name one more beautiful than I am.

title: The Gift
Name: bronn
text: bronn Well now, in King's Landing there was an absolutely gorgeous...

title: The Gift
Name: tyene
text: tyene There was a what? In King's Landing you were saying.

title: The Gift
Name: bronn
text: bronn Was I?

title: The Gift
Name: tyene
text: tyene There was a woman more beautiful than I am.

title: The Gift
Name: bronn
text: bronn Was there? My memory's not what it was earlier.

title: The Gift
Name: tyene
text: tyene How's your arm now?

title: The Gift
Name: bronn
text: bronn You seem concerned with it. You must really like me.

title: The Gift
Name: tyene
text: tyene And how about your head?

title: The Gift
Name: bronn
text: bronn My head… You don't even wanna know what's going on in…

title: The Gift
Name: tyene
text: tyene Your nose is bleeding.

title: The Gift
Name: bronn
text: bronn It's nothing. It's the dry air.

title: The Gift
Name: tyene
text: tyene My dagger was coated with a special ointment from Asshei. They call it the Long Farewell. It takes time to work, but if a single drop makes contact with the skin, death.

title: The Gift
Name: tyene
text: tyene The only antidote. Who's the most beautiful woman in the world?

title: The Gift
Name: tyene
text: tyene Sorry? Who?

title: The Gift
Name: bronn
text: bronn You.

title: The Gift
Name: tyene
text: tyene Don't drop it.

title: The Gift
Name: tyene
text: tyene I think you're very handsome as well.

title: The Gift
Name: petyr
text: petyr I'm sorry about the locale.

title: The Gift
Name: olenna
text: olenna No you're not.

title: The Gift
Name: petyr
text: petyr It felt like the safest place.

title: The Gift
Name: olenna
text: olenna Not for your clientele, clearly.

title: The Gift
Name: petyr
text: petyr It was an establishment like no other. The sheer range of appetites catered to, desires that didn't exist until we invented them.

title: The Gift
Name: olenna
text: olenna You've always been rather impressed with yourself, haven't you?

title: The Gift
Name: petyr
text: petyr The past is the past. The future is all that's worth discussing. The future of House Tyrell.

title: The Gift
Name: olenna
text: olenna Don't pretend to have any concern for my house, my grandchildren, or me. I should have known you'd return to the capital once things started going wrong.

title: The Gift
Name: petyr
text: petyr I promise you..

title: The Gift
Name: olenna
text: olenna I promise you, Lord Baelish, that our fates are joined. Together we murdered a king. And if my house should fall, I would have nothing to hide. And if i should meet with some accident here at this broken little flesh market, they'll never even find what's left of you. So do you deny a part in all of this?

title: The Gift
Name: petyr
text: petyr Cersei summoned me to King's Landing. I dared not refuse her.

title: The Gift
Name: olenna
text: olenna And what did she want?

title: The Gift
Name: petyr
text: petyr A piece of info that she know that I had. Neither silence nor lies were an option. But I have other information of which she is unaware. And as you say, our interests are aligned. I have a gift for you.

title: The Gift
Name: olenna
text: olenna What kind of gift?

title: The Gift
Name: petyr
text: petyr The same kind I gave Cersei. A handsome young man.

title: The Gift
Name: slave
text: slave Many worthy fighters have died trying to make it to the Great Games. When most of you worthless scum join them in death this afternoon it will represent a significant rise in your station. But if you happen to triumph here you will fight at the great pit of Daznak itself in front of the queen. So whatever happens, the gods have smiled upon you today. Today is the day your lives actually start to mean something.

title: The Gift
Name: owner
text: owner You and you, you, you two, you, you, and you.

title: The Gift
Name: owner
text: owner Valar morghulis.

title: The Gift
Name: men
text: men Valar dohaeris.

title: The Gift
Name: owner
text: owner Prepare yourselves.

title: The Gift
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys Sitting through the great games will be bad enough.

title: The Gift
Name: hizdahr
text: hizdahr For generations, in the days leading up to the great games, it has been customary for our ruler to make the rounds to the lower pits to pay the fighters there the honor of her presence.

title: The Gift
Name: owner
text: owner Move yourselves!

title: The Gift
Name: owner
text: owner Your Grace. Your Future Grace. You honor us all.

title: The Gift
Name: owner
text: owner We fight and die for your glory, O glorious queen.”

title: The Gift
Name: men
text: men We fight and die for your glory, O glorious queen.”

title: The Gift
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys I think I've seen enough.

title: The Gift
Name: hizdahr
text: hizdahr Your Grace, it's a tradition for the queen to stay until the victor has emerged.

title: The Gift
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys I've sacrificed more than enough for your traditions.

title: The Gift
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion What are you doing?

title: The Gift
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys Get him out of my sight.

title: The Gift
Name: jorah
text: jorah Khaleesi, please, I just need a moment of your time. I brought you a gift.

title: The Gift
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion It's true. He has.

title: The Gift
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys Who are you?

title: The Gift
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion I am the gift. It's a pleasure to meet you, Your Grace. My name is Tyrion Lannister.

title: The Gift
Name: cersei
text: cersei This is horrible. Unacceptable. Are they feeding you enough at least? I brought you this. Venison. It's quite good. I had it myself for supper only last night. We did everything we could from the moment they took your brother. Tommen even went to the sept himself to confront the high sparrow, but I fear The Faith has left reason behind.

title: The Gift
Name: margaery
text: margaery I know you did this.

title: The Gift
Name: cersei
text: cersei We are making every effort on your behalf. I swear to you by all the seven gods.

title: The Gift
Name: margaery
text: margaery Lies come easily to you. Everyone knows that. But innocence, decency, concern? You're not very good at those, I'm afraid. Perhaps that's why your son was so eager to cast you aside for me.

title: The Gift
Name: cersei
text: cersei You're upset. You're not thinking clearly. I'll visit again when you've had a chance to calm down.

title: The Gift
Name: margaery
text: margaery I don't want to see you again.

title: The Gift
Name: cersei
text: cersei I do hope you change your mind about that. I've been told men often go mad in the Black Cells below the Red Keep, but I suppose your isolation will end once your trial begins.

title: The Gift
Name: margaery
text: margaery Leave.

title: The Gift
Name: cersei
text: cersei Yes, I'm afraid I must. My son needs me now more than ever.

title: The Gift
Name: margaery
text: margaery Get out you hateful bitch!

title: The Gift
Name: cersei
text: cersei Sleep well, sister.

title: The Gift
Name: sparrow
text: sparrow Thank you. You saw her?

title: The Gift
Name: cersei
text: cersei Yes.

title: The Gift
Name: sparrow
text: sparrow And?

title: The Gift
Name: cersei
text: cersei Her accommodations seem sufficient. What happens to her now?

title: The Gift
Name: sparrow
text: sparrow Well she and her brother are both being held under fair suspicion. A trial will be held for each of them to determine if they are guilty of any acts that might constitute a violation of the tenants of the faith.

title: The Gift
Name: cersei
text: cersei Who will stand judge?

title: The Gift
Name: sparrow
text: sparrow Seven septons. As it was in all trials before the Targaryens.

title: The Gift
Name: cersei
text: cersei Will you be one of them?

title: The Gift
Name: sparrow
text: sparrow I will.

title: The Gift
Name: cersei
text: cersei If one or both of them were to confess before the trial…

title: The Gift
Name: sparrow
text: sparrow Then they will be at The Mother's mercy.

title: The Gift
Name: cersei
text: cersei What does The Mother's mercy entail?

title: The Gift
Name: sparrow
text: sparrow It depends on the situation. The acts themselves, the degree of contrition.

title: The Gift
Name: cersei
text: cersei Thank you High Septon for bringing them whatever justice they deserve in the eyes of the Seven.

title: The Gift
Name: sparrow
text: sparrow Did you know this chapel is one of the oldest structures in King's Landing?

title: The Gift
Name: cersei
text: cersei I think I may have heard at one point.

title: The Gift
Name: sparrow
text: sparrow Baelor built his sept around it. But men worshipped here long before him.

title: The Gift
Name: sparrow
text: sparrow Who carved this altar do you know?

title: The Gift
Name: cersei
text: cersei I'm afraid i don't.

title: The Gift
Name: sparrow
text: sparrow No one does. There's no name on it. Or anywhere else in the chapel. The people who built this place didn't inflict their vanity on the people who came after them. The way Baelor did with that great gilded monstrosity out there. Their faith was clean.

title: The Gift
Name: sparrow
text: sparrow A young man came to us not long ago, broken in body and spirit. He had so much to strip away, so much weighing him down. But piece by piece he unburdened himself. Let go of vanity, pride, sin, now his soul is so light he will float through the Seven Heaves like a bird.

title: The Gift
Name: sparrow
text: sparrow And he has much to say about you.

title: The Gift
Name: cersei
text: cersei Move. Let me go immediately.

title: The Gift
Name: cersei
text: cersei You will order her to let me go! I am the queen! I am the queen! Have you lost your mind? Let me go! You filthy… I am the queen! Let me go!

title: The Gift
Name: cersei
text: cersei Look at me. Look at my face. It's the last thing you'll see before you die.

title: The Gift
Name: end
text: end EPISODE

title: Hardhome
Name: jorah
text: jorah Your Grace, I want to say--

title: Hardhome
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys You will not speak. How do I know you are who you say you are?

title: Hardhome
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion If only I were otherwise.

title: Hardhome
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys If you are Tyrion Lannister why shouldn't I kill you? To pay your family back for what it did to mine

title: Hardhome
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion You want revenge against the Lannisters? I killed my mother Joanna Lannister the day I was born. I killed my father Tywin Lannister with a bow to the heart. I am the greatest Lannister killer of our time.

title: Hardhome
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys So I should welcome you into my service because you murdered members of your own family?

title: Hardhome
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion Into your service? Your Grace we have only just met. It's too soon to know if you deserve my service.

title: Hardhome
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys If you'd rather return to the fighting pits just say the word.

title: Hardhome
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion When I was a young man I heard a story about a baby born during the worst storm in living memory. She had no wealth, no lands, no army, only a name and a handful of supporters, most of whom probably thought they could use that name to benefit themselves. They kept her alive, moving her from place to place, often hours ahead of the men who had been sent to kill her. She was eventually sold off to some warlord on the edge of the world and that appeared to be that. And then a few years later the most well informed person I knew told me that this girl without wealth, lands, or armies had somehow acquired all 3 in a very short span of time, along with three dragons. He thought she was our best, last chance to build a better world. I thought you were worth meeting at the very least.

title: Hardhome
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys And why are you worth meeting? Why should I spend my time listening to you?

title: Hardhome
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion Because you can not build a better world on your own. You have no one at your side who understands that land you want to rule. The strengths and the weaknesses of the houses that will either support or oppose you.

title: Hardhome
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys I have a very large army and very large dragons.

title: Hardhome
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion Killing and politics aren't always the same thing. When I served as Hand of the King I did quite well with the latter considering the king in question preferred torturing animals to leading his people. I could do an even better job advising a ruler worth the name.

title: Hardhome
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys So you want to advise me. Very well. What would you have me do with him? I swore I would kill him if he ever returned.

title: Hardhome
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion I know.

title: Hardhome
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys Why should the people trust a queen who can't keep her promises?

title: Hardhome
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion Whomever Ser Jorah was when he started informing on you, he is no longer that man. I can't remember seeing the same man as devoted to anything as he is to serving you. He claims he would kill for you and die for you, and nothing I have witnessed gives me reason to doubt him. And yet he did betray you.

title: Hardhome
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion Did he have an opportunity to confess his betrayals?

title: Hardhome
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys Yes, many opportunities.

title: Hardhome
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion And did he?

title: Hardhome
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys No. Not until forced to do so.

title: Hardhome
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion He worships you. He is in love with you, I think. But he did not trust you with the truth - an unpleasant truth, to be sure - but one of great significance to you. He did not trust that you would be wise enough to forgive him.

title: Hardhome
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys So I should kill him?

title: Hardhome
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion A ruler who kills those that are devoted to her is not a ruler that inspires devotion. And you're going to need to inspire devotion, and lots of it, if you're ever going to rule across the Narrow Sea. But you cannot have him by your side when you do.

title: Hardhome
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys Remove Ser Jorah from the city.

title: Hardhome
Name: septa
text: septa Confess.

title: Hardhome
Name: cersei
text: cersei My son. Let me speak to--

title: Hardhome
Name: septa
text: septa Confess. I meant it.

title: Hardhome
Name: cersei
text: cersei My face will be the last thing you see before--

title: Hardhome
Name: arya
text: arya My name is Lana. I'm an orphan. When I was 8 I begged enough money to buy my first bucket of oysters, and I sold that bucket and made enough money to buy 2 more.

title: Hardhome
Name: arya
text: arya Iit took a while but I finally saved enough to buy myself an oyster cart. Now every morning I make my way down to the canals. I pass the fish mongers and the bakers. I usually see Lhara, my first customer of the day on my way home. Then I turn left onto Moonsinger Lane--

title: Hardhome
Name: arya
text: arya Left onto Ragman Lane, where I do most of my trade.

title: Hardhome
Name: jaqen
text: jaqen Lana is very impressive. Very industrious. She will make a fine servant for the Many Faced God.

title: Hardhome
Name: arya
text: arya How will she serve him?

title: Hardhome
Name: jaqen
text: jaqen She will no longer turn left onto Ragman Lane. She will turn right and go to Ragman Harbor.

title: Hardhome
Name: arya
text: arya What will she do there?

title: Hardhome
Name: jaqen
text: jaqen She will see.

title: Hardhome
Name: arya
text: arya See what?

title: Hardhome
Name: jaqen
text: jaqen How can a man tell a girl this. If he knew what she would see, there would be no reason to send her.

title: Hardhome
Name: arya
text: arya Oysters, clams and cockles!

title: Hardhome
Name: arya
text: arya Oysters clams and cockles! Oysters clams and cockles!

title: Hardhome
Name: thin
text: thin Your oysters fresh?

title: Hardhome
Name: arya
text: arya Best in the city.

title: Hardhome
Name: thin
text: thin You wouldn't lie to an old man would you?

title: Hardhome
Name: thin
text: thin Very nice. Give me 4. With vinegar.

title: Hardhome
Name: man
text: man It's my 18th voyage. I've returned from all of them without a scratch on me.

title: Hardhome
Name: thin
text: thin Can't do it.

title: Hardhome
Name: man
text: man Please I have 3 children. Without me-- here take it you have to, I have 3 children, what will they do? Please you have to! Please! You don't understand?

title: Hardhome
Name: jaqen
text: jaqen The man is a gambler. He wages that his sailor's ship will make it to its destination. It is a strange wager for the captain. He only wins if he loses his life.

title: Hardhome
Name: arya
text: arya So why would a captain make the wager in the first place?

title: Hardhome
Name: jaqen
text: jaqen A girl tells a man that she has seen.

title: Hardhome
Name: arya
text: arya If the captain dies, the thin man pays his family a lot of money.

title: Hardhome
Name: jaqen
text: jaqen But perhaps the gambler loses his bet and decides that he doesn't have to pay after all. A destitute woman and her small child, what can they do to such a man if he keeps their money for himself? To whom can they turn for recourse?

title: Hardhome
Name: arya
text: arya The Many Faced God. You said you didn't know what I would see at the docks.

title: Hardhome
Name: jaqen
text: jaqen A man had no idea what she would see and what she would not. A girl named Lana will return to the docks. She will watch the gambler. She will come to know as much about him as she knows about herself.

title: Hardhome
Name: arya
text: arya And then what?

title: Hardhome
Name: jaqen
text: jaqen A gift for the Thin Man.

title: Hardhome
Name: waif
text: waif She is not ready.

title: Hardhome
Name: jaqen
text: jaqen Perhaps she is, perhaps she's not.

title: Hardhome
Name: waif
text: waif And if she's not?

title: Hardhome
Name: jaqen
text: jaqen It is all the same to the Many Faced God.

title: Hardhome
Name: qyburn
text: qyburn The trial will take place. The High Sparrow will be presenting a substantial case against you.

title: Hardhome
Name: cersei
text: cersei The charges?

title: Hardhome
Name: qyburn
text: qyburn Fornication, treason, incest, the murder of King Robert.

title: Hardhome
Name: cersei
text: cersei All lies.

title: Hardhome
Name: qyburn
text: qyburn Of course, Your Grace. My concern is that The Faith does not adhere to the same standards of proof as the crown. And I hope you'll excuse me for saying it, but belief is so often the death of reason.

title: Hardhome
Name: cersei
text: cersei I wish you'd said it sooner. Any word from Jaime?

title: Hardhome
Name: qyburn
text: qyburn I'm afraid not. Your Grace, Grand Maester Pycelle has summoned your Uncle Kevan back from Casterly Rock to serve as Hand of the King. He now presides over the small council.

title: Hardhome
Name: cersei
text: cersei Tell him I need to speak to him.

title: Hardhome
Name: qyburn
text: qyburn I implored him to visit you but he would not.

title: Hardhome
Name: cersei
text: cersei What about my son, the king? If you can visit me then surely the king--

title: Hardhome
Name: qyburn
text: qyburn Your arrest, and Queen Margaery's arrest, the king has not taken well. He remains in his chambers, his servants often find his food in the hall. Left untouched.

title: Hardhome
Name: cersei
text: cersei You need to talk to him, you need to talk to my son to come and see me, come and see his mother.

title: Hardhome
Name: qyburn
text: qyburn I tried my grace, he wouldn't see me. He wouldn't see anyone.

title: Hardhome
Name: cersei
text: cersei I can't stay here.

title: Hardhome
Name: qyburn
text: qyburn There is a way, Your Grace. A way out.

title: Hardhome
Name: cersei
text: cersei Confess? To the High Sparrow? I won't. I made him. I rose him up from nothing, I will not kneel before some barefooted commoner and beg his forgiveness.

title: Hardhome
Name: qyburn
text: qyburn Goodbye my queen. The work continues.

title: Hardhome
Name: sansa
text: sansa Why. Why Theon.

title: Hardhome
Name: theon
text: theon Not Theon. There is no Theon. Reek.

title: Hardhome
Name: sansa
text: sansa Reek. Why did you tell him, Reek?

title: Hardhome
Name: theon
text: theon I was helping you. You were trying to escape, there is no escape. Not ever. Theon Greyjoy tried to escape. The master knew. He knows everything. He hunted him, he caught him, he strapped him to a cross, and cut away piece after piece until there was no Theon left.

title: Hardhome
Name: sansa
text: sansa Good. If it weren't for you I'd still have a family. If I could do to you what Ramsay did to you right here, right now, I would.

title: Hardhome
Name: theon
text: theon I deserved everything. I deserve to be Reek. I did terrible things. Turned on Robb. Captured Winterfell. Killed those boys.

title: Hardhome
Name: theon
text: theon They weren't “those boys”, they were Bran and Rickon. They were your brothers, you'd know them since they were born.

title: Hardhome
Name: theon
text: theon They weren't. They were only--

title: Hardhome
Name: sansa
text: sansa Only what?

title: Hardhome
Name: theon
text: theon I can't..

title: Hardhome
Name: sansa
text: sansa Tell me!

title: Hardhome
Name: theon
text: theon I can't, not unless the master says...

title: Hardhome
Name: sansa
text: sansa Tell me, they weren't what?!

title: Hardhome
Name: theon
text: theon They weren't...

title: Hardhome
Name: sansa
text: sansa Tell me why Bran and Rickon should be dead while you still breathe the air. Tell me to my face Theon, tell me that they weren't your brothers!

title: Hardhome
Name: theon
text: theon They weren't Bran and Rickon! I couldn't find them. It was two farm boys. I killed them and burned them so no one would know.

title: Hardhome
Name: sansa
text: sansa You didn't…?

title: Hardhome
Name: sansa
text: sansa Do you know where they went, Bran and Rickon?

title: Hardhome
Name: theon
text: theon I can't talk to you anymore.

title: Hardhome
Name: sansa
text: sansa Theon, you have to tell me, do you have any idea where Bran and Rickon--

title: Hardhome
Name: theon
text: theon Not Theon, Reek!

title: Hardhome
Name: bolton
text: bolton Our scouts tells us he's got no more than 6000 men. More than half of them are mounted, however.

title: Hardhome
Name: roose
text: roose And how high can Stannis' horses jump? Our walls have been full repaired our walls have been reinforced. We have enough food for six months. We are more prepared for a siege than they could have ever been. All we have to do is wait for them to freeze, starve, and mutiny.

title: Hardhome
Name: roose
text: roose You disagree?

title: Hardhome
Name: ramsay
text: ramsay Stannis isn't from the North. You are, father. I think you're missing an opportunity to show the people of the North how House Bolton treats southern invaders.

title: Hardhome
Name: roose
text: roose And what do you recommend?

title: Hardhome
Name: ramsay
text: ramsay That we not sit and wait to let Stannis to decide what type of fight this is going to be. That we hit first, and hit hard, and leave a feast for the crows.

title: Hardhome
Name: roose
text: roose A smart commander does not surrender a defensive advantage. As long as we stay behind these walls they can't touch us. Not to mention that the snow is so deep that we couldn't get an army through if we wanted to.

title: Hardhome
Name: ramsay
text: ramsay I don't need an army. I need 20 good men.

title: Hardhome
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys So have you decided yet? Whether I'm worthy of your service?

title: Hardhome
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion Have you decided yet whether you're going to have me killed?

title: Hardhome
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys It's probably my safest option.

title: Hardhome
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion I can see why you would think so. It's what your father would have done.

title: Hardhome
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys And what would your father do?

title: Hardhome
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion My father? Who publicly sentenced me to death? I'd say his thoughts on having me killed were abundantly clear.

title: Hardhome
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys Is that why you killed him?

title: Hardhome
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion Some day if you decide not to execute me, I'll tell you all about why I killed my father. And on that day, should it ever come, we'll need more wine than this.

title: Hardhome
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys I know what my father was. What he did. I know the Mad King earned his name.

title: Hardhome
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion So here we sit, two terrible children of two terrible fathers.

title: Hardhome
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys I'm terrible?

title: Hardhome
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion I've heard stories.

title: Hardhome
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys Why did you travel to the other side of the world to meet someone terrible?

title: Hardhome
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion To see if you were the right kind of terrible.

title: Hardhome
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys Which kind is that?

title: Hardhome
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion The kind that prevents your people from being even more so.

title: Hardhome
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys I did reopen the fighting pits. Under my rule murder will once again become entertainment.

title: Hardhome
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion Yes, that was wise. And you agreed to marry someone you loathed for the greater good. Very impressive. My own sister married someone she loathed as well, though not by choice and certainly not for the greater good, Gods forbid. She ended up having him killed.

title: Hardhome
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys Perhaps it won't come to that.

title: Hardhome
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion It's not impossible that Varys was right about you after all.

title: Hardhome
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys Varys? King Robert's spy master?

title: Hardhome
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion Yes. He was the one who convinced me to come find you. He was my travelling companion before Ser Jorah seized that role for himself.

title: Hardhome
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys Jorah sent my secrets to Varys. For 20 years the spider oversaw the campaign to find and kill me.

title: Hardhome
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion He did what he had to do to survive. He did a lot of other things that he didn't have to do. I suspect he's the main reason you weren't slaughtered in your crib.

title: Hardhome
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys But you trust him?

title: Hardhome
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion Yes, oddly. He might be the only person in the world that I trust. Besides my brother.

title: Hardhome
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys The brother who killed my father.

title: Hardhome
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion That's the one.

title: Hardhome
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys Perhaps I will have you killed after all.

title: Hardhome
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion Your queenly prerogative. I had given up on life until Varys convinced me you might be worth living for. You chop off my head? Well, my final days were interesting.

title: Hardhome
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys I'm not going to kill you.

title: Hardhome
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion No? Banish me?

title: Hardhome
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys No.

title: Hardhome
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion So if I'm not going to be murdered, and I'm not going to be banished...

title: Hardhome
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys You're going to advise me. While you can still speak in complete sentences.

title: Hardhome
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion Advise you on what?

title: Hardhome
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys How to get what I want.

title: Hardhome
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion The Iron Throne. Perhaps you should try wanting something else.

title: Hardhome
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys If I want jokes I'll get myself a proper fool.

title: Hardhome
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion I'm not entirely joking. There's more to the world than Westeros after all. How many hundreds of thousands of lives have you changed for the better here? Perhaps this is where you belong. Where you can do the most good.

title: Hardhome
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys I fought so that no child born into Slaver's Bay would ever know what it was like to be bought or sold. I will continue that fight here and beyond. But this is not my home.

title: Hardhome
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion And when you get back to your home, who supports you?

title: Hardhome
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys The common people.

title: Hardhome
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion Let's be generous and assume that's going to happen. Here in Slaver's Bay you had the support of the common people and only the common people. What was that like, ruling without the rich? House Targaryen is gone, not a single person who shares your blood is alive to support you. The Starks are gone as well, our two terrible fathers saw to that. The remaining Lannisters won't back you, not ever. Stannis Baratheon won't back you either, his entire claim to the Throne depends on the illegitimacy of yours. That leaves the Tyrells. Not impossible, but not enough.

title: Hardhome
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys Lannister, Targaryen, Baratheon, Stark, Tyrell. They're all just spokes on a wheel. This one's on top, then that ones on top and on and on it spins, crushing the people on the ground.

title: Hardhome
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion It's a beautiful dream. Stopping the wheel. You're not the first person to have dreamt it.

title: Hardhome
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys I'm not going to stop the wheel. I'm going to break the wheel.

title: Hardhome
Name: jorah
text: jorah You said whoever wins would fight at the Great Pit in front of the queen. I won.

title: Hardhome
Name: master
text: master You struck me.

title: Hardhome
Name: jorah
text: jorah I've been flogged if it makes you happy. I'm the best you've got. If I win at the Great Pit how much can you sell me for?

title: Hardhome
Name: master
text: master You're a free man, you could have gone anywhere, why did you come back?

title: Hardhome
Name: jorah
text: jorah Let me fight for her and I belong to you.

title: Hardhome
Name: septa
text: septa Thirsty? Confess.

title: Hardhome
Name: cersei
text: cersei I'll get out of here, you realize. Before long.

title: Hardhome
Name: cersei
text: cersei I can make you a wealthy woman. A lady of the court.

title: Hardhome
Name: cersei
text: cersei I can make sure you die in the most hideous way imaginable, and all I do is sit here imagining ways for you to die.

title: Hardhome
Name: gilly
text: gilly Does it hurt?

title: Hardhome
Name: sam
text: sam No.

title: Hardhome
Name: gilly
text: gilly Good.

title: Hardhome
Name: sam
text: sam How are you?

title: Hardhome
Name: gilly
text: gilly I'm not the one who got punched and kicked in the face.

title: Hardhome
Name: sam
text: sam You know what I mean.

title: Hardhome
Name: gilly
text: gilly I'm good.

title: Hardhome
Name: sam
text: sam Are you scared?

title: Hardhome
Name: gilly
text: gilly A little.

title: Hardhome
Name: sam
text: sam Me too.

title: Hardhome
Name: sam
text: sam Who's there?

title: Hardhome
Name: olly
text: olly Olly.

title: Hardhome
Name: sam
text: sam Come in.

title: Hardhome
Name: olly
text: olly I heard what happened.

title: Hardhome
Name: sam
text: sam Not to worry. Men brawl from time to time. It's only natural.

title: Hardhome
Name: olly
text: olly Figured you were hungry.

title: Hardhome
Name: sam
text: sam You're a good lad.

title: Hardhome
Name: olly
text: olly Wanted to ask you something. If you've got the time.

title: Hardhome
Name: gilly
text: gilly I need to check on baby Sam.

title: Hardhome
Name: sam
text: sam Now then. How can I help?

title: Hardhome
Name: olly
text: olly It's about the Lord Commander.

title: Hardhome
Name: sam
text: sam Yes?

title: Hardhome
Name: olly
text: olly He's going up to Hardhome to save all them wildlings. Wildlings killed my mom and dad. They killed everyone in my village.

title: Hardhome
Name: sam
text: sam We've been fighting them for years.

title: Hardhome
Name: olly
text: olly This wasn't a fight. We were farmers and they slaughtered us. So why's he saving them?

title: Hardhome
Name: sam
text: sam Wildlings are people, just like us. There are good ones and bad ones.

title: Hardhome
Name: olly
text: olly The one he's travelling with, the one with the red beard, he led the raid on my village.

title: Hardhome
Name: sam
text: sam Olly...

title: Hardhome
Name: olly
text: olly How can he trust him?

title: Hardhome
Name: sam
text: sam I've seen the army of the dead. I've seen the white walkers, and they're coming for us, for all the living. And when it's time we'll need every last man we can find.

title: Hardhome
Name: olly
text: olly But what if we let the wildings through the gates and they cut our throats while we sleep?

title: Hardhome
Name: sam
text: sam Jon's taking a risk, but he has to. We don't stand a chance otherwise. Sometimes a man has to make hard choices, choices that might look wrong to others but you know are right in the long run.

title: Hardhome
Name: olly
text: olly You believe that?

title: Hardhome
Name: sam
text: sam With all my heart.

title: Hardhome
Name: sam
text: sam Try not to worry Olly. I've been worrying about Jon for years. He always comes back.

title: Hardhome
Name: tormund
text: tormund You trust me Jon Snow?

title: Hardhome
Name: jon
text: jon Does that make me a fool?

title: Hardhome
Name: tormund
text: tormund We are fools together now.

title: Hardhome
Name: tormund
text: tormund Lord of Bones. Been a long time.

title: Hardhome
Name: lord
text: lord Last time I saw you the little crow was your prisoner. The other way around now. What happened?

title: Hardhome
Name: tormund
text: tormund War.

title: Hardhome
Name: lord
text: lord You call that a war? The greatest army the North has ever seen cut to pieces by a southern king.

title: Hardhome
Name: tormund
text: tormund We should gather the elders find somewhere quiet to talk.

title: Hardhome
Name: lord
text: lord You don't give the orders here.

title: Hardhome
Name: tormund
text: tormund I'm not giving an order.

title: Hardhome
Name: lord
text: lord Why aren't you in chains?

title: Hardhome
Name: jon
text: jon He's not my prisoner.

title: Hardhome
Name: lord
text: lord What is he?

title: Hardhome
Name: jon
text: jon We're allies.

title: Hardhome
Name: lord
text: lord You fucking traitor! You fight for the crows now.

title: Hardhome
Name: tormund
text: tormund I don't fight for the crows.

title: Hardhome
Name: jon
text: jon We're not here to fight. We're here to talk.

title: Hardhome
Name: lord
text: lord Is that right? You and the pretty crow do a lot of talking, Tormund. And when you're done talking, do you get down on your knees and suck his cock--

title: Hardhome
Name: tormund
text: tormund Gather the elders and let's talk.

title: Hardhome
Name: jon
text: jon My name's Jon Snow. I'm Lord Commander of the Night's Watch. We're not friends. We've never been friends. We won't become friends today. This isn't about friendship. This is about survival. This is about putting a 700 foot wall between you and what's out there.

title: Hardhome
Name: karsi
text: karsi You built that wall to keep us out.

title: Hardhome
Name: loboda
text: loboda Since when do the crows give 2 shits if we live?

title: Hardhome
Name: jon
text: jon In normal times we wouldn't. But these aren't normal times. The white walkers don't care if a man's Free Folk or Crow. We're all the same to them. Meat to their army. But together we can beat them.

title: Hardhome
Name: karsi
text: karsi Beat the white walkers? Good luck with that. Run from them, maybe.

title: Hardhome
Name: jon
text: jon It's not a trick. It's a gift for those who join us.

title: Hardhome
Name: jon
text: jon Dragonglass. A man of the Night's Watch used one of these daggers to kill a walker.

title: Hardhome
Name: loboda
text: loboda You saw this?

title: Hardhome
Name: jon
text: jon No. But I trust the man.

title: Hardhome
Name: karsi
text: karsi There are old stories about Dragonglass.

title: Hardhome
Name: loboda
text: loboda There are old stories about ice spiders big as hounds.

title: Hardhome
Name: karsi
text: karsi And with the things we've seen you don't believe them?

title: Hardhome
Name: jon
text: jon Come with me and I'll share these weapons.

title: Hardhome
Name: karsi
text: karsi Come with you where?

title: Hardhome
Name: jon
text: jon There are good lands south of the wall. The Night's Watch will allow you through the tunnel and allow your people to farm those lands.

title: Hardhome
Name: jon
