text: jon I knew Mance Rayder. He never wanted a war with the Night's Watch, he wanted a new life for his people. For you. We're prepared to give you that new life.

title: Hardhome
Name: karsi
text: karsi If…?

title: Hardhome
Name: jon
text: jon If you swear you join us when the real war begins.

title: Hardhome
Name: loboda
text: loboda Where is Mance?

title: Hardhome
Name: jon
text: jon He died.

title: Hardhome
Name: loboda
text: loboda How?

title: Hardhome
Name: jon
text: jon I put an arrow through his heart.

title: Hardhome
Name: loboda
text: loboda I say we send the Lord Commander back to Castle Black with no eyes.

title: Hardhome
Name: tormund
text: tormund None of you saw Mance die! I did. The Southern King who broke our army, Stannis, wanted to burn him alive to send him a message. Jon Snow defied that cunt's orders. His arrow was mercy. What it did took courage, and that's what we need today

title: Hardhome
Name: karsi
text: karsi I lost my father, my uncle, and 2 brothers fighting the damn crows.

title: Hardhome
Name: jon
text: jon I'm not asking you to forget your dead. I'll never forget mine. I lost 50 brothers the night that Mance attacked the wall. But I'm asking you to think about your children now. They'll never have children of their own if we don't band together. The Long Night is coming and the dead come with it. No clan can stop them. The free folk can't stop them. The Night's Watch can't stop them. And all the southern kings can't stop them. Only together, all of us, and even then it might not be enough, but at least then we'll give the fuckers a fight.

title: Hardhome
Name: karsi
text: karsi You vouch for this man, Tormund?

title: Hardhome
Name: tormund
text: tormund He's prettier than both my daughters, but he knows how to fight. He's young, but he knows how to lead. He didn't have to come to Hardhome. He came because he needs us. And we need him.

title: Hardhome
Name: loboda
text: loboda My ancestors would spit on me if I broke bread with a crow.

title: Hardhome
Name: karsi
text: karsi So would mine, but fuck 'em, they're dead.

title: Hardhome
Name: tormund
text: tormund This is the way.

title: Hardhome
Name: wildling
text: wildling I'm with Tormund. We stay here we're dead men. At least with King Crow there's a chance.

title: Hardhome
Name: giant
text: giant Tormund.

title: Hardhome
Name: loboda
text: loboda Keep that new life you want to give us. Keep your glass, King Crow. Soon as you get on his ships they're gonna slit your throats and dump your bodies to the bottom of the Shivering Sea. That's our enemy. That has always been our enemy.

title: Hardhome
Name: karsi
text: karsi I fucking hate Thenns.

title: Hardhome
Name: jon
text: jon How many are with us? 5000?

title: Hardhome
Name: tormund
text: tormund I'm not good at counting.

title: Hardhome
Name: jon
text: jon We're leaving too many behind.

title: Hardhome
Name: tormund
text: tormund The free folk are stubborn. You know how long it took Mance to band them together. 20 fucking years.

title: Hardhome
Name: jon
text: jon And he knew them better than I ever will.

title: Hardhome
Name: tormund
text: tormund They're running out of food and there's nothing to hunt. They'll come around.

title: Hardhome
Name: karsi
text: karsi Johnna is gonna look after you. She's in charge, you listen to her.

title: Hardhome
Name: daughter
text: daughter I wanna go with you.

title: Hardhome
Name: karsi
text: karsi I need to get the old folks on the boats. I'm right behind you, I promise. Go on.

title: Hardhome
Name: wun
text: wun Lokh kif rukh?

title: Hardhome
Name: loboda

title: The Dance of Dragons
Name: davos
text: davos A band of 20 men, maybe less. They were in and out before anyone spotted them, burnt our food stores to the ground, all our siege weapons were destroyed, dozens of tents were--

title: The Dance of Dragons
Name: stannis
text: stannis Horses?

title: The Dance of Dragons
Name: davos
text: davos We're still getting a count, but hundreds are dead.

title: The Dance of Dragons
Name: stannis
text: stannis 20 men rode into our camp without a single guard sounding the alarm?

title: The Dance of Dragons
Name: davos
text: davos The northerners know more about their land than we ever will.

title: The Dance of Dragons
Name: stannis
text: stannis Put last night's guards in chains, either they fell asleep or they were conspiring with the enemy. Find out the truth and then hang them.

title: The Dance of Dragons
Name: davos
text: davos Unless there's a thaw, we can't press forward to Winterfell, and we don't have enough food to get us back to Castle Black.

title: The Dance of Dragons
Name: stannis
text: stannis We're not returning to Castle Black.

title: The Dance of Dragons
Name: davos
text: davos Forgive me, Your Grace, I never claimed to be an expert in military matters. But if we can't march forward, and we won't march back…

title: The Dance of Dragons
Name: stannis
text: stannis Have the dead horses butchered for meat.

title: The Dance of Dragons
Name: alliser
text: alliser Open the gates.

title: The Dance of Dragons
Name: jon
text: jon It was a failure.

title: The Dance of Dragons
Name: sam
text: sam It wasn't.

title: The Dance of Dragons
Name: jon
text: jon I went to save them, I failed.

title: The Dance of Dragons
Name: sam
text: sam You didn't fail him, or him, or her. Every one of them is alive because of you, and no one else.

title: The Dance of Dragons
Name: jon
text: jon I don't think that fact's lost on them.

title: The Dance of Dragons
Name: alliser
text: alliser You have a good heart, Jon Snow. It will get us all killed.

title: The Dance of Dragons
Name: davos
text: davos You sent for me, Your Grace.

title: The Dance of Dragons
Name: stannis
text: stannis Find you some healthy horses and a few good men to guard you, I'm sending you back to Castle Black. Tell the Lord Commander to send food, supplies, fresh horses, in return when I take the throne I'll make sure the Night's Watch has all the men it requires. He can guard all 19 castles if he so wishes.

title: The Dance of Dragons
Name: davos
text: davos Your Grace, you've named me your Hand.

title: The Dance of Dragons
Name: stannis
text: stannis Yes.

title: The Dance of Dragons
Name: davos
text: davos The King's Hand should never abandon the King, especially in a time of war.

title: The Dance of Dragons
Name: stannis
text: stannis You're not abandoning me, you're obeying a command.

title: The Dance of Dragons
Name: davos
text: davos A boy with a scroll could deliver this message.

title: The Dance of Dragons
Name: stannis
text: stannis And if Jon Snow refuses a boy with a scroll, what does the boy say? I didn't name you hand for your expertise in military matters, ride for Castle Black, don't come back empty handed.

title: The Dance of Dragons
Name: davos
text: davos Your Grace, perhaps Queen and Princess Shireen could accompany me.

title: The Dance of Dragons
Name: stannis
text: stannis My family stays with me.

title: The Dance of Dragons
Name: davos
text: davos At least let me take Shireen. A siege is no place for a little girl.

title: The Dance of Dragons
Name: davos
text: davos What's this one now?

title: The Dance of Dragons
Name: shireen
text: shireen The Dance of Dragons

title: The Dance of Dragons
Name: davos
text: davos Well that sounds like a proper story.

title: The Dance of Dragons
Name: shireen
text: shireen Ser Byron Swann wanted to kill the dragon Vhagar. He polished his shield for a week, til the steel was like a mirror. Then he crouched behind it, and crept forward, hoping the dragon would only see his own reflection.

title: The Dance of Dragons
Name: davos
text: davos But the dragon only saw a dumb man, holding a mirrored shield.

title: The Dance of Dragons
Name: shireen
text: shireen And burnt him to a crisp.

title: The Dance of Dragons
Name: davos
text: davos Thus ending the dragonslaying career of Ser Byron Swann. I made you something, Princess.

title: The Dance of Dragons
Name: davos
text: davos Do you like it?

title: The Dance of Dragons
Name: shireen
text: shireen He's beautiful.

title: The Dance of Dragons
Name: shireen
text: shireen Thank you.

title: The Dance of Dragons
Name: davos
text: davos You're very welcome.

title: The Dance of Dragons
Name: shireen
text: shireen Will you make me a doe, too, so that he can have company?

title: The Dance of Dragons
Name: davos
text: davos Of course I will.

title: The Dance of Dragons
Name: shireen
text: shireen But why am I getting a present?

title: The Dance of Dragons
Name: davos
text: davos Because you deserve it. My son was always on me trying to teach me to read. Gods, I was stubborn about it. Made it this far without reading, seemed to me I could make it to the grave. I wish I had listened to them. This is my own poor way of saying thank you for teaching me to be a grown up. I'll be gone for a few days, Princess. I'll want to hear all about the dance of dragons when I'm back.

title: The Dance of Dragons
Name: shireen
text: shireen You'll just have to read it yourself.

title: The Dance of Dragons
Name: jaime
text: jaime Prince Doran.

title: The Dance of Dragons
Name: doran
text: doran Forgive us, we started without you. Please, sit.

title: The Dance of Dragons
Name: jaime
text: jaime Princess Myrcella.

title: The Dance of Dragons
Name: myrcella
text: myrcella Uncle.

title: The Dance of Dragons
Name: jaime
text: jaime What a lovely dress.

title: The Dance of Dragons
Name: myrcella
text: myrcella You don't like it?

title: The Dance of Dragons
Name: jaime
text: jaime You must be cold.

title: The Dance of Dragons
Name: myrcella
text: myrcella Not at all. The Dornish climate agrees with me.

title: The Dance of Dragons
Name: jaime
text: jaime Prince Trystane. How's your jaw?

title: The Dance of Dragons
Name: trystane
text: trystane A fleabite.

title: The Dance of Dragons
Name: ellaria
text: ellaria What are you doing in Dorne?

title: The Dance of Dragons
Name: jaime
text: jaime Looking out for the safety of my niece, the princess Myrcella.

title: The Dance of Dragons
Name: doran
text: doran And rather than send a raven or speak to me directly you decided to enter my country in secret and abduct our guest by force.

title: The Dance of Dragons
Name: jaime
text: jaime We received a threatening message. The princess's necklace in the jaws of a viper.

title: The Dance of Dragons
Name: myrcella
text: myrcella That necklace was stolen from my room.

title: The Dance of Dragons
Name: jaime
text: jaime Ah. Excellent. The last meal before the beheading.

title: The Dance of Dragons
Name: doran
text: doran We can't behead you. Many in Dorne want war. But I've seen war. I've seen the bodies piled on the battlefields. I've seen the orphans starving in the cities. I don't want to lead my people into that hell.

title: The Dance of Dragons
Name: ellaria
text: ellaria No, you want to break bread with the Lannisters.

title: The Dance of Dragons
Name: doran
text: doran And that is precisely what we are doing. Let us drink to Tommen, the first of his name, the King of the Andals and the First Men, Lord of the Seven Kingdoms.

title: The Dance of Dragons
Name: doran
text: doran King Tommen insists on his sister's return to the capital?

title: The Dance of Dragons
Name: jaime
text: jaime I'm afraid he does.

title: The Dance of Dragons
Name: doran
text: doran I cannot disobey my King's command. She will return with you to King's Landing. And my son, Prince Trystane, will accompany you both. If the alliance between Dorne and the Iron Throne is to continue, their engagement must stand.

title: The Dance of Dragons
Name: jaime
text: jaime I accept.

title: The Dance of Dragons
Name: doran
text: doran One more thing. My brother was named to the small council before his death. Your father understood the importance of keeping Dorne in the loop. With Oberyn gone, Trystane will take his place on the small council.

title: The Dance of Dragons
Name: jaime
text: jaime You have my word.

title: The Dance of Dragons
Name: ellaria
text: ellaria The word of a Kingslayer.

title: The Dance of Dragons
Name: ellaria
text: ellaria No wonder you can't stand. You have no spine.

title: The Dance of Dragons
Name: doran
text: doran You are mother to four of my nieces, girls I love very much. For their sake, I hope you live a long life. Talk to me that way again and you won't.

title: The Dance of Dragons
Name: jaime
text: jaime May I inquire into the fate of my man?

title: The Dance of Dragons
Name: doran
text: doran Tell me, Ser Jaime, in King's Landing, how do they punish a commoner who strikes a prince?

title: The Dance of Dragons
Name: jaime
text: jaime He said it was just a fleabite. The fault is mine. Bronn is merely a soldier following my orders. If anyone should be punished it's me.

title: The Dance of Dragons
Name: doran
text: doran Prince Trystane must learn judgement if he's to rule one day. I'll let him decide.

title: The Dance of Dragons
Name: trystane
text: trystane I have learned the value of mercy from my father. I will set your man free.

title: The Dance of Dragons
Name: jaime
text: jaime You're a good man.

title: The Dance of Dragons
Name: trystane
text: trystane On one condition.

title: The Dance of Dragons
Name: nymeria
text: nymeria Why do we play? I'm better than you, I'll always be better than you. Have I ever missed once? I don't think, I can't recall. You must love humiliation or pain. Which do you love most? Humiliation or-- -- pain? That one hurt didn't it? You going to cry? Give up, little sister.

title: The Dance of Dragons
Name: tyene
text: tyene You're going to miss.

title: The Dance of Dragons
Name: nymeria
text: nymeria I never miss.

title: The Dance of Dragons
Name: tyene
text: tyene You will. You're thinking too much. Now you're nervous. “What if she's right?”

title: The Dance of Dragons
Name: nymeria
text: nymeria Luck.

title: The Dance of Dragons
Name: tyene
text: tyene Now it's my turn.

title: The Dance of Dragons
Name: nymeria
text: nymeria You're too slow. You've always been too slow.

title: The Dance of Dragons

text: areo You'll find out very soon.

title: The Dance of Dragons

text: tyene Say it one more time, handsome. Who am I?

title: The Dance of Dragons

title: The Dance of Dragons

text: tyene And that's the truth!

title: The Dance of Dragons

title: The Dance of Dragons

title: The Dance of Dragons

text: jaime Prince Trystane here is a man of mercy. He's agreed to grant you your freedom.

title: The Dance of Dragons

title: The Dance of Dragons

text: thin Come on.

title: The Dance of Dragons
Name: banker
text: banker Lord Tyrell! On behalf of the Iron Bank, may I be the first to welcome you to the free city of Braavos. I hope your journey was trouble free.

title: The Dance of Dragons
Name: mace
text: mace Bit of chop the last few days but nothing too awful. Good to see the old chap is still guarding the Harbor.

title: The Dance of Dragons
Name: banker
text: banker And how goes the harvest in the Reach?

title: The Dance of Dragons
Name: mace
text: mace Vintnors say this might be the best year for red grapes in half a century. If we come to a satisfactory arrangement, I'll be sure to send the Arbor's finest your way.

title: The Dance of Dragons
Name: banker
text: banker I'm afraid I don't partake.

title: The Dance of Dragons
Name: mace
text: mace Some consider usury distasteful, dishonorable. Pure nonsense, of course.

title: The Dance of Dragons
Name: banker
text: banker I'm glad we see eye-to-eye on this matter.

title: The Dance of Dragons
Name: mace
text: mace Did you know that at one point Maegor the third tried to outlaw it in the Seven Kingdoms? Wanted to arrest anyone caught charging interest and cut off both their hands.

title: The Dance of Dragons
Name: banker
text: banker Most unfortunate for the glovers.

title: The Dance of Dragons
Name: mace
text: mace If a man charges low interest on a loan then he has nothing to gain and everything to lose, so why charge him? Whereas a reward makes a man willing to gamble.

title: The Dance of Dragons
Name: banker
text: banker We are not gamblers here at the Iron Bank, Lord Tyrell.

title: The Dance of Dragons
Name: mace
text: mace You are the worldo s best gamblers. And all those bets you won built this.

title: The Dance of Dragons
Name: banker
text: banker I'm afraid I still have a good deal of work to do.

title: The Dance of Dragons
Name: mace
text: mace Oh, nonsense. Work's over. Do you sing?

title: The Dance of Dragons
Name: banker
text: banker I don't have that gift.

title: The Dance of Dragons
Name: mace
text: mace It's not a gift, it's a skill, anyone can learn it. “So give me a kiss by the Long Canall and give me two kisses in Salty Town, for we are going to die, tomorrow. The bareheaded beggar, the king with his crown…”

title: The Dance of Dragons
Name: meryn
text: meryn I thought that old shit would never stop singing.

title: The Dance of Dragons
Name: man
text: man It wasn't bad, though.

title: The Dance of Dragons
Name: meryn
text: meryn The Tyrells can all rot in hell, treasonous cunts. They were going to make that boy-fucker Renly king.

title: The Dance of Dragons
Name: meryn
text: meryn This is the place, lads. The sleekest little minks in Braavos.

title: The Dance of Dragons
Name: man
text: man You're buying?

title: The Dance of Dragons
Name: meryn
text: meryn Oh, I'm buying. But I never was good at sharing.

text: prostitute Oh let her in, Brusco, I'm hungry. Come here, sweetness.

text: arya Three coppers.

text: jon Here's a silver because the lady likes you.

title: The Dance of Dragons

text: meryn Too old.

title: The Dance of Dragons
Name: head
text: head Brea.

title: The Dance of Dragons
Name: head
text: head I have just the one. Anara our most expensive girl, but well worth it, I assure you.

title: The Dance of Dragons
Name: meryn
text: meryn Do you have what I want or not?

title: The Dance of Dragons
Name: head
text: head Of course. Of course.

title: The Dance of Dragons

text: man Fresh? Come on, the lads are hungry.

title: The Dance of Dragons

text: man Nothing better for you cock stand than fresh oysters.

title: The Dance of Dragons

text: man I'll have one.

text: head Who let this girl in? Shoo shoo!

text: meryn Good.

text: meryn I'll tell you when we're done.

title: The Dance of Dragons

title: The Dance of Dragons
Name: head
text: head Of course.

title: The Dance of Dragons

text: head I'll have you whipped, girl! Go on!

title: The Dance of Dragons
Name: man
text: man Valaar morghulis.

title: The Dance of Dragons
Name: jaqen
text: jaqen And?

title: The Dance of Dragons
Name: arya
text: arya The Thin Man wasn't hungry today.

title: The Dance of Dragons
Name: jaqen
text: jaqen Perhaps that's why the man is thin.

title: The Dance of Dragons
Name: arya
text: arya Tomorrow.

title: The Dance of Dragons
Name: jaqen
text: jaqen Tomorrow.

title: The Dance of Dragons
Name: jaqen
text: jaqen A girl has work to do.

title: The Dance of Dragons
Name: doran
text: doran Your rebellion is over. You can swear your allegiance to me now, or you can die.

title: The Dance of Dragons
Name: doran
text: doran I believe in second chances. I don't believe in third chances.

title: The Dance of Dragons
Name: ellaria
text: ellaria You write like a 7 year old.

title: The Dance of Dragons
Name: jaime
text: jaime Your maester kindly agreed to copy it over for me.

title: The Dance of Dragons
Name: ellaria
text: ellaria He didn't try to make you pay?

title: The Dance of Dragons
Name: ellaria
text: ellaria Then maybe he's changed. The Queen will be thrilled to know you'll be bringing her daughter home

title: The Dance of Dragons
Name: jaime
text: jaime She will.

title: The Dance of Dragons
Name: ellaria
text: ellaria You love her very much, don't you?

title: The Dance of Dragons
Name: jaime
text: jaime Of course, she's my niece.

title: The Dance of Dragons
Name: ellaria
text: ellaria I wasn't talking about her.

title: The Dance of Dragons
Name: ellaria
text: ellaria You think I disapprove. Why? Because people disapprove of that sort of thing where you are from? They disapproved of Oberyn and me where you are from. Here, no one blinked an eye. 100 years ago, no one would have blinked an eye at you if you had been named Targaryen. It's always changing, who we're supposed to love and who we're not.The only thing that stays the same is that we want who we want.

title: The Dance of Dragons
Name: ellaria
text: ellaria I know your daughter had no part in the terrible thing that happened to the man I loved. Perhaps even you were innocent of that.

title: The Dance of Dragons
Name: shireen
text: shireen Father. Aren't you cold?

title: The Dance of Dragons
Name: stannis
text: stannis No. What are you reading?

title: The Dance of Dragons
Name: shireen
text: shireen The Dance of Dragons.

title: The Dance of Dragons
Name: stannis
text: stannis What's it about?

title: The Dance of Dragons
Name: shireen
text: shireen It's the story of the fight between Rhaenyra Targaryen and her half-brother Aegon for control of the Seven Kingdoms. Both of them thought they belonged on the Iron Throne. When people started for declaring for one of them or the other, their fight divided the kingdom in two. Brothers fought brothers. Dragons fought dragons. By the time it was over, thousands were dead. And it was a disaster for the Targaryens as well. They never truly recovered.

title: The Dance of Dragons
Name: stannis
text: stannis The dance of dragons”? Why is that a dance?

title: The Dance of Dragons
Name: shireen
text: shireen That's just what they call it.

title: The Dance of Dragons
Name: stannis
text: stannis Doesn't make much sense.

title: The Dance of Dragons
Name: shireen
text: shireen I think it's poetic.

title: The Dance of Dragons
Name: stannis
text: stannis If you had to choose between Rhaenyra and Aegon, who would you have chosen?

title: The Dance of Dragons
Name: shireen
text: shireen I wouldn't have chosen either. It's all the choosing sides that made things so horrible.

title: The Dance of Dragons
Name: stannis
text: stannis Sometimes a person has to choose. Sometimes the world forces his hand. If a man knows what he is and remains true to himself, the choice is not choice at all. He must fulfill his destiny and become who he is meant to be. However much he may hate it.

title: The Dance of Dragons
Name: shireen
text: shireen It's alright, father.

title: The Dance of Dragons
Name: stannis
text: stannis You don't even know what I'm talking about.

title: The Dance of Dragons
Name: shireen
text: shireen It doesn't matter. I want to help you. Is there any way I can help?

title: The Dance of Dragons
Name: stannis
text: stannis Yes there is.

title: The Dance of Dragons
Name: shireen
text: shireen Good, I want to. I'm the Princess Shireen of House Baratheon and I'm your daughter.

title: The Dance of Dragons
Name: stannis
text: stannis Forgive me.

title: The Dance of Dragons
Name: shireen
text: shireen Where's my father? I want to see my father.

title: The Dance of Dragons
Name: melisandre
text: melisandre It will all be over soon, Princess.

title: The Dance of Dragons
Name: shireen
text: shireen Where's my father? No you can't do this, father where are you?!

title: The Dance of Dragons
Name: shireen
text: shireen Let me see my father! Where are you, please?!

title: The Dance of Dragons
Name: selyse
text: selyse It's what the Lord wants. It's a good thing. A great thing.

title: The Dance of Dragons
Name: melisandre
text: melisandre The year is now, my Lord. For you we offer up this girl, that you may cleanse her with your fire and that its light may lead our way.

title: The Dance of Dragons
Name: selyse
text: selyse If we don't act then we'll all starve here all of us, but if we make this sacrifice…

title: The Dance of Dragons
Name: melisandre
text: melisandre Accept this token of our faith, my lord and lead us from the darkness. Lord of Light show us the way!

title: The Dance of Dragons
Name: shireen
text: shireen Mother, please mother! Mother, please mother!

title: The Dance of Dragons
Name: selyse
text: selyse I can't.

title: The Dance of Dragons
Name: stannis
text: stannis There's no other way. She has King's blood.

title: The Dance of Dragons
Name: melisandre
text: melisandre Lord of Light protect us, for the night is dark and full of terrors!

title: The Dance of Dragons
Name: shireen
text: shireen Mother, don't do this please! Please help! Don't do this! Please, father! Mother, help!

title: The Dance of Dragons
Name: selyse
text: selyse No...

title: The Dance of Dragons
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys Where have you been?

title: The Dance of Dragons

text: hizdahr Just making sure everything's in order.

title: The Dance of Dragons

text: announcer My queen, our first contest. Who will triumph

title: The Dance of Dragons

text: hizdahr They're waiting for you. Clap your hands.

text: daario That one, the smaller man, no question, that's where you should put your money.

text: daenerys I'm not putting my money anywhere.

title: The Dance of Dragons
Name: daario
text: daario People used to bet against me when I fought in the pits. He would have bet against me. Common novice mistake.

title: The Dance of Dragons
Name: hizdahr
text: hizdahr I have spent much of my life in Meereen, and in my experience, larger men do triumph over smaller man, far more often than not.

title: The Dance of Dragons
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys Has your experience ever involved any actual fighting? You, yourself, have you ever tried to kill a man that was trying to kill you?

title: The Dance of Dragons
Name: daario
text: daario Whenever I got into the pit against a beast like that one, the crowd saw me, all skin and bone back then, then they saw a pile of angry muscles ready to murder me. They couldn't get their money out fast enough. But the pile of angry muscles never had any muscles here or here . And the big men were always too slow to stop my dagger from going where their muscles weren't. Yes, whenever I saw a beast like that one, standing across from me making his beast faces, I knew I could rest easy.

title: The Dance of Dragons
Name: hizdahr
text: hizdahr You don't approve?

title: The Dance of Dragons
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion There's always been more than enough death in the world for my taste. I can do without it in my leisure time.

title: The Dance of Dragons
Name: hizdahr
text: hizdahr Fair enough, yet -- it's an unpleasant question -- but what great thing has ever been accomplished without killing or cruelty?

title: The Dance of Dragons
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion It's easy to confuse what is with what ought to be. Especially when what is has worked in your favor.

title: The Dance of Dragons
Name: hizdahr
text: hizdahr I'm not talking about myself. I'm talking about the necessary conditions of greatness.

title: The Dance of Dragons
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys That is greatness?

title: The Dance of Dragons
Name: hizdahr
text: hizdahr That is a vital part of the great city of Meereen. Which has existed long before you arrived and will remain standing long after we have returned to the dirt.

title: The Dance of Dragons
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion My father would have liked you.

title: The Dance of Dragons
Name: announcer
text: announcer We ask again

title: The Dance of Dragons
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys One day your great city will return to the dirt as well.

title: The Dance of Dragons
Name: hizdahr
text: hizdahr At your command?

title: The Dance of Dragons
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys If need be.

title: The Dance of Dragons
Name: announcer
text: announcer A Meereenese champion?

title: The Dance of Dragons
Name: hizdahr
text: hizdahr How many people will die to make this happen?

title: The Dance of Dragons
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys If it comes to that they would have died for a good reason.

title: The Dance of Dragons
Name: hizdahr
text: hizdahr Those men think they're dying for a good reason.

title: The Dance of Dragons
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys Someone else's reason.

title: The Dance of Dragons
Name: hizdahr
text: hizdahr So your reasons are true, and theirs are false. They don't know their own minds, but you do.

title: The Dance of Dragons
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion Well said, you're an eloquent man. Doesn't mean you're wrong. In my experience, eloquent men are right every bit as often as imbeciles.

title: The Dance of Dragons
Name: announcer
text: announcer or a Westerosi Knight?!

title: The Dance of Dragons
Name: jorah
text: jorah I fight and die for your glory, oh glorious Queen.

title: The Dance of Dragons
Name: hizdahr
text: hizdahr Your Grace--

title: The Dance of Dragons
Name: daario
text: daario Shut your mouth.

title: The Dance of Dragons
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion You can end this.

title: The Dance of Dragons
Name: hizdahr
text: hizdahr She cannot.

title: The Dance of Dragons
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion You can!

title: The Dance of Dragons
Name: daario
text: daario Protect your queen!

title: The Dance of Dragons
Name: hizdahr
text: hizdahr Your Grace, Your Grace, come with me! I know a way out! I know a way--

title: The Dance of Dragons
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion Stay close!

title: The Dance of Dragons
Name: jorah
text: jorah This way!

title: The Dance of Dragons
Name: daario
text: daario The other side, follow me!

title: The Dance of Dragons
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys Drogon!

title: The Dance of Dragons
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys Valahd..

title: The Dance of Dragons
Name: end
text: end EPISODE

title: Mother’s Mercy
Name: melisandre
text: melisandre The Lord of Light has made good on his promise, my king. His fires have melted the snows away. The way ahead is clear.

title: Mother’s Mercy
Name: stannis
text: stannis We ride for Winterfell.

title: Mother’s Mercy
Name: melisandre
text: melisandre And you will take it. The Lord has shown me Bolton banners burning. You will receive what is yours by right.

title: Mother’s Mercy
Name: soldier
text: soldier Your Grace.

title: Mother’s Mercy
Name: stannis
text: stannis Prepare to form up.

title: Mother’s Mercy
Name: stannis
text: stannis Tell me.

title: Mother’s Mercy
Name: soldier
text: soldier The men. Many deserted before dawn.

title: Mother’s Mercy
Name: stannis
text: stannis How many?

title: Mother’s Mercy
Name: soldier
text: soldier Nearly half. All the sell-swords, with all the horses.

title: Mother’s Mercy
Name: soldier
text: soldier Your Grace?

title: Mother’s Mercy
Name: stannis
text: stannis Speak up. It can't be worse than mutiny.

title: Mother’s Mercy
Name: stannis
text: stannis Cut her down.

title: Mother’s Mercy
Name: soldier
text: soldier Your Grace. The Lady Melisandre was just seen riding out of camp.

title: Mother’s Mercy
Name: stannis
text: stannis Get the men into marching formation. On to Winterfell.

title: Mother’s Mercy
Name: jon
text: jon He raised his hands. And they all stood up at once. Tens of thousands of them, the biggest army in the world.

title: Mother’s Mercy
Name: sam
text: sam So what are you gonna do?

title: Mother’s Mercy
Name: jon
text: jon I'm gonna hope they don't learn how to climb the wall.

title: Mother’s Mercy
Name: sam
text: sam But… the Dragonglass?

title: Mother’s Mercy
Name: jon
text: jon No one's ever getting that back, now. It wouldn't have mattered anyway, unless we had a mountain of it.

title: Mother’s Mercy
Name: sam
text: sam But… you killed a White Walker.

title: Mother’s Mercy
Name: jon
text: jon With Longclaw. I saw them shatter steel axes like they were glass. But Longclaw…

title: Mother’s Mercy
Name: sam
text: sam He's made of Valyrian steel. How many Valyrian steel swords are left in the Seven Kingdoms?

title: Mother’s Mercy
Name: jon
text: jon Not enough. The first Lord Commander in history to sacrifice the lives of sworn Brothers to save the lives of Wildlings. How's it feel to be friends with the most hated man in Castle Black?

title: Mother’s Mercy
Name: sam
text: sam You were friends with me when I first got here. And I wasn't winning any elections back then.

title: Mother’s Mercy
Name: jon
text: jon Here's to us then. Long may they sneer.

title: Mother’s Mercy
Name: jon
text: jon What?

title: Mother’s Mercy
Name: sam
text: sam I wanted to ask you something. To ask something of you. Send me, Gilly, and the baby to Oldtown so I can become a Maester. That's what I'm meant to be, not this.

title: Mother’s Mercy
Name: jon
text: jon I need you here, Sam. If you leave, who's left to give me advice I trust?

title: Mother’s Mercy
Name: sam
text: sam Well, there's Edd.

title: Mother’s Mercy
Name: sam
text: sam I'll be more use to you as a Maester. More use to everyone now that Maester Aemon's gone. The Citadel has the worldo s greatest library. I'll learn about history, strategy, healing. And other things. Things that will help when they come.

title: Mother’s Mercy
Name: sam
text: sam If Gilly stays here then she'll die. And the baby that she named after me will die. And I'll end up dying, too, trying to protect them. Which means that the last thing that I'll see in this world will be the look in her eyes when I fail them. I'd rather see a thousand White Walkers than see that.

title: Mother’s Mercy
Name: sam
text: sam Thank you.

title: Mother’s Mercy
Name: jon
text: jon You know that The Citadel will make you swear off women, too.

title: Mother’s Mercy
Name: sam
text: sam They'll bloody try.

title: Mother’s Mercy
Name: jon
text: jon Sam?

title: Mother’s Mercy
Name: sam
text: sam What?

title: Mother’s Mercy
Name: jon
text: jon Sam…

title: Mother’s Mercy
Name: jon
text: jon You've just been beaten half to death. How did you--

title: Mother’s Mercy
Name: sam
text: sam Very carefully.

title: Mother’s Mercy
Name: jon
text: jon I'm glad the end of the worldo s working out for someone.

title: Mother’s Mercy
Name: sam
text: sam I'll come back.

title: Mother’s Mercy
Name: jon
text: jon To your return.

title: Mother’s Mercy
Name: sam
text: sam To my return.

title: Mother’s Mercy
Name: podrick
text: podrick My lady! Stannis. Stannis Baratheon is coming. His whole army.

title: Mother’s Mercy
Name: brienne
text: brienne How do you know it's Stannis?

title: Mother’s Mercy
Name: podrick
text: podrick He's carrying his flaming heart banners. From the Blackwater. I'll never forget it.

title: Mother’s Mercy
Name: stannis
text: stannis Trench here. Another one 300 yards from the castle wall. Hurry them along. And send out a foraging party immediately. The siege begins at sunrise.

title: Mother’s Mercy
Name: soldier
text: soldier There's not going to be a siege, Your Grace.

title: Mother’s Mercy
Name: stannis
text: stannis Bolton has women fighting for him.

title: Mother’s Mercy
Name: brienne
text: brienne I do not fight for the Boltons. I'm Brienne of Tarth. I was Kingsguard to Renly Baratheon. I was there when he was murdered by a shadow with your face. You murdered him? With blood magic?

title: Mother’s Mercy
Name: stannis
text: stannis I did.

title: Mother’s Mercy
Name: brienne
text: brienne In the name of Renly of House Baratheon, First of his Name, Rightful King of the Andals and the First Men, Lord of the Seven Kingdoms, and Protector of the Realm, I, Brienne of Tarth, sentence you to die. Do you have any last words?

title: Mother’s Mercy
Name: stannis
text: stannis Go on, do your duty.

title: Mother’s Mercy
Name: ramsay
text: ramsay Looks like we're done here.

title: Mother’s Mercy
Name: survivor
text: survivor I surrender. I surrender!

title: Mother’s Mercy
Name: ramsay
text: ramsay And I accept your surrender.

title: Mother’s Mercy
Name: ramsay
text: ramsay Let's head back. My wife must be lonely.

title: Mother’s Mercy
Name: myranda
text: myranda My lady. I have come to escort you back to your chamber.

title: Mother’s Mercy
Name: theon
text: theon Go with her. Please.

title: Mother’s Mercy
Name: sansa
text: sansa I know what Ramsay is. I know what he'll do to me. If I'm going to die, let it happen while there's some of me left.

title: Mother’s Mercy
Name: myranda
text: myranda Die? Who said anything about dying? You can't die yet. Your father was Warden of the North, and Ramsay needs you. Though I suppose he doesn't need all of you. Just the parts he'll use to make his heir. Until you've given him a boy or two and he's finished using them. He's got incredible plans for those parts. So. Shall we wait for him to come back, or shall we begin now?

title: Mother’s Mercy
Name: myranda
text: myranda You're leaving it to me? Good. Let's begin.

title: Mother’s Mercy
Name: myranda
text: myranda Stop! Stop!

title: Mother’s Mercy
Name: man
text: man Open the gates!

title: Mother’s Mercy
Name: theon
text: theon He's coming back.

title: Mother’s Mercy
Name: meryn
text: meryn I can see I have my work cut out for me.You two. Out.

title: Mother’s Mercy
Name: arya
text: arya You were the first person on my list, you know. For killing Syrio Forel, remember him? Probably not. I've gotten a few of the others. The Many Faced God stole a few more for me. I'm glad he left me you. Do you know who I am?

title: Mother’s Mercy
Name: arya
text: arya I can't hear you.

title: Mother’s Mercy
Name: arya
text: arya You know who I am. I'm Arya Stark.

title: Mother’s Mercy
Name: arya
text: arya Do you know who you are?

title: Mother’s Mercy
Name: arya
text: arya You're no one. You're nothing.

title: Mother’s Mercy
Name: jaqen
text: jaqen A girl has taken a life. The wrong life.

title: Mother’s Mercy
Name: waif
text: waif I was right about her.

title: Mother’s Mercy
Name: jaqen
text: jaqen You were.

title: Mother’s Mercy
Name: waif
text: waif You're not ready. Not at all.

title: Mother’s Mercy
Name: jaqen
text: jaqen That man's life wasn't yours to take. A girl stole from the Many Faced God. Now a debt is owed.

title: Mother’s Mercy
Name: jaqen
text: jaqen Only death can pay for life.

title: Mother’s Mercy
Name: arya
text: arya No! No! No, you don't die! Don't die!

title: Mother’s Mercy
Name: waif
text: waif Why are you crying?

title: Mother’s Mercy
Name: arya
text: arya He was my friend.

title: Mother’s Mercy
Name: waif
text: waif No he wasn't. Didn't you listen to him?

title: Mother’s Mercy
Name: jaqen
text: jaqen He was no one.

title: Mother’s Mercy
Name: arya
text: arya But if you're… Who's this?

title: Mother’s Mercy
Name: jaqen
text: jaqen No one at all. Just as a girl should have been before she took a face from the hall.

title: Mother’s Mercy
Name: jaqen
text: jaqen The faces are for no one.

title: Mother’s Mercy
Name: jaqen
text: jaqen You are still someone.

title: Mother’s Mercy
Name: jaqen
text: jaqen And to someone…

title: Mother’s Mercy
Name: jaqen
text: jaqen the faces are as good as poison.

title: Mother’s Mercy
Name: arya
text: arya I can't see!

title: Mother’s Mercy
Name: arya
text: arya What's happening?! What's happening?!

title: Mother’s Mercy
Name: doran
text: doran I wish you a safe journey home.

title: Mother’s Mercy
Name: jaime
text: jaime Thank you.

title: Mother’s Mercy
Name: ellaria
text: ellaria Forgive me child. I wish you all the happiness in the world.

title: Mother’s Mercy
Name: bronn
text: bronn Maybe I'll come visit you sometime.

title: Mother’s Mercy
Name: tyene
text: tyene Maybe I'll come visit you.

title: Mother’s Mercy
Name: bronn
text: bronn Don't wait too long. I've a noble woman to marry back home.

title: Mother’s Mercy
Name: tyene
text: tyene You want a good girl, but you need the bad pussy.

title: Mother’s Mercy
Name: jaime
text: jaime Whenever you're ready, My Lord.

title: Mother’s Mercy
Name: jaime
text: jaime Try not to lose it this time.

title: Mother’s Mercy
Name: myrcella
text: myrcella I'll never take it off again.

title: Mother’s Mercy
Name: jaime
text: jaime I know you didn't want to leave Dorne. But I'm glad you're coming home. Your mother's desperate to see you. And I'm glad Trystane's coming with us. He seems like a nice boy. You're lucky. Arranged marriages are rarely so… so well arranged.

title: Mother’s Mercy
Name: myrcella
text: myrcella Do you think mother will like him.

title: Mother’s Mercy
Name: jaime
text: jaime If she sees you're happy, I'm sure she will.

title: Mother’s Mercy
Name: myrcella
text: myrcella And you really believe that?

title: Mother’s Mercy
Name: jaime
text: jaime Have you ever known your mother to like anyone aside from her children?

title: Mother’s Mercy
Name: myrcella
text: myrcella She likes you.

title: Mother’s Mercy
Name: jaime
text: jaime I'm not so sure about that. Listen. There's something I've wanted to tell you. Something I should have told you long ago. So. Now that you've seen more of the world, you've learned how complicated things can be. People can be. The Lannisters and the Martells have hated each other for years, but you've fallen in love with Trystane. It was an accident, really, I mean what were the chances? You happen to fall in love with the man you were assigned to marry? My point is… we don't choose whom we love. We just… It's beyond our control. I sound like an idiot.

title: Mother’s Mercy
Name: myrcella
text: myrcella No you don't.

title: Mother’s Mercy
Name: jaime
text: jaime What I'm trying to say. What I'm trying and failing to say…

title: Mother’s Mercy
Name: myrcella
text: myrcella I know what you're trying to say.

title: Mother’s Mercy
Name: jaime
text: jaime No. I'm afraid you don't.

title: Mother’s Mercy
Name: myrcella
text: myrcella I do.

title: Mother’s Mercy
Name: myrcella
text: myrcella I know. About you and mother. I think a part of me always knew. And I'm glad. I'm glad that you're my father.

title: Mother’s Mercy
Name: jaime
text: jaime Myrcella?

title: Mother’s Mercy
Name: jaime
text: jaime Myrcella?!

title: Mother’s Mercy
Name: jaime
text: jaime Myrcella?! Myrcella?!

title: Mother’s Mercy
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion You love her, don't you? How could you not. Of course, it's hopeless for the both of you. Sellsword from the fighting pits, a disgraced knight. Neither one of you is fit consort for a queen. But, we always want the wrong woman.

title: Mother’s Mercy
Name: daario
text: daario Does he always talk so much?

title: Mother’s Mercy
Name: grey
text: grey Jorah the Andal.

title: Mother’s Mercy
Name: jorah
text: jorah Torgo Nudho.

title: Mother’s Mercy
Name: grey
text: grey You should not be here.

title: Mother’s Mercy
Name: daario
text: daario No, but he is.

title: Mother’s Mercy
Name: grey
text: grey Our queen ordered him exiled from city.

title: Mother’s Mercy
Name: daario
text: daario Our queen would be dead if not for him.

title: Mother’s Mercy
Name: missandei
text: missandei It's true. And I would be dead if not for the… little man.

title: Mother’s Mercy
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion Dwarf. I believe that's the word. Apologies. My Valyrian is a bit “nostril”.

title: Mother’s Mercy
Name: missandei
text: missandei A bit “rusty”.

title: Mother’s Mercy
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion Rusty” Thank you.

title: Mother’s Mercy
Name: grey
text: grey I am sorry. Sorry I am not there to fight for my queen.

title: Mother’s Mercy
Name: daario
text: daario You missed a good scrap.

title: Mother’s Mercy
Name: jorah
text: jorah None of that matters now. The longer we sit here bantering the longer Daenerys is out there in the wilderness.

title: Mother’s Mercy
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion He's right. The dragon headed north. If we're going to find her, that's where we're to go.

title: Mother’s Mercy
Name: jorah
text: jorah We? You're a Lannister. The Queen intends to remove your family from power.

title: Mother’s Mercy
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion And I intend to help her do it.

title: Mother’s Mercy
Name: jorah
text: jorah You've been here for how many days now? I've fought for her for years. Since she was little more than a child.

title: Mother’s Mercy
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion You betrayed her!

title: Mother’s Mercy
Name: jorah
text: jorah Careful now.

title: Mother’s Mercy
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion And she exiled you, twice, I believe?

title: Mother’s Mercy
Name: jorah
text: jorah The second time thanks to you.

title: Mother’s Mercy
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion Don't blame me for your crimes, Mormont.

title: Mother’s Mercy
Name: daario
text: daario He's right. The Queen exiled Jorah. And he's right, Jorah saved her life. Perhaps she feels differently about him now. Perhaps not. The only way we'll know is if we ask her.

title: Mother’s Mercy
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion Fine, fine, I suppose he can join us. Just as long as he promises not to kill me in my sleep.

title: Mother’s Mercy
Name: jorah
text: jorah If I ever kill you your eyes will be wide open.

title: Mother’s Mercy
Name: daario
text: daario Forgive me, but why would we bring you?

title: Mother’s Mercy
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion Pardon me?

title: Mother’s Mercy
Name: daario
text: daario Have you ever tracked animals in the wilderness?

title: Mother’s Mercy
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion Not precisely, but I have other skills that'd be very useful--

title: Mother’s Mercy
Name: daario
text: daario Can you fight?

title: Mother’s Mercy
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion I have fought. I don't claim to be a great warrior.

title: Mother’s Mercy
Name: daario
text: daario Are you good on a horse?

title: Mother’s Mercy
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion Middling.

title: Mother’s Mercy
Name: daario
text: daario So mainly you talk?

title: Mother’s Mercy
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion And drink. I've survived so far.

title: Mother’s Mercy
Name: daario
text: daario Which I respect. But you would not help us on this expedition. You would help us here in Meereen, though. None of us have any experience governing a city, except for him. You want to prove your value to the queen? Prove it right here in Meereen.

title: Mother’s Mercy
Name: jorah
text: jorah He's a foreign dwarf that barely speaks the language. Why would the Meereenese listen to him?

title: Mother’s Mercy
Name: daario
text: daario They wouldn't. They will listen to Grey Worm.

title: Mother’s Mercy
Name: grey
text: grey I'll come with you. I'll find our queen.

title: Mother’s Mercy
Name: missandei
text: missandei You are not strong enough to go anywhere.

title: Mother’s Mercy
Name: grey
text: grey I am.

title: Mother’s Mercy
Name: daario
text: daario He is, he's the toughest man with no balls I've ever met. But you still can't go. The people believe in you. They know you speak for the queen.

title: Mother’s Mercy
Name: missandei
text: missandei It's true. Only the Unsullied can keep the peace in Meereen. If you leave, half the city will consume the other half.

title: Mother’s Mercy
Name: daario
text: daario And Missandei. Our queen trusts no one more than Missandei. Certainly not me. The queen's closest confidant, the commander of the Unsullied, and the foreign dwarf with the scarred face. Good fortune, my friends, Meereen is ancient and glorious. Try not to ruin her. Looks like it's you and me, Jorah the Andal. Let's find some good horses. We have so much to talk about.

title: Mother’s Mercy
Name: voice
text: voice Hello, old friend.

title: Mother’s Mercy
Name: varys
text: varys I thought we were so happy together until you abandoned me.

title: Mother’s Mercy
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion I suppose there's no point in asking how you found me.

title: Mother’s Mercy
Name: varys
text: varys The birds sing in the west, the birds sing in the east. If one knows how to listen. They tell me you've already found favor with the Mother of Dragons.

title: Mother’s Mercy
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion Well, she didn't execute me, so that's a promising start. Now the heroes are off to find her, and I'm stuck here, trying to placate a city on the brink of civil war. Any advice for an old comrade?

title: Mother’s Mercy
Name: varys
text: varys Information is the key. You need to learn your enemies' strengths and strategies. You need to learn which of your friends are not your friends.

title: Mother’s Mercy
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion If only I knew someone with a vast network of spies.

title: Mother’s Mercy
Name: varys
text: varys If only. A grand old city, choking on violence, corruption, and deceit. Who could possibly have any experience managing such a massive, ungainly beast?

title: Mother’s Mercy
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion I did miss you.

title: Mother’s Mercy
Name: varys
text: varys Oh, I know.

title: Mother’s Mercy
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys We have to go home.

title: Mother’s Mercy
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys My poor, sweet thing. Does it hurt? We have to go home. Drogon? Can you take me back to Meereen?

title: Mother’s Mercy
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys How far did you carry me?

title: Mother’s Mercy
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys Drogon, we need to return. My people need me.

title: Mother’s Mercy
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys Well, there's no food. At the very least you can hunt us some supper.

title: Mother’s Mercy
Name: septa
text: septa Confess. Confess.

title: Mother’s Mercy
Name: cersei
text: cersei I have sinned. I see that now. How could I have been so blind for so long. I want to be clean again. I want absolution. The Crone came to me with her lamp raised high, and with its holy light--

title: Mother’s Mercy
Name: sparrow
text: sparrow You wish to make a confession?

title: Mother’s Mercy
Name: cersei
text: cersei Once I've confessed, will I be free?

title: Mother’s Mercy
Name: sparrow
text: sparrow Your Grace will be dealt with according to her sins.

title: Mother’s Mercy
Name: cersei
text: cersei The Mother have mercy then. I lay with a man outside the bonds of marriage, I confess.

title: Mother’s Mercy
Name: sparrow
text: sparrow Name him.

title: Mother’s Mercy
Name: cersei
text: cersei Lancel Lannister.

title: Mother’s Mercy
Name: sparrow
text: sparrow Your cousin. And the King's squire.

title: Mother’s Mercy
Name: cersei
text: cersei I was lonely and afraid.

title: Mother’s Mercy
Name: sparrow
text: sparrow You had a husband.

title: Mother’s Mercy
Name: cersei
text: cersei A husband of whoring every chance he got.

title: Mother’s Mercy
Name: sparrow
text: sparrow His sins do not pardon your own.

title: Mother’s Mercy
Name: cersei
text: cersei May the gods forgive me.

title: Mother’s Mercy
Name: sparrow
text: sparrow Other men?

title: Mother’s Mercy
Name: cersei
text: cersei No.

title: Mother’s Mercy
Name: sparrow
text: sparrow No others?

title: Mother’s Mercy
Name: sparrow
text: sparrow Speaking falsehoods before the Gods is a great crime. You understand this?

title: Mother’s Mercy
Name: cersei
text: cersei I do.

title: Mother’s Mercy
Name: sparrow
text: sparrow There are those who say your children were not fathered by King Robert. That they are bastards born of incest and adultery.

title: Mother’s Mercy
Name: cersei
text: cersei A lie. A lie from the lips of Stannis Baratheon. He wants the Throne, but his brother's children stand in his way, so he claims they are not his brothers'. The filth. There is not one shred of truth to it. I deny it.

title: Mother’s Mercy
Name: sparrow
text: sparrow Good. But these are terrible charges. And the realm must know the truth of them. If Your Grace has given honest testimony, your trial will prove your innocence.

title: Mother’s Mercy
Name: cersei
text: cersei Trial? I have confessed?

title: Mother’s Mercy
Name: sparrow
text: sparrow To a single sin. Others you have denied. Your trial will separate the truths from the falsehoods.

title: Mother’s Mercy
Name: cersei
text: cersei I bow to the wisdom of your High Holiness. But if I might beg for just one drop of the Mother's mercy. I haven't seen my son… I don't know how long it's been. I need to see him. Please.

title: Mother’s Mercy
Name: sparrow
text: sparrow You have taken the first step on a path back to righteousness. In light of this, I will permit you to return to the Red Keep.

title: Mother’s Mercy
Name: cersei
text: cersei Thank you. Thank you.

title: Mother’s Mercy
Name: sparrow
text: sparrow The Mother is merciful. It is her you should thank.

title: Mother’s Mercy
Name: cersei
text: cersei I will, I will. I swear it, day and night.

title: Mother’s Mercy
Name: sparrow
text: sparrow Good.

title: Mother’s Mercy
Name: cersei
text: cersei Am I free to go?

title: Mother’s Mercy
Name: sparrow
text: sparrow After your atonement.

title: Mother’s Mercy
Name: cersei
text: cersei My atonement?

title: Mother’s Mercy
Name: sparrow
text: sparrow A sinner comes before you. Cersei of House Lannister, mother to his Grace King Tommen, widow to his Grace King Robert. She has committed the acts of falsehood and fornication. She has confessed her sins and begged for forgiveness. To demonstrate her repentance, she will cast aside all pride, all artifice, and present herself as the gods made her, to you. The good people of the city. She comes before you with a solemn heart. Shorn of secrets. Naked before the eyes of gods and men. To make her walk of atonement.

title: Mother’s Mercy
Name: septa
text: septa Shame. Shame. Shame.

title: Mother’s Mercy
Name: crowd
text: crowd Bitch! Whore! All hail her royal tits!

title: Mother’s Mercy
Name: woman
text: woman I've had half as many cocks as the queen!

title: Mother’s Mercy
Name: man
text: man Suck me off! Suck me off, you bitch!

title: Mother’s Mercy
Name: qyburn
text: qyburn Your Grace. It's good to have you back. Come. We'll take you inside. I need to have a look at those feet.

title: Mother’s Mercy
Name: qyburn
text: qyburn May I have the honor of presenting the newest member of the Kingsguard.

title: Mother’s Mercy
Name: qyburn
text: qyburn If it please Your Grace, he's taken a holy vow of silence. He has sworn that he will not speak until all his Grace's enemies are dead, and the evil has been driven from the realm.

title: Mother’s Mercy
Name: davos
text: davos He came to your aid. Stannis. Now he needs you!

title: Mother’s Mercy
Name: jon
text: jon We don't have enough men to make any difference.

title: Mother’s Mercy

text: olly Says he was first Ranger. Said he knows where to find him.

title: Mother’s Mercy

title: Mother’s Mercy

text: jon He could be lying.

text: alliser Could be. There are ways to find out.

title: Mother’s Mercy

text: jon Where is he?

title: Mother’s Mercy

text: alliser Over there.

title: Mother’s Mercy
Name: alliser
text: alliser For the Watch.

title: Mother’s Mercy
Name: brother
text: brother For the Watch.

title: Mother’s Mercy
Name: jon
text: jon Olly…

title: Mother’s Mercy
Name: olly
text: olly For the Watch.

title: Mother’s Mercy
Name: end
text: end EPISODE

text: end SEASON
