text: balon Not if our captains defy my orders, abandon their posts, and sacrifice our men on foolish mission

title: Home
Name: yara
text: yara I won't apologize for trying to rescue Theon

title: Home
Name: balon
text: balon Then where is he

title: Home
Name: yara
text: yara Where is your kingdom We took those castles because the northerners marched off to war That war is over The last time we provoked them too far, I watched from that window as they breached our walls and knocked down our towers I lost two brothers that day

title: Home
Name: balon
text: balon And I lost three sons The War of the Five Kings, they call it Well, the other four are dead When you rule the Iron Islands, you can wage all the peace you wan. But for now, shut your mouth and obey or I will make another heir who will

title: Home
Name: balon
text: balon Let me pass. You fool, move aside for your king.

title: Home
Name: hooded
text: hooded Haven't I always, brother?

title: Home
Name: balon
text: balon I thought you'd be rotting under some foreign sea by now

title: Home
Name: euron
text: euron What is dead may never die

title: Home
Name: euron
text: euron Has the custom changed since I've been gone? Aren't you supposed to repeat the words?

title: Home
Name: balon
text: balon You can mock our god without my help

title: Home
Name: euron
text: euron I don't mock the Drowned God I am the Drowned God From Oldtown to Qarth, when men see my sails, they pray

title: Home
Name: euron
text: euron You're old, brother You've had your time Now let another rule

title: Home
Name: balon
text: balon I heard you lost your mind during the storm on the Jade Sea They tied you to the mast to keep you from jumping overboard

title: Home
Name: euron
text: euron They did

title: Home
Name: balon
text: balon And when the storm passed, you cut out their tongues

title: Home
Name: euron
text: euron I needed silence

title: Home
Name: balon
text: balon What kind of an Ironborn loses his senses during a storm

title: Home
Name: euron
text: euron I am the storm, brother The first storm and the last And you're in my way

title: Home
Name: aeron
text: aeron Lord, take your servant Balon back beneath the waves Feed the creatures of your kingdom on his flesh Pull his bones down to your depths to rest beside his ancestors and his children

title: Home
Name: all
text: all What is dead may never die

title: Home
Name: yara
text: yara I'm going to find out who did this I'm going to feed them to the sharks while they live I swear it by the Salt Throne

title: Home
Name: aeron
text: aeron The Salt Throne is not yours to swear upon, not unless the kingsmoot chooses you

title: Home
Name: yara
text: yara My father wouldo ve wanted me to rule

title: Home
Name: aeron
text: aeron Your father does not get to choose The law is clear Perhaps you'll win Perhaps you'll be the first woman in history to rule the Ironborn And perhaps not

title: Home
Name: melisandre
text: melisandre Come in

title: Home
Name: davos
text: davos I'm sorry, my lady I didn't mean to interrupt

title: Home
Name: melisandre
text: melisandre You interrupt nothing

title: Home
Name: davos
text: davos I assume you know why I'm here

title: Home
Name: melisandre
text: melisandre I will after you tell me

title: Home
Name: davos
text: davos It's about the Lord Commander

title: Home
Name: melisandre
text: melisandre The former Lord Commander

title: Home
Name: davos
text: davos Does he have to be?

title: Home
Name: melisandre
text: melisandre What are you asking

title: Home
Name: davos
text: davos Do you know of any magicthat could help him? Bring him back?

title: Home
Name: melisandre
text: melisandre If you want to help him, leave him be

title: Home
Name: davos
text: davos Can it be done

title: Home
Name: melisandre
text: melisandre There are some with his power

title: Home
Name: davos
text: davos How

title: Home
Name: melisandre
text: melisandre I don't know

title: Home
Name: davos
text: davos Have you seen it done

title: Home
Name: melisandre
text: melisandre I met a man who came back from the dead, but the priest who did it -- It shouldn't have been possible

title: Home
Name: davos
text: davos But it was It could be now

title: Home
Name: melisandre
text: melisandre Not for me

title: Home
Name: davos
text: davos Not for you? I saw you drink poison that shouldo ve killed you I saw you give birth to a demon made of shadows

title: Home
Name: melisandre
text: melisandre Everything I believed, the great victory I saw in the flames, all of it was a lie

title: Home
Name: melisandre
text: melisandre You were right all along The Lord never spoke to me

title: Home
Name: davos
text: davos Fuck him, then Fuck all of them I'm not a devout man, obviously Seven Gods, drowned gods, tree gods, it's all the same

title: Home
Name: davos
text: davos I'm not asking the Lord of Light for helpI'm asking the woman who showed me that miracles exist

title: Home
Name: melisandre
text: melisandre I never had this gift

title: Home
Name: davos
text: davos Have you ever tried?

title: Home
Name: melisandre
text: melisandre Please

title: Oathbreaker
Name: davos
text: davos Easy, easy Easy

title: Oathbreaker
Name: davos
text: davos What do you remember?

title: Oathbreaker
Name: jon
text: jon They stabbed me Olly...he put a knife in my heart I shouldn't be here

title: Oathbreaker
Name: davos
text: davos The lady brought you back.

title: Oathbreaker
Name: melisandre
text: melisandre Afterwards, after they stabbed you, after you died, where did you go? What did you see?

title: Oathbreaker
Name: jon
text: jon Nothing There was nothing at all

title: Oathbreaker
Name: melisandre
text: melisandre The Lord let you come back for a reason Stannis was not the prince who was promised, but someone has to be

title: Oathbreaker
Name: davos
text: davos Could you give us a moment?

title: Oathbreaker
Name: davos
text: davos You were dead And now you're not That's completely fucking mad, seems to me I can only imagine how it seems to you

title: Oathbreaker
Name: jon
text: jon I did what I thought was right And I got murdered for it And now I'm back Why?

title: Oathbreaker
Name: davos
text: davos I don't know Maybe we'll never know What does it matter? You go on You fight for as long as you can You clean up as much of the shit as you can

title: Oathbreaker
Name: jon
text: jon I don't know how to do that I thought I did, but...I failed

title: Oathbreaker
Name: davos
text: davos Good Now go fail again

title: Oathbreaker
Name: tormund
text: tormund They think you're some kind of god The man who returned from the dead

title: Oathbreaker
Name: jon
text: jon I'm not a god

title: Oathbreaker
Name: tormund
text: tormund I know that

title: Oathbreaker
Name: tormund
text: tormund I saw your pecker What kind of god would have a pecker that small?

title: Oathbreaker
Name: dolorous
text: dolorous Your eyes are still brown Is that still you in there?

title: Oathbreaker
Name: jon
text: jon I think so Hold off on burning my body for now

title: Oathbreaker
Name: dolorous
text: dolorous That's funny You sure that's still you in there?

title: Oathbreaker
Name: gilly
text: gilly You all right?

title: Oathbreaker
Name: sam
text: sam Yes Yes, I'm fine

title: Oathbreaker
Name: gilly
text: gilly Did I ever tell you I used to think the sea was called the see because it was nothing but water as far as the eye could see?

title: Oathbreaker
Name: sam
text: sam I don't think so

title: Oathbreaker
Name: gilly
text: gilly Sea, see They're spelled different, but they sound the same

title: Oathbreaker
Name: sam
text: sam Yeah, they do

title: Oathbreaker
Name: gilly
text: gilly It was before I learned how to read, obviously

title: Oathbreaker
Name: gilly
text: gilly Sam, are you going to be sick?

title: Oathbreaker
Name: gilly
text: gilly Won't be long We'll be in the south soon I'm excited to see Oldtown Captain says it's the most beautiful city in Westeros Are you going to vomit again?

title: Oathbreaker
Name: sam
text: sam No No, no, no The Citadel doesn't admit women There won't be a place for you there or for Little Sam

title: Oathbreaker
Name: gilly
text: gilly I stayed at Castle Black There's no women allowed there

title: Oathbreaker
Name: sam
text: sam The Citadel isn't Castle Black I don't have a Jon Snow or a Maester Aemon to help me bend the rules

title: Oathbreaker
Name: gilly
text: gilly I'll stay in Oldtown, then

title: Oathbreaker
Name: sam
text: sam By yourself? With a baby and no money?

title: Oathbreaker
Name: gilly
text: gilly So if we're not going to Oldtown, where are you taking me?

title: Oathbreaker
Name: sam
text: sam To my home Horn Hill My father's -- well, my father, but my mother's a kind woman and my sister's lovely They'll take care of you both

title: Oathbreaker
Name: gilly
text: gilly Wherever you go, I go, too” That's what you said

title: Oathbreaker
Name: sam
text: sam I said that because I want you and Little Same to be safe That's all I want -- to become a maester so I can help Jon when the time comes so you'll be safe

title: Oathbreaker
Name: gilly
text: gilly Us and everyone else in the world

title: Oathbreaker
Name: sam
text: sam I don't care about them Well, no, I do, but I don't really I care about you and him

title: Oathbreaker
Name: gilly
text: gilly I know that, Sam And he does, too You're the only one who ever has

title: Oathbreaker
Name: gilly
text: gilly If you think it's for the best, we trust you

title: Oathbreaker
Name: sam
text: sam I'd feel better if you threw something at me and stormed off

title: Oathbreaker
Name: gilly
text: gilly I'd never do that to the father of my son

title: Oathbreaker
Name: bran
text: bran That's my father

title: Oathbreaker
Name: threeeyed
text: threeeyed The man beside him is Howland Reed, Meera's father.

title: Oathbreaker
Name: bran
text: bran Ser Arthur Dayne

title: Oathbreaker
Name: threeeyed
text: threeeyed The Sword of the Morning

title: Oathbreaker
Name: bran
text: bran Father said he was the best swordsman he ever saw

title: Oathbreaker
Name: arthur
text: arthur Lord Stark

title: Oathbreaker
Name: eddard
text: eddard I looked for you on the Trident

title: Oathbreaker
Name: arthur
text: arthur We weren't there

title: Oathbreaker
Name: kingsguard
text: kingsguard Your friend the usurper would lie beneath the ground if we had been

title: Oathbreaker
Name: eddard
text: eddard The Mad King is dead Rhaegar lies beneath the ground Why weren't you there to protect your prince?

title: Oathbreaker
Name: arthur
text: arthur Our prince wanted us here

title: Oathbreaker
Name: eddard
text: eddard Where's my sister?

title: Oathbreaker
Name: arthur
text: arthur I wish you good fortune in the wars to come

title: Oathbreaker
Name: arthur
text: arthur And now it begins

title: Oathbreaker
Name: eddard
text: eddard No Now it ends

title: Oathbreaker
Name: bran
text: bran He's better than my father

title: Oathbreaker
Name: threeeyed
text: threeeyed Far better

title: Oathbreaker
Name: bran
text: bran But Father beat him

title: Oathbreaker
Name: threeeyed
text: threeeyed Did he?

title: Oathbreaker
Name: bran
text: bran I know he did Heard the story a thousand times

title: Oathbreaker
Name: bran
text: bran He stabbed him in the back

title: Oathbreaker
Name: bran
text: bran What's in the tower?

title: Oathbreaker
Name: threeeyed
text: threeeyed That's enough for one day We'll visit again another time

title: Oathbreaker
Name: bran
text: bran I want to see where he's going

title: Oathbreaker
Name: threeeyed
text: threeeyed Time to go

title: Oathbreaker
Name: bran
text: bran Father!

title: Oathbreaker
Name: bran
text: bran Why did you do that? Take me back there I want to go back

title: Oathbreaker
Name: threeeyed
text: threeeyed No

title: Oathbreaker
Name: bran
text: bran He heard me

title: Oathbreaker
Name: threeeyed
text: threeeyed Maybe Maybe he heard the wind

title: Oathbreaker
Name: threeeyed
text: threeeyed The past is already written The ink is dry

title: Oathbreaker
Name: bran
text: bran What's in that tower? I want to go back there

title: Oathbreaker
Name: threeeyed
text: threeeyed I've told you many times, stay too long where you don't belong and you will never return

title: Oathbreaker
Name: bran
text: bran Why do I want to return? So I can be a cripple again? So I can talk to an old man in a tree?

title: Oathbreaker
Name: threeeyed
text: threeeyed You think I wanted to sit here for 1,000 years watching the world from a distance as the roots grew through me?

title: Oathbreaker
Name: bran
text: bran So why did you?

title: Oathbreaker
Name: threeeyed
text: threeeyed I was waiting for you

title: Oathbreaker
Name: bran
text: bran I don't want to be you

title: Oathbreaker
Name: threeeyed
text: threeeyed I don't blame you You won't be here forever You won't be an old man in a tree But before you leave, you must learn

title: Oathbreaker
Name: bran
text: bran Learn what?

title: Oathbreaker
Name: threeeyed
text: threeeyed Everything

title: Oathbreaker
Name: bloodrider
text: bloodrider Hey, Great Khaleesi Move your ass

title: Oathbreaker
Name: khal
text: khal Welcome home, Khaleesi

title: Oathbreaker
Name: dothraki
text: dothraki Go

title: Oathbreaker
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys What are you doing?! Take your hands off me! I will have your heads!

title: Oathbreaker
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys You have made a mistake One you will regret I am the wife of the Great Khal

title: Oathbreaker
Name: dothraki
text: dothraki We know who you are I remember you eating the stallion's heart Why didn't you come to us after Khal Drogo died?

title: Oathbreaker
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys Because I am Daenerys Stormborn, the Breaker of Chains, the Queen of Meereen and the Mother of Dragons My place is not here with you

title: Oathbreaker
Name: dothraki
text: dothraki You were the wife of the Great Khal You thought he would conquer the world with you at his side He didn't I was the wife of the Great Khal Khal Savo I thought he would conquer the world with me at his side You're young We were all young once But we all understand the way things are You will learn as well, if you are fortunate enough to stay with us

title: Oathbreaker
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys Where else would I go? Every khaleesi becomes Dosh Khaleen

title: Oathbreaker
Name: dothraki
text: dothraki Yes Immediately after the death of their khal But you went out into the world That is forbidden All the khalasars have returned for the Khalar Vezhven They will decide which cities will be sacked and which tribes will be enslaved And now they must decide what to do with Khal Drogo's silver-haired widow With luck, your place will be here with us, Mother of Dragons It is the best you can hope for, now

title: Oathbreaker
Name: varys
text: varys I don't know how you stand it in all that leather

title: Oathbreaker
Name: varys
text: varys If we could have the room

title: Oathbreaker
Name: varys
text: varys You look lovely today, my dear You really do How you climbed all those steps without breaking a sweat

title: Oathbreaker
Name: woman
text: woman If you're going to torture me, just call them back and get on with it

title: Oathbreaker
Name: varys
text: varys I am not a torturer

title: Oathbreaker
Name: varys
text: varys Though it so often is what people deserve

title: Oathbreaker
Name: varys
text: varys And it does provide answers But they're usually the wrong answers My job is to find the right answers Do you know how I do that? I do it by making people happy I'd like to make you happy, Vala That's your name, isn't it, Vala?

title: Oathbreaker
Name: varys
text: varys That's all right I know who you are and what you've done You've done a lot You've sacrificed your body for a cause, which is more than most people do And you've helped the Sons of the Harpy murder the Unsullied and the Second Sons

title: Oathbreaker
Name: vala
text: vala The Unsullied and the Second Songs are foreign soldiers brought here by a foreign queen to destroy our city and our history

title: Oathbreaker
Name: varys
text: varys I understand Well, that makes perfect sense from your perspective I have a different perspective, of course I think it's important that you try to see things from my perspective just as I will try to see them from yours Because that is the only way that I can make you and Dom happy That is how you pronounce it -- Dom? I'm afraid I don't really speak the language Such a handsome boy Those big, brown eyes Good luck keeping the ladies away

title: Oathbreaker
Name: vala
text: vala Yes, you're a true liberator, aren't you? You won't torture me, you'll just threaten my son

title: Oathbreaker
Name: varys
text: varys Children are blameless I have never hurt them Your boy is in no immediate danger, this I swear to you But between us, dear, you did conspire to kill the queen's soldiers We both know the penalty for that crime How will poor Dom get on without his mother? And with his breathing problem

title: Oathbreaker
Name: vala
text: vala If I tell you anything, they'll kill me So either you kill me or they do

title: Oathbreaker
Name: varys
text: varys Yes, from your perspective, this is a problem There is a third option, though A ship leaving tomorrow for Pentos I've already booked passage for a woman and her young son I'll even throw in a bag of silver to help you start again

title: Oathbreaker
Name: varys
text: varys Though I'm afraid we'll have to ask one of our leather-clad friends back in to carry it Far too heavy for me The boat sails at dawn You need to decide now A new life for you and Dom or…

title: Oathbreaker
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion What should we do while we wait? To pass the time, what should we do? What should we talk about?

title: Oathbreaker
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion You speak 19 languages You must occasionally use some of them to talk about things

title: Oathbreaker
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion You two, you spend a great deal of time together What would you be talking about if I weren't here?

title: Oathbreaker
Name: grey
text: grey Patrol When I am going on patrol with the Unsullied What we see on patrol Who we captured on patrol

title: Oathbreaker
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion That's good That's very good

title: Oathbreaker
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion But that's a report I was thinking more of a conversation A wise man once said the truth history of the world is the history of great conversation in elegant rooms

title: Oathbreaker
Name: missandei
text: missandei Who said this?

title: Oathbreaker
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion Me Just now All right, no conversations Let's play a game

title: Oathbreaker
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion You don't play games, either one of you, ever?

title: Oathbreaker
Name: grey
text: grey Games are for children

title: Oathbreaker
Name: missandei
text: missandei My master Kraznys would sometimes make us play games

title: Oathbreaker
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion There, that's a start

title: Oathbreaker
Name: missandei
text: missandei Only the girls

title: Oathbreaker
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion Oh no, no, no Not that, of course not that Innocent games, fun games, drinking games

title: Oathbreaker
Name: missandei
text: missandei We do not drink

title: Oathbreaker
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion Until you do

title: Oathbreaker
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion Alright No drinking We can play without drinking It's a wonderful game I invented it Here's how it works I make a statement about your past If I'm wrong, I drink And if I'm right -- Maybe we can't play without drinking

title: Oathbreaker
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion Oh, you took your time

title: Oathbreaker
Name: varys
text: varys Sorry I was busy learning who funds the Sons of the Harpy Some things you can't rush

title: Oathbreaker
Name: missandei
text: missandei You found out?

title: Oathbreaker
Name: varys
text: varys The good masters of Astapor And the wise masters of Yunkai With help from their friends in Volantis

title: Oathbreaker
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion You see? You don't even have to worry about the local rebellion We only have to worry about the three rich foreign cities paying for it

title: Oathbreaker
Name: grey
text: grey We conquered Asatapor and Yunkai once We will do it again and execute the Masters

title: Oathbreaker
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion If the Unsullied march off to reconquer Asatapor and Yunkai, who remain to defend the free people of Meereen?

title: Oathbreaker
Name: grey
text: grey If we do not fight them, how can we stop them?

title: Oathbreaker
Name: missandei
text: missandei We cannot The Masters only speak one language They spoke it to me for many years I know it better than my mother tongue If we want them to hear us, we must speak it back to them May it be the last thing they ever hear

title: Oathbreaker
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion You may be right

title: Oathbreaker
Name: grey
text: grey So we will fight them?

title: Oathbreaker
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion Possibly

title: Oathbreaker
Name: missandei
text: missandei Possibly?

title: Oathbreaker
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion It's a conversation

title: Oathbreaker
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion Tell me, can the little birds get a message to the good Masters of Astapor, the wise Masters of Yunkai, the benevolent enslavers of Volantis

title: Oathbreaker
Name: varys
text: varys Of course Man can be fickle, but birds always trust

title: Oathbreaker
Name: qyburn
text: qyburn Your eye looks much better, Arthur How's your mother's jaw?

title: Oathbreaker
Name: arthur
text: arthur Better

title: Oathbreaker
Name: qyburn
text: qyburn And your father?

title: Oathbreaker
Name: arthur
text: arthur No one's seen him

title: Oathbreaker
Name: qyburn
text: qyburn And no one will That worked out rather nicely

title: Oathbreaker
Name: little
text: little Will Lord Varys ever come back?

title: Oathbreaker
Name: qyburn
text: qyburn I don't think so Do you miss him?

title: Oathbreaker
Name: little
text: little He was nice

title: Oathbreaker
Name: arthur
text: arthur He called us his little birds He gave us sweets

title: Oathbreaker
Name: qyburn
text: qyburn It's funny you should mention that Guess what I happened to find today Candied plums from Dorne

title: Oathbreaker
Name: qyburn
text: qyburn Now remember, if any of your friends like sweets or need help, they can always come to me All I need in return are whispers

title: Oathbreaker
Name: qyburn
text: qyburn No need to be afraid This is Ser Gregor He's friends with all my friends

title: Oathbreaker
Name: qyburn
text: qyburn Run along now

title: Oathbreaker
Name: cersei
text: cersei Varys's little birds

title: Oathbreaker
Name: qyburn
text: qyburn Your little birds now, your Grace

title: Oathbreaker
Name: jaime
text: jaime What did you do to him exactly I haven't been able to get a clear answer

title: Oathbreaker
Name: qyburn
text: qyburn Oh, a number of things

title: Oathbreaker
Name: jaime
text: jaime Does he understand what we're saying I mean, to the extent that he ever understood complete sentences in the first place

title: Oathbreaker
Name: qyburn
text: qyburn He understands well enough

title: Oathbreaker
Name: jaime
text: jaime So tell him to march into the sept and crush the High Sparrow's head like a melon

title: Oathbreaker
Name: cersei
text: cersei The High Sparrow has hundreds of Faith Militant surrounding him Ser Gregor will can't face them all And he won't have to He'll only have to face one

title: Oathbreaker
Name: jaime
text: jaime Has the Faith leveled official charges yet?

title: Oathbreaker
Name: cersei
text: cersei Not yet

title: Oathbreaker
Name: jaime
text: jaime That is one trial by combat I look forward to watching

title: Oathbreaker
Name: cersei
text: cersei Don't stop at the city I want little birds in Dorne, in Highgarden, in the North If someone is planning on making our losses their gains I want to hear it If someone is laughing at the queen who walk naked through the streets covered in shit, I want to hear I want to know who they are I want to where they are

title: Oathbreaker
Name: maester
text: maester As bad as Lord Varys was Varys was, Qyburn is worse I told them all I told them He's arrogant, dangerous You don't get thrown out of the Citadel without good reason And no one listened to my advice, so here we are

title: Oathbreaker
Name: maester
text: maester And what he's done to Gregor Clegane is an abomination We never sanctioned this, this experiment And I for one think it would be in our best interest to have the beast dest --

title: Oathbreaker
Name: kevan
text: kevan Can I help you

title: Oathbreaker
Name: cersei
text: cersei Why are you here

title: Oathbreaker
Name: mace
text: mace My mother...

title: Oathbreaker
Name: lady
text: lady I was invited, my dear, o help deal with several troublesome issues, such as the queen's imprisonment

title: Oathbreaker
Name: cersei
text: cersei Thank you for bringing it up It's well past time we addressed the abuses I endured

title: Oathbreaker
Name: lady
text: lady Margaery is the queen You are not the queen because you're not married to the king I do appreciate these things can get a bit confusing in your family

title: Oathbreaker
Name: kevan
text: kevan This is a Small Council meeting You have no position on the Small Council

title: Oathbreaker
Name: jaime
text: jaime I'm Lord Commander of the Kingsguard The Lord Commander of the Kingsguard does have a position on the Small Council

title: Oathbreaker
Name: cersei
text: cersei Grand Maester Pycelle, would you sanction that statement?

title: Oathbreaker
Name: maester
text: maester Well, um...I would say Ser Gerold Hightower had a seat on the Mad King's council Of course, that was the Mad King King Robert saw things differently

title: Oathbreaker
Name: cersei
text: cersei What about Myrcella's death, Uncle? Do you consider the murder of your own blood a troublesome issue?

title: Oathbreaker
Name: jaime
text: jaime The same women who murdered Myrcella have overthrown House Martell and taken control of Dorne We've got a lot to discuss All of us together

title: Oathbreaker
Name: cersei
text: cersei And seeing as you cannot make us leave, we best get on with it

title: Oathbreaker
Name: kevan
text: kevan No, we cannot make you leave And you cannot make us stay Not unless you're gonna have that thing murder us all

title: Oathbreaker
Name: sparrow
text: sparrow Oh, your Grace

title: Oathbreaker
Name: tommen
text: tommen My mother would like to see her daughter's final resting place

title: Oathbreaker
Name: sparrow
text: sparrow Oh, I'm, sorry, your Grace That's not possible Not yet

title: Oathbreaker
Name: tommen
text: tommen When will it be possible?

title: Oathbreaker
Name: sparrow
text: sparrow When she's fully atoned for her sins

title: Oathbreaker
Name: tommen
text: tommen You've cut off her hair and marched her naked through the streets in front of the whole city That wasn't a full atonement?

title: Oathbreaker
Name: sparrow
text: sparrow No She must stand trial before seven septons, so we can learn the true extant of her sins

title: Oathbreaker
Name: tommen
text: tommen I want you to let her see Myrcella's resting place

title: Oathbreaker
Name: tommen
text: tommen I am the king

title: Oathbreaker
Name: sparrow
text: sparrow You are

title: Oathbreaker
Name: tommen
text: tommen And what does that mean to you

title: Oathbreaker
Name: sparrow
text: sparrow It means a great deal to me The crown and the faith are the twin pillars of the world Do you know who told me that Your mother

title: Oathbreaker
Name: tommen
text: tommen My mother who is unclean? My mother who still needs to atone after all you've put her through?

title: Oathbreaker
Name: sparrow
text: sparrow How do you think the Mother Above first came to us? How did men and women first come to feel the Mother's presence? It was through their own mothers There is a great deal of falsehood in Cersei, you know that But when she speaks of you, the Mother's love outshines it all Her love for you is more real than anything else in this world Because it doesn't come from this world But you know that You've felt it You've seen her when she talks to you

title: Oathbreaker
Name: tommen
text: tommen Yes

title: Oathbreaker
Name: sparrow
text: sparrow It's a great gift One I never had Envy One more thing for me to atone for

title: Oathbreaker
Name: sparrow
text: sparrow You Grace, may I? Do you mind? It's my knees

title: Oathbreaker
Name: tommen
text: tommen Of course

title: Oathbreaker
Name: sparrow
text: sparrow When your mother made her walk of atonement, she did it to get back to you

title: Oathbreaker
Name: tommen
text: tommen I still don't understand why you want to put her through any more than she's already endured

title: Oathbreaker
Name: sparrow
text: sparrow It's not what I want It's what the gods want They make their will known to us and it's up to us to either accept or reject it

title: Oathbreaker
Name: sparrow
text: sparrow Please

title: Oathbreaker
Name: sparrow
text: sparrow If we're to be just and good, then we accept it, all of us, even kings A true leader avails himself of the wisest council he can And no one is wiser than the gods

title: Oathbreaker
Name: tommen
text: tommen My grandfather once said something similar Except for the part about the gods

title: Oathbreaker
Name: sparrow
text: sparrow The gods worked through him whether he knew it or not As they work through your mother There's so much good in all of us The best we can do is to help each other bring it out

title: Oathbreaker
Name: waif
text: waif Who are you

title: Oathbreaker
Name: arya
text: arya No one

title: Oathbreaker
Name: waif
text: waif Who were you before you came here

title: Oathbreaker
Name: arya
text: arya Arya Stark

title: Oathbreaker
Name: waif
text: waif Tell me about Arya Stark's family

title: Oathbreaker
Name: arya
text: arya Her father was Eddard Stark Her mother was Catelyn Stark She had one sister, Sansa, and four brothers

title: Oathbreaker
Name: arya
text: arya Three brothers

title: Oathbreaker
Name: arya
text: arya Rob, Bran, Rickon And a half-brother, Jon

title: Oathbreaker
Name: waif
text: waif And where are they now?

title: Oathbreaker
Name: arya
text: arya They may be dead for all a girl knows

title: Oathbreaker
Name: waif
text: waif Tell me about The Hound

title: Oathbreaker
Name: arya
text: arya Also dead

title: Oathbreaker
Name: arya
text: arya Arya Stark left him to die He was on her list

title: Oathbreaker
Name: arya
text: arya He was not on her list anymore She'd taken him off it

title: Oathbreaker
Name: waif
text: waif Why? Didn't she want him dead any longer

title: Oathbreaker
Name: arya
text: arya She did and she did not

title: Oathbreaker
Name: waif
text: waif She sounds confused

title: Oathbreaker
Name: arya
text: arya Yes, she was

title: Oathbreaker
Name: waif
text: waif Who else was on Arya Stark's funny little list?

title: Oathbreaker
Name: arya
text: arya Cersei Lannister, Gregor Clegane, Walder Frey

title: Oathbreaker
Name: waif
text: waif That's a short list That can't be everyone you want to kill

title: Oathbreaker
Name: waif
text: waif Are you sure you're not forgetting someone

title: Oathbreaker
Name: arya
text: arya Which name would you like a girl to speak?

title: Oathbreaker
Name: jaqen
text: jaqen If a girl tells me her name, I will give her eyes back

title: Oathbreaker
Name: arya
text: arya A girl has no name

title: Oathbreaker
Name: jaqen
text: jaqen Come

title: Oathbreaker
Name: jaqen
text: jaqen If a girl is truly no one, she has nothing to fear

title: Oathbreaker
Name: jaqen
text: jaqen Who are you?

title: Oathbreaker
Name: ramsay
text: ramsay The Umbers are a famously loyal house

title: Oathbreaker
Name: lord
text: lord Famously loyal to the Starks

title: Oathbreaker
Name: smalljon
text: smalljon And you, Lord Karstark Your people share blood with the Starks, don't they? But here we are Times change

title: Oathbreaker
Name: ramsay
text: ramsay When my father became Warden of the North, your house refused to pledge their banners

title: Oathbreaker
Name: smalljon
text: smalljon Your father was a cunt

title: Oathbreaker
Name: ramsay
text: ramsay My beloved father, the Warden --

title: Oathbreaker
Name: smalljon
text: smalljon Your father was a cunt and that's why you killed him I might've done the same to my father, if he hadn't have done me the favor of dying on his own

title: Oathbreaker
Name: ramsay
text: ramsay My father was poisoned by our enemies

title: Oathbreaker
Name: smalljon
text: smalljon Mmm

title: Oathbreaker
Name: ramsay
text: ramsay Why have you come to Winterfell, Lord Umber?

title: Oathbreaker
Name: smalljon
text: smalljon The bastard Jon Snow led an army of wildlings past the Wall We're farther north than any of you fuckers Wildlings come down, we always have to fight them first I like fighting wildlings, been doing it all my life But there are too many of them for us to beat back alone

title: Oathbreaker
Name: ramsay
text: ramsay So now you've come seeking help?

title: Oathbreaker
Name: smalljon
text: smalljon We need to help each other The colder it gets, the farther South those goat fuckers will roam Won't take them long to get here

title: Oathbreaker
Name: lord
text: lord You think a horde of wildlings can take Winterfell

title: Oathbreaker
Name: smalljon
text: smalljon If they get Jon Snow leading them, maybe He knows this place better than we ever will

title: Oathbreaker
Name: ramsay
text: ramsay Pledge your banners to House Bolton Swear loyalty to me as Warden of the North and we will fight together to destroy the bastard and all his wildling friends

title: Oathbreaker
Name: smalljon
text: smalljon I'm not kissing your fucking hand

title: Oathbreaker
Name: ramsay
text: ramsay Traditionally a bannerman kneels before his lord

title: Oathbreaker
Name: smalljon
text: smalljon I'm not doing that either

title: Oathbreaker
Name: ramsay
text: ramsay Why would I trust a man who won't honor tradition?

title: Oathbreaker
Name: smalljon
text: smalljon Your father honored tradition Knelt for Robb Stark Called him King of the North Was Robb Stark right to trust your father?

title: Oathbreaker
Name: ramsay
text: ramsay Then it appears we're at a bit of an impasse

title: Oathbreaker
Name: smalljon
text: smalljon Fuck kneeling and fuck oaths I've got a gift for you

title: Oathbreaker
Name: ramsay
text: ramsay A girl, I hope I prefer redheads

title: Oathbreaker
Name: smalljon
text: smalljon A girl, aye A wild one

title: Oathbreaker
Name: ramsay
text: ramsay I like them wild

title: Oathbreaker
Name: smalljon
text: smalljon And the boy, nice and young The way Karstark likes them

title: Oathbreaker
Name: ramsay
text: ramsay Who's this?

title: Oathbreaker
Name: smalljon
text: smalljon Rickon Stark

title: Oathbreaker
Name: ramsay
text: ramsay How do I know that's Rickon Stark?

title: Oathbreaker
Name: ramsay
text: ramsay Welcome home, Lord Stark

title: Oathbreaker
Name: dolorous
text: dolorous It's time

title: Oathbreaker
Name: jon
text: jon If you have any last words, now is the time

title: Oathbreaker
Name: bowen
text: bowen You shouldn't be alive It's not right

title: Oathbreaker
Name: jon
text: jon Neither was killing me

title: Oathbreaker
Name: othell
text: othell My mother's still living at White Harbor Could you write her? Tell her I died fighting the wildings

title: Oathbreaker
Name: alliser
text: alliser I had a choice, Lord Commander Betray you or betray the Night's Watch You brought an army of wildlings into our lands An army of muderers and raiders If I had to do it all over knowing where I'd end up, I pray I'd make the right choice again

title: Oathbreaker
Name: jon
text: jon I'm sure you would, Ser Alliser

title: Oathbreaker
Name: alliser
text: alliser I fought, I lost Now I rest But you, Lord Snow, you'll be fighting their battles forever

title: Oathbreaker
Name: dolorous
text: dolorous We should burn the bodies

title: Oathbreaker
Name: jon
text: jon You should

title: Oathbreaker
Name: dolorous
text: dolorous What do you want me to do with this?

title: Oathbreaker
Name: jon
text: jon Wear it Burn it Whatever you want You have Castle Black

title: Oathbreaker
Name: jon
text: jon My watch is ended

title: Book of the Stranger
Name: dolorous
text: dolorous Where you gonna go?

title: Book of the Stranger
Name: jon
text: jon South

title: Book of the Stranger
Name: dolorous
text: dolorous What are you gonna do?

title: Book of the Stranger
Name: jon
text: jon Get warm

title: Book of the Stranger
Name: dolorous
text: dolorous I was with you at Hardhome We saw what's out there We know it's coming here How can you leave us now?

title: Book of the Stranger
Name: jon
text: jon I did everything I could You know that

title: Book of the Stranger
Name: dolorous
text: dolorous You swore a vow

title: Book of the Stranger
Name: jon
text: jon Aye, I pledged my life to the Night's Watch I gave my life

title: Book of the Stranger
Name: dolorous
text: dolorous For all nights to come

title: Book of the Stranger
Name: jon
text: jon They killed me, Edd! My own brothers You want me to stay here after that?

title: Book of the Stranger
Name: man
text: man Riders approaching!

title: Book of the Stranger
Name: man
text: man Open the gate!

title: Book of the Stranger
Name: sansa
text: sansa This is good soup Do you remember those kidney pies Old Nan used to make?

title: Book of the Stranger
Name: jon
text: jon With the peas and onions?

title: Book of the Stranger
Name: sansa
text: sansa Mmm

title: Book of the Stranger
Name: jon
text: jon We never should have left Winterfell

title: Book of the Stranger
Name: sansa
text: sansa Don't you wish we could go back to the day we left? I want to scream at myself, “Don't go, you idiot”

title: Book of the Stranger
Name: jon
text: jon How could we know?

title: Book of the Stranger
Name: sansa
text: sansa I spent a lot of time thinking about what as ass I was to you I wish I could change everything

title: Book of the Stranger
Name: jon
text: jon We were children

title: Book of the Stranger
Name: sansa
text: sansa I was awful, just admit it

title: Book of the Stranger
Name: jon
text: jon You were occasionally awful I'm sure I can't have been great fun Always sulking in the corner while the rest of you played

title: Book of the Stranger
Name: sansa
text: sansa Can you forgive me?

title: Book of the Stranger
Name: jon
text: jon There's nothing to forgive

title: Book of the Stranger
Name: sansa
text: sansa Forgive me

title: Book of the Stranger
Name: jon
text: jon All right All right, I forgive you

title: Book of the Stranger
Name: jon
text: jon You'd think after thousands of years, the Night's Watch would have learned how to make a good ale

title: Book of the Stranger
Name: sansa
text: sansa Where will you go?

title: Book of the Stranger
Name: jon
text: jon Where will we go? If I don't watch over you, Father's ghost will come back and murder me

title: Book of the Stranger
Name: sansa
text: sansa Where will we go?

title: Book of the Stranger
Name: jon
text: jon I can't stay here, not after what happened

title: Book of the Stranger
Name: sansa
text: sansa There's only one place we can go Home

title: Book of the Stranger
Name: jon
text: jon Should we tell the Boltons to pack up and leave?

title: Book of the Stranger
Name: sansa
text: sansa We'll take it back from them

title: Book of the Stranger
Name: jon
text: jon I don't have an army

title: Book of the Stranger
Name: sansa
text: sansa How many wildlings did you save?

title: Book of the Stranger
Name: jon
text: jon They didn't come here to serve me

title: Book of the Stranger
Name: sansa
text: sansa They owe you their lives

title: Book of the Stranger
Name: sansa
text: sansa You think they'll be safe here if Roose Bolton remains Warden of the North?

title: Book of the Stranger
Name: jon
text: jon Sansa

title: Book of the Stranger
Name: sansa
text: sansa Winterfell is our home It's ours and Arya's and Bran's and Rickon's Wherever they are, it belongs to our family We have to fight for it

title: Book of the Stranger
Name: jon
text: jon I'm tired of fighting

title: Book of the Stranger
Name: jon
text: jon It's all I've done since I left home I've killed brothers of the Night's Watch I've killed wildlings I've killed men that I admire I hanged a boy younger than Bran I fought and I lost

title: Book of the Stranger
Name: sansa
text: sansa If we don't take back the North, we'll never be safe I want you to help me But I'll do it myself if I have to

title: Book of the Stranger
Name: davos
text: davos My lady

title: Book of the Stranger
Name: melisandre
text: melisandre Ser Davos

title: Book of the Stranger
Name: davos
text: davos Will you stay here at Castle Black?

title: Book of the Stranger
Name: melisandre
text: melisandre I will do as Jon Snow commands

title: Book of the Stranger
Name: davos
text: davos You serve Jon Snow now?

title: Book of the Stranger
Name: melisandre
text: melisandre He's the prince that was promised

title: Book of the Stranger
Name: davos
text: davos Forgive me, my lady, I thought that was Stannis

title: Book of the Stranger
Name: davos
text: davos What happened down there?

title: Book of the Stranger
Name: melisandre
text: melisandre There was a battle Stannis was defeated

title: Book of the Stranger
Name: davos
text: davos And Shireen? What happened to the princess?

title: Book of the Stranger
Name: brienne
text: brienne I saw what happened I saw Stannis' forces defeated in the field

title: Book of the Stranger
Name: davos
text: davos My lady, I'm Ser Davos Seaworth

title: Book of the Stranger
Name: brienne
text: brienne We've met before I was Kingsguard to Renly Baratheon Before Renly was assassinated with bloodmagic

title: Book of the Stranger
Name: davos
text: davos That's in the past now

title: Book of the Stranger
Name: brienne
text: brienne Yes, it's in the past It doesn't mean I forget Or forgive He admitted it, you know

title: Book of the Stranger
Name: davos
text: davos Who did?

title: Book of the Stranger
Name: brienne
text: brienne Stannis Just before I executed him

title: Book of the Stranger
Name: petyr
text: petyr The Defender of the Vale!

title: Book of the Stranger
Name: robin
text: robin Uncle Petyr!

title: Book of the Stranger
Name: petyr
text: petyr My lord Come and see

title: Book of the Stranger
Name: petyr
text: petyr I missed your name day Go on

title: Book of the Stranger
Name: robin
text: robin A falcon!

title: Book of the Stranger
Name: petyr
text: petyr A gyrfalcon The greatest and rarest of birds

title: Book of the Stranger
Name: yohn
text: yohn Last time I saw you, Baelish, you told me you were taking Sansa Stark home with you to the Fingers.

title: Book of the Stranger
Name: petyr
text: petyr Indeed I was

title: Book of the Stranger
Name: yohn
text: yohn And yet not long ago, we received reports that she has been married to Ramsay Bolton in Winterfell

title: Book of the Stranger
Name: petyr
text: petyr On our way to the Fingers, we were set upon by a large force of Bolton men Seemed to know exactly when we were traveling and exactly whom we were transporting

title: Book of the Stranger
Name: yohn
text: yohn Do you take me for a fool?

title: Book of the Stranger
Name: petyr
text: petyr Tell me, Lord Royce, how many people knew of my travel plans with Sansa Stark? I shared my intentions with you and no one else

title: Book of the Stranger
Name: yohn
text: yohn Slander a man in his own home, you might find yourself crossing swords with him

title: Book of the Stranger
Name: petyr
text: petyr Your home is the Vale The Lord of the Vale stands before us And only his judgment concerns me

title: Book of the Stranger
Name: robin
text: robin Shall we throw him through the Moon Door?

title: Book of the Stranger
Name: yohn
text: yohn My lord My lord, I have always been faithful to House Arryn To your father, to your mother, and now to you.

title: Book of the Stranger
Name: robin
text: robin Do you believe him, Uncle Petyr?

title: Book of the Stranger
Name: petyr
text: petyr Lord Royce has served the Vale well He;s enjoyed a distinguished military career If we could trust his absolute loyalty, he would make a capable commander in the wars to come

title: Book of the Stranger
Name: yohn
text: yohn You can trust my absolute loyalty, my lord

title: Book of the Stranger
Name: petyr
text: petyr I think he deserves one more chance What do you say?

title: Book of the Stranger
Name: robin
text: robin Fine

title: Book of the Stranger
Name: petyr
text: petyr I bring good news My friends in the North tell me Sansa has escaped Winterfell I expect she's headed to Castle Black where her brother serves as Lord Commander But she won't be safe there, not with the Boltons after her

title: Book of the Stranger
Name: robin
text: robin She's my cousin We should help her

title: Book of the Stranger
Name: petyr
text: petyr That was my instinct as well

title: Book of the Stranger
Name: petyr
text: petyr Our lord has spoken Gather the Knights of the Vale The time has come to join the fray

title: Book of the Stranger
Name: grey
text: grey You invite the enemy into our city?

title: Book of the Stranger
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion I did As a clever man once told me, “We make peace with our enemies, not our friends”

title: Book of the Stranger
Name: grey
text: grey I don't make peace with the queen's enemies I kill the queen's enemies

title: Book of the Stranger
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion Yes, that's the military approach And how has that worked here in Meereen? I represent the diplomatic approach

title: Book of the Stranger
Name: missandei
text: missandei Our queen tried to make peace with the Masters and they tried to murder her

title: Book of the Stranger
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion We enter these negotiations with open eyes Trust me My own recent experience with slavery has taught me the horrors of that institution

title: Book of the Stranger
Name: missandei
text: missandei How many days were you a slave?

title: Book of the Stranger
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion Long enough to know

title: Book of the Stranger
Name: missandei
text: missandei Not long enough to understand

title: Book of the Stranger
Name: yezzan
text: yezzan I bought this dwarf for a single gold honor And somehow you've risen to the top of the Great Pyramid of Meereen It's most impressive

title: Book of the Stranger
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion And now you speak for the Good Masters of AstaporHere's to reversals of fortune

title: Book of the Stranger
Name: razdal
text: razdal We came here to meet the queen and instead we're greeted by a dwarf and a eunuch

title: Book of the Stranger
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion Let's make this simple, shall we? Tell me what you want

title: Book of the Stranger
Name: belicho
text: belicho We want you to leave Slaver's Bay Take your dragons and your mercenaries and go

title: Book of the Stranger
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion Queen Daenerys won't stay in Meereen forever Her path takes her westward

title: Book of the Stranger
Name: razdal
text: razdal When we last met, I offered her ships so she could return to Westeros where she belongs She refused them

title: Book of the Stranger
Name: missandei
text: missandei She refused them because hundreds of thousands of men, women, and children still lived in chains

title: Book of the Stranger
Name: razdal
text: razdal As they have since the dawn of time

title: Book of the Stranger
Name: grey
text: grey Not anymore

title: Book of the Stranger
Name: yezzan
text: yezzan You think you're a free man now? You still follow orders Just because your master has silver hair and tits doesn't mean she's not a master

title: Book of the Stranger
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion Friends, friends, friends, please

title: Book of the Stranger
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion There have always been those with wealth and power and those with nothing That is the way of the world I'm not here to change the way of the world

title: Book of the Stranger
Name: yezzan
text: yezzan Slavery is the way of our world

title: Book of the Stranger
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion You don't need slaves to make money There haven't been slaves in Westeros for hundreds of years and I grew up richer than any of you But our queen recognizes that she erred by abolishing slavery without providing a new system to replace it So here is the queen's proposal Slavery will never return to Meereen but she will give the other cities of Slaver's Bay time to adjust to the new order

title: Book of the Stranger
Name: yezzan
text: yezzan What does that mean?

title: Book of the Stranger
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion Instead of abolishing slavery overnight, we will give you seven years to end the practice

title: Book of the Stranger
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion Slaveholders will be compensated for their losses, of course, at fair prices In exchange, you will cut off your support for the Sons of the Harpy

title: Book of the Stranger
Name: yezzan
text: yezzan We do not support the Sons of the Harpy

title: Book of the Stranger
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion Fine, fine, but you will cut it off all the same I do hope you accept, my friends You will not receive a better offer

title: Book of the Stranger
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion Let us sail on the tide of freedom instead of being drowned by it And as a parting gift to our honored guests…

title: Book of the Stranger
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion Give freedom a chance See if it doesn't taste every bit as good as what came before

title: Book of the Stranger
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion My friends! Large sorry...you wait so fat time

title: Book of the Stranger
Name: missandei
text: missandei Perhaps I should translate for you

title: Book of the Stranger
Name: man
text: man We speak the Common Tongue

title: Book of the Stranger
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion Excellent

title: Book of the Stranger
Name: man
text: man You met with the slavers today

title: Book of the Stranger
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion I did

title: Book of the Stranger
Name: man
text: man Our brothers and sister died fighting these scum Now you invite them to our city and drink wine with them

title: Book of the Stranger
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion I imagine this room was built so the rulers could intimidate the ruled

title: Book of the Stranger
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion But I am not your ruler I'm not the Breaker of Chains I'm not the Unburnt And I am certainly not the Mother of Dragons

title: Book of the Stranger
Name: man
text: man You are a stranger here So why do you represent Meereen in these talks with our enemies?

title: Book of the Stranger
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion Because our queen chose me as her advisor Until she returns from her travels --

title: Book of the Stranger
Name: man
text: man When does she return?

title: Book of the Stranger
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion Soon You have my word

title: Book of the Stranger
Name: man
text: man We don't know you We don't trust you We know Torgo Nudho We fight with him against the Masters We trust him

title: Book of the Stranger
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion And that is exactly why Grey Worm took part in these negotiations As commander of the Unsullied, he knows hot to defeat the slavers and he knows when it is time to make peace

title: Book of the Stranger
Name: man
text: man You have made peace with the slavers?

title: Book of the Stranger
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion We offered terms

title: Book of the Stranger
Name: man
text: man And you, Grey Worm? You want to drink wine with these men? The men who tore us from our mothers' arms and sold us at auction like cattle?

title: Book of the Stranger
Name: grey
text: grey I am a soldier, not a politician But if there is a chance for peace -- a just peace -- we should take it

title: Book of the Stranger
Name: man
text: man Missandei, you know what these men are How can you trust them?

title: Book of the Stranger
Name: missandei
text: missandei I do not trust them I will never trust them

title: Book of the Stranger
Name: missandei
text: missandei But as a wise man once said, “We make peace with our enemies, not our friends”

title: Book of the Stranger
Name: grey
text: grey Do not use me for your lies

title: Book of the Stranger
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion Those men respect you

title: Book of the Stranger
Name: grey
text: grey They respect me because they know who I am They know I am loyal

title: Book of the Stranger
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion As do I

title: Book of the Stranger
Name: grey
text: grey I am loyal to my queen, not you If you betray her work, you are my enemy

title: Book of the Stranger
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion I am not betraying her work I am trying to save her city

title: Book of the Stranger
Name: missandei
text: missandei You promised the slavers they could keep slavery

title: Book of the Stranger
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion For a short time

title: Book of the Stranger
Name: missandei
text: missandei Seven years is not a short time for a slave

title: Book of the Stranger
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion You're right Slavery is a horror that should be ended at once War is a horror that should be ended at once I can't do both today

title: Book of the Stranger
Name: grey
text: grey You are wrong to trust these men

title: Book of the Stranger
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion I don't trust the Masters I trust their self-interest They're trustworthy if they're convinced that working with me is in their self-interest

title: Book of the Stranger
Name: grey
text: grey You don't know them You don't understand them We are not human in their eyes They look at me and see a weapon They look at her and see a whore

title: Book of the Stranger
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion They look at me and they see a misshapen little beast Their contempt is their weakness They'll underestimate us every time and we will use that to our advantage

title: Book of the Stranger
Name: grey
text: grey You will not use them They will use you That is what they do

title: Book of the Stranger
Name: daario
text: daario You all right? Why don't you sit and catch your breath?

title: Book of the Stranger
Name: jorah
text: jorah I'm fine

title: Book of the Stranger
Name: daario
text: daario I don't think you could ride the dragon 20 years ago, maybe

title: Book of the Stranger
Name: jorah
text: jorah What?

title: Book of the Stranger
Name: daario
text: daario Our queen She's wild, you know Don't let her size fool you It's hard enough for me and I'm a young man You, I don't think your heart could take it

title: Book of the Stranger
Name: daario
text: daario Must make you angry that our queen chose me

title: Book of the Stranger
Name: jorah
text: jorah Makes me sad You'll disappoint her before long She'll move on

title: Book of the Stranger
Name: daario
text: daario We'll all disappoint her before long

title: Book of the Stranger
Name: jorah
text: jorah We need each other right now After we're done needing each other --

title: Book of the Stranger
Name: daario
text: daario Oh, I don't want to fight you, Jorah the Andal What do I have to gain? If I win, I'm the shit who killed an old man If I lose, I'm the shit who was killed by an old man

title: Book of the Stranger
Name: jorah
text: jorah You didn't get much discipline as a child, did you?

title: Book of the Stranger
Name: daario
text: daario None

title: Book of the Stranger
Name: jorah
text: jorah The road running through the Horse Gate, they call that the godsway

title: Book of the Stranger
Name: jorah
text: jorah Eastern Market, Western Market When Khal Drogo died, she was supposed to come here and join the Dosh Khaleen, the widows of the dead khals That's where they would have taken her, the Temple of the Dosh Khaleen

title: Book of the Stranger
Name: daario
text: daario What are you doing?

title: Book of the Stranger
Name: jorah
text: jorah It's forbidden to carry weapons in the sacred city

title: Book of the Stranger
Name: daario
text: daario Isn't it forbidden to sneak into their city and steal their khaleesi?

title: Book of the Stranger
Name: jorah
text: jorah If they spot us and we're unarmed, we'll say we're traders heading for the Western Market But if they see weapons…

title: Book of the Stranger
Name: daario
text: daario You're asking a dog to hand over his teeth

title: Book of the Stranger
Name: jorah
text: jorah There's 100,000 of them down there We can't fight our way out We wait till dark, and then we'll find her

title: Book of the Stranger
Name: daario
text: daario Uh…

title: Book of the Stranger
Name: daario
text: daario I'm very attached to this knife

title: Book of the Stranger
Name: jorah
text: jorah Don't worry it didn't touch you

title: Book of the Stranger
Name: daario
text: daario You know what happens?

title: Book of the Stranger
Name: jorah
text: jorah I know what happens

title: Book of the Stranger
Name: daario
text: daario I'll do it myself.

title: Book of the Stranger
Name: daario
text: daario I should have been born a Dothraki

title: Book of the Stranger
Name: jorah
text: jorah Come on

title: Book of the Stranger
Name: jorah
text: jorah My friends...We wandered off from the Western Market and got lost Could you show us the way back?

title: Book of the Stranger
Name: dothraki
text: dothraki What do you sell?

title: Book of the Stranger
Name: jorah
text: jorah Wine Come down to my stall tomorrow, I'll give you a cask of the Arbor's finest

title: Book of the Stranger
Name: dothraki
text: dothraki You're not merchants

title: Book of the Stranger
Name: dothraki
text: dothraki Get the others

title: Book of the Stranger
Name: daario
text: daario Told you, I'm very attached to this knife

title: Book of the Stranger
Name: daario
text: daario You all right?

title: Book of the Stranger
Name: jorah
text: jorah If they find a body with a stab wound, the whole city will be looking for us

title: Book of the Stranger
Name: daario
text: daario Huh

title: Book of the Stranger
Name: leader
text: leader Some of them don't think Dothraki should breed with foreigners They are stupid old women They don't realize that we have always diluted our blood This one is Lhazareen Her Khal found her hiding in a well after he burned her village How old were you?

title: Book of the Stranger
Name: lhazareen
text: lhazareen Twelve

title: Book of the Stranger
Name: leader
text: leader A year later, she bore her Khal a daughter How did he show his happiness?

title: Book of the Stranger
Name: lhazareen
text: lhazareen He broke my ribs

title: Book of the Stranger
Name: leader
text: leader We are not queens here, but the khals depend on us for our wisdom Our lives have meaning

title: Book of the Stranger
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys That is more than most have

title: Book of the Stranger
Name: leader
text: leader When the khals meet for the Khalar Vezhven tomorrow night, I hope they let you live out your days with us The other possibilities are not so pleasant

title: Book of the Stranger
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys I need to make water

title: Book of the Stranger
Name: leader
text: leader You can't run from Dothraki You know this

title: Book of the Stranger
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys I will never run from Dothraki

title: Book of the Stranger
Name: leader
text: leader Go, show her

title: Book of the Stranger
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys I needed fresh air The old women stink

title: Book of the Stranger
Name: lhazareen
text: lhazareen They do stink

title: Book of the Stranger
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys You must have been very young when your Khal died

title: Book of the Stranger
Name: lhazareen
text: lhazareen Sixteen

title: Book of the Stranger
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys Too bad he didn't die sooner

title: Book of the Stranger
Name: lhazareen
text: lhazareen Yes, too bad

title: Book of the Stranger
Name: lhazareen
text: lhazareen Is it true you have three dragons?

title: Book of the Stranger
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys Mm-hmm

title: Book of the Stranger
Name: lhazareen
text: lhazareen And they breathe fire?

title: Book of the Stranger
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys They do Would you like to see them one day?

title: Book of the Stranger
Name: lhazareen
text: lhazareen I am Dosh Khaleen I can never leave Vaes Dothrak, until I rise as smoke from the pyre on the day I die

title: Book of the Stranger
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys No, don't hurt her

title: Book of the Stranger
Name: daario
text: daario She'll give us away

title: Book of the Stranger
Name: jorah
text: jorah We have to go now

title: Book of the Stranger
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys We will never get out of Vaes Dothrak alive

title: Book of the Stranger
Name: jorah
text: jorah All we can do is try

title: Book of the Stranger
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys No We can do more than that And you're going to help me

title: Book of the Stranger
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys And you...Have faith in me, Khaleesi Do not betray me

title: Book of the Stranger
Name: sparrow
text: sparrow If I were to let you leave right now, where would you go? What would you seek out?

title: Book of the Stranger
Name: margaery
text: margaery I'd go to my brother, my husband, my family

title: Book of the Stranger
Name: sparrow
text: sparrow Of course, but for you, that means seeking out money, finery, power Seeking out your family means seeking out sin I'm not maligning you I sought those things out, too. To the exclusion of all else My father was a cobbler He died with I was young and I took over his shop He was a simple man and he made simple shoes But I found that the more work I put into my shoes, the more people wanted them Fine leather, ornamentation, detailing, and time Time most of all Dozens of hours spent on a single pair

title: Book of the Stranger
Name: margaery
text: margaery Quality takes time

title: Book of the Stranger
Name: sparrow
text: sparrow Yes I imagine you've worn a year of someone's life on your back The highborn liked to cover their feet with my time and they paid well for the privilege I used their money to buy a taste of their lives for myself Each time I indulged, I felt myself ascending to something better

title: Book of the Stranger
Name: margaery
text: margaery And one day you walked through a graveyard and realized it was all for nothing and set out on the path to righteousness Book of the Stranger, verse 25

title: Book of the Stranger
Name: sparrow
text: sparrow You know

title: Book of the Stranger
Name: margaery
text: margaery Septa Unella reads it to me At me

title: Book of the Stranger
Name: sparrow
text: sparrow Yes, yes, she does enjoy reading at people You're close But it wasn't a graveyard It was a feast I bought old fine wine and young pretty girls and invited my friends to come share it all We passed around the wine, passed around the women, and soon we fell into a stupor I woke before dawn I could barely stand Everyone else was asleep on the couches or on the floor, lying in heaps next to their fine clothes The truth of their bodies laid bare I could smell them beneath the incense and the perfume and the fine food that had already started to turn And I saw it with perfect clarity I saw what my sins were The gold I had, the wine I drank, the women I used, my ceaseless struggle to maintain my position It was all part of a story A story I was telling myself about who I was A collection of lies that would disappear in the light The people I was trying to climb away from, the beggars in the street, the poor, they were closer to the truth than I ever was

title: Book of the Stranger
Name: margaery
text: margaery So what did you do?

title: Book of the Stranger
Name: sparrow
text: sparrow I left to go and find them I didn't even put on my shoes I walked out the door and never went back

title: Book of the Stranger
Name: sparrow
text: sparrow Come, let's go and see him

title: Book of the Stranger
Name: margaery
text: margaery Who?

title: Book of the Stranger
Name: sparrow
text: sparrow Your brother

title: Book of the Stranger
Name: margaery
text: margaery enters her brother's cell. The door closes and locks behind her. Loras is lying on the floor.

title: Book of the Stranger
Name: margaery
text: margaery Loras. Loras.

title: Book of the Stranger
Name: margaery
text: margaery helps LORAS to his knees. He cries.

title: Book of the Stranger
Name: margaery
text: margaery Listen to me. You need to stay strong.

title: Book of the Stranger
Name: loras
text: loras I can't stay strong. I never was strong.

title: Book of the Stranger
Name: margaery
text: margaery You are strong. You are the future of our house, the future of our family.

title: Book of the Stranger
Name: loras
text: loras I don't care about that.

title: Book of the Stranger
Name: margaery
text: margaery Shh. Have you -- have you told them that? That you don't care?

title: Book of the Stranger
Name: loras
text: loras I just want it to stop. Help me.

title: Book of the Stranger
Name: margaery
text: margaery They want me to help you. They want me told help tear you down. That's why he's letting me see you, I know it is. And if either of us give in to what they want, then they win.

title: Book of the Stranger
Name: loras
text: loras Let them win. Just make it stop. Please.

title: Book of the Stranger
Name: loras
text: loras begins sobbing. MARGAERY embraces him.

title: Book of the Stranger
Name: margaery
text: margaery All right.

title: Book of the Stranger
Name: cersei
text: cersei is walking down the hall to TOMMEN's chamber. She hears MAESTER PYCELLE talking.

title: Book of the Stranger
Name: maester
text: maester And now, how to avert disaster with our current predicament. This High Sparrow. I have dealt with fanatics of every description, Your Grace. Not setting them off, that's the most important thing. You are beset with enemies both within and without.

title: Book of the Stranger
Name: cersei
text: cersei enters the room

title: Book of the Stranger
Name: cersei
text: cersei What are you doing here?

title: Book of the Stranger
Name: maester
text: maester I am advising the king on our current predicament.

title: Book of the Stranger
Name: cersei
text: cersei Leave.

title: Book of the Stranger
Name: maester
text: maester I am a member of the Small Council. The king's small --

title: Book of the Stranger
Name: cersei
text: cersei Is this a Small Council meeting?

title: Book of the Stranger
Name: maester
text: maester Obviously not. I'm here to lend my wisdom and my support.

title: Book of the Stranger
Name: tommen
text: tommen Thank you for your counsel, Grand Maester. That will be all for now.

title: Book of the Stranger
Name: maester
text: maester Your Grace.

title: Book of the Stranger
Name: maester
text: maester PYCELLE hobbles towards the door. As he leaves, he flashes CERSEI a smile. CERSEI closes the door.

title: Book of the Stranger
Name: cersei
text: cersei Since I've missed the past several Small Coucil meetings, I wanted to speak to you about a few things.

title: Book of the Stranger
Name: tommen
text: tommen I've been thinking about the High Sparrow.

title: Book of the Stranger
Name: cersei
text: cersei As have we all, unfortunately.

title: Book of the Stranger
Name: tommen
text: tommen We need to be careful in dealing with such a man. To prevent things from escalating any further. We have to be careful not to antagonize him. He has Margaery. We can't put her at risk. He's dangerous.

title: Book of the Stranger
Name: cersei
text: cersei Look at me. What did they do to me? To the king's own mother?

title: Book of the Stranger
Name: cersei
text: cersei It's all right. It's done. It's in the past. And of course Margaery's safety is paramount.

title: Book of the Stranger
Name: tommen
text: tommen You don't like Margaery, do you?

title: Book of the Stranger
Name: cersei
text: cersei Whether I like her or not is completely unimportant. Margaery is the queen. Queens must command respect. Kings even more so. Not just for their own sake, but for everyone's. The High Sparrow has no respect for kings or queens. No respect for anything in this world. He has no use for the things of this world. He want to knock them down and replace them with what? With fantasies. With beggars in the street. With nothing.

title: Book of the Stranger
Name: tommen
text: tommen Mother...there's something I want to tell you. Something the High Sparrow told me.

title: Book of the Stranger
Name: cersei
text: cersei You've spoken with him?

title: Book of the Stranger
Name: tommen
text: tommen I promised him I wouldn't tell anyone. If he found out I told --

title: Book of the Stranger
Name: cersei
text: cersei It would be a breach of confidence which he would not take lightly, given his constant prattling about the truth. I am your mother. You can always trust me.

title: Book of the Stranger
Name: kevan
text: kevan and LADY OLENNA are waiting in the Small Council chamber for the meeting to start. CERSEI and JAIME enter.

title: Book of the Stranger
Name: cersei
text: cersei The Small Council meeting has been postponed on the king's orders.

title: Book of the Stranger
Name: kevin
text: kevin and LADY OLENNA stand up.

title: Book of the Stranger
Name: lady
text: lady I would have thought we were perfectly clear the first time. You're not welcome.

title: Book of the Stranger
Name: cersei
text: cersei You once spoke of your respect for our father because he understood the necessity of working with one's rivals.

title: Book of the Stranger
Name: lady
text: lady My dear, you have been stripped of your dignity and authority, publicly shamed, and confined to the Red Keep. What's left to work with?

title: Book of the Stranger
Name: jaime
text: jaime Cersei is the mother of the king. She has the king's ear and his trust. And the king has been speaking regularly with the High Sparrow about Queen Margaery and Ser Loras.

title: Book of the Stranger
Name: cersei
text: cersei The High Sparrow seized power knowing full well we'd bicker amongst ourselves instead of seizing it back. Here we are. Well done to us. Now the future of the Seven Kingdoms rest in his dirty, peasant hands. In a few days, he'll have a trial for me. But before that, Queen Margaery will make her walk of atonement. Yes, Margaery will repent her sins before the good people of the city.

title: Book of the Stranger
Name: lady
text: lady Oh, no. That cannot happen. That will not happen.

title: Book of the Stranger
Name: cersei
text: cersei I agree.

title: Book of the Stranger
Name: jaime
text: jaime You've got the second largest army in Westeros. You'll bring them into the city, stop queen Margaery's humiliation before it starts, and take her back into Crown custody.

title: Book of the Stranger
Name: kevan
text: kevan The king has ordered me to take no action against the High Sparrow or the Faith Militant out of fear for the queen's safety.

title: Book of the Stranger
Name: jaime
text: jaime You'll take no action at all. When the Tyrell armies come, you will stand down. Are you expressly forbidden from standing down?

title: Book of the Stranger
Name: kevan
text: kevan No, but if the king should call on me --

title: Book of the Stranger
Name: jaime
text: jaime The whole thing will be over before anyone can call on you to do anything. When the High Sparrow is in custody or dead, preferably, and Margaery's back at Tommen's side, do you think the king will be angry at the outcome?

title: Book of the Stranger
Name: cersei
text: cersei You hate these fanatics as much as we do. You hate what they've done to your son. Do you want Lancel back or have you given him up for good?

title: Book of the Stranger
Name: kevan
text: kevan Of course I want him back.

title: Book of the Stranger
Name: cersei
text: cersei Then stand aside and let the people that took him from you be destroyed.

title: Book of the Stranger
Name: kevan
text: kevan If it doesn't go as planned, the Sparrows have many friends in the city. We'll have civil war. Many will die.

title: Book of the Stranger
Name: lady
text: lady Many will die no matter what we do. Better them than us.

title: Book of the Stranger
Name: theon
text: theon approaches Pyke Castle by boat.

title: Book of the Stranger
Name: yara
text: yara They told me you were home and I didn't believe it. “Theon Greyjoy?” I said. “He's dead. He's been dead a long time." He let you go?

title: Book of the Stranger
Name: theon
text: theon I escaped.

title: Book of the Stranger
Name: yara
text: yara I can't hear you.

title: Book of the Stranger
Name: yara
text: yara Look at me. Look at me! Men died trying to rescue you. Good men. My men.

title: Book of the Stranger
Name: theon
text: theon I'm sorry.

title: Book of the Stranger
Name: yara
text: yara You were my brother. You're a spoiled little cunt, but you were my brother and I risked everything for you and you betrayed me.

title: Book of the Stranger
Name: theon
text: theon I know. I know and I'm sorry.

title: Book of the Stranger
Name: yara
text: yara Stop saying that.

title: Book of the Stranger
Name: theon
text: theon He broke me. He broke me into a thousand pieces.

title: Book of the Stranger
Name: yara
text: yara I know.

title: Book of the Stranger
Name: theon
text: theon You don't know.

title: Book of the Stranger
Name: yara
text: yara He send us one of those pieces. That's why I came for you.

title: Book of the Stranger
Name: yara
text: yara Why did you come here?

title: Book of the Stranger
Name: theon
text: theon Where else could I go?

title: Book of the Stranger
Name: yara
text: yara You heard father was dead and thought you'd claim the crown?

title: Book of the Stranger
Name: theon
text: theon No, no. I only heard he died after we docked.

title: Book of the Stranger
Name: yara
text: yara You happen to show up on Pyke right before the Kingsmoot?

title: Book of the Stranger
Name: theon
text: theon I didn't know.

title: Book of the Stranger
Name: yara
text: yara You think any Ironborn wants you to be king? After what you've done?

title: Book of the Stranger
Name: theon
text: theon I don't want to be king.

title: Book of the Stranger
Name: yara
text: yara What do you want?

title: Book of the Stranger
Name: theon
text: theon I shouldo ve listened to you. You're the only one --

title: Book of the Stranger
Name: yara
text: yara That doesn't matter anymore. Stop crying. Look at me. Tell me what you want.

title: Book of the Stranger
Name: theon
text: theon You should rule the Iron Islands. Let me help you.

title: Book of the Stranger
Name: ramsay
text: ramsay peels an apple with a knife. The door opens. A guard ushers OSHA into the room. RAMSAY nods. The guard leaves and closes the door.

title: Book of the Stranger
Name: ramsay
text: ramsay They've cleaned you up nicely. You know who I am?

title: Book of the Stranger
Name: osha
text: osha A lord?

title: Book of the Stranger
Name: ramsay
text: ramsay Yes. A lord. You've seen my banners?

title: Book of the Stranger
Name: osha
text: osha The flayed man.

title: Book of the Stranger
Name: ramsay
text: ramsay Does that worry you at all?

title: Book of the Stranger
Name: osha
text: osha You eat them after?

title: Book of the Stranger
Name: ramsay
text: ramsay No.

title: Book of the Stranger
Name: osha
text: osha Then I've seen worse.

title: Book of the Stranger
Name: ramsay
text: ramsay peels the skin of the apple and puts it on the table with the knife. OSHA looks at the knife. RAMSAY waves for OSHA to come to him. She walks towards him.

title: Book of the Stranger
Name: ramsay
text: ramsay You served the Starks?

title: Book of the Stranger
Name: osha
text: osha Aye. They put me in chains and put a sword at my throat, so I've served them.

title: Book of the Stranger
Name: ramsay
text: ramsay The Starks have been gone for a long time, but you kept protecting Rickon.

title: Book of the Stranger
Name: osha
text: osha He'd fetch a good price to the right buyer. I served his family a long time. Didn't get no wages. Way I see it, I'm owed.

title: Book of the Stranger
Name: ramsay
text: ramsay Be that as it may, Rickon's not yours to sell anymore. He's mine. So what use could I possibly have for you?

title: Book of the Stranger
Name: osha
text: osha I can give you what you want.

title: Book of the Stranger
Name: ramsay
text: ramsay Are you sure you know what that is?

title: Book of the Stranger
Name: osha
text: osha comes closer and sits down on his lap. They kiss.

title: Book of the Stranger
Name: osha
text: osha Same thing men always want. And when they really want it, they give it a bath first.

title: Book of the Stranger
Name: ramsay
text: ramsay You're a good talker.

title: Book of the Stranger
Name: ramsay
text: ramsay I like that.

title: Book of the Stranger
Name: ramsay
text: ramsay You're a much better talker than Theon Greyjoy.

title: Book of the Stranger
Name: osha
text: osha That so?

title: Book of the Stranger
Name: ramsay
text: ramsay I had to work hard to get him talking. But he talked. They all do.

title: Book of the Stranger
Name: ramsay
text: ramsay He told me everything. All about the Stark boys. Who helped them escape, and how she did it.

title: Book of the Stranger
Name: osha
text: osha gets up and tries to stab RAMSAY with the knife, but RAMSAY stabs her in the neck first. She falls on the ground, with blood running from her neck. She dies. RAMSAY cleans his knife and continues to peel the apple. He bites a piece.

title: Book of the Stranger
Name: sansa
text: sansa JON SNOW, BRIENNE, TORMUND, and DOLOROUS EDD are eating at a table. SANSA looks at the meat on her fork. JON SNOW, DOLOROUS EDD, and TORMUND eat vigorously. BRIENNE looks around at the men eating. TORMUND stares intently at BRIENNE. BRIENNE looks away. TORMUND smiles. DOLOROUS EDD notices their interaction.

title: Book of the Stranger
Name: dolorous
text: dolorous Sorry about the food. It's not what we're known for.

title: Book of the Stranger
Name: sansa
text: sansa That's all right. There are more important things.

title: Book of the Stranger

text: man A letter for you, Lord Commander.

text: jon I'm not Lord Commander anymore.

Name: jon
text: jon SNOW takes the letter. The man leaves. JON SNOW sees the seal of House Bolton. He opens the scroll and starts reading.

title: Book of the Stranger
Name: jon
text: jon To the traitor and bastard Jon Snow. You allowed thousands of wildlings past the Wall. You have betrayed your own kind. You have betrayed the North. Winterfell is mine, bastard. Come and see. Your brother Rickon is in my dungeon.

title: Book of the Stranger
Name: jon
text: jon SNOW looks at SANSA.

title: Book of the Stranger
Name: jon
text: jon His direwolf's skin is on my floor. Come and see. I want my bride back. Send her to me, bastard, and I will not trouble you or your wildling lovers. Keep her from me and I will ride north and slaughter every wildling man, woman, and babe living under your protection. You will watch as I skin them living. You --

title: Book of the Stranger
Name: sansa
text: sansa Go on.

title: Book of the Stranger
Name: jon
text: jon It's just more of the same.

title: Book of the Stranger
Name: jon
text: jon SNOW puts the letter away, but SANSA takes it and continues reading.

title: Book of the Stranger
Name: sansa
text: sansa You will watch as my soldiers take turns raping your sister. You will watch as my dogs your wild little brother. Then I will spoon your eyes from their sockets and let my dogs do the rest. Come and see. Ramsay Bolton, Lord of Winterfell and Warden of the North.

title: Book of the Stranger
Name: jon
text: jon Lord of Winterfell and Warden of the North.

text: sansa His father's dead. Ramsay killed him. And now he has Rickon.

Name: jon
text: jon We don't know that.
