Name: sansa
text: sansa Yes, we do.

title: Book of the Stranger
Name: tormund
text: tormund How many men does he have in his army?

title: Book of the Stranger
Name: sansa
text: sansa I heard him say 5,000 once when he was talking about Stannis's attack.

title: Book of the Stranger
Name: jon

title: Book of the Stranger
Name: tormund
text: tormund That can march and fight? 2,000. The rest are children and old people.

title: Book of the Stranger
Name: sansa
text: sansa You're the son of the last true Warden of the North. Northern families are loyal. They'll fight for you if you ask.

title: Book of the Stranger
Name: sansa
text: sansa A monster has taken our home and our brother. We have to go back to Winterfell and save them both.

title: Book of the Stranger
Name: jon
text: jon SNOW nods.

title: Book of the Stranger
Name: khal
text: khal It is forbidden to spill blood in the sacred city. It is forbidden to carry weapons in the sacred city.

title: Book of the Stranger

Name: khal

title: Book of the Stranger

text: khal The Wise Masters of Yunkai want her. They're offering ten thousand horses In exchange. What's worth more, one pink little girl or ten thousand horses?

title: Book of the Stranger
Name: khal
text: khal Fuck the Wise Masters in their perfumed asses. I'll take their horses for myself.

Name: daenerys
text: daenerys Don't you want to know what I think?

title: Book of the Stranger
Name: khal
text: khal You'd rather be sold to slavery? Or maybe you'd like to show Rhalko here what you taste like?

text: daenerys No. I don't want either of those things.

title: Book of the Stranger
Name: khal
text: khal We don't care what you want. This is the Temple of the Dosh Khaleen. You have no voice here, unless you are Dosh Khaleen. Which you are not, until we decide you are.

title: Book of the Stranger
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys I know where I am. I have been here before. This is where the Dosh Khaleen pronounced my child the Stallion Who Mounts the World.

title: Book of the Stranger
Name: khal
text: khal And what happened? You trusted a sorceress, like a fool. Your baby is dead because of you. And so is Khal Drogo.

title: Book of the Stranger
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys This is where Drogo promised to take his khalasar west to where the world ends. To ride wooden horses across the Black Salt Sea as no khal has done before. He promised to kill the men in their iron suits and tear down their stone houses. He swore to me before the Mother of Mountains.

title: Book of the Stranger
Name: khal
text: khal And you were dumb enough to believe him?

title: Book of the Stranger
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys And here, now, what great matters do the Great Khals discuss? Which little villages you'll raid, how many girls you'll get to fuck, how many horses you'll demand in tribute. You are small men. None of you are fit to lead the Dothraki. But I am. So I will.

title: Book of the Stranger
Name: khal
text: khal All right. No Dosh Khaleen for you. Instead we'll take turns fucking you. And then we'll let our bloodriders fuck you.

title: Book of the Stranger
Name: khal
text: khal And If there's anything left of you, we'll give our horses a turn. You crazy cunt. Did you really think we would serve you?

text: daenerys lays her hand on a fire pit.

title: Book of the Stranger
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys You're not going to serve. You're going to die.

title: Book of the Stranger
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys knocks down all the fire pits one by one. The khals cower away from the flame. The flame begins to cover the entire temple. The khals run to the door and try to escape, but the door has been barred. JORAH and DAARIO watch the temple burning from the outside. The Dothraki people gather around the burning temple. DAENERYS grabs the final fire pit and knocks it in KHAL MORO's direction. The fire engulfs the entire temple and kills all the khals. DAENERYS walks out of the fire, unharmed and naked. All the Dothraki bow to DAENERYS. JORAH and DAARIO walk up to the steps burning temple. JORAH bows to DAENERYS. DAARIO stares at her and then bows.

title: The Door
Name: sansa
text: sansa Yes?

title: The Door
Name: man
text: man For you, my lady.

title: The Door
Name: sansa
text: sansa How far is Mole's Town?

title: The Door
Name: petyr
text: petyr Sansa. Lady Brienne. When I heard you had escaped WInterfell, I feared the worst. You have no idea how happy I am to see you unharmed.

title: The Door
Name: sansa
text: sansa Unharmed? What are you doing here?

Name: petyr
text: petyr I rode north with the Knights of the Vale to come to your aid. They're encamped at Moat Cailin as we speak.

title: The Door
Name: sansa
text: sansa To come to my aid? Did you know about Ramsay? If you didn't know, you're an idiot. If you did know, you're my enemy.

title: The Door
Name: sansa
text: sansa Would you like to hear about our wedding night? He never hurt my face. He needed my face, the face of Ned Stark's daughter. But the rest of me, he did what he liked with the rest of me as long as I could still give him an heir. What do you think he did?

title: The Door
Name: petyr

title: The Door
Name: sansa
text: sansa What do you think he did to me?

title: The Door
Name: brienne
text: brienne Lady Sansa asked you a question.

title: The Door
Name: petyr
text: petyr He beat you.

title: The Door
Name: sansa
text: sansa Yes, he enjoyed that. What else do you think he did?

title: The Door
Name: petyr
text: petyr Sansa, I --

title: The Door
Name: sansa
text: sansa What else?

title: The Door
Name: petyr
text: petyr Did he cut you?

title: The Door
Name: sansa
text: sansa Maybe you did know about Ramsay all along.

title: The Door
Name: petyr
text: petyr I didn't know.

title: The Door
Name: sansa
text: sansa I thought you knew everyone's secrets.

title: The Door
Name: petyr
text: petyr I made a mistake, a horrible mistake. I underestimated a stranger.

title: The Door
Name: sansa
text: sansa The other things he did, ladies aren't supposed to talk about those things, but I imagine brothel keepers talk about them all the time. I can still feel it. I don't mean in my tender heart it still pains me so. I can still feel what he did in my body standing here right now.

title: The Door
Name: petyr
text: petyr I'm so sorry.

title: The Door
Name: sansa
text: sansa You said you would protect me.

title: The Door
Name: petyr
text: petyr And I will. You must believe me when I tell you that I will.

title: The Door
Name: sansa
text: sansa I don't believe you anymore. I don't need you anymore. You can't protect me. You won't even be able to protect yourself if I tell Brienne to cut you down. And why shouldn't I?

title: The Door
Name: petyr
text: petyr Do you want me to beg for my life? If that's what you want, I will. Whatever you ask that is in my power, I will do.

title: The Door
Name: sansa
text: sansa What if I want you to die here and now?

title: The Door
Name: petyr
text: petyr Then I will die.

title: The Door
Name: sansa
text: sansa You freed me from the monsters who murdered my family and you gave me to other monsters who murdered my family. Go back to Moat Cailin. My brother and I will take back the North on our own. I never want to see you again.

title: The Door
Name: petyr
text: petyr I would do anything to undo what's been done to you. I know that I can't. Will you allow me to say one more thing before I go? Your great-uncle Brynden the Blackfish has gathered what remains of the Tully forces and retaken Riverrun. You might consider seeking him out. The time may come when you need an army loyal to you.

title: The Door
Name: sansa
text: sansa I have an army.

title: The Door
Name: petyr
text: petyr Your brother's army.

title: The Door
Name: petyr
text: petyr Half-brother.

title: The Door
Name: waif

title: The Door
Name: waif
text: waif You'll never be one of us, Lady Stark.

Name: jaqen

title: The Door
Name: jaqen
text: jaqen None of the first Faceless Men were born to lords and ladies. They began as slaves in the mines of Valyria.

title: The Door
Name: arya
text: arya Who was the first?

title: The Door
Name: jaqen
text: jaqen He was no one. The Many-Faced God taught him how to shed his face and how to give the gift. The man taught others in exchange for their service. Many served, many more gifts were given. Soon all the masters and overseers were gone and the Faceless Men fled.

title: The Door
Name: arya
text: arya Where did they go?

title: The Door
Name: jaqen
text: jaqen Here. They founded the Free City of Braavos and built this house. These were the faces they wore in life when they were not wearing others. The first Faceless Men. And now a girl is one of them, if a girl desires.

Name: arya

Name: bobono

text: clarenzo It's a wart. Two warts. I've got two fucking warts on my cock.

Name: man
text: man No! No! No!

Name: leaf
text: leaf We were at war. We were being slaughtered. Our sacred trees cut down. We needed to defend ourselves.

Name: bran

title: The Door

text: leaf From you. From men.

Name: aeron
text: aeron We speak in the presence of the Drowned God. In his name we father today to choose a new king as our leader. Who makes a claim?

title: The Door
Name: yara
text: yara I am Yara Greyjoy, daughter of Balon Greyjoy, King of the Iron Islands. I claim the Salt Throne.

title: The Door
Name: man
text: man We've never had a queen. Not once.

title: The Door
Name: yara
text: yara There are many things we've never done. We've never made our mark upon the world. The great lords of Westeros pay us no mind until our little raids buzz through their kingdoms long enough to become a nuisance. Then they swat us down. They conquer us, humiliate us, and go right back to forgetting we exist.

title: The Door

Name: theon
text: theon And she is your rightful ruler. Those of you that have sailed under her, and there are many of you here, you know what she is.

title: The Door

title: The Door

text: theon She is ironborn!

title: The Door

title: The Door
Name: euron
text: euron I'm Euron Greyjoy.

title: The Door
Name: euron
text: euron I claim the Salt Throne.

title: The Door
Name: euron
text: euron Niece.

title: The Door
Name: euron
text: euron Nephew. Little Theon.

title: The Door
Name: euron
text: euron Heard you managed to fuck things right into the ground. Captured a castle you couldn't keep. Got yourself taken prisoner. Even heard you have no cock.

title: The Door
Name: euron
text: euron Explains why you think a woman can be king.

text: yara When did you return, Uncle?

title: The Door
Name: euron
text: euron A few days ago. I had some things to take care of. Long overdue.

title: The Door
Name: yara
text: yara I'm glad you're here. Now I know what my first act as queen will be. To execute the man who killed my father.

title: The Door
Name: euron
text: euron I did. I killed him. Threw him right over a rope bridge and watched him fall. He was leading us nowhere and we would still be heading there if it weren't for me. No one loved him. No one wanted to follow him. He led ius into two wars we couldn't win. I apologize to you all for not killing him years ago.

Name: theon
text: theon That would have been hard to do. You weren't here. Last I heard, you were gallivanting around the world having a grand old time.

title: The Door
Name: euron
text: euron Gallivanting? That the sort of thing you start to say once your dick gets chopped off?

Name: euron
text: euron Right idea, except I'm the one who's going to build the Iron Fleet because I'm the one who knows how to use it. I've been all over the world. I've seen more of it than all of you combined. And across the sea there is a person who hates the great lords of Westeros just as much as we do. Someone with a large army, three large dragons, and no husband. I'm going to build that fleet and I'm going to gallivant right over and give it to Daenerys Targaryen along with my big cock.

text: euron I'm not going to seduce her. The Iron Fleet will seduce her. And together we're going to take the Seven Kingdoms. I wasn't born to be king. I paid the iron price and here I stand.

text: aeron May Euron, your servant, be born again from the sea as you were. Bless him with salt. Bless him with stone. Bless him with steel.

title: The Door
Name: aerson
text: aerson Listen to the waves. Listen to the god. He is speaking to us and he says we shall have no king but Euron Greyjoy. Let the sea wash your follies and your vanities away. Let the old Euron drown. Let his lungs fill with seawater.

title: The Door

title: The Door
Name: aeron
text: aeron What is dead may never die.

title: The Door

title: The Door
Name: euron
text: euron Go back to your homes. Chop down every tree you can find. Quarter-saw the timber and start building. I want every man bending planks. I want every woman spinning flax for sails. Build me a thousand ships and I will give you this world.

text: daenerys I banished you twice. You came back twice. And you saved my life. So I can't take you back and I can't send you away.
