text: daenerys I'm sorry. I'm so sorry.

title: The Door
Name: jorah
text: jorah Don't be. All I've ever wanted was to serve you. Tyrion Lannister was right. I love you. I'll always love you. Goodbye, Khaleesi.

title: The Door
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys Do not walk away from your queen, Jorah the Andal.

title: The Door
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys You have not been dismissed. You pledged yourself to me. You swore to obey my commands for the rest of your life.

title: The Door
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys Well, I command you to find the cure wherever it is in this world. I command you to heal yourself and then return to me. When I take the Seven Kingdoms, I need you by my side.

title: The Door
Name: varys
text: varys In the last fortnight since our pact with the Masters, how many killings have been carried out by the Sons of the Harpy?

title: The Door
Name: grey
text: grey None.

title: The Door
Name: varys
text: varys And how many Masters have been butchered by the free men.

title: The Door
Name: grey
text: grey Two, but that was the day of the pact. Since then, nothing.

title: The Door
Name: varys
text: varys So it's safe to say that a fragile peace has taken hold.

title: The Door
Name: grey
text: grey For now.

title: The Door
Name: varys
text: varys For now is the best we get in our profession.

title: The Door
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion It's not enough.

title: The Door
Name: varys
text: varys Considering the city was on the brink of civil war, I'd say it's a good start.

title: The Door
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion It's not enough for Meereen to have peace. They need to know Daenerys is responsible for it. The Sons of the Harpy have a good story. Resist the foreign invaders. Our queen has an even better story. Mother of Dragons, Breaker of Chains and...all that.

title: The Door
Name: missandei
text: missandei The people know who brought them freedom.

title: The Door
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion Yes, but do they know who brought them security? Who brought about an end to the violence? We need someone the people trust, someone they know who cannot be bought or influenced.

title: The Door
Name: varys
text: varys Sounds like quite the hero. Where would we find him?

title: The Door
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion Who said anything about “him”?

title: The Door
Name: man
text: man You stand in the presence of Kinvara, High Priestess of the Red Temple of Volantis, the Flame of Truth, the Light of Wisdom, the First Servant of the Lord of Light.

title: The Door
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion Welcome to Meereen.

title: The Door
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion That's about the extent of my Valyrian.

title: The Door
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion Thank you for travelling all this way. I know from personal experience how uncomfortable the journey can be.

title: The Door
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion The truth is we need your help. We had hoped that we could somehow persuade you to --

title: The Door
Name: kinvara
text: kinvara You don't need to persuade me. I came to help.

title: The Door
Name: kinvara
text: kinvara Daenerys Stormborn is the one who was promised. From the fire she was reborn to remake the world.

title: The Door
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion Yes.

title: The Door
Name: kinvara
text: kinvara She has freed the slaves from their chains and crucified the Masters for their sins.

title: The Door
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion She did indeed.

title: The Door
Name: kinvara
text: kinvara Her dragons are fire made flesh, a gift from the Lord of Light. But you heard all this before, haven't you? On the Long Bridge of Volantis. The dragons will purify nonbelievers by the thousands, burning their sins and flesh away.

title: The Door
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion Ideally we'd avoid purifying too many nonbelievers. The Mother of Dragons has followers of many different faiths.

title: The Door
Name: kinvara
text: kinvara You want your queen to be worshipped and obeyed. And while she's gone, you want her advisors to be worshipped and obeyed.

title: The Door
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion I'd settle for obeyed.

title: The Door
Name: kinvara
text: kinvara I will summon my most eloquent priests. They will spread the word. Daenerys has been sent to lead the people against the darkness in this war and in the great war still to come.

title: The Door
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion That sounds most excellent --

title: The Door
Name: varys
text: varys A man named Stannis Baratheon was anointed as the chosen one by one of your priestesses. He, too, had a glorious destiny. He attacked King's Landing and was soundly defeated by the man standing beside me. Last I had heard, he'd been defeated again, this time at Winterfell and this time for good.

title: The Door
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion We'd be most grateful for any support you could provide the queen.

title: The Door
Name: varys
text: varys I suppose it's hard for a fanatic to admit a mistake. Isn't that the whole point of being a fanatic? You're always right. Everything is the Lordo s will.

title: The Door
Name: kinvara
text: kinvara Everything is the Lordo s will. But men and women make mistakes. Even honest servants of the Lord.

title: The Door
Name: varys
text: varys And you, an honest servant of the lord, why should I trust you to know any more than the priestess who counseled Stannis?

title: The Door
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion My friend has a healthy skepticism of religion, but we are all loyal supporters of the queen.

title: The Door
Name: kinvara
text: kinvara Everyone is what they are and where they are for a reason. Terrible things happen for a reason. Take what happened to you, Lord Varys, when you were a child. If not for your mutilation at the hand of a second-rate sorcerer, you wouldn't be here helping the Lordo s Chosen bring his light into the world. Knowledge has made you powerful. But there's still so much you don't know. Do you remember what you heard that night when the sorcerer tossed your parts in the fire? You heard a voice call out from the flames. Do you remember? Should I tell you what the voice said?

title: The Door
Name: kinvara
text: kinvara Should I tell you the name of the one who spoke?

title: The Door
Name: kinvara
text: kinvara We serve the same queen. If you are her true friend, you have nothing to fear from me.

title: The Door
Name: bran
text: bran What?

title: The Door
Name: bran
text: bran He saw me, the Night King! He saw me!

title: The Door
Name: threeeyed
text: threeeyed He touched you.

title: The Door
Name: bran
text: bran I don't know. He was close, but --

title: The Door
Name: threeeyed
text: threeeyed He knows you are here. He'll come for you.

title: The Door
Name: bran
text: bran But he can't get in.

title: The Door
Name: threeeyed
text: threeeyed He can now. His mark is on you. You must leave, all of you.

title: The Door
Name: meera
text: meera Come on, Hodor. Help me with the sledge.

title: The Door
Name: hodor
text: hodor Hodor.

title: The Door
Name: bran
text: bran I'm sorry. I didn't mean to.

title: The Door
Name: threeeyed
text: threeeyed The time has come.

title: The Door
Name: bran
text: bran The time for what?

title: The Door
Name: threeeyed
text: threeeyed For you to become me.

title: The Door
Name: bran
text: bran But am I ready?

title: The Door
Name: threeeyed
text: threeeyed No.

title: The Door
Name: jon
text: jon We can't defend the north from the Walkers and the south from the Boltons. If we want to survive, we need Winterfell, and to take Winterfell, we need more men.

title: The Door
Name: davos
text: davos Aside from the Starks and the Boltons, the most powerful houses in the North are the Umbers, the Karstarks, and the Manderlys.

title: The Door
Name: davos
text: davos The Umbers and the Karstarks have already declared for the Boltons, so we're not doing so well there.

title: The Door
Name: sansa
text: sansa The Umbers gave Rickon to our enemies. They can hang. But the Karstarks declared for Ramsay without knowing they had another choice.

title: The Door
Name: davos
text: davos I beg your pardon, my lady, but they know that a Stark beheaded their father. I don't think we can count on them either.

title: The Door
Name: sansa
text: sansa How well do you know the North, Ser Davos?

title: The Door
Name: davos
text: davos Precious little, my lady.

title: The Door
Name: sansa
text: sansa My father always said Northerners are different. More loyal, more suspicious of outsiders.

title: The Door
Name: davos
text: davos They may well be loyal, but how many rose up against the Boltons when they betrayed your family? I may not know the North, but I know men. They're more or less the same in any corner of the world and even the bravest of them don't want to see their wives and children skinned for a lost cause. If Jon's going to convince them to fight alongside him, they need to believe it's a fight they can win.

title: The Door
Name: jon
text: jon There are more than three other houses in the North -- Glover, Mormont, Cerwyn, Mazin, Hornwood. Two dozen more. Together they equal all the others. We can start small and build.

title: The Door
Name: sansa
text: sansa The North remembers. They remember the Stark name. People will still risk everything for it, from White Harbor to Ramsay's own door.

title: The Door
Name: davos
text: davos I don't doubt it. But Jon doesn't have the Stark name.

title: The Door
Name: sansa
text: sansa No, but I do.

title: The Door
Name: sansa
text: sansa Jon is every bit as much Ned Stark's son as Ramsay is Roose Bolton's. Ant there are also the Tullys. They're not Northern, but they will back us against the Boltons without question.

title: The Door
Name: davos
text: davos I didn't know the Tullys still had an army.

title: The Door
Name: sansa
text: sansa My uncle the Blackfish has reformed it and retaken Riverrun.

title: The Door
Name: jon
text: jon How do you know that?

title: The Door
Name: sansa
text: sansa Ramsay received a raven before I escaped Winterfell.

title: The Door
Name: davos
text: davos That's good. The Blackfish is a legend. His support would mean a great deal. Stark, Tully, a few more houses, almost starts to look like a winning side.

title: The Door
Name: brienne
text: brienne I've sworn to protect you, my lady.

title: The Door
Name: sansa
text: sansa You heard them. We need more men and my uncle has an army.

title: The Door
Name: brienne
text: brienne We can send the Blackfish a raven.

title: The Door
Name: sansa
text: sansa Can't risk Ramsay intercepting it. It has to be you.

title: The Door
Name: sansa
text: sansa Ride for Riverrun. My uncle will talk to you and you'll know how to talk to him.

title: The Door
Name: sansa
text: sansa What is it?

title: The Door
Name: brienne
text: brienne I don't like leaving you here alone.

title: The Door
Name: sansa
text: sansa With Jon?

title: The Door
Name: brienne
text: brienne Not him. He seems trustworthy. A bit brooding, perhaps. I suppose that's understandable, considering. The others, though. Davos and the Red Woman helped a man murder his own brother with blood magic. And when Stannis paid for his crime, where were they? Already out looking for a leader with better prospects. And that wildling fellow with the beard --

title: The Door
Name: sansa
text: sansa Jon isn't Tormund. Jon isn't Davos, the Red Woman, or Stannis for that matter. Jon is Jon. He's my brother. He'll keep me safe. I trust him.

title: The Door
Name: brienne
text: brienne Then why did you lie to him when he asked you how you learned about Riverrun?

title: The Door
Name: jon
text: jon New dress?

title: The Door
Name: sansa
text: sansa I made it myself. Do you like it?

title: The Door
Name: jon
text: jon Year, it's -- I like the wolf bit.

title: The Door
Name: sansa
text: sansa Good, because I made this for you.

title: The Door
Name: sansa
text: sansa I made it like the one Father used to wear. As near as I can remember.

title: The Door
Name: jon
text: jon Thank you, Sansa.

title: The Door
Name: sansa
text: sansa You're welcome.

title: The Door
Name: jon
text: jon Don't knock it down while I'm gone.

title: The Door
Name: dolorous
text: dolorous I'll do my best.

title: The Door
Name: dolorous
text: dolorous Good luck.

title: The Door
Name: man
text: man Should we close the gate, Lord Commander?

title: The Door
Name: dolorous
text: dolorous I'm not the Lord Comman --

title: The Door
Name: dolorous
text: dolorous Yeah, ahem, close the bloody gate.

title: The Door
Name: meera
text: meera We can go home now, Hodor. Well, maybe not home home, but somewhere that isn't a cave.

title: The Door
Name: meera
text: meera Eat something that isn't moss. I want an egg. How do you like ‘em? Boiled? Fried up with some butter?

title: The Door
Name: meera
text: meera With a rasher of bacon and some blood sausage.

title: The Door
Name: leaf
text: leaf Get Bran and run!

title: The Door
Name: meera
text: meera Bran. Bran, wake up. Bran.

title: The Door
Name: hodor
text: hodor Hodor. Hodor.

title: The Door
Name: meera
text: meera Bran, wake up.

title: The Door
Name: meera
text: meera Hodor.

title: The Door
Name: meera
text: meera Help me!

title: The Door
Name: rickard
text: rickard Remember that you are a Stark. Comport yourself with dignity at the Vale and try to stay out of fights.

title: The Door
Name: young
text: young Yes, Father.

title: The Door
Name: rickard
text: rickard But if you have to fight, win.

title: The Door
Name: meera
text: meera Bran! Bran, wake up!

title: The Door
Name: meera
text: meera Bran! Bran! Bran, wake up.

title: The Door
Name: meera
text: meera You have to wake up. We need Hodor.

title: The Door
Name: meera
text: meera Bran, we're all going to die!

title: The Door
Name: meera
text: meera Bran, wake up! We're all going to die! Bran! Bran!

title: The Door
Name: meera
text: meera Bran, you have to wake up! We need Hodor!

title: The Door
Name: meera
text: meera Warg into Hodor now!

title: The Door
Name: meera
text: meera Bran, wake up. We need Hodor. We need Hodor. Warg into Hodor now! Now!

title: The Door
Name: threeeyed
text: threeeyed Listen to your friend, Brandon.

title: The Door
Name: hodor
text: hodor Hodor. Hodor. Hodor. Hodor.

title: The Door
Name: meera
text: meera Summer!

title: The Door
Name: leaf
text: leaf Go. Go!

title: The Door
Name: threeeyed
text: threeeyed The time has come. Leave me.

title: The Door
Name: meera
text: meera What are you doing?

title: The Door
Name: leaf
text: leaf Go!

title: The Door
Name: meera
text: meera Hodor, hurry!

title: The Door
Name: meera
text: meera Hold the door!

title: The Door
Name: meera
text: meera Hold the door! Hold the door! Hold the door!

title: The Door
Name: young
text: young Hold the door!

title: The Door
Name: young
text: young Hold the door! Hold the door! Hold the door! Hold the door! Hold the door! Hold the door!

title: The Door
Name: young
text: young Hold the door! Hold the door! Hold the door! Hold the door! Hold the door! Hold the door! Hold the door! Hold the door! Hold door! Hold door! Hold door! Hold door! Hodor! Hodor! Hodor! Hodor! Hodor! Hodor! Hodor!

title: Blood of My Blood
Name: bran
text: bran Meera. They found us.

title: Blood of My Blood
Name: meera
text: meera I'm so sorry.

title: Blood of My Blood
Name: rider
text: rider Come with me, now.

title: Blood of My Blood
Name: rider
text: rider The dead don't rest.

title: Blood of My Blood
Name: gilly
text: gilly It's so green.

title: Blood of My Blood
Name: sam
text: sam Oh, yes. Once you get south of the Riverlands, very different sorts of trees start to take over. Maple, elm, beech, poplar. The odd willow. And of course now that summer's over, you'll start seeing the autumn colors coming in. Still, you'll find more green here than anywhere else.

title: Blood of My Blood
Name: gilly
text: gilly You're nervous. You're a nervous talker.

title: Blood of My Blood
Name: gilly
text: gilly That's not any better being a nervous mute.

title: Blood of My Blood
Name: sam
text: sam I didn't think I'd ever come back here after my father made me renounce my title and inheritance and, well, threaten to kill me if I didn't. A person just doesn't feel welcome at that point.

title: Blood of My Blood
Name: sam
text: sam And I certainly didn't expect to be introducing him to my family. So you know what to tell them.

title: Blood of My Blood
Name: gilly
text: gilly That Little Sam is your baby.

title: Blood of My Blood
Name: sam
text: sam Yes, now that's very important. If he thinks that Little Sam is his grandchild, he'll take you in. He'll get an education. He'll learn to read. And you can help teach him. Huh?

title: Blood of My Blood
Name: gilly
text: gilly What did you tell your family about me?

title: Blood of My Blood
Name: sam
text: sam I told them I met you in the North.

title: Blood of My Blood
Name: gilly
text: gilly Did you tell them how far north?

title: Blood of My Blood
Name: sam
text: sam Well, it wasn't a very large piece of parchment.

title: Blood of My Blood
Name: gilly
text: gilly You didn't tell them where I'm really from? You didn't tell them I'm a wildling?

title: Blood of My Blood
Name: sam
text: sam The thing is...my father doesn't like wildlings. He hoped I'd make a man of myself by “killing some bloody wildlings,” so it's probably a good subject to avoid if at all possible.

title: Blood of My Blood
Name: gilly
text: gilly I think we're here.

title: Blood of My Blood
Name: melessa
text: melessa Sam. Oh, Sam.

title: Blood of My Blood
Name: sam
text: sam Oh, hello, Mother.

title: Blood of My Blood
Name: melessa
text: melessa I never thought I'd see you again. You look wonderful.

title: Blood of My Blood
Name: sam
text: sam Oh.

title: Blood of My Blood
Name: sam
text: sam Talla? Gods, you're a woman now.

title: Blood of My Blood
Name: talla
text: talla Father says I have to marry Symun Fossoway. He has yellow teeth- -

title: Blood of My Blood
Name: melessa
text: melessa That's enough, Talla.

title: Blood of My Blood
Name: sam
text: sam Oh, um, Mother, this is Gilly.

title: Blood of My Blood
Name: melessa
text: melessa Oh, my. You are lovely.

title: Blood of My Blood
Name: gilly
text: gilly I am happy to know you, Lady Tarly.

title: Blood of My Blood
Name: sam
text: sam Oh, and this, this is our son Samwell.

title: Blood of My Blood
Name: melessa
text: melessa Hello, little one. It's me, your grandmother.

title: Blood of My Blood
Name: melessa
text: melessa May I hold him?

title: Blood of My Blood
Name: gilly
text: gilly Yes, of course.

title: Blood of My Blood
Name: melessa
text: melessa You have a curious mind, I can tell. You'll be a scholar like your father.

title: Blood of My Blood
Name: sam
text: sam Where is Father? And Dickon?

title: Blood of My Blood
Name: melessa
text: melessa They're on a hunt. They'll join us for dinner. Come inside. Such a journey. You must be exhausted.

title: Blood of My Blood
Name: talla
text: talla Come, you'll be wanting a bath after all that travel. Oh, and a dress for dinner. You can wear one of mine. What's your color? Midnight blue or silver? Silver, maybe. Come. You can choose one of my bedrooms if you want.

title: Blood of My Blood
Name: tommen
text: tommen Is there no other way?

title: Blood of My Blood
Name: sparrow
text: sparrow You're afraid for her?

title: Blood of My Blood
Name: tommen
text: tommen Of course I'm afraid for her! It just seems very dangerous.

title: Blood of My Blood
Name: sparrow
text: sparrow She'll be protected the entire way. The Faith Militant are very stern with those who overstep their bounds. And Queen Margaery isn't your mother. I suspect the gods will predispose the common people to gentleness on her behalf. She's truly opened her heart to them.

title: Blood of My Blood
Name: tommen
text: tommen She's always been very devoted to the poor and the unfortunate.

title: Blood of My Blood
Name: sparrow
text: sparrow And now she's devoted to the gods as well. Would you like to see her?

title: Blood of My Blood
Name: tommen
text: tommen Have they hurt you? Have they mistreated you?

title: Blood of My Blood
Name: margaery
text: margaery No, Your Grace.

title: Blood of My Blood
Name: tommen
text: tommen I've missed you. More than you could know.

title: Blood of My Blood
Name: margaery
text: margaery We'll be together again soon and everything will be better than it was before.

title: Blood of My Blood
Name: tommen
text: tommen Better how? Soon the- - walk of atonement. He says there's no other way.

title: Blood of My Blood
Name: margaery
text: margaery Have you spoken to him at all, the High Sparrow?

title: Blood of My Blood
Name: tommen
text: tommen Yes, a few times. Have you?

title: Blood of My Blood
Name: margaery
text: margaery Yes, I have. He's not quite what we thought he was, is he?

title: Blood of My Blood
Name: margaery
text: margaery You think I'm mad. I sound mad.

title: Blood of My Blood
Name: tommen
text: tommen No. No, you don't. You- - you could never. You're right, he's not. He's a lot more- -

title: Blood of My Blood
Name: margaery
text: margaery He is. There's something about him. His way of looking at the world. It's not an easy thing admitting to yourself what you really are. It's taken me a while. He's helped me.

title: Blood of My Blood
Name: tommen
text: tommen What are you talking about? You're a good person. You've always been a good person. You're the best person I know.

title: Blood of My Blood
Name: tommen
text: tommen I was just telling him about your devotion to the poor.

title: Blood of My Blood
Name: margaery
text: margaery Ah, yes, I visited their hovels and I fed them soup and I made sure I was seen doing it. I never gave them what they really needed, though. I've had lots of time to think about how good I was at seeming good. All those stories I told myself about who I was and why I did the things I did. There were so many lies in those stories.

title: Blood of My Blood
Name: tommen
text: tommen I don't understand.

title: Blood of My Blood
Name: margaery
text: margaery It's all right. It really is. It's such a relief to let go of those lies.

title: Blood of My Blood
Name: tommen
text: tommen What about Loras?

title: Blood of My Blood
Name: margaery
text: margaery I love my brother. I will always love my brother. His soul is pure and perfect. His sins don't erase that purity, they only obscure it. He just needs to atone for them. We all do. Sooner or later, one way or another. The gods have a plan for us all.

title: Blood of My Blood
Name: gilly
text: gilly It's hard to walk in this.

title: Blood of My Blood
Name: sam
text: sam It's beautiful. You're beautiful.

title: Blood of My Blood
Name: sam
text: sam This venison, it's very tasty. Is it from today's hunt?

title: Blood of My Blood
Name: dickon
text: dickon Well, no. We haven't been able to cure that one yet. This is last week's.

title: Blood of My Blood
Name: sam
text: sam Oh, of course. Sorry. Long journey.

title: Blood of My Blood
Name: dickon
text: dickon Brought it down from 70 yards. One shot.

title: Blood of My Blood
Name: sam
text: sam Oh, that's a fair distance.

title: Blood of My Blood
Name: dickon
text: dickon So do you do much hunting up at the wall?

title: Blood of My Blood
Name: sam
text: sam Oh, yes. Yes. A good amount. North of the Wall, you don't hunt, you don't eat.

title: Blood of My Blood
Name: dickon
text: dickon Mm-hmmm. Mostly deer or is it elk as well?

title: Blood of My Blood
Name: sam
text: sam Rabbits. Sometimes squirrels. I say “we,” it's my friend Jon mostly. Sometimes Edd. Oh, and Gilly. She's- - she's quite a good hunter as well. Um, huntress.

title: Blood of My Blood
Name: melessa
text: melessa I imagine it's common where you're from. We once met a man, Lord Umber from Last Hearth, wasn't it, Randyll, who said he taught all his daughters how to hunt.

title: Blood of My Blood
Name: talla
text: talla Your father taught you to hunt? Our father would never teach us. I think our father could learn a thing or two from your father.

title: Blood of My Blood
Name: randyll
text: randyll That's enough of that.

title: Blood of My Blood
Name: melessa
text: melessa Samwell, would you care for more bread?

title: Blood of My Blood
Name: sam
text: sam Oh, yes. Yes, please. Thank you, Mother.

title: Blood of My Blood
Name: randyll
text: randyll Not fat enough already?

title: Blood of My Blood
Name: sam
text: sam I travelled south under orders from the Lord Commander. He wants me to- -

title: Blood of My Blood
Name: randyll
text: randyll I read your letter. You're to be a maester.

title: Blood of My Blood
Name: sam
text: sam Yes. And once I have my chain, I'll return to Castle Black.

title: Blood of My Blood
Name: randyll
text: randyll I thought the Night's Watch might make a man of you. Something resembling a man at least. You managed to stay soft and fat.

title: Blood of My Blood
Name: randyll
text: randyll Your nose buried in books. Spending your life reading about the achievements of better men. I'll wager you still can't sit a horse or wield a sword.

title: Blood of My Blood
Name: melessa
text: melessa Randyll, to be maester of the Night's Watch is a great honor.

title: Blood of My Blood
Name: gilly
text: gilly He can wield a sword. He killed a Thenn. He killed a White Walker.

title: Blood of My Blood
Name: dickon
text: dickon There's no such thing.

title: Blood of My Blood
Name: gilly
text: gilly I saw it with my own eyes on our way down to Castle Black. He drove a dagger into the walker's heart. He risked his own life to save mine more than once. He's a greater warrior than either of you will ever be.

title: Blood of My Blood
Name: randyll
text: randyll Your way down to Castle Black? Where did he kill a white walker? Where are you from? How'd you come to meet my son?

title: Blood of My Blood
Name: gilly
text: gilly The Night's Watch came to our keep.

title: Blood of My Blood
Name: randyll
text: randyll Where?

title: Blood of My Blood
Name: sam
text: sam Gilly.

title: Blood of My Blood
Name: gilly
text: gilly North of the Wall.

title: Blood of My Blood
Name: randyll
text: randyll North of the Wall? You're a Wildling. The Seven Kingdoms have waged war against these savages for centuries and here I sit hosting one in my hall thanks to my son. See that sword?

title: Blood of My Blood
Name: randyll
text: randyll It's called Heartsbane. It's been in our family for 500 years. It's Valyrian steel. Only a handful of them left in the world. It's supposed to go to my firstborn son after I die. To him. He will never wield that sword. If he were to become Lord Tarly of Horn Hill, it would be the end of this house. I took you for a Mole's Town whore when I saw you and I made my peace with that. Who else would have him? But I overestimated him. No. It was a wildling whore that seduced my son. This you getting back at me, boy? Hmm? Bring that to my table and making me dine with it. And you got what you were after, didn't you? A bastard. A half-breed bastard. Your invitation into our home.

title: Blood of My Blood
Name: melessa
text: melessa Come, my dear. Talla.

title: Blood of My Blood
Name: melessa
text: melessa I've lost my appetite.

title: Blood of My Blood
Name: randyll
text: randyll He dishonors us.

title: Blood of My Blood
Name: melessa
text: melessa You dishonor yourself.

title: Blood of My Blood
Name: randyll
text: randyll Your mother's a fine woman. You're not worthy of her. To please her, I'll take the wildling in. She can work in the kitchens. The bastard will be raised here. But this will be the last night you ever spend at Horn Hill.

title: Blood of My Blood
Name: sam
text: sam I'm sorry I let him treat you that way. I was afraid he'd turn you and Little Sam away.

title: Blood of My Blood
Name: gilly
text: gilly I'm not angry at you. I'm angry that horrible people can treat good people that way and get away with it. When do you have to go?

title: Blood of My Blood
Name: sam
text: sam First light.

title: Blood of My Blood
Name: sam
text: sam Say good-bye to him for me.

title: Blood of My Blood
Name: gilly
text: gilly You're not what he thinks you are, Sam. He doesn't know what you are.

title: Blood of My Blood
Name: sam
text: sam Good-bye, Gilly.

title: Blood of My Blood
Name: gilly
text: gilly Sam?

title: Blood of My Blood
Name: sam
text: sam We're leaving.

title: Blood of My Blood
Name: gilly
text: gilly What?

title: Blood of My Blood
Name: sam
text: sam Get your things.

title: Blood of My Blood
Name: gilly
text: gilly I don't have any things.

title: Blood of My Blood
Name: gilly
text: gilly What are you doing?

title: Blood of My Blood
Name: sam
text: sam We belong together. All of us.

title: Blood of My Blood
Name: gilly
text: gilly What about your mother and sister?

title: Blood of My Blood
Name: sam
text: sam Oh, they'll understand.

title: Blood of My Blood
Name: gilly
text: gilly Your sister's dress.

title: Blood of My Blood
Name: sam
text: sam She won't mind. Looks better on you anyway.

title: Blood of My Blood
Name: gilly
text: gilly Sam. That's your father's sword.

title: Blood of My Blood
Name: sam
text: sam It's my family's sword.

title: Blood of My Blood
Name: gilly
text: gilly Sam. Won't he come for it?

title: Blood of My Blood
Name: sam
text: sam He can bloody well try.

title: Blood of My Blood
Name: clarenzo
text: clarenzo The lion and the rose are one. I thank the gods above.

title: Blood of My Blood
Name: clarenzo
text: clarenzo And to you, my beauteous bridge, I pledge undying love.

title: Blood of My Blood
Name: all
text: all Hail King Joffrey. Hail Queen Margaery.

title: Blood of My Blood
Name: clarenzo
text: clarenzo I'll drink a toast to my new queen, for there is no one fairer. Dear Uncle, will you share my joy and be my royal cupbearer?

title: Blood of My Blood
Name: bobono
text: bobono Drink long and deep, my noble king, from this cup of sweet wine.

title: Blood of My Blood
Name: bobono
text: bobono The last drink he shall ever take. And vengeance shall be mine.

title: Blood of My Blood
Name: clarenzo
text: clarenzo Poison! Murder! I gasp. I- - I die.

title: Blood of My Blood
Name: clarenzo
text: clarenzo I limp. And it was he…

title: Blood of My Blood
Name: clarenzo
text: clarenzo that poisoned me. My evil Uncle Imp.

title: Blood of My Blood
Name: lady
text: lady My firstborn son. My golden lion foully, falsely slain. I pray you found a lasting peace free from strife and pain.

title: Blood of My Blood
Name: lady
text: lady Hear my prayer, O cruel gods. Take my life instead. For I cannot face another day when my sweet boy is dead. Oh, woe. Oh grief.

title: Blood of My Blood
Name: lady
text: lady Oh, darkest day, my heart is full of sorrow. All hope is lost. All joy is gone. And there is no tomorrow.

title: Blood of My Blood
Name: bobono
text: bobono What is that I hear and smell? Someone I'll soon send to hell.

title: Blood of My Blood
Name: bobono
text: bobono It's time to see if truth they told who said Tywin Lannister shits gold.

title: Blood of My Blood
Name: izembaro
text: izembaro You beast. You beast. You killed my wife and now you've taken your father's life.

title: Blood of My Blood
Name: izembaro
text: izembaro No worse child ever stained this land.

title: Blood of My Blood
Name: izembaro
text: izembaro Curse the day I named you.

title: Blood of My Blood
Name: bobono
text: bobono My greatest crime. Now I must flee.

title: Blood of My Blood
Name: bobono
text: bobono Then sail across the Narrow Sea to do unto you more treachery.

title: Blood of My Blood
Name: bobono
text: bobono Don't fear the winter.

title: Blood of My Blood
Name: bobono
text: bobono Fear me!

title: Blood of My Blood
Name: izembaro
text: izembaro Thank you. Ladies and gentlemen, I give you Bianca, Clarenzo.

title: Blood of My Blood
Name: izembaro
text: izembaro I give you Bobono.

title: Blood of My Blood
Name: izembaro
text: izembaro I give you Camello.

title: Blood of My Blood
Name: izembaro
text: izembaro And last but not least, sweet Lady Crane.

title: Blood of My Blood
Name: camello
text: camello Give this a good beating. Shake those fleas out. That's a dear.

title: Blood of My Blood
Name: izembaro
text: izembaro That crowd was shit.

title: Blood of My Blood
Name: lady
text: lady Girl.

title: Blood of My Blood
Name: lady
text: lady What are you doing back here?

title: Blood of My Blood
Name: arya
text: arya Nothing.

title: Blood of My Blood
Name: lady
text: lady I saw you the other day in the audience. How many times have you seen this stupid play?

title: Blood of My Blood
Name: arya
text: arya Three times.

title: Blood of My Blood
Name: lady
text: lady Did you pay?

title: Blood of My Blood
Name: arya
text: arya No.

title: Blood of My Blood
Name: lady
text: lady I remember when the players came to my village. I didn't have any money, so I snuck in. Just like you. Saw the painted faces, the costumes, listened to the songs, cried when the young lovers died in each other's arms. I ran off and joined them the next day, never looked back.

title: Blood of My Blood
Name: arya
text: arya You're very good.

title: Blood of My Blood
Name: lady
text: lady My final speech is shit.

title: Blood of My Blood
Name: lady
text: lady But to be fair to myself, which I always like to be, the writing's no good.

title: Blood of My Blood
Name: arya
text: arya So change it. It would all just be farting, belching, and slapping without you.

title: Blood of My Blood
Name: lady
text: lady How would you change it?

title: Blood of My Blood
Name: arya
text: arya The queen loves her son more than anything. And he was taken from her before she could say good-bye. She wouldn't just cry. She would be angry. She would want to kill the person who did this to her.

title: Blood of My Blood
Name: lady
text: lady What's your name?

title: Blood of My Blood
Name: arya
text: arya Mercy.

title: Blood of My Blood
Name: lady
text: lady You have very expressive eyes, Mercy.

title: Blood of My Blood
Name: lady
text: lady Wonderful eyebrows. Do you like pretending to be other people?

title: Blood of My Blood
Name: arya
text: arya I have to go. My father's waiting for me.

title: Blood of My Blood
Name: bianca
text: bianca Lady Crane, they loved you.

title: Blood of My Blood
Name: lady
text: lady They were sweet. Or drunk. Drunkenly sweet.

title: Blood of My Blood
Name: izembaro
text: izembaro No laugh for Nedo s death. These people are worse than animals.

title: Blood of My Blood
Name: izembaro
text: izembaro But they loved her. They all love her.

title: Blood of My Blood
Name: camello
text: camello Yes, you are adored by people and animals alike.

title: Blood of My Blood
Name: lady
text: lady I do what I can with what I'm given.

title: Blood of My Blood
Name: izembaro
text: izembaro With what you're given?

title: Blood of My Blood
Name: lady
text: lady Well, I was thinking- -

title: Blood of My Blood
Name: izembaro
text: izembaro Oh, we're all thinkers now, are we?

title: Blood of My Blood
Name: izembaro
text: izembaro Full to the tits with ideas.

title: Blood of My Blood
Name: lady
text: lady I didn't mean- -

title: Blood of My Blood
Name: izembaro
text: izembaro You have ideas, I have ideas, he has ideas. Why should my ideas have any more value than yours simply because I've been doing this my whole life? Who is anyone to judge my work? This is my profession. I know what I'm doing.

title: Blood of My Blood
Name: izembaro
text: izembaro You have no right to an opinion.

title: Blood of My Blood
Name: arya
text: arya Careful of that one. She wants you dead.

title: Blood of My Blood
Name: jaqen
text: jaqen And?

title: Blood of My Blood
Name: waif
text: waif As I expected.

title: Blood of My Blood
Name: jaqen
text: jaqen A shame. A girl had many gifts.

title: Blood of My Blood
Name: waif
text: waif You promised me.

title: Blood of My Blood
Name: jaqen
text: jaqen Don't let her suffer.

title: Blood of My Blood
Name: mace
text: mace My lord.

title: Blood of My Blood
Name: jaime
text: jaime My lord.

title: Blood of My Blood
Name: mace
text: mace My friends, the hour has come. Madness has overtaken this city and grasped in its claws my children. But now we must drive it back under the rocks whence it came. Madness has had its day!

title: Blood of My Blood
Name: captain
text: captain Forward, march!

title: Blood of My Blood
Name: sparrow
text: sparrow Rich or poor, noble or common, if we win, we must atone. Margaery of House Tyrell came to us a sinner. She stood before the gods in the holy sept and lied. She turned a blind eye to her brother's sins. She disgraces her house, the king, and herself.

title: Blood of My Blood
Name: captain
text: captain Company, halt! Face front! Turn!

title: Blood of My Blood
Name: sparrow
text: sparrow Lord Tyrell.

title: Blood of My Blood
Name: sparrow
text: sparrow Ser Jaime.

title: Blood of My Blood
Name: jaime
text: jaime Sorry to interrupt. We're here for Queen Margaery and Ser Loras Tyrell. Give them to us and we'll be on our way.

title: Blood of My Blood
Name: sparrow
text: sparrow I don't have the authority to give them to you. And you don't have the authority to take them.

title: Blood of My Blood
Name: captain
text: captain Lock spears!

title: Blood of My Blood
Name: jaime
text: jaime I speak for King Tommen of House Baratheon, First of His Name.

title: Blood of My Blood
Name: sparrow
text: sparrow The gods don't recognize his authority in this matter.

title: Blood of My Blood
Name: jaime
text: jaime You already insulted one great house. It won't happen twice. Every last sparrow will die before Margaery walks down that street.

title: Blood of My Blood
Name: sparrow
text: sparrow To die in the service of the gods would please each and every one of us. We yearn for it. But there is no call for it today. There will be no walk of atonement.

title: Blood of My Blood
Name: captain
text: captain Order up!

title: Blood of My Blood
Name: sparrow
text: sparrow Queen Margaery has already atoned for her sins by bringing another into the true light of the Seven.

title: Blood of My Blood
Name: sparrow
text: sparrow Together we announce a new age of harmony. A holy alliance between the Crown and the Faith.

title: Blood of My Blood
Name: woman
text: woman Long live King Tommen and bless you, Queen Margaery!

title: Blood of My Blood
Name: tommen
text: tommen The crown and the faith are the twin pillars upon which the world rests. Together we will restore the Seven Kingdoms to glory.

title: Blood of My Blood
Name: mace
text: mace What's happening?

title: Blood of My Blood
Name: olenna
text: olenna He's beaten us. That's what's happening.

title: Blood of My Blood
Name: tommen
text: tommen When you attack the Faith, you attack the Crown. Anyone who attacks the Crown is unfit to serve as Lord Commander of the Kingsguard.

title: Blood of My Blood
Name: jaime
text: jaime I've been a member of the Kingsguard since before you were born. You don't have to do this. You don't have to do anything.

title: Blood of My Blood
Name: tommen
text: tommen I have to answer to the gods.

title: Blood of My Blood
Name: jaime
text: jaime Not when you're sitting in that chair.

title: Blood of My Blood
Name: tommen
text: tommen The Crown's decision on this matter is final.

title: Blood of My Blood
Name: jaime
text: jaime Will I be walking naked in the streets? Or will I spend a few months in the sept dungeons first to teach me about the gods' mercy?

title: Blood of My Blood
Name: tommen
text: tommen You have served your house and your king faithfully for many years. And you will continue to do so. But not in this city.

title: Blood of My Blood
Name: walder
text: walder You've lost it?

title: Blood of My Blood
Name: black
text: black Yes, father.

title: Blood of My Blood
Name: walder
text: walder It's a castle, not a bloody sheep. Presumably you still know where it is. You didn't lose Riverrun. You let the Blackfish take it from you.

title: Blood of My Blood
Name: lothar
text: lothar He surprised us. He knows the castle better than anyone.

title: Blood of My Blood
Name: walder
text: walder You did lose the Blackfish after the Red Wedding. You had him right here in this hall and you let him leave. Then when I told you to hunt him down and kill him, you couldn't find him. That's what it means to lose something. Now he's come back and taken Riverrun.

title: Blood of My Blood
Name: black
text: black I don't think it's fair to blame us- -

title: Blood of My Blood
Name: walder
text: walder For 300 years we kissed Tully boots, swore oaths to them and their stinking fish banners. Not again. Riverrun is ours. Take it back.

title: Blood of My Blood
Name: black
text: black We don't have the men.

title: Blood of My Blood
Name: walder
text: walder We've got 10 times as many men as the damn Blackfish.

title: Blood of My Blood
Name: black
text: black The Mallisters have risen against us. And the Blackwoods.

title: Blood of My Blood
Name: lothar
text: lothar The Brotherhood Without Banners is rallying the commoners against us, raiding our supply trains and camps.

title: Blood of My Blood
Name: black
text: black Riverrun can withstand a siege for a year.

title: Blood of My Blood
Name: walder
text: walder If I want excuses, I'll put her in charge. They're laughing at us. All across the Riverlands right down to King's Landing, they're laughing at us.

title: Blood of My Blood
Name: walder
text: walder I hear it in my sleep! I'm not dead yet, unfortunately for you. And I'll not leave this world until they all choke on that laughter. Take that castle back.

title: Blood of My Blood
Name: lothar
text: lothar He'll never yield, Father.

title: Blood of My Blood
Name: walder
text: walder Oh, he'll yield.

title: Blood of My Blood
Name: walder
text: walder You'll show him the knife you used to kill Robb Stark's child in his whore mother's belly, and you'll show him the knife you used to open his niece's throat. And you'll remind him who it was that got married at the Red Wedding in the first place. His nephew.

title: Blood of My Blood
Name: walder
text: walder Cheer up, Lord Edmure. You're going home.

title: Blood of My Blood
Name: jaime
text: jaime I'm being sent to deal with the Blackfish. Apparently Walder Frey can't manage it on his own because he's 400 years old. Sent me with an army to the Riverlands and a siege that could last months.

title: Blood of My Blood
Name: cersei
text: cersei BEtter you're elsewhere at the head of an army than in the sept dungeons.

title: Blood of My Blood
Name: jaime
text: jaime I'm not going to the Riverlands.

title: Blood of My Blood
Name: cersei
text: cersei What, then?

title: Blood of My Blood
Name: jaime
text: jaime I'm going to give Bronn the largest bag of gold anyone's ever seen and have him gather the best killers he knows. I'll take them to the sept and I'll remove the High Sparrow's head and every other sparrow head I can find.

title: Blood of My Blood
Name: cersei
text: cersei You can't.

title: Blood of My Blood
Name: jaime
text: jaime He has our son! He stole our son! He's torn our family apart. How should we treat people who tear us apart?

title: Blood of My Blood
Name: cersei
text: cersei We should treat them without mercy and we will. But if you kill the High Sparrow, you won't leave the sept alive. And without you, this is all for nothing. Stand at the head of our army where you belong, where Father wanted you. Show our men where their loyalties belong. Show them what lannisters are, what we do to our enemies. And take that stupid little castle back because it's ours and because you can.

title: Blood of My Blood
Name: jaime
text: jaime You'll stand trial soon. I need to he here for you.

title: Blood of My Blood
Name: cersei
text: cersei It will be a trial by combat. I have the Mountain. They've made us both stronger, all of them.

title: Blood of My Blood
Name: cersei
text: cersei They have no idea how strong we are. No idea what we're going to do to them.

title: Blood of My Blood
Name: cersei
text: cersei We've always been together. We'll always be together. We're the only two people in the world.

title: Blood of My Blood
Name: meera
text: meera Why did you help us?

title: Blood of My Blood
Name: rider
text: rider The Three-Eyed Raven sent for me.

title: Blood of My Blood
Name: meera
text: meera The Three-Eyed Raven's dead.

title: Blood of My Blood
Name: rider
text: rider Now he lives again.

title: Blood of My Blood
Name: rider
text: rider When I last saw you, you were a boy. A fearless boy. Loved to climb the castle walls, frighten his mother.

title: Blood of My Blood
Name: bran
text: bran Who are you?

title: Blood of My Blood
Name: bran
text: bran Uncle Benjen. The last letter Jon wrote me said you had been lost beyond the Wall.

title: Blood of My Blood
Name: benjen
text: benjen I led a ranging party deep into the North to find White Walkers. They found us. A white walker stabbed me in the gut with a sword of ice. Left me there to die. To turn. The Children found me. Stopped the walker's magic from taking hold.

title: Blood of My Blood
Name: bran
text: bran How?

title: Blood of My Blood
Name: benjen
text: benjen The same way they made the Walkers in the first place. You saw it yourself.

title: Blood of My Blood
Name: bran
text: bran Dragonglass. A shard of dragonglass plunged into your heart.

title: Blood of My Blood
Name: benjen
text: benjen You are the Three-Eyed Raven now.

title: Blood of My Blood
Name: bran
text: bran I didn't have time to learn. I can't control anything.

title: Blood of My Blood
Name: benjen
text: benjen You must learn to control it before the Night King comes.

title: Blood of My Blood
Name: benjen
text: benjen Drink.

title: Blood of My Blood
Name: benjen
text: benjen One way or another, he will find his way to the world of men. When he does, you will be there waiting for him. And you will be ready.

title: Blood of My Blood
Name: daario
text: daario Everything all right?

title: Blood of My Blood
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys How many days' ride to Meereen?

title: Blood of My Blood
Name: daario
text: daario A week at best.

title: Blood of My Blood
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys How many ships will I need to bring my khalasar to Westeros?

title: Blood of My Blood
Name: daario
text: daario Dothraki and all their horses, the Unsullied, the Second Sons- - 1,000 ships easily. Probably more.

title: Blood of My Blood
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys And who has that many?

title: Blood of My Blood
Name: daario
text: daario Nobody.

title: Blood of My Blood
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys Nobody yet.

title: Blood of My Blood
Name: daario
text: daario So we ride for Meereen and after that we sail for Westeros. What then?

title: Blood of My Blood
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys I take what is mine.

title: Blood of My Blood
Name: daario
text: daario You weren't made to sit on a chair in a palance.

title: Blood of My Blood
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys What was I made for?

title: Blood of My Blood
Name: daario
text: daario You're a conqueror, Daenerys Stormborn.

title: Blood of My Blood
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys Wait here.

title: Blood of My Blood
Name: daario
text: daario I'm going after her. Wait for me here.

title: Blood of My Blood
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys Every khal who ever lived chose three blood riders to fight beside him and guard his way. But I am not a khal. I will not choose three blood riders. I choose you all.

title: Blood of My Blood
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys I will ask more of you than any khal has ever asked of his khalassar! Will you ride the wooden horses across the black salt sea?

title: Blood of My Blood
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys Will you kill my enemies in their iron suits and tear down their stone houses?

title: Blood of My Blood
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys Will you give me the Seven Kingdoms, the gift Khal Drogo promised me before the Mother of Mountains?

title: Blood of My Blood
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys Are you with me?

title: Blood of My Blood
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys Now and always?

title: The Broken Man
Name: man
text: man That's it. Get it to the top.

title: The Broken Man
Name: man
text: man Steady. Steady.

title: The Broken Man
Name: ray
text: ray Up she goes.

title: The Broken Man
Name: ray
text: ray Hey, come on. Put your back into it, huh?

title: The Broken Man
Name: ray
text: ray Here you are, son.

title: The Broken Man
Name: ray
text: ray Oh, gentlemen, please.

title: The Broken Man
Name: ray
text: ray And you lot, come on. Come on, get it moving. Come on, come on.

title: The Broken Man
Name: ray
text: ray In all my days I've never seen a man swing an ax like that. How many men did it take to cut you down?

title: The Broken Man
Name: sandor
text: sandor Just one.

title: The Broken Man
Name: ray
text: ray Ooh. he must have been some kind of monster.

title: The Broken Man
Name: sandor
text: sandor He was a woman.

title: The Broken Man
Name: ray
text: ray I think some of the men are a bit afraid of you.

title: The Broken Man
Name: sandor
text: sandor I'm used to it.

title: The Broken Man
Name: ray
text: ray When I found you, I thought you'd been dead for days. The way you were stinking already and you had bugs all over you and bone was coming through right there.

title: The Broken Man
Name: ray
text: ray I was gonna give you a proper burial and then you coughed. Oh, nearly shit myself. I reckoned you were gonna die by the time I loaded you on the wagon, but you didn't. Now, I reckoned you'd die a dozen more times over the next few days, but you didn't. What kept you going?

title: The Broken Man
Name: sandor
text: sandor Hate.

title: The Broken Man
Name: ray
text: ray No, there's a reason you're still here.

title: The Broken Man
Name: sandor
text: sandor Aye, there's a reason. I'm a big fucker and I'm tough to kill.

title: The Broken Man
Name: ray
text: ray No, a reason. Gods aren't done with you yet.

title: The Broken Man
Name: sandor
text: sandor I've heard that before. Man was talking about a different god, though.

title: The Broken Man
Name: ray
text: ray Well, maybe he was right. I don't know much about the gods.

title: The Broken Man
Name: sandor
text: sandor You're in the wrong line of work.

title: The Broken Man
Name: ray
text: ray Oh, there's plenty of pious sons of bitches who think they know the word of god or gods. I don't. I don't even know their real names. Maybe it is the Seven. Or maybe it's the old gods. Or maybe it's the Lord of Light. Or maybe they're all the same fucking thing. I don't know. What matters, I believe, is that there's something greater than us. And whatever it is, it's got plans for Sandor Clegane.

title: The Broken Man
Name: sandor
text: sandor You didn't know me back in my time. You don't know the things I've done.

title: The Broken Man
Name: ray
text: ray I've heard stories.

title: The Broken Man
Name: sandor
text: sandor If the gods are real...why haven't they punished me?

title: The Broken Man
Name: ray
text: ray They have.

title: The Broken Man
Name: sparrow
text: sparrow Your Grace. What are we reading today?

title: The Broken Man
Name: margaery
text: margaery The Book of the Mother, Your Holiness. Chapter three, verse 12.

title: The Broken Man
Name: sparrow
text: sparrow Ah, “As water rounds the stones, smoothing- -”

title: The Broken Man
Name: margaery
text: margaery Smoothing what was jagged, so does a woman's love calm a man's brute nature. A wife salves her husbando s wounds, a mother sings her son to sleep.”

title: The Broken Man
Name: sparrow
text: sparrow You learn quickly. There are some who know every verse of the sacred text, but don't have a drop of the Mother's mercy in their blood and savages who can't read at all who understand the Father's wisdom.

title: The Broken Man
Name: margaery
text: margaery For year I pretended to love the poor, the afflicted. I had pity for them, but I never loved them. They disgusted me.

title: The Broken Man
Name: sparrow
text: sparrow They are hard to love.

title: The Broken Man
Name: sparrow
text: sparrow The poor disgust us because they are us, shorn of our illusions. They show us what we'd look like without our fine clothes. How'd we smell without perfume.

title: The Broken Man
Name: sparrow
text: sparrow Can I ask you about a personal matter?

title: The Broken Man
Name: margaery
text: margaery Of course.

title: The Broken Man
Name: sparrow
text: sparrow The king mentioned that since your reunion, you haven't joined him in the marriage bed.

title: The Broken Man
Name: margaery
text: margaery No.

title: The Broken Man
Name: sparrow
text: sparrow You have a duty, Your Grace. To your husband, your king, your country, to the gods themselves.

title: The Broken Man
Name: margaery
text: margaery It's just...the desires that once drove me no longer do.

title: The Broken Man
Name: sparrow
text: sparrow Congress does not require desire on the woman's part, only patience. The king must have an heir if we are to continue our good work.

title: The Broken Man
Name: margaery
text: margaery Forgive me. Sometimes the truth path is hard to find.

title: The Broken Man
Name: sparrow
text: sparrow Hard to find and harder still to walk upon. But you've made great progress. I only pray your grandmother follows your lead.

title: The Broken Man
Name: margaery
text: margaery My grandmother?

title: The Broken Man
Name: sparrow
text: sparrow Yes. The Queen of Thorns is a remarkable woman, a strong woman, and an unrepentant sinner. You must teach her the new way as she taught you the old. Or I fear for her safety, body and soul.

title: The Broken Man
Name: olenna
text: olenna Does it move or talk? I want to speak with you alone.

title: The Broken Man
Name: margaery
text: margaery Septa Unella has been my true friend and counselor.

title: The Broken Man
Name: olenna
text: olenna Oh, this is madness!

title: The Broken Man
Name: olenna
text: olenna You're not in your sanctuary now, my dear. All I have to do is whistle and my men will stroll in here and bash you about...

title: The Broken Man
Name: margaery
text: margaery Grandmother.

title: The Broken Man
Name: olenna
text: olenna until I tell them to stop. If I tell them to stop. You could use a good bashing.

title: The Broken Man
Name: margaery
text: margaery Grandmother, please.

title: The Broken Man
Name: olenna
text: olenna What have they done to you?

title: The Broken Man
Name: margaery
text: margaery You marched against the High Sparrow, against the Faith.

title: The Broken Man
Name: olenna
text: olenna We marched for you.

title: The Broken Man
Name: margaery
text: margaery The gods could have punished you and Father, but they didn't. They showed mercy.

title: The Broken Man
Name: olenna
text: olenna And what about your brother? What mercy did they show him?

title: The Broken Man
Name: margaery
text: margaery Loras's only hope is to confess his crimes and repent. If he does, the Faith will allow him to return to Highgarden. He'll have to renounce his name and title...

title: The Broken Man
Name: olenna
text: olenna Have you lost your mind?

title: The Broken Man
Name: margaery
text: margaery and live his life as a penitent.

title: The Broken Man
Name: olenna
text: olenna He is the heir to Highgarden, the future of House Tyrell.

title: The Broken Man
Name: margaery
text: margaery He can begin again.

title: The Broken Man
Name: olenna
text: olenna As a mindless fanatic.

title: The Broken Man
Name: margaery
text: margaery As a free man.

title: The Broken Man
Name: olenna
text: olenna You will leave for Highgarden today. There is no law that says you must stay here.

title: The Broken Man
Name: margaery
text: margaery I am the queen. It is my duty to serve my husband the king.

title: The Broken Man
Name: margaery
text: margaery But you should leave, Grandmother. Your place is at home.

title: The Broken Man
Name: olenna
text: olenna I will never leave you. Never.

title: The Broken Man
Name: margaery
text: margaery You must.

title: The Broken Man
Name: margaery
text: margaery Go home. Find comfort in prayer and good works.

title: The Broken Man
Name: margaery
text: margaery The Mother watches over us all.

title: The Broken Man
Name: olenna
text: olenna I'll see you soon, my dear.

title: The Broken Man
Name: margaery
text: margaery Seven blessings to you, Grandmother.

title: The Broken Man
Name: margaery
text: margaery Shall we pray?

title: The Broken Man
Name: dim
text: dim We said we'd fight with you, King Crow, when the time comes and we meant it, but this isn't what we agreed to. These aren't White Walkers. This isn't an army of the dead. This isn't our find.

title: The Broken Man
Name: tormund
text: tormund If it weren't for him, none of us would be here. All of you would be meat in the Night King's army. And I'd be a pile of charred bones just like Mance.

title: The Broken Man
Name: dim
text: dim Remember Mance's camp? It stretched all the way to the horizon. And look at us now. Look what's left of us. And if we lose this, we're gone. Dozens of tribes, hundreds of generations. Be like we were never there at all. We'll be the last of the free folk.

title: The Broken Man
Name: jon
text: jon That's what'll happen to you if we lose. The Boltons, the Karstarks, the Umbers, they know you're here. They know that more than half of you are women and children. After they finish with me, they'll come for you. You're right. This isn't your fight. You shouldn't have to come to Winterfell with me. I shouldn't be asking you. It's not the deal we made. I need you with me if we're gonna beat them, and we need to beat them if you're going to survive.

title: The Broken Man
Name: tormund
text: tormund The crows killed him because he spoke for the free folk when no other southerners would. He died for us. If we are not willing to do the same for him, we're cowards. And if that's what we are, we deserve to be the last of the free folk.

title: The Broken Man
Name: wun
text: wun Snow.

title: The Broken Man
Name: jon
text: jon Are you sure they'll come?

title: The Broken Man
Name: tormund
text: tormund We're not clever like you southerners. When we say we'll do something, we do it.

title: The Broken Man
Name: cersei
text: cersei I heard you were leaving King's Landing.

title: The Broken Man
Name: olenna
text: olenna That is hardly your concern.

title: The Broken Man
Name: cersei
text: cersei Your grandson is still a prisoner. You'll leave him rotting in a cell?

title: The Broken Man
Name: olenna
text: olenna Loras rots in a cell because of you. THe High Sparrow rules this city because of you. Our two ancient houses face collapse because of you and your stupidity.

title: The Broken Man
Name: cersei
text: cersei You're right. I made a terrible mistake. I carry it with me every single day.

title: The Broken Man
Name: olenna
text: olenna Good.

title: The Broken Man
Name: cersei
text: cersei I delivered an army of fanatics onto our doorstep. And now we must fight them together. We need each other.

title: The Broken Man
Name: olenna
text: olenna I wonder if you're the worst person I've ever met. At a certain age, it's hard to recall. But the truly vile do stand out through the years. Do you remember the way you smirked at me when my grandson and granddaughter were dragged off to their cells? I do. I'll never forget it.

title: The Broken Man
Name: cersei
text: cersei You love your granddaughter. I love my son. It's the only truth I know. We must defend them.

title: The Broken Man
Name: olenna
text: olenna I'm leaving this wretched city as fast as I can before that shoeless zealot throws me into one of his cells. If you're half as bright as you think you are, you'll find your way out of here, too.

title: The Broken Man
Name: cersei
text: cersei Never. I'll never leave my son.

title: The Broken Man
Name: olenna
text: olenna What'll you do, then? You have no support. Not anymore. Your brother's gone. The High Sparrow saw to that. The rest of your family have abandoned you. The people despise you. You're surrounded by enemies, thousands of them. You're going to kill them all by yourself? You've lost, Cersei. It's the only joy I can find in all this misery.

title: The Broken Man
Name: man
text: man Pick the pace up. Keep going.

title: The Broken Man
Name: man
text: man Keep it moving!

title: The Broken Man
Name: bronn
text: bronn Now, that is a sorry attempt at a siege. Someone needs to teach those sad twats how to dig trenches.

title: The Broken Man
Name: jaime
text: jaime Someone certainly does.

title: The Broken Man
Name: bronn
text: bronn Oh, no. Not me. I'm just an upjumped sellsword.

title: The Broken Man
Name: jaime
text: jaime You're an anointed knight. There's quite a difference.

title: The Broken Man
Name: bronn
text: bronn Aye, knights don't get paid.

title: The Broken Man
Name: jaime
text: jaime You have better instincts than any officer in the Lannister army.

title: The Broken Man
Name: bronn
text: bronn That's like saying I have a bigger cock than anyone in the Unsullied army.

title: The Broken Man
Name: jaime
text: jaime I expect to command all the Lannister forces before long. You can be the right hand I lost.

title: The Broken Man
Name: bronn
text: bronn You promised me a lordship and a castle and a highborn beauty for a wife.

title: The Broken Man
Name: jaime
text: jaime And you'll get all three. A Lannister always- -

title: The Broken Man
Name: bronn
text: bronn Don't say it. Don't fucking say it.

title: The Broken Man
Name: lothar
text: lothar Come out and fight us, Blackfish. Yield the castle or we'll hang him.

title: The Broken Man
Name: lothar
text: lothar This is your last warning. Yield the castle.

title: The Broken Man
Name: black
text: black You think I won't do it, old man?

title: The Broken Man
Name: black
text: black I sliced your niece's throat from ear to ear. And where were you? Running and hiding like a fucking coward. Yield the castle or I cut his throat.

title: The Broken Man
Name: brynden
text: brynden Go on, then. Cut his throat.

title: The Broken Man
Name: jaime
text: jaime Lothar, is it?

title: The Broken Man
Name: lothar
text: lothar Ser Jaime. We didn't know you were coming.

title: The Broken Man
Name: jaime
text: jaime Cause you didn't set up a proper perimeter. You just allowed 8,000 men to approach unchallenged.

title: The Broken Man
Name: bronn
text: bronn Good thing we're friends or we'd be fucking you in the ass right now.

title: The Broken Man
Name: jaime
text: jaime Have Lord Edmure bathed and fed.

title: The Broken Man
Name: black
text: black Whoa, whoa.

title: The Broken Man
Name: lothar
text: lothar Walder.

title: The Broken Man
Name: black
text: black Edmure is a prisoner of House Frey.

title: The Broken Man
Name: jaime
text: jaime Only a fool makes threats he's not prepared to carry out. Now let's say I threatened to hit you unless you shut your mouth, but you kept talking. What do you think I'd do?

title: The Broken Man
Name: black
text: black I don't give a rat's- -

title: The Broken Man
Name: jaime
text: jaime I'm here by the king's command to take back this castle. Have him bathed and fed. Unless you'd like to take his place.

title: The Broken Man
Name: lothar
text: lothar Apologies, Ser Jaime.

title: The Broken Man
Name: lothar
text: lothar Do as he says.

title: The Broken Man
Name: jaime
text: jaime The siege is now under my command. The next time the Blackfish looks out from those ramparts, he'll see an army at his gates, not whatever this is.

title: The Broken Man
Name: bronn
text: bronn Have your lads start digging perimeter trenches. Set pickets every hundred yards. And work double-time on those siege towers and trebuchets.

title: The Broken Man
Name: black
text: black Those are our siege towers- -

title: The Broken Man
Name: jaime
text: jaime As I said, the siege is under my command. If that's not to your liking, go home.

title: The Broken Man
Name: jaime
text: jaime Get word to the Blackfish. I want a parley.

title: The Broken Man
Name: bronn
text: bronn A parley or a fight?

title: The Broken Man
Name: jaime
text: jaime He's an old man.

title: The Broken Man
Name: bronn
text: bronn You've got one hand. My money's on the old boy.

title: The Broken Man
Name: jon
text: jon Lady Mormont.

title: The Broken Man
Name: lyanna
text: lyanna Welcome to Bear Island.

title: The Broken Man
Name: sansa
text: sansa I remember when you were born, my lady. You were named for my Aunt Lyanna. It was said she was a great beauty. I'm sure you will be, too.

title: The Broken Man
Name: lyanna
text: lyanna I doubt it. My mother wasn't a great beauty or any other kind of beauty. She was a great warrior, though. She died fighting for your brother, Robb.

title: The Broken Man
Name: jon
text: jon I served under your uncle at Castle Black, Lady Lyanna. He was also a great warrior and an honorable man. I was his steward. In fact- -

title: The Broken Man
Name: lyanna
text: lyanna I think we've had enough small talk. What are you here?

title: The Broken Man
Name: jon
text: jon Stannis Baratheon garrisoned at Castle Black before he marched on Winterfell and was killed. He showed me the letter you wrote to him when he petitioned for men. It said- -

title: The Broken Man
Name: lyanna
text: lyanna I remember what it said. “Bear Island knows no king but the King in the North whose name is Stark.”

title: The Broken Man
Name: jon
text: jon Robb is gone, but House Stark is not. And it needs your support now more than ever. I've come with my sister to ask for House Mormont's allegiance.

title: The Broken Man
Name: lyanna
text: lyanna As far as I understand, you're a Snow and Lady Sansa is a Bolton. Or is she a Lannister? I've heard conflicting reports.

title: The Broken Man
Name: sansa
text: sansa I did what I had to do to survive, my lady. But I am a Stark. I will always be a Stark.

title: The Broken Man
Name: lyanna
text: lyanna If you say so. In any case, you don't just want my allegiance. You want my fighting men.

title: The Broken Man
Name: jon
text: jon Ramsay Bolton cannot be allowed to keep Winterfell, my lady. It is our duty to stop him. Even more so because he holds our brother Rickon Stark as prisoner. What you have to understand, my lady, is that- -

title: The Broken Man
Name: lyanna
text: lyanna I understand that I'm responsible for Bear Island and all who live here. So why should I sacrifice one more Mormont life for someone else's war?

title: The Broken Man
Name: davos
text: davos If it please, my lady, I understand how you feel.

title: The Broken Man
Name: lyanna
text: lyanna I don't know you, Ser…?

title: The Broken Man
Name: davos
text: davos Davos, my lady, of House Seaworth.

title: The Broken Man
Name: davos
text: davos You needn't ask your maester about my house. It's rather new.

title: The Broken Man
Name: lyanna
text: lyanna All right, Ser Davos of House Seaworth. How is it you understand how I feel?

title: The Broken Man
Name: davos
text: davos You never thought you'd find yourself in your position. Being responsible for so many lives at such a young age. I never thought I'd be in my position. I was a crabber's son, then I was a smuggler. And now I found myself addressing the lady of a great house in time of war. But I'm here because this isn't someone else's war. It's our war.

title: The Broken Man
Name: lyanna
text: lyanna Go on, Ser Davos.

title: The Broken Man
Name: davos
text: davos Your uncle, Lord Commander Mormont, made that man his steward. He chose Jon to be his successor because he knew had the courage to do what was right, even if it meant giving his life. Because Jeor Mormont and Jon Snow both understood that the real war isn't between a few squabbling houses. It's between the living and the dead. And make no mistake, my lady, the dead are coming.

title: The Broken Man
Name: lyanna
text: lyanna Is this true?

title: The Broken Man
Name: jon
text: jon Your uncle fought them at the Fist of the First Men. I fought them at Hardhome. We both lost.

title: The Broken Man
Name: davos
text: davos As long as the Boltons hold Winterfell, the North is divided. And a divided North won't stand a chance against the Night King. You want to protect your people, my lady. I understand. But there's no hiding from this. We have to fight and we need to do it together.

title: The Broken Man
Name: lyanna
text: lyanna House Mormont has kept faith with House Stark for 1,000 years. We will not break faith today.

title: The Broken Man
Name: jon
text: jon Thank you, my lady. How many fighting men can we expect?

title: The Broken Man
Name: lyanna
text: lyanna 62.

title: The Broken Man
Name: jon
text: jon 62?

title: The Broken Man
Name: lyanna
text: lyanna We are not a large house, but we're a proud one. And every man from Bear Island fights with the strength of 10 mainlanders.

title: The Broken Man
Name: davos
text: davos If they're half as ferocious as their lady, the Boltons are doomed.

title: The Broken Man
Name: brynden
text: brynden Kingslayer.

title: The Broken Man
Name: jaime
text: jaime Blackfish.

title: The Broken Man
Name: brynden
text: brynden I assume you're here to fulfill the vow you gave my niece. I don't see Sansa and Arya.

title: The Broken Man
Name: jaime
text: jaime I don't have them.

title: The Broken Man
Name: brynden
text: brynden Pity. Do you wish to resume your captivity?

title: The Broken Man
Name: brynden
text: brynden Then why are you here?

title: The Broken Man
Name: jaime
text: jaime You know why I'm here. This castle belongs to House Frey. You're trespassing. In the name of King Tommen, I order you to surrender or- -

title: The Broken Man
Name: brynden
text: brynden Or you'll kill Edmure?

title: The Broken Man
Name: brynden
text: brynden My nephew's marked for death no matter what. Hang him and be done with it.

title: The Broken Man
Name: jaime
text: jaime It won't stop with Edmure. You'll force me to storm the castle. Hundreds will die.

title: The Broken Man
Name: brynden
text: brynden Hundreds of mine. Thousands of yours. If you can breach the walls.

title: The Broken Man
Name: jaime
text: jaime We'll breach them and kill every last one of you. But if you surrender, I'll spare the lives of your men. On my honor.

title: The Broken Man
Name: brynden
text: brynden Your honor? Bargaining with oathbreakers is like building on quicksand.

title: The Broken Man
Name: jaime
text: jaime The war is over, ser. Why sacrifice living men to a lost cause?

title: The Broken Man
Name: brynden
text: brynden As long as I'm standing, the war is not over. This is my home. I was born in this castle and I'm ready to die in it. So you can either attack or try to starve us out. We have enough provisions for two years. Do you have two years, Kingslayer?

title: The Broken Man
Name: jaime
text: jaime You clearly have no intention of saving your men's lives. Why did you come to treat with me?

title: The Broken Man
Name: brynden
text: brynden Sieges are dull. And I wanted to see you in person, get the measure of you.

title: The Broken Man
Name: jaime
text: jaime Well, now you have.

title: The Broken Man
Name: brynden
text: brynden Aye, now I have. I'm disappointed.

title: The Broken Man
Name: robett
text: robett The answer is no.

title: The Broken Man
Name: jon
text: jon Lord Glover, if you could just hear us out.

title: The Broken Man
Name: robett
text: robett I've heard enough. We've only just taken back this castle from the Ironborn. The Boltons helped us do it. Now you want me to fight against them? I could be skinned for even talking to you.

title: The Broken Man
Name: jon
text: jon The Boltons are traitors. Roose Bolton- -

title: The Broken Man
Name: robett
text: robett Have other northern houses pledged to fight for you?

title: The Broken Man
Name: jon
text: jon House Mormont.

title: The Broken Man
Name: robett
text: robett And?

title: The Broken Man
Name: jon
text: jon We sent raven to Houses Manderly- -

title: The Broken Man
Name: robett
text: robett I don't care about ravens. You're asking me to join your army. Who is fighting in this army?

title: The Broken Man
Name: jon
text: jon The bulk of the force is made up of wildlings.

title: The Broken Man
Name: robett
text: robett Then the rumors are true. I didn't dare believe them. I received you out of respect for your father. Now I would like you to leave. House Glover will not abandon its ancestral home to fight alongside wildlings.

title: The Broken Man
Name: jon
text: jon Lord Glover.

title: The Broken Man
Name: robett
text: robett There's nothing else to say.

title: The Broken Man
Name: sansa
text: sansa I would remind you that House Glover is pledged to House Stark. Sworn to answer when called upon.

title: The Broken Man
Name: robett
text: robett Yes, my family served House Stark for centuries. We wept when we heard of your father's death. When my brother was lord of this castle, he answered Robb's call and hailed him King in the North.

title: The Broken Man
Name: robett
text: robett And where was King Robb when the Ironborn attacked this castle? When they threw my wife and children in prison and brutalized and killed our subjects? Taking up with a foreign whore. Getting himself and those who followed him killed.

title: The Broken Man
Name: robett
text: robett I served House Stark once, but House Stark is dead.

title: The Broken Man
Name: theon
text: theon Why did we have to come here?

title: The Broken Man
Name: yara
text: yara Some of us still like it. Have a drink at least.

title: The Broken Man
Name: theon
text: theon I don't want one.

title: The Broken Man
Name: yara
text: yara Don't go far, love.

title: The Broken Man
Name: yara
text: yara I'll find you in a bit.

title: The Broken Man
Name: yara
text: yara Nothing on the Iron Islands has an ass like that. Doesn't interest you anymore?

title: The Broken Man
Name: yara
text: yara I'm sorry. I won't joke about it. I'll never hurt you, little brother. Don't you know that?

title: The Broken Man
Name: theon
text: theon You think Uncle Euron's hunting for us?

title: The Broken Man
Name: yara
text: yara Of course he is. As long as we're alive, we're a threat.

title: The Broken Man
Name: theon
text: theon He'll find us.

title: The Broken Man
Name: yara
text: yara It's a great big world and we have fast ships. Drink.

title: The Broken Man
Name: theon
text: theon I don't want any.

title: The Broken Man
Name: yara
text: yara I don't care what you want. Drink.

title: The Broken Man
Name: yara
text: yara Drink it all.

title: The Broken Man
Name: yara
text: yara You're Ironborn, Theon. I know you've had some bad years.

title: The Broken Man
Name: theon
text: theon Some bad years?

title: The Broken Man
Name: yara
text: yara But I'm tired of watching you cower like a beat dog. Drink the goddamn ale.

title: The Broken Man
Name: yara
text: yara Now listen to me. I need you. The real Theon Greyjoy, not this rat shit pretender. Can you find him for me? Drink.

title: The Broken Man
Name: yara
text: yara You escaped, do you hear me? You got away and you're never going back. We'll get justice for you.

title: The Broken Man
Name: theon
text: theon If I got justice, my burnt body would hang over the gates of Winterfell.

title: The Broken Man
Name: yara
text: yara Fuck justice, then. We'll get revenge. Drink.

title: The Broken Man
Name: yara
text: yara Listen to me. If you're so broken that there's no coming back, take a knife and cut your wrists. End it. But if you're staying, Theon, I need you. We're gonna sail to Meereen. We're gonna make a pact with this Dragon Queen. And we're gonna take back the Iron Islands.

title: The Broken Man
Name: yara
text: yara Are you with me? Are you really with me?

title: The Broken Man
Name: yara
text: yara Now, since it's my last night ashore for a long while, I'm gonna go fuck the tits off this one.

title: The Broken Man
Name: davos
text: davos Stannis camped here on his way to Winterfell.

title: The Broken Man
Name: sansa
text: sansa And that's a good thing?

title: The Broken Man
Name: davos
text: davos He was the most experienced commander in Westeros. He chose this place for a reason. Those mountains are a natural fortification. There's a stream down there for the horses.

title: The Broken Man
Name: jon
text: jon We're not staying here long. Another storm could hit any day..

title: The Broken Man
Name: ray
text: ray I was a soldier once. All my superiors thought I was brave. I wasn't. I mean, I never ran from a fight. Only because I was afraid my friends would see I was afraid. That's all I was, a coward. We followed orders no matter the orders. Burn that village. Fine, I'm your arsonist. Steal that farmer's crops. Good, I'm your thief. Kill those young lads so they won't take up arms against us. I'm your murderer. I remember once a woman screaming at us, calling us animals as we dragged her son from their hut. But we weren't animals. Animals are true to their nature and we had betrayed ours. I cut that young boy's throat myself as his mother screamed and my friends held her back.

title: The Broken Man
Name: ray
text: ray That night...I felt such shame. Shame was so heavy on me, I couldn't eat, I couldn't sleep.

title: The Broken Man
Name: ray
text: ray All I could do was stare into that dark sky and listen to that mother screaming her son's name. I'll hear her screaming the rest of my life.

title: The Broken Man
Name: ray
text: ray Now, I know I can never bring that lad back. All I can do with time I've got left is bring a little goodness into the world. That's all any of us can do, isn't it? Never too late to stop robbing people, to stop killing people. Start helping people.

title: The Broken Man
Name: ray
text: ray It's never too late to come back.

title: The Broken Man
Name: ray
text: ray And it's not about waiting for the gods to answer your prayers. It's not even about the gods. It's about you. Learning you have to answer your prayers yourself.

title: The Broken Man

title: No One
Name: lady
text: lady My son. My firstborn son. My child king, hush. Listen to the gods, for you they sing. Fight no more, sweet child. Your wars are won. The wolves are buried and the false stag done. Shut your blue eyes, my love. Let the crown fall. The Father above beckons you into his hall. In Seventh Heaven I'll see you once more. But now I seek vengeance on Sansa the whore and my brother the Imp who killed his own king. Born amongst lions, our curse from within. I will slay him, I swear. With noose or with knife, though it take me a fortnight, a moon, or my life.

Name: tommen
text: tommen Lords and ladies, the Faith and the Crown are the two pillars that hold up this world. One collapses, so does the other. The Father judges us all. If you break his laws...you will be punished. After conferring with His Holiness the High Septon, we have determined that Loras Tyrell and Cersei lannister's trial will be held in the Great Sept of Baelor on the first day of the Festival of the Mother.

title: No One
Name: tommen
text: tommen Furthermore, after much prayer and reflection, the Crown has decided that from this day forward, trial by combat will be forbidden throughout the Seven Kingdoms. The tradition is a brutish one, a scheme devised by corrupt rulers in order to avoid true judgment from the gods. Cersei Lannister and Loras Tyrell will stand trial before seven septons as it was in the earliest days of the Faith. Seven blessings to all.

title: No One
Name: crowd
text: crowd Seven blessings.

title: No One
Name: qyburn
text: qyburn Your Grace...that old rumor you told me about. My little birds investigated.

title: No One
Name: cersei
text: cersei And? Was it just a rumor or something more?
