title: No One
Name: qyburn
text: qyburn More. Much more.

title: No One
Name: missandei
text: missandei You seem happy.

title: No One
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion I am happy. You should both be as well. Not so long ago, this city was ready to devour itself.

title: No One
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion Now it's like a man reborn.

title: No One
Name: missandei
text: missandei I will be happy when our queen returns.

title: No One
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion Why don't you drink? Why don't either of you ever drink?

title: No One
Name: grey
text: grey Unsullied never drink.

title: No One
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion Why not?

title: No One
Name: grey
text: grey Rules.

title: No One
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion And who made these rules? Your former masters?

title: No One
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion Those miserable old shits didn't want you to be human. Have a drink with me.

title: No One
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion And you? What's your excuse?

title: No One
Name: missandei
text: missandei I have tried wine before. It made me feel funny.

title: No One
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion That's how you know it's working.

title: No One
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion Here's to our queen. Anyone not drinking is disrespecting our queen.

title: No One
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion To Daenerys Stormborn, Mother of Dragons, Breaker of Chains, long may she reign.

title: No One
Name: grey
text: grey Long may she reign.

title: No One
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion Do you like it?

title: No One
Name: grey
text: grey Tastes like it has turned.

title: No One
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion Yes, yes. Fermentation. One day, after our queen has taken the Seven Kingdoms...I'd like to have my own vineyard. Make my own wine. The Imp's Delight. Only my close friends could drink it.

title: No One
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion Tell me a joke, Missandei of Naath.

title: No One
Name: missandei
text: missandei I do not know any jokes.

title: No One
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion Grey worm?

title: No One
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion Right. Three lords walk into a tavern- - a Stark, a Martell, and a Lannister. They order ale...

title: No One
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion but when the barkeep brings them over, each of them finds a fly in his cup. The Lannister, outraged, shoves the cup aside and demands another. The Martell plucks the fly out and swallows it whole. The Stark reaches into his cup, pulls out the fly and shouts, “Spit it out, you see shit. Spit it out.”

title: No One
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion It's funnier in Westeros.

title: No One
Name: grey
text: grey The Starks and the lannisters, i thought these were enemies.

title: No One
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion Yes.

title: No One
Name: missandei
text: missandei A joke is like a story, Torgo Nudho. Not a true story, necessarily.

title: No One
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion A story that's supposed to make you laugh, ideally. Not at the moment, perhaps.

title: No One
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion Missandei, do you like the wine?

title: No One
Name: missandei
text: missandei I do.

title: No One
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion Tell a joke.

title: No One
Name: missandei
text: missandei Two translators are on a sinking ship.

title: No One
Name: missandei
text: missandei The first says, “Do you know how to swim?” The second says, “No, but I can shout for help in 19 languages.”

title: No One
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion Ah!

title: No One
Name: grey
text: grey That is the worst joke I ever heard.

title: No One
Name: missandei
text: missandei You don't even know what a joke is.

title: No One
Name: grey
text: grey I am soldier all my life. You think I never hear joke?

title: No One
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion You lied to us.

title: No One
Name: grey
text: grey I make joke.

title: No One
Name: missandei
text: missandei More jokes.

title: No One
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion I once walked into a brothel with a honeycomb and a jackass. The madam says- -

title: No One
Name: missandei
text: missandei The Masters have come for their property.

title: No One
Name: jaime
text: jaime Lord Edmure.

title: No One
Name: jaime
text: jaime I apologize for the way the Freys treated you. A man of your birth deserved better. You have my word you'll be properly fed and clothes from now on.

title: No One
Name: edmure
text: edmure I have your word?

title: No One
Name: edmure
text: edmure Oh, good. Good, that's- - that's a fine thing. My uncle will never surrender the castle, ser. Whatever game you're playing.

title: No One
Name: jaime
text: jaime The Blackfish is an old man. A good death is all he can hope for. But you, you have a child now, I've heard. A son you sired on your wedding night. You're a potent man.

title: No One
Name: edmure
text: edmure A son I've never met born of a wife that I haven't seen since our first night together.

title: No One
Name: jaime
text: jaime You should be with them both. I can arrange that, you realize? Comfortable rooms for you at Casterly Rock. A tutor for your boy, knights to train him to fight and to ride. And when he comes of age, he'll have a keep of his own.

title: No One
Name: edmure
text: edmure Do you imagine yourself a decent person? Is that it? After you've massacred my family. Kept me in a cell for years. Stolen our lands.

title: No One
Name: jaime
text: jaime I'll remind you that our houses are at war. I'm sorry if this conflict has inconvenienced you, but rebelling against the Crown does have consequences.

title: No One
Name: edmure
text: edmure Says the man who shoved his sword through his king's back.

title: No One
Name: jaime
text: jaime Did I give you the impression that this was a negotiation? It's not.

title: No One
Name: edmure
text: edmure You understand. On some level you understand that you're an evil man.

title: No One
Name: jaime
text: jaime I'll leave the judgments to the gods.

title: No One
Name: edmure
text: edmure Well, that is convenient for you. You're a fine-looking fellow, aren't you?

title: No One
Name: edmure
text: edmure Your square jaw, your golden armor. Tell me, I want to know. I truly do. How do you live with yourself? All of us have to believe that we're decent, don't we? You have to sleep at night. How do you tell yourself that you're decent after everything that you've done?

title: No One
Name: jaime
text: jaime I was your sister's prisoner once. She hit me on the head with a rock if I remember correctly.

title: No One
Name: edmure
text: edmure Yeah. She should have killed you.

title: No One
Name: jaime
text: jaime Perhaps, but she didn't. Catelyn Stark hated me just like you hate me. But I didn't hate her. I admired her. Far more than her husband or her son.

title: No One
Name: edmure
text: edmure Do you think I care whom you admire and whom you don't?

title: No One
Name: jaime
text: jaime No, I don't, but I'm telling you anyway because you're my prisoner. You don't have a choice. The love she had for her children, I was a little awed by it. Reminded me of my sister.

title: No One
Name: edmure
text: edmure Oh. Oh, I see. You're a madman.

title: No One
Name: jaime
text: jaime I'm not here to trade insults. Your sister was a strong- -

title: No One
Name: edmure
text: edmure Don't talk about Cat!

title: No One
Name: jaime
text: jaime I'll talk about whomever I want.

title: No One
Name: jaime
text: jaime She loved her children. I suppose all mothers do, but Catelyn and Cersei, there's a fierceness you don't often see.

title: No One
Name: jaime
text: jaime They'd do anything to protect their babies.

title: No One
Name: jaime
text: jaime Start a war. Burn cities to ash. Free their worst enemies. The things we do for love.

title: No One
Name: edmure
text: edmure You didn't come here to talk about our sisters.

title: No One
Name: jaime
text: jaime That's exactly why I came here. I love Cersei. You can laugh at that if you want. You can sneer. It doesn't matter. She needs me. And to get back to her, I have to take Riverrun. I'll send for your baby boy.

title: No One
Name: jaime
text: jaime And I'll launch him into Riverrun with a catapult. Because you don't matter to me, Lord Edmure. Your son doesn't matter to me. The people in the castle don't matter to me. Only Cersei. And if I have to slaughter every Tully who ever lived to get back to her, that's what I'll do.

title: No One
Name: guard
text: guard Who goes there?

title: No One
Name: edmure
text: edmure Edmure Tully, son of Hoster Tully, and the rightful Lord of Riverrun. I demand entry.

title: No One
Name: brynden
text: brynden Don't let him in.

title: No One
Name: guard
text: guard He's the Lord of Riverrun. I have to obey his commands.

title: No One
Name: brynden
text: brynden He's been their captive ever since they murdered his king at the Red Wedding. Why do you think the people who murdered his king at the Red Wedding would decide to let him come home? Because it's a trap, you idiot. Don't let him in.

title: No One
Name: guard
text: guard He's my lord, my lord. I've sworn to serve the Lord of Riverrun and obey his commands.

title: No One
Name: brynden
text: brynden You're not obeying Edmure's commands. You're obeying the fucking Kinglsayer's commands.

title: No One
Name: edmure
text: edmure I demand entry.

title: No One
Name: guard
text: guard My lord has given an order.

title: No One
Name: brynden
text: brynden WIth a knife to his throat. That is not a valid order.

title: No One
Name: guard
text: guard Lower the drawbridge and open the gate for Lord Ed- -

title: No One
Name: brynden
text: brynden I'll have your head before I surrender Riverrun.

title: No One
Name: guard
text: guard You are not lord of this castle, my lord.

title: No One
Name: guard
text: guard Lower the drawbridge!

title: No One
Name: guard
text: guard Aye, ser!

title: No One
Name: black
text: black If you're wrong, we're just surrendered our most valuable prisoner.

title: No One
Name: guard
text: guard Welcome home, my lord.

title: No One
Name: edmure
text: edmure Command all the forces within the castle to lay down their arms. Open the gates.

title: No One
Name: guard
text: guard My lord- -

title: No One
Name: edmure
text: edmure Your lord has given a command.

title: No One
Name: edmure
text: edmure Find the Blackfish. Put him in irons and hand him over to the Freys.

title: No One
Name: guard
text: guard Find him.

title: No One
Name: brynden
text: brynden Go on.

title: No One
Name: brienne
text: brienne Come with us.

title: No One
Name: brynden
text: brynden I've run before from the Red Wedding. I'm not running again. This is my family home.

title: No One
Name: brienne
text: brienne Your family is in the North. Come with us. Don't die for pride when you can fight for your blood.

title: No One
Name: brynden
text: brynden You'll serve Sansa far better than I ever could.

title: No One
Name: brynden
text: brynden Go on, now.

title: No One
Name: brynden
text: brynden I haven't had a proper sword fight in years. I expect I'll make a damn fool of myself.

title: No One
Name: guard
text: guard We found the Blackfish, my lord.

title: No One
Name: jaime
text: jaime Good. Bring him to me.

title: No One
Name: guard
text: guard He died fighting, my lord.

title: No One
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion I was wrong. I admit it.

title: No One
Name: missandei
text: missandei That changes nothing.

title: No One
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion The Unsullied could mount a defense off the beachhead. If the slavers' forces- -

title: No One
Name: grey
text: grey No more talking from you. Your talking gave us this.

title: No One
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion And I have acknowledged that. I'm trying- -

title: No One
Name: grey
text: grey You're trying to tell me what the army should do. You do not know what the army should do.

title: No One
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion All right, what should the army do?

title: No One
Name: grey
text: grey We'll not go to the beach. If we go to the beach, the Masters will take the pyramid. The pyramid is the only place in the city we can defend. We stay here.

title: No One
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion And then?

title: No One
Name: grey
text: grey We wait for them to come to us. Then we fight them.

title: No One
Name: beric
text: beric Clegane.

title: No One
Name: thoros
text: thoros What the fuck you doing here?

title: No One
Name: sandor
text: sandor Chasing them. You?

title: No One
Name: thoros
text: thoros Hanging them.

title: No One
Name: sandor
text: sandor Any particular reason?

title: No One
Name: beric
text: beric They're our men. Or they were. They attacked a nearby sept and murdered the villagers. Why do you want them?

title: No One
Name: sandor
text: sandor Same reason. I was helping build it. They killed a friend of mine.

title: No One
Name: thoros
text: thoros You've got friends?

title: No One
Name: sandor
text: sandor Not anymore. They're mine.

title: No One
Name: beric
text: beric It's the Brotherhoodo s good name they've dragged through the dirt.

title: No One
Name: sandor
text: sandor Fuck your name. They're mine. I killed you once before, Dondarrion. Happy to do it again.

title: No One
Name: sandor
text: sandor Drop that arrow, you bloody girl.

title: No One
Name: sandor
text: sandor Tougher girls than you have tried to kill me.

title: No One
Name: beric
text: beric You can have one of them.

title: No One
Name: sandor
text: sandor Two.

title: No One
Name: thoros
text: thoros No, no, no.

title: No One
Name: thoros
text: thoros We're not butchers. We hang them.

title: No One
Name: sandor
text: sandor hanging? All over in an instant. Where's the punishment in that?

title: No One
Name: thoros
text: thoros They die.

title: No One
Name: sandor
text: sandor We all bloody die.

title: No One
Name: sandor
text: sandor Except this one here. I'll only gut one of them.

title: No One
Name: beric
text: beric No.

title: No One
Name: sandor
text: sandor I'll chop off one hand.

title: No One
Name: beric
text: beric We gave you two of the three out of respect for your loss. That's generous.

title: No One
Name: sandor
text: sandor Bunch of nancies.

title: No One
Name: sandor
text: sandor There was a time I would have killed all seven of you just to gut these three.

title: No One
Name: thoros
text: thoros You're getting old, Clegane.

title: No One
Name: sandor
text: sandor He's not.

title: No One
Name: lem
text: lem Please don't. I'll give you anything.

title: No One
Name: sandor
text: sandor Got anything to eat?

title: No One
Name: thoros
text: thoros Enjoying yourself?

title: No One
Name: sandor
text: sandor I prefer chicken.

title: No One
Name: beric
text: beric You ought to join us. We could use you.

title: No One
Name: sandor
text: sandor I tried joining. Didn't work out for me.

title: No One
Name: thoros
text: thoros Clegane, we're here for a reason. The Lord of Light is keeping Beric alive for a reason. He gave a failed, drunk priest the power to bring him back for a reason. We are part of something larger than ourselves.

title: No One
Name: sandor
text: sandor Lots of horrible shit in this world gets done for something larger than ourselves.

title: No One
Name: beric
text: beric Cold winds are rising in the North.

title: No One
Name: sandor
text: sandor And you're going to go stop them?

title: No One
Name: beric
text: beric We need good men to help us.

title: No One
Name: sandor
text: sandor Last time you saw me, you wanted to execute me.

title: No One
Name: beric
text: beric True enough. But the Lord of Light gave you the power to defeat me. Why?

title: No One
Name: sandor
text: sandor I beat you because I'm better than you, Beric. I was better than you before you started yammering on about the Lord and I'm better than you now.

title: No One
Name: beric
text: beric Aye, you're probably right. You're a fighter. You were born a fighter. You walked away from the fight. How did that go? Good and bad, young and old, the things we're fighting will destroy them all alike. You can still help a lot more than you've harmed Clegane, it's not too late for you.

title: No One
Name: arya
text: arya Lady Crane?

title: No One
Name: waif
text: waif If you'd have done your job, she would have died painlessly.

title: No One
Name: waif
text: waif Instead…

title: No One
Name: waif
text: waif The Many-Faced God was promised a name. He must always receive what is his. You can't change that. I can't change that. No one can. And now he's been promised another name.

title: No One
Name: waif
text: waif It will all be over soon. On your knees or on your feet?

title: No One
Name: waif
text: waif Haven't we been through this already? That won't help you.

title: No One
Name: arya
text: arya You told her to kill me.

title: No One
Name: jaqen
text: jaqen Yes. But here you are. And there she is.

title: No One
Name: jaqen
text: jaqen Finally a girl is no one.

title: No One
Name: arya
text: arya A girl is Arya Stark of Winterfell and I'm going home.

title: Battle of the Bastards
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion Despite appearances, I think you'll find the city's on the rise.

title: Battle of the Bastards
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion Perhaps we should take shelter.

title: Battle of the Bastards
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys The city is on the rise?

title: Battle of the Bastards
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion Meereen is strong. Commerce has returned to the markets. The people are behind you.

title: Battle of the Bastards
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion Well, not all the people, of course. No ruler that ever lived had the support of all the people. But the rebirth of Meereen is the cause of this violence. The Masters cannot let Meereen succeed. Because if Meereen succeeds, a city without slavery, a city without Masters…

title: Battle of the Bastards
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion it proves that no one needs a Master.

title: Battle of the Bastards
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys Good. Shall we begin?

title: Battle of the Bastards
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion Do we have a plan?

title: Battle of the Bastards
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys I will crucify the Masters. I will set their fleets afire, kill every last one of their soldiers, and return their cities to the dirt. That is my plan.

title: Battle of the Bastards
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys You don't approve?

title: Battle of the Bastards
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion You once told me you knew what your father was. Did you know his plans for King's Landing when the Lannister armies were at his gates?

title: Battle of the Bastards
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion Probably not. Well, he told my brother and Jaime told me. He had caches of wildfire hidden under the Red Keep, the Guildhalls, the Sept of Baelor, all the major thoroughfares. He would have burned every one of his citizens. The loyal ones and the trators. Every man, woman, and child. That's why Jaime killed him.

title: Battle of the Bastards
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys This is entirely different.

title: Battle of the Bastards
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion You're talking about destroying cities. It's not entirely different. I'd like to suggest an alternate approach.

title: Battle of the Bastards
Name: razdal
text: razdal Once before, I offered you peace. If you had not been so arrogant, you could have returned to your homeland with a fleet of ships. Instead, you will flee Slaver's Bay on foot like the beggar queen you are.

title: Battle of the Bastards
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion We are here to discuss terms of surrender, not to trade insults.

title: Battle of the Bastards
Name: yezzan
text: yezzan The terms are simple. You and your foreign friends will abandon the Great Pyramid and the city of Meereen. The Unsullied you stole from Kraznys mo Nakloz will remain to be sold again to the highest bidder. The translator you stole from Kraznys mo Nakloz will remain to be sold again to the highest bidder. The dragons beneath the Great Pyramid will be slaughtered.

title: Battle of the Bastards
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys We obviously didn't communicate clearly. We're here to discuss your surrender, not mine.

title: Battle of the Bastards
Name: razdal
text: razdal I imagine it's difficult adjust to the new reality. Your reign is over.

title: Battle of the Bastards
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys My reign has just begun.

title: Battle of the Bastards
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys Dracarys.

title: Battle of the Bastards
Name: grey
text: grey You men have a choice

title: Battle of the Bastards
Name: grey
text: grey fight and die for the masters who would never fight and die for you, or go home to your families.

title: Battle of the Bastards
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion Thank you for the armada. Our queen does love ships. Now, last time we spoke, we made a pact. You violated that pact. You declared war upon us. Though our queen does have a forgiving nature, this cannot be forgiven.

title: Battle of the Bastards
Name: missandei
text: missandei Our queen insists that one of you must die as punishment for your crimes.

title: Battle of the Bastards
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion It always seems a bit abstract, doesn't it, other people dying?

title: Battle of the Bastards
Name: razdal
text: razdal Him. He should die.

title: Battle of the Bastards
Name: belicho
text: belicho Yes, him.

title: Battle of the Bastards
Name: razdal
text: razdal He's not one of us. He's an outsider, a lowborn. He does not speak for us.

title: Battle of the Bastards
Name: yezzan
text: yezzan Please.

title: Battle of the Bastards
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion Tell your people what happened here. Tell them you live by the grace of Her Majesty. When they come forward with notions of retribution or ideas about returning the slave cities to their former glory, remind the what happened when Daenerys Stormborn and her dragons came to Meereen.

title: Battle of the Bastards
Name: jon
text: jon You don't have to be here.

title: Battle of the Bastards
Name: sansa
text: sansa Yes, I do.

title: Battle of the Bastards
Name: ramsay
text: ramsay My beloved wife. I've missed you terribly.

title: Battle of the Bastards
Name: ramsay
text: ramsay Thank you for returning Lady Bolton safely. Now, dismount and kneel before me, surrender your army and proclaim me the true Lord of Winterfell and Warden of the North. I will pardon you for deserting the Night's Watch. I will pardon these treasonous lords for betraying my house. Come, bastard, you don't have the men, you don't have the horses, and you don't have Winterfell. Why lead those pour souls into slaughter? There's no need for a battle. Get off your hose and kneel. I'm a man of mercy.

title: Battle of the Bastards
Name: jon
text: jon You're right. There's no need for a battle. Thousands of men don't need to die. Only one of us. Let's end this the old way. You against me.

title: Battle of the Bastards
Name: ramsay
text: ramsay I keep hearing stories about you, bastard. The way people in the North talk about you, you're the greatest swordsman who ever walked. Maybe you are that good. Maybe not. I don't know if I'd beat you. But I know that my army will beat yours. I have 6,000 men. You have, what, half that? Not even?

title: Battle of the Bastards
Name: jon
text: jon Aye, you have the numbers. Will your men want to fight for you when they hear you wouldn't fight for them?

title: Battle of the Bastards
Name: ramsay
text: ramsay He's good. Very good. Tell me, will you let your little brother die because you're too proud to surrender?

title: Battle of the Bastards
Name: sansa
text: sansa How do we know you have him?

title: Battle of the Bastards
Name: ramsay
text: ramsay Now, if you want to save —

title: Battle of the Bastards
Name: sansa
text: sansa You're going to die tomorrow, Lord Bolton. Sleep well.

title: Battle of the Bastards
Name: ramsay
text: ramsay She's a fine woman, your sister. I look forward to having her back in my bed. And you're all fine-looking men. My dogs are desperate to meet you. I haven't fed them for seven days. They're ravenous. I wonder which parts they'll try first. Your eyes? Your balls? We'll find out soon enough. In the morning, then, bastard.

title: Battle of the Bastards
Name: jon
text: jon If he was smart, he'd stay inside the walls of Winterfell and wait us out.

title: Battle of the Bastards
Name: davos
text: davos That's not his way. He knows the North is watching. If the other houses sense weakness on his part, they'll stop fearing him. He can't have that. Fear is his power.

title: Battle of the Bastards
Name: jon
text: jon It's his weakness, too. His mean don't want to fight for him. They're forced to fight for him. If they feel the tide turning...

title: Battle of the Bastards
Name: tormund
text: tormund It's not his men that worry me. It's his horses. I know what mounted knights can do to us.

title: Battle of the Bastards
Name: tormund
text: tormund You and Stannis cut through us like piss through snow.

title: Battle of the Bastards
Name: jon
text: jon We're digging trenches all along our flanks. They won't be able to hit us the way that Stannis hit you, in a double envelopment.

title: Battle of the Bastards
Name: tormund
text: tormund stares blankly at JON SNOW.

title: Battle of the Bastards
Name: jon
text: jon A pincer move.

title: Battle of the Bastards
Name: jon
text: jon They won't be able to hit us from the sides.

title: Battle of the Bastards
Name: tormund
text: tormund Good.

title: Battle of the Bastards
Name: davos
text: davos It's crucial that we let them charge at us. They've got the numbers, we need the patience. If we let him buckle our center, he'll pursue. Then we'll have him surrounded on three sides.

title: Battle of the Bastards
Name: tormund
text: tormund Did you really think that cunt would fight you man to man?

title: Battle of the Bastards
Name: jon
text: jon No. But I wanted to make him angry. I want him coming at us full tilt.

title: Battle of the Bastards
Name: davos
text: davos We should all get some sleep.

title: Battle of the Bastards
Name: tormund
text: tormund Rest, Jon Snow. We need you sharp tomorrow.

title: Battle of the Bastards
Name: sansa
text: sansa So you've met the enemy, drawn up your battle plans.

title: Battle of the Bastards
Name: jon
text: jon Aye, for what they're worth.

title: Battle of the Bastards
Name: sansa
text: sansa You've known him for the space of a single conversation, you and your trusted advisors, and you sit around and make your plans on how to defeat a man you don't know. I lived with him. I know the way his mind works. I know how he likes to hurt people. Did it ever once occur to you that I might have some insight?

title: Battle of the Bastards
Name: jon
text: jon You're right.

title: Battle of the Bastards
Name: sansa
text: sansa You think he's going to fall into your trap. He won't He's the one who lays traps.

title: Battle of the Bastards
Name: jon
text: jon He's overconfident.

title: Battle of the Bastards
Name: sansa
text: sansa He plays with people. He's far better at it than you. He's been doing it all his life.

title: Battle of the Bastards
Name: jon
text: jon Aye, and what have I been doing all my life? Playing with broomsticks? I fought beyond the Wall against worse than Ramsay Bolton. I've defended the Wall from worse than Ramsay Bolton.

title: Battle of the Bastards
Name: sansa
text: sansa You don't know him.

title: Battle of the Bastards
Name: jon
text: jon All right, tell me. What should we do? How do we get Rickon back?

title: Battle of the Bastards
Name: sansa
text: sansa We'll never get him back. Rickon is Ned Starks trueborn son, which makes him a greater threat to Ramsay than you, a bastard, or me, a girl. As long as he lives, Ramsay's claim to Winterfell will be contested, which means he won't live long.

title: Battle of the Bastards
Name: jon
text: jon We can't give up on our brother.

title: Battle of the Bastards
Name: sansa
text: sansa Listen to me, please. He wants you to make a mistake.

title: Battle of the Bastards
Name: jon
text: jon Of course he does. What should I do differently?

title: Battle of the Bastards
Name: sansa
text: sansa I don't know! I don't know anything about battles! Just don't do what he wants you to do.

title: Battle of the Bastards
Name: jon
text: jon Aye, that's good advice.

title: Battle of the Bastards
Name: sansa
text: sansa You think that's obvious?

title: Battle of the Bastards
Name: jon
text: jon Well, it is a bit obvious.

title: Battle of the Bastards
Name: sansa
text: sansa If you had asked for my advice earlier, I would have told you not to attack Winterfell until we have a larger force, or is that obvious, too?

title: Battle of the Bastards
Name: jon
text: jon When will we have a larger force?! We've pleaded with every house that'll have us! The Blackfish can't help us! We're lucky to have this many men!

title: Battle of the Bastards
Name: sansa
text: sansa It's not enough!

title: Battle of the Bastards
Name: jon
text: jon Now, it's not enough! It's what we have! Battles have been won against greater odds.

title: Battle of the Bastards
Name: sansa
text: sansa If Ramsay wins, I'm not going back there alive. Do you understand me?

title: Battle of the Bastards
Name: jon
text: jon SNOW I won't ever let him touch you again. I'll protect you, I promise.

title: Battle of the Bastards
Name: sansa
text: sansa No one can protect me. No one can protect anyone.

title: Battle of the Bastards
Name: davos
text: davos You think there's hope?

title: Battle of the Bastards
Name: tormund
text: tormund I've never seen these Bolton fuckers fight. And they've never seen the free folk fight, so, yes, there's hope. You want to avenge your king, don't you?

title: Battle of the Bastards
Name: davos
text: davos It wasn't the Boltons defeated Stannis. It was Stannis himself. I loved the man. He lifted me up and made me something. But he had demons in his skull whispering foul things.

title: Battle of the Bastards
Name: tormund
text: tormund You saw these demons?

title: Battle of the Bastards
Name: davos
text: davos What?

title: Battle of the Bastards
Name: davos
text: davos No, it's a manner of speaking. Not actual demons.

title: Battle of the Bastards
Name: tormund
text: tormund Oh. Well, you loved that cunt Stannis and I loved the man he burned. Mance didn't have demons in his skull. He didn't torch people or listen to some red witch. I believed in him. I thought he was the man to lead us through the Long Night. But I was wrong just like you.

title: Battle of the Bastards
Name: davos
text: davos Maybe that was our mistake, believing in kings.

title: Battle of the Bastards
Name: tormund
text: tormund Jon Snow's not a king.

title: Battle of the Bastards
Name: davos
text: davos No, he's not.

title: Battle of the Bastards
Name: tormund
text: tormund I need a good drink to help me sleep the night before a fight. You want some? I have a jug of sour goat's milk stronger than any of that grape water you southern twats like sucking on.

title: Battle of the Bastards
Name: davos
text: davos No, thanks. It does sound delicious, but I better keep a clear head. I can never sleep the night before a battle.

title: Battle of the Bastards
Name: tormund
text: tormund So what do you do all night?

title: Battle of the Bastards
Name: davos
text: davos I walk. Think and walk. Think and walk until I'm far enough away from camp that no one can hear me shitting my guts out.

title: Battle of the Bastards
Name: tormund
text: tormund Happy shitting.

title: Battle of the Bastards
Name: jon
text: jon My lady. You weren't at the war council.

title: Battle of the Bastards
Name: melisandre
text: melisandre I'm not a soldier.

title: Battle of the Bastards
Name: jon
text: jon Any advice?

title: Battle of the Bastards
Name: melisandre
text: melisandre Don't lose.

title: Battle of the Bastards
Name: jon
text: jon If I do, if I fall, don't bring me back.

title: Battle of the Bastards
Name: melisandre
text: melisandre I'll have to try.

title: Battle of the Bastards
Name: jon
text: jon I'm ordering you not to bring me back.

title: Battle of the Bastards
Name: melisandre
text: melisandre I am not your servant, Jon Snow.

title: Battle of the Bastards
Name: jon
text: jon You're in my camp. I'm the commander.

title: Battle of the Bastards
Name: melisandre
text: melisandre I serve the Lord of Light. I do what he commands.

title: Battle of the Bastards
Name: jon
text: jon How do you know what he commands?

title: Battle of the Bastards
Name: melisandre
text: melisandre I interpret his signs as well as I can. If the Lord didn't want me to bring you back, how did I bring you back? I have no power. Only what he gives me and he gave me you.

title: Battle of the Bastards
Name: jon
text: jon Why?

title: Battle of the Bastards
Name: melisandre
text: melisandre I don't know. Maybe you're only needed for this small part of his plan and nothing else. Maybe he brought you here to die again.

title: Battle of the Bastards
Name: jon
text: jon What kind of god would do something like that?

title: Battle of the Bastards
Name: melisandre
text: melisandre The one we've got.

title: Battle of the Bastards
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion Last time we saw each other was at Winterfell, yes? You were making jokes about my height, I seem to recall. Everyone who makes a joke about a dwarf's height thinks he's the only person ever to make a joke about a dwarf's height. “The height of nobility,” “a man of your stature,” “someone to look up to.” You're all making the same five or six jokes.

title: Battle of the Bastards
Name: theon
text: theon It was a long time ago.

title: Battle of the Bastards
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion It was. And how have things been going for you since then? Not so well, I gather. Can't imagine you would have murdered the Stark boys if things had been going well.

title: Battle of the Bastards
Name: theon
text: theon I didn't murder the Stark boys. But I did things that were just as bad or worse.

title: Battle of the Bastards
Name: yara
text: yara And he paid for them.

title: Battle of the Bastards
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion Doesn't seem like it. He's still alive. It was complicated for you, I'm sure, growing up at Winterfell. Never quite knowing who you were. But then, we all live complicated lives, don't we?

title: Battle of the Bastards
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys You've brought us 100 ships from the Iron Fleet with men to sail them. In return, I expect you want me to support your claim to the throne of the Iron Islands?

title: Battle of the Bastards
Name: theon
text: theon Not my claim. Hers.

title: Battle of the Bastards
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys And what's wrong with you?

title: Battle of the Bastards
Name: theon
text: theon I'm not fit to rule.

title: Battle of the Bastards
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion We can agree upon that at least.

title: Battle of the Bastards
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys Has the Iron Islands ever had a queen before?

title: Battle of the Bastards
Name: yara
text: yara No more than Westeros.

title: Battle of the Bastards
Name: theon
text: theon Our Uncle Euron returned home after a long absence. He murdered our father and took the Salt Throne from yara. He would have murdered us if we had stayed.

title: Battle of the Bastards
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys Lord Tyrion tells me your father was a terrible king.

title: Battle of the Bastards
Name: yara
text: yara You and I have that in common.

title: Battle of the Bastards
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys We do. And both murdered by a usurper as well.

title: Battle of the Bastards
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys Will their ships be enough?

title: Battle of the Bastards
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion With the former Masters' fleet, possibly. Barely. There are more than 100 ships in the Iron Fleet.

title: Battle of the Bastards
Name: theon
text: theon There are and Euron is building more. He's going to offer them to you.

title: Battle of the Bastards
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys So why shouldn't I wait for him?

title: Battle of the Bastards
Name: theon
text: theon The Iron Fleet isn't all he's bringing. He also wants to give you --

title: Battle of the Bastards
Name: yara
text: yara His big cock, I think he said. Euron's offer is also an offer of marriage, you see. You won't get one without the other.

title: Battle of the Bastards
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys And I imagine your offer is free of any marriage demands?

title: Battle of the Bastards
Name: yara
text: yara I never demand, but I'm up for anything, really.

title: Battle of the Bastards
Name: theon
text: theon He murdered our father and would have murdered us. He'll murder you as soon as you have what he wants.

title: Battle of the Bastards
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion The Seven Kingdoms.

title: Battle of the Bastards
Name: theon
text: theon All of them.

title: Battle of the Bastards
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys And you don't want the Seven Kingdoms?

title: Battle of the Bastards
Name: theon
text: theon Your ancestors defeated ours and took the Iron Islands. We ask you to give them back.

title: Battle of the Bastards
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys And that's all?

title: Battle of the Bastards
Name: yara
text: yara We'd like you to help us murder an uncle or two who don't think a woman's fit to rule.

title: Battle of the Bastards
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys Reasonable.

title: Battle of the Bastards
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion What if everyone starts demanding their independence?

title: Battle of the Bastards
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys She's not demanding, she's asking. The others are free to ask as well. Our father were evil men, all of us here. They left the world worse than they found it. We're not going to do that. We're going to leave the world better than we found it.

title: Battle of the Bastards
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys You will support my claim as queen of the Seven Kingdoms and respect the integrity of the Seven Kingdoms. No more reaving, roving, raiding, or raping.

title: Battle of the Bastards
Name: yara
text: yara That's our way of life.

title: Battle of the Bastards
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys No more.

title: Battle of the Bastards
Name: yara
text: yara No more.

title: Battle of the Bastards
Name: ramsay
text: ramsay Do you like games, little man? Let's play a game. Run to your brother. The sooner you make it to him, the sooner you get to see him. That's it. That's the game. Easy. Ready? Go.

title: Battle of the Bastards
Name: ramsay
text: ramsay No, you have to run, remember? Those are the rules.

title: Battle of the Bastards
Name: tormund
text: tormund Don't.

title: Battle of the Bastards
Name: davos
text: davos Prepare to charge! Prepare to charge!

title: Battle of the Bastards
Name: davos
text: davos Go! Go! Follow your commander!

title: Battle of the Bastards
Name: tormund
text: tormund Run and fight!

title: Battle of the Bastards
Name: ramsay
text: ramsay Now.

title: Battle of the Bastards
Name: karstark
text: karstark Cavalry, charge!

title: Battle of the Bastards
Name: davos
text: davos We'll just kill our own men. Stand down.

title: Battle of the Bastards
Name: ramsay
text: ramsay Loose!

title: Battle of the Bastards
Name: jon
text: jon Get word --

title: Battle of the Bastards
Name: davos
text: davos We may as well be taking shits back here.

title: Battle of the Bastards
Name: davos
text: davos Follow!

title: Battle of the Bastards
Name: ramsay
text: ramsay It's time, go.

title: Battle of the Bastards
Name: smalljon
text: smalljon Who owns the North?

title: Battle of the Bastards
Name: all
text: all We do!

title: Battle of the Bastards
Name: smalljon
text: smalljon Show me!

title: Battle of the Bastards
Name: tormund
text: tormund Hey!

title: Battle of the Bastards
Name: man
text: man Infantry, advance!

title: Battle of the Bastards
Name: davos
text: davos With me, lads! Break their line!

title: Battle of the Bastards
Name: man
text: man Tormund!

title: Battle of the Bastards
Name: man
text: man Get him back!

title: Battle of the Bastards
Name: tormund
text: tormund Fuck this, come on!

title: Battle of the Bastards
Name: ramsay
text: ramsay Their army's gone.

title: Battle of the Bastards
Name: man
text: man Our army's gone.

title: Battle of the Bastards
Name: ramsay
text: ramsay We have Winterfell. They don't have the men for a siege. All we have to do is wait.

title: Battle of the Bastards
Name: ramsay
text: ramsay You suggested one on one combat, didn't you?

title: Battle of the Bastards
Name: ramsay
text: ramsay I've reconsidered. I think that sounds like a wonderful idea.

title: Battle of the Bastards
Name: jon
text: jon We're going to bury my brother in the crypt next to my father.

title: Battle of the Bastards
Name: sansa
text: sansa Jon.

title: Battle of the Bastards
Name: sansa
text: sansa Where is he?

title: Battle of the Bastards
Name: ramsay
text: ramsay Ah. Sansa. Hello, Sansa. Is this where I'll be staying now? No. Our time together is about to come to an end. That's all right. You can't kill me. I'm part of you now.

title: Battle of the Bastards
Name: sansa
text: sansa Your words will disappear. Your house will disappear. Your name will disappear. All memory of you will disappear.

title: Battle of the Bastards
Name: ramsay
text: ramsay My hounds will never harm me.

title: Battle of the Bastards
Name: sansa
text: sansa You haven't fed them in seven days. You said it yourself.

title: Battle of the Bastards
Name: ramsay
text: ramsay They're loyal beasts.

title: Battle of the Bastards
Name: sansa
text: sansa They were. Now they're starving.

title: Battle of the Bastards
Name: ramsay
text: ramsay Sit. Down! Down! Down! Down! Down!

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: attendant
text: attendant Your Grace. The trial will be getting underway soon.

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: mistress
text: mistress You got my money?

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: pycelle
text: pycelle Later. Go away.

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: girl
text: girl Grand Maester.

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: sparrow
text: sparrow Ser Loras Tyrell. Are you prepared to stand trial and profess your guilt or innocence before the Seven?

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: loras
text: loras There'll be no need for a trial. I confess before the Seven and freely admit to my crimes.

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: sparrow
text: sparrow To which crimes will you be confessing?

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: loras
text: loras All of them. I lay with other men including the traitor Renly Baratheon.

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: loras
text: loras I perjured myself before the gods. I am guilty of depravity… dishonesty, profligacy, and arrogance. I see that now. I humble myself before the Seven and accept whatever punishment the gods deem just.

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: sparrow
text: sparrow The gods' judgment is fierce, but also fair. The Warrior punishes those who believe themselves beyond the reach of justice. But the Mother shows her mercy to those who kneel before her.

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: loras
text: loras I take full responsibility for my many sins and unburden myself of my desires. My only remaining wish is to devote my life to the Seven. May I be a living example of their grace for others to witness.

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: sparrow
text: sparrow You understand fully what this means?

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: loras
text: loras I do. I will abandon the Tyrell name and all that goes with it. I will renounce my lordship and my claims on Highgarden. I will never marry and I will never father children.

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: sparrow
text: sparrow Brother Loras…

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: sparrow
text: sparrow I ask you to dedicate your life to the seven gods.

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: sparrow
text: sparrow Will you fight to defend your faith against heretics and apostates?

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: loras
text: loras I will.

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: mace
text: mace No, I can't let them…

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: margaery
text: margaery Faith is the way, Father.

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: tommen
text: tommen All right. I'm ready.

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: tommen
text: tommen I have to go, I'm-- I'm late for the trial.

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: margaery
text: margaery You mutilated him. You gave me your word.

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: sparrow
text: sparrow I've kept my word. Once the queen mother's trial is concluded, Brother Loras is free to leave.

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: margaery
text: margaery And where is the queen mother?

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: lancel
text: lancel Her litter never left the Red Keep.

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: sparrow
text: sparrow It appears the queen mother doesn't wish to attend her own trial.

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: sparrow
text: sparrow Go to the Red Keep and show her the way.

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: lancel
text: lancel Get the others.

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: pycelle
text: pycelle Where's the king?

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: qyburn
text: qyburn Elsewhere, I'm afraid.

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: pycelle
text: pycelle What's the meaning of this? I was told that-- I have more important things to do with my time than waste them in the presence--

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: qyburn
text: qyburn Please, Grand Maester. I bear you no ill will. Please forgive me if you can.

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: qyburn
text: qyburn This pains me, my lord. Whatever your faults, you do not deserve to die alone in such a cold, dark place. But sometimes before we can usher in the new, the old must be put to rest.

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: lancel
text: lancel The longer you wait, the worse it'll be for you.

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: lancel
text: lancel What are you doing?

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: margaery
text: margaery There's something wrong.

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: sparrow
text: sparrow You have nothing to fear, Your Grace. The trial will begin shortly.

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: margaery
text: margaery Cersei is not here. Tommen is not here. Why do you think they are not here?

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: sparrow
text: sparrow If the accused is not here, she will be tried regardless. We cannot escape the justice of the gods--

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: margaery
text: margaery Forget about the bloody gods and listen to what I'm telling you. Cersei understands the consequences of her absence and she is absent anyway, which means she does not intend to suffer those consequences. The trial can wait. We all need to leave.

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: margaery
text: margaery We all need to leave now!

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: margaery
text: margaery Loras. Stay with me.

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: margaery
text: margaery Let me through. Let me through. Get out of my way.

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: margaery
text: margaery Let us through!

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: cersei
text: cersei Confess. Confess.

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: septa
text: septa No.

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: cersei
text: cersei Confess.

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: cersei
text: cersei Confess. It felt good. Beating me, starving me, frightening me, humiliating me. You didn't do it because you cared about my atonement. You did it because it felt good. I understand. I do things because they feel good. I drink because it feels good. I killed my husband because it felt good to be rid of him. I fuck my brother because it feels good to feel him inside me. I lie about fucking my brother… because it feels good to keep our son safe from hateful hypocrites. I killed your High Sparrow… and all his little sparrows… all his septons, all his septas, all his filthy soldiers, because it felt good to watch them burn. It felt good to imagine their shock and their pain. No thought has ever given me greater joy. Even confessing feels good under the right circumstances.

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: cersei
text: cersei You've always been quiet.

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: cersei
text: cersei I said my face would be the last thing you saw before you died. Do you remember?

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: septa
text: septa Good. I'm glad to see your face. I'm ready to meet the gods.

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: cersei
text: cersei What? Now? Today? You're not going to die today. You're not going to die for quite a while. Ser Gregor.

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: cersei
text: cersei This is Ser Gregor Clegane. He's quiet, too.

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: cersei
text: cersei Your gods have forsaken you. This is your god now.

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: cersei
text: cersei Shame.

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: attendant
text: attendant I'm very sorry, Your Grace. Very sorry.

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: walder
text: walder For House Lannister!

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: men
text: men Hear me roar!

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: walder
text: walder For House Frey!

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: men
text: men We stand together!

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: walder
text: walder May we stand together through the centuries, good friends to the last.

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: walder
text: walder And when we drive our swords through our enemies' hearts, may we speak the words of our alliance, “The Freys and the Lannisters send their regards.”

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: bronn
text: bronn You don't even have to do anything, do you?

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: bronn
text: bronn You just sit there, a rich slab of beef, and all the birds come pecking.

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: jaime
text: jaime You're welcome to her.

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: bronn
text: bronn She doesn't want me. She wants your golden fingers up her twat.

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: jaime
text: jaime Those two have their eyes on you.

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: bronn
text: bronn They have their eyes on you, cunt.

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: jaime
text: jaime Not my type.

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: bronn
text: bronn Not blonde enough?

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: jaime
text: jaime Ladies, have you met Ser Bronn of the Blackwater, hero of the Battle of Blackwater Bay.

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: jaime
text: jaime There you go.

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: bronn
text: bronn Maybe I'm not in the mood.

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: bronn
text: bronn Fuck it.

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: bronn
text: bronn No need to call me ser just because I'm an anointed knight.

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: walder
text: walder This came together rather well. Your father would be pleased.

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: jaime
text: jaime I'm sure he would be.

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: walder
text: walder Edmure is back in a cell. Can't go killing my son by law. It wouldn't be right. Give the family a bad name.

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: walder
text: walder So the famous Blackfish killed by footsoldiers, eh? Legendary warrior, everyone said.

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: jaime
text: jaime Have you done much fighting yourself, Lord Frey?

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: walder
text: walder I'm a bit old for all that.

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: jaime
text: jaime No, but back in your day.

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: walder
text: walder The purpose of fighting is defeating your enemies, isn't it?

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: walder
text: walder I've defeated mine. Riverrun belonged to House Tully for a thousand years. Now it's mine. What do you call that? Victory.

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: jaime
text: jaime Yes, you're a great conqueror.

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: walder
text: walder Go on, mock me, boy. You think I mind? The Tullys mocked me for years. The Starks mocked me. Where are they now? You talk about war as if you're an expert but the one battle I remember you fighting, you were captured by Robb Stark, the Young Wolf. But it doesn't matter. Here we are now, two kingslayers. We know what it's like to have them grovel to our faces and snigger behind our backs. We don't mind, do we? Fear is a marvelous thing.

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: jaime
text: jaime They don't fear the Freys, though. They fear the Lannisters. We gave you the Riverlands to hold the Riverlands. If we have to ride north and take them back for you every time you lose them, why do we need you?

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: cersei
text: cersei Show me.

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: qyburn
text: qyburn Your Grace, there's no need--

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: qyburn
text: qyburn What are your thoughts concerning the king's funeral? As the Sept of Baelor is no longer an option, perhaps a ceremony in the throne room?

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: cersei
text: cersei He should be with his grandfather, his brother, his sister. Burn him and bury his ashes where the sept once stood.

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: sam
text: sam Hello.

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: sam
text: sam From Lord Commander Snow at Castle Black.

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: sam
text: sam I'm-- I'm to be the new maester.

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: maester
text: maester Oh.

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: maester
text: maester According to our records, Jeor Mormont is Lord Commander.

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: sam
text: sam He died.

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: maester
text: maester We received no report from the maester at Castle Black.

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: sam
text: sam Maester Aemon became quite ill shortly after the election. He's since passed away. Which is why I'm here.

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: maester
text: maester This is irregular.

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: sam
text: sam Yes, well, I suppose that life is irregular.

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: maester
text: maester The archmaester will discuss these irregularities with you. In the meantime, you are permitted to use the library. Follow me.

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: maester
text: maester No women or children!

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: jon
text: jon When we had feasts, our family would sit up here… and I'd sit down there.

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: melisandre
text: melisandre Could have been worse, Jon Snow. You had a family. You had feasts.

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: jon
text: jon Aye, you're right. I was luckier than most.

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: jon
text: jon What is that?

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: davos
text: davos Tell him. Tell him who it belonged to.

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: melisandre
text: melisandre The Princess Shireen.

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: davos
text: davos Tell him what you did to her. Tell him!

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: melisandre
text: melisandre We burned her at the stake.

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: davos
text: davos Why?

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: melisandre
text: melisandre The army was trapped. The horses were dying. It was the only way.

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: davos
text: davos You burned a little girl alive!

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: melisandre
text: melisandre I only do what my Lord commands!

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: davos
text: davos If he commands you to burn children, your Lord is evil!

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: melisandre
text: melisandre We are standing here because of him. Jon Snow is alive because the Lord willed it.

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: davos
text: davos I loved that girl like she was my own. She was good. She was kind. And you killed her!

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: melisandre
text: melisandre So did her father. So did her mother. Her own blood knew it was the only way.

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: davos
text: davos The only way for what? They all died anyway! You told everyone Stannis was the one. You had him believing it, all of them fooled. And you lied.

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: melisandre
text: melisandre I didn't lie. I was wrong.

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: davos
text: davos Aye, you were wrong. How many died because you were wrong?

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: davos
text: davos I ask your leave to execute this woman for murder. She admits to the crime.

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: jon
text: jon Do you have anything to say for yourself?

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: melisandre
text: melisandre I've been ready to die for many years. If the Lord was done with me, so be it, but he's not. You've seen the Night King, Jon Snow. You know the great war is still to come. You know the army of the dead will be upon us soon. And you know I can help you win that war.

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: jon
text: jon Ride south today. If you return to the North, I'll have you hanged as a murderer.

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: davos
text: davos If you ever come back this way, I will execute you myself.

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: jon
text: jon I'm having the lordo s chamber prepared for you.

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: sansa
text: sansa Mother and Father's room? You should take it.

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: jon
text: jon I'm not a Stark.

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: sansa
text: sansa You are to me.

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: jon
text: jon You're the Lady of Winterfell. You deserve it. We're standing here because of you. The battle was lost until the Knights of the Vale rode in. They came because of you. You told me Lord Baelish sold you to the Boltons.

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: sansa
text: sansa He did.

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: jon
text: jon And you trust him?

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: sansa
text: sansa Only a fool would trust Littlefinger. I should have told you about him, about the Knights of the Vale. I'm sorry.

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: jon
text: jon We need to trust each other. We can't fight a war amongst ourselves. We have so many enemies now.

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: sansa
text: sansa Jon.

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: sansa
text: sansa A raven came from the Citadel. A white raven. Winter is here.

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: jon
text: jon Well, Father always promised, didn't he?

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: olenna
text: olenna The last time a Tyrell came to Dorne, he was assassinated. 100 red scorpions, was it?

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: ellaria
text: ellaria You have nothing to fear from us, Lady Olenna.

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: olenna
text: olenna You murder your own prince, but you expect me to trust you?

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: obara
text: obara We invited you to Dorne because we needed your help. You came to Dorne because you needed our help?

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: olenna
text: olenna What is your name again? Barbaro?

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: obara
text: obara Obara.

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: olenna
text: olenna Obara. You look like an angry little boy. Don't presume to tell me what I need.

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: nymeria
text: nymeria Forgive my sister. What she lacks in diplomacy, she makes--

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: olenna
text: olenna Do shut up, dear.

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: olenna
text: olenna Anything from you?

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: olenna
text: olenna No? Good. Let the grown women speak.

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: ellaria
text: ellaria The Lannisters have declared war on House Tyrell. They have declared war on Dorne. We must be allies now if we wish to survive.

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: olenna
text: olenna Cersei stole the future from me. She killed my son. She killed my grandson. She killed my granddaughter. Survival is not what I'm after now.

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: ellaria
text: ellaria You're absolutely right. I chose the wrong words. It is not survival I offer. It is your heart's desire.

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: olenna
text: olenna And what is my heart's desire?

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: ellaria
text: ellaria Vengeance. Justice.

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: varys
text: varys Fire and blood.

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: daario
text: daario Your ships are nearly ready. I saw them painting the sails.

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: daario
text: daario I'm curious to see how the Dothraki do on the poison water.

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys You're not coming with us.

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: daario
text: daario New strategy? You want the Second Sons to attack from the west coast? If we take Casterly Rock, the Lannisters will have nowhere to run when you hit King's Landing.

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys You're not going to Westeros. You're staying here with the Second Sons. There's finally peace in Meereen. You will keep the peace while the people choose their own leaders.

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: daario
text: daario Fuck Meereen. Fuck the people. I'm here for you, not them.

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys You promised me. “My sword is yours. My life is yours.” This is what I command. If I'm going to rule in Westeros, I'll need to make alliances. The best way to make alliances is with marriage.

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: daario
text: daario Who are you marrying this time?

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys I don't know. Maybe no one.

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: daario
text: daario But you need to lure all the noble houses to the table? Are you a queen or fish bait?

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys I can't bring a lover to Westeros.

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: daario
text: daario A king wouldn't think twice about it.

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys So that's what you want? To be my mistress?

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: daario
text: daario I'm not proud. I don't care what perfumed aristocrat sits beside you in the throne room. I don't want a crown. I want you.

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: daario
text: daario I love you. And I make you happy. You know I do. Bring me with you. Let me fight for you.

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys I can't.

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: daario
text: daario The dwarf told you to do this.

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys No one tells me to do anything.

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: daario
text: daario Clever fellow. Can't argue with his logic. I'm no use to you over there.

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys Don't get angry.

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: daario
text: daario I'm not angry. I'm full of self-pity. Who comes after you? Who can ever follow Daenerys Stormborn, the Mother of Dragons?

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys A great number of women, I imagine. Specific orders will be left for you regarding the welfare of Meereen and the Bay of Dragons.

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: daario
text: daario Bay of Dragons?

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys We can't call it Slaver's Bay anymore, can we?

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: daario
text: daario You'll get that throne you want so badly, I'm sure of it. I hope it brings you happiness.

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: daario
text: daario I pity the lord of Westeros. They have no idea what's coming for them.

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys Farewell, Daario Naharis.

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion How did he take it?

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys No tears.

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion I know it was hard for you. You turned away a man who truly loves you because he would have been a liability in the Seven Kingdoms. That's the kind of self-sacrifice that makes for a good ruler, if it's any consolation.

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys It's not.

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion No, I suppose not. I'm terrible at consoling.

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys Yes, you really are.

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion All right, how about the fact that this is actually happening? You have your armies, you have your ships, you have your dragons. Everything you've ever wanted since you were old enough to want anything. It's all yours for the taking. Are you afraid?

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion Good. You're in the great game now. And the great game's terrifying. The only people who aren't afraid of failure are madmen like your father.

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys Do you know what frightens me? I said farewell to a man who loves me. A man I thought I cared for. And I felt nothing. Just impatient to get on with it.

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion He wasn't the first to love you and he won't be the last.

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys Well, you have completely failed to console me.

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion For what it's worth, I've been a cynic for as long as I can remember. Everyone's always asking me to believe in things-- family, gods, kings, myself. It was often tempting until I saw where belief got people. So I said no, thank you to belief. And yet here I am.

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion I believe in you. It's embarrassing, really. I'd swear you my sword, but I don't actually own a sword.

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys It's your counsel I need.

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion It's yours. Now and always.

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys Good. I, um… I had something made for you. I'm not sure if it's right.

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys Tyrion Lannister, I name you Hand of the Queen.

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: walder
text: walder You're not one of mine, are you?

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: handmaiden
text: handmaiden No, my lord.

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: walder
text: walder Didn't think so. Too pretty.

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: walder
text: walder Where are my damn moron sons? Black Walder and Lothar promised to be here by midday.

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: handmaiden
text: handmaiden They're here, my lord.

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: walder
text: walder Well, what are they doing, trimming their cunt hairs? Tell them to come here now.

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: handmaiden
text: handmaiden But they're already here, my lord.

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: handmaiden
text: handmaiden Here, my lord.

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: handmaiden
text: handmaiden They weren't easy to carve. Especially Black Walder.

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: walder
text: walder What…

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: arya
text: arya My name is Arya Stark. I want you to know that. The last thing you're ever going to see is a Stark smiling down at you as you die.

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: petyr
text: petyr Forgive me, my lady… if you're at prayer.

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: sansa
text: sansa I'm done with all that. I came here every day when I was a girl. I prayed to be somewhere else. Back then I only ever thought about what I wanted, never about what I had.

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: sansa
text: sansa I was a stupid girl.

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: petyr
text: petyr You were a child.

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: sansa
text: sansa What do you want?

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: petyr
text: petyr I thought you knew what I wanted.

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: sansa
text: sansa I was wrong.

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: petyr
text: petyr No, you weren't. Every time I'm faced with a decision, I close my eyes and see the same picture. Whenever I consider an action, I ask myself will this action help to make this picture a reality? Pull it out of my mind and into the world? And I only act if the answer is yes. A picture of me on the Iron Throne… and you by my side.

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: sansa
text: sansa It's a pretty picture.

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: petyr
text: petyr News of this battle will spread quickly through the Seven Kingdoms. I've declared for House Stark for all to hear.

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: sansa
text: sansa You've declared for other houses before, Lord Baelish. It's never stopped you from serving yourself.

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: petyr
text: petyr The past is gone for good. You can sit here mourning its departure or you can prepare for the future. You, my love, are the future of House Stark. Who should the North rally behind? A trueborn daughter of Ned and Catelyn Stark born here at Winterfell or a motherless bastard born in the south?

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: benjen
text: benjen This is where I leave you.

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: meera
text: meera You're not coming with us?

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: benjen
text: benjen The Wall is not just ice and stone. Ancient spells were carved into its foundations. Strong magic to protect men from what lies beyond. And while it stands, the dead cannot pass. I cannot pass.

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: meera
text: meera Where will you go?

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: benjen
text: benjen The great war is coming and I still fight for the living. I'll do what I can… as long as I can.

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: bran
text: bran Thank you, Uncle Benjen.

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: benjen
text: benjen I wish you both good fortune.

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: meera
text: meera Are you sure you're ready for this?

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: bran
text: bran I'm the Three-Eyed Raven now. I have to be ready for this.

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: lyanna
text: lyanna Ned?

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: eddard
text: eddard Lyanna.

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: lyanna
text: lyanna Is that you? Is that really you?

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: lyanna
text: lyanna You're not a dream.

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: eddard
text: eddard No, I'm not a dream. I'm here. Right here.

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: lyanna
text: lyanna I've missed you, big brother.

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: eddard
text: eddard I've missed you, too.

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: lyanna
text: lyanna I want to be brave.

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: eddard
text: eddard Shh. You are.

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: lyanna
text: lyanna I'm not.

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: lyanna
text: lyanna I don't want to die.

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: eddard
text: eddard You're not going to die.

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: eddard
text: eddard Get her some water!

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: lyanna
text: lyanna No, no water.

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: eddard
text: eddard Is there a maester?

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: lyanna
text: lyanna Please. Listen to me, Ned.

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: lyanna
text: lyanna If Robert finds out, he'll kill him, you know he will. You have to protect him. Promise me, Ned. Promise me.

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: lyanna
text: lyanna Promise me, Ned. Promise me.

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: vale
text: vale You can't expect Knights of the Vale to side with wildling invaders.

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: tormund
text: tormund We didn't invade. We were invited.

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: vale
text: vale Not by me.

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: jon
text: jon The free folk, the northerners, and the Knights of the Vale fought bravely, fought together, and we won. My father uses to say we find our true friends on the battlefield.

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: man
text: man The Boltons are defeated. The war is over. Winter has come. If the maesters are right, it'll be the coldest one in a thousand years. We should ride home and wait out the coming storms.

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: jon
text: jon The war is not over. And I promise you, friend, the true enemy won't wait out the storm. He brings the storm.

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: lyanna
text: lyanna Your son was butchered at the Red Wedding, Lord Manderly. But you refused the call. You swore allegiance to House Stark, Lord Glover, but in their hour of greatest need, you refused the call. And you, Lord Cerwyn, your father was skinned alive by Ramsay Bolton. Still you refuse the call. But House Mormont remembers. The North remembers. We know no king but the King in the North whose name is Stark. I don't care if he's a bastard. Ned Stark's blood runs through his veins. He's my king from this day until his last day.

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: manderly
text: manderly Lady Mormont speaks harshly and truly. My son died for Robb Stark, the Young Wolf. I didn't think we'd find another king in my lifetime. I didn't commit my men to your cause ‘cause I didn't want more Manderlys dying for nothing. But I was wrong. Jon Snow avenged the Red Wedding. He is the White Wolf. The King in the North.

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: glover
text: glover I did not fight beside you on the field and I will regret that until my dying day. A man can only admit when he was wrong and ask forgiveness.

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: jon
text: jon There's nothing to forgive, my lord.

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: glover
text: glover There will be more fights to come. House Glover will stand behind House Stark as we have for a thousands years. And I will stand behind Jon Snow… the King in the North!

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: glover
text: glover The King in the North!

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: all
text: all The King in the North! The King in the North! The King in the North! The King in the North! The King in the North! The King in the North! The King in the North! The King in the North!

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: jaime
text: jaime Come on.

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: qyburn
text: qyburn I now proclaim Cersei of the House Lannister First of Her Name, Queen of the Andals and the First Men, Protector of the Seven Kingdoms.

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: qyburn
text: qyburn Long may she reign.

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: all
text: all Long may she reign.

title: Dragonstone
Name: walder
text: walder You're wonder why I brought you all here. After all, we just had a feast. Since when does old Walder give us two feasts in a single fortnight?

title: Dragonstone
Name: walder
text: walder Well, it's no good being lord of the Riverlands if you can't celebrate with your family. That's what I say!

title: Dragonstone
Name: walder
text: walder I've gathered every Frey who means a damn thing so I can tell you my plans for this great house now that winter has come. But first, a toast! No more of that Dornish horse piss! This is the finest Arbor gold! Proper wine for proper heroes!

title: Dragonstone
Name: waldery
text: waldery Stand together!

title: Dragonstone
Name: all
text: all Stand together!

title: Dragonstone
Name: walder
text: walder Not you. I'm not wasting good wine on a damn woman.

title: Dragonstone
Name: walder
text: walder Maybe I'm not the most pleasant man. I'll admit it. But I'm proud of you lot. You're my family, the men who helped me slaughter the Starks at the Red Wedding.

title: Dragonstone
Name: walder
text: walder Yes, yes. Cheer. Brave men, all of you. Butchered a woman pregnant with her babe. Cut the throat of a mother of five. Slaughtered your guests after inviting them into your home. But you didn't slaughter every one of the Starks.

title: Dragonstone
Name: walder
text: walder No, no, that was your mistake. You should have ripped them all out, root and stem.

title: Dragonstone
Name: walder
text: walder Leave one wolf alive and the sheep are never safe.

title: Dragonstone
Name: arya
text: arya When people ask you what happened here, tell them the North remembers. Tell them winter came for House Frey.

title: Dragonstone
Name: edd
text: edd You wildlings?

title: Dragonstone
Name: meera
text: meera I'm Meera Reed, daughter of Howland Reed. This is Brandon Stark, son of Ned Stark.

title: Dragonstone
Name: edd
text: edd How do I know that's true?

title: Dragonstone
Name: bran
text: bran You were at the Fist of the First Men. You were at Hardhome. You've seen the Army of the Dead. You've seen the Night King. He's coming for us. For all of us.

title: Dragonstone
Name: edd
text: edd Okay, come on. Let's get them inside.

title: Dragonstone
Name: jon
text: jon I want every northern maester to scour their records for any mention of dragonglass. Dragonglass kills white walkers. It's more valuable to us now than gold. We need to find it, we need to mine it, we need to make weapons from it. Everyone aged 10 to 60 will drill daily with spears, pikes, bow and arrow.

title: Dragonstone
Name: robett
text: robett It's about time we taught these boys of summer how to fight.

title: Dragonstone
Name: jon
text: jon Not just the boys.

title: Dragonstone
Name: jon
text: jon We can't defend the North if only half the population is fighting.

title: Dragonstone
Name: robett
text: robett You expect me to put a spear in my granddaughter's hand?

title: Dragonstone
Name: lyanna
text: lyanna I don't plan on knitting by the fire while men fight for me. I might be small, Lord Glover, and I might be a girl, but I am every bit as much a Northerner as you.

title: Dragonstone
Name: robett
text: robett Indeed you are, my lady. No one has questioned--

title: Dragonstone
Name: lyanna
text: lyanna And I don't need your permission to defend the North.

title: Dragonstone
Name: lyanna
text: lyanna We'll begin training every man, woman, boy, and girl on Bear Island.

title: Dragonstone
Name: jon
text: jon While we're preparing for attack, we need to shore up our defenses. The only thing standing between us and the Army of the Dead is the Wall and the Wall hasn't been properly manned in centuries. I'm not the king of the Free Folk.

title: Dragonstone
Name: jon
text: jon But if we're going to survive this winter together...

title: Dragonstone
Name: tormund
text: tormund You want us to man the castles for you?

title: Dragonstone
Name: jon
text: jon Last time we saw the Night King was at Hardhome. The closest castle to Hardhome is Eastwatch-by-the-Sea.

title: Dragonstone
Name: tormund
text: tormund Then that's where I'll go. Looks like we're the Night's Watch now.

title: Dragonstone
Name: jon
text: jon If they breach the wall, the first two castles in their path are Last Hearth and Karhold.

title: Dragonstone
Name: yohn
text: yohn The Umbers and the Karstarks betrayed the North. Their castles should be torn down with not a stone left standing.

title: Dragonstone
Name: sansa
text: sansa The castles committed no crimes. And we need every fortress we have for the war to come. We should give the Last Hearth and Karhold to new families, loyal families who supported us against Ramsay.

title: Dragonstone
Name: all
text: all Aye!

title: Dragonstone
Name: jon
text: jon The Umbers and the Karstarks have fought beside the Starks for centuries. They've kept faith for generation after generation.

title: Dragonstone
Name: sansa
text: sansa And then they broke faith.

title: Dragonstone
Name: jon
text: jon I'm not going to strip these families of their ancestral homes because of the crimes of a few reckless sons.

title: Dragonstone
Name: sansa
text: sansa So there's no punishment for treason and no reward for loyalty?

title: Dragonstone
Name: jon
text: jon The punishment for treason is death. Smalljon Umber died on the field of battle. Harald Karstark died on the field of battle.

title: Dragonstone
Name: sansa
