text: sansa They died fighting for Ramsay. Give the castles to the families of the men who died fighting for you.

title: Dragonstone
Name: jon
text: jon When I was Lord Commander of the Night's Watch I executed men who betrayed me. I executed men who refused to follow orders. My father always said, "The man who passes the sentence should swing the sword," and I have tried to live by those words. But I will not punish a son for his father's sins, and I will not take a family home away from a family it has belonged to for centuries. That is my decision, and my decision is final.

title: Dragonstone
Name: jon
text: jon Ned Umber.

title: Dragonstone
Name: jon
text: jon Alys Karstark.

title: Dragonstone
Name: jon
text: jon For centuries, our families fought side by side on the battlefield. I ask you to pledge your loyalty once again to House Stark, to serve as our bannermen and come to our aid whenever called upon.

title: Dragonstone
Name: jon
text: jon Stand.

title: Dragonstone
Name: jon
text: jon Yesterday's wars don't matter anymore. The North needs to band together, all the living north. Will you stand beside me, Ned and Alys, now and always?

title: Dragonstone
Name: ned
text: ned Now and always!

title: Dragonstone
Name: jon
text: jon You are my sister, but I am king now.

title: Dragonstone
Name: sansa
text: sansa Will you start wearing a crown?

title: Dragonstone
Name: jon
text: jon When you question my decisions in front of the other lords and ladies, you undermine me.

title: Dragonstone
Name: sansa
text: sansa So I can't question your decisions anymore?

title: Dragonstone
Name: jon
text: jon Of course you can, but--

title: Dragonstone
Name: sansa
text: sansa Joffrey never let anyone question his authority. You think he was a good king?

title: Dragonstone
Name: jon
text: jon Do you think I'm Joffrey?

title: Dragonstone
Name: sansa
text: sansa You're as far from Joffrey as anyone I've ever met.

title: Dragonstone
Name: jon
text: jon Thank you.

title: Dragonstone
Name: sansa
text: sansa You're good at this, you know.

title: Dragonstone
Name: jon
text: jon At what?

title: Dragonstone
Name: sansa
text: sansa At ruling.

title: Dragonstone
Name: jon
text: jon No.

title: Dragonstone
Name: sansa
text: sansa You are. You are. They respect you, they really do, but you have to--

title: Dragonstone
Name: sansa
text: sansa Why are you laughing?

title: Dragonstone
Name: jon
text: jon What did father used to say? Everything before the word "but" is horse shit.

title: Dragonstone
Name: sansa
text: sansa He never said that to me.

title: Dragonstone
Name: jon
text: jon No. No, he never cursed in front of his girls.

title: Dragonstone
Name: sansa
text: sansa Because he was trying to protect us. He never wanted us to see how dirty the world really is, but Father couldn't protect me and neither can you. Stop trying.

title: Dragonstone
Name: jon
text: jon All right, I'll stop trying to protect you and you stop trying to undermine me.

title: Dragonstone
Name: sansa
text: sansa I'm not trying to undermine you.

title: Dragonstone
Name: sansa
text: sansa You have to be smarter than Father. You need to be smarter than Robb. I loved them, I miss them, but they made stupid mistakes, and they both lost their heads for it.

title: Dragonstone
Name: jon
text: jon And how should I be smarter? By listening to you?

title: Dragonstone
Name: sansa
text: sansa Would that be so terrible?

title: Dragonstone
Name: wolkan
text: wolkan A raven from King's Landing, Your Grace.

title: Dragonstone
Name: jon
text: jon Cersei of House Lannister, First of Her Name, Queen of the Andals and the First Men, Protector of the Seven Kingdoms--

title: Dragonstone
Name: sansa
text: sansa What does she want?

title: Dragonstone
Name: jon
text: jon Come to King's Landing. Bend the knee or suffer the fate of all traitors.

title: Dragonstone
Name: sansa
text: sansa You've been so consumed with the enemy to the north, you've forgotten about the one to the south.

title: Dragonstone
Name: jon
text: jon I'm consumed with the Night King because I've seen him. And believe me, you'd think of little else if you had, too.

title: Dragonstone
Name: sansa
text: sansa We still have a wall between us and the Night King. Theres nothing between us and Cersei.

title: Dragonstone
Name: jon
text: jon There's a thousand miles between us and Cersei. Winter is here. The Lannisters are a southern army. They've never ranged this far north.

title: Dragonstone
Name: sansa
text: sansa You're the military man, but I know her. If you're her enemy, she'll never stop until she's destroyed you. Everyone who's ever crossed her, she's found a way to murder.

title: Dragonstone
Name: jon
text: jon You almost sound as if you admire her.

title: Dragonstone
Name: sansa
text: sansa I learned a great deal from her.

title: Dragonstone
Name: jaime
text: jaime What is this?

title: Dragonstone
Name: cersei
text: cersei Its what we've been waiting for our whole lives. It's what Father trained us for, whether he knew it or not.

title: Dragonstone
Name: jaime
text: jaime He knew it. Made me memorize every damn city, town, lake, forest, and mountain.

title: Dragonstone
Name: cersei
text: cersei It's ours now, we just have to take it.

title: Dragonstone
Name: cersei
text: cersei You've been quiet since you came home. Are you angry with me?

title: Dragonstone
Name: jaime
text: jaime No, not angry.

title: Dragonstone
Name: cersei
text: cersei Are you afraid of me?

title: Dragonstone
Name: jaime
text: jaime Should I be?

title: Dragonstone
Name: cersei
text: cersei Daenerys Targaryen has chosen Tyrion to be her Hand. Right now, they're sailing across the Narrow Sea, hoping to take back her father's throne. Our little brother, the one you love so much, the one you set free, the one who murdered our father and our first-born son, now he stands beside our enemies and gives them counsel. He's out there somewhere at the head of an armada. Where will they land?

title: Dragonstone
Name: jaime
text: jaime Dragonstone.

title: Dragonstone
Name: jaime
text: jaime They have deep-water ports for the ships. Stannis left the castle unoccupied, and that's where she was born.

title: Dragonstone
Name: cersei
text: cersei Enemies to the east.

title: Dragonstone
Name: cersei
text: cersei Enemies to the south--Ellaria Sand and her brood of bitches.

title: Dragonstone
Name: cersei
text: cersei Enemies to the west--Olenna, the old cunt. Another traitor.

title: Dragonstone
Name: cersei
text: cersei Enemies to the north. Ned Stark's bastard has been named King in the North and that murdering whore Sansa stands beside him. Enemies everywhere. We're surrounded by traitors. You're in command of the Lannister army now. How do we proceed?

title: Dragonstone
Name: jaime
text: jaime Winter is here. We can't win a war if we can't feed our men and our horses. The Tyrells have the grain, the Tyrells have the livestock.

title: Dragonstone
Name: cersei
text: cersei Will the Tyrell bannermen stand alongside a Dothraki horde and Unsullied slave soldiers?

title: Dragonstone
Name: jaime
text: jaime If they think Daenerys will win. No one wants to fight on the losing side. Right now, we look like the losing side.

title: Dragonstone
Name: cersei
text: cersei I'm the Queen of the Seven Kingdoms.

title: Dragonstone
Name: jaime
text: jaime Three kingdoms, at best. I'm not sure you understand how much danger we're in.

title: Dragonstone
Name: cersei
text: cersei I understand we're in a war for survival. I understand whoever loses dies. I understand whoever wins could launch a dynasty that lasts a thousand years.

title: Dragonstone
Name: jaime
text: jaime A dynasty for whom? Our children are dead. We're the last of us.

title: Dragonstone
Name: cersei
text: cersei A dynasty for us, then.

title: Dragonstone
Name: jaime
text: jaime We never talked about Tommen.

title: Dragonstone
Name: cersei
text: cersei There's nothing to say.

title: Dragonstone
Name: jaime
text: jaime Our baby boy killed himself.

title: Dragonstone
Name: cersei
text: cersei He betrayed me. He betrayed us both. Should we spend our days mourning the dead--mother, father, and all our children?

title: Dragonstone
Name: jaime
text: jaime Cersei--

title: Dragonstone
Name: cersei
text: cersei I loved them. I did. But they're ashes now and we're still flesh and blood. We're the last Lannisters, the last ones who count.

title: Dragonstone
Name: jaime
text: jaime Even Lannisters can't survive without allies. Where are our allies now? You saw what happened to Walder Frey and his family.

title: Dragonstone
Name: cersei
text: cersei I heard. How could we ever trust a man like that?

title: Dragonstone
Name: jaime
text: jaime We couldn't. He was a useless, old coward, but the Freys supported us. Now they're all dead. Whoever killed them is no friend of ours. We need allies. Stronger, better allies. We can't win this war alone.

title: Dragonstone
Name: cersei
text: cersei You think I listened to Father for 40 years and learned nothing?

title: Dragonstone
Name: jaime
text: jaime The Greyjoys? You invited the Greyjoys to King's Landing?

title: Dragonstone
Name: cersei
text: cersei Not all of them.

title: Dragonstone
Name: jaime
text: jaime Well, it looks like all of them.

title: Dragonstone
Name: cersei
text: cersei I invited Euron Greyjoy, the new King of the Iron Islands. You said yourself we needed stronger, better allies. There you are.

title: Dragonstone
Name: jaime
text: jaime How are they better allies? How are they different from the Freys? They both broke their promises and murdered their former friends as soon as it suited them.

title: Dragonstone
Name: cersei
text: cersei So does everyone when it suits them. Unlike the Freys, they have ships. And they're good at killing.

title: Dragonstone
Name: jaime
text: jaime They're not good at anything. I know the Ironborn. They're bitter, angry little people. All they know how to do is steal things they can't build or grow themselves.

title: Dragonstone
Name: cersei
text: cersei Euron Greyjoy didn't come here for that.

title: Dragonstone
Name: jaime
text: jaime Oh, what did he come here for, then?

title: Dragonstone
Name: cersei
text: cersei A queen.

title: Dragonstone
Name: euron
text: euron The moment I was chosen Lord of the Iron Islands, they turned on me. Their own uncle. They stole my best ships and ran. Sailed the right across the world and gave them to the Dragon Queen so she could bring her armies here to attack you.

title: Dragonstone
Name: euron
text: euron It's nothing compares to the treason you suffered at the hands of a family members, from what I hear. But still, it bothers me. Murdering them would make me feel a lot better. And since it appears that all our treasonous family members are fighting for the same side, I thought we rightful monarchs could murder them together.

title: Dragonstone
Name: jaime
text: jaime You're not a rightful monarch, though, are you?

title: Dragonstone
Name: jaime
text: jaime The Greyjoys rebelled agains the throne for the right to be monarchs, but as I recall, you were soundly defeated. Come to mention it, weren't you the one who started that rebellion by sailing to Casterly Rock and burning the Lannister fleet? You certainly caught us there. Very smart move on your part. Of course, we all made it to the Iron Islands anyway. I was there.

title: Dragonstone
Name: euron
text: euron I remember very well. I saw you. I heard so much talk. The best in the world. No one can stop him. I didn't believe it, to be honesty. But I must say, when you rushed through the breach and started cutting people down...it was glorious. Like a dance.

title: Dragonstone
Name: jaime
text: jaime The people I was cutting down were your own kin.

title: Dragonstone
Name: euron
text: euron The place was getting crowded. I enjoyed watching it. I truly did.

title: Dragonstone
Name: jaime
text: jaime And I enjoyed killing Greyjoys.

title: Dragonstone
Name: euron
text: euron A good thing for me. If you hadn't crushed us, I wouldn't have gone into exile. If I hadn't done that, I wouldn't be the greatest captain on the 14 seas.

title: Dragonstone
Name: cersei
text: cersei If not the most humble.

title: Dragonstone
Name: euron
text: euron You're not humble. You're the queen of a great nation. You don't care about the Iron Islands. They're nothing but rocks and bird shit and--and a lot of very unattractive people. The Iron Fleet, on the other hand, that's something else entirely. It's the greatest armada Westeros has ever seen. With the Iron Fleet, you own the seas. You can defeat the invaders of the east and the pretenders of the north and south.

title: Dragonstone
Name: cersei
text: cersei What do you want in return?

title: Dragonstone
Name: euron
text: euron Ever since I was a little boy, I wanted to grow up and mary the most beautiful woman in the world. So here I am, with a thousand ships and two good hands.

title: Dragonstone
Name: cersei
text: cersei I decline your proposal.

title: Dragonstone
Name: euron
text: euron Why?

title: Dragonstone
Name: cersei
text: cersei You're not trustworthy. You've broken promises to allies before and murdered them at the nearest opportunity. You murdered your own brother.

title: Dragonstone
Name: euron
text: euron You should try it. Feels wonderful.

title: Dragonstone
Name: euron
text: euron I don't expect you to trust me outright. You need proof of my honest intentions. In my experience, the surest way to a woman's heart is with a gift. A priceless gift. I won't return to King's Landing until I have that for you.

title: Dragonstone
Name: marwyn
text: marwyn Ah, Maester Weyland. A drinker's liver if ever I saw one.

title: Dragonstone
Name: marwyn
text: marwyn Weigh that.

title: Dragonstone
Name: marwyn
text: marwyn The triumph of transitory pleasures. Mankindo s curse.

title: Dragonstone
Name: sam
text: sam Archmaester, I was wondering...

title: Dragonstone
Name: marwyn
text: marwyn What's the weight?

title: Dragonstone
Name: sam
text: sam Um, 147.

title: Dragonstone
Name: sam
text: sam I was wondering if you had considered my proposition.

title: Dragonstone
Name: marwyn
text: marwyn I don't remember your proposition.

title: Dragonstone
Name: sam
text: sam I asked you if, in light of what I've seen in the North, if I could have access to the restricted area of the library.

title: Dragonstone
Name: marwyn
text: marwyn That area is reserved for maesters. Are you a maester?

title: Dragonstone
Name: sam
text: sam No.

title: Dragonstone
Name: marwyn
text: marwyn Not a very strong proposition, is it?

title: Dragonstone
Name: sam
text: sam Archmaester, with respect, I've seen them--the Army of the Dead. The white walkers. W was sent here to learn how to defeat them, but everyone in the Citadel, those who will even talk to me, they all doubt the walkers ever existed in the first place.

title: Dragonstone
Name: marwyn
text: marwyn Everyone in the Citadel doubts everything. It's their job. But the tales of the Long Night can't be pure fabrication. Too many similarities from unconnected sources.

title: Dragonstone
Name: sam
text: sam Sources in the restricted area?

title: Dragonstone
Name: marwyn
text: marwyn The very same. And the simplest explanation for your grating obsession with the white walkers is that you're telling the truth and that you saw what you say you saw.

title: Dragonstone
Name: sam
text: sam So, you believe me.

title: Dragonstone
Name: marwyn
text: marwyn I do. You'll finish weighing that heart?

title: Dragonstone
Name: sam
text: sam That makes you the only person south of the Twins who does.

title: Dragonstone
Name: marwyn
text: marwyn We're not lie the people south of the Twins. And we're not like the people north of the Twins. In the Citadel, we lead different lives for different reasons. We are this worldo s memory, Samwell Tarly. Without us, men would be little better than dogs. Don't remember any meal but the last, can't see forward to any but the next. And every time you leave the house and shut the door, they howl like you're gone forever. When Robert's Rebellion was raging, people that the end was near. The end of the Targaryen dynasty. "How will we survive?" When Aegon Targaryen turned his eye westward and flew his dragons to Blackwater Rush--"The end is near! How will we survive?" And thousands of year before that, during the Long Night, we can forgive them for thinking it truly was the end. But it wasn't. None of it was. The Wall has stood through it all. And every winter that ever came has ended.

title: Dragonstone
Name: marwyn
text: marwyn Be a good lad. Clean this up.

title: Dragonstone
Name: brienne
text: brienne Nope.

title: Dragonstone
Name: tormund
text: tormund You're a lucky man.

title: Dragonstone
Name: petyr
text: petyr I've heard she beat the Hound in single combat. She's a very impressive woman.

title: Dragonstone
Name: sansa
text: sansa What do you want, Lord Baelish?

title: Dragonstone
Name: petyr
text: petyr I want you to be happy. I want you to be safe.

title: Dragonstone
Name: sansa
text: sansa I am safe. I'm at home, surrounded by friends. I have Brienne to protect me from anyone who would harm me.

title: Dragonstone
Name: petyr
text: petyr What about happy? Why aren't you happy? What do you want that you do not have?

title: Dragonstone
Name: sansa
text: sansa At the moment, peace and quiet.

title: Dragonstone
Name: sansa
text: sansa No need to seize the last word, Lord Baelish. I'll assume it was something clever.

title: Dragonstone
Name: petyr
text: petyr My lady.

title: Dragonstone
Name: brienne
text: brienne Why is he still here?

title: Dragonstone
Name: sansa
text: sansa We need his men. Without the Vale, Ramsay Bolton would still hold this castle. Littlefinger saved us.

title: Dragonstone
Name: brienne
text: brienne He wants something.

title: Dragonstone
Name: sansa
text: sansa I know exactly what he wants.

title: Dragonstone
Name: man
text: man He rode through the streets of the city / Down from his hill on high / O'er the winds and the steps and the cobble / He rode to a woman's sigh / For she was his secret treasure / She was his shame and his bliss / And a chain and a keep are nothing / Compared to a woman's kiss / For hands of gold are always cold / But a woman's hands are warm / For hands of gold are always cold / But a woman's hands are--

title: Dragonstone
Name: arya
text: arya That's a pretty song. I've never heard it before.

title: Dragonstone
Name: man
text: man It's a new one.

title: Dragonstone
Name: man
text: man Are you hungry? We've got some rabbit.

title: Dragonstone
Name: arya
text: arya I don't want to steal your food.

title: Dragonstone
Name: man
text: man You're not stealing, we're offering. Come on, it's gonna be a cold night.

title: Dragonstone
Name: man
text: man You heading south?

title: Dragonstone
Name: arya
text: arya King's Landing.

title: Dragonstone
Name: man
text: man Poor girl.

title: Dragonstone
Name: arya
text: arya Not so bad, is it?

title: Dragonstone
Name: man
text: man Depends on your taste, I guess. If you like your streets covered in shit and pig's blood, it's the town for you.

title: Dragonstone
Name: man
text: man All my life, I wanted to see the Red Keep, the Sept of Baelor, the Dragonpit. Then when I finally make it, they wouldn't let me within a mile of the Red Keep, the Sept of Baelor's blown to hell, and the Dragonpit is a damn ruin.

title: Dragonstone
Name: man
text: man The people who live there, they'd skin you alive if they could make two coppers off your hide.

title: Dragonstone
Name: man
text: man Worst place in the world.

title: Dragonstone
Name: arya
text: arya What are you doing in the Riverlands?

title: Dragonstone
Name: man
text: man There's been some trouble with the Freys up at The Twins, so we're part of the army that's been sent to keep the peace.

title: Dragonstone
Name: man
text: man Here you go. Guests first.

title: Dragonstone
Name: arya
text: arya Oh, no, I couldn't. You don't have enough.

title: Dragonstone
Name: man
text: man My mother always told me to be kind to strangers. Strangers will be kind to you.

title: Dragonstone
Name: arya
text: arya You're a long way from home. I'm sure you've had some adventures, though.

title: Dragonstone
Name: man
text: man Yeah, endless adventures. They'll be singing about us for a thousand years.

title: Dragonstone
Name: man
text: man 3; The truth is when we left home, we couldn't wait to get away. But now we've been gone a while, we can't wait to get home.

title: Dragonstone
Name: man
text: man I just think about my dad out there on his boat all alone. I ought o be out there with him.

title: Dragonstone
Name: man
text: man My wife's just had our first baby.

title: Dragonstone
Name: arya
text: arya Boy or girl?

title: Dragonstone
Name: man
text: man Oh, who knows? You think soldiers get ravens with news from home?

title: Dragonstone
Name: man
text: man I hope it's a girl.

title: Dragonstone
Name: arya
text: arya Why?

title: Dragonstone
Name: man
text: man Girls take care of their papas when their papas grow old. Boys just go off to fight in someone else's wars.

title: Dragonstone
Name: man
text: man Are you old enough to drink?

title: Dragonstone
Name: man
text: man It's blackberry wine. I made it myself.

title: Dragonstone
Name: arya
text: arya It's really good.

title: Dragonstone
Name: man
text: man So, why is a nice girl on her own heading to King's Landing?

title: Dragonstone
Name: arya
text: arya I'm going to kill the queen.

title: Dragonstone
Name: thoros
text: thoros Bad night to be outdoors.

title: Dragonstone
Name: sandor
text: sandor You've got real powerful magic to figure that out. Did the Lord of Light whisper that in your ear? "It's snowing, Thoros. It's windy. It's gonna be a cold night."

title: Dragonstone
Name: thoros
text: thoros You're a grouchy old bear, aren't you, Clegane? You want some rum?

title: Dragonstone
Name: sandor
text: sandor Don't like that shit. It's too sweet.

title: Dragonstone
Name: thoros
text: thoros Why are you always in such a foul mood?

title: Dragonstone
Name: sandor
text: sandor Experience.

title: Dragonstone
Name: beric
text: beric This seems like a good place to spend the night.

title: Dragonstone
Name: sandor
text: sandor These people don't want us here.

title: Dragonstone
Name: beric
text: beric Seems deserted to me. No livestock. No smoke coming from the chimney.

title: Dragonstone
Name: sandor
text: sandor I don't like the look of it.

title: Dragonstone
Name: thoros
text: thoros For a big, hard man, you scare easy.

title: Dragonstone
Name: sandor
text: sandor I'll tell you what doesn't scare me

title: Dragonstone
Name: thoros
text: thoros Come on. Maybe they've got some ale hidden away.

title: Dragonstone
Name: sandor
text: sandor They don't.

title: Dragonstone
Name: thoros
text: thoros See if there's a larder. They always leave something behind.

title: Dragonstone
Name: beric
text: beric How do you think it ended for them?

title: Dragonstone
Name: sandor
text: sandor With death.

title: Dragonstone
Name: beric
text: beric Girl died in her father's arms. Both of them covered in blood and a knife at their feet. I'd say they were starving. And rather than letting his little girl suffer, he ended it for both of them.

title: Dragonstone
Name: sandor
text: sandor Doesn't matter now.

title: Dragonstone
Name: beric
text: beric No, doesn't matter now.

title: Dragonstone
Name: sandor
text: sandor I've known you a long time, Dondarrion.

title: Dragonstone
Name: beric
text: beric Aye. I think the first time we met was at that tournament--

title: Dragonstone
Name: sandor
text: sandor And I always thought you were dull as dirt.

title: Dragonstone
Name: sandor
text: sandor You're not bad. I don't hate you. Don't like, but you're not bad.

title: Dragonstone
Name: beric
text: beric Thank you, Clegane. That warms the heart.

title: Dragonstone
Name: sandor
text: sandor But there's nothing special about you.

title: Dragonstone
Name: beric
text: beric You're right about that.

title: Dragonstone
Name: sandor
text: sandor So why does the Lord of Light keep bringing you back? I've met better men than you, and they've been hanged from crossbeams, or beheaded, or just shat themselves to death in a field somewhere. None of them came back. So, why you?

title: Dragonstone
Name: beric
text: beric You think I don't ask myself that? Every hour of every day? Why am I here? What am I supposed to do? What does the Lord see in me?

title: Dragonstone
Name: sandor
text: sandor And?

title: Dragonstone
Name: beric
text: beric I don't know. I don't understand our Lord.

title: Dragonstone
Name: sandor
text: sandor Your Lord.

title: Dragonstone
Name: beric
text: beric I don't know what He wants from me. I only know that He wants me alive.

title: Dragonstone
Name: sandor
text: sandor If he's so all-powerful, why doesn't he just tell you what the fuck he wants?

title: Dragonstone
Name: thoros
text: thoros Clegane.

title: Dragonstone
Name: thoros
text: thoros Come over here. Don't worry. The fire won't bite. I want to show you something.

title: Dragonstone
Name: sandor
text: sandor It's my fucking luck I end up with a band of fire worshippers.

title: Dragonstone
Name: beric
text: beric Aye. Almost seems like divine justice.

title: Dragonstone
Name: sandor
text: sandor There's no divine justice, you dumb cunt. If there was, you'd be dead...and that girl would be alive.

title: Dragonstone
Name: sandor
text: sandor What do you want?

title: Dragonstone
Name: thoros
text: thoros Look into the flames.

title: Dragonstone
Name: sandor
text: sandor I don't want to look in the damn flames.

title: Dragonstone
Name: thoros
text: thoros You saw me bring him back from the dead after you cut him down. Don't you want to know what gave me the power?

title: Dragonstone
Name: sandor
text: sandor I keep asking and no one wants to tell me.

title: Dragonstone
Name: thoros
text: thoros We can't tell you. Only the fire can tell you.

title: Dragonstone
Name: thoros
text: thoros What do you see?

title: Dragonstone
Name: sandor
text: sandor Logs burning.

title: Dragonstone
Name: thoros
text: thoros Keep looking. What do you see?

title: Dragonstone
Name: sandor
text: sandor Ice. A wall of ice. The Wall.

title: Dragonstone
Name: thoros
text: thoros What else?

title: Dragonstone
Name: sandor
text: sandor It's where the Wall meets the sea. There's a castle there.

title: Dragonstone
Name: sandor
text: sandor There's a mountain. Looks like an arrowhead. The dead are marching past.

title: Dragonstone
Name: sandor
text: sandor Thousands of them.

title: Dragonstone
Name: beric
text: beric Do you believe me now, Clegane? Do you believe we're here for a reason?

title: Dragonstone
Name: thoros
text: thoros What the hell are you doing, Clegane?

title: Dragonstone
Name: sandor
text: sandor Burying the dead.

title: Dragonstone
Name: thoros
text: thoros You knew these people.

title: Dragonstone
Name: sandor
text: sandor Not really.

title: Dragonstone
Name: sandor
text: sandor We ask the Father to judge us with mercy. We ask the Mother to... Fuck it, I don't remember the rest. I'm sorry you're dead. You deserved better. Both of you.

title: Dragonstone
Name: little
text: little Mom.

title: Dragonstone
Name: gilly
text: gilly You should really sleep, Sam.

title: Dragonstone
Name: sam
text: sam The dead don't.

title: Dragonstone
Name: gilly
text: gilly Legends of the Long Night.

title: Dragonstone
Name: sam
text: sam The Targaryens used dragonglass to decorate their weapons without even knowing what the First Men used it for.

title: Dragonstone
Name: gilly
text: gilly What is it?

title: Dragonstone
Name: sam
text: sam It's a map of Dragonstone. The Targaryens built their first stronghold there when they invaded Westeros.

title: Dragonstone
Name: gilly
text: gilly That's dragonglass?

title: Dragonstone
Name: sam
text: sam A mountain of it. Beneath the ground. Stannis told me, but I didn't think... This is important. Jon needs to know.

title: Dragonstone
Name: jorah
text: jorah Has she come yet?

title: Dragonstone
Name: sam
text: sam Who?

title: Dragonstone
Name: jorah
text: jorah The Dragon Queen. Daenerys Stormborn.

title: Dragonstone
Name: sam
text: sam Haven't heard anything.

title: Dragonstone
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys Shall we begin?

title: Stormborn
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion On a night like this, you came into the world.

title: Stormborn
Name: varys
text: varys I remember that storm. All the dogs in King's Landing howled through the night.

title: Stormborn
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys I wish I could remember it.

title: Stormborn
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys I always thought this would be a homecoming. It doesn't feel like home.

title: Stormborn
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion We won't stay on Dragonstone for long.

title: Stormborn
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys Good.

title: Stormborn
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys Not so many lions.

title: Stormborn
Name: varys
text: varys Cersei controls fewer than half the Seven Kingdoms. The lord of Westeros despise her. Even before your arrival, they plotted against her. Now...

title: Stormborn
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys They cry out for their true queen? They drink secret toasts to my health?

title: Stormborn
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys People used to tell my brother that sort of thing, and he was stupid enough to believe them.

title: Stormborn
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys If Viserys had three dragons and an army at his back, he'd have invaded King's Landing already.

title: Stormborn
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion Conquering Westeros would be easy for you. But you're not here to be queen of the ashes.

title: Stormborn
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys No.

title: Stormborn
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion We can take the Seven Kingdoms without turning it into a slaughterhouse. If the great houses support your claim against Cersei, the game is won. With the Tyrell army and the Dornish on our side, we have powerful allies in the south.

title: Stormborn
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys I never properly thanked you for that.

title: Stormborn
Name: varys
text: varys They joined our side, my queen, because they believe in you.

title: Stormborn
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys You served my father, didn't you, Lord Varys?

title: Stormborn
Name: varys
text: varys I did.

title: Stormborn
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys And then you served the man who overthrew him?

title: Stormborn
Name: varys
text: varys I had a choice, Your Grace--serve Robert Baratheon or face the headman's axe.

title: Stormborn
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys But you didn't serve him long. You turned against him.

title: Stormborn
Name: varys
text: varys Robert was an improvement on your father, to be sure. There have been few rulers in history as cruel as the Mad King. Robert was neither mad nor cruel. He simply had no interest in being king.

title: Stormborn
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys So you took it upon yourself to find a better one.

title: Stormborn
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion Your Grace, when I was ready to drink myself into a small coffin, Lord Varys told me about a queen in the east who--

title: Stormborn
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys Before I came to power, you favored my brother. All your spies, your little birds, did they tell you Viserys was cruel, stupid, and weak? Would those qualities have made for a good king in your learned opinion?

title: Stormborn
Name: varys
text: varys Until your marriage to Khal Drogo, Your Grace, I knew nothing about you, save your existence and that you were said to be beautiful.

title: Stormborn
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys So you and your friends traded me like a prized horse to the Dothraki.

title: Stormborn
Name: varys
text: varys Which you turned to your advantage.

title: Stormborn
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys Who gave the order to kill me?

title: Stormborn
Name: varys
text: varys King Robert.

title: Stormborn
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys Who hired the assassins?

title: Stormborn
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys Who sent word to Essos to murder Daenerys Targaryen?

title: Stormborn
Name: varys
text: varys Your Grace, I did what had to be done to--

title: Stormborn
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys To keep yourself alive.

title: Stormborn
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion Lord Varys has proven himself a loyal servant.

title: Stormborn
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys Proven himself loyal? Quite the opposite. If he dislikes one monarch, he conspires to crown the next one. What king of a servant is that?

title: Stormborn
Name: varys
text: varys The kind the realm needs. Incompetence should not be rewarded with blind loyalty. As long as I have my eyes, I'll use them. I wasn't born into a great house. I came from nothing. I was sold as a slave and carved up as an offering. When I was a child, I lived in alleys, gutters, abandoned houses. You wish to know where my true loyalties lie? Not with any king or queen, but with the people. The people who suffer under despots and prosper under just rule. The people whose hearts you aim to win. If you demand blind allegiance, I respect your wishes. Grey Worm can behead me or your dragons can devour me. But if you let me live, I will serve you well. I will dedicate myself to seeing you on the Iron Throne because I choose you. Because I know the people have no better chance than you.

title: Stormborn
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys Swear this to me, Varys. If you ever think I'm failing the people, you won't conspire behind my back. You'll look me in the eye as you have done today, and you'll tell me how I'm failing them.

title: Stormborn
Name: varys
text: varys I swear it, my queen.

title: Stormborn
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys And I swear this--if you ever betray me, I'll burn you alive.

title: Stormborn
Name: varys
text: varys I would expect nothing less from the Mother of Dragons.

title: Stormborn
Name: grey
text: grey Forgive me, my queen. A red priestess from As'shai has come to see you.

title: Stormborn
Name: melisandre
text: melisandre Queen Daeneys, I was a slave once, bought and sold, scourged and branded. It is an honor to meet the Breaker of Chains.

title: Stormborn
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys The Red Priests helped bring peace to Meereen. You are very welcome here. What is your name?

title: Stormborn
Name: melisandre
text: melisandre I am called Melisandre.

title: Stormborn
Name: varys
text: varys She once served another who wanted the Iron Throne. It didn't end well for Stannis Baratheon, did it?

title: Stormborn
Name: melisandre
text: melisandre No, it didn't.

title: Stormborn
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys You chose an auspicious day to arrive at Dragonstone.

title: Stormborn
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys We've just decided to pardon those who served the wrong king.

title: Stormborn
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys The Lord of Light doesn't have many followers in Westeros, does he?

title: Stormborn
Name: melisandre
text: melisandre Not yet. But even those who don't worship the Lord can serve his cause.

title: Stormborn
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys What does your Lord expect from me?

title: Stormborn
Name: melisandre
text: melisandre The Long Night is coming. Only the prince who was promised can bring the dawn.

title: Stormborn
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys The prince who was promised will bring the dawn. I'm afraid I'm not a prince.

title: Stormborn
Name: missandei
text: missandei Your Grace, forgive me, but your translation is not quite accurate. That noun has no gender in High Valyrian, so the proper translation for that prophecy would be the prince or princess who was promised will bring the dawn.

title: Stormborn
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion Doesn't really roll off the tongue, does it?

title: Stormborn
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys No, but I like it better.

title: Stormborn
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys And you believe this prophecy refers to me?

title: Stormborn
Name: melisandre
text: melisandre Prophecies are dangerous things. I believe you have a role to play, as does another. The King in the North, Jon Snow.

title: Stormborn
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion Jon Snow? Ned Stark's bastard?

title: Stormborn
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys You know him?

title: Stormborn
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion I traveled with him to the Wall when he joined the Night's Watch.

title: Stormborn
Name: varys
text: varys And why do you think the Lord of Light singled out this Jon Snow aside from the visions you've seen in the flames, that is?

title: Stormborn
Name: melisandre
text: melisandre As Lord Commander of the Night's Watch he allowed the Wildlings south of the Wall to protect them from great danger. As King in the North he has united those Wildlings with the northern houses so together they may face their common enemy.

title: Stormborn
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys He sounds like quite a man.

title: Stormborn
Name: melisandre
text: melisandre Summon Jon Snow. Let him stand before you and tell you things that have happened to him, the things that he has seen with his own eyes.

title: Stormborn
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion I can't speak to prophecies or visions in the flames, but I like Jon Snow and I trusted him, and I am an excellent judge of character.

title: Stormborn
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion If he does rule the north, he would make a valuable ally. The Lannisters executed his father and conspired to murder his brother. Jon Snow has even more reason to hate Cersei than you do.

title: Stormborn
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys Very well. Send a raven north. Tell Jon Snow that his Queen invites him to come to Drangonstone...and bend the knee.

title: Stormborn
Name: sansa
text: sansa Do you think it's really Tyrion? It could be someone trying to lure you into a trap.

title: Stormborn
Name: jon
text: jon Read the last bit.

title: Stormborn
Name: sansa
text: sansa All dwarfs are bastards in their father's eyes." What does that mean?

title: Stormborn
Name: jon
text: jon It's something he said to me the first night we met. You know him better than any of us. What do you think?

title: Stormborn
Name: sansa
text: sansa Tyrion is not like the other Lannisters. He was always kind to me, but it's too great a risk. "The Seven Kingdoms will bleed as long as Cersei sits on the Iron Throne. Join us. Together we can end her tyranny."

title: Stormborn
Name: davos
text: davos Sounds like a charmer. Of course, the casual mention of a Dothraki horde, a legion of Unsullied and three dragons, a bit less charming.

title: Stormborn
Name: jon
text: jon What?

title: Stormborn
Name: davos
text: davos Fire kills Whites, you told me. What breathes fire?

title: Stormborn
Name: sansa
text: sansa You're not suggesting Jon meet with her?

title: Stormborn
Name: davos
text: davos No, too dangerous.

title: Stormborn
Name: jon
text: jon But?

title: Stormborn
Name: davos
text: davos But if the Army of the Dead makes it passed the Wall, do we have enough men to fight them?

title: Stormborn
Name: cersei
text: cersei If the Mad King's daughter takes the Iron Throne, she will destroy the Realm as we know it. Some of you are bannermen of House Tyrell. But House Tyrell is in open rebellion against the Crown. With their help the Mad King's daughter has ferried an army of savages to our shores. Mindless Unsullied soldiers who will destroy your castles and your holdfasts. Dothraki heathens who will burn your villages to the ground, rape and enslave your women, and butcher your children without a second thought. This is how Olenna Tyrell rewards centuries of service and loyalty.

title: Stormborn
Name: cersei
text: cersei You all remember the Mad King. You remember the horrors he inflicted upon his people. His daughter is no different. In Essos her brutality is already legendary. She crucified hundreds of noblemen in Slaver's Bay. And when she grew bored of that, she fed them to her dragons.

title: Stormborn
Name: cersei
text: cersei It is my solemn duty to protect the people, and I will but I need your help, My Lords. We must stand together, all of us, if we hope to stop her.

title: Stormborn
Name: randyll
text: randyll She has three full-grown dragons, Your Grace. The same as Aegon when he conquered the Seven Kingdoms. How do you propose to stop them?

title: Stormborn
Name: qyburn
text: qyburn We are currently at work on a solution, My Lord.

title: Stormborn
Name: jaime
text: jaime Lord Tarley.

title: Stormborn
Name: randyll
text: randyll Ser, Jaime. I believe you know my son.

title: Stormborn
Name: dickon
text: dickon Ser, Jaime.

title: Stormborn
Name: jaime
text: jaime Rickon, isn't it?

title: Stormborn
Name: dickon
text: dickon Dickon.

title: Stormborn
Name: jaime
text: jaime That's it.

title: Stormborn
Name: jaime
text: jaime Thank you for coming. The other lords of the Reach look to you for guidance now more than ever. They might not have come if you hadn't.

title: Stormborn
Name: randyll
text: randyll If my queen summons me, I answer the call. And I've heard what she does to those that defy her.

title: Stormborn
Name: jaime
text: jaime Do you ride for Hornhill today?

title: Stormborn
Name: randyll
text: randyll I have an army to mobilize. It won't be long until the fighting starts.

title: Stormborn
Name: jaime
text: jaime And what side will you be fighting for? You were the only man to defeat Robert Baratheon in battle. Not even Rhaegar Targaryen could --

title: Stormborn
Name: randyll
text: randyll It's a long ride back to the reach, Ser Jaime. How may I serve?

title: Stormborn
Name: jaime
text: jaime I want you to be my ranking general in the wars to come. I want you to swear allegiance to Cersei and I want you to help her destroy her enemies. All of her enemies.

title: Stormborn
Name: randyll
text: randyll Including Olenna Tyrell? I'm a Tarley. That name means something. We're not oath breakers. We're not schemers. We don't stab our rivals in the back or cut their throats at weddings. I swore an oath to House Tyrell.

title: Stormborn
Name: jaime
text: jaime You swore an oath to the Crown as well, Lord Tarley.

title: Stormborn
Name: randyll
text: randyll I've known Olenna since I was a child.

title: Stormborn
Name: jaime
text: jaime She was a great woman, once. Now she's broken. She wants revenge so badly she brought the Dothraki to our shores. The Dothraki in Westeros for the first time in history. I know you don't like my sister, but you have to make a choice. Do you fight with us or with the foreign savages and eunuchs?

title: Stormborn
Name: jaime
text: jaime When the war is won the queen will need a new warden of the south. I can think of no better man than Randyll Tarley.

title: Stormborn
Name: marwyn
text: marwyn The infection has spread too far. You should have cut off your arm the moment you were touched.

title: Stormborn
Name: jorah
text: jorah How long?

title: Stormborn
Name: marwyn
text: marwyn It will be years before it kills you. It could be 10, could be 20.

title: Stormborn
Name: jorah
text: jorah But how long 'till...

title: Stormborn
Name: marwyn
text: marwyn Your mind? Six months, maybe fewer.

title: Stormborn
Name: sam
text: sam Pardon, Archmaester. I met Stannis Baratheon's daughter at Castle Black. She had Greyscale as a baby and was cured. Isn't there some way --

title: Stormborn
Name: marwyn
text: marwyn Does this look like a baby to you?

title: Stormborn
Name: sam
text: sam No.

title: Stormborn
Name: marwyn
text: marwyn Have you studied the varying rates of Greyscale progression in infants and fully grown men?

title: Stormborn
Name: marwyn
text: marwyn Maester Chrissen discovered Shireen Baratheon's affliction immediately.

title: Stormborn
Name: marwyn
text: marwyn This is quite advanced and beyond our skills, Ser. Were you a commoner I'd have you shipped to Valyria at once to live out your life with the Stone Men. As an anointed Knight I'll allow you one more day. How you choose to spend that time is up to you.

title: Stormborn
Name: marwyn
text: marwyn Come, Samwell.

title: Stormborn
Name: sam
text: sam Should we send word to your family, Ser...

title: Stormborn
Name: jorah
text: jorah Jorah. Jorah Mormont.

title: Stormborn
Name: sam
text: sam Mormont?

title: Stormborn
Name: jorah
text: jorah There's no need. I've been dead to them for years.

title: Stormborn
Name: qyburn
text: qyburn Have you ever been down here, Your Grace?

title: Stormborn
Name: cersei
text: cersei No, I can't say I have. I haven't seen these since Robert had them removed from the Throne Room.

title: Stormborn
Name: qyburn
text: qyburn Curious that King Robert did not have them destroyed.

title: Stormborn
Name: cersei
text: cersei They were his trophies. He couldn't keep them around. They would have made him look small. Sometimes he would come down here and look at them. I believe he brought his whores on occasion.

title: Stormborn
Name: qyburn
text: qyburn Balerion the Dread. The beast that Aegon rode across the sea. Its flames forged the Iron Throne and brought the Seven Kingdoms to heel. Powerful, but not invincible.

title: Stormborn
Name: qyburn
text: qyburn Apparently one of Daenarys' dragons was wounded by spears in the fighting pits of Meereen. If they can be wounded, they can be killed.

title: Stormborn
Name: qyburn
text: qyburn The finest artilleters and blacksmiths in King's Landing have been laboring day and night, Your Grace. If you'd kindly pull that lever.

title: Stormborn
Name: yara
text: yara If you want the Iron Throne, take it. We have an army, a fleet, and three dragons. We should hit King's Landing now. Hard. With everything we have. The city will fall within a day.

title: Stormborn
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion If we turn the dragons loose, tens of thousands will die in the firestorms.

title: Stormborn
Name: ellaria
text: ellaria It's called war. You don't have the stomach for it, scurry back into hiding.

title: Stormborn
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion I know how you wage war. We don't poison little girls here. Myrcella was innocent.

title: Stormborn
Name: ellaria
text: ellaria She was a Lannister. There are no innocent Lannisters. My greatest regret is that Oberyn died fighting for you.

title: Stormborn
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys That's enough. Tyrion is the Hand of the Queen. You will treat him with respect.

title: Stormborn
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys I am not here to be queen of the ashes.

title: Stormborn
Name: olenna
text: olenna That's very nice to hear. Of course, I can't remember a queen who was better loved than my grand daughter. The common people loved her, the nobles loved her. And what is left of her now? Ashes. Commoners, nobles, they're all just children really. They won't obey you unless they fear you.

title: Stormborn
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys I'm grateful to you, Lady Olenna, for your council. I'm grateful to all of you. But you have chosen to follow me. I will not attack King's Landing. We will not attack King's Landing.

title: Stormborn
Name: olenna
text: olenna Then how do you mean to take the Iron Throne? By asking nicely?

title: Stormborn
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys We will lay siege to the capital surrounding the city on all sides. Cersei will have the Iron Throne but no food for her army or the people.

title: Stormborn
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion But we won't use Dothraki and Unsullied.

title: Stormborn
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion Cersei will try to rally the lords of Westeros by appealing to their loyalty, their love for their country. If we besiege the city with foreigners, we prove her point. Our army should be Westerosi.

title: Stormborn
Name: ellia
text: ellia And I suppose we're providing the Westerosi?

title: Stormborn
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion You are.

title: Stormborn
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion Lady Greyjoy will escort you home to Sunspear and her Iron Fleet will ferry the Dornish army back up to King's Landing.

title: Stormborn
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion The Dornish will lay siege to the capital alongside the Tyrell army. Two great kingdoms united against Cersei.

title: Stormborn
Name: olenna
text: olenna So, your master plan is to use our armies? Forgive me for asking, but why did you bother to bring your own?

title: Stormborn
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion The unsullied will have another objective. For decades House Lannister has been the true power in Westeros. And the seat of that power is Casterly Rock. Grey Worm and the Unsullied will sail for the Rock and take it.

title: Stormborn
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys Do I have your support?

title: Stormborn
Name: yara
text: yara You have mine.

title: Stormborn
Name: ellia
text: ellia Dorne is with you, Your Grace.

title: Stormborn
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys Thank you all. Lady Olenna, may I speak with you alone?

title: Stormborn
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys I realize you're here out of hatred for Cersei and not love for me. But I swear to you she will pay for what she's done and we will bring peace back to Westeros.

title: Stormborn
Name: olenna
text: olenna Peace. Do you think that's what we had under your father or his father or his? Peace never lasts, my dear. Would you take a bit of advice from an old woman?

title: Stormborn
Name: olenna
text: olenna He's a clever man, your Hand. I've known a great many clever men. I've outlived them all. Do you know why? I ignored them. The lords of Westeros are sheep. Are you a sheep? No. You're a dragon. Be a dragon.

title: Stormborn
Name: grey
text: grey Enter.

title: Stormborn
Name: missandei
text: missandei You leave tomorrow. Were you going to say goodbye?

title: Stormborn
Name: grey
text: grey I will see you when I return.

title: Stormborn
Name: missandei
text: missandei But you don't know when that will be.

title: Stormborn
Name: grey
text: grey No one knows.

title: Stormborn
Name: missandei
text: missandei I wish you good fortune.

title: Stormborn
Name: grey
text: grey Missandei --

title: Stormborn
Name: grey
text: grey It is hard for me to say goodbye to you.

title: Stormborn
Name: missandei
text: missandei Why?

title: Stormborn
Name: grey
text: grey You know why.

title: Stormborn
Name: missandei
text: missandei I don't.

title: Stormborn
Name: grey
text: grey You are my weakness.

title: Stormborn
Name: missandei
text: missandei That's what I am? Your weakness?

title: Stormborn
Name: grey
text: grey When Unsullied are young their masters learn their fears. One boy is scared of dogs. One boy hates high places. One is frightened of the ocean. They make the boy sleep with dogs or climb a cliff. They throw him in the water. If he learns to swim, good. If he drowns, good. Either way, strong Unsullied. But I had no fears. I was never the biggest, never the strongest, but I was bravest always.

title: Stormborn
Name: missandei
text: missandei I believe it.

title: Stormborn
Name: grey
text: grey Until I meet Missandei from the Isle of Naarth. Now I have fear.

title: Stormborn
Name: missandei
text: missandei I do too.

title: Stormborn
Name: grey
text: grey No.

title: Stormborn
Name: missandei
text: missandei I want to see you. Please.

title: Stormborn
Name: marwyn
text: marwyn It might be useful. Fouthen was a dreadful writer but an excellent researcher.

title: Stormborn
Name: sam
text: sam Archmaester, I wanted to --

title: Stormborn
Name: marwyn
text: marwyn And this one.

title: Stormborn
Name: marwyn
text: marwyn Maester Faol was quite the opposite. A brilliant stylist who invented half the stories he tells.

title: Stormborn
Name: sam
text: sam I wanted to ask you --

title: Stormborn
Name: marwyn
text: marwyn If you need to write histories, Tarley, you have to do the research. If you want people to read your histories, you need a bit of style. I'm not writing the Chronicle of the Wars Following the Death of King Robert the First so it can sit on a shelf unread.

title: Stormborn
Name: marwyn
text: marwyn What? You don't like the title? What would you call it then?

title: Stormborn
Name: sam
text: sam Possibly something a bit more poetic?

title: Stormborn
Name: marwyn
text: marwyn We're not poets, Tarley.

title: Stormborn
Name: sam
text: sam Archmaester, if I could just have a moment.

title: Stormborn
Name: marwyn
text: marwyn This is your moment. Use it wisely.

title: Stormborn
Name: sam
text: sam I may have found a way to treat Ser Jorah. There are two recorded cases of advanced Greyscale being cured. I found the procedure in the Study of Rare Diseases by Archmaester Pilos.

title: Stormborn
Name: marwyn
text: marwyn I'm familiar with Archmaester Pylos and the Study of Rare Diseases.

title: Stormborn
Name: sam
text: sam Oh, you are?

title: Stormborn
Name: marwyn
text: marwyn Yes. Should I tell you how he died? From Greyscale.

title: Stormborn
Name: sam
text: sam Oh.

title: Stormborn
Name: marwyn
text: marwyn The procedure is far too dangerous which is why it's now forbidden.

title: Stormborn
Name: sam
text: sam Hello.

title: Stormborn
Name: jorah
text: jorah What are you doing?

title: Stormborn
Name: sam
text: sam You're Jorah Mormont. You're the only son of Jeor Mormont.

title: Stormborn
Name: sam
text: sam My name is Samwell Tarley. I'm a sworn brother of the Night's Watch training to serve as maester of Castle Black. I knew your father. I was with him when he died. You're not dying today, Ser Jorah.

title: Stormborn
Name: sam
text: sam Drink this.

title: Stormborn
Name: jorah
text: jorah What is it?

title: Stormborn
Name: sam
text: sam Rum. Drink it all, please. I'm afraid this is going to hurt.

title: Stormborn
Name: sam
text: sam If you could take off your shirt.

title: Stormborn
Name: sam
text: sam If you wouldn't mind, bite down hard. I'm sorry but no one knows I'm here. If they hear you screaming then we're both finished.

title: Stormborn
Name: jorah
text: jorah Have you ever done this before?

title: Stormborn
Name: sam
text: sam No. No one else will try, so I'm the best you've got. Have a seat. I'm going to remove the entire layer of infected tissue, then apply a medicinal ointment to the --

title: Stormborn
Name: sam
text: sam Shh, shhh. Again, I'm sorry. Please try not to scream.

title: Stormborn
Name: man
text: man They say her dragons are bigger than Aegons.

title: Stormborn
Name: man
text: man Horse shit. Cersei is just trying to frighten us.

title: Stormborn
Name: man
text: man If it's true, if she lays siege to King's Landing prices will triple.

title: Stormborn
Name: man
text: man As long as we get back there before they start.

title: Stormborn
Name: man
text: man One more round. It's a long ride.

title: Stormborn
Name: hot
text: hot Ary!

title: Stormborn
Name: arya
text: arya Hello, Hot Pie. Sit down. Who's that for?

title: Stormborn
Name: arya
text: arya Mmm. This is good.

title: Stormborn
Name: hot
text: hot You think so? The secret is browning the butter before making the dough. Most people don't don't do that because it takes up too much time.

title: Stormborn
Name: arya
text: arya I didn't do that.

title: Stormborn
Name: hot
text: hot You've been making pies?

title: Stormborn
Name: arya
text: arya One or two.

title: Stormborn
Name: hot
text: hot I can't believe you're here. Did you meet the big lady?

title: Stormborn
Name: arya
text: arya Big lady?

title: Stormborn
Name: hot
text: hot The lady knight. I figured she was a knight because she had armor on. She was looking for your sister but I told her about you. Did she ever find you?

title: Stormborn
Name: arya
text: arya She found me.

title: Stormborn
Name: hot
text: hot What happened to you Ary?

title: Stormborn
Name: arya
text: arya You got any ale?

title: Stormborn
Name: hot
text: hot Where are you heading?

title: Stormborn
Name: arya
text: arya King's Landing.

title: Stormborn
Name: hot
text: hot Why?

title: Stormborn
Name: arya
text: arya I heard Cersei's queen now.

title: Stormborn
Name: hot
text: hot I heard she blew up the Great Sept. That must have been something to see. Boom.

title: Stormborn
Name: arya
text: arya Hmm.

title: Stormborn
Name: hot
text: hot I can't believe someone could do that.

title: Stormborn
Name: arya
text: arya Cersei would do that.

title: Stormborn
Name: hot
text: hot I thought you'd be heading for Winterfell.

title: Stormborn
Name: arya
text: arya Why would I go there? The Boltons have it.

title: Stormborn
Name: hot
text: hot No. The Boltons are dead.

title: Stormborn
Name: arya
text: arya What?

title: Stormborn
Name: hot
text: hot Jon Snow came down from Castle Black with a Wildling army and won the Battle of the Bastards. He's King in the North now.

title: Stormborn
Name: arya
text: arya You're lying.

title: Stormborn
Name: hot
text: hot Why would I lie about that? He's your brother right?

title: Stormborn
Name: arya
text: arya Thanks for the pie.

title: Stormborn
Name: hot
text: hot Friends don't pay. I can't believe I thought you were a boy. You're pretty.

title: Stormborn
Name: arya
text: arya Thanks.

title: Stormborn
Name: arya
text: arya Take care of yourself, Hot Pie. Try not to get killed.

title: Stormborn
Name: hot
text: hot No, I won't. I'm like you, Ary. I'm a survivor.

title: Stormborn
Name: jon
text: jon Come in.

title: Stormborn
Name: wolkan
text: wolkan A raven, My King, from the Citadel.

title: Stormborn
Name: jon
text: jon This message was sent to me by Samwell Tarley. He was my brother at the Night's Watch. A man I trust as much as anyone in this world. He's discovered proof that Dragonstone sits on a mountain of Dragonglass.

title: Stormborn
Name: jon
text: jon I received this a few days ago from Dragonstone. It was sent to me by Tyrion Lannister.

title: Stormborn
Name: jon
text: jon He's now Hand of the Queen to Daenerys Targaryen. She intends to take the Iron Throne from Cersei Lannister. She has a powerful army at her back and if this message is to be believed, three dragons.

title: Stormborn
Name: jon
text: jon Lord Tyrion has invited me to Dragonstone to meet with Daenerys and I'm going to accept.

title: Stormborn
Name: jon
text: jon We need this Dragonglass, My Lords. We know that Dragonglass can destroy both White Walkers and their army. We need to mine it and turn it into weapons.

title: Stormborn
Name: jon
text: jon But more importantly, we need allies. The Night King's army grows larger by the day. We can't defeat them on our own. We don't have the numbers. Daenerys has her own army and she has dragon fire. I need to try and persuade her to fight with us. Ser Davos and I will ride for White Harbor tomorrow, then sail for Dragonstone.

title: Stormborn
Name: sansa
text: sansa Have you forgotten what happened to our grandfather? The Mad King invited him to King's Landing and roasted him alive.

title: Stormborn
Name: jon
text: jon I know that.

title: Stormborn
Name: sansa
text: sansa She is here to reclaim the Iron Throne and the Seven Kingdoms. The north is one of those seven kingdoms. This isn't an invitation, it's a trap.

title: Stormborn
Name: jon
text: jon It could be, but I don't believe Tyrion would do that. You know him. He's a good man.

title: Stormborn
Name: yohn
text: yohn Your Grace, with respect I must agree with Lady Sansa. I remember the Mad King all too well. A Targaryen cannot be trusted, nor can a Lannister.

title: Stormborn
Name: robett
text: robett We called your brother king, and then he rode south and lost his kingdom.

title: Stormborn
Name: lyanna
text: lyanna Winter is here, Your Grace. We need the King in the North in the north.

title: Stormborn
Name: jon
text: jon You all crowned me your king. I never wanted it, I never asked for it, but I accepted it because the north is my home. It's part of me and I will never stop fighting for it, no matter the odds. But the odds are against us. None of you have seen the Army of the Dead. None of you. We can never hope to defeat them alone. We need allies, powerful allies. I know it's a risk. But I have to take it.

title: Stormborn
Name: sansa
text: sansa Then send an emissary. Don't go yourself.

title: Stormborn
Name: jon
text: jon Daenerys is a queen. Only a king can convince her to help us. It has to be me.

title: Stormborn
Name: sansa
text: sansa You're abandoning your people. Your abandoning your home.

title: Stormborn
Name: jon
text: jon I'm leaving both in good hands.

title: Stormborn
Name: sansa
text: sansa Whose?

title: Stormborn
Name: jon
text: jon Yours. You are my sister. You are the only Stark in Winterfell. Until I return, the north is yours.

title: Stormborn
Name: petyr
text: petyr I delivered his bones myself. I presented them to Lady Catlyn as a gesture of goodwill from Tyrion Lannister. It seems like a lifetime ago. Do give Lord Tyrion my best when you see him.

title: Stormborn
Name: petyr
text: petyr I was sorry when he died. Your father and I had our differences but he loved Cat very much. So did I. She wasn't fond of you, was she? Well, it appears she vastly underestimated you. Your father and brothers are gone, yet here you stand King in the North. Last best hope against the coming storm.

title: Stormborn
Name: jon
text: jon You don't belong down here.

title: Stormborn
Name: petyr
text: petyr Forgive me. We have never talked properly. I wanted to remedy that.

title: Stormborn
Name: jon
text: jon I have nothing to say to you.

title: Stormborn
Name: petyr
text: petyr Not even thank you? If it weren't for me you'd have been slaughtered at that battlefield. You have many enemies, My King, but I swear to you I'm not one of them. I love Sansa as I loved her mother.

title: Stormborn
Name: jon
text: jon Touch my sister and I'll kill you myself.

title: Stormborn
Name: arya
text: arya Nymeria?

title: Stormborn
Name: arya
text: arya Nymeria, it's me, Arya. I'm heading north, girl, back to Winterfell. I'm finally going home. Come with me.

title: Stormborn
Name: arya
text: arya Come with me.

title: Stormborn
Name: arya
text: arya That's not you.

title: Stormborn
Name: nymeria
text: nymeria You can't have them all. It's not fair.

title: Stormborn
Name: obara
text: obara I'm oldest.

title: Stormborn
Name: tyene
text: tyene Momma will want Cersei for herself.

title: Stormborn
Name: obara
text: obara She's not my momma. You can have Cersei. I want The Mountain.

title: Stormborn
Name: nymeria
text: nymeria The Mountain killed father. He'll crush you with one hand.

title: Stormborn
Name: tyene
text: tyene Father got careless. That's what Momma says.

title: Stormborn
Name: obara
text: obara Will you shut up about Momma? Momma, momma.

title: Stormborn
Name: tyene
text: tyene Maybe I'll kill you both before we take King's Landing and then I won't have to share.

title: Stormborn
Name: ellaria
text: ellaria How can you drink this piss? When we reach Sunspear I'll treat you to a Dornish red, the best in the world. Have you ever been to Dorne?

title: Stormborn
Name: yara
text: yara A few times. Never stayed long.

title: Stormborn
Name: ellaria
text: ellaria A boy in every port?

title: Stormborn
Name: yara
text: yara A boy, a girl. Depends on the port.

title: Stormborn
Name: ellaria
text: ellaria Could we get some more?

title: Stormborn
Name: yara
text: yara I thought it wasn't for you.

title: Stormborn
Name: ellaria
text: ellaria I'm developing a taste for it.

title: Stormborn
Name: yara
text: yara He's not your servant.

title: Stormborn
Name: theon
text: theon It's fine.

title: Stormborn
Name: ellaria
text: ellaria So, you're going to be Queen of the Iron Islands.

title: Stormborn
Name: yara
text: yara Once I kill my uncle.

title: Stormborn
Name: ellaria
text: ellaria And what will you be, handsome?

title: Stormborn
Name: theon
text: theon Whatever my queen demands.

title: Stormborn
Name: yara
text: yara He'll be my advisor, my protector.

title: Stormborn
Name: ellaria
text: ellaria Oh, I see. Your protector.

title: Stormborn
Name: ellaria
text: ellaria So if someone gets too close to you --

title: Stormborn
Name: yara
text: yara He might have to intervene.

title: Stormborn
Name: ellaria
text: ellaria hold that person back.

title: Stormborn
Name: yara
text: yara Until they've made their intentions known.

title: Stormborn
Name: ellaria
text: ellaria Why are you standing all the way over there then? A foreign invasion is under way. It seems like you don't need a protector.

title: Stormborn
Name: yara
text: yara Stay here.

title: Stormborn
Name: yara
text: yara Euron.

title: Stormborn
Name: yara
text: yara Your mother is below deck. Keep her safe.

title: Stormborn
Name: ellaria
text: ellaria Kill us! Get it over with!

title: Stormborn
Name: euron
text: euron Give your uncle a kiss.

title: Stormborn
Name: euron
text: euron Theon!

title: Stormborn
Name: euron
text: euron Ah, come on your cockless hound. I have her. Come and get her.

title: Stormborn
Name: end
text: end CREDITS

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion The bastard of Winterfell.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: jon
text: jon The dwarf of Casterly Rock.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion I believe we last saw each other on top of the wall.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: jon
text: jon You were pissing off the edge, if I remember right. You picked up some scars along the road.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion It's been a long road. But we're both still here.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion I'm Tyrion Lannister.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: davos
text: davos Davos Seaworth.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion and DAVOS shake hands.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion Ah, the Onion Knight. We fought on opposite sides at the Battle of Blackwater Bay.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: davos
text: davos Unluckily for me.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion Missandei is the queen's most trusted advisor.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: missandei
text: missandei Welcome to Dragonstone. Our queen knows this is a long journey. She appreciates the effort you have made on her behalf. If you wouldn't mind handing over your weapons.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: jon
text: jon Of course.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: missandei
text: missandei Please, this way.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: davos
text: davos Where are you from? I can't place the accent.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: missandei
text: missandei I was born on the Island of Naarth.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: davos
text: davos Ah. I hear it's beautiful down there. Palm trees and butterflies. I haven't been myself.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: davos
text: davos This place has changed.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion And Sansa, I hear she's alive and well.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: jon
text: jon She is.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion Does she miss me terribly?

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion A sham marriage and unconsummated.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: jon
text: jon I didn't ask --

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion Well, it was. It wasn't. Anyway, she's much smarter than she lets on.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: jon
text: jon She's starting to let on.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion Good. At some point I want to hear how a Knight's Watch recruit became King in the North.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: jon
text: jon As long as you tell me how a Lannister became Hand to Daenerys Targaryen.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion A long and bloody tale. To be honest, I was drunk for most of it.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: jon
text: jon My bannermen think I'm a fool for coming here.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion Of course they do. If I was your hand I would have advised against it. General rule of thumb, Stark men don't fare well when they travel south.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: jon
text: jon True. But I'm not a Stark.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion I'd say you get used to them, but you never really do.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion Come. Their mother is waiting for you.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: varys
text: varys I wondered why you weren't there to meet our guests. You begged us to summon the King in the North. Don't you want to see him again?

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: melisandre
text: melisandre I've done my part. I've brought ice and fire together.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: varys
text: varys Strange. You spoke so highly of Jon Snow but when he arrives you hide on a cliff. I didn't take you for a bashful girl.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: melisandre
text: melisandre My time whispering in the ears of kings has come to an end.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: varys
text: varys Oh, I doubt that. Give us common folk one taste of power we're like the lion who tasted man. Nothing is ever so sweet again.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: melisandre
text: melisandre Neither of us is common folk anymore. I did not part on good terms with the King in the North, or his advisor.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: varys
text: varys Why?

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: melisandre
text: melisandre Because of mistakes I made. Terrible mistakes. I would only be a distraction if I stayed.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: varys
text: varys So where will you go?

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: melisandre
text: melisandre Volantis.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: varys
text: varys Good. If you don't mind my saying, I don't think you should return to Westeros. I'm not sure you'd be safe here.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: melisandre
text: melisandre I will return, dear spider. One last time.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: varys
text: varys My Lady --

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: melisandre
text: melisandre I have to die in this strange country, just like you.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: missandei
text: missandei You stand in the presence of Daenerys Stormborn of House Targaryen, rightful heir to the Iron Throne, rightful Queen of the Andals and the First Men, Protector of the Seven Kingdoms, the Mother of Dragons, the Khaleesi of the Great Grass Sea, The Unburnt, The Breaker of Chains.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: davos
text: davos This is Jon Snow.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: davos
text: davos He's King in the North.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys Thank you for traveling so far, My Lords. I hope the seas weren't too rough.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: jon
text: jon The winds were kind, Your Grace.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: davos
text: davos Apologies. I have a Flea Bottom accent, I know. But Jon Snow is King in the North, Your Grace. He's not a lord.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys Forgive me --

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion Your Grace, this is Ser Davos Seaworth.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys Forgive me, Ser Davos. I never did receive a formal education, but I could have sworn the last King in the North was Torren Stark who bent the knee to my ancestor Aegon Targaryen in exchange for his life and the lives of the northmen. Torren Stark swore fealty to House Targaryen in perpetuity. But do I have my facts wrong?

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: davos
text: davos I wasn't there, Your Grace.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys No. Of course not. But still, an oath is an oath. In perpetuity means -- what does perpetuity mean, Lord Tyrion?

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion Forever.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys Forever. So I assume, My Lord, that you're here to bend the knee.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: jon
text: jon I am not.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys Oh. Well, that is unfortunate. You've travelled all this way to break faith with House Targaryen?

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: jon
text: jon Break faith? Your father burned my grandfather alive. He burned my uncle alive. He would have burned the Seven Kingdoms.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys My father was an evil man. On behalf of House Targaryen I ask your forgiveness for the crimes he committed against your family. And I ask you not to judge a daughter by the sins of her father. Our two houses were allies for centuries. Those were the best centuries the kingdom's ever known. Centuries of peace and prosperity with the Targaryens sitting on the Iron Throne and a Stark serving as Warden of the North. I am the last Targaryen, Jon Snow. Honor the pledge your ancestor made to mine. Bend the knee and I will name you Warden of the North. Together we will save this country from those who would destroy it.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: jon
text: jon You're right. You're not guilty of your father's crime. And I'm not beholden to my ancestor's vows.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys Then why are you here?

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: jon
text: jon Because I need your help and you need mine.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys Did you see three dragons flying overhead when you arrived?

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: jon
text: jon I did.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys And did you see the Dothraki, all of whom have sworn to kill for me?

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: jon
text: jon They're hard to miss.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys But still, I need your help?

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: davos
text: davos Not to defeat Cersei. You could storm King's Landing tomorrow and the city would fall. Hell, we almost took it and we didn't even have dragons.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion Almost.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: jon
text: jon But you haven't stormed King's Landing. Why not? The only reason I can see is you don't want to kill thousands of innocent people. It's the fastest way to win the war but you won't do it. Which means at the very least you're better than Cersei.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys Still, that doesn't explain why I need your help.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: jon
text: jon Because right now you and I and Cersei and everyone else, we're children playing at a game screaming that the rules aren't fair.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys You told me you liked this man.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion I do.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys In the time since he's met me he's refused to call me queen, he's refused to bow and now he's calling me a child.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion I believe he's calling all of us children. Figure of speech.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: jon
text: jon Your Grace, everone you know will die before winter is over if we don't defeat the enemy to the north.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys As far as I can see, you are the enemy to the north.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: jon
text: jon I am not your enemy. The dead are the enemy.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys The dead?

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys Is that another figure of speech?

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: jon
text: jon The Army of the Dead is on the march.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion The Army of the Dead?

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: jon
text: jon You don't know me well, My Lord, but do you think I am a liar or a madman?

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion No, I don't think you're either of those things.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: jon
text: jon The Army of the Dead is real. The White Walkers are real. The Knight King is real. I've seen them. If they get past the wall and we're squabbling amongst ourselves --

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: jon
text: jon we're finished.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys I was born at Dragonstone. Not that I can remember it.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys We fled before Robert's assassins could find us. Robert was your father's best friend, no? I wonder if your father knew his best friend sent assassins to murder a baby girl in her crib. Not that it matters now of course. I spent my life in foreign lands. So many men have tried to kill me. I don't remember all of their names. I have been sold like a brood mare. I have been chained and betrayed, raped and defiled. Do you know what kept me standing through all those years in exile? Faith. Not in any gods. Not in myths and legends. In myself. In Daenerys Targaryen. The world hadn't seen a dragon in centuries until my children were born. The Dothraki hadn't crossed the sea. Any sea.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys They did for me. I was born to rule the Seven Kingdoms. And I will.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: jon
text: jon You'll be ruling over a graveyard if we don't defeat the Night King.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion The war against my sister has already begun. You can't expect us to halt hostilities and join you in fighting --

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion whatever you saw beyond the wall.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: davos
text: davos You don't believe him. I understand that. It sounds like nonsense.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: davos
text: davos But if destiny has brough Daenerys Targaryen back to our shores, it has also made Jon Snow King in the North. You were the first to bring Dothraki to Westeros. He was the first to make allies with Wildlings and northmen. He was named Lord Commander of the Night's Watch. He was named King in the North. Not because of his birthright. He has no birthright. He's a damn bastard. All those hard son's of bitches chose him as their leader because they believe in him.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: davos
text: davos All those things you don't believe in, he faced those things. He fought those things for the good of his people. He risked his life for his people. He took a knife in the heart for his people. He gave his own --

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: davos
text: davos If we don't put asside our enmities and band together we will die. And then it doesn't matter whose skeleton sits on the Iron Throne.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion If it doesn't matter you might as well kneel.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion Swear your allegiance to Queen Daenerys. Help her to defeat my sister and together our armies will protect the north.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: jon
text: jon There's no time for that. There's no time for any of this. While we stand here debating --

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion It takes no time to bend the knee. Pledge your sword to her cause.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: jon
text: jon And why would I do that?

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: jon
text: jon I mean no offense, Your Grace, but I don't know you. As far as I can tell your claim to the throne rests entirely on your father's name. And my own father fought to overthrow the Mad King. The lords of the north placed their trust in me to lead them. And I will continue to do so as well as I can.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys That's fair. It's also fair to point out that I'm the rightful queen of the Seven Kingdoms. By declaring yourself king of the northern most kingdom, you are in open rebellion.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: daenerys
