text: daenerys You must forgive my manners. You will both be tired after your long journey. We'll have baths drawn for you and supper sent to your rooms.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: jon
text: jon Am I your prisoner?

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys Not yet.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: varys
text: varys Our Iron Born and Dornish allies were attacked on route to Dorne.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys And?

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: varys
text: varys Two or three ships escaped. The rest sunk our captured. Ellaria and the sand snakes dead or captured. The Greyjoys are dead or captured.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys All of them?

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: captain
text: captain Your sister's dead?

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: theon
text: theon Euron has her.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: captain
text: captain You saw him take her? And you got away?

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: theon
text: theon I couldn't save her. I tried.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: captain
text: captain You wouldn't be here if you tried.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: euron
text: euron This is the life. Look at them. Cheering for a Greyjoy.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: euron
text: euron I have to be honest, it's making me hard. Did you see little Theon's face right before he jumped overboard?

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: euron
text: euron Oh no!

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: euron
text: euron What a twat.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: euron
text: euron My queen. Please accept this gift on behalf of all of your loyal subjects in the Iron Islands.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: euron
text: euron I give you --

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: euron
text: euron what no other man could give. Justice. Justice for your murdered daughter.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: cersei
text: cersei You've proven yourself the greatest captain on the 14 seas and a true friend to the crown.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: euron
text: euron A bit more than a true friend.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: cersei
text: cersei And you deserve a proper reward for your heroism.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: euron
text: euron There's only one reward I want.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: cersei
text: cersei You shall have what your heart desires --

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: cersei
text: cersei when the war is won.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: cersei
text: cersei With Euron Greyjoy commanding our naval forces and Jaime Lannister leading our armies, the sons and daugters of Westeros shall defend our country.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: euron
text: euron There's nothing quite like it, is there? The love of the people. I suppose you wouldn't know.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: jaime
text: jaime This same mob spat at my sister not long ago, and if you turn on us, they'll cheer to see your head mounted on a spike.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: euron
text: euron Or yours. They just like severed heads really. Listen, if you have any advice at all I'd love to hear it when we have an hour or two to speak as brothers.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: jaime
text: jaime Advice?

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: euron
text: euron Does she like it gentle or rough? A finger in the bum?

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: euron
text: euron Shhh, shhh, shhh, not now. We'll talk later.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: cersei
text: cersei I want you to know I understand. Even though we're enemies, you and I, I understand the fear that drives you. I was there that day when Ser Gregor crushed your lover's head. I close my eyes I can hear the sound of Oberyn's skull breaking.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: cersei
text: cersei The sound of your scream. I never heard a sound like that. I thought, that's true love. Oberyn looked beautiful that day. He really did. No one moved like him. No one had such skill with a spear. Even Ser Gregor couldn't stop him. If only he hadn't taunted him. He could have walked away and left poor Ser Gregor to die. But that wasn't your lover's way, was it? Now he's burried somewhere. And here Ser Gregor is stronger than ever. That must be difficult for you. When my daughter was taken from me, my only daughter, well, you can't imagine how that feels unless you've lost a child. I fed her at my own breast even though they told me to give her to the wet nurse. I couldn't bear to see her in another woman's arms. I never got to have a mother. But Myrcella did. She was mine and you took her from me. Why did you do that?

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: cersei
text: cersei It doesn't matter now.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: cersei
text: cersei Your daughter is a beauty too. Brown eyes, those lips. A perfect Dornish beauty.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: cersei
text: cersei I imagine she is your favorite.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: cersei
text: cersei I know, I know, we're not supposed to have favorites. But still, we're only human. We love who we love.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: cersei
text: cersei I'm sorry. I can't understand you. The gag makes it difficult to understand what you're saying. It must be frustrating.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: cersei
text: cersei We all make our choices. You chose to murder my daughter. You must have felt powerful after you made that choice.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: cersei
text: cersei Do you feel powerful now? I don't sleep very well, not at all really. I lie in bed and I stare at the canopy and imagine ways of killing my enemies. How to destroy Ellaria Sand, the woman who murdered my only daughter. I thought about having Ser Gregor crush your skull the way he did Oberyn's. It would be poetic I suppose but fast. Too fast.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: cersei
text: cersei I thought about having him crush your daughter's skull.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: cersei
text: cersei She's so beautiful. The thought of this lovely face cracking open like a duck egg, no, it's just not right.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: tyene
text: tyene Momma!

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: cersei
text: cersei Qyburn, he's the cleverest man I know. Clever enough to learn what poison you used to murder Myrcella. The long goodbye, was that it?

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: qyburn
text: qyburn The Long Farewell.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: cersei
text: cersei That's the one.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: cersei
text: cersei How long does the poison take?

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: qyburn
text: qyburn Difficult to say. Hours, days, it depends on the subject's constitution.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: cersei
text: cersei But death is certain?

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: qyburn
text: qyburn Oh yes, Your Grace, quite certain.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: cersei
text: cersei Your daughter will die here in this cell. You will be here watching when she does. You will be here the rest of your days. If you refuse to eat we will force food down your throat. You will live to watch your daughter rot, to watch that beautiful face collapse to bone and dust all the while contemplating the choices you've made.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: cersei
text: cersei Make sure the guards change the torches every few hours. I don't want her to miss a thing.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: jaime
text: jaime No.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: jaime
text: jaime Don't.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: jaime
text: jaime What are you doing? No one can see us like this ?

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: cersei
text: cersei I am queen of the Seven Kingdoms. I'll do as I please.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: messenger
text: messenger Forgive me, Your Grace. The visitor from Braavos has arrived.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: cersei
text: cersei Good. And we'll need fresh sheets for the bed.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: messenger
text: messenger At once, Your Grace.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: tycho
text: tycho No, thank you.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: tycho
text: tycho My condolences, Your Grace, on the death of your son. From all reports he was a fine young man.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: cersei
text: cersei The Iron Bank didn't send you hear to offer condolences.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: tycho
text: tycho Condolences and congratulations. You've become the first ruling queen in the Seven Kingdoms. That's quite an accomplishment. The Iron Bank appreciates how you cast off the yoke of superstition freeing the crown from elements that sought to subvert the rule of law.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: cersei
text: cersei The destruction of the Sept of Baelor was a tragic accident.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: tycho
text: tycho Indeed. But sometimes tragedies are necessary to restore order and rational leadership.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: cersei
text: cersei The Iron Bank wants its gold back.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: tycho
text: tycho Your father never minced words either. But, yes, your debts are considerable. And you are now engaged in a conflict on several fronts. We both know how expensive war can be.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: cersei
text: cersei And we both know gold wins wars. Your vaults are empty. Your late husbando s profligacy saw to that.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: tycho
text: tycho Your wealthiest ally is the Tyrells who are now your enemies. You're surrounded on all sides by rivals for the throne.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: cersei
text: cersei And the Iron Bank wants to bet on a winner.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: tycho
text: tycho We don't make bets. We invest in endeavors we deem likely to be successful.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: cersei
text: cersei That's a fancy way of saying bet. The war has already begun. I've drawn first blood. I decapitated the Dornish snake. My armada owns the Narrow Sea.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: tycho
text: tycho Euron Greyjoy's armada owns the Narrow Sea.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: cersei
text: cersei Euron Greyjoy is loyal to me.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: tycho
text: tycho For now. Daenerys Targaryen has three full grown dragons. How well do wooden ships fare against fire breathing dragons?

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: cersei
text: cersei Her dragons might not be as invulnerable as some think. Now, let's talk about the Targaryen girl. You want to invest in her? I'm guessing the Iron Bank invested considerable gold in the slave trade. How are you profits now that Daenerys has freed all the slaves?

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: tycho
text: tycho The slave trade has entered a down turn, it's true.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: cersei
text: cersei From what I gather she considers herself more of a revolutionary that a monarch. In your experience how do bankers usually fare with revoltionaries?

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: cersei
text: cersei The Lannisters owe the Iron Bank quite a lot of money but Lannisters always pay their debts. Do former slaves or Dothraki or dragons?

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: tycho
text: tycho Your father's daughter indeed.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: cersei
text: cersei Give me a fortnight. Stay in King's Landing as my honored guest and when you return to Braavos I swear to you my debt will be paid in full.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion I came out here to brood over my failure to predict the Greyjoy attack. You're making it difficult. You look a lot better brooding than I do. You make me feel like I'm failing at brooding over failing.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: jon
text: jon I'm a prisoner on this island.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion I wouldn't say you're a prisoner on this island. You're free to walk the castle, the beaches, to go wherever you want.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: jon
text: jon Except to my ship. They took my ship.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion I wouldn't say we took your ship.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: jon
text: jon I'm not playing word games with you. The dead are coming for us all.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion Why don't you figure out what to do about my missing fleet and murdered allies, and I'll figure out what to do about your walking dead men.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: jon
text: jon It's hard for me to fathom. It really is. If someone told me about the White Walkers and the Night King --

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: jon
text: jon You probably don't believe me.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion I do actually.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: jon
text: jon You didn't before. Grumpkins and snarks you called them. Do you remember? You said it was all nonsense.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion It was all nonsense. Everybody knew it. But then Mormont saw them and you saw them, and I trust the eyes of an honest man more than I trust what everybody knows.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: jon
text: jon How do I convince people who don't know me that an enemey they don't believe in is coming to kill them all?

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion Good question.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: jon
text: jon I know it's a good question. I'm looking for an answer.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion People's minds aren't made for problems that large. White Walkers, the Night King, Army of the Dead, it's almost a relief to confront a familiar monster like my sister.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: jon
text: jon I need to help prepare my people for what's coming. I can't help them from here. I'd like to leave.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion It seems unlikely that you became King in the North by giving up that easily.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: jon
text: jon Everyone told me to learn from my father's mistakes. Don't go south. Don't answer a summons from the Mad King's daughter, a foreign invader. And here I am. A northern fool.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion Children are not their fathers, luckily for all of us. And sometimes there's more to foreign invaders than northern fools that meets the eye. Daenerys could have sailed for Westeros long ago but she didn't. Instead she stayed where she was and saved many people from horrible fates some of whom are on this island with us right now. While you're our guest here you might consider asking them what they think of the Mad King's daughter. She protects people from monsters, just as you do. That's why she came here. And she's not about to head north to fight an enemy she's never seen on a word of a man she doesn't know after a single meeting. That's not a reasonable thing to ask.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion So do you have anything reasonable to ask?

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: jon
text: jon What do you mean?

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion Maybe you are a northern fool. I'm asking if there's something I can do to help you.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys Dragonglass?

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion Yes. Volcanic glass, obsidian. He says you have a tremendous amount of it here.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys Why are we talking about glass? We just lost two of our allies.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion Which is why I was speaking to Jon Snow, a potential ally.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys And what does the King in the North want with Dragonglass?

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion Apparently it can be turned into weapons that kill White Walkers and their foot soldiers, or stop them, destroy them. I'm unsure of the nomenclature.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys And what do you think of this Army of the Dead and White Walkers and Night Kings?

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion I'd very much like to believe that Jon Snow is wrong, but a wise man once said that you should never believe a thing simply because you want to believe it.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys Which wise man said this?

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion I don't remember.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys Are you trying to present your own statements as ancient wisdom?

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion I would never do that...to you. The reason I believe Jon Snow is because he's here. All of his advisors would have told him not to come. I would have told him not to come, yet he's here anyway. You don't have to believe him. Let him mine the Dragonglass. If he's wrong it's worthless. You didn't even know it was here. It's nothing to you. Give him something by giving him nothing. Take a step toward a more productive relationship with a possible ally. Keep him occupied while we focus on the task at hand. Casterly Rock.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys What was that Ser Davos said about taking a knife in the heart for his people? Did you notice that?

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion You must allow them their flights of fancy. It's dreary in the north.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: jon
text: jon Amazing thing to see.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys I named them for my brothers Vicerys and Rhaegon. They're both gone now.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys You lost two brothers as well?

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys People thought dragons were gone forever but here they are. Perhaps we should all be examining what we think we know.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: jon
text: jon You've been talking to Tyrion?

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys He is my Hand.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: jon
text: jon He enjoys talking.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys We all enjoy what we're good at.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: jon
text: jon I don't.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys You know I'm not going to let Cersei stay on the Iron Throne.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: jon
text: jon I never expected that you would.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys And I haven't changed my mind about which kingdoms belong to the throne.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: jon
text: jon I haven't either.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys I will allow you to mine the Dragonglass and forge weapons from it. Any resources or men you need I will provide for you.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: jon
text: jon Thank you.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: jon
text: jon So you believe me then about the Night King and the Army of the Dead?

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys You better get to work, Jon Snow.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: sansa
text: sansa How much do we have?

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: wolkan
text: wolkan 4,000 bushels, My Lady.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: sansa
text: sansa What does that mean?

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: yohn
text: yohn For the current occupants of the castle it's enough food for a year, perhaps more.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: sansa
text: sansa What's the longest winter in the past 100 years?

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: wolkan
text: wolkan I'm not entirely certain. I'll check Maester Llewyn's records. He kept a copy of every raven scroll.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: sansa
text: sansa You're telling me we don't have enough food, especially not if the armies of the north come back to defend Winterfell.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: wolkan
text: wolkan No, My Lady, most likely not.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: sansa
text: sansa We must prepare for that eventuality. Every direction the threat comes from, this is the best place to be. We need to start building up our grain stores with regular shipments from every keep in the north. If we don't use it by winter's end we'll give it back to them, but if the entire north has to flee to Winterfell there won't be enough time to bring wagonloads of grain with them.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: yohn
text: yohn Very wise, My Lady.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: sansa
text: sansa Maester Wolkan, you'll see to it?

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: sansa
text: sansa Are they covering those breastplates in leather?

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: yohn
text: yohn No, My Lady.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: sansa
text: sansa Well, shouldn't they be once the real cold comes?

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: yohn
text: yohn They should indeed. Pardon me, My Lady.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: yohn
text: yohn You there, why isn't there leather on these?

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: petyr
text: petyr Command suits you. The northerns are all facing north worried about the threat beyond the wall.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: sansa
text: sansa So they should be.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: petyr
text: petyr I know Cersei better than anyone here. If you turn your back on her --

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: sansa
text: sansa You don't know Cersei better than anyone here.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: petyr
text: petyr I only meant to say --

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: sansa
text: sansa That the woman who murdered my mother, father and brother is dangerous? Thank you for your wise council.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: petyr
text: petyr One of two things will happen. Either the dead will defeat the living, in which case all our troubles come to an end. Or life will win out. And what then?

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: petyr
text: petyr Don't fight in the north or the south. Fight every battle everywhere always in your mind. Everyone is your enemy, everyone is your friend, every possible series of events is happening all at once. Live that way and nothing will surprise you. Everything that happens will be something that you've seen before.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: guard
text: guard Lady Sansa, at the gate.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: bran
text: bran Hello, Sansa.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: sansa
text: sansa I wish Jon was here.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: bran
text: bran Yes. I need to speak to him.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: sansa
text: sansa Your father's last living true born son. You're Lord of Winterfell.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: bran
text: bran I can never be the Lord of Winterfell. I can never be lord of anything. I'm the three-eyed raven.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: sansa
text: sansa I don't know what that means.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: bran
text: bran It's difficult to explain.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: sansa
text: sansa Try, please, for me.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: bran
text: bran It means I can see everything. Everything that's ever happened to everyone. Everything that's happening right now. It's all pieces, fragments. I need to learn to see better. When the long night comes again I need to be ready.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: sansa
text: sansa How do you know all of this?

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: bran
text: bran The three-eyed raven taught me.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: sansa
text: sansa I thought you were the three-eyed raven.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: bran
text: bran I told you it's difficult to explain.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: sansa
text: sansa Bran --

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: bran
text: bran I'm sorry for all that's happened to you. I'm sorry it had to happen here at our home. It was so beautiful that night. Snow falling just like now. And you were so beautiful in your white wedding dress.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: sansa
text: sansa I have to go back inside, Bran.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: bran
text: bran I'll stay a bit longer.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: marwyn
text: marwyn Hmm.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: marwyn
text: marwyn Hmm. Does it hurt?

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: jorah
text: jorah A bit. Less than before.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: marwyn
text: marwyn The infection no longer appears to be active.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: marwyn
text: marwyn Unusual. Unlikely. One could almost be forgiven for thinking the entire upper layer of diseased skin was debrided and the underlying region treated with some sort of ointment.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: jorah
text: jorah I don't know anything about that. I just started feeling better. I assumed it was the rest that did it.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: jorah
text: jorah And the climate.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: marwyn
text: marwyn The climate? You're free to go, Ser. This chamber is needed for the infectious, which you are no longer.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: marwyn
text: marwyn Tarley, I'd like to speak with you in my study this evening.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: jorah
text: jorah How bad is it?

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: sam
text: sam I suppose I'll find out this evening.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: sam
text: sam Where will you go?

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: jorah
text: jorah I surrendered to this sickness the moment I first saw it. I knew it would kill me or I'd kill myself before it could. Daenerys Stormborn convinced me otherwise. The only place for me is with her.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: jorah
text: jorah I owe my life to her and you.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: sam
text: sam Your father saved me more than once. It's the least I could do.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: jorah
text: jorah Perhaps our paths will cross again?

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: sam
text: sam I hope they do.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: marwyn
text: marwyn You treated him?

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: sam
text: sam Yes.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: marwyn
text: marwyn Who told you to treat him?

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: sam
text: sam No one.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: marwyn
text: marwyn Who forbade you or anyone to attempt to treat him?

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: sam
text: sam I seem to remember you.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: marwyn
text: marwyn But you treated him anyway?

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: sam
text: sam I did.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: marwyn
text: marwyn I forbade it because it's dangerous and rarely successful. Especially on someone of that age. You could have infected yourself and others. You could have devastated the entire Citadel. But you didn't. It's a meticulous, difficult procedure. Many maesters whose chains are heavy with healing links have attempted it and failed. But you succeeded. How?

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: sam
text: sam I read the books and followed the instructions.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: marwyn
text: marwyn That man is alive because of you. You should be proud.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: sam
text: sam Thank you, Archmaester.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: marwyn
text: marwyn Come here.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: marwyn
text: marwyn All these manuscripts and scrolls and rotting away. I need you to make copies of them.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: marwyn
text: marwyn You were expecting a reward? Your reward is not being immediately expelled from the Citadel. You'd better get started. Be mindful of the paper mites. They like flesh as well.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys We need to find Euron Greyjoy's fleet and sink it.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: varys
text: varys Your Grace, he's already destroyed a good portion of our fleet. To send our remaining ships after him --

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys I'm not talking about sending our ships after him.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion But you'll have to go yourself. Euron's ships could be anywhere or in more than one place. You'd be flying around the open seas alone for who knows how long.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys I wouldn't be alone. I'd have Drogon, Vicerion and Rhaegal. What can anyone do to them?

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: missandei
text: missandei They can still do something to you. It only takes one arrow.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion It's too great a risk. You're too important.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys What about Casterly Rock?

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: varys
text: varys The Unsullied will be there soon.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: missandei
text: missandei And what will they face?

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: varys
text: varys A difficult situation. They know we're coming.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion Yes. Cersei believes my sole purpose in life is to destroy House Lannister. She will be ready.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion No one has ever taken the rock.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion The Lannister army is still the army my father built. Well trained and well provisioned. 10,000 men at least. They will see us coming.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion They will be ready.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: man
text: man Draw! Loose!

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion The gates of Casterly Rock are impregnable.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion The fight up the walls will be hard. We'll be at a disadvantage. Many men will die.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion Interesting thing about my father. He built our house up from near ruin. He built our army. He built Casterly Rock as we know it, but he didn't build the sewers. That was beneath him. So he gave the job to the lowest person he could find. Me. He was right. I was low. The company I kept low, women mostly. They weren't welcome at the Rock. Father disapproved of that sort of behavior. I couldn't walk them through the front gates. I couldn't have them in my chambers. So in the process of building the sewers I threw in something for myself.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion It was a passage that began by the sea and ended beneath one of the main guard towers.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion No better place for low pursuits. Casterly Rock, the impregnable fortress.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion As a good friend of mine once said, "give me 10 good men and I'll impregnate the bitch."

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion And so it begins. They will face the bulk of the Lannister forces. They will be outnumbered. They will have less armor and fewer weapons.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion But as my sister's armies fights for her, the Unsullied will be fighting for something greater. They will be fighting for freedom and the person who gave it to them. They will be fighting for you. And that is why they will triump.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: unsullied
text: unsullied There are none left.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: grey
text: grey There are supposed to be more than this. Many more.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: grey
text: grey Where are they? Where are the rest of the Lannisters?

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: olenna
text: olenna It's done?

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: jaime
text: jaime It is.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: olenna
text: olenna And now the rains weep for our whores. Did we fight well?

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: jaime
text: jaime I suppose as well as can be expected.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: olenna
text: olenna It was never our forte. Golden roses indeed. Your brother and his new queen thought you would be defending Casterly Rock.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: jaime
text: jaime The truth is Casterly Rock isn't worth much anymore. Well, it is to me. My fond childhood memories won't keep Cersei on the throne.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: olenna
text: olenna So you'll just let them take it?

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: jaime
text: jaime For now. They won't be able to hold it. Euron Greyjoy's navy burned their ships, we emptied the larders before we left. Eventually they'll be forced to abandon their position and march all the way across Westeros.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: olenna
text: olenna And you took your army, your real army, and went where they weren't?

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: jaime
text: jaime As Robb Stark did to me at Whispering Wood. There are always lessons in failures.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: olenna
text: olenna Yes. You must be very wise by now.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: jaime
text: jaime My father always said I was a slow learner.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: olenna
text: olenna If he was so clever why didn't he take Highgarden the moment your gold mines ran dry? I suppose I'll be able to ask him myself soon enough. No more learning from my mistakes, eh? How will you do it? With that sword?

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: olenna
text: olenna That was Joffrey's sword, wasn't it? Not that he ever used it. What did he call it?

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: jaime
text: jaime Widow's Wail.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: olenna
text: olenna He really was a cunt, wasn't he? I did unspeakable things to protect my family, or watched them being done on my orders. I never lost a night's sleep over them. They were necessary. And whatever I imagined necessary for the safety of House Tyrell I did. But your sister has done things I wasn't capable of imagining. That was my prize mistake, a failure of imagination. She's a monster, you do know that?

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: jaime
text: jaime To you, sure. To others as well. But after we've won and there's no one left to oppose us, the people living peaceful in the world she built, do you really think they'll wring their hands over the way she built it?

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: olenna
text: olenna You love her. You really do love her. You poor fool. She'll be the end of you.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: jaime
text: jaime Possibly. Not much to be gained from discussing it with you though, is there?

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: olenna
text: olenna What better person to discuss it with? What better guarantee could you have that the things you say will never leave this room? But perhaps you're right. If she's driven you this far it's gone beyond your control.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: jaime
text: jaime Yes, it has.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: olenna
text: olenna She's a disease. I regret my role in spreading it. You will too.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: jaime
text: jaime I think we're done here.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: olenna
text: olenna How will it happen?

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: jaime
text: jaime Cersei had several ideas. Whipping you through the streets and beheading you in front of the Red Keep. Flaying you alive and hanging you from the walls of King's Landing. I talked her out of those.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: olenna
text: olenna Will there be pain?

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: jaime
text: jaime No. I made sure of that.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: olenna
text: olenna That's good.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: olenna
text: olenna I'd hate to die like your son clawing at my neck, foam and bile spilling from my mouth, eyes blood red, skin purple. It must have been horrible for you as a Kingsguard, as a father. It was horrible enough for me. A shocking scene. Not at all what I intended. You see, I'd never seen the posion work before. Tell Cersei. I want her to know it was me.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: end
text: end CREDITS

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: jaime
text: jaime Halt that wagon!

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: jaime
text: jaime opens the carriage. It is filled with gold bars and coins. He picks up a large sack and hands it to BRONN.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: bronn
text: bronn You just won the biggest prize in the world. What could you possibly have to be upset about? Come on. You can tell me. Queen of Thorns give you one last prick in the balls before saying goodbye?

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: jaime
text: jaime I'll save my confessions for the High Septon.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: bronn
text: bronn There is no more High Septon.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: jaime
text: jaime No, there isn't, is there?

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: bronn
text: bronn There is still the question of my prize.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: jaime
text: jaime is putting a padlock on the wagon bearing the gold. He stops and turns to BRONN.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: jaime
text: jaime That's a lot of money I just gave you.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: bronn
text: bronn It's not a castle.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: bronn
text: bronn turns and points to Highgarden.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: bronn
text: bronn How about that one? It's available.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: jaime
text: jaime You don't want Highgarden.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: bronn
text: bronn I beg to differ.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: jaime
text: jaime We're at war. Daenerys Targaryen could come take it back the day after you move in. Besides, think of the upkeep. The more you own, the more it weighs you down.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: bronn
text: bronn Oh, is that why you're so fucking glum, eh? All your new riches weighing you down?

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: jaime
text: jaime pounds on the back of the carriage and the horses start trotting.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: jaime
text: jaime They're not mine. The gold belongs to the Iron Bank. We pay our debts.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: bronn
text: bronn Right. Just not to me.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: jaime
text: jaime Bronn of the Blackwater, formerly of whatever nameless shit heap you're from with a saddlebag full of gold complaining about not getting paid. When we win this war all the castles in the Seven Kingdoms will be yours to choose from with no one left to take them away from you.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: bronn
text: bronn Yes, I'm sure Queen Cersei's reign will be quiet and peaceful.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: jaime
text: jaime Stranger things have happened.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: bronn
text: bronn Like what?

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: randyll
text: randyll TARLEY and his son DICKON come riding up on horseback. RANDYLL addresses JAIME.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: randyll
text: randyll The granaries are being emptied and loaded into wagons, My Lord.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: jaime
text: jaime The current harvest?

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: dickon
text: dickon We have teams of men collecting it and more farmers in the Reach.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: jaime
text: jaime looks over to BRONN.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: jaime
text: jaime Ser Bronn, will you accompany the Tarleys and help them accelerate this process?

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: bronn
text: bronn I'm not much for shoveling weight.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: jaime
text: jaime No, but motivating reluctant farmers to hand over their harvest, I've heard you guys have a real talent for that.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: randyll
text: randyll My Lord.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: dickon
text: dickon My Lord.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: randyll
text: randyll DICKON and BRONN break away from the Lannister army and ride into the distance. Horse drawn carts are carrying spoils from Highgarden and Lannister men are marching down the road.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: cersei
text: cersei and TYCHO NESTORIS from the Iron Bank of Braavos are sitting having a discussion.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: tycho
text: tycho I must say, I don't think the Iron Bank has ever had a debt of this magnitude repaid in a single installment. I always considered your father a very effective and efficient man, but you appear to be redefining those terms entirely.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: cersei
text: cersei You're too kind, My Lord.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: tycho
text: tycho I am neither kind, nor a lord, Your Grace. I am merely an instrument of the institution I represent, its wellbeing is a matter of arithmetic, not sentiment. And the current arithmetic is outstanding. The gold --

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: cersei
text: cersei Is on its way. My brother is supervising its transportation himself.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: tycho
text: tycho Some at the Iron Bank will be disappointed. They've grown rather fond of your interest payments.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: cersei
text: cersei We must devise a way to raise their spirits.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: tycho
text: tycho Yes. Perhaps we could be of assistance in some current venture.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: cersei
text: cersei My only venture at the moment is reestablishing control over this continent and every person on it.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: tycho
text: tycho I see a great deal of potential in that venture. I imagine that it would require outside investment?

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: cersei
text: cersei It will indeed. I need to expand my armies, my navies. My hand, Qyburn, had made overtures to the Golden Company in Essos.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: tycho
text: tycho I know them well. They've helped us recover significant sums from parties who had fallen into deep arrears.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: cersei
text: cersei That's good to hear. I too would like them to recover some things that belong to me.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: tycho
text: tycho Rest assured, Your Grace, you can count on the Iron Bank's support, as soon as the gold arrives.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: bran
text: bran is sitting in a wheelchair. PETER BAELISH is sitting next to him. BAELISH unsheathes a Valyrian steel dagger and shows it to BRAN. It's the same dagger used in the attempt to assassinate BRAN years ago.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: petyr
text: petyr This is for you.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: petyr
text: petyr flips the knife in his hand and extends it towards BRAN.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: petyr
text: petyr The last man who wielded it meant to cut your throat, but your mother fought him off.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: bran
text: bran reaches out and takes the knife, turning it and looking it over carefully.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: petyr
text: petyr The other dagger, the one that took her life, I would have stopped that dagger with my own heart if I could have. I wasn't there for her when she needed me most. But I am here for her now. To do what she would have done, to protect her children. Anything I can do for you, Brandon, you need only ask.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: bran
text: bran Do you know who this belonged to?

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: petyr
text: petyr No. That very question was what started the War of the Five Kings. In a way, that dagger made you what you are today. Forced from your home, driven out to the wilds beyond the Wall. I imagine you've seen things most men wouldn't believe.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: petyr
text: petyr hands the sheath of the knife to BRAN. BRAN slides the knife into the sheath.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: petyr
text: petyr To go through all of that and make your way home again only to find such chaos in the world, I can only imagine --

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: bran
text: bran Chaos is a ladder.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: bran
text: bran is staring at BAELISH. BAELISH stops speaking. The door opens and Meera appears.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: petyr
text: petyr I'm sorry to have disturbed you, Lord Stark.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: petyr
text: petyr stands up to leave.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: bran
text: bran I'm not Lord Stark.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: petyr
text: petyr bows and walks past Meera and closes the door.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: meera
text: meera notices BRAN sitting in a wheelchair.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: meera
text: meera What's that?

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: bran
text: bran Maester Wolkan built it for me so I can move around more easily.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: meera
text: meera It's a very good idea.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: bran
text: bran You're leaving?

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: meera
text: meera I don't want to leave you, but when they come I need to be with my family. And you're safe, safe as anyone can be now. You don't need me anymore.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: bran
text: bran No, I don't.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: meera
text: meera That's all you've got to say?

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: bran
text: bran Thank you.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: meera
text: meera Thank you?

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: bran
text: bran For helping me.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: meera
text: meera My brother died for you. Hodor and Summer died for you. I almost died for you. Bran!

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: bran
text: bran I'm not really, not anymore. I remember what it felt like to be Brandon Stark, but I remember so much else now.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: meera
text: meera begins to cry.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: meera
text: meera You died in that cave.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: meera
text: meera turns to walk out the door. She hesitates looking at BRAN, then walks out.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: arya
text: arya approaches the main gate on foot. Two guards are huddled by a brazier getting warm. There's indistinct chatter. One of the men notice ARYA walking to the gate and approach her.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: man
text: man Hey, oh. Where are you going?

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: arya
text: arya In there. I live here.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: man
text: man Fuck off.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: arya
text: arya I'm Arya Stark. This is my home.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: man
text: man Arya Stark is dead.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: arya
text: arya Send for Maester Llewyn or Ser Rodrick. They'll tell you who I am.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: man
text: man There's no Rodrick here.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: man
text: man Maester's name is Wolkan.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: arya
text: arya Go ask Jon Snow then, the King in the North. He's my brother

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: man
text: man He's a thousand miles away.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: man
text: man It's cold. We're busy. So, you know, best fuck off.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: man
text: man Mm-hmm.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: arya
text: arya If Jon Snow is gone who is in charge of Winterfell?

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: man
text: man The Lady of Winterfell, Lady Stark.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: arya
text: arya Which Lady Stark?

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: man
text: man You tell us. You're the one impersonating her sister.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: arya
text: arya Tell Sansa her sister is home.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: man
text: man Lady Sansa is too busy to waster her breath on you, just like us. So for the last time, fuck off.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: man
text: man 1 goes to grab Arya but she easily dodges out of his grasp.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: arya
text: arya I'm getting into this castle one way or another. If I'm not who I say I am, I won't last long. But if I am, and Sansa finds out that you turned me away...

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: arya
text: arya keeps glancing at the men. They look uneasy. They bring her inside of the gate. They indicate towards a cart near the entrance.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: man
text: man You sit there. Right there. Don't move.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: man
text: man Go tell Lady Stark. I'll watch her.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: arya
text: arya is glancing around Winterfell. Men are working building tools and cutting wood. ARYA looks over and sees a Winterfell flag sigil hanging from the wall. The two guards are still arguing.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: man
text: man You tell her.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: man
text: man I'm not.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: man
text: man Because if you don't I'll hit you right in the fucking face as hard as I can.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: man
text: man We told her to wait. We were standing right next to her.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: sansa
text: sansa sighs.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: man
text: man When we turned around she had gone, My Lady. She was nothing. Some winter town girl.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: man
text: man She comes in asking for Ser Rodrick and Maester Llewyn.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: man
text: man Don't trouble yourself over it, My Lady. We'll find her.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: sansa
text: sansa You don't have to. I know where she is.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: arya
text: arya is standing look at a statue of Ned Stark holding his sword. ARYA hears a sound and turns to see SANSA approaching. SANSA stops when she sees ARYA.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: arya
text: arya Do I have to call you Lady Stark now?

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: sansa
text: sansa hesitates for a moment.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: sansa
text: sansa Yes.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: sansa
text: sansa begins smiling then walking towards ARYA. SANSA reaches out and hugs ARYA.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: sansa
text: sansa You shouldn't have run from the guards.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: arya
text: arya I didn't run. You need better guards.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: sansa
text: sansa smirks at ARYA.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: arya
text: arya It suits you, Lady Stark. Jon left you in charge?

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: sansa
text: sansa He did. I hope he comes back soon. I remember how happy he was to see me. When he sees you, his heart will probably stop.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: arya
text: arya That doesn't look like him. It should have been carved by someone who knew his face.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: sansa
text: sansa Everyone who knew his face is dead.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: arya
text: arya We're not.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: arya
text: arya turns to face SANSA.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: arya
text: arya They say you killed Joffrey. Did you?

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: sansa
text: sansa I wish I had.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: arya
text: arya Me too. I was angry when I heard someone else had done it. However long my list got he was always first.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: sansa
text: sansa Your list?

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: arya
text: arya Of people I'm going to kill.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: sansa
text: sansa begins to laugh. ARYA joins her.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: sansa
text: sansa How did you get back to Winterfell?

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: arya
text: arya It's a long story. I imagine yours is too.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: sansa
text: sansa Yes. It's not a very pleasant one.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: arya
text: arya Mine neither, but our stories aren't over yet.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: sansa
text: sansa No, they're not.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: sansa
text: sansa Arya, Bran's home too.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: arya
text: arya smiles and looks at SANSA. SANSA doesn't smile back. The smile fades from ARYA's face.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: bran
text: bran is sitting next to the Weirwood tree. SANSA and ARYA approach. BRAN turns to look at them. BRAN begins speaking to ARYA.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: bran
text: bran You came home.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: arya
text: arya steps forward and throws her arms around BRAN. SANSA smiles in the background. ARYA lets go and steps back.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: bran
text: bran I saw you at the crossroads.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: arya
text: arya You saw me?

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: bran
text: bran I see quite a lot now.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: sansa
text: sansa Bran has visions.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: bran
text: bran I thought you might go to King's Landing.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: arya
text: arya So did I.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: sansa
text: sansa Why would you go back there?

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: bran
text: bran Cersei is on her list of names.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: arya
text: arya stares at BRAN. ARYA turns to look at SANSA.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: sansa
text: sansa Who else is on your list?

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: arya
text: arya Most of them are dead already.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: bran
text: bran produces the Valyrian dagger that BAELISH gave him and unsheathes it.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: arya
text: arya Where did you get this?

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: bran
text: bran Littlefinger gave it to me.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: arya
text: arya Littlefinger, he's here?

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: arya
text: arya turns to look at SANSA.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: sansa
text: sansa He's declared for House Stark.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: sansa
text: sansa steps up closer to BRAN and speaks to him.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: sansa
text: sansa Why would he give you a dagger?

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: bran
text: bran He thought I'd want it.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: sansa
text: sansa Why?

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: bran
text: bran Because it was meant to kill me.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: sansa
text: sansa The cutthroat after your fall?

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: arya
text: arya Why would a cutthroat have a Valyrian steel dagger?

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: bran
text: bran Someone very wealthy wanted me dead.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: sansa
text: sansa He's not a generous man. He wouldn't give you anything unless he thought he was getting something back.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: bran
text: bran It doesn't matter.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: sansa
text: sansa What do you mean it doesn't matter?

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: bran
text: bran I don't want it.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: bran
text: bran holds the knife out to ARYA. ARYA looks at BRAN.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: arya
text: arya Are you sure? It's Valyrian steel.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: bran
text: bran It's wasted on a cripple.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: arya
text: arya looks down at the dagger. She steps forward and takes it from BRAN.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: arya
text: arya is pushing BRAN in his wheelchair and SANSA is next to them. The Stark children are walking back through the gate of Winterfell. Men are milling around doing various jobs. BRIENNE and PODRICK see the Stark children all back at Winterfell together.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: podrick
text: podrick Catelyn Stark would be proud. You kept your vow.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: brienne
text: brienne I did next to nothing.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: podrick
text: podrick You're too hard on yourself, My Lady.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: brienne
text: brienne I'm not a --

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: brienne
text: brienne pauses for a moment.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: brienne
text: brienne Thank you, Podrick.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys and MISSANDEI are walking along a path outside of Dragonstone followed by members of the Queensguard.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: missandei
text: missandei Your Grace, there's still no word from the Unsullied.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys Soon. They will come back to me.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: missandei
text: missandei He better.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys stops and turns to look at MISSANDEI. She then continues walking.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys What happened?

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: missandei
text: missandei begins smirking.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: missandei
text: missandei Many things.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys Many things?

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: jon
text: jon Your Grace.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys looks at MISSANDEI then her Queensguard. She speaks in Valyrian and motions to her guard to stand down.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys It's all right.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys descends the stairs with MISSANDEI and they begin walking with JON. They walk along the beach until they reach a cave. DAVOS is waiting for them with a lit torch.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: jon
text: jon I wanted you to see it before we start hacking it to bits.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: jon
text: jon leads DAENERYS and MISSANDEI into the cave. He lights a brazier and illuminates the Dragonglass along the walls. He continues walking deeper into the cave.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: jon
text: jon So this is it, all we'll ever need.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys is looking up at the walls of Dragonglass.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: jon
text: jon There is something else I want to show your, Your Grace.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: jon
text: jon and DAENERYS go to a further chamber in the cave. There are murals painted on the walls of Dragonglass.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: jon
text: jon The Children of the Forest made these.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys When?

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: jon
text: jon A very long time ago.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys They were right here standing where we're standing before there were Targaryens or Starks or Lannisters. Maybe even before there were men.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: jon
text: jon No.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys stops looking at the walls and turns to look at JON. JON walks to another wall and begins to examine the murals. The murals depict Children of the Forest and the First Men standing together.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: jon
text: jon They were here together the Children and the First Men.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys Doing what? Fighting each other?

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: jon
text: jon takes DAENERYS by the arm and swings her torch to another part of the wall. There is a mural of the Night King and White Walkers.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys They fought together against their common enemy. Despite their differences, despite their suspicions, together. We need to do the same if we're going to survive.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: jon
text: jon and DAENERYS look back at the wall with the Night King.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: jon
text: jon Because the enemy is real. It's always been real.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys turns to look at JON.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys And you say you can't defeat them without my armies and my dragons?

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: jon
text: jon No, I don't think I can.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys steps forward closer to JON.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys I will fight for you. I will fight for the north...when you bend the knee.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: jon
text: jon My people won't accept a southern ruler, not after everything they've suffered.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys steps even closer to JON until they're face to face.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys They will if their king does. They chose you to lead them. They chose you to protect them. Isn't their survival more important than your pride?

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: jon
text: jon and DAENERYS, DAVOS and MISSANDEI are walking out of the cave. As they exit TYRION and VARYS are standing on the beach awaiting them. DAENERYS begins addressing Tyrion.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys What is it?

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion We took Casterly Rock.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys That's very good to hear.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion and VARYS look at each other. They aren't eager to deliver the bad news.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys Isn't it?

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: davos
text: davos You'll want to discuss this amongst yourselves. Perhaps --

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys You will stay. All my allies are gone. They've been taken from me while I've been sitting here on this island.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion We still have the largest army.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys Who won't be able to eat because Cersei has taken all the food from the Reach.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion Call Grey Worm and the Unsullied back. We still have enough ships to carry the Dothraki to the mainland. Commit to the blockade of King's Landing. We have a plan. It's still the right plan.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys stops walking, turns and speaks harshly to Tyrion.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys The right plan? Your strategy has lost us Dorne, the Iron Islands and the Reach.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion If I've underestimated our enemies --

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys Our enemies? Your family, you mean. Perhaps you don't want to hurt them after all.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys begins looking out to the ocean. Three dragons are flying in the sky over the water.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys Enough with the clever plans.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys turns back and looks at TYRION.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys I have three large dragons. I'm going to fly them to the Red Keep.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion We've discussed this.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys My enemies are in the Red Keep. What kind of a queen am I if I'm not willing to risk my life to fight them?

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion A smart one.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys looks over to JON SNOW.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys What do you think I should do?

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: jon
text: jon I would never presume to --

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys I'm at war. I'm losing.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys begins walking close to JON.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: jon
text: jon looks over the ocean at the dragons flying.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: jon
text: jon I never thought that dragons would exist again. No one did. The people who follow you know that you made something impossible happen. Maybe that helps them believe that you can make other impossible things happen. Build a world that's different from the shit one they've always known.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: jon
text: jon glances back towards the dragons.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: jon
text: jon But if you use them to melt castles and burn cities, you're not different. You're just more of the same.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys looks back out to her dragons flying along the water.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: brienne
text: brienne and PODRICK are sparring. BRIENNE kicks PODS foot out from under him and he lands face first in the dirt.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: brienne
text: brienne Don't lunge.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: podrick
text: podrick pushes himself back up and picks up his sword. PODRICK attacks again. Brienne blocks his blows and kicks his foot out again.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: brienne
text: brienne Don't go where your enemy leads you.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: arya
text: arya is watching the sparring session from across the courtyard. She begins to approach Brienne.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: brienne
text: brienne Up.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: brienne
text: brienne begins striking at PODRICK while he blocks her blows. BRIENNE hits PODRICK in the stomach with the hilt of her sword and PODRICK lands on the ground.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: brienne
text: brienne And don't --

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: arya
text: arya Don't fight someone like her in the first place.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: podrick
text: podrick stands up and retrieves his sword. ARYA walks closer to speak to BRIENNE.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: brienne
text: brienne Nice sword. Very nice dagger.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: arya
text: arya looks down at the Valyrian dagger and unsheathes it. She approaches BRIENNE flipping the knife several times in her fingers. BRIENNE takes the dagger and examines it.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: sansa
text: sansa and BAELISH are walking along the upper section of the courtyard having a conversation.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: sansa
text: sansa If they haven't contributed the right amount of grain to the stores then I'm afraid they'll have to make due with --

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: sansa
text: sansa sees ARYA in the courtyard speaking with BRIENNE and stops to watch her.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: arya
text: arya It's been awhile since I've trained.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: brienne
text: brienne I can go and find the Master of Arms for you, My Lady.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: arya
text: arya He didn't beat the hound. You did. I want to train with you.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: brienne
text: brienne chuckles.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: arya
text: arya You swore to serve both of my mother's daughters, didn't you?

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: brienne
text: brienne nods her head in agreement.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: brienne
text: brienne Move aside, Podrick.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: podrick
text: podrick backs away. ARYA draws her sword, Needle.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: brienne
text: brienne You can't use that, My Lady. It's too small.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: arya
text: arya I won't cut you. Don't worry.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: brienne
text: brienne smirks and raises her sword to a fighting posture.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: brienne
text: brienne I'll try not to.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: brienne
text: brienne strikes at ARYA who quickly sidesteps and parries the attack. BRIENNE attacks again and ARYA sidesteps, dodges multiple strikes and parries BRIENNE while smiling. ARYA strikes at BRIENNE and hits her hand causing BRIENNE to flinch and lose her two-handed grip on her sword. BRIENNE regains composure and starts to circle ARYA. BAELISH and SANSA are still watching from the upper balcony. ARYA is waiting for an attack with her sword behind her back. BRIENNE strikes and ARYA blocks her attacks, spins and stabs behind her back and hits BRIENNE in the knee causing BRIENNE's sword to strike the dirt. BRIENNE kicks ARYA in the stomach and sends ARYA to the ground. ARYA quickly gets back to her feet. BRIENNE overpowers ARYA and ARYA drops her sword on the ground. BRIENNE strikes again but ARYA dodges, draws her Valyrian dagger and puts it near BRIENNE's neck. BRIENNE and ARYA both stop fighting and sheathe their weapons smiling.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: brienne
text: brienne Who taught you to do that?

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: arya
text: arya No one.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: arya
text: arya collects her sword. SANSA walks away. BAELISH remains on the balcony staring at ARYA who looks up at him. BAELISH bows to ARYA and walks away.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: jon
text: jon and DAVOS are walking along the paths outside of Dragonstone having a discussion.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: davos
text: davos What do you think of her?

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: jon
text: jon Who?

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: davos
text: davos sighs

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: davos
text: davos I believe you know of whom I speak.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: jon
text: jon I think she has a good heart.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: davos
text: davos A good heart? I've noticed you starring at that good heart.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: jon
text: jon There's no time for that. I saw the Night King, Davos. I looked into his eyes. How many men do we have in the north to fight him? 10,000? Less?

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: davos
text: davos Fewer.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: jon
text: jon What?

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: davos
text: davos and JON near the end of the path. MISSANDEI is standing along the path looking at the ocean.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: davos
text: davos Speaking of good hearts, Missandei of Naarth.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: missandei
text: missandei turns to looks at DAVOS and JON.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: missandei
text: missandei Ser Davos, Lord Snow.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: davos
text: davos King Snow, isn't it? No? That doesn't sound right. King Jon?

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: jon
text: jon It doesn't matter.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: missandei
text: missandei Forgive me, but may I ask a question?

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: jon
text: jon Of course.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: missandei
text: missandei Your name is Jon Snow, but your father's name was Ned Stark?

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: jon
text: jon I'm a bastard. My mother and father weren't married.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: davos
text: davos Is the custom different in Naarth?

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: missandei
text: missandei We don't have marriage in Naarth so the concept of a bastard doesn't exist.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: davos
text: davos The sounds liberating.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: jon
text: jon Why did you leave your homeland?

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: missandei
text: missandei I was stolen away by slavers.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: jon
text: jon I'm sorry.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: davos
text: davos If I may, how did a slave girl come to advise Daenerys Targaryen?

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: missandei
text: missandei She bought me from my master and set me free.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: davos
text: davos That was good of her. Of course you're serving her now, aren't you?

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: missandei
text: missandei I serve my queen because I want to serve my queen. Because I believe in her.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: jon
text: jon And if you wanted to sail home to Naarth tomorrow --

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: missandei
text: missandei Then she would give me a ship and wish me good fortune.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: jon
text: jon You believe that?

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: missandei
text: missandei I know it. All of us who came with her from Essos, we believe in her. She's not our queen because she's the daughter of some king we never knew. She's the queen we chose.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: davos
text: davos You'll forgive me if I switch sides.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: jon
text: jon notices a single ship sailing into the bay. It has a kraken sigil. MISSANDEI turns to look.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: jon
text: jon Is that a Greyjoy ship?

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: theon
text: theon GREYJOY and other Iron Born are pulling their landing boat onto the beach wading through the surf. They pull the boat onto the sand. JON SNOW, MISSANDEI, DAVOS and Dothraki guards are waiting to meet them. JON sees THEON and both men freeze and stare at each other. JON steps forward towards THEON.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: theon
text: theon Jon. I didn't know you were here.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: theon
text: theon steps closer to JON.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: theon
text: theon Sansa, is she all right?

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: jon
text: jon grabs THEON by his shirt and pulls him face to face.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: jon
text: jon What you did for her is the only reason I'm not killing you.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: jon
text: jon releases THEON.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: davos
text: davos We heard your uncle attacked your fleet. We thought you were dead.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: theon
text: theon I should be.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: davos
text: davos Your sister?

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: theon
text: theon Euron has her. I came to ask the queen to help get her back.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: jon
text: jon The queen is gone.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: theon
text: theon Where did she go?

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: randyll
text: randyll All of the gold is safely through the gates of King's Landing.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: jaime
text: jaime Good.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: randyll
text: randyll We need to get the last of these wagons over the Blackwater Rush before nightfall. If the head of the line is ambushed, the tail will never be able to reinforce in time.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: jaime
text: jaime We are stretched a bit thin.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: randyll
text: randyll With your permission, flogging stragglers has a marked effect on mobility.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: jaime
text: jaime Let's give them fair warning first. These men fought well at Highgarden.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: randyll
text: randyll is clearly disappointed. He turns and rides off back to the line of soldiers. JAIME and BRONN exchange glances, then follow RANDYLL. BRONN and JAIME are riding through the ranks. DICKON TARLEY sees JAIME and starts a conversation.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: dickon
text: dickon Ser Jaime.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: jaime
text: jaime Rickon.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: dickon
text: dickon Dickon.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: bronn
text: bronn openly laughs in DICKON's face and looks at JAIME.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: jaime
text: jaime I hear you fought bravely at Highgarden. Your first battle?

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: dickon
text: dickon nods his head in agreement.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: jaime
text: jaime And?

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: dickon
text: dickon It was glorious.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: bronn
text: bronn Come on. Your father's not here.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: dickon
text: dickon All my life we've been pledged to House Tyrell. I knew some of those men. I hunted with them.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: jaime
text: jaime They didn't deserve to die. But Lady Olenna chose to betray the queen and support the Targaryen girl. So here we are.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: dickon
text: dickon I didn't expect it to smell like that.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: bronn
text: bronn Men shit themselves when they die. Didn't they teach you that at fancy lad school?

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: jaime
text: jaime looks over at BRONN

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: bronn
text: bronn Well, I learned it when I was 5.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: bronn
text: bronn pauses and strains to hear a noise far in the distance.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: jaime
text: jaime What?

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: bronn
text: bronn Listen.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: jaime
text: jaime Spears and shields! Spears and shields!

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: jaime
text: jaime Spears and shields!

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: bronn
text: bronn In line now!

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: randyll
text: randyll is riding across the battlefield yelling orders to men.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: randyll
text: randyll Come on, lads. Not those wagons. Fall in line. Fall in line.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: dickon
text: dickon draws his sword. RANDYLL is yelling orders to the men.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: randyll
text: randyll Spears armed!

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: bronn
text: bronn Get back to King's Landing.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: jaime
text: jaime I'm not abandoning my army.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: bronn
text: bronn You're a commander, not a damned infantryman. These fuckers are about to swamp us.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: jaime
text: jaime We can hold them off.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys Dracarys!

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: drogon
text: drogon breathes fire into the first line of Lannister soldiers. The men burst into flames and start screaming. DICKON looks on in shock. A flanking group of Dothraki Screamers ride over the flames through the hole created by Drogon and start cutting men down. JAIME attempts to issue orders to the men.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: jaime
text: jaime Hold the line!

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: jaime
text: jaime Archers! Archers with me!

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: jaime
text: jaime Knock!

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: archers
text: archers Knock! Draw!

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: drogon
text: drogon loops around and is making a pass on JAIME and the archers. DAENERYS and DROGON are diving at the group of men.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: jaime
text: jaime Loose!

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: jaime
text: jaime Qyburn's scorpion is over there.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: bronn
text: bronn Go get it then.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: jaime
text: jaime I can't shoot with one hand.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: jaime
text: jaime holds up his gold hand to illustrate his point.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: bronn
text: bronn hesitates for a moment. He turns his horse and rides to man the artillery crossbow. JAIME draws his sword and rides into battle.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: jaime
text: jaime Come on!

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: bronn
text: bronn Where are you?

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion walks to the edge of the battlefield accompanied by Dothraki guards. He can see Lannisters being slaughtered. One of the Dothraki guards begin to speak.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: guard
text: guard Your people can't fight.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion is watching the mayhem. Men are screaming and engulfed in flames. Horses and carriages run wild with no driver. JAIME is still on the battlefield struggling against the horde. Burning Lannister men are taking off their helmets revealing melted faces. Men crawl to the river in search of relief from the dragonfire. DROGON and DAENERYS are flying over the river creating wake in the water. JAIME sees her approaching his position.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: jaime
text: jaime Take cover!

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: drogon
text: drogon spits flames into the Lannister position. The men standing there are reduced to standing ash. The wind blows them away. BRONN is lining up DROGON in the sights of the crossbow. He reaches down and pulls the lever to fire. A bolt sails past DROGON and misses. BRONN reloads the machine. DROGON and DAENERYS circle around and dive on the crossbow. BRONN takes his time aiming his shot.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: bronn
text: bronn Come on you fucker.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys commands DROGON to fire at the crossbow.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion Flee, you idiot!

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: jaime
text: jaime looks at DAENERYS and readies himself. He spurs his horse onward.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: jaime
