text: jaime Come on, boy. Come on!

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: jaime
text: jaime grabs the spear as he rides by and brings it up to position. JAIME's horse is galloping full speed on the edge of the river kicking up water. TYRION is watching JAIME's attempt to kill DAENERYS.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion You fucking idiot.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: jaime
text: jaime is getting close. DAENERYS turns at the last moment to see JAIME bearing down on her spear in hand. DROGON notices JAIME, turns his head and spews flames. BRONN appears from nowhere and manages to dive off of his horse and knock JAIME and himself in the water before they're both consumed by fire. Their horses are instantly burned to death. JAIME is being dragged down by a full set of armor into the dark water. JAIME sinks into blackness and out of sight.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: end
text: end CREDITS

title: Eastwatch
Name: jaime
text: jaime You could have killed me.

title: Eastwatch
Name: bronn
text: bronn What the fuck were you doing back there?

title: Eastwatch
Name: jaime
text: jaime Ending the war by killing her.

title: Eastwatch
Name: bronn
text: bronn You saw the dragon between you and her?

title: Eastwatch
Name: bronn
text: bronn looks incredulously at JAIME.

title: Eastwatch
Name: bronn
text: bronn And?

title: Eastwatch
Name: jaime
text: jaime sits up and says nothing to BRONN. BRONN sits up and faces JAIME.

title: Eastwatch
Name: bronn
text: bronn Listen to me, cunt. Till I get what I'm owed, a dragon doesn't get to kill you. You don't get to kill you. Only I get to kill you.

title: Eastwatch
Name: jaime
text: jaime That was only one of them. She has two more. If she decides to use them, to really use them --

title: Eastwatch
Name: bronn
text: bronn You're fucked.

title: Eastwatch
Name: jaime
text: jaime Don't you mean we're fucked?

title: Eastwatch
Name: bronn
text: bronn No, I do not. Dragons are where our partnership ends. I'm not going to be around when those things start spitting fire on King's Landing.

title: Eastwatch
Name: jaime
text: jaime I have to tell Cersei.

title: Eastwatch
Name: bronn
text: bronn pauses and looks at JAIME.

title: Eastwatch
Name: bronn
text: bronn Best well jump back in that river.

title: Eastwatch
Name: bronn
text: bronn stands up and walks away. JAIME continues sitting on the shore looking at the smoke and fire from the distant battle.

title: Eastwatch
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion is walking over an ash covered ground. There are burned bodies and cargo strewn about. Dothraki are looting dead Lannister soldies. A group of mounted Dothraki are escorting captured Lannister soldiers to where DAENERYS and DROGON are awaiting the prisoners. DAENERYS addresses the captured soldiers.

title: Eastwatch
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys I know what Cersei has told you, that I've come to destroy your cities --

title: Eastwatch
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys burn down your homes, murder you and orphan your children. That's Cersei Lannister, not me. I'm not here to murder. And all I want to destroy is the wheel that is rolled over rich and poor to the benefit of no one but the Cersei Lannisters of the world. I offer you a choice. Bend the knee and join me. Together we will leave the world a better place than we found it, or refuse and die.

title: Eastwatch
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys Step forward, My Lord.

title: Eastwatch
Name: randyll
text: randyll takes several steps towards DAENERYS and stands in front of the kneeling Lannister men.

title: Eastwatch
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys You will not kneel?

title: Eastwatch
Name: randyll
text: randyll I already have a queen.

title: Eastwatch
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion My sister, she wasn't your queen until recently though, was she, until she murdered your rightful queen and destroyed House Tyrell for all time. So it appears your allegiances are somewhat flexible.

title: Eastwatch
Name: randyll
text: randyll There are no easy choices in war. Say what you will about your sister, she was born in Westeros, has lived here all her life. You on the other hand, you murdered your own father and chose to support a foreign invader. One with no ties to this land, an army of savages at her back.

title: Eastwatch
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys You will not trade your honor for your life. I respect that.

title: Eastwatch
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion turns to speak to DAENERYS.

title: Eastwatch
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion Perhaps he could take the black, Your Grace. Whatever else he is, he is a true soldier. He would be invaluable at the Wall.

title: Eastwatch
Name: randyll
text: randyll You cannot send me to the Wall. You are not my queen.

title: Eastwatch
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys turns to look at her Dothraki escort. The Dothraki walk forward to collect RANDYLL. As the men are pulling RANDYLL away DICKON steps forward.

title: Eastwatch
Name: dickon
text: dickon You will have to kill me too.

title: Eastwatch
Name: randyll
text: randyll pulls away from the Dothraki and turns to face his son.

title: Eastwatch
Name: randyll
text: randyll Step back and shut your mouth.

title: Eastwatch
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys Who are you?

title: Eastwatch
Name: randyll
text: randyll A stupid boy.

title: Eastwatch
Name: dickon
text: dickon I'm Dickon Tarley, son of Randyll Tarley.

title: Eastwatch
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion You are the future of your house. This war has already wiped one great house from the world. Don't let it happen again. Bend the knee.

title: Eastwatch
Name: dickon
text: dickon looks to RANDYLL. RANDYLL nods to his son.

title: Eastwatch
Name: dickon
text: dickon I will not.

title: Eastwatch
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion turns to speak to DAENERYS. He speaks softly so no one but the queen can hear.

title: Eastwatch
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion Your Grace, nothing strips bold notions from a man's head like a few weeks in a dark cell.

title: Eastwatch
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys I meant what I said. I'm not here to put men in chains. If that becomes an option many will take it. I gave them a choice. They made it.

title: Eastwatch
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion Your Grace, if you begin beheading entire families --

title: Eastwatch
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys I'm not beheading anyone.

title: Eastwatch
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion pauses and looks over the DROGON. DRGON roars and shakes his head and flexes his wings.

title: Eastwatch
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion Your Grace --

title: Eastwatch
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys looks to her Dothraki escort and gives a signal. The men grab RANDYLL and DICKON and walk them over to DROGON. RANDYLL takes DICKON by the arm.

title: Eastwatch
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys Lord Randyll Tarley, Dickon Tarley, I, Daenerys of House Targaryen, First of my name, Breaker of Chains and Mother of Dragons, sentence you to die.

title: Eastwatch
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys pauses a moment and looks at RANDYLL and DICKON.

title: Eastwatch
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys Dracarys.

title: Eastwatch
Name: drogon
text: drogon draws a deep breath and begins spewing dragonfire at the two men. They are instantly engulfed in flames. They both collapse into ash after a few seconds. There are two craters left where RANDYLL and DICKON stood. The Lannister men recoil in horror. Any Lannister soldier that was still standing kneels to the ground. DAENERYS silently turns and begins to walk off the battlefield.

title: Eastwatch
Name: jaime
text: jaime is quickly walking down the hall leading to CERSEI's room. As he approaches, QYBURN exits the queen's chambers.

title: Eastwatch
Name: qyburn
text: qyburn My Lord.

title: Eastwatch
Name: jaime
text: jaime passes by QYBURN without saying a word and barges into CERSEI's quarters. CERSEI stand and walks over to JAIME.

title: Eastwatch
Name: cersei
text: cersei How many men did we lose?

title: Eastwatch
Name: jaime
text: jaime We haven't done a full counting.

title: Eastwatch
Name: cersei
text: cersei It's armies that win wars. We have the Tyrell gold, we have the Iron Bank behind us. We can buy mercenaries.

title: Eastwatch
Name: jaime
text: jaime shakes his head.

title: Eastwatch
Name: cersei
text: cersei They're not the same as our men but they'll fight if they're well paid, which they will be.

title: Eastwatch
Name: jaime
text: jaime I just saw the Dothraki fight. They'll beat any mercenary army. They'll beat any army I've ever seen. Killing our men wasn't war for them, it was sport. Her dragon burned a thousand wagons. Qyburn's scorpion fired bolts bigger than you. They couldn't stop it. And she has three of them. This isn't a war we can win.

title: Eastwatch
Name: cersei
text: cersei So what do we do? Sue for peace? I sit on her father's throne, the father you betrayed and murdered. And in her mind she's winning. What sort of offer do you think she'd make?

title: Eastwatch
Name: cersei
text: cersei turns and walks away from JAIME.

title: Eastwatch
Name: cersei
text: cersei Maybe we can count on Tyrion to intercede on our behalf by way of apology for murdering our father and our son.

title: Eastwatch
Name: jaime
text: jaime He didn't.

title: Eastwatch
Name: cersei
text: cersei You saw the crossbow, you saw his body.

title: Eastwatch
Name: jaime
text: jaime walks across the room to where CERSEI is standing.

title: Eastwatch
Name: jaime
text: jaime I'm not talking about father. Tyrion didn't kill Joffrey. He had nothing to do with it.

title: Eastwatch
Name: cersei
text: cersei After all this time it still amazes me --

title: Eastwatch
Name: jaime
text: jaime It was Olenna. She confessed before she died.

title: Eastwatch
Name: cersei
text: cersei And this was before or after she drank the poison you so kindly provided her?

title: Eastwatch
Name: jaime
text: jaime After.

title: Eastwatch
Name: cersei
text: cersei And you believed her?

title: Eastwatch
Name: jaime
text: jaime If you were Olenna would you rather have seen your granddaughter married to Joffrey or Tommen? Which one would Margerey been better able to control? Which one would have made Olenna the true ruler of the Seven Kingdoms? She was telling the truth.

title: Eastwatch
Name: cersei
text: cersei looks away, then sits down.

title: Eastwatch
Name: cersei
text: cersei I shouldn't have listened to you. She should have died screaming.

title: Eastwatch
Name: jaime
text: jaime She's dead like her son, her grandchildren, her whole house. And if we don't find a way out of this war we'll follow them.

title: Eastwatch
Name: cersei
text: cersei So we fight and die or we submit and die. I know my choice. A soldier should know his.

title: Eastwatch
Name: jon
text: jon SNOW is standing on the edge of a cliff looking towards the ocean. DROGON roars and flies over him with DAENERYS on his back. DROGON lands next to JON and charges towards him. DROGON opens his jaws and roars in JON's face. DROGON creeps closer until he is inches from JON. JON removes his glove and slowly extends his hand toward DROGON. DROGON lowers his head and allows JON to touch him. DAENERYS looks surprised and steps down from her mount. DROGON turns and flies away.

title: Eastwatch
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys They're beautiful, aren't they?

title: Eastwatch
Name: jon
text: jon That wasn't the word I was thinking of, but, yes, they are. Gorgeous beasts.

title: Eastwatch
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys They're not beasts to me. No matter how big they get, how terrifying to everyone else, they're my children.

title: Eastwatch
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys turns to look at her three dragons as they fly over Dragonstone in the distance.

title: Eastwatch
Name: jon
text: jon You weren't gone long.

title: Eastwatch
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys turns back to JON.

title: Eastwatch
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys No.

title: Eastwatch
Name: jon
text: jon And?

title: Eastwatch
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys And I have fewer enemies today than I did yesterday.

title: Eastwatch
Name: jon
text: jon pauses and doesn't say anything.

title: Eastwatch
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys You're not sure how you feel about that?

title: Eastwatch
Name: jon
text: jon No, I'm not.

title: Eastwatch
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys turns and starts walking towards the castle, JON follows.

title: Eastwatch
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys How many men did your army kill taking Winterfell back from the Boltons?

title: Eastwatch
Name: jon
text: jon Thousands.

title: Eastwatch
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys We both want to help people. We can only help them from a position of strength. Sometimes strength is terrible. When you first came here Ser Davos said you took a knife in the heart for your people.

title: Eastwatch
Name: jon
text: jon Ser Davos gets carried away.

title: Eastwatch
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys So it was a figure of speech?

title: Eastwatch
Name: jon
text: jon doesn't say anything. A group of Dothraki guards approach DAENERYS and speak in their native tongue.

title: Eastwatch
Name: guard
text: guard This man says he is your friend, Khaleesi.

title: Eastwatch
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys He is my friend.

title: Eastwatch
Name: jorah
text: jorah kneels before DAENERYS.

title: Eastwatch
Name: jorah
text: jorah Your Grace.

title: Eastwatch
Name: jorah
text: jorah stands.

title: Eastwatch
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys Jon Snow, this is Ser Jorah Mormont, an old friend.

title: Eastwatch
Name: jon
text: jon I served with your father. He was a great man.

title: Eastwatch
Name: jorah
text: jorah nods to JON.

title: Eastwatch
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys You look strong. You found a cure?

title: Eastwatch
Name: jorah
text: jorah I wouldn't be here if I hadn't. I return to your service, my queen, if you'll have me.

title: Eastwatch
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys It would be my honor.

title: Eastwatch
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys steps forward and hugs JORAH.

title: Eastwatch
Name: bran
text: bran s eyes are pure white. They wash back to their normal color. He is sitting in front of the Weirwood. Maester Wolkan stands next to him.

title: Eastwatch
Name: bran
text: bran Ravens. We need to send ravens.

title: Eastwatch
Name: wolkan
text: wolkan nods his head to BRAN.

title: Eastwatch
Name: archmaester
text: archmaester MARWYN and other citadel maesters are seated at a council table. MARWYN has a raven scroll in his hand and the maesters are discussing the contents. SAMWELL enters the room carrying a large stock of books and scrolls. MARWYN points SAM to a nearby table to offload the books.

title: Eastwatch
Name: maester
text: maester I put very little stock in it myself. Prophecies of doom are never in short supply, especially when winter comes.

title: Eastwatch
Name: marwyn
text: marwyn I remember Wolkan. A bit timid but a sharp mind.

title: Eastwatch
Name: maester
text: maester The north has dulled many good maester's wits. I'm not sure if it's the cold, the drink, or the company.

title: Eastwatch
Name: maester
text: maester A crippled boy claims to have seen dead men on the march beyond the wall thanks to the magical help of a raven with three eyes.

title: Eastwatch
Name: sam
text: sam stops working and turns around.

title: Eastwatch
Name: marwyn
text: marwyn It is a bit much. Still we ought to --

title: Eastwatch
Name: sam
text: sam Brandon Stark --

title: Eastwatch
Name: sam
text: sam the crippled boy.

title: Eastwatch
Name: marwyn
text: marwyn Do you know him?

title: Eastwatch
Name: sam
text: sam I let him through the Wall years ago. I saw him go beyond the wall.

title: Eastwatch
Name: marwyn
text: marwyn And?

title: Eastwatch
Name: sam
text: sam Somehow a crippled boy survived for years beyond the wall when no one else could. Not the Night's Watch, not the Wildlings, no one. Perhaps we ought to listen to what he has to say.

title: Eastwatch
Name: maester
text: maester Perhaps you need more scribing work to discipline your mind.

title: Eastwatch
Name: marwyn
text: marwyn I sense a more detailed proposal is forthcoming.

title: Eastwatch
Name: sam
text: sam steps forward and clears his throat.

title: Eastwatch
Name: sam
text: sam Everyone in Westeros trusts and respects you. If you tell people the threat is real they'll believe it. If you advise all the lords to send their men north to hold the wall they'll do it. And if you tell every maester in the Citadel to search every word of every faded scroll about the long night, they may find something that lets us defeat the Army of the Dead for good.

title: Eastwatch
Name: marwyn
text: marwyn It could be done. And this news could be authentic. It's possible. It's also possible this message is part of a ploy by the dragon queen to lure southern armies away from the lands they are currently defending to open those lands to easy conquest.

title: Eastwatch
Name: maester
text: maester That does seem far more likely than magic birds talking to cripples.

title: Eastwatch
Name: sam
text: sam Archmaester, please. It's real. I've seen it.

title: Eastwatch
Name: marwyn
text: marwyn We will write to Maester Wolkan at Winterfell for clarification. I promise you we will get to the truth of it one way or another.

title: Eastwatch
Name: sam
text: sam Archmaester --

title: Eastwatch
Name: marwyn
text: marwyn That will be all, Tarley.

title: Eastwatch
Name: sam
text: sam turns to collect his work and leave. The maesters begin talking to one another.

title: Eastwatch
Name: maester
text: maester It brings to mind the work of Davy Moonstone, the charlatan who claimed to see the children of the forest.

title: Eastwatch
Name: maester
text: maester Don't forget the Prophet Lodock that promised the Drowned God would rise up and destroy Aegon the Conquerer.

title: Eastwatch
Name: maester
text: maester Is he the one whose father and brother were just burned alive?

title: Eastwatch
Name: marwyn
text: marwyn I'm afraid so.

title: Eastwatch
Name: maester
text: maester Horrible business.

title: Eastwatch
Name: marwyn
text: marwyn I don't have the heart to tell him yet. He's a good lad.

title: Eastwatch
Name: marwyn
text: marwyn crumples the raven scroll and throws it dismissevely on the table.

title: Eastwatch
Name: marwyn
text: marwyn Right. The ravenry was falling apart last time I checked...

title: Eastwatch
Name: varys
text: varys and TYRION are sitting on the stairs of the Throne Room alone. VARYS has a sealed raven scroll in his hand tapping it on the stone. TYRION is drinking a glass of wine having a discussion with VARYS.

title: Eastwatch
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion All rulers demand that people bend the knee. It's why they're rulers. She gave Tarley a choice. A man who had taken up arms against her. What else could she do?

title: Eastwatch
Name: varys
text: varys Not burn him alive alongside his son.

title: Eastwatch
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion I am her hand, not her head. I can't make her decisions for her.

title: Eastwatch
Name: varys
text: varys That's what I used to tell myself about her father. I found the traitors but I wasn't the one burning them alive. I was only a purveyor of information.

title: Eastwatch
Name: varys
text: varys reaches over to TYRION's cup of wine, picks it up and begins to drink from it. He grimaces as he drinks.

title: Eastwatch
Name: varys
text: varys It's what I told myself when I watched them beg for mercy, "I'm not the one doing it." As the pitch of their screams rose higher, "I'm not the one doing it." When their hair caught fire and the smell of the burning flesh filled the Thone Room, "I'm not the one doing it."

title: Eastwatch
Name: varys
text: varys drinks again and sets the cup down next to TYRION. TYRION picks it up.

title: Eastwatch
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion Daenerys is not her father.

title: Eastwatch
Name: varys
text: varys And she never will be... with the right counsel. You need to find a way to make her listen.

title: Eastwatch
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion looks down at the note in VARYS's hand.

title: Eastwatch
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion Who is that for?

title: Eastwatch
Name: varys
text: varys Jon Snow.

title: Eastwatch
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion Did you read it?

title: Eastwatch
Name: varys
text: varys It's a sealed scroll for the King in the North.

title: Eastwatch
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion pauses and drinks from his cup of wine.

title: Eastwatch
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion What's it say?

title: Eastwatch
Name: varys
text: varys Nothing good.

title: Eastwatch
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys and VARYS are seated at the painted table. TYRION and JORAH stand near the queen. DAVOS and JON SNOW are standing on the other end of the table. JON is holding a raven scroll and reading it.

title: Eastwatch
Name: jon
text: jon I thought Arya was dead. I thought Bran was dead.

title: Eastwatch
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys I'm happy for you. You don't look happy.

title: Eastwatch
Name: jon
text: jon Bran saw the Night King and his army marching towards Eastwatch. If they make it past the wall --

title: Eastwatch
Name: varys
text: varys The Wall has kept them out for thousands of years. Presumably --

title: Eastwatch
Name: jon
text: jon interrupts VARYS.

title: Eastwatch
Name: jon
text: jon I need to go home.

title: Eastwatch
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys You said you don't have enough men.

title: Eastwatch
Name: jon
text: jon We'll fight with the men we have. Unless you'll join us.

title: Eastwatch
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys And give the country to Cersei? As soon as I march away she marches in.

title: Eastwatch
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion Perhaps not. Cersei thinks the Army of the Dead is nothing but a story made up by wet nurses to frighten children. What if we prove her wrong?

title: Eastwatch
Name: jon
text: jon I don't think she'll come see the dead at my invitation.

title: Eastwatch
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion begins walking around the table closer to JON.

title: Eastwatch
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion So bring the dead to her.

title: Eastwatch
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys I thought that was what we are trying to avoid.

title: Eastwatch
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion We don't have to bring the whole army. Only one soldier.

title: Eastwatch
Name: davos
text: davos Is that possible?

title: Eastwatch
Name: jon
text: jon The first White I ever saw was brought into Castle Black from beyond the Wall.

title: Eastwatch
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion Bring one of these things down to King's Landing and show her the truth.

title: Eastwatch
Name: varys
text: varys Anything you bring back will be useless unless Cersei grants us an audience and is somehow convinced not to murder us the moment we set foot in the capital.

title: Eastwatch
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion The only person she listens to is Jaime. He may listen to me.

title: Eastwatch
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys And how would you get into King's Landing.

title: Eastwatch
Name: davos
text: davos I can smuggle you in, but if the Goldcloaks were to recognize you, I'm warning you, I'm not a fighter.

title: Eastwatch
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion nods his head.

title: Eastwatch
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys Well, it will all be for nothing if we don't have one of these dead men.

title: Eastwatch
Name: varys
text: varys Fair point. How do you propose to find one?

title: Eastwatch
Name: jon
text: jon pauses and stares at the ground. JORAH breaks the silence.

title: Eastwatch
Name: jorah
text: jorah With the queen's permission I'll go north and take one.

title: Eastwatch
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys turns to look at JORAH.

title: Eastwatch
Name: jorah
text: jorah You asked me to find a cure so I could serve you. Allow me to serve you.

title: Eastwatch
Name: jon
text: jon The free folk will help us. They know the real north better than anyone.

title: Eastwatch
Name: davos
text: davos They won't follow Ser Jorah.

title: Eastwatch
Name: jon
text: jon They won't have to.

title: Eastwatch
Name: davos
text: davos You can't lead a raid beyond the wall. You're not in the Night's Watch anymore. You're King in the North.

title: Eastwatch
Name: jon
text: jon I'm the only one here whose fought them. I'm the only one here who knows them.

title: Eastwatch
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys I haven't given you permission to leave.

title: Eastwatch
Name: jon
text: jon With respect, Your Grace, I don't need your permission. I am a king. And I came here knowing that you could have your men behead me or your dragons burn me alive. I put my trust in you, a stranger, because I knew it was the best chance for my people, for all our people. Now I'm asking you to trust in a stranger because it's our best chance.

title: Eastwatch
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys pauses for a moment then nods her head in agreement.

title: Eastwatch
Name: robett
text: robett The King in the North should stay in the north. We did not choose you to rule us, My Lady, but perhaps we should have.

title: Eastwatch
Name: yohn
text: yohn The Knights of the Vale came here for you, Lady Stark.

title: Eastwatch
Name: sansa
text: sansa You're very kind, my lords, but Jon is our king. He is doing what he thinks is best.

title: Eastwatch
Name: sansa
text: sansa and ARYA are walking through the hall to SANSA's quarters having a discussion.

title: Eastwatch
Name: sansa
text: sansa I warned Jon this would happen. He can't leave the north and expect it to just sit and wait for him like Ghost.

title: Eastwatch
Name: arya
text: arya He didn't. He trusted you to hold it for him.

title: Eastwatch
Name: sansa
text: sansa Well, he's not making it easy. The northern lords are proud.

title: Eastwatch
Name: arya
text: arya These are mother and father's chambers.

title: Eastwatch
Name: sansa
text: sansa And?

title: Eastwatch
Name: arya
text: arya Nothing.

title: Eastwatch
Name: sansa
text: sansa Don't do that.

title: Eastwatch
Name: sansa
text: sansa turns around to face ARYA.

title: Eastwatch
Name: arya
text: arya What?

title: Eastwatch
Name: sansa
text: sansa Say what you mean.

title: Eastwatch
Name: arya
text: arya You always liked nice things. It made you feel better than everyone.

title: Eastwatch
Name: sansa
text: sansa drops the papers in her hand on a table and looks at ARYA.

title: Eastwatch
Name: sansa
text: sansa Are you angry with me?

title: Eastwatch
Name: arya
text: arya They were insulting Jon and you sat there and listened.

title: Eastwatch
Name: sansa
text: sansa I listened to their complaints, which is my responsibility as Lady of Winterfell.

title: Eastwatch
Name: arya
text: arya Their opinions are important to you?

title: Eastwatch
Name: sansa
text: sansa Glover has 500 men. Royce has 2,000. Offend them and Jon loses his army.

title: Eastwatch
Name: arya
text: arya Not if they lose their heads first.

title: Eastwatch
Name: sansa
text: sansa Winterfell didn't just fall into our hands. We took it back, and the Mormonts and the Hornwoods and the Wildlings and the Vale, all of us working together. Now, I'm sure cutting off heads is very satisfying, but that's not the way you get people to work together.

title: Eastwatch
Name: arya
text: arya And if Jon doesn't come back, you'll need their support, so you can work together to give you what you really want.

title: Eastwatch
Name: sansa
text: sansa How can you even think such a horrible thing?

title: Eastwatch
Name: arya
text: arya You're thinking it right now. You don't want to be, but the thought just won't go away.

title: Eastwatch
Name: sansa
text: sansa and ARYA stare at each in silence for a moment.

title: Eastwatch
Name: sansa
text: sansa I have work to do.

title: Eastwatch
Name: sansa
text: sansa turns and walks away from ARYA.

title: Eastwatch
Name: arya
text: arya My lady.

title: Eastwatch
Name: arya
text: arya exits the room.

title: Eastwatch
Name: davos
text: davos and TYRION are standing on the beach of King's Landing. DAVOS is securing a small row boat. TYRION is looking up towards the city walls.

title: Eastwatch
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion Last time I was here I killed my father with a crossbow.

title: Eastwatch
Name: davos
text: davos Last time I was here you killed my son with wildfire.

title: Eastwatch
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion turns to look at DAVOS. DAVOS walks next to TYRION and stakes the boat anchor into the sand.

title: Eastwatch
Name: davos
text: davos There's a path to the left that hugs the cliff. The guards hardly ever patrol it. Too many steps.

title: Eastwatch
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion begins walking towards the path. DAVOS follows him and quickly takes the lead. TYRION stops and looks back towards the unattended boat.

title: Eastwatch
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion You're not staying here?

title: Eastwatch
Name: davos
text: davos I've got my own business in Flea Bottom.

title: Eastwatch
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion What if someone takes the boat?

title: Eastwatch
Name: davos
text: davos Then we're fucked. Best hurry.

title: Eastwatch
Name: bronn
text: bronn and JAIME are walking by the dragon skulls. Both men have sparring swords in their hand.

title: Eastwatch
Name: jaime
text: jaime We don't have time for this. We should be preparing the city for a siege. The Dothraki are coming.

title: Eastwatch
Name: bronn
text: bronn All the more reason for you to train. Unless you plan on fighting Dothraki 12 year olds.

title: Eastwatch
Name: jaime
text: jaime I seem to recall them giving you a bit of trouble as well.

title: Eastwatch
Name: bronn
text: bronn And here I am ready to train.

title: Eastwatch
Name: jaime
text: jaime Why down here?

title: Eastwatch
Name: bronn
text: bronn I don't think you want people to see how you look swinging that thing yet.

title: Eastwatch
Name: jaime
text: jaime Today might be the day I kill you by accident.

title: Eastwatch
Name: bronn
text: bronn Oh, you won't be swinging it at me.

title: Eastwatch
Name: bronn
text: bronn stops walking and holds his torch out. TYRION steps from around a pillar and looks at JAIME. JAIME looks angrily at BRONN.

title: Eastwatch
Name: bronn
text: bronn I'll leave you to it.

title: Eastwatch
Name: bronn
text: bronn turns and walks away leaving JAIME and TYRION alone.

title: Eastwatch
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion I needed to see you and I knew you'd never agree to meet.

title: Eastwatch
Name: jaime
text: jaime remains silent and stares at TYRION.

title: Eastwatch
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion You made me look like a complete fool. I thought I'd surprise you by hitting Casterly Rock, but you were three steps ahead of me. You abandoned the family home. Completely unsentimental. Father would have been proud.

title: Eastwatch
Name: jaime
text: jaime Don't talk about our father.

title: Eastwatch
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion Listen to me --

title: Eastwatch
Name: jaime
text: jaime I once told Bronn that if I ever saw you again I'd cut you in half.

title: Eastwatch
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion glances down at the sword in JAIME's hand.

title: Eastwatch
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion It would take you awhile with a sparring sword.

title: Eastwatch
Name: jaime
text: jaime shakes his head and says nothing.

title: Eastwatch
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion He was going to execute me. He knew I was innocent. He didn't hate me because of anything I did, he hated me because of what I am. The little monster sent to punish him. Do you think I wanted to be born this way? Did he think I chose --

title: Eastwatch
Name: jaime
text: jaime What do you want?

title: Eastwatch
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion Daenerys will win this war. You're a military man. You must know there is no way around it. Daenerys is not her father. She's even willing to suspend hostilities if Cersei agrees to certain terms.

title: Eastwatch
Name: jaime
text: jaime You want Cersei to bend the knee you can ask her yourself.

title: Eastwatch
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion I -- I don't. Daenerys doesn't. Not right now anyway. She has a more important request.

title: Eastwatch
Name: davos
text: davos I wasn't sure I'd find you.

title: Eastwatch
Name: davos
text: davos I thought you might still be rowing.

title: Eastwatch
Name: gendry
text: gendry chuckles and DAVOS smiles.

title: Eastwatch
Name: davos
text: davos I looked in shops, taverns, brothels. I should have known to come straight to the Street of Steel.

title: Eastwatch
Name: gendry
text: gendry Weren't you worried about the Goldcloaks?

title: Eastwatch
Name: davos
text: davos I haven't been here in years. Why should they recognize me? Sometimes I hardly do. Nothing fucks you harder than time.

title: Eastwatch
Name: davos
text: davos walks to the side of the shop and inspects a rack of swords. He pulls one, nods in approval and puts it back in its place. He turns back to GENDRY.

title: Eastwatch
Name: davos
text: davos Anybody give you any trouble?

title: Eastwatch
Name: gendry
text: gendry Here I am arming Lannisters. I never get a second look. You were right. Safest place for me was right under the queen's nose.

title: Eastwatch
Name: davos
text: davos Don't be so sure. Safety is never a permanent state of affairs. Bad things are coming.

title: Eastwatch
Name: gendry
text: gendry nods.

title: Eastwatch
Name: gendry
text: gendry You came to get me. You want me to come with you.

title: Eastwatch
Name: davos
text: davos I think you need to understand --

title: Eastwatch
Name: gendry
text: gendry I'm ready. Let's go.

title: Eastwatch
Name: davos
text: davos You should know what you're heading into.

title: Eastwatch
Name: gendry
text: gendry Don't you think I've been thinking about it every swing of the hammer... how happy I am making weapons for the family that killed my father? They tried to kill me.

title: Eastwatch
Name: gendry
text: gendry is tossing his tools and apron to the side. He picks up a satchel and swings it over his head.

title: Eastwatch
Name: gendry
text: gendry I've been getting ready. I never knew what for, but I've always known I'd know it when it comes.

title: Eastwatch
Name: davos
text: davos You might want to bring one of those swords.

title: Eastwatch
Name: gendry
text: gendry smiles at DAVOS and begins walking towards the weapons.

title: Eastwatch
Name: gendry
text: gendry I don't know much about swinging swords, but this --

title: Eastwatch
Name: gendry
text: gendry removes a giant war hammer from the wall.

title: Eastwatch
Name: gendry
text: gendry this I know.

title: Eastwatch
Name: gendry
text: gendry and DAVOS turn and walk out of the shop.

title: Eastwatch
Name: davos
text: davos and GENDRY are walking towards the boat DAVOS left on the beach.

title: Eastwatch
Name: davos
text: davos Keep your father's name to yourself. The situation is complicated enough already.

title: Eastwatch
Name: gendry
text: gendry and DAVOS arrive at the boat. GENDRY lays his hammer on top of the boat cargo. DAVOS is gathering the anchor and rope. Two Goldcloaks begin walking down the beach towards the boat unnoticed by DAVOS and GENDRY.

title: Eastwatch
Name: gendry
text: gendry Who should I say I am?

title: Eastwatch
Name: davos
text: davos turns and notices the two guards approaching the boat. He turns and loudly addresses GENDRY.

title: Eastwatch
Name: davos
text: davos I told you, Clovis, if we don't get out of here soon someone is going to --

title: Eastwatch
Name: guard
text: guard You there.

title: Eastwatch
Name: davos
text: davos No weapons, friends. I promise. What can I do for you?

title: Eastwatch
Name: guard
text: guard Is that your boat?

title: Eastwatch
Name: davos
text: davos It is.

title: Eastwatch
Name: gendry
text: gendry looks down into the boat and sees his weapon in plain view.

title: Eastwatch
Name: guard
text: guard The docks are that way.

title: Eastwatch
Name: gendry
text: gendry That they are. I try to stay away from them to avoid good men such as yourselves.

title: Eastwatch
Name: davos
text: davos Still five gold dragons?

title: Eastwatch
Name: guard
text: guard Are you joking?

title: Eastwatch
Name: guard
text: guard You must be even older than you look. 15.

title: Eastwatch
Name: davos
text: davos 15?

title: Eastwatch
Name: guard
text: guard Apiece.

title: Eastwatch
Name: davos
text: davos angrily reaches into his pouch and pays the men.

title: Eastwatch
Name: davos
text: davos I can't say it was a pleasure doing business with you.

title: Eastwatch
Name: davos
text: davos turns and begins walking back to his boat.

title: Eastwatch
Name: guard
text: guard What's in the boat?

title: Eastwatch
Name: davos
text: davos pauses and turns back to the guards.

title: Eastwatch
Name: davos
text: davos Not more gold.

title: Eastwatch
Name: guard
text: guard Wine?

title: Eastwatch
Name: guard
text: guard Mmm.

title: Eastwatch
Name: guard
text: guard I like wine.

title: Eastwatch
Name: guard
text: guard Or hams.

title: Eastwatch
Name: davos
text: davos Come and have a look.

title: Eastwatch
Name: davos
text: davos Fermented crab.

title: Eastwatch
Name: guard
text: guard What?

title: Eastwatch
Name: davos
text: davos Fermented crab. One bucket of this triples the brothel's earnings for the week. A man thinks he's done, he's ready to go back to his loving family, but before he gets his britches up his lady of the hour pops a tiny spoon of that into his mouth. Five minutes later, he's back in the race. Here, have a taste.

title: Eastwatch
Name: davos
text: davos scoops up a bit of fermented crab and offers it to the guards. Both men reach out and take a pinch. The guards sniff the crab and put it in their mouth. They both recoil from the taste and look at each other.

title: Eastwatch
Name: davos
text: davos I'd hurry to your favorite establishment or you'll put a whole in that chainmail.

title: Eastwatch
Name: guard
text: guard Oi, Dwarf!

title: Eastwatch
Name: davos
text: davos quickly walks to cut the guards off.

title: Eastwatch
Name: davos
text: davos I really wouldn't try anymore until you see how the first bite hits you.

title: Eastwatch
Name: guard
text: guard That dwarf --

title: Eastwatch
Name: guard
text: guard Where did you get that scar?

title: Eastwatch
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion Fish hook. Some men you just can't teach.

title: Eastwatch
Name: guard
text: guard We was looking for a dwarf with a scar like that awhile back.

title: Eastwatch
Name: davos
text: davos is still standing behind the guards. He retrieves his gold pouch again and holds it up shaking it.

title: Eastwatch
Name: davos
text: davos Perhaps there's some arrangement?

title: Eastwatch
Name: guard
text: guard Arrangement? You gonna arrange to pay us more than Queen Cersei?

title: Eastwatch
Name: gendry
text: gendry can be seen behind the backs of the guards. He slowly retrieves his hammer and creeps up behind GUARD 2. He swings his hammer and connects with the side of the guardo s head. The man drops. As GENDRY transitions onto the second guard and swings his hammer, GUARD 1 turns to look and catches a hammer blow to the face.

title: Eastwatch
Name: davos
text: davos is looking at TYRION and motions towards GENDRY.

title: Eastwatch
Name: davos
text: davos This is Gendry.

title: Eastwatch
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion He'll do.

title: Eastwatch
Name: jaime
text: jaime opens the door and step into the queen's room. CERSEI is seated near a window speaking to QYBURN.

title: Eastwatch
Name: cersei
text: cersei That won't be necessary.

title: Eastwatch
Name: qyburn
text: qyburn bows his head and walks to leave the room. As he passes by JAIME he addresses him.

title: Eastwatch
Name: qyburn
text: qyburn Ser Jaime.

title: Eastwatch
Name: qyburn
text: qyburn closes the door as he leaves. JAIME and CERSEI are alone. CERSEI begins walking over to a chair in front of JAIME and sits.

title: Eastwatch
Name: jaime
text: jaime Why was QYBURN here?

title: Eastwatch
Name: cersei
text: cersei He's Hand of the Queen. Why are you here?

title: Eastwatch
Name: jaime
text: jaime I met with Tyrion.

title: Eastwatch
Name: cersei
text: cersei pauses for a moment making JAIME uncomfortable.

title: Eastwatch
Name: cersei
text: cersei What did our brother have to say?

title: Eastwatch
Name: jaime
text: jaime Daenerys wants to meet.

title: Eastwatch
Name: cersei
text: cersei To discuss a surrender?

title: Eastwatch
Name: jaime
text: jaime To discuss an armistice.

title: Eastwatch
Name: cersei
text: cersei She just won a great victory. Why would she want a truce now?

title: Eastwatch
Name: jaime
text: jaime Because an army of dead men is marching on the Seven Kingdoms. Tyrion claims he'll have proof.

title: Eastwatch
Name: cersei
text: cersei smirks and looks away from JAIME.

title: Eastwatch
Name: cersei
text: cersei Are you going to punish him?

title: Eastwatch
Name: jaime
text: jaime Tyrion?

title: Eastwatch
Name: cersei
text: cersei Bronn.

title: Eastwatch
Name: jaime
text: jaime looks confused.

title: Eastwatch
Name: cersei
text: cersei He betrayed you. He set up a meeting without your knowledge or consent. Do you think anything of importance happens in this city without me knowing?

title: Eastwatch
Name: jaime
text: jaime You let it happen. Why?

title: Eastwatch
Name: cersei
text: cersei I've come to believe that accomodation with the Dragon Queen could be in our immediate interest. She has the numbers. If we want to beat her we have to be clever. We have to fight her like father would have. Dead men, dragons and Dragon Queens, whatever stands in our way we will defeat it ourselves for our house. For this.

title: Eastwatch
Name: cersei
text: cersei lifts her hands from the chair and places them both on her stomach indicating she's pregnant. JAIME looks shocked.

title: Eastwatch
Name: jaime
text: jaime Who will you say is the father?

title: Eastwatch
Name: cersei
text: cersei You.

title: Eastwatch
Name: jaime
text: jaime People won't like that.

title: Eastwatch
Name: cersei
text: cersei stands from her chair and walks in front of JAIME.

title: Eastwatch
Name: cersei
text: cersei Do you remember what father used to say about people?

title: Eastwatch
Name: jaime
text: jaime The lion doesn't concern himself with the opinions of the sheep.

title: Eastwatch
Name: jaime
text: jaime reaches forward and takes CERSEI and kisses her. While they embrace CERSEI speaks to JAIME.

title: Eastwatch
Name: cersei
text: cersei Never betray me again.

title: Eastwatch
Name: gendry
text: gendry and DAVOS are walking down the beach near the Dragonglass cave. Groups of men are carrying boxes filled with Dragonglass out of the cave. DAVOS and GENDRY are having a discussion.

title: Eastwatch
Name: davos
text: davos We're leaving today. The king's got a lot on his mind.

title: Eastwatch
Name: gendry
text: gendry I understand.

title: Eastwatch
Name: davos
text: davos He doesn't need to be thinking about harboring the bastard of a dead king.

title: Eastwatch
Name: gendry
text: gendry You don't have to worry.

title: Eastwatch
Name: davos
text: davos You're just Clovis, a smith who's come to pay his respects before he heads off to work at the Winterfell forges.

title: Eastwatch
Name: gendry
text: gendry Understood.

title: Eastwatch
Name: davos
text: davos and GENDRY enter the mouth of the cave. JON is walking along the corridor.

title: Eastwatch
Name: davos
text: davos Begging your pardon, Your Grace.

title: Eastwatch
Name: jon
text: jon stops and turns around to face DAVOS.

title: Eastwatch
Name: jon
text: jon You survived King's Landing.

title: Eastwatch
Name: davos
text: davos Yet again.

title: Eastwatch
Name: jon
text: jon Your Grace, this is --

title: Eastwatch
Name: gendry
text: gendry steps forward in front of DAVOS.

title: Eastwatch
Name: gendry
text: gendry It's Gendry, Your Grace. I'm Robert Baratheon's son. Bastard son.

title: Eastwatch
Name: jon
text: jon looks to DAVOS.

title: Eastwatch
Name: davos
text: davos He was meant to keep that to himself.

title: Eastwatch
Name: gendry
text: gendry Our fathers trusted each other. Why shouldn't we?

title: Eastwatch
Name: jon
text: jon I saw your father once at Winterfell.

title: Eastwatch
Name: gendry
text: gendry I met yours in my shop.

title: Eastwatch
Name: jon
text: jon You're a lot leaner.

title: Eastwatch
Name: gendry
text: gendry You're a lot shorter.

title: Eastwatch
Name: jon
text: jon stops smiling and pauses a moment. Then he chuckles.

title: Eastwatch
Name: jon
text: jon I grew up on stories about them.

title: Eastwatch
Name: gendry
text: gendry All I ever knew was they fought together and won. Ser Davos told me where you're going, Your Grace, and why. Let me come with you.

title: Eastwatch
Name: davos
text: davos Don't be a fool. You're not a soldier.

title: Eastwatch
Name: gendry
text: gendry No, but I'm a fighter. And he won't be needing a smith with a sword like that.

title: Eastwatch
Name: jon
text: jon Do you know how to use one?

title: Eastwatch
Name: gendry
text: gendry shakes his head.

title: Eastwatch
Name: jon
text: jon Well, that's a problem.

title: Eastwatch
Name: gendry
text: gendry I prefer a hammer.

title: Eastwatch
Name: gendry
text: gendry looks to DAVOS.

title: Eastwatch
Name: davos
text: davos He can handle himself.

title: Eastwatch
Name: jon
text: jon nods.

title: Eastwatch
Name: jon
text: jon We could use the help.

title: Eastwatch
Name: davos
text: davos As my father used to say, it's better to be a coward for a minute than dead for the rest of your life.

title: Eastwatch
Name: gendry
text: gendry I owe you my life. Twice over. But if what you said is true about what's out there, I can't wait out this war.

title: Eastwatch
Name: davos
text: davos Yeah. Nobody mind me. All I've ever done is live to a ripe old age.

title: Eastwatch
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion You may not believe it, but I've missed you Mormont. Nobody glowers quite like you. Not even Grey Worm.

title: Eastwatch
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion retrieves a gold coin from his pocket and turns it in his hands.

title: Eastwatch
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion This is the coin the slaver gave me when I suggested he free us and pay us. Remember?

title: Eastwatch
Name: jorah
text: jorah It was supposed to last us the rest of our lives.

title: Eastwatch
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion smiles and hands the coin to JORAH.

title: Eastwatch
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion Take it with you. You'll bring it back. Our queen needs you.

title: Eastwatch
Name: jorah
text: jorah nods to TYRION. DAENERYS appears and walks up to JORAH.

title: Eastwatch
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys We should be better at saying farewell by now.

title: Eastwatch
Name: jorah
text: jorah Your Grace, I --

title: Eastwatch
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys reaches forward and takes JORAH by his hands. JON SNOW, DAVOS and GENDRY exit the cave and walk towards the boats. JORAH bends and kisses DAENERY's hand. He turns and continues readying the boat. JON stands in front of DAENERYS.

title: Eastwatch
Name: jon
text: jon If I don't return at least you won't have to deal with the King in the North anymore.

title: Eastwatch
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys smiles.

title: Eastwatch
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys But I've grown used to him.

title: Eastwatch
Name: jon
text: jon I wish you good fortune in the wars to come, Your Grace.

title: Eastwatch
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys nods to JON. JON turns and walks to the head of the boat. The men take hold of it.

title: Eastwatch
Name: jon
text: jon Heave!

title: Eastwatch
Name: sam
text: sam is seated at a table surround by papers and candles. He is writing notes into a book. Gilly is seated across from him reading aloud from a tome. SAM JR. is playing on the bed.

title: Eastwatch
Name: gilly
text: gilly Do you know how many steps there are in the Citadel?

title: Eastwatch
Name: sam
text: sam No.

title: Eastwatch
Name: gilly
text: gilly 15,782.

title: Eastwatch
Name: sam
text: sam looks up from his work annoyed. He remains silent and continues working.

title: Eastwatch
Name: gilly
text: gilly Guess how many windows are in the Great Sept of Baelor.

title: Eastwatch
Name: sam
text: sam looks away and pauses.

title: Eastwatch
Name: sam
text: sam None anymore.

title: Eastwatch
Name: gilly
text: gilly That's true. This High Septon Meynard, he recorded everything. He even recorded his own bowel movements. What does "annulment" mean?

title: Eastwatch
Name: sam
text: sam It's when a man sets asside his lawful wife.

title: Eastwatch
Name: gilly
text: gilly Meynard says here that he issued an anullment for Prince Rhaegar and remarried him to someone else at the same time in a secret ceremony in Dorne. Is that a common thing --

title: Eastwatch
Name: sam
text: sam isn't paying much attention to GILLY. He loudly interrupts her.

title: Eastwatch
Name: sam
text: sam These maesters, they set me to the task of preserving that man's window counting and anullments and bowel movements for all eternity while the secret to defeating the Night King's probably sitting on some dusty shelf somewhere completely ignored. But that's all right, isn't it. We could all become slavering, murderous imbecils enthralled to evil incarnate as long as we can have access to the full records of High Septon Meynardo s 15,782 shits.

title: Eastwatch
Name: gilly
text: gilly Steps. That number was steps.

title: Eastwatch
Name: sam
text: sam is dismayed. He sets his quill down and grabs the book he was writing in and hands it to SAM Jr. He retrieves his cloak and walks out the door.

title: Eastwatch
Name: sam
text: sam is walking through a dark library. He heads to the restricted section and unlocks the barred gate. He begins removing books and scrolls from shelfs and stuff them in his satchel. After retrieving what he needs, SAM quickly walks to the exit of the library. He pauses before he leaves and turns around. He glances back at the library. It is many stories tall lined with countless shelves of books. SAMWELL looks at the library one last time, turns and walks out of the door.

title: Eastwatch
Name: sam
text: sam is loading a wagon with his things. He walks around to the driver seat. GILLY and SAM JR. are already in the wagon dressed for the road. SAM climbs aboard and takes the reins in his hand.

title: Eastwatch
Name: gilly
text: gilly Are you sure you want to do this? You always wanted to be a maester.

title: Eastwatch
Name: sam
text: sam I'm tired of reading about the achievements of better men.

title: Eastwatch
Name: arya
text: arya is in the kennels observing PETER BAELISH and a Winterfell servant having a conversation. The servent is whispering in BAELISH's ear. ARYA can't hear the conversation. ARYA sees BAELISH hand the servant a raven scroll. The servant turns to leave. BAELISH senses someone is watching him and he looks to where ARYA stood but she has already vanished. BAELISH turns and leaves the kennels.

title: Eastwatch
Name: arya
text: arya is on the upper level looking down at BAELISH. He is having a conversation with ROBETT GLOVER and YOHN ROYCE. She can't hear what's being said. BAELISH finishes his conversation and walks away from the men. ARYA disappears behind the corner and continues following BAELISH.

title: Eastwatch
Name: arya
text: arya is walking down the hallway. She pauses, peers around a corner and looks towards the door of BAELISH's quarters. BAELISH appears and unlocks his door. Before he walks in MAESTER WOLKAN approaches him. She continues watching the men.

title: Eastwatch
Name: wolkan
text: wolkan I found it, my Lord.

title: Eastwatch
Name: wolkan
text: wolkan hands BAELISH a raven scroll.

title: Eastwatch
Name: wolkan
text: wolkan It took some searching. Maester Llewyn's archives are thorough.

title: Eastwatch
Name: petyr
text: petyr reads the note then looks at WOLKAN.

title: Eastwatch
Name: petyr
text: petyr Are you sure this is the only copy at Winterfell?

title: Eastwatch
Name: wolkan
text: wolkan Yes, my Lord.

title: Eastwatch
Name: petyr
text: petyr Lady Stark thanks you for your service.

title: Eastwatch
Name: wolkan
text: wolkan turns and walks away. BAELISH enters his room and shuts the door. ARYA continues watching. A moment later BAELISH opens the door and exits the room, locking the door as he leaves. After he is gone ARYA walks to the door and produces a lockpick from her sleeve. She enters the room and begins searching for the raven scroll. She opens a cabinet but finds nothing of value. She checks another cabinet, then looks in the fireplace and above the mantle finding nothing. She lifts up the mattress and finds a small hole cut into the bedding. She reaches in and retrives the raven scroll. She unrolls it and reads the contents.

title: Eastwatch
Name: jon
text: jon and the raiding party land on the Beach of Eastwatch. JON looks up at the castle. The men collect their equipment and make for the castle.

title: Eastwatch
Name: tormund
text: tormund JON, DAVOS, GENDRY, and JORAH sit at a table having a conversation.

title: Eastwatch
Name: tormund
text: tormund Isn't it your job to talk him out of stupid fucking ideas like this?

title: Eastwatch
Name: davos
text: davos I've been failing at that job of late.

title: Eastwatch
Name: tormund
text: tormund How many queens are there now?

title: Eastwatch
Name: jon
text: jon Two.

title: Eastwatch
Name: tormund
text: tormund And you need to convince the one with the dragons or the one who fucks her brother?

title: Eastwatch
Name: jon
text: jon Both.

title: Eastwatch
Name: tormund
text: tormund How many men did you bring?

title: Eastwatch
Name: jon
text: jon looks around the table.

title: Eastwatch
Name: jon
text: jon Not enough.

title: Eastwatch
Name: tormund
text: tormund The big woman?

title: Eastwatch
Name: jon
text: jon smiles and shakes his head. TORMUND is disappointed.

title: Eastwatch
Name: jorah
text: jorah We were hoping some of your men could help.

title: Eastwatch
Name: davos
text: davos I'll be staying behind. I'm a liability out there as you well know.

title: Eastwatch
Name: tormund
text: tormund nods his head.

title: Eastwatch
Name: tormund
text: tormund You are.

title: Eastwatch
Name: tormund
text: tormund turns to look at JON.

title: Eastwatch
Name: tormund
text: tormund You really want to go out there again?

title: Eastwatch
Name: tormund
text: tormund You're not the only ones.

title: Eastwatch
Name: tormund
text: tormund My scouts found them a mile south of the Wall. Said they were on their way here.

title: Eastwatch
Name: jon
text: jon You're The Hound. I saw you once at Winterfell.

title: Eastwatch
Name: sandor
text: sandor pulls a blanket tight around himself and sits up from the table he was laying on.

title: Eastwatch
Name: tormund
text: tormund They want to go beyond the Wall too.

title: Eastwatch
Name: beric
text: beric We don't want to go beyond the Wall, we have to. Our lord told us the great war is coming.

title: Eastwatch
Name: gendry
text: gendry Don't trust them. Don't trust any of them.

title: Eastwatch
Name: gendry
text: gendry They're the Brotherhood. And the last thing their Lord told them to do was sell me to a Red Witch to be murdered.

title: Eastwatch
Name: jorah
text: jorah Thoros?

title: Eastwatch
Name: thoros
text: thoros sits up from a dark corner.

title: Eastwatch
Name: jorah
text: jorah I hardly recognized you.

title: Eastwatch
Name: thoros
text: thoros Ser Jorah Mormont --

title: Eastwatch
Name: tormund
text: tormund turns and angrily looks at JORAH.

title: Eastwatch
Name: thoros
text: thoros They won't give me anything to drink down here. I haven't been feeling like myself.

title: Eastwatch
Name: tormund
text: tormund You're a fucking Mormont? Like the last Lord Commander?

title: Eastwatch
Name: jorah
text: jorah He was my father.

title: Eastwatch
Name: tormund
text: tormund He hunted us like animals.

title: Eastwatch
Name: jorah
text: jorah You returned the favor, as I recall.

title: Eastwatch
Name: beric
text: beric Here we all are at the edge of the world at the same moment heading in the same direction for the same reason.

title: Eastwatch
Name: davos
text: davos Our reasons aren't your reasons.

title: Eastwatch
Name: beric
text: beric It doesn't matter what we think our reasons are.

title: Eastwatch
Name: beric
text: beric stands up and walks towards the bars of the cell.

title: Eastwatch
Name: beric
text: beric There's a greater purpose at work and we serve it together whether we know it or not. We may take the steps but the Lord of Light --

title: Eastwatch
Name: sandor
text: sandor For fuck's sake, will you shut your hole. Are we coming with you or not?

title: Eastwatch
Name: jorah
text: jorah Don't you want to know what we're doing?

title: Eastwatch
Name: thoros
text: thoros Is it worse than sitting in a freezing cell waiting to die?

title: Eastwatch
Name: jon
text: jon He's right. We're all on the same side.

title: Eastwatch
Name: gendry
text: gendry How can we be?

title: Eastwatch
Name: jon
text: jon We're all breathing.

title: Eastwatch
Name: tormund
text: tormund hands the cell keys to JON. JON opens the door and let the men out.

title: Eastwatch
Name: end
text: end CREDITS

title: Beyond the Wall
Name: jon
text: jon Are you all right?

title: Beyond the Wall
Name: gendry
text: gendry faces JON and grunts.

title: Beyond the Wall
Name: jon
text: jon Ever been north before?

title: Beyond the Wall
Name: gendry
text: gendry Never seen snow before.

title: Beyond the Wall
Name: tormund
text: tormund Beautiful, eh? I can breath again. Down south the air smells like pig shit.

title: Beyond the Wall
Name: jon
text: jon You've never been down south.

title: Beyond the Wall
Name: tormund
text: tormund I've been to Winterfell.

title: Beyond the Wall
Name: jon
text: jon That's the north.

title: Beyond the Wall
Name: gendry
text: gendry How do you live up here? How do you keep your balls from freezing off?

title: Beyond the Wall
Name: tormund
text: tormund You have to keep moving. That's the secret. Walking is good, fighting is better, fucking is best.

title: Beyond the Wall
Name: jon
text: jon There's not another woman within 100 miles of here.

title: Beyond the Wall
Name: tormund
text: tormund turns to look at JON and GENDRY.

title: Beyond the Wall
Name: tormund
text: tormund We have to make due with what we've got.

title: Beyond the Wall
Name: jon
text: jon glances at GENDRY. GENDRY backs away from JON and TORMUND.

title: Beyond the Wall
Name: tormund
text: tormund This one is maybe not so smart.

title: Beyond the Wall
Name: jon
text: jon Davos says he is a strong fighter.

title: Beyond the Wall
Name: tormund
text: tormund Good. That's more important than being smart.

title: Beyond the Wall
Name: tormund
text: tormund looks at JON as they continue to walk.

title: Beyond the Wall
Name: tormund
text: tormund Smart people don't come up here looking for the dead. So, you met this Dragon Queen, huh? And?

title: Beyond the Wall
Name: jon
text: jon She'll only fight beside us if I bend the knee.

title: Beyond the Wall
Name: tormund
text: tormund You spent too much time with the free folk and now you don't like kneeling. Mance Rayder was a great man, a proud man. The king beyond the wall never bent the knee. How many of his people died for his pride?

title: Beyond the Wall
Name: thoros
text: thoros Are you still mad at us, boy?

title: Beyond the Wall
Name: gendry
text: gendry You sold me to a witch.

title: Beyond the Wall
Name: thoros
text: thoros Priestess. I'll admit, it is a subtle distinction.

title: Beyond the Wall
Name: beric
text: beric We're fighting a great war. Wars cost money.

title: Beyond the Wall
Name: gendry
text: gendry I wanted to be one of you. I wanted to join the Brotherhood but you sold me off like a slave. Do you know what she did to me? She strapped me down on a bed, she stripped me naked --

title: Beyond the Wall
Name: sandor
text: sandor Sounds all right so far.

title: Beyond the Wall
Name: gendry
text: gendry and put leeches on me.

title: Beyond the Wall
Name: sandor
text: sandor Was she naked too?

title: Beyond the Wall
Name: thoros
text: thoros She needed your blood.

title: Beyond the Wall
Name: gendry
text: gendry Yes. Thank you. I know that.

title: Beyond the Wall
Name: sandor
text: sandor steps in front of GENDRY to halt him.

title: Beyond the Wall
Name: sandor
text: sandor It could have been worse.

title: Beyond the Wall
Name: gendry
text: gendry She wanted to kill me. They would have killed me if it wasn't for Davos --

title: Beyond the Wall
Name: sandor
text: sandor But they didn't, did they? So what you whinging about?

title: Beyond the Wall
Name: gendry
text: gendry I'm not whinging.

title: Beyond the Wall
Name: sandor
text: sandor Your lips are moving and you're complaining about something. That's whinging.

title: Beyond the Wall
Name: sandor
text: sandor motions to BERIC.

title: Beyond the Wall
Name: sandor
text: sandor This one's been killed six times. You don't hear him bitching about it.

title: Beyond the Wall
Name: sandor
text: sandor walks away to join the group. BERIC and THOROS smile to each other. THOROS holds his wine flask out to GENDRY who takes a large gulp and hands it back to THOROS.

title: Beyond the Wall
Name: thoros
text: thoros Good lad.

title: Beyond the Wall
Name: jon
text: jon The first time I went north of the wall was with your father.

title: Beyond the Wall
Name: jorah
text: jorah He was a good man. He deserved a better son. Were you with him at the end?

title: Beyond the Wall
Name: jon
text: jon I was a prisoner of the Wildlings. But we avenged him. I want you to know that every mutineer found justice.

title: Beyond the Wall
Name: jorah
text: jorah I can't think of a worse way for him to go. The Night's Watch was his life. He would have died to protect every one of those men, and they butchered him.

title: Beyond the Wall
Name: jon
text: jon I hate that he died that way. My father was the most honorable man I ever met. He was good all the way through. And he died on the executioner's block.

title: Beyond the Wall
Name: jorah
text: jorah Your father wanted to execute me.

title: Beyond the Wall
Name: jon
text: jon I heard.

title: Beyond the Wall
Name: jorah
text: jorah He was in the right of course. It didn't make me hate him any less.

title: Beyond the Wall
Name: jorah
text: jorah and JON glance at each other.

title: Beyond the Wall
Name: jon
text: jon I'm glad he didn't capture you.

title: Beyond the Wall
Name: jorah
text: jorah Me too.

title: Beyond the Wall
Name: jon
text: jon stops walking and loosens the belt holding his sword.

title: Beyond the Wall
Name: jon
text: jon Your father gave me this sword. He changed the pommel from a bear to a wolf, but it's still Long Claw.

title: Beyond the Wall
Name: jon
text: jon hands the sword to JORAH. JORAH slowly takes the sword and looks it over in his hands.

title: Beyond the Wall
Name: jon
text: jon Lord Commander Mormont thought you'd never come back to Westeros.

title: Beyond the Wall
Name: jorah
text: jorah stops examining the sword and looks up to JON.

title: Beyond the Wall
Name: jon
text: jon But you are back and it's been in your family for centuries. It's not right for me to have it.

title: Beyond the Wall
Name: jorah
text: jorah pauses, then nods at JON.

title: Beyond the Wall
Name: jorah
text: jorah He gave it to you.

title: Beyond the Wall
Name: jon
text: jon I'm not his son.

title: Beyond the Wall
Name: jorah
text: jorah pulls the sword halfway out of the sheath and inspects the blade, turning it in his hands.

title: Beyond the Wall
Name: jorah
text: jorah I brought shame to my house. I broke my father's heart.

title: Beyond the Wall
Name: jorah
text: jorah resheaths the blade and hands it back to JON.

title: Beyond the Wall
Name: jorah
text: jorah I forfeited the right to claim this sword. It's yours. May it serve you well and your children after you.

title: Beyond the Wall
Name: arya
text: arya Father used to watch us from up here. He wouldn't say much. You probably don't remember. You were inside knitting all the time.

title: Beyond the Wall
Name: sansa
text: sansa I remember.

title: Beyond the Wall
Name: arya
text: arya One time the boys were shooting arrows with Ser Rodrick. I came out here after and Bran had left his bow behind just lying on the ground. Ser Rodrick would have cuffed him if he saw. There was one arrow in the target. There was no one around, just like now. No one to stop me. So I started shooting. And every shot I had to go out there and get my one arrow and walk back and shoot it again. I wasn't very good. Finally I hit the bullseye. It could have been the 20th shot or the 50th. I don't remember. But I hit the bullseye and I heard this.

title: Beyond the Wall
Name: arya
text: arya starts a slow clap.

title: Beyond the Wall
Name: arya
text: arya I looked up and he's standing right here smiling down at me. I knew what I was doing was against the rules. But he was smiling so I knew it wasn't wrong. The rules were wrong. I was doing what I was meant to be doing and he knew it. Now he's dead. Killed by the Lannisters with your help.

title: Beyond the Wall
Name: sansa
text: sansa turns to look at ARYA.

title: Beyond the Wall
Name: sansa
text: sansa What?

title: Beyond the Wall
Name: arya
text: arya retrieves a raven scroll from her pocket and unrolls it.

title: Beyond the Wall
Name: arya
text: arya That's your pretty handwriting. Septa Mordane used to crack my knuckles because I couldn't write as well as you. "Robb, I write to you today with heavy heart. Our good King Robert is dead. Killed from wounds he took in a boar hunt --

title: Beyond the Wall
Name: sansa
text: sansa You don't have to read it. I remember.

title: Beyond the Wall
Name: arya
text: arya Father has been charged with treason. He conspired with Robert's brothers against my beloved Joffrey and tried to steal his throne. The Lannisters are treating me well and providing me with every comfort. I beg you, come to King's Landing, swear fealty to King Joffrey and prevent any strife between the great houses of Lannister and Stark. Your faithful sister, Sansa.

title: Beyond the Wall
Name: sansa
text: sansa They forced me to do it.

title: Beyond the Wall
Name: arya
text: arya Did they. With a knife at your throat? Did they put you on a rack and stretch you until your bones started to pop?

title: Beyond the Wall
Name: sansa
text: sansa You don't know what it was like. I was a child.

title: Beyond the Wall
Name: arya
text: arya So was I. I would have let them kill me before I betrayed my family.

title: Beyond the Wall
Name: sansa
text: sansa They told me it was the only way to save father.

title: Beyond the Wall
Name: arya
text: arya And you were stupid enough to believe them. I remember you standing on that platform with Joffrey and Cersei when they dragged father too the block. I remember the pretty dress you were wearing. I remember the fancy way you did your hair.

title: Beyond the Wall
Name: sansa
text: sansa You were there?

title: Beyond the Wall
Name: arya

title: Beyond the Wall
Name: sansa
text: sansa And what did you do? Did you come running to the rescue? Did you fight off the Lannisters and save father?

title: Beyond the Wall
Name: arya
text: arya I wanted to.

title: Beyond the Wall
Name: sansa
text: sansa But you didn't. Just like me.

title: Beyond the Wall
Name: arya
text: arya I didn't betray him. I didn't betray Robb. I didn't betray our entire family for my beloved Joffrey.

title: Beyond the Wall
Name: sansa
text: sansa You should be on your knees thanking me. We're standing in Winterfell again because of me. You didn't win it back. Jon didn't win it back. He lost the Battle of the Bastards. The Knight's of the Vale won the battle and they rode north for me while you were off where, traveling the world?

title: Beyond the Wall
Name: arya
text: arya I was training.

title: Beyond the Wall
Name: sansa
text: sansa Training. Well, while you were training I suffered things you can never imagine.

title: Beyond the Wall
Name: arya

title: Beyond the Wall
Name: sansa
text: sansa You never would have survived what I survived.

title: Beyond the Wall
Name: arya
text: arya I guess we'll never know.

title: Beyond the Wall
Name: sansa
text: sansa What are you doing to do with that letter.

title: Beyond the Wall
Name: arya
text: arya I don't know yet.

title: Beyond the Wall
Name: sansa
text: sansa Who did you show it to? Where did you find it?

title: Beyond the Wall
Name: arya
text: arya You're scared, aren't you? What are you scared of? You didn't commit any crimes. No one's going to hang you.

title: Beyond the Wall
Name: sansa
text: sansa Arya --

title: Beyond the Wall
Name: arya
text: arya Are you scared I'll show it to Jon and he'll be angry? No. That's not Jon. He'll understand. You were just a scared little girl all alone with the wicked Lannisters.

title: Beyond the Wall
Name: sansa
text: sansa Do you know how happy Cersei would be if she saw us fighting? This is exactly what she wants. This is what she's always wanted, to tear us apart --

title: Beyond the Wall
Name: arya
text: arya The northern lords will read it. They wouldn't think much of Lady Sansa if they knew how she did Cersei's bidding. What would little Lyanna Mormont say? She's younger than you were when you wrote this. Are you going to say, "But I was just a child"?

title: Beyond the Wall
Name: sansa
text: sansa You're angry. Sometimes anger makes people do unfortunate things.

title: Beyond the Wall
Name: arya
text: arya Sometimes fear makes them do unfortunate things. I'll go with anger.

title: Beyond the Wall
Name: arya
text: arya turns and walks away.

title: Beyond the Wall

Name: beric
text: beric Of course I did. When he was Hand he sent me off hunting for The Mountain. Your Wildling friend told me the red woman brought you back. Thoros has brought me back six times. We both serve the same lord.

Name: beric
text: beric I don't know.

title: Beyond the Wall
Name: jon
text: jon That's all anyone can tell me, I don't know. So what's the point in serving a god that none of us knows what he wants.

title: Beyond the Wall
Name: beric
text: beric I think about that all the time. I don't think it's our purpose to understand except one thing. We're soldiers. We have to know what we're fighting for. I'm not fighting so some man or woman I barely know can sit on a throne made of swords.

title: Beyond the Wall
Name: jon
text: jon So what are you fighting for?

title: Beyond the Wall
Name: beric
text: beric Life. Death is the enemy. The first enemy and the last.

title: Beyond the Wall
Name: jon
text: jon But we all die.

title: Beyond the Wall
Name: beric
text: beric The enemy always wins. And we still need to fight him. That's all I know. You and I wont find much joy while we're here. But we can keep others alive. We can defend those who can't defend themselves.

title: Beyond the Wall
Name: jon
text: jon I am the shield that guards the realms of men.

title: Beyond the Wall
Name: beric
text: beric Maybe we don't need to understand any more than that. Maybe that's enough.

title: Beyond the Wall
Name: jon

title: Beyond the Wall
Name: sandor
text: sandor stops and looks into the distance. There is a steep mountain ascending into the clouds in the distance.

title: Beyond the Wall

title: The Dragon and the Wolf

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: cersei
text: cersei Sit down or leave.

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion We are a group of people who do not like one another, as this recent demonstration has shown. We have suffered at each other's hands. We have lost people we love at each other's hands. If all we wanted was more of the same, there would be no need for this gathering. We are entirely capable of waging war against each other without meeting face-to-face.

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: cersei
text: cersei So instead, we should settle our differences and live together in harmony for the rest of our days?

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion We all know that will never happen.

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: cersei
text: cersei Then why are we here?

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: jon
text: jon This isn't about living in harmony. It's just about living. The same thing is coming for all of us. A general you can't negotiate with. An army that doesn't leave corpses behind on the battlefield. Lord Tyrion tells me a million people live in this city. They're about to become a million more soldiers in the Army of the Dead.

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: cersei
text: cersei I imagine for most of them it would be an improvement.

Name: jon

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: cersei
text: cersei I don't think it's serious at all. I think it's another bad joke. If my brother Jaime has informed me correctly, you're asking me for a truce.

title: The Dragon and the Wolf

text: cersei That's all? Pull back my armies and stand down while you go on your monster hunt. Or while you solidify and expand your position. Hard for me to know which it is with my armies pulled back until you return and march on my capital with four times the men.

Name: tyrion

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: euron
text: euron I'm going back to my island. You should go back to yours. When winter's over, we'll be the only ones left alive.

title: The Dragon and the Wolf

text: cersei He's right to be afraid. And a coward to run. If those things come for us, there will be no kingdoms to rule. Everything we suffered will have been for nothing. Everything we lost will have been for nothing. The crown accepts your truce. Until the dead are defeated, they are the true enemy.

text: cersei In return, the King

text: tyrion I'm pleased you bent the knee to our queen

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: jon
text: jon I'm not going to swear an oath I can't uphold. Talk about my father.

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion That is indeed a problem. The more immediate problem is that we're fucked.

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: davos
text: davos Any ideas as to how we might change that state of affairs?

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion Only one. Everyone stays here, and I go and talk to my sister.

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys I didn't come all this way to have my Hand

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion I don't want Cersei to murder me either. I could have stayed in my cell and saved a great deal of trouble.

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: jon
text: jon I did this. I should go.

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion She'll definitely murder you. I go see my sister.

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion You spoke with her?

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: jaime
text: jaime At her until she kicked me out. She thinks I was an idiot to trust you. A lot of people seem to think that, actually.

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion I'm about to step into a room with the most murderous woman in the world who's already tried to kill me twice, that I know of. Who's an idiot?

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: jaime
text: jaime I suppose we should say goodbye, one idiot to another.

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: cersei
text: cersei I shouldn't be surprised, I suppose. She's your kind of woman a foreign whore who doesn't know her place.

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion A foreign whore you can't abduct, beat, or intimidate. That must be difficult for you.

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: cersei
text: cersei So you bring her here with her pet Northerner, whom you've convinced to bow down before her.

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion I didn't know about that.

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: cersei
text: cersei And now you've got them both working towards the same goal, the goal you've worked towards your entire life.

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion Cersei, I didn't know.

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: cersei
text: cersei the destruction of this family.

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion I am the one preventing that from happening. Daenerys didn't want to debate and negotiate. She didn't want to bring you words. She wanted to bring you fire and blood until I advised her otherwise. I don't want to destroy our family. I never have.

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: cersei
text: cersei You killed our father

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion After he sentenced me to death for a crime I didn't commit, yes, I killed him. Hate me for it if you want. I hate myself for it in spite of what he was, in spite of what he did to me.

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: cersei
text: cersei Oh, poor little man. Your papa was mean to you. Do you have any idea what you did when you fired that crossbow? You left us open. You laid us bare for the vultures, and the vultures came and tore us apart. You may not have killed Joffrey, but you killed Myrcella, you killed Tommen. No one wouldo ve touched them if Father--

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion I have never been more sorry about anything.

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: cersei
text: cersei I will not hear it, not from you.

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: cersei
text: cersei I will not hear it!

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion All right. You love your family, and I have destroyed it. I will always be a threat. So put an end to me.

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion If it weren't for me, you'd have a motherIf it weren't for me, you'd have a father.

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion I am more sorry about the children than you could ever know.

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: cersei
text: cersei I will not

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion I don't care. I loved them. You know I did. You know it in your heart if there's anything left of it.

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: cersei
text: cersei It doesn't matter. Your love doesn't matter. Your feelings don't matter. I don't care why you did what you did. I only care what it cost us. It cost us our future.

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion If there's no future, then why are we here? Why did you allow me to come?

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: cersei
text: cersei Not to help my enemies collaborate in my destruction.

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion Yes, no, not what you hoped for, but you must have hoped for something.

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: cersei
text: cersei What did you hope for? To make Jon Snow submit to your queen.

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion Mm, not like this.

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: cersei
text: cersei But eventually, you want everyone to bend the knee to her.

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion Yes.

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: cersei
text: cersei Why?

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion Because I think she will make the world a better place.

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: cersei
text: cersei You said she'd destroy King's Landing.

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion She knows herself. She chose an advisor who would check her worst impulses instead of feeding them.

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: cersei
text: cersei That's the difference between you. I don't care about checking my worst impulses. I don't care about making the world a better place. Hang the world.

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: cersei
text: cersei That thing you dragged here, I know what it is, I know what it means. And when it came at me, I didn't think about the world. Not at all. As soon as it opened its mouth, the world disappeared for me, right down its black throat.
