All I could think about was keeping those gnashing teeth away from the ones who matter most, away from my family. Maybe Euron Greyjoy had the right idea. Get on a boat, take those who matter.

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion You're pregnant.

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: jon
text: jon No one is less happy about this than I am.

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys I know. I respect what you did. Wish you hadn't done it, but I respect it.

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys This place was the beginning of the end for my family. A dragon is not a slave. They were terrifying. Extraordinary. They filled people with wonder and awe, and we locked them in here. They wasted away. They grew small. And we grew small as well. We weren't extraordinary without them. We were just like everyone else.

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: jon
text: jon You're not like everyone else. And your family hasn't seen its end. You're still here.

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys I can't have children.

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: jon
text: jon Who told you that?

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys The witch who murdered my husband.

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: jon
text: jon Has it occurred to you she might not have been a reliable source of information?

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys You were right from the beginning. If I had trusted you, everything would be different.

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: jon
text: jon So, what now?

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys I can't forget what I saw north of the Wall. And I can't pretend that Cersei won't take back half the country the moment I march north.

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: jon
text: jon It appears Tyrion's assessment was correct. We're fucked.

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: cersei
text: cersei My armies will not stand down. I will not pull them back to the capital. I will march them north to fight alongside you in the Great War. The darkness is coming for us all. We'll face it together. And when the Great War is over, perhaps you'll remember I chose to help with no promises or assurances from any of you. I expect not. Call our banners. All of them.

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: petyr
text: petyr It's not easy for ravens to fly in these storms. Perhaps Jon tried to send word earlier.

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: sansa
text: sansa No, this is the way he is, the way he's always been. He never asked for my opinion. Why would he start now?

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: petyr
text: petyr I can't believe he'd surrender the Northern crown without consulting you.

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: sansa
text: sansa This is his writing, his signature. He pledged to fight for Daenerys Targaryen. He's bent the knee.

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: petyr
text: petyr I've heard gossip that the Dragon Queen is quite beautiful.

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: sansa
text: sansa What does that have to do with anything?

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: petyr
text: petyr Jon is young and unmarried. Daenerys is young and unmarried.

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: sansa
text: sansa You think he wants to marry her?

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: petyr
text: petyr An alliance makes sense. Together, they'd be difficult to defeat. He was named King.

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: sansa
text: sansa Even if I wanted to, Arya would never go along. She always loved Jon far more than she ever loved me, and she'd kill anyone who betrayed her family.

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: petyr
text: petyr You are family, too. Would Arya really murder her own sister?

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: sansa
text: sansa Do you know what she is now? Do you know what the Faceless Men are?

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: petyr
text: petyr Only by reputation. They worship the God of Death, I believe. I never trust godly men.

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: sansa
text: sansa They're killers. And Arya was one of them. What do you think she's after?

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: petyr
text: petyr She's your sister

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: sansa
text: sansa She could want me dead because she thinks I wronged my family.

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: petyr
text: petyr Why did she come to Winterfell?

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: sansa
text: sansa To kill me for marrying our enemies and betraying my family.

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: petyr
text: petyr Why did she unearth the letter Cersei made you write?

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: sansa
text: sansa To provide proof of my betrayals. To provide justification after she murders me.

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: petyr
text: petyr And after she murders you, what does she become?

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: sansa
text: sansa Lady

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: jon
text: jon If we have the Dothraki ride hard on the kingsroad, they'll arrive at Winterfell within the fortnight.

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys And the Unsullied? We can sail with them to White Harbor, meet the Dothraki here on the kingsroad, then ride together to Winterfell.

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: jorah
text: jorah Perhaps you should fly to Winterfell, Your Grace. You have many enemies in the North. Thousands fell fighting your fatherAll it takes is one angry man with a crossbow. He'll see your silver hair on the kingsroad and know that one well-placed bolt will make him a hero. The man who killed the conqueror.

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: jon
text: jon It's your decision, Your Grace. But if we're going to be allies in this war, it's important for the Northerners to see us as allies. If we sail to White Harbor together, I think it sends a better message.

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys I've not come to conquer the North. I'm coming to save the North. We sail together.

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: theon
text: theon Jon.

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: theon
text: theon Can I speak with you?

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: jon
text: jon All right.

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: theon
text: theon What you did in King's Landing, what you said... You couldo ve lied to Cersei about bending the knee to Daenerys. You risked everything to tell an enemy the truth.

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: jon
text: jon We went down there to make peace. And it seems to me we need to be honest with each other if we're going to fight together.

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: theon
text: theon You've always known what was right. Even when we were all young and stupid, you always knew. Every step you take it's always the right step.

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: jon
text: jon It's not. It may seem that way from the outside, but I promise you, it's not true. I've done plenty of things that I regret.

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: theon
text: theon Not compared to me, you haven't.

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: jon
text: jon No. Not compared to you.

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: theon
text: theon I always wanted to do the right thing. Be the right kind of person. But I never knew what that meant. It always seemed like there's like there was an impossible choice I had to make. Stark or Greyjoy.

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: jon
text: jon Our father was more of a father.

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: theon
text: theon He was.

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: jon
text: jon And you betrayed him. Betrayed his memory.

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: theon
text: theon I did.

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: jon
text: jon But you never lost him. He's a part of you. Just like he's a part of me.

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: theon
text: theon But the things I've done.

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: jon
text: jon It's not my place to forgive you for all of it. But what I can forgive, I do. You don't need to choose. You're a Greyjoy and you're a Stark.

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: theon
text: theon When I was Ramsay's prisoner, Yara tried to save me. She's the only one who tried to save me. She needs me now.

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: jon
text: jon So, why are you still talking to me?

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: harrag
text: harrag Load up. Load up, lads. Go on. Tide's coming in.

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: theon
text: theon All of us chose to follow Yara. We left the Iron Islands for Yara. She would never leave one of us behind. We're not leaving her behind.

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: harrag
text: harrag Your sister--

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: theon
text: theon She's not dead.

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: harrag
text: harrag She's dead. Even if Euron hasn't cut her throat yet, she's dead.

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: theon
text: theon She's our queen

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: harrag
text: harrag She's your sister

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: theon
text: theon I did. I ran from my uncle.

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: harrag
text: harrag So, why in fuck's name should we listen to you? They say the dead can't swim. We're going to sail east, find a nice, quiet island, kill all the men, and take their wives for ourselves.

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: theon
text: theon We're done with all that.

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: harrag
text: harrag Who says we are?

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: theon
text: theon Yara did. She made a pledge. We're going to find her, and we're going to set her free.

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: harrag
text: harrag Run away, little Theon. It's what you do best.

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: man
text: man He needs to shut his mouth.

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: man
text: man Hey!

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: man
text: man Oh, yes!

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: man
text: man That's more like it.

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: harrag
text: harrag Stay down or I'll kill you!

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: harrag
text: harrag I said stay down or I'll kill you!

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: theon
text: theon Not for me. For Yara!

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: men
text: men Yara!

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: sansa
text: sansa Have my sister

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: arya
text: arya Are you sure you want to do this?

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: sansa
text: sansa It's not what I want. It's what honor demands.

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: arya
text: arya And what does honor demand?

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: sansa
text: sansa That I defend my family from those who would harm us. That I defend the North from those who would betray us.

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: arya
text: arya All right, then. Get on with it.

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: sansa
text: sansa You stand accused of murder. You stand accused of treason. How do you answer these charges Lord Baelish?

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: arya
text: arya My sister asked you a question.

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: petyr
text: petyr Lady Sansa, forgive me I'm a bit confused.

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: sansa
text: sansa Which charges confuse you? Let's start with the simplest one you murdered our aunt, Lysa Arryn. You pushed her through the Moon Door and watched her fall. Do you deny it?

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: petyr
text: petyr I did it to protect you.

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: sansa
text: sansa You did it to take power in the Vale. Earlier, you conspired to murder Jon.

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: petyr
text: petyr Whatever your aunt

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: sansa
text: sansa You had Aunt Lysa send a letter to our parents telling them it was the Lannisters who murdered Jon.

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: petyr
text: petyr I know of no such letter.

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: sansa
text: sansa You conspired with Cersei Lannister and Joffrey Baratheon to betray our father.

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: petyr
text: petyr I deny it! None of you were there to see what happened. None of you knows the truth.

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: bran
text: bran You held a knife to his throat.

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: bran
text: bran You said, "I did warn you not the trust me."

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: arya
text: arya You told our mother

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: petyr
text: petyr Lady Sansa, I have known you since you were a girl. I've protected you.

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: sansa
text: sansa Protected me? By selling me to the Boltons?

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: petyr
text: petyr If we could speak alone, I can explain everything.

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: sansa
text: sansa Sometimes when I'm trying to understand a person's motives, I play a little game. I assume the worst. What's the worst reason you have for turning me against my sisterThat's what you do, isn't it? That's what you've always done turn family against family, turn sister against sister. That's what you did to our mother.

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: petyr
text: petyr Sansa, please.

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: sansa
text: sansa I'm a slow learner, it's true. But I learn.

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: petyr
text: petyr Give me a chance to defend myself. I deserve that.

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: petyr
text: petyr I am Lord Protector of the Vale and I command you to escort me safely back to the Eyrie.

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: john
text: john I think not.

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: petyr
text: petyr Sansa, I beg you! I loved your mother since the time I was a boy.

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: sansa
text: sansa And yet, you betrayed her.

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: petyr
text: petyr I loved you. More than anyone.

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: sansa
text: sansa And yet, you betrayed me.

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: sansa
text: sansa When you brought me back to Winterfell, you told me there's no justice in the world, not unless we make it. Thank you for all your many lessons, Lord Baelish. I will never forget them.

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: petyr
text: petyr Sansa! I--

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: jaime
text: jaime Our men in King's Landing will march north in three days' time.

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: man
text: man It'll take us a fortnight just to gather supplies for the train.

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: jaime
text: jaime We don't have a fortnight. If the North falls, we fall. Three days. The remaining forces in the Westerlands will take the river road east. We'll meet at Lord Harroway's Town and march together to Winterfell.

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: cersei
text: cersei Ser Jaime.

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: jaime
text: jaime Your Grace.

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: cersei
text: cersei My lords, I need a moment with my brother.

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: men
text: men Your Grace.

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: cersei
text: cersei What are you doing?

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: jaime
text: jaime Preparing the expedition north.

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: cersei
text: cersei Expedition north? I always knew you were the stupidest Lannister. The Starks and Targaryens have united against us, and you want to fight alongside them? Are you a traitor or an idiot?

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: jaime
text: jaime You pledged our forces to fight our common enemy.

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: cersei
text: cersei I'll say whatever I need to say to ensure the survival of our house. You expect me to trust the man who murdered our father.

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: jaime
text: jaime You saw it with your own eyes. You saw a dead man trying to kill us.

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: cersei
text: cersei I saw it burn. If dragons can't stop them, if Dothraki and Unsullied and Northmen can't stop them, how will our armies make a difference?

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: jaime
text: jaime This isn't about noble houses, this is about the living and the dead!

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: cersei
text: cersei And I intend to stay amongst the living. Let the Stark boy and his new queen--

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: jaime
text: jaime I made a promise.

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: cersei
text: cersei Our child will rule Westeros.

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: jaime
text: jaime Our child will never be born if the dead come south.

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: cersei
text: cersei The monsters are real. The white walkers, the dragons, the Dothraki screamers all the frightening stories we heard when we were young, they're all real. So be it. Let the monsters kill each other. And while they battle in the North, we take back the lands that belong to us.

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: jaime
text: jaime And then what?

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: cersei
text: cersei And then we rule.

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: jaime
text: jaime When the fighting in the North is over, someone wins. You understand that, don't you? If the dead win, they march south and kill us all. If the living win, and we've betrayed them, they march south and kill us all!

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: cersei
text: cersei The Targaryens and the Starks already want to kill us all. Most of them will die in the North.

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: jaime
text: jaime I faced them in the field. We can't beat them. We can't beat their dragons.

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: cersei
text: cersei How many dragons did you see at the pit?

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: jaime
text: jaime Two.

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: cersei
text: cersei What happened to the third?

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: jaime
text: jaime For all we know, it's guarding her fleet!

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: cersei
text: cersei She came here with her dragons and her Dothraki and her Unsullied. She came here to show us all her power. No, something happened.The dragons are vulnerable.

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: jaime
text: jaime We can't beat the Dothraki. We don't have the numbers. We don't have the support of the other houses!

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: cersei
text: cersei No, we have something better. We have the Iron Bank. You shouldo ve listened more when Father--

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: jaime
text: jaime The Golden Company is not here. They're in Essos. How is a mercenary company in Essos going to help us?

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: cersei
text: cersei Do you really think Euron Greyjoy turned tail and sailed back to the Iron Islands? Do you think he abandoned the chance to marry the queen?

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: jaime
text: jaime You plotted with Euron Greyjoy without telling me, the commander.

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: cersei
text: cersei And you conspired with Tyrion, the man who murdered our father without telling me, your queen.

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: jaime
text: jaime I didn't conspire with him.

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: cersei
text: cersei You met with him in secret without my consent. You planned to promote my enemies' interests. That is the definition of conspiracy.

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: jaime
text: jaime I pledged to ride north. I intend to honor that pledge.

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: cersei
text: cersei And that will be treason.

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: jaime
text: jaime Treason?

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: cersei
text: cersei Disobeying your queen

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: jaime
text: jaime Doesn't matter what I'd call it.

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: cersei
text: cersei I told you no one walks away from me.

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: jaime
text: jaime Are you going to order him to kill me? I'm the only one you have left. Our children are gone, our father

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: cersei
text: cersei There's one more yet to come.

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: jaime
text: jaime Give the order, then.

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: jaime
text: jaime I don't believe you.

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: bran
text: bran Come in.

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: bran
text: bran Samwell Tarly.

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: sam
text: sam I wasn't sure if you'd remember me.

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: bran
text: bran I remember everything.

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: bran
text: bran You helped us get beyond the Wall. You're a good man.

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: sam
text: sam Oh, well, thank you, but, um, I'm not sure that I am. What happened to you beyond the Wall?

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: bran
text: bran I became the Three-Eyed Raven.

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: sam
text: sam Oh! I don't know what that means.

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: bran
text: bran I can see things that happened in the past. I can see things happening now all over the world. Why did you come to Winterfell?

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: sam
text: sam Um, Jon's the one to lead the fight against the dead. I know he is. But he can't do it alone, so I've come here to help him.

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: bran
text: bran He's on his way back to Winterfell with Daenerys Targaryen. You you saw this in a vision?

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: sam
text: sam Oh.

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: bran
text: bran He needs to know the truth.

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: sam
text: sam The truth about what?

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: bran
text: bran About himself. No one knows. No one but me. Jon isn't really my father's son He's the son of Rhaegar Targaryen and my aunt.

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: sam
text: sam It's not.

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: bran
text: bran Dornish bastards are named Sand.

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: sam
text: sam At the Citadel, I transcribed a High Septon's diary. He annulled Rhaegar's marriage to Elia. He wed Rhaegar and Lyanna in a secret ceremony.

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: bran
text: bran Are you certain?

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: sam
text: sam It's what the High Septon wrote in his private diary. I don't know why he'd lie. Is this something you can see?

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: rhaegar
text: rhaegar Father, Smith, Warrior, Mother, Maiden, Crone, Stranger. I am hers and she is mine from this day until the end of my days.

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: lyanna
text: lyanna Father, Smith, Warrior, Mother, Maiden, Crone, Stranger. I am his and he is mine from this day until the end of my days.

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: bran
text: bran Robert's Rebellion was built on a lie. Rhaegar didn't kidnap my aunt.

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: bran
text: bran He loved her. And she loved him.

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: bran
text: bran And Jon - Jon's real name.

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: lyanna
text: lyanna His name is Aegon.

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: bran
text: bran He's never been a bastard.

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: brans
text: brans He needs to know. We need to tell him.

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: arya
text: arya Are you all right?

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: sansa
text: sansa It's just strange. In his own horrible way, I believe he loved me.

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: arya
text: arya You did the right thing.

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: sansa
text: sansa You did it.

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: arya
text: arya I'm just the executioner. You passed the sentence. You're the Lady.

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: sansa
text: sansa Does that bother you?

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: arya
text: arya I was never going to be as good a lady as you. So I had to be something else. I never could have survived what you survived.

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: sansa
text: sansa You would have. You're the strongest person I know.

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: arya
text: arya I believe that's the nicest thing you've ever said to me.

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: sansa
text: sansa Well, don't get used to it. You're still very strange and annoying.

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: arya
text: arya In winter, we must protect ourselves. Look after one another.

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: sansa
text: sansa Father

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: arya
text: arya I miss him.

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: sansa
text: sansa Me, too.

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: beric
text: beric It's a long way down.

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: tormund
text: tormund Yeah. The crows keep telling me I'll get used to it.

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: man
text: man I can see movement. Watch, on the tree line!

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: man
text: man What is it?

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: tormund
text: tormund Come on! Run! Run!

title: Winterfell
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion You should consider yourself lucky. At least your balls won't freeze off.

title: Winterfell
Name: varys
text: varys You take great offense at dwarf jokes, but love telling eunuch jokes. Why is that?

title: Winterfell
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion Because I have balls, and you don't.

title: Winterfell
Name: jon
text: jon I warned you. Northerners don't much trust outsiders.

title: Winterfell
Name: jon
text: jon Look at you.

title: Winterfell
Name: jon
text: jon You're a man.

title: Winterfell
Name: bran
text: bran Almost.

title: Winterfell
Name: jon
text: jon Where's Arya?

title: Winterfell
Name: sansa
text: sansa Lurking somewhere.

title: Winterfell
Name: jon
text: jon Queen Daenerys of House Targaryen. My sister, Sansa Stark, the Lady of Winterfell.

title: Winterfell
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys Thank you for inviting us into your home, Lady Stark. The North is as beautiful as your brother claimed, as are you.

title: Winterfell
Name: sansa
text: sansa Winterfell is yours, Your Grace.

title: Winterfell
Name: bran
text: bran We don't have time for all this. The Night King has your dragon.

title: Winterfell
Name: bran
text: bran He's one of them now. The Wall has fallen, the dead march south.

title: Winterfell
Name: sansa
text: sansa As soon as we heard about the Wall, I called all our banners to retreat to Winterfell. Lord Umber when can we expect your people to arrive?

title: Winterfell
Name: umber
text: umber We need more horses and wagons, if it please my lady.

title: Winterfell
Name: umber
text: umber And my lord.

title: Winterfell
Name: umber
text: umber And my queen. Sorry.

title: Winterfell
Name: sansa
text: sansa You'll have as many as we can spare. Hurry back to Last Hearth and bring your people here.

title: Winterfell
Name: jon
text: jon We need to send ravens to the Night's Watch as well. There's no sense in manning the castles anymore. We make our stand here.

title: Winterfell
Name: maester
text: maester At once, Your Grace.

title: Winterfell
Name: lyanna
text: lyanna Your Grace.

title: Winterfell
Name: lyanna
text: lyanna But you're not. Are you? You left Winterfell a king and came back a- I'm not sure what you are now.

title: Winterfell
Name: lyanna
text: lyanna A lord? Nothing at all?

title: Winterfell
Name: jon
text: jon It's not important.

title: Winterfell
Name: lyanna
text: lyanna Not important? We named you King in the North.

title: Winterfell
Name: man
text: man King of the North!

title: Winterfell
Name: jon
text: jon You did, my lady. It was the honor of my life. I'll always be grateful for your faith. But when I left Winterfell, I told you we need allies or we will die. I have brought those allies home to fight alongside us. I had a choice, keep my crown or protect the North. I chose the North.

title: Winterfell
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion If anyone survives the war to come, we'll have Jon Snow to thank. He risked his life to show us the threat is real. Thanks to his courage, we have brought with us the greatest army the world has ever seen. We have brought two full-grown dragons. And soon, the Lannister army will ride north to join our cause.

title: Winterfell
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion I know, I know, our people haven't been friends in the past. But we must fight together now or die.

title: Winterfell
Name: sansa
text: sansa May I ask, how are we meant to feed the greatest army the world has ever seen? While I ensured our stores would last through winter, I didn't account for Dothraki, Unsullied and two full-grown dragons. What do dragons eat, anyway?

title: Winterfell
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys Whatever they want.

title: Winterfell
Name: gendry
text: gendry Hey, careful, lads. We need every last bit of it.

title: Winterfell
Name: man
text: man Sorry 'bout that.

title: Winterfell
Name: gendry
text: gendry Are these the last of the wagons?

title: Winterfell
Name: man
text: man Aye.

title: Winterfell
Name: gendry
text: gendry All right, let's get it all to the forges.

title: Winterfell
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion My lord. My lady.

title: Winterfell
Name: royce
text: royce My lady.

title: Winterfell
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion The Lady of Winterfell. Has a nice ring to it.

title: Winterfell
Name: sansa
text: sansa So does Hand of the Queen. Depending on the queen, I suppose.

title: Winterfell
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion Last time we spoke was at Joffrey's wedding. Miserable affair.

title: Winterfell
Name: sansa
text: sansa It had its moments.

title: Winterfell
Name: sansa
text: sansa Apologies for leaving like that.

title: Winterfell
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion Yes, it was a bit hard to explain why my wife fled moments after the king's murder.

title: Winterfell
Name: sansa
text: sansa We both survived.

title: Winterfell
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion Many underestimated you. Most of them are dead now.

title: Winterfell
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion I'm sure you weren't thrilled to hear the Lannister army's marching north. You have every right to be fearful of my sister. No one fears her more than I do. But I promise, you'll be safe-

title: Winterfell
Name: sansa
text: sansa Cersei told you her army was coming north to fight for you?

title: Winterfell
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion She did.

title: Winterfell
Name: sansa
text: sansa And you believed her?

title: Winterfell
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion She has something to live for now. I believe she wants to survive.

title: Winterfell
Name: sansa
text: sansa I used to think you were the cleverest man alive.

title: Winterfell
Name: arya
text: arya You used to be taller.

title: Winterfell
Name: jon
text: jon How did you sneak up on me?

title: Winterfell
Name: arya
text: arya How did you survive a knife through the heart?

title: Winterfell
Name: jon
text: jon I didn't.

title: Winterfell
Name: jon
text: jon You still have it.

title: Winterfell
Name: arya
text: arya Needle.

title: Winterfell
Name: jon
text: jon Have you ever used it?

title: Winterfell
Name: arya
text: arya Once or twice.

title: Winterfell
Name: arya
text: arya Valyrian steel.

title: Winterfell
Name: jon
text: jon Jealous?

title: Winterfell
Name: arya
text: arya Too heavy for me.

title: Winterfell
Name: jon
text: jon Where were you before? I couldo ve used your help with Sansa.

title: Winterfell
Name: arya
text: arya She doesn't like your queen, does she?

title: Winterfell
Name: jon
text: jon Sansa thinks she's smarter than everyone.

title: Winterfell
Name: arya
text: arya She's the smartest person I've ever met.

title: Winterfell
Name: jon
text: jon Now you're defending her?

title: Winterfell
Name: jon
text: jon You?

title: Winterfell
Name: arya
text: arya I'm defending our family. So is she.

title: Winterfell
Name: jon
text: jon Yeah. I'm her family too.

title: Winterfell
Name: arya
text: arya Don't forget that.

title: Winterfell
Name: qyburn
text: qyburn Your Grace, I'm afraid I bring terrible news. The dead have broken through the Wall.

title: Winterfell
Name: cersei
text: cersei Good.

title: Winterfell
Name: yara
text: yara Why don't you just get it over with and kill me?

title: Winterfell
Name: euron
text: euron But we're family. The last Greyjoys left in the world. The last ones with balls anyway.

title: Winterfell
Name: euron
text: euron If I kill you who can I talk to? Hmm?

title: Winterfell
Name: euron
text: euron I've got a crew full of mutes. It gets lonely at sea.

title: Winterfell
Name: yara
text: yara Are we in King's Landing?

title: Winterfell
Name: euron
text: euron Mm.

title: Winterfell
Name: yara
text: yara You picked the losing side.

title: Winterfell
Name: euron
text: euron Then I'll sail the Iron Fleet somewhere else.

title: Winterfell
Name: euron
text: euron But first I'm gonna fuck the queen.

title: Winterfell
Name: cersei
text: cersei Twenty-thousand men, is it?

title: Winterfell
Name: harry
text: harry Yes, Your Grace. A few died in transit.

title: Winterfell
Name: euron
text: euron They cheated at dice. Or maybe I cheated. Someone cheated. They weren't good fighters. You won't miss them.

title: Winterfell
Name: cersei
text: cersei Horses?

title: Winterfell
Name: harry
text: harry Two thousand.

title: Winterfell
Name: cersei
text: cersei And elephants?

title: Winterfell
Name: harry
text: harry Uh, no elephants, Your Grace.

title: Winterfell
Name: cersei
text: cersei That's disappointing. I was told the Golden Company had elephants.

title: Winterfell
Name: harry
text: harry They are excellent beasts, Your Grace, but not well-suited to long sea voyages.

title: Winterfell
Name: cersei
text: cersei In any event, you are most welcome here in King's Landing, Captain Strickland.

title: Winterfell
Name: harry
text: harry We look forward to fighting on your behalf, Your Grace.

title: Winterfell
Name: euron
text: euron Am I most welcome here?

title: Winterfell
Name: cersei
text: cersei You are a true friend of the crown and an honored guest.

title: Winterfell
Name: euron
text: euron Good. As a true friend and an honored guest

title: Winterfell
Name: euron
text: euron I was hoping we could talk in private.

title: Winterfell
Name: cersei
text: cersei After the war. That was our agreement.

title: Winterfell
Name: euron
text: euron Wars sometimes last years.

title: Winterfell
Name: cersei
text: cersei You want a whore, buy one. You want a queen, earn her.

title: Winterfell
Name: euron
text: euron How?

title: Winterfell
Name: euron
text: euron I've given her justice, an army, and the Iron Fleet, yet she gives me no sign of affection. My heart is nearly broken.

title: Winterfell
Name: cersei
text: cersei You're insolent. I've executed men for less.

title: Winterfell
Name: euron
text: euron They were lesser men.

title: Winterfell
Name: dirah
text: dirah I hear the dragon burnt up a thousand Lannister men.

title: Winterfell
Name: crayah
text: crayah Burnt up some of my favorite boys.

title: Winterfell
Name: dirah
text: dirah Archie, was it?

title: Winterfell
Name: crayah
text: crayah And William.

title: Winterfell
Name: dirah
text: dirah Tall handsome William?

title: Winterfell
Name: crayah
text: crayah Yeah, tall handsome William.

title: Winterfell
Name: dirah
text: dirah They said what's left of him could fit in a wine glass.

title: Winterfell
Name: bronn
text: bronn I am the only man you ever met who shot a dragon.

title: Winterfell
Name: crayah
text: crayah Did you?

title: Winterfell
Name: bronn
text: bronn Nearly killed it.

title: Winterfell
Name: marei
text: marei That's brave.

title: Winterfell
Name: crayah
text: crayah That boy Eddie.

title: Winterfell
Name: dirah
text: dirah The ginger?

title: Winterfell
Name: crayah
text: crayah That's him. Came back with his face burnt right off. He's got no eyelids now.

title: Winterfell
Name: dirah
text: dirah How does he sleep with no eyelids?

title: Winterfell
Name: bronn
text: bronn All right, can we stop talking about the fucking dragons now?

title: Winterfell
Name: qyburn
text: qyburn Ser Bronn of the Blackwater.

title: Winterfell
Name: bronn
text: bronn You're kidding me.

title: Winterfell
Name: qyburn
text: qyburn Apologies for the interruption, but the queen did urge me to hurry.

title: Winterfell
Name: bronn
text: bronn Sorry, ladies. Another time perhaps.

title: Winterfell
Name: crayah
text: crayah You ever get lonely; I am partial to older gentlemen.

title: Winterfell
Name: qyburn
text: qyburn Poor girl. The pox will take her within the year.

title: Winterfell
Name: bronn
text: bronn Which girl?

title: Winterfell
Name: qyburn
text: qyburn The queen's brothers made promises to you and broke them. Her Grace wants to rectify their mistake.

title: Winterfell
Name: bronn
text: bronn She once gave me a castle and a wife, then rectified me right out of them.

title: Winterfell
Name: qyburn
text: qyburn That was Ser Jaime's doing, not hers. When Queen Cersei wants something, she pays in advance and in gold. Several chests of it, in fact. Waiting for you in a wagon just outside.

title: Winterfell
Name: bronn
text: bronn So, she wants to murder someone, but she can't send her soldiers. If it's the Dragon Queen she's after-

title: Winterfell
Name: qyburn
text: qyburn She has other plans for the Targaryen girl.

title: Winterfell
Name: bronn
text: bronn Yeah, well, good luck with that.

title: Winterfell
Name: qyburn
text: qyburn Our queen's brothers are unlikely to survive their Northern adventures. But in the event that they do-

title: Winterfell
Name: qyburn
text: qyburn She has a keen sense of poetic justice.

title: Winterfell
Name: bronn
text: bronn That fucking family.

title: Winterfell
Name: qyburn
text: qyburn When the Citadel expelled me, I thought I would die poor and alone, but in exchange for my service, Queen Cersei made me her Hand. What would she do for the man who rids her of her treasonous brothers?

title: Winterfell
Name: cersei
text: cersei I wanted those elephants.

title: Winterfell
Name: euron
text: euron So, how do I compare to the fat king?

title: Winterfell
Name: cersei
text: cersei You're insulting my late husband?

title: Winterfell
Name: euron
text: euron Are you offended?

title: Winterfell
Name: cersei
text: cersei Robert had a different whore every night, but he still didn't know his way around a woman's body.

title: Winterfell
Name: euron
text: euron And the Kingslayer?

title: Winterfell
Name: cersei
text: cersei You enjoy risking your neck, don't you?

title: Winterfell
Name: euron
text: euron Life is boring.

title: Winterfell
Name: cersei
text: cersei You're not boring, I'll give you that.

title: Winterfell
Name: euron
text: euron Do I please the queen?

title: Winterfell
Name: cersei
text: cersei You might be the most arrogant man I've ever met. I like that.

title: Winterfell
Name: cersei
text: cersei But now I want to be alone.

title: Winterfell
Name: euron
text: euron I'm going to put a prince in your belly.

title: Winterfell
Name: yara
text: yara Euron can't defend the Iron Islands, not if he's in King's Landing with all his men and his ships.

title: Winterfell
Name: yara
text: yara We can take our home back.

title: Winterfell
Name: theon
text: theon Daenerys went north.

title: Winterfell
Name: yara
text: yara Daenerys will need somewhere to retreat if they can't hold the North. Somewhere the dead can't go.

title: Winterfell
Name: theon
text: theon You're my queen. I go where you command.

title: Winterfell
Name: yara
text: yara You want to go to Winterfell. To fight for the Starks. Go. What is dead may never die.

title: Winterfell
Name: theon
text: theon What is dead may never die.

title: Winterfell
Name: yara
text: yara But kill the bastards anyway.

title: Winterfell
Name: wolkan
text: wolkan Welcome back, my lady. If you'd follow me

title: Winterfell
Name: varys
text: varys The Karstarks.

title: Winterfell
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion One of the better sigils. Beats an onion, anyway.

title: Winterfell
Name: davos
text: davos Can't argue with that.

title: Winterfell
Name: davos
text: davos Not so long ago, the Starks and the Karstarks were slaughtering each other on the battlefield. Jon Snow brought peace to the houses.

title: Winterfell
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion And our queen is grateful.

title: Winterfell
Name: davos
text: davos Her gratitude is lovely, but that's not my point. The Northmen are loyal to Jon Snow, not to her. They don't know her. The Free Folk don't know her. I've been up here a while, and I'm telling you, they're stubborn as goats. You want their loyalty, you have to earn it.

title: Winterfell
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion I sense that you're leading to a proposal.

title: Winterfell
Name: davos
text: davos A proposal is what I'm proposing. On the off chance that we survive the Night King, what if the Seven Kingdoms, for once in their whole shit history, were ruled by a just woman and an honorable man?

title: Winterfell
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion They do make a handsome couple.

title: Winterfell
Name: varys
text: varys You overestimate our influence. Jon and Daenerys don't want to listen to lonely old men.

title: Winterfell
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion I'm not that old.

title: Winterfell
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion Not as old as him.

title: Winterfell
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion Our queen respects the wisdom of age.

title: Winterfell
Name: varys
text: varys Of course she does. Respect is how the young keep us at a distance, so we don't remind them of an unpleasant truth.

title: Winterfell
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion What is that?

title: Winterfell
Name: varys
text: varys Nothing lasts.

title: Winterfell
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys Your sister doesn't like me.

title: Winterfell
Name: jon
text: jon She doesn't know you. If it makes you feel any better, she didn't like me either when we were growing up.

title: Winterfell
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys She doesn't need to be my friend but I am her queen. If she can't respect me-

title: Winterfell
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys How many today?

title: Winterfell
Name: dothraki
text: dothraki Only eighteen goats and eleven sheep.

title: Winterfell
Name: jon
text: jon What's the matter?

title: Winterfell
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys The dragons are barely eating.

title: Winterfell
Name: jon
text: jon What's wrong with them?

title: Winterfell
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys They don't like the North.

title: Winterfell
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys Go on.

title: Winterfell
Name: jon
text: jon I don't know how to ride a dragon.

title: Winterfell
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys Nobody does. Until they ride a dragon.

title: Winterfell
Name: jon
text: jon What if he doesn't want me to?

title: Winterfell
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys Then I've enjoyed your company, Jon Snow.

title: Winterfell
Name: jon
text: jon What do I hold onto?

title: Winterfell
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys Whatever you can.

title: Winterfell
Name: jon
text: jon You've completely ruined horses for me.

title: Winterfell
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys We could stay a thousand years-

title: Winterfell
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys No one would find us.

title: Winterfell
Name: jon
text: jon We'd be pretty old.

title: Winterfell
Name: jon
text: jon It's cold up here for a southern girl.

title: Winterfell
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys So keep your queen warm.

title: Winterfell
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys Don't be afraid.

title: Winterfell
Name: man
text: man Gendry?

title: Winterfell
Name: man
text: man He's here.

title: Winterfell
Name: gendry
text: gendry It isn't easy making a blade that big with dragonglass.

title: Winterfell
Name: sandor
text: sandor You're saying you're good, is that it?

title: Winterfell
Name: gendry
text: gendry I'm just saying it's a tricky material to-

title: Winterfell
Name: sandor
text: sandor You know who makes weapons for the wildlings? Cripples and cocksuckers. Which one are you?

title: Winterfell
Name: arya
text: arya Leave him be.

title: Winterfell
Name: sandor
text: sandor I heard you were here. You left me to die.

title: Winterfell
Name: arya
text: arya First I robbed you.

title: Winterfell
Name: sandor
text: sandor You're a cold little bitch, aren't you? Guess that's why you're still alive.

title: Winterfell
Name: arya
text: arya That was a nice ax you made for him. You've gotten better.

title: Winterfell
Name: gendry
text: gendry Yeah, thanks. So have you.

title: Winterfell
Name: gendry
text: gendry I mean, you look good.

title: Winterfell
Name: arya
text: arya Thanks. So do you.

title: Winterfell
Name: gendry
text: gendry It's not a bad place to grow up, if it wasn't so cold.

title: Winterfell
Name: arya
text: arya Stay close to that forge, then.

title: Winterfell
Name: gendry
text: gendry Is that a command, Lady Stark?

title: Winterfell
Name: arya
text: arya Don't call me that.

title: Winterfell
Name: gendry
text: gendry As you wish, milady.

title: Winterfell
Name: arya
text: arya Here's my wish.

title: Winterfell
Name: arya
text: arya Can you make it?

title: Winterfell
Name: gendry
text: gendry What do you need something like this for?

title: Winterfell
Name: arya
text: arya Can you make it or not?

title: Winterfell
Name: gendry
text: gendry You already have a sword. What's that?

title: Winterfell
Name: gendry
text: gendry It's Valyrian steel. I always knew you were just another rich girl.

title: Winterfell
Name: arya
text: arya You don't know any other rich girls.

title: Winterfell
Name: sansa
text: sansa Come in.

title: Winterfell
Name: sansa
text: sansa Lord Glover wishes us good fortune, but he's staying in Deepwood Motte with his men.

title: Winterfell
Name: jon
text: jon House Glover will stand behind House Stark as we have for a thousand years." Isn't that what he said?

title: Winterfell
Name: sansa
text: sansa I will stand behind Jon Snow," he said.

title: Winterfell
Name: sansa
text: sansa The King in the North.

title: Winterfell
Name: jon
text: jon I told you we needed allies.

title: Winterfell
Name: sansa
text: sansa You didn't tell me you were going to abandon your crown.

title: Winterfell
Name: jon
text: jon I never wanted a crown. All I wanted was to protect the North. I brought two armies home with me, two dragons.

title: Winterfell
Name: sansa
text: sansa And a Targaryen queen.

title: Winterfell
Name: jon
text: jon Do you think we can beat the Army of the Dead without her? I fought them, Sansa. Twice. You want to worry about who holds what title, I'm telling you it doesn't matter. Without her, we don't stand a chance.

title: Winterfell
Name: jon
text: jon Do you have any faith in me at all?

title: Winterfell
Name: sansa
text: sansa You know I do.

title: Winterfell
Name: jon
text: jon She'll be a good queen. For all of us. She's not her father.

title: Winterfell
Name: sansa
text: sansa No, she's much prettier.

title: Winterfell
Name: sansa
text: sansa Did you bend the knee to save the North or because you love her?

title: Winterfell
Name: sam
text: sam Oh!

title: Winterfell
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys So you're the man?

title: Winterfell
Name: sam
text: sam Um. Which man am I, Your Grace?

title: Winterfell
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys The one who saved Ser Jorah when no one else could.

title: Winterfell
Name: jorah
text: jorah They could, they just wouldn't.

title: Winterfell
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys I'll have to make some changes in the Citadel when I take my throne. A great service merits a great reward.

title: Winterfell
Name: sam
text: sam Oh, it's my honor to serve you, Your Grace.

title: Winterfell
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys Well, there must be something I could give you.

title: Winterfell
Name: sam
text: sam If it's not too much trouble, I could use a pardon.

title: Winterfell
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys For what crime?

title: Winterfell
Name: sam
text: sam Um, I borrowed a few books from the Citadel.

title: Winterfell
Name: sam
text: sam And also a sword.

title: Winterfell
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys From the Citadel?

title: Winterfell
Name: sam
text: sam From my family. It's been in House Tarly for generations.

title: Winterfell
Name: sam
text: sam It wouldo ve been mine anyway, eventually, but my father had other ideas.

title: Winterfell
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys Not Randyll Tarly?

title: Winterfell
Name: sam
text: sam You know him?

title: Winterfell
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys I offered to let him retain his lands and titles if he bent the knee. He refused.

title: Winterfell
Name: sam
text: sam Well At least I'll be allowed home again, now that my brother's the lord.

title: Winterfell
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys Your brother stood with your father.

title: Winterfell
Name: sam
text: sam Hm. Thank you, Your Grace. For telling me. And m- may I?

title: Winterfell
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys Of course.

title: Winterfell
Name: sam
text: sam What are you doing out here?

title: Winterfell
Name: bran
text: bran Waiting, for an old friend. It's time to tell Jon the truth.

title: Winterfell
Name: sam
text: sam No, no. You're his brother. Shouldn't you tell him?

title: Winterfell
Name: bran
text: bran I'm not his brother. He trusts you more than anyone. Now's the time.

title: Winterfell
Name: jon
text: jon Sam?

title: Winterfell
Name: sam
text: sam I'm sorry, I know I'm not supposed to be down here.

title: Winterfell
Name: jon
text: jon Were you hiding from me?

title: Winterfell
Name: sam
text: sam Of course not.

title: Winterfell
Name: jon
text: jon What are you doing in Winterfell? Or did you read every book in the Citadel already?

title: Winterfell
Name: jon
text: jon What's wrong? Gilly? Is she all right?

title: Winterfell
Name: sam
text: sam She's good.

title: Winterfell
Name: jon
text: jon Little Sam?

title: Winterfell
Name: sam
text: sam Don't you know?

title: Winterfell
Name: jon
text: jon Know what?

title: Winterfell
Name: sam
text: sam Daenerys. She executed my father and brother. They were her prisoners.

title: Winterfell
Name: sam
text: sam She didn't tell you.

title: Winterfell
Name: jon
text: jon I'm so sorry. We need to end this war.

title: Winterfell
Name: sam
text: sam Would you have done it?

title: Winterfell
Name: jon
text: jon Well, I've executed men who disobeyed me.

title: Winterfell
Name: sam
text: sam You've also spared men. Thousands of wildlings when they refused to kneel.

title: Winterfell
Name: jon
text: jon I wasn't a king.

title: Winterfell
Name: sam
text: sam But you were. You've always been.

title: Winterfell
Name: jon
text: jon I gave up my crown, Sam.

title: Winterfell
Name: jon
text: jon I bent the knee. I'm not King in the North anymore.

title: Winterfell
Name: sam
text: sam I'm not talking about the King in the North. I'm talking about the King of the bloody Seven Kingdoms.

title: Winterfell
Name: sam
text: sam Bran and I worked it out. I had a High Septon's diary. Bran had whatever Bran has.

title: Winterfell
Name: jon
text: jon What are you talking about?

title: Winterfell
Name: sam
text: sam Your mother was Lyanna Stark.

title: Winterfell
Name: sam
text: sam And your father- your real father was Rhaegar Targaryen. You've never been a bastard. You're Aegon Targaryen, true heir to the Iron Throne. I'm sorry, I know it's a lot to take in.

title: Winterfell
Name: jon
text: jon My father was the most honorable man I ever met. You're saying he lied to me all my life.

title: Winterfell
Name: sam
text: sam No. Your father- Well, Ned Stark. He promised your mother he'd always protect you. And he did. Robert would have murdered you if he knew. You're the true king. Aegon Targaryen, Sixth of His Name, Protector of the Realm, all of it.

title: Winterfell
Name: jon
text: jon Daenerys is our queen.

title: Winterfell
Name: sam
text: sam She shouldn't be.

title: Winterfell
Name: jon
text: jon That's treason.

title: Winterfell
Name: sam
text: sam It's the truth. You gave up your crown to save your people. Would she do the same?

title: Winterfell
Name: edd
text: edd Stay back, he's got blue eyes!

title: Winterfell
Name: tormund
text: tormund I've always had blue eyes!

title: Winterfell
Name: beric
text: beric Did you find anyone?

title: Winterfell
Name: edd
text: edd The Umber boy.

title: Winterfell
Name: beric
text: beric It's a message. From the Night King.

title: Winterfell
Name: tormund
text: tormund His army's between us and Winterfell. We're on foot.

title: Winterfell
Name: edd
text: edd We rode down from Castle Black. We can double up on the horses.

title: Winterfell
Name: tormund
text: tormund If the horses last, we'll get there before the dead.

title: Winterfell
Name: tormund
text: tormund We just have to hope the Night King doesn't come first-

title: A Knight of the Seven Kingdoms
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys When I was a child, my brother would tell me a bedtime story about the man who murdered our father.

title: A Knight of the Seven Kingdoms
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys Who stabbed him in the back and cut his throat. Who sat down on the Iron Throne and watched as his blood poured onto the floor.

title: A Knight of the Seven Kingdoms
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys He told me other stories as well. About all the things we would do to that man once we took back the Seven Kingdoms and had him in our grasp.

title: A Knight of the Seven Kingdoms
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys Your sister pledged to send her army north.

title: A Knight of the Seven Kingdoms
Name: jaime
text: jaime She did.

title: A Knight of the Seven Kingdoms
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys I don't see an army. I see one man, with one hand. It appears your sister lied to me.

title: A Knight of the Seven Kingdoms
Name: jaime
text: jaime She lied to me as well. She never had any intention of sending her army north.

title: A Knight of the Seven Kingdoms
Name: jaime
text: jaime She has Euron Greyjoy's fleet and 20,000 fresh troops. The Golden Company from Essos, bought and paid for. Even if we defeat the dead, she'll have more than enough to destroy the survivors.

title: A Knight of the Seven Kingdoms
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys We"?

title: A Knight of the Seven Kingdoms
Name: jaime
text: jaime I promised to fight for the living. I intend to keep that promise.

title: A Knight of the Seven Kingdoms
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion Your Grace, I know my brother-

title: A Knight of the Seven Kingdoms
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys Like you knew your sister?

title: A Knight of the Seven Kingdoms
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion He came here alone, knowing full well how he'd be received. Why would he do that if he weren't telling the truth?

title: A Knight of the Seven Kingdoms
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys Perhaps he trusts his little brother to defend him, right up to the moment he slits my throat.

title: A Knight of the Seven Kingdoms
Name: sansa
text: sansa You're right. We can't trust him. He attacked my father in the streets. He tried to destroy my house and my family, the same as he did yours.

title: A Knight of the Seven Kingdoms
Name: jaime
text: jaime Do you want me to apologize? I won't. We were at war. Everything I did, I did for my house and my family. I'd do it all again.

title: A Knight of the Seven Kingdoms
Name: bran
text: bran The things we do for love.

title: A Knight of the Seven Kingdoms
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys So why have you abandoned your house and family now?

title: A Knight of the Seven Kingdoms
Name: jaime
text: jaime Because this goes beyond loyalty.

title: A Knight of the Seven Kingdoms
Name: jaime
text: jaime This is about survival.

title: A Knight of the Seven Kingdoms
Name: brienne
text: brienne You don't know me well, Your Grace.

title: A Knight of the Seven Kingdoms
Name: brienne
text: brienne But I know Ser Jaime. He is a man of honor. I was his captor once. But when we were both taken prisoner and the men holding us tried to force themselves on me, Ser Jaime defended me. And lost his hand because of it.

title: A Knight of the Seven Kingdoms
Name: brienne
text: brienne Without him, my lady, you would not be alive. He armed me, armored me, and sent me to find you and bring you home because he'd sworn an oath to your mother.

title: A Knight of the Seven Kingdoms
Name: sansa
text: sansa You vouch for him?

title: A Knight of the Seven Kingdoms
Name: brienne
text: brienne I do.

title: A Knight of the Seven Kingdoms
Name: sansa
text: sansa You would fight beside him?

title: A Knight of the Seven Kingdoms
Name: brienne
text: brienne I would.

title: A Knight of the Seven Kingdoms
Name: sansa
text: sansa I trust you with my life. If you trust him with yours, we should let him stay.

title: A Knight of the Seven Kingdoms
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys What does the Warden of the North say about it?

title: A Knight of the Seven Kingdoms
Name: jon
text: jon We need every man we can get.

title: A Knight of the Seven Kingdoms
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys Very well.

title: A Knight of the Seven Kingdoms
Name: jaime
text: jaime Thank you, Your Grace.

title: A Knight of the Seven Kingdoms
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys Either you knew Cersei was lying and let me believe otherwise, or you didn't know at all. Which makes you either a traitor or a fool.

title: A Knight of the Seven Kingdoms
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion I was a fool.

title: A Knight of the Seven Kingdoms
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys Not for the first time.

title: A Knight of the Seven Kingdoms
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys Cersei still sits on the throne. If you can't help me take it back, I'll find another Hand who can.

title: A Knight of the Seven Kingdoms
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion I suspect one of you will be wearing this before it's all over.

title: A Knight of the Seven Kingdoms
Name: gendry
text: gendry Don't you have something better to do?

title: A Knight of the Seven Kingdoms
Name: arya
text: arya You make my weapon yet?

title: A Knight of the Seven Kingdoms
Name: gendry
text: gendry Just as soon as I'm done making a few thousand of these.

title: A Knight of the Seven Kingdoms
Name: arya
text: arya You should make mine first. And make sure it's stronger than this.

title: A Knight of the Seven Kingdoms
Name: gendry
text: gendry It's strong enough.

title: A Knight of the Seven Kingdoms
Name: gendry
text: gendry It's going to be safer down in the crypt, you know.

title: A Knight of the Seven Kingdoms
Name: arya
text: arya Are you going to be down in the crypt?

title: A Knight of the Seven Kingdoms
Name: gendry
text: gendry No, but-

title: A Knight of the Seven Kingdoms
Name: arya
text: arya But you're a fighter.

title: A Knight of the Seven Kingdoms
Name: gendry
text: gendry I've done my share.

title: A Knight of the Seven Kingdoms
Name: arya
text: arya You've fought them?

title: A Knight of the Seven Kingdoms
Name: gendry
text: gendry I did. Some of them.

title: A Knight of the Seven Kingdoms
Name: arya
text: arya How many?

title: A Knight of the Seven Kingdoms
Name: gendry
text: gendry A few. That was enough.

title: A Knight of the Seven Kingdoms
Name: arya
text: arya What are they like?

title: A Knight of the Seven Kingdoms
Name: gendry
text: gendry Bad. Really bad.

title: A Knight of the Seven Kingdoms
Name: arya
text: arya Really bad"?

title: A Knight of the Seven Kingdoms
Name: arya
text: arya Even a smith's apprentice can do better than "really bad." What do they look like? What do they smell like? How do they move? How hard are they to kill?

title: A Knight of the Seven Kingdoms
Name: gendry
text: gendry Look, I know you want to fight. And I know you're not scared of rapers or murderers or-This is different. This is-this is death. You want to know what they're like? Death. That's what they're like.

title: A Knight of the Seven Kingdoms
Name: arya
text: arya I know Death.

title: A Knight of the Seven Kingdoms
Name: arya
text: arya He's got many faces.

title: A Knight of the Seven Kingdoms
Name: arya
text: arya I look forward to seeing this one.

title: A Knight of the Seven Kingdoms
Name: arya
text: arya My weapon?

title: A Knight of the Seven Kingdoms
Name: gendry
text: gendry I'll get right on it.

title: A Knight of the Seven Kingdoms
Name: jaime
text: jaime I'm sorry for what I did to you.

title: A Knight of the Seven Kingdoms
Name: bran
text: bran You weren't sorry then. You were protecting your family.

title: A Knight of the Seven Kingdoms
Name: jaime
text: jaime I'm not that person anymore.

title: A Knight of the Seven Kingdoms
Name: bran
text: bran You still would be, if you hadn't pushed me out of that window. And I would still be Brandon Stark.

title: A Knight of the Seven Kingdoms
Name: jaime
text: jaime You're not?

title: A Knight of the Seven Kingdoms
Name: bran
text: bran No. I'm something else now.

title: A Knight of the Seven Kingdoms
Name: jaime
text: jaime You're not angry at me.

title: A Knight of the Seven Kingdoms
Name: bran
text: bran I'm not angry at anyone.

title: A Knight of the Seven Kingdoms
Name: jaime
text: jaime Why didn't you tell them?

title: A Knight of the Seven Kingdoms
Name: bran
text: bran You won't be able to help us in this fight if I let them murder you first.

title: A Knight of the Seven Kingdoms
Name: jaime
text: jaime What about afterwards?

title: A Knight of the Seven Kingdoms
Name: bran
text: bran How do you know there is an afterwards?

title: A Knight of the Seven Kingdoms
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion Well, here we are.

title: A Knight of the Seven Kingdoms
Name: jaime
text: jaime Yes, here we are.

title: A Knight of the Seven Kingdoms
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion Together again.

title: A Knight of the Seven Kingdoms
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion And the masses rejoice.

title: A Knight of the Seven Kingdoms
Name: jaime
text: jaime How do they feel about their new queen?

title: A Knight of the Seven Kingdoms
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion She's your new queen too.

title: A Knight of the Seven Kingdoms
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion They remember what happened the last time Targaryens brought dragons north. They'll come around once they see Daenerys is different.

title: A Knight of the Seven Kingdoms
Name: jaime
text: jaime And she is? Different?

title: A Knight of the Seven Kingdoms
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion She is.

title: A Knight of the Seven Kingdoms
Name: jaime
text: jaime You're sure about her?

title: A Knight of the Seven Kingdoms
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion I am.

title: A Knight of the Seven Kingdoms
Name: jaime
text: jaime She didn't seem sure about you.

title: A Knight of the Seven Kingdoms
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion It's hard to blame her. I made a mistake common to clever people. I underestimated my opponents.

title: A Knight of the Seven Kingdoms
Name: jaime
text: jaime Hmm.

title: A Knight of the Seven Kingdoms
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion Cersei told me the pregnancy had changed her. A chance for you both to start again. And I believed her.

title: A Knight of the Seven Kingdoms
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion Was she lying about the baby too?

title: A Knight of the Seven Kingdoms
Name: jaime
text: jaime No, that part is real.

title: A Knight of the Seven Kingdoms
Name: jaime
text: jaime She's always been good at using the truth to tell lies. I wouldn't be too hard on yourself. She's fooled me more than anybody.

title: A Knight of the Seven Kingdoms
Name: jaime
text: jaime What?

title: A Knight of the Seven Kingdoms
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion She never fooled you. You always knew exactly what she was, and you loved her anyway.

title: A Knight of the Seven Kingdoms
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion So we're going to die at Winterfell. Not the death I wouldo ve chosen. I always pictured myself dying in my own bed, the age of 80, with a belly full of wine and-

title: A Knight of the Seven Kingdoms
Name: both
text: both A girl's mouth around-

title: A Knight of the Seven Kingdoms
Name: jaime
text: jaime Your cock.

title: A Knight of the Seven Kingdoms
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion My cock.

title: A Knight of the Seven Kingdoms
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion At least Cersei won't get to murder me. I'm sure I'll feel some satisfaction denying her that pleasure while I'm being ripped apart by dead men.

title: A Knight of the Seven Kingdoms
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion Maybe after I'm dead I'll march down to King's Landing and rip her apart.

title: A Knight of the Seven Kingdoms
Name: brienne
text: brienne Ser Jaime.

title: A Knight of the Seven Kingdoms
Name: jaime
text: jaime Lady Brienne.

title: A Knight of the Seven Kingdoms
Name: jaime
text: jaime He's come a long way.

title: A Knight of the Seven Kingdoms
Name: brienne
text: brienne He's alright. Still has a lot to learn.

title: A Knight of the Seven Kingdoms
Name: jaime
text: jaime I'm sure you'll teach him. I've been told you're commanding the left flank.

title: A Knight of the Seven Kingdoms
Name: brienne
text: brienne I am. It's, uh-it's good ground.

title: A Knight of the Seven Kingdoms
Name: jaime
text: jaime It is.

title: A Knight of the Seven Kingdoms
Name: brienne
text: brienne The rise, it should give us some advantage.

title: A Knight of the Seven Kingdoms
Name: brienne
text: brienne If we can keep a tight formation, we might be able to beat them back.

title: A Knight of the Seven Kingdoms
Name: jaime
text: jaime Yes, I think you're right.

title: A Knight of the Seven Kingdoms
Name: brienne
text: brienne What are you doing?

title: A Knight of the Seven Kingdoms
Name: brienne
text: brienne I think you know.

title: A Knight of the Seven Kingdoms
Name: jaime
text: jaime I truly don't.

title: A Knight of the Seven Kingdoms
Name: brienne
text: brienne We have never had a conversation last this long without you insulting me. Not once.

title: A Knight of the Seven Kingdoms
Name: jaime
text: jaime You want me to insult you?

title: A Knight of the Seven Kingdoms
Name: brienne
text: brienne No!

title: A Knight of the Seven Kingdoms
Name: jaime
text: jaime Good.

title: A Knight of the Seven Kingdoms
Name: jaime
text: jaime I came to Winterfell because-I'm not the fighter I used to be. But I'd be honored to serve under your command, if you'll have me.

title: A Knight of the Seven Kingdoms
Name: brienne
text: brienne I better get back.

title: A Knight of the Seven Kingdoms
Name: jorah
text: jorah Forgive me, khaleesi.

title: A Knight of the Seven Kingdoms
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys Have you done something to offend me?

title: A Knight of the Seven Kingdoms
Name: jorah
text: jorah Many things.

title: A Knight of the Seven Kingdoms
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys Long ago and long forgiven.

title: A Knight of the Seven Kingdoms
Name: jorah
text: jorah But you did forgive, despite my failures. When I heard you'd named Tyrion your Hand, it broke my heart.

title: A Knight of the Seven Kingdoms
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys When I named him Hand, I didn't know if I'd ever see you again.

title: A Knight of the Seven Kingdoms
Name: jorah
text: jorah You made the right choice.

title: A Knight of the Seven Kingdoms
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys I wasn't under the impression you liked him very much.

title: A Knight of the Seven Kingdoms
Name: jorah
text: jorah I didn't. His mouth hardly stopped moving between Volantis and Meereen. It was all I could do not to throw him in the sea.

title: A Knight of the Seven Kingdoms
Name: jorah
text: jorah But the mind behind all those words-

title: A Knight of the Seven Kingdoms
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys He's made mistakes. Serious mistakes.

title: A Knight of the Seven Kingdoms
Name: jorah
text: jorah As have we all. He owns his and learns from them.

title: A Knight of the Seven Kingdoms
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys You're advising me to forgive the man who stole your position?

title: A Knight of the Seven Kingdoms
Name: jorah
text: jorah I am. And one other suggestion, if you'll allow me.

title: A Knight of the Seven Kingdoms
Name: royce
text: royce The moment we can get the last infantryman out onto the field, we should shut the gates.

title: A Knight of the Seven Kingdoms
Name: sansa
text: sansa Keep them open for as long as you can. There are still people coming in from the countryside.

title: A Knight of the Seven Kingdoms
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys Lady Sansa, I was hoping we could speak alone.

title: A Knight of the Seven Kingdoms
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys I thought you and I were on the verge of agreement before. About Ser Jaime.

title: A Knight of the Seven Kingdoms
Name: sansa
text: sansa Brienne has been loyal to me, always. I trust her more than anyone.

title: A Knight of the Seven Kingdoms
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys I wish I could have that kind of faith in my advisors.

title: A Knight of the Seven Kingdoms
Name: sansa
text: sansa Tyrion is a good man. He was never anything but decent towards me.

title: A Knight of the Seven Kingdoms
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys I didn't ask him to be my Hand simply because he was good.

title: A Knight of the Seven Kingdoms
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys I asked him to be my Hand because he was good, and intelligent, and ruthless when he had to be. He never should have trusted Cersei.

title: A Knight of the Seven Kingdoms
Name: sansa
text: sansa You never should have either.

title: A Knight of the Seven Kingdoms
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys I thought he knew his sister.

title: A Knight of the Seven Kingdoms
Name: sansa
text: sansa Families are complicated.

title: A Knight of the Seven Kingdoms
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys Ours certainly have been.

title: A Knight of the Seven Kingdoms
Name: sansa
text: sansa A sad thing to have in common.

title: A Knight of the Seven Kingdoms
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys We have other things in common. We've both known what it means to lead people who aren't inclined to accept a woman's rule. And we've both done a damn good job of it, from what I can tell.

title: A Knight of the Seven Kingdoms
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys And yet, I can't help but feel we're at odds with one another. Why is that? Your brother.

title: A Knight of the Seven Kingdoms
Name: sansa
text: sansa He loves you, you know that.

title: A Knight of the Seven Kingdoms
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys That bothers you.

title: A Knight of the Seven Kingdoms
Name: sansa
text: sansa Men do stupid things for women. They're easily manipulated.

title: A Knight of the Seven Kingdoms
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys All my life, I've known one goal

title: A Knight of the Seven Kingdoms
Name: sansa
text: sansa I should have thanked you the moment you arrived. That was a mistake.

title: A Knight of the Seven Kingdoms
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys I'm here because I love your brother and I trust him, and I know he's true to his word. He's only the second man in my life I can say that about.

title: A Knight of the Seven Kingdoms
Name: sansa
text: sansa Who was the first?

title: A Knight of the Seven Kingdoms
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys Someone taller.

title: A Knight of the Seven Kingdoms
Name: sansa
text: sansa And what happens afterwards? We defeat the dead, we destroy Cersei. What happens then?

title: A Knight of the Seven Kingdoms
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys I take the Iron Throne.

title: A Knight of the Seven Kingdoms
Name: sansa
text: sansa What about the North? It was taken from us, and we took it back. And we said we'd never bow to anyone else again. What about the North?

title: A Knight of the Seven Kingdoms
Name: wolkan
text: wolkan Apologies, my lady. Your Grace.

title: A Knight of the Seven Kingdoms
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys What is it?

title: A Knight of the Seven Kingdoms
Name: theon
text: theon My queen.

title: A Knight of the Seven Kingdoms
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys Your sister?

title: A Knight of the Seven Kingdoms
Name: theon
text: theon She only has a few ships, and she couldn't sail them here. So, she's sailing to the Iron Islands instead, to take them back in your name.

title: A Knight of the Seven Kingdoms
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys But why aren't you with her?

title: A Knight of the Seven Kingdoms
Name: theon
text: theon I want to fight for Winterfell, Lady Sansa, if you'll have me.

title: A Knight of the Seven Kingdoms
Name: man
text: man Milord, we're not soldiers.

title: A Knight of the Seven Kingdoms
Name: davos
text: davos You are now. Look, I made it through most of my years without ever getting near a fight, but then I survived the Battle of the Bastards. Right outside these walls. If I can live through that, you can live through this. They'll outfit you with weapons at the forge. Right that way.

title: A Knight of the Seven Kingdoms
Name: man
text: man Thank you.

title: A Knight of the Seven Kingdoms
Name: gilly
text: gilly When the time comes, you'll be down in the crypts.

title: A Knight of the Seven Kingdoms
Name: gilly
text: gilly They're the safest place to be. Through that archway right over there.

title: A Knight of the Seven Kingdoms
Name: woman
text: woman Thank you.

title: A Knight of the Seven Kingdoms
Name: teela
text: teela Which way should I go?

title: A Knight of the Seven Kingdoms
Name: davos
text: davos Which way do you want to go?

title: A Knight of the Seven Kingdoms
Name: teela
text: teela All the children will be going below when the time comes.

title: A Knight of the Seven Kingdoms
Name: teela
text: teela But both me brothers were soldiers. I want to fight too.

title: A Knight of the Seven Kingdoms
Name: gilly
text: gilly That's good to hear. I'm going to be in the crypt with my son, and I'd feel a lot better with you down there to protect us.

title: A Knight of the Seven Kingdoms
Name: davos
text: davos I'm sure a lot of people would.

title: A Knight of the Seven Kingdoms
Name: teela
text: teela All right. I'll defend the crypt, then.

title: A Knight of the Seven Kingdoms
Name: tormund
text: tormund My little crow.

title: A Knight of the Seven Kingdoms
Name: jon
text: jon I thought we'd lost you.

title: A Knight of the Seven Kingdoms
Name: tormund
text: tormund Almost.

title: A Knight of the Seven Kingdoms
Name: jon
text: jon How did you find each other?

title: A Knight of the Seven Kingdoms
Name: edd
text: edd We met up at the Last Hearth.

title: A Knight of the Seven Kingdoms
Name: tormund
text: tormund The dead got there first.

title: A Knight of the Seven Kingdoms
Name: jon
text: jon The Umbers?

title: A Knight of the Seven Kingdoms
Name: beric
text: beric Fighting for the Night King now.

title: A Knight of the Seven Kingdoms
Name: tormund
text: tormund We had to travel around them to get here. Whoever's not here now is with them.

title: A Knight of the Seven Kingdoms
Name: jon
text: jon How long do we have?

title: A Knight of the Seven Kingdoms
Name: tormund
text: tormund Before the sun comes up tomorrow.

title: A Knight of the Seven Kingdoms
Name: tormund
text: tormund The big woman still here?

title: A Knight of the Seven Kingdoms
Name: jon
text: jon They're coming.

title: A Knight of the Seven Kingdoms
Name: jon
text: jon We have dragonglass and Valyrian steel.

title: A Knight of the Seven Kingdoms
Name: jon
text: jon But there are too many of them.

title: A Knight of the Seven Kingdoms
Name: jon
text: jon Far too many.

title: A Knight of the Seven Kingdoms
Name: jon
text: jon Our enemy doesn't tire.

title: A Knight of the Seven Kingdoms
Name: jon
text: jon Doesn't stop. Doesn't feel.

title: A Knight of the Seven Kingdoms
Name: jon
text: jon We can't beat them in a straight fight.

title: A Knight of the Seven Kingdoms
Name: jaime
text: jaime So, what can we do?

title: A Knight of the Seven Kingdoms
Name: jon
text: jon The Night King made them all. They follow his command. If he falls Getting to him may be our best chance.

title: A Knight of the Seven Kingdoms
Name: jaime
text: jaime If that's true, he'll never expose himself.

title: A Knight of the Seven Kingdoms
Name: bran
text: bran Yes, he will.

title: A Knight of the Seven Kingdoms
Name: bran
text: bran He'll come for me. He's tried before, many times, with many Three-Eyed Ravens.

title: A Knight of the Seven Kingdoms
Name: sam
text: sam Why? What does he want?

title: A Knight of the Seven Kingdoms
Name: bran
text: bran An endless night. He wants to erase this world, and I am its memory.

title: A Knight of the Seven Kingdoms
Name: sam
text: sam That's what death is, isn't it? Forgetting. Being forgotten. If we forget where we've been and what we've done, we're not men anymore. Just animals. Your memories don't come from books. Your stories aren't just stories. If I wanted to erase the world of men, I'd start with you.

title: A Knight of the Seven Kingdoms
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion How will he find you?

title: A Knight of the Seven Kingdoms
Name: bran
text: bran His mark is on me.

title: A Knight of the Seven Kingdoms
Name: bran
text: bran He always knows where I am.

title: A Knight of the Seven Kingdoms
Name: jon
text: jon We'll put you in the crypt, where it's safest.

title: A Knight of the Seven Kingdoms
Name: bran
text: bran No. We need to lure him into the open before his army destroys us all. I'll wait for him in the Godswood.

title: A Knight of the Seven Kingdoms
Name: sansa
text: sansa You want us to use you as bait?

title: A Knight of the Seven Kingdoms
Name: arya
text: arya We're not leaving you alone out there.

title: A Knight of the Seven Kingdoms
Name: theon
text: theon He won't be. I'll stay with him. With the Ironborn. I took this castle from you. Let me defend you now.

title: A Knight of the Seven Kingdoms
Name: davos
text: davos We'll hold off the rest of them for as long as we can.

title: A Knight of the Seven Kingdoms
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion When the time comes, Ser Davos and I will be on the walls, to give you the signal to light the trench.

title: A Knight of the Seven Kingdoms
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys Ser Davos is perfectly capable of waving a torch on his own. You'll be in the crypt.

title: A Knight of the Seven Kingdoms
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion Your Grace, I have fought before, I can do it again. Alongside the men and women risking their lives.

title: A Knight of the Seven Kingdoms
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys There are thousands of them and only one of you. You can't fight as well as they can, but you can think better than any of them. You're here because of your mind. If we survive, I'll need it.

title: A Knight of the Seven Kingdoms
Name: davos
text: davos The dragons should give us an edge in the field.

title: A Knight of the Seven Kingdoms
Name: jon
text: jon If they're in the field, they're not protecting Bran. We need to be near him. Not too near, or the Night King won't come. But close enough to pursue him when he does.

title: A Knight of the Seven Kingdoms
Name: arya
text: arya Dragonfire will stop him?

title: A Knight of the Seven Kingdoms
Name: bran
text: bran I don't know. No one's ever tried.

title: A Knight of the Seven Kingdoms
Name: tormund
text: tormund We're all going to die.

title: A Knight of the Seven Kingdoms
Name: tormund
text: tormund But at least we die together.

title: A Knight of the Seven Kingdoms
Name: jon
text: jon Let's get some rest.

title: A Knight of the Seven Kingdoms
Name: jon
text: jon Your Grace.

title: A Knight of the Seven Kingdoms
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion Do you need help?

title: A Knight of the Seven Kingdoms
Name: bran
text: bran No.
