title: A Knight of the Seven Kingdoms
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion You've had a strange journey.

title: A Knight of the Seven Kingdoms
Name: bran
text: bran Stranger than most.

title: A Knight of the Seven Kingdoms
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion I'd like to hear about it.

title: A Knight of the Seven Kingdoms
Name: bran
text: bran It's a long story.

title: A Knight of the Seven Kingdoms
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion If only we were trapped in a castle, in the middle of winter, with nowhere to go.

title: A Knight of the Seven Kingdoms
Name: missandei
text: missandei Hello.

title: A Knight of the Seven Kingdoms
Name: grey
text: grey When Daenerys takes her throne there will be no place for us here. I am loyal to my queen. I will fight for her until her enemies are defeated, but when the war is over and she has won, do you want to grow old in this place? Is there nothing else you want to do, nothing else you want to see?

title: A Knight of the Seven Kingdoms
Name: missandei
text: missandei Naath. I'd like to see the beaches again.

title: A Knight of the Seven Kingdoms
Name: grey
text: grey Then I will take you there.

title: A Knight of the Seven Kingdoms
Name: missandei
text: missandei My people are peaceful. We cannot protect ourselves.

title: A Knight of the Seven Kingdoms
Name: grey
text: grey My people are not peaceful. We will protect you.

title: A Knight of the Seven Kingdoms
Name: sam
text: sam Have you told her yet?

title: A Knight of the Seven Kingdoms
Name: jon
text: jon No.

title: A Knight of the Seven Kingdoms
Name: sam
text: sam Mm-hmm. Being careful. Biding your time. Waiting for the perfect-

title: A Knight of the Seven Kingdoms
Name: edd
text: edd And now our watch begins.

title: A Knight of the Seven Kingdoms
Name: jon
text: jon Gilly? Little Sam?

title: A Knight of the Seven Kingdoms
Name: sam
text: sam They'll be safe down in the crypt.

title: A Knight of the Seven Kingdoms
Name: jon
text: jon If you want to join them.

title: A Knight of the Seven Kingdoms
Name: jon
text: jon To protect them.

title: A Knight of the Seven Kingdoms
Name: sam
text: sam Everyone seems to forget that I was the first man to kill a White Walker. I've killed Thenns.

title: A Knight of the Seven Kingdoms
Name: edd
text: edd Thenn.

title: A Knight of the Seven Kingdoms
Name: sam
text: sam I've saved Gilly more than once. I stole a considerable number of books from the Citadel library, survived the Fist of the First Men. You need me out there.

title: A Knight of the Seven Kingdoms
Name: edd
text: edd Well, if that's what it's come to, we really are fucked.

title: A Knight of the Seven Kingdoms
Name: sam
text: sam Well, calling you "fucked" wouldn't be strictly accurate.

title: A Knight of the Seven Kingdoms
Name: edd
text: edd Samwell Tarly. Slayer of White Walkers. Lover of Ladies. As if we needed any more signs the world was ending.

title: A Knight of the Seven Kingdoms
Name: sam
text: sam Think back to where we started. Us, Grenn, Pyp.

title: A Knight of the Seven Kingdoms
Name: jon
text: jon Now it's just us three.

title: A Knight of the Seven Kingdoms
Name: edd
text: edd Last man left, burn the rest of us.

title: A Knight of the Seven Kingdoms
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion I wish Father were here.

title: A Knight of the Seven Kingdoms
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion I would love to see the look on his face when he realizes his two sons are about to die defending Winterfell.

title: A Knight of the Seven Kingdoms
Name: jaime
text: jaime That would be something to see.

title: A Knight of the Seven Kingdoms
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion I remember the first time we were here, the first time I saw this hall.

title: A Knight of the Seven Kingdoms
Name: jaime
text: jaime Mm.

title: A Knight of the Seven Kingdoms
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion You were a golden lion. I was a drunken whore-monger. It was all so simple.

title: A Knight of the Seven Kingdoms
Name: jaime
text: jaime It wasn't so simple. I was sleeping with my sister and you had one friend in the world who was sleeping with his sister.

title: A Knight of the Seven Kingdoms
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion I was speaking in relative terms.

title: A Knight of the Seven Kingdoms
Name: jaime
text: jaime Do you miss it?

title: A Knight of the Seven Kingdoms
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion Of course I miss it.

title: A Knight of the Seven Kingdoms
Name: jaime
text: jaime Well, my golden lion days are done, but whore-mongering is still an option for you.

title: A Knight of the Seven Kingdoms
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion It's not. Things would be easier if it were.

title: A Knight of the Seven Kingdoms
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion The perils of self-betterment.

title: A Knight of the Seven Kingdoms
Name: jaime
text: jaime Oh! My lady.

title: A Knight of the Seven Kingdoms
Name: brienne
text: brienne Oh, we didn't mean to interrupt. We were just looking for somewhere warm to-

title: A Knight of the Seven Kingdoms
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion To contemplate your imminent death. You've come to the right place. You want some of this piss? It's not bad. It's not good either.

title: A Knight of the Seven Kingdoms
Name: podrick
text: podrick Thank you, milord.

title: A Knight of the Seven Kingdoms
Name: brienne
text: brienne I don't think that's wise.

title: A Knight of the Seven Kingdoms
Name: brienne
text: brienne The battle might start at any moment.

title: A Knight of the Seven Kingdoms
Name: brienne
text: brienne Half cup.

title: A Knight of the Seven Kingdoms
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion And you?

title: A Knight of the Seven Kingdoms
Name: brienne
text: brienne No, thank you. I should try and get some sleep.

title: A Knight of the Seven Kingdoms
Name: jaime
text: jaime You really think any of us are going to sleep tonight? Join us.

title: A Knight of the Seven Kingdoms
Name: brienne
text: brienne All right. Just a bit.

title: A Knight of the Seven Kingdoms
Name: davos
text: davos Well, what do we have here?

title: A Knight of the Seven Kingdoms
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion Ser Davos, join us.

title: A Knight of the Seven Kingdoms
Name: davos
text: davos No, not for me, thanks. Came here for this.

title: A Knight of the Seven Kingdoms
Name: davos
text: davos I figured I could wait to die freezing my balls off out there or wait to die nice and warm in here.

title: A Knight of the Seven Kingdoms
Name: tormund
text: tormund It could be our last night in this world, you know.

title: A Knight of the Seven Kingdoms
Name: brienne
text: brienne Yes, well, I'm glad you're here.

title: A Knight of the Seven Kingdoms
Name: brienne
text: brienne Here fighting with us. Glad you survived Eastwatch.

title: A Knight of the Seven Kingdoms
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion Would you like a drink?

title: A Knight of the Seven Kingdoms
Name: tormund
text: tormund Brought my own.

title: A Knight of the Seven Kingdoms
Name: tormund
text: tormund They call you "King Killer."

title: A Knight of the Seven Kingdoms
Name: jaime
text: jaime I'm sure someone does.

title: A Knight of the Seven Kingdoms
Name: tormund
text: tormund They call me "Giantsbane." Want to know why?

title: A Knight of the Seven Kingdoms
Name: tormund
text: tormund I killed a giant when I was ten. Then I climbed right into bed with his wife.

title: A Knight of the Seven Kingdoms
Name: tormund
text: tormund When she woke up, you know what she did? Suckled me at her teat for three months. Thought I was her baby. That's how I got so strong. Giant's milk.

title: A Knight of the Seven Kingdoms
Name: davos
text: davos Maybe I will have that drink.

title: A Knight of the Seven Kingdoms
Name: sandor
text: sandor You never used to shut up. Now you're just sitting there like a mute.

title: A Knight of the Seven Kingdoms
Name: arya
text: arya Guess I've changed.

title: A Knight of the Seven Kingdoms
Name: arya
text: arya What are you doing up here?

title: A Knight of the Seven Kingdoms
Name: sandor
text: sandor What's it look like?

title: A Knight of the Seven Kingdoms
Name: arya
text: arya No, I mean, what are you doing up here? You joined the Brotherhood. You went beyond the Wall with Jon. You're here now. Why? When was the last time you fought for anyone but yourself?

title: A Knight of the Seven Kingdoms
Name: sandor
text: sandor I fought for you, didn't I?

title: A Knight of the Seven Kingdoms
Name: sandor
text: sandor Oh, for fuck's sake. May as well be at a bloody wedding.

title: A Knight of the Seven Kingdoms
Name: beric
text: beric My lady. It's good to see you again. I'm sorry we parted the way we did.

title: A Knight of the Seven Kingdoms
Name: sandor
text: sandor Was he on your list?

title: A Knight of the Seven Kingdoms
Name: arya
text: arya For a little while.

title: A Knight of the Seven Kingdoms
Name: beric
text: beric That's all right.

title: A Knight of the Seven Kingdoms
Name: beric
text: beric The Lord of Light has brought us together all the same. This is his moment. When light-

title: A Knight of the Seven Kingdoms
Name: sandor
text: sandor Thoros isn't here anymore, so I hope you're not about to give a sermon. Because if you are, the Lord of Light's gonna wonder why he brought you back nineteen times just to watch you die when I chuck you over this fucking wall.

title: A Knight of the Seven Kingdoms
Name: sandor
text: sandor Where are you going?

title: A Knight of the Seven Kingdoms
Name: arya
text: arya I'm not spending my final hours with you two miserable old shits.

title: A Knight of the Seven Kingdoms
Name: arya
text: arya That for me?

title: A Knight of the Seven Kingdoms
Name: arya
text: arya This'll work.

title: A Knight of the Seven Kingdoms
Name: gendry
text: gendry Last time you saw me, you wanted me to come to Winterfell. Took the long road, but…

title: A Knight of the Seven Kingdoms
Name: arya
text: arya What did the Red Woman want with you?

title: A Knight of the Seven Kingdoms
Name: gendry
text: gendry She wanted my blood for some kind of spell.

title: A Knight of the Seven Kingdoms
Name: arya
text: arya Why your blood?

title: A Knight of the Seven Kingdoms
Name: gendry
text: gendry I'm Robert Baratheon's bastard.

title: A Knight of the Seven Kingdoms
Name: gendry
text: gendry I didn't know until she told me. Then she tied me up, stripped me down, put leeches all over me.

title: A Knight of the Seven Kingdoms
Name: arya
text: arya Was that your first time?

title: A Knight of the Seven Kingdoms
Name: gendry
text: gendry No, yeah, I've never had leeches put all over my cock.

title: A Knight of the Seven Kingdoms
Name: arya
text: arya Your first time with a woman.

title: A Knight of the Seven Kingdoms
Name: gendry
text: gendry What? I-I didn't-I wasn't with her.

title: A Knight of the Seven Kingdoms
Name: arya
text: arya Were you with other girls before that in King's Landing?

title: A Knight of the Seven Kingdoms
Name: arya
text: arya Or after?

title: A Knight of the Seven Kingdoms
Name: arya
text: arya You don't remember?

title: A Knight of the Seven Kingdoms
Name: gendry
text: gendry Yes, I was.

title: A Knight of the Seven Kingdoms
Name: arya
text: arya One? Two? Twenty?

title: A Knight of the Seven Kingdoms
Name: gendry
text: gendry Well, I didn't keep count.

title: A Knight of the Seven Kingdoms
Name: arya
text: arya Yes, you did.

title: A Knight of the Seven Kingdoms
Name: gendry
text: gendry Three.

title: A Knight of the Seven Kingdoms
Name: arya
text: arya We're probably going to die soon. I want to know what it's like before that happens.

title: A Knight of the Seven Kingdoms
Name: gendry
text: gendry Arya, I-

title: A Knight of the Seven Kingdoms
Name: arya
text: arya I'm not the Red Woman. Take your own bloody pants off.

title: A Knight of the Seven Kingdoms
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion It's strange, isn't it? Almost everyone here's fought the Starks at one time or another. And here we are in their castle, ready to defend it. Together.

title: A Knight of the Seven Kingdoms
Name: brienne
text: brienne At least we'll die with honor.

title: A Knight of the Seven Kingdoms
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion I think we might live.

title: A Knight of the Seven Kingdoms
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion I-I do. How many battles have we survived between us? Ser Davos Seaworth. Survivor of both the Blackwater and the Battle of the Bastards.

title: A Knight of the Seven Kingdoms
Name: davos
text: davos All without a shred of combat ability.

title: A Knight of the Seven Kingdoms
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion Mm. Ser Jaime Lannister, fabled hero of the Siege of Pyke.

title: A Knight of the Seven Kingdoms
Name: jaime
text: jaime Fabled loser of the Battle of Whispering Wood.

title: A Knight of the Seven Kingdoms
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion Hear, hear! Ser Brienne of Tarth. Defeated the Hound in-Pardon me, Lady Brienne.

title: A Knight of the Seven Kingdoms
Name: tormund
text: tormund She's not a ser? You're not a knight?

title: A Knight of the Seven Kingdoms
Name: brienne
text: brienne Women can't be knights.

title: A Knight of the Seven Kingdoms
Name: tormund
text: tormund Why not?

title: A Knight of the Seven Kingdoms
Name: brienne
text: brienne Tradition.

title: A Knight of the Seven Kingdoms
Name: tormund
text: tormund Fuck tradition.

title: A Knight of the Seven Kingdoms
Name: brienne
text: brienne I don't even want to be a knight.

title: A Knight of the Seven Kingdoms
Name: tormund
text: tormund I'm no king. But if I were, I'd knight you ten times over.

title: A Knight of the Seven Kingdoms
Name: jaime
text: jaime You don't need a king. Any knight can make another knight.

title: A Knight of the Seven Kingdoms
Name: jaime
text: jaime I'll prove it.

title: A Knight of the Seven Kingdoms
Name: jaime
text: jaime Kneel, Lady Brienne.

title: A Knight of the Seven Kingdoms
Name: jaime
text: jaime Do you want to be a knight or not? Kneel.

title: A Knight of the Seven Kingdoms
Name: jaime
text: jaime In the name of the Warrior, I charge you to be brave.

title: A Knight of the Seven Kingdoms
Name: jaime
text: jaime In the name of the Father, I charge you to be just.

title: A Knight of the Seven Kingdoms
Name: jaime
text: jaime In the name of the Mother, I charge you to defend the innocent.

title: A Knight of the Seven Kingdoms
Name: jaime
text: jaime Arise, Brienne of Tarth a knight of the Seven Kingdoms.

title: A Knight of the Seven Kingdoms
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion Ser Brienne of Tarth! Knight of the Seven Kingdoms!

title: A Knight of the Seven Kingdoms
Name: jorah
text: jorah We have all we need to win this war.

title: A Knight of the Seven Kingdoms
Name: lyanna
text: lyanna I have trained my men, women and children. I have fought before. I can fight again.

title: A Knight of the Seven Kingdoms
Name: jorah
text: jorah Please, listen to me. You're the future of our house.

title: A Knight of the Seven Kingdoms
Name: lyanna
text: lyanna I don't need you to remind me of that.

title: A Knight of the Seven Kingdoms
Name: jorah
text: jorah You'll be safer in the crypt. These things we're fighting-

title: A Knight of the Seven Kingdoms
Name: lyanna
text: lyanna I will not hide underground. I pledged to fight for the North, and I will fight.

title: A Knight of the Seven Kingdoms
Name: sam
text: sam Oh, I'm sorry, I didn't mean to-

title: A Knight of the Seven Kingdoms
Name: lyann
text: lyann It's all right. We're done here.

title: A Knight of the Seven Kingdoms
Name: lyanna
text: lyanna I wish you good fortune, cousin.

title: A Knight of the Seven Kingdoms
Name: jorah
text: jorah Thank you, my lady.

title: A Knight of the Seven Kingdoms
Name: jorah
text: jorah What have you got there?

title: A Knight of the Seven Kingdoms
Name: sam
text: sam It's called Heartsbane. It's my family sword.

title: A Knight of the Seven Kingdoms
Name: jorah
text: jorah You still have a family.

title: A Knight of the Seven Kingdoms
Name: sam
text: sam Yes. And I'd love to defend them with it. But I can't really hold it upright. Your father, he taught me how to be a man. How to do what's right. This is right. It's Valyrian steel. I'd be honored if you'd take it.

title: A Knight of the Seven Kingdoms
Name: jorah
text: jorah I'll wield it in his memory to guard the realms of men.

title: A Knight of the Seven Kingdoms
Name: sam
text: sam I'll see you when it's through.

title: A Knight of the Seven Kingdoms
Name: sam
text: sam I hope we win.

title: A Knight of the Seven Kingdoms
Name: jaime
text: jaime We'd better get some rest.

title: A Knight of the Seven Kingdoms
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion No, let's stay a bit longer.

title: A Knight of the Seven Kingdoms
Name: davos
text: davos We're out of wine.

title: A Knight of the Seven Kingdoms
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion How about a song? One of you must know one. Ser Davos?

title: A Knight of the Seven Kingdoms
Name: davos
text: davos You'll pray for a quick death.

title: A Knight of the Seven Kingdoms
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion Ser Brienne?

title: A Knight of the Seven Kingdoms
Name: tormund
text: tormund Mm-mm.

title: A Knight of the Seven Kingdoms
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion Mmm.

title: A Knight of the Seven Kingdoms
Name: podrick
text: podrick High in the halls of the kings who are gone, Jenny would dance with her ghosts, the ones she had lost and the ones she had found and the ones who had loved her the most.

title: A Knight of the Seven Kingdoms
Name: podrick
text: podrick The ones who'd been gone for so very long.

title: A Knight of the Seven Kingdoms
Name: podrick
text: podrick She couldn't remember their names. They spun her around on the damp old stones.

title: A Knight of the Seven Kingdoms
Name: podrick
text: podrick Spun away all her sorrow and pain. And she never wanted to leave

title: A Knight of the Seven Kingdoms
Name: podrick
text: podrick Never wanted to leave. Never wanted to leave. Never wanted to leave.

title: A Knight of the Seven Kingdoms
Name: podrick
text: podrick Never wanted to leave. Never wanted to leave.

title: A Knight of the Seven Kingdoms
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys Who's that?

title: A Knight of the Seven Kingdoms
Name: jon
text: jon Lyanna Stark.

title: A Knight of the Seven Kingdoms
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys My brother, Rhaegar, everyone told me he was decent and kind. He liked to sing. Gave money to poor children. And he raped her.

title: A Knight of the Seven Kingdoms
Name: jon
text: jon He didn't. He loved her.

title: A Knight of the Seven Kingdoms
Name: jon
text: jon They were married in secret. After Rhaegar fell on the Trident, she had a son. Robert would have murdered the baby if he ever found out, and Lyanna knew it. So the last thing she did, as she bled to death on her birthing bed, was give the boy to her brother, Ned Stark, to raise as his bastard.

title: A Knight of the Seven Kingdoms
Name: jon
text: jon My name. My real name is Aegon Targaryen.

title: A Knight of the Seven Kingdoms
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys That's impossible.

title: A Knight of the Seven Kingdoms
Name: jon
text: jon I wish it were.

title: A Knight of the Seven Kingdoms
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys Who told you this?

title: A Knight of the Seven Kingdoms
Name: jon
text: jon Bran. He saw it.

title: A Knight of the Seven Kingdoms
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys He saw it?

title: A Knight of the Seven Kingdoms
Name: jon
text: jon And Samwell confirmed it. He read about their marriage at the Citadel without even knowing what it meant.

title: A Knight of the Seven Kingdoms
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys A secret no one in the world knew except your brother and your best friend. Doesn't seem strange to you?

title: A Knight of the Seven Kingdoms
Name: jon
text: jon It's true, Dany. I know it is.

title: A Knight of the Seven Kingdoms
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys If it were true, it would make you the last male heir of House Targaryen. You'd have a claim to the Iron Throne.

title: A Knight of the Seven Kingdoms
Name: man
text: man Form up! Get yourselves back!

title: The Long Night
Name: northman
text: northman Oi!

title: The Long Night
Name: northman
text: northman Mind out.

title: The Long Night
Name: northman
text: northman MOVE!

title: The Long Night
Name: northman
text: northman Look, on the west wall!

title: The Long Night
Name: soldier
text: soldier Get down to the crypt!

title: The Long Night
Name: soldier
text: soldier Just hold.

title: The Long Night
Name: man
text: man We'll take him.

title: The Long Night
Name: lyanna
text: lyanna Come on, help the lads!

title: The Long Night
Name: soldier
text: soldier Yes, my lady.

title: The Long Night
Name: lyanna
text: lyanna Quickly, now! Quickly! Get those in position.

title: The Long Night
Name: soldier
text: soldier Come on.

title: The Long Night
Name: soldier
text: soldier Close the gate!

title: The Long Night
Name: soldier
text: soldier That's it.

title: The Long Night
Name: edd
text: edd Oh, for fuck's sake. You took your time.

title: The Long Night
Name: melisandre
text: melisandre Do you speak their tongue?

title: The Long Night
Name: melisandre
text: melisandre Tell them to lift their swords.

title: The Long Night
Name: melisandre
text: melisandre Valar morghulis.

title: The Long Night
Name: grey
text: grey Valar dohaeris.

title: The Long Night
Name: davos
text: davos Open the gate!

title: The Long Night
Name: soldier
text: soldier Open the gate!

title: The Long Night
Name: man
text: man Come. Come on. Easy.

title: The Long Night
Name: melisandre
text: melisandre There's no need to execute me, Ser Davos. I'll be dead before the dawn.

title: The Long Night
Name: soldier
text: soldier Cease fire!

title: The Long Night
Name: jon
text: jon The Night King is coming.

title: The Long Night
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys The dead are already here.

title: The Long Night
Name: brienne
text: brienne Stand your ground!

title: The Long Night
Name: arya
text: arya Get down to the crypt.

title: The Long Night
Name: sansa
text: sansa I'm not abandoning my people.

title: The Long Night
Name: arya
text: arya Take this and go.

title: The Long Night
Name: sansa
text: sansa I don't know how to use it.

title: The Long Night
Name: arya
text: arya Stick them with the pointy end.

title: The Long Night
Name: sam
text: sam Edd! Edd!

title: The Long Night
Name: edd
text: edd Sam, get up!

title: The Long Night
Name: edd
text: edd Oh, God. Sam.

title: The Long Night
Name: woman
text: woman Edd!

title: The Long Night
Name: tormund
text: tormund Fall back! Fall back!

title: The Long Night
Name: brienne
text: brienne Fall back!

title: The Long Night
Name: soldier
text: soldier Come on!

title: The Long Night
Name: lyanna
text: lyanna Open the gate!

title: The Long Night
Name: soldier
text: soldier Let us in!

title: The Long Night
Name: soldier
text: soldier Keep moving!

title: The Long Night
Name: lyanna
text: lyanna Keep moving, fast!

title: The Long Night
Name: soldier
text: soldier To your posts!

title: The Long Night
Name: soldier
text: soldier Go!

title: The Long Night
Name: soldier
text: soldier Come on, run! Keep moving!

title: The Long Night
Name: grey
text: grey Protect the retreat!

title: The Long Night
Name: grey
text: grey Stand your ground!

title: The Long Night
Name: jon
text: jon Dany!

title: The Long Night
Name: soldier
text: soldier Grab your weapon now!

title: The Long Night
Name: soldier
text: soldier Guard the barricades!

title: The Long Night
Name: soldier
text: soldier Through that pass!

title: The Long Night
Name: brienne
text: brienne Hey! Hey! Hey!

title: The Long Night
Name: soldier
text: soldier Close up the gaps!

title: The Long Night
Name: brienne
text: brienne Go! Hey! Go! Go!

title: The Long Night
Name: jaime
text: jaime Get in! Get in! Get in! Come on!

title: The Long Night
Name: soldier
text: soldier Move!

title: The Long Night
Name: soldier
text: soldier Retreat!

title: The Long Night
Name: lyanna
text: lyanna Protect the gate!

title: The Long Night
Name: soldier
text: soldier Protect the gate!

title: The Long Night
Name: jaime
text: jaime They're coming! Come on!

title: The Long Night
Name: sandor
text: sandor Fall back!

title: The Long Night
Name: grey
text: grey Light the trench! Light the trench!

title: The Long Night
Name: soldier
text: soldier Wait!

title: The Long Night
Name: soldier
text: soldier Light the trench!

title: The Long Night
Name: davos
text: davos She can't see us.

title: The Long Night
Name: davos
text: davos Light the trenches!

title: The Long Night
Name: soldier
text: soldier With a torch, light the trenches! Right there.

title: The Long Night
Name: soldier
text: soldier Torch it!

title: The Long Night
Name: melisandre
text: melisandre Lord of Light, cast your light upon us. Lord of Light, defend us. For the night is dark and full of terrors!

title: The Long Night
Name: melisandre
text: melisandre Lord of Light, cast your light upon us! Lord of Light, defend us! For the night is dark and full of terrors!

title: The Long Night
Name: beric
text: beric Clegane.

title: The Long Night
Name: woman
text: woman You must try not to worry yourself.

title: The Long Night
Name: varys
text: varys At least we're already in a crypt.

title: The Long Night
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion If we were up there, we might see something everyone else is missing. Something that makes a difference.

title: The Long Night
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion What? Remember the Battle of Blackwater? I brought us through the Mud Gate.

title: The Long Night
Name: varys
text: varys And got your face cut in half.

title: The Long Night
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion And it made a difference. If I was out there right now...

title: The Long Night
Name: sansa
text: sansa You'd die. There's nothing you can do.

title: The Long Night
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion You might be surprised at the lengths I'd go to avoid joining the Army of the Dead. I could think of no organization less suited to my talents.

title: The Long Night
Name: sansa
text: sansa Witty remarks won't make a difference. That's why we're down here, none of us can do anything. It's the truth. It's the most heroic thing we can do now look the truth in the face.

title: The Long Night
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion Maybe we should have stayed married.

title: The Long Night
Name: sansa
text: sansa You were the best of them.

title: The Long Night
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion What a terrifying thought.

title: The Long Night
Name: sansa
text: sansa It wouldn't work between us.

title: The Long Night
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion Why not?

title: The Long Night
Name: sansa
text: sansa The Dragon Queen. Your divided loyalties would become a problem.

title: The Long Night
Name: missandei
text: missandei Yes. Without the Dragon Queen, there'd be no problem at all. We'd all be dead already.

title: The Long Night
Name: theon
text: theon They lit the trench. Bran I just want you to know... I wish... The things I did

title: The Long Night
Name: bran
text: bran Everything you did brought you where you are now. Where you belong. Home.

title: The Long Night
Name: bran
text: bran I'm going to go now.

title: The Long Night
Name: theon
text: theon Go where?

title: The Long Night
Name: davos
text: davos Man the walls!

title: The Long Night
Name: soldier
text: soldier Man the walls!

title: The Long Night
Name: soldier
text: soldier Man the wall!

title: The Long Night
Name: lyanna
text: lyanna Man the walls! Come on!

title: The Long Night
Name: lyanna
text: lyanna Get out there! Get moving!

title: The Long Night
Name: jaime
text: jaime Come on. Come on! Come on! Go, go, go!

title: The Long Night
Name: brienne
text: brienne Come on!

title: The Long Night
Name: soldier
text: soldier They're against the wall!

title: The Long Night
Name: soldier
text: soldier Get more men up here!

title: The Long Night
Name: soldier
text: soldier Fill the gaps, quickly!

title: The Long Night
Name: jaime
text: jaime Get in there!

title: The Long Night
Name: soldier
text: soldier They're climbing the walls!

title: The Long Night
Name: jaime
text: jaime Relieve the archers!

title: The Long Night
Name: soldier
text: soldier Relieve the archers!

title: The Long Night
Name: jaime
text: jaime Archers on top!

title: The Long Night
Name: soldier
text: soldier Move up!

title: The Long Night
Name: soldier
text: soldier Go, go! Come here! Come on!

title: The Long Night
Name: soldier
text: soldier Move back!

title: The Long Night
Name: soldier
text: soldier Stand away!

title: The Long Night
Name: soldier
text: soldier Go on, go on.

title: The Long Night
Name: jorah
text: jorah Go! Go.

title: The Long Night
Name: soldier
text: soldier Step back.

title: The Long Night
Name: soldier
text: soldier All the way, archers!

title: The Long Night
Name: soldier
text: soldier Hold the wall!

title: The Long Night
Name: soldier
text: soldier The wall, they're coming up!

title: The Long Night
Name: jaime
text: jaime Draw!

title: The Long Night
Name: jaime
text: jaime Come on!

title: The Long Night
Name: soldier
text: soldier They're coming up!

title: The Long Night
Name: jaime
text: jaime Look out!

title: The Long Night
Name: beric
text: beric Clegane! Clegane!

title: The Long Night
Name: beric
text: beric Clegane! Clegane, we need you!

title: The Long Night
Name: beric
text: beric You can't give up on us.

title: The Long Night
Name: sandor
text: sandor Fuck off! We can't beat them. Don't you see that, you stupid whore? We're fighting Death! They can't beat Death.

title: The Long Night
Name: beric
text: beric Tell her that.

title: The Long Night
Name: soldier
text: soldier Open the door!

title: The Long Night
Name: soldier
text: soldier Open the door! Open the door! Please! Open it!

title: The Long Night
Name: sandor
text: sandor Come on!

title: The Long Night
Name: beric
text: beric Go!

title: The Long Night
Name: beric
text: beric Run!

title: The Long Night
Name: sandor
text: sandor We've gotta go!

title: The Long Night
Name: melisandre
text: melisandre The Lord brought him back for a purpose. Now that purpose has been served.

title: The Long Night
Name: arya
text: arya I know you.

title: The Long Night
Name: melisandre
text: melisandre And I know you.

title: The Long Night
Name: arya
text: arya You said we'd meet again.

title: The Long Night
Name: melisandre
text: melisandre And here we are. At the end of the world.

title: The Long Night
Name: arya
text: arya You said I'd shut many eyes forever. You were right about that too.

title: The Long Night
Name: melisandre
text: melisandre Brown eyes... green eyes... and blue eyes.

title: The Long Night
Name: melisandre
text: melisandre What do we say to the God of Death?

title: The Long Night
Name: arya
text: arya Not today.

title: The Long Night
Name: theon
text: theon Here they come!

title: The Long Night
Name: theon
text: theon Steady, lads.

title: The Long Night
Name: theon
text: theon Steady now. Make every shot count.

title: The Long Night
Name: man
text: man Over there!

title: The Long Night
Name: man
text: man There!

title: The Long Night
Name: jon
text: jon Get off!

title: The Long Night
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys Dracarys.

title: The Long Night
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion Come on! Come on! No! No, no, no!

title: The Long Night
Name: jon
text: jon Bran!

title: The Long Night
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys Go!

title: The Long Night
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys Jorah!

title: The Long Night
Name: bran
text: bran Theon.

title: The Long Night
Name: bran
text: bran You're a good man.

title: The Long Night
Name: bran
text: bran Thank you.

title: The Long Night
Name: jorah
text: jorah I'm hurt.

title: The Last of the Starks
Name: jon
text: jon We're here to say goodbye to our brothers and sisters. To our fathers and mothers. To our friends. Our fellow men and women who set aside their differences to fight together and die together so that others might live. Everyone in this world owes them a debt that can never be repaid. It is our duty and our honor to keep them alive in memory for those who come after us and those who come after them for as long as men draw breath. They were the shields that guarded the realms of men. And we shall never see their like again.

title: The Last of the Starks
Name: man
text: man To your health.

title: The Last of the Starks
Name: gendry
text: gendry Have you seen Arya?

title: The Last of the Starks
Name: sandor
text: sandor You can still smell the burning bodies, and that's where your head is at.

title: The Last of the Starks
Name: gendry
text: gendry I just want to thank her for-

title: The Last of the Starks
Name: sandor
text: sandor I'm sure you do.

title: The Last of the Starks
Name: gendry
text: gendry Look, it's not about that.

title: The Last of the Starks
Name: sandor
text: sandor Of course it's about that, you twat. Why shouldn't it be? The dead are dead. You're not.

title: The Last of the Starks
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys Gendry.

title: The Last of the Starks
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys That's right, isn't it?

title: The Last of the Starks
Name: gendry
text: gendry Yes, Your Grace.

title: The Last of the Starks
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys You're Robert Baratheon's son.

title: The Last of the Starks
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys You are aware he took my family's throne and tried to have me murdered?

title: The Last of the Starks
Name: gendry
text: gendry I didn't even know he was my father until after he was dead.

title: The Last of the Starks
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys Yes, he's dead. His brothers are too. So who's Lord of Storm's End now?

title: The Last of the Starks
Name: gendry
text: gendry I don't know, Your Grace.

title: The Last of the Starks
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys Does anyone?

title: The Last of the Starks
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys I think you should be Lord of Storm's End.

title: The Last of the Starks
Name: gendry
text: gendry I can't be. I'm a bastard.

title: The Last of the Starks
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys No, you are Lord Gendry Baratheon of Storm's End, the lawful son of Robert Baratheon. Because that is what I have made you.

title: The Last of the Starks
Name: davos
text: davos To Lord Gendry Baratheon of Storm's End.

title: The Last of the Starks
Name: all
text: all To Gendry!

title: The Last of the Starks
Name: man
text: man Lord Gendry!

title: The Last of the Starks
Name: man
text: man Gendry!

title: The Last of the Starks
Name: man
text: man That's easy, isn't it?

title: The Last of the Starks
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion A fitting reward for a hero.

title: The Last of the Starks
Name: sam
text: sam Uh, hold on.

title: The Last of the Starks
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion And a Lord of Storm's End who will be forever loyal to you.

title: The Last of the Starks
Name: man
text: man Come, my lord.

title: The Last of the Starks
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys See? You're not the only one who's clever.

title: The Last of the Starks
Name: woman
text: woman I have to go down and get another barrel.

title: The Last of the Starks
Name: jaime
text: jaime We fought dead things and lived to talk about it. If this isn't the time to drink, when is?

title: The Last of the Starks
Name: davos
text: davos The last time I saw her, I told her I'd kill her if I ever saw her again.

title: The Last of the Starks
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion I'm sure you had your reasons.

title: The Last of the Starks
Name: davos
text: davos I did. I do.

title: The Last of the Starks
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion So did you?

title: The Last of the Starks
Name: davos
text: davos Never got the chance. She did it to herself. Or her god did it to her. Lord of Light. We play his game for him, we fight his war and win, and then he fucks off. No signs, no blessings. Who knows what he wants?

title: The Last of the Starks
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion I don't imagine thinking about that subject will leave you any happier than before.

title: The Last of the Starks
Name: davos
text: davos And what if I'm not trying to be happy?

title: The Last of the Starks
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion Then you're in luck. We may have defeated them, but we still have us to contend with.

title: The Last of the Starks
Name: davos
text: davos Thank you. I feel much better.

title: The Last of the Starks
Name: man
text: man More ale!

title: The Last of the Starks
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion This is clever. Even better than the saddle I designed for you.

title: The Last of the Starks
Name: bran
text: bran It's the same as the one Daeron Targaryen built for his crippled nephew 120 years ago. I liked that one.

title: The Last of the Starks
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion You know our history better than anyone. That will be useful as Lord of Winterfell.

title: The Last of the Starks
Name: bran
text: bran I'm not Lord of Winterfell.

title: The Last of the Starks
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion You're the only surviving trueborn son of Ned Stark.

title: The Last of the Starks
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion You don't want it.

title: The Last of the Starks
Name: bran
text: bran I don't really want anymore.

title: The Last of the Starks
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion I envy you.

title: The Last of the Starks
Name: bran
text: bran You shouldn't envy me. Mostly I live in the past.

title: The Bells
Name: varys
text: varys Come in.

title: The Bells
Name: varys
text: varys And?

title: The Bells
Name: varys
text: varys Nothing?

title: The Bells
Name: martha
text: martha She won't eat.

title: The Bells
Name: varys
text: varys We'll try again at supper.

title: The Bells
Name: martha
text: martha I think they're watching me.

title: The Bells
Name: varys
text: varys Who?

title: The Bells
Name: martha
text: martha Her soldiers.

title: The Bells
Name: varys
text: varys Of course they are. That's their job.

title: The Bells
Name: varys
text: varys What have I told you, Martha?

title: The Bells
Name: martha
text: martha The greater the risk, the greater the reward.

title: The Bells
Name: varys
text: varys Go on. They'll be missing you in the kitchen.

title: The Bells
Name: varys
text: varys The Northern armies?

title: The Bells
Name: jon
text: jon Just crossed the Trident. They'll be at the walls of King's Landing in two days. How is she?

title: The Bells
Name: varys
text: varys She hasn't seen anyone since we returned. Hasn't left her chambers, hasn't accepted any food.

title: The Bells
Name: jon
text: jon She shouldn't be alone.

title: The Bells
Name: varys
text: varys You're worried for her. I admire your empathy.

title: The Bells
Name: jon
text: jon Aren't you worried for her?

title: The Bells
Name: varys
text: varys I'm worried for all of us. They say every time a Targaryen is born, the gods toss a coin and the world holds its breath.

title: The Bells
Name: jon
text: jon We're not much for riddles where I'm from.

title: The Bells
Name: varys
text: varys We both know what she's about to do.

title: The Bells
Name: jon
text: jon That's her decision to make. She is our queen.

title: The Bells
Name: varys
text: varys Men decide where power resides, whether or not they know it.

title: The Bells
Name: jon
text: jon What do you want?

title: The Bells
Name: varys
text: varys All I've ever wanted. The right ruler on the Iron Throne. I still don't know how her coin has landed. But I'm quite certain about yours.

title: The Bells
Name: jon
text: jon I don't want it. I never have.

title: The Bells
Name: varys
text: varys I have known more kings and queens than any man living. I've heard what they say to crowds, and seen what they do in the shadows. I have furthered their designs, however horrible. But what I tell you now is true

title: The Bells
Name: jon
text: jon She is my queen.

title: The Bells
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion Your Grace?

title: The Bells
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion There's something you need to know.

title: The Bells
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys Someone has betrayed me.

title: The Bells
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion Yes.

title: The Bells
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys Jon Snow.

title: The Bells
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion Varys.

title: The Bells
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys He knows the truth about Jon.

title: The Bells
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion He does.

title: The Bells
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys Because you told him. You learned from Sansa. And she learned from Jon, though I begged him not to tell her. As I said, he betrayed me.

title: The Bells
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion I'm glad Sansa told me. I am your Hand. I need to be aware of any threats you're facing.

title: The Bells
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys And Varys?

title: The Bells
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion Your Master of Whisperers needs to be aware too.

title: The Bells
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys You spoke to him first. Without coming to me. Without asking my permission.

title: The Bells
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion It was a mistake.

title: The Bells
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys Why do you think Sansa told you? What do you think she hoped to gain?

title: The Bells
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion She trusts me.

title: The Bells
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys Yes, she trusts you. She trusted you to spread secrets that could destroy your own queen. And you did not let her down.

title: The Bells
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion If I have failed you, my queen, forgive me. Our intentions were good. We wanted what you want. A better world, all of us. Varys as much as anyone.

title: The Bells
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion But it doesn't matter now.

title: The Bells
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys No. It doesn't matter now.

title: The Bells
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion It was me.

title: The Bells
Name: varys
text: varys I hope I deserve this. Truly, I do. I hope I'm wrong. Goodbye, old friend.

title: The Bells
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys Lord Varys. I, Daenerys of House Targaryen, First of My Name, Breaker of Chains and Mother of Dragons ...

title: The Bells
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys sentence you to die. Dracarys.

title: The Bells
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys This was all she brought with her when we crossed the Narrow Sea. Her only possession.

title: The Bells
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys It's all right, Torgo Nudo. Let me speak with him.

title: The Bells
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys What did I say would happen if you told your sister?

title: The Bells
Name: jon
text: jon I don't want it, and that's what I told him.

title: The Bells
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys She betrayed your trust. She killed Varys as much as I did. This was a victory for her. Now she knows what happens when people hear the truth about you. Far more people in Westeros love you than love me. I don't have love here. I only have fear.

title: The Bells
Name: jon
text: jon I love you. And you will always be my queen.

title: The Bells
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys Is that all I am to you? Your queen?

title: The Bells
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys All right, then.

title: The Bells
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys Let it be fear.

title: The Bells
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion The people who live there, they're not your enemies. They're innocents, like the ones you liberated in Meereen.

title: The Bells
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys In Meereen, the slaves turned on the masters and liberated the city themselves the moment I arrived.

title: The Bells
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion They're afraid. Anyone who resists Cersei will see his family butchered. You can't expect them to be heroes. They're hostages.

title: The Bells
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys They are. In a tyrant's grip. Whose fault is that? Mine?

title: The Bells
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion What does it matter whose fault it is? Thousands of children will die if the city burns.

title: The Bells
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys Your sister knows how to use her enemies' weaknesses against them. That's what she thinks our mercy is - weakness.

title: The Bells
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion I beg you, my queen-

title: The Bells
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys But she's wrong. Mercy is our strength. Our mercy towards future generations who will never again be held hostage by a tyrant.

title: The Bells
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys Ready the Unsullied. Tonight you sail for King's Landing, to join the Northern armies.

title: The Bells
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion Cersei's followers will abandon her if they know the war is lost. Give them that chance. If the city surrenders, they will ring the bells and raise the gates. Please, if you hear them ringing the bells, call off the attack.

title: The Bells
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys Wait for me outside the city. You'll know when it's time.

title: The Bells
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys Your brother was stopped trying to get past our lines.

title: The Bells
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys It seems he hasn't abandoned your sister after all. The next time you fail me will be the last time you fail me.

title: The Bells
Name: guard
text: guard Let them pass.

title: The Bells
Name: guard
text: guard Through the gate.

title: The Bells
Name: guard
text: guard Get going.

title: The Bells
Name: davos
text: davos The rearguard should be here by daybreak.

title: The Bells
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion She wants to attack now.

title: The Bells
Name: jon
text: jon Daybreak at the earliest.

title: The Bells
Name: soldier
text: soldier Careful with that.

title: The Bells
Name: soldier
text: soldier My lord.

title: The Bells
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion Davos. I need to ask you a favor. You're the greatest smuggler alive, aren't you?

title: The Bells
Name: davos
text: davos I'm not gonna like this favor, am I?

title: The Bells
Name: soldier
text: soldier He's always better when he's got some food in him.

title: The Bells
Name: soldier
text: soldier Problem is when he's got drink in him. See what he did the other week?

title: The Bells
Name: soldier
text: soldier Aye. Fighting as well. Commander nearly caught him.

title: The Bells
Name: soldier
text: soldier Ay up. Where you going?

title: The Bells
Name: arya
text: arya I'm Arya Stark. I'm going to kill Queen Cersei.

title: The Bells
Name: sandor
text: sandor Think about it. She kills Cersei, the war's over. There won't be a siege. You might not even die tomorrow.

title: The Bells
Name: soldier
text: soldier I need to go talk to my captain.

title: The Bells
Name: sandor
text: sandor Go ahead, talk to him.

title: The Bells
Name: soldier
text: soldier Where's he going?

title: The Bells
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion I drink to eat the skull keeper.

title: The Bells
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion I want to eat the skull keeper.

title: The Bells
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion I want to see the ...

title: The Bells
Name: unsullied
text: unsullied We speak the common tongue.

title: The Bells
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion Ah. Good. I want to be alone with the prisoner. Get some rest. Tomorrow will be a long day.

title: The Bells
Name: unsullied
text: unsullied We have orders to guard the prisoner.

title: The Bells
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion Ordered by whom? The queen herself?

title: The Bells
Name: unsullied
text: unsullied No.

title: The Bells
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion Well, in that case, as Hand of the Queen, I outrank whomever gave your order. Probably by quite a lot.

title: The Bells
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion How did they find you?

title: The Bells
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion Did you consider taking it off?

title: The Bells
Name: jaime
text: jaime Cersei once called me "the stupidest Lannister."

title: The Bells
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion And you're going back to her, to die with her.

title: The Bells
Name: jaime
text: jaime You've underestimated her before.

title: The Bells
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion She's going to die. Unless you can convince her to change her course of action.

title: The Bells
Name: jaime
text: jaime Difficult to do from here.

title: The Bells
Name: jaime
text: jaime When have I ever been able to convince Cersei of anything?

title: The Bells
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion Try. If not for yourself, if not for her, then for every one of the million people in that city, innocent or otherwise.

title: The Bells
Name: jaime
text: jaime To be honest, I never really cared much for them. Innocent or otherwise.

title: The Bells
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion You do care for one innocent. I know you do. And so does Cersei. She has a reason now.

title: The Bells
Name: jaime
text: jaime The child is the reason she'll never give an inch. All the worst things she's ever done, she's done for her children. It's not impossible that she'll win.

title: The Bells
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion She won't. Her enemy's forces have been depleted, as she said they would be.

title: The Bells
Name: jaime
text: jaime Two of the three dragons are dead. She's evened the odds.

title: The Bells
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion The city will fall tomorrow.

title: The Bells
Name: jaime
text: jaime She has the Lannister army, she has the Golden Company-

title: The Bells
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion I defended the city last time it was attacked. I know it better than anyone. It will fall tomorrow.

title: The Bells
Name: jaime
text: jaime Then I suppose I'll die tomorrow, if not before.

title: The Bells
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion Why?

title: The Bells
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion Escape. The two of you, together. Remember where we met, where they keep the dragon skulls, beneath the Red Keep? Take her down there. Keep following the stairways down, down as far as they'll go. You'll come out onto a beach at the foot of the keep. A dinghy will be waiting for you. Sail out of the bay. If the winds are kind, you'll make it to Pentos. Start a new life.

title: The Bells
Name: jaime
text: jaime Sail right past the Iron Fleet and into a new life? Sounds a lot less likely than Cersei winning this war-

title: The Bells
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion There won't be an Iron Fleet for much longer. Do it. If you don't, you'll never see Cersei again.

title: The Bells
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion Swear to me.

title: The Bells
Name: jaime
text: jaime You have my word.

title: The Bells
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion If it works, give the order to ring all the bells in King's Landing and open the gates. That will be our signal that the city has surrendered.

title: The Bells
Name: jaime
text: jaime I'll try.

title: The Bells
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion I never thought I'd get to repay the favor. Remember, ring the bells and open the gates.

title: The Bells
Name: jaime
text: jaime Your queen will execute you for this.

title: The Bells
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion If Daenerys can make it to the throne without wading through a river of blood, maybe she'll show mercy to the person who made that possible.

title: The Bells
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion Tens of thousands of innocent lives one not particularly innocent dwarf it seems like a fair trade. If it weren't for you, I never wouldo ve survived my childhood.

title: The Bells
Name: jaime
text: jaime You would have.

title: The Bells
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion You were the only one who didn't treat me like a monster. You were all I had.

title: The Bells
Name: soldier
text: soldier Eyes on the horizon!

title: The Bells
Name: soldier
text: soldier Load the scorpion!

title: The Bells
Name: soldier
text: soldier Archers, close up!

title: The Bells
Name: man
text: man Come on!

title: The Bells
Name: soldier
text: soldier Up to the espringal!

title: The Bells
Name: soldier
text: soldier To the back of it!

title: The Bells
Name: soldier
text: soldier Archers, line up!

title: The Bells
Name: woman
text: woman This way! Come on!

title: The Bells
Name: soldier
text: soldier Clear the streets now!

title: The Bells
Name: woman
text: woman No!

title: The Bells
Name: man
text: man In, now. And you, come on.

title: The Bells
Name: soldier
text: soldier Inside, now!

title: The Bells
Name: man
text: man Quickly.

title: The Bells
Name: soldier
text: soldier Yes. Follow down there. They're here. Get to the Red Keep.

title: The Bells
Name: father
text: father My son!

title: The Bells
Name: soldier
text: soldier Get inside!

title: The Bells
Name: man
text: man Just ahead of you, I can see it!

title: The Bells
Name: soldier
text: soldier All right, move it!

title: The Bells
Name: woman
text: woman Come on!

title: The Bells
Name: soldier
text: soldier Keep moving!

title: The Bells
Name: soldier
text: soldier Keep going!

title: The Bells
Name: soldier
text: soldier Quickly!

title: The Bells
Name: soldier
text: soldier All the way!

title: The Bells
Name: father
text: father Hold your mother's hand!

title: The Bells
Name: soldier
text: soldier Make way for the Golden Company!

title: The Bells
Name: soldier
text: soldier Close the gate!

title: The Bells
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion If you hear the bells ring, they've surrendered. Call off your men.

title: The Bells
Name: soldier
text: soldier Move along now, lads.

title: The Bells
Name: soldier
text: soldier That's it.

title: The Bells
Name: soldier
text: soldier Go on, move it.

title: The Bells
Name: soldier
text: soldier Come on, move, move. Faster, faster. Come on, move it. Keep going.

title: The Bells
Name: soldier
text: soldier Keep moving.

title: The Bells
Name: sandor
text: sandor Move.

title: The Bells
Name: soldier
text: soldier Stay with him.

title: The Bells
Name: man
text: man Hold on.

title: The Bells
Name: woman
text: woman Hold my hand.

title: The Bells
Name: nora
text: nora Get behind there.

title: The Bells
Name: soldier
text: soldier Close the gate! No more through!

title: The Bells
Name: nora
text: nora No!

title: The Bells
Name: vicky
text: vicky No! Mommy!

title: The Bells
Name: nora
text: nora Vicky! Please!

title: The Bells
Name: vicky
text: vicky No, please, sir!

title: The Bells
Name: man
text: man Open the gate!

title: The Bells
Name: man
text: man Open it!

title: The Bells
Name: soldier
text: soldier Get back!

title: The Bells
Name: nora
text: nora Look, try that one! Go! Go!

title: The Bells
Name: soldier
text: soldier The gates are locked now!

title: The Bells
Name: woman
text: woman Open!

title: The Bells
Name: woman
text: woman Open the gate! Soldier! Soldier!

title: The Bells
Name: man
text: man Please open the gate!

title: The Bells
Name: soldier
text: soldier Go back to your homes!

title: The Bells
Name: soldier
text: soldier Stay back! It's closed!

title: The Bells
Name: jaime
text: jaime Soldier!

title: The Bells
Name: soldier
text: soldier Move away! Stop!

title: The Bells
Name: man
text: man Let us in!

title: The Bells
Name: man
text: man We're not leaving!

title: The Bells
Name: soldier
text: soldier Turn!

title: The Bells
Name: euron
text: euron Turn it around! Turn it around!

title: The Bells
Name: euron
text: euron Get back! Back!

title: The Bells
Name: euron
text: euron Fire!

title: The Bells
Name: soldier
text: soldier I can see her! Ready!

title: The Bells
Name: soldier
text: soldier Move!

title: The Bells
Name: soldier
text: soldier Fire!

title: The Bells
Name: soldier
text: soldier Reload!

title: The Bells
Name: soldier
text: soldier Faster! Hurry!

title: The Bells
Name: man
text: man Go!

title: The Bells
Name: man
text: man Run!

title: The Bells
Name: qyburn
text: qyburn Your Grace.

title: The Bells
Name: cersei
text: cersei All we need is one good shot.

title: The Bells
Name: qyburn
text: qyburn The scorpions have all been destroyed, Your Grace.

title: The Bells
Name: cersei
text: cersei The Iron Fleet hold Blackwater Bay. Euron killed one of her dragons. He can kill another.

title: The Bells
Name: qyburn
text: qyburn Your Grace, the Iron Fleet is burning. The gates have been breached. The Golden Company-

title: The Bells
Name: cersei
text: cersei Our men will fight harder than sellswords ever could. They will defend their queen to the last man.

title: The Bells
Name: qyburn
text: qyburn Yes, Your Grace.

title: The Bells
Name: cersei
text: cersei The Red Keep has never fallen. It won't fall today.

title: The Bells
Name: man
text: man No, no, no!

title: The Bells
Name: jon
text: jon Move, move!

title: The Bells
Name: man
text: man Run. Run! Come on!

title: The Bells
Name: soldier
text: soldier Ring the bells!

title: The Bells
Name: man
text: man The bells!

title: The Bells
Name: man
text: man Ring the bells!

title: The Bells
Name: woman
text: woman Ring the bells!

title: The Bells
Name: man
text: man Ring the bloody bells!

title: The Bells
Name: woman
text: woman Tell the queen to ring the bells.

title: The Bells
Name: man
text: man Ring the bells! Ring the bell!

title: The Bells
Name: woman
text: woman This way.

title: The Bells
Name: soldier
text: soldier Ring the bell!

title: The Bells
Name: man
text: man Ring the bell!

title: The Bells
Name: man
text: man Ring them!

title: The Bells
Name: man
text: man Help us!

title: The Bells
Name: man
text: man In the name of the-

title: The Bells
Name: man
text: man Queen! We're surrounded!

title: The Bells
Name: man
text: man Now! Come on!

title: The Bells
Name: man
text: man Hurry up!

title: The Bells
Name: jon
text: jon No! Get back! Get back!

title: The Bells
Name: jon
text: jon Stay! Stay!

title: The Bells
Name: davos
text: davos Quickly. Quickly.

title: The Bells
Name: jon
text: jon Stop!

title: The Bells
Name: soldier
text: soldier Get off me! Get off, bitch!

title: The Bells
Name: woman
text: woman No, get off! Help! Help! No!

title: The Bells
Name: lannister
text: lannister Go! Go!

title: The Bells
Name: jon
text: jon Find somewhere to hide.

title: The Bells
Name: man
text: man My God!

title: The Bells
Name: euron
text: euron The Kingslayer.

title: The Bells
Name: jaime
text: jaime We need to get the queen out of King's Landing.

title: The Bells
Name: euron
text: euron Listen. That's the sound of a city dying. It's over.

title: The Bells
Name: jaime
text: jaime Well, maybe for you.

title: The Bells
Name: euron
text: euron If you kill another king before you die they'll sing about you forever.

title: The Bells
Name: jaime
text: jaime You're no king.

title: The Bells
Name: euron
text: euron Oh, but I am. And I fucked the queen. If I win, I'll bring your head to Cersei so you can kiss her one last time.

title: The Bells
Name: qyburn
text: qyburn Your Grace, it isn't safe here any longer.

title: The Bells
Name: cersei
text: cersei The Red Keep is the safest place in the city.

title: The Bells
Name: qyburn
text: qyburn The Unsullied have breached the gates of the Red Keep.

title: The Bells
Name: qyburn
text: qyburn Maegor's Holdfast would be a better place to wait out the storm.

title: The Bells
Name: euron
text: euron You fought well for a cripple.

title: The Bells
Name: euron
text: euron Another king for you.

title: The Bells
Name: euron
text: euron But I got you!

title: The Bells
Name: euron
text: euron I got you!

title: The Bells
Name: euron
text: euron I'm the man who killed Jaime Lannister.

title: The Bells
Name: sandor
text: sandor Go home, girl. The fire will get her, or one of the Dothraki.

title: The Bells
Name: sandor
text: sandor Or maybe that dragon will eat her. It doesn't matter. She's dead. And you'll be dead too if you don't get out of here.

title: The Bells
Name: arya
text: arya I'm going to kill her.

title: The Bells
Name: sandor
text: sandor You think you wanted revenge a long time? I've been after it all my life.

title: The Bells
Name: sandor
text: sandor It's all I care about. And look at me.

title: The Bells
Name: sandor
text: sandor Look at me! You wanna be like me?

title: The Bells
Name: sandor
text: sandor You come with me, you die here.

title: The Bells
Name: arya
text: arya Sandor.

title: The Bells
Name: arya
text: arya Thank you.

title: The Bells
Name: sandor
text: sandor Your Grace.

title: The Bells
Name: sandor
text: sandor Hello, big brother.

title: The Bells
Name: cersei
text: cersei Ser Gregor, stay by my side.

title: The Bells
Name: cersei
text: cersei Ser Gregor, I command you.

title: The Bells
Name: qyburn
text: qyburn Obey your queen, Ser Gregor.

title: The Bells
Name: sandor
text: sandor Yeah, that's you. That's what you've always been.

title: The Bells
Name: cersei
text: cersei You're hurt.

title: The Bells
Name: jaime
text: jaime It doesn't matter.

title: The Bells
Name: cersei
text: cersei You're bleeding.

title: The Bells
Name: owen
text: owen Alanna! Alanna! Have you seen my wife? Have you seen my wife?

title: The Bells
Name: arya
text: arya Let go.

title: The Bells
Name: owen
text: owen Have you seen my wife?

title: The Bells
Name: man
text: man Out of the way!

title: The Bells
Name: man
text: man No!

title: The Bells
Name: sandor
text: sandor Oh.

title: The Bells
Name: nora
text: nora Take my hand. Take my hand! Get up. Get up.

title: The Bells
Name: nora
text: nora No. No.

title: The Bells
Name: arya
text: arya Wait! Wait! No!

title: The Bells
Name: sandor
text: sandor Fucking die!

title: The Bells
Name: jon
text: jon We need to fall back! Fall back behind the wall! Fall back!

title: The Bells
Name: soldier
text: soldier Fall back!

title: The Bells
Name: jon
text: jon Get out of the city! Fall back! Fall back! Fall back!

title: The Bells
Name: arya
text: arya You can't stay here. You have to keep moving.

title: The Bells
Name: woman
text: woman We can't go out there.

title: The Bells
Name: arya
text: arya You have to.

title: The Bells
Name: woman
text: woman Everyone out there is dead.

title: The Bells
Name: arya
text: arya If you stay here, you'll die. Follow me.

title: The Bells
Name: arya
text: arya Follow me!

title: The Bells
Name: man
text: man Come on, quickly. All of you.

title: The Bells
Name: vicky
text: vicky Mama! Mama! Mama!

title: The Bells
Name: vicky
text: vicky No. Mama! Mama! Mama!

title: The Bells
Name: arya
text: arya Get up. Get up!

title: The Bells
Name: arya
text: arya We have to keep moving.

title: The Bells
Name: nora
text: nora Take her. Take her!

title: The Bells
Name: nora
text: nora Take her.

title: The Bells
Name: arya
text: arya Come on! Come on!

title: The Bells
Name: jaime
text: jaime This way.

title: The Bells
Name: cersei
text: cersei I want our baby to live. I want our baby to live. I want our baby to live.

title: The Bells
Name: cersei
text: cersei Don't let me die, Jaime. Please don't let me die.

title: The Bells
Name: jaime
text: jaime It's all right.

title: The Bells
Name: cersei
text: cersei Please don't let me die.

title: The Bells
Name: cersei
text: cersei I don't want to die.

title: The Bells
Name: jaime
text: jaime Just look- Look at me. Look at me.

title: The Bells
Name: cersei
text: cersei Not like this. Not like this. Not like this.

title: The Bells
Name: jaime
text: jaime Look- Look- Look me in the eye. Don't look away. Don't look- Look at me! Just look at me.

title: The Bells
Name: jaime
text: jaime Nothing else matters. Nothing else matters. Only us.

title: The Iron Throne
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion I'll find you later.

title: The Iron Throne
Name: jon
text: jon It's not safe. Let me send some men with you.

title: The Iron Throne
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion I'm going alone.

title: The Iron Throne
Name: grey
text: grey In the name of the one true queen, Daenerys Targaryen, I sentence you to die.

title: The Iron Throne
Name: jon
text: jon Grey Worm!

title: The Iron Throne
Name: jon
text: jon It's over.

title: The Iron Throne
Name: grey
text: grey These men are prisoners. It is not over until the queen's enemies are defeated.

title: The Iron Throne
Name: davos
text: davos How much more defeated do you want them to be? They're on their knees.

title: The Iron Throne
Name: grey
text: grey They are breathing.

title: The Iron Throne
Name: davos
text: davos Look around you, friend. We won.

title: The Iron Throne
Name: grey
text: grey I obey my queen's commands, not yours.

title: The Iron Throne
Name: jon
text: jon And what are the queen's commands?

title: The Iron Throne
Name: grey
text: grey Kill all who follow Cersei Lannister." These are free men. They chose to fight for her.

title: The Iron Throne
Name: davos
text: davos Easy, men. Easy! Easy.

title: The Iron Throne
Name: davos
text: davos Jon. We should speak with the queen.

title: The Iron Throne
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys Blood of my blood.

title: The Iron Throne
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys You kept all your promises to me. You killed my enemies in their iron suits.

title: The Iron Throne
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys Your tore down their stone houses. You gave me the Seven Kingdoms.

title: The Iron Throne
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys Torgo Nudho.

title: The Iron Throne
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys You have walked beside me since the Plaza of Pride. You are the bravest of men, the most loyal of soldiers. I name you commander of all my forces, the Queen's Master of War.

title: The Iron Throne
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys Unsullied. All of you were torn from your mother's arms and raised as slaves. Now you are liberators. You have freed the people of King's Landing from the grip of a tyrant!

title: The Iron Throne
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys But the war is not over. We will not lay down our spears until we have liberated all the people of the world!

title: The Iron Throne
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys From Winterfell to Dorne, from Lannisport to Qarth, from the Summer Isles to the Jade Sea! Women, men and children have suffered too long beneath the wheel.

title: The Iron Throne
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys Will you break the wheel with me?

title: The Iron Throne
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys You freed your brother. You committed treason.

title: The Iron Throne
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion I freed my brother. And you slaughtered a city.

title: The Iron Throne
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys Take him.

title: The Iron Throne
Name: jon
text: jon What are you doing here?

title: The Iron Throne
Name: jon
text: jon Hey, what happened?

title: The Iron Throne
Name: arya
text: arya I came to kill Cersei. Your queen got there first.

title: The Iron Throne
Name: jon
text: jon She's everyone's queen now.

title: The Iron Throne
Name: arya
text: arya Try telling Sansa.

title: The Iron Throne
Name: jon
text: jon Wait for me outside the city gates. I'll come find you.

title: The Iron Throne
Name: arya
text: arya Jon. She knows who you are. Who you really are. You'll always be a threat to her. And I know a killer when I see one.

title: The Iron Throne
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion Did you bring any wine?

title: The Iron Throne
Name: jon
text: jon No.

title: The Iron Throne
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion Ah... Well... thank you for coming to see me. Our queen doesn't keep prisoners for long. I suppose there's a crude kind of justice. I betrayed my closest friend and watched him burn. Now Varys's ashes can tell my ashes, "See, I told you." It just occurred to me. I'm talking to the only man alive who knows where I'm going.

title: The Iron Throne
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion So is there life after death?

title: The Iron Throne
Name: jon
text: jon Not that I've seen.

title: The Iron Throne
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion I should be thankful. Oblivion is the best I could hope for. I strangled my lover. I shot my own father with a crossbow. I betrayed my queen.

title: The Iron Throne
Name: jon
text: jon You didn't.

title: The Iron Throne
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion I did. And I'd do it again, now that I've seen what I've seen. I chose my fate. The people of King's Landing did not.

title: The Iron Throne
Name: jon
text: jon I can't justify what happened. I won't try. But the war is over now.

title: The Iron Throne
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion Is it? When you heard her talking to her soldiers, did she sound like someone who's done fighting?

title: The Iron Throne
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion She liberated the people of Slaver's Bay. She liberated the people of King's Landing. And she'll go on liberating until the people of the world are free and she rules them all.

title: The Iron Throne
Name: jon
text: jon And you've been by her side, counseling her. Until today.

title: The Iron Throne
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion Until today. Varys was right. I was wrong. It was vanity to think I could guide her. Our queen's nature is fire and blood.

title: The Iron Throne
Name: jon
text: jon You think our house words are stamped on our bodies when we're born and that's who we are? Then I'd be fire and blood too. She's not her father, no more than you're Tywin Lannister.

title: The Iron Throne
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion My father was an evil man. My sister was an evil woman. Pile up all the bodies of all the people they ever killed, there still won't be half as many as our beautiful queen slaughtered in a single day.

title: The Iron Throne
Name: jon
text: jon Cersei left her no choice.

title: The Iron Throne
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion The moment the gates fell, the battle was over.

title: The Iron Throne
Name: jon
text: jon She saw her friend beheaded. She saw her dragon shot out of the sky.

title: The Iron Throne
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion And she burned down a city for it.

title: The Iron Throne
Name: jon
text: jon Ah, it's easy to judge when you're standing far from the battlefield.

title: The Iron Throne
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion Would you have done it?

title: The Iron Throne
Name: jon
text: jon What?

title: The Iron Throne
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion You've been up there, on a dragon's back. You've had that power. Would you have burned the city down?

title: The Iron Throne
Name: jon
text: jon I don't know.

title: The Iron Throne
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion Yes, you do. You won't say because you don't want to betray her but you know.

title: The Iron Throne
Name: jon
text: jon What's it matter what I'd do?

title: The Iron Throne
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion It matters more than anything. When she murdered the slavers of Astapor, I'm sure no one but the slavers complained. After all, they were evil men.

title: The Iron Throne
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion When she crucified hundreds of Meereenese nobles, who could argue? They were evil men. The Dothraki khals she burned alive? They would have done worse to her. Everywhere she goes, evil men die and we cheer her for it. And she grows more powerful and more sure that she is good and right. She believes her destiny is to build a better world for everyone. If you believed that if you truly believed it, wouldn't you kill whoever stood between you and paradise?

title: The Iron Throne
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion I know you love her. I love her too. Not as successfully as you. But I believed in her with all my heart. Love is more powerful than reason. We all know that. Look at my brother.

title: The Iron Throne
Name: jon
text: jon Love is the death of duty.

title: The Iron Throne
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion You just came up with that?

title: The Iron Throne
Name: jon
text: jon Maester Aemon said it a long time ago.

title: The Iron Throne
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion Sometimes duty is the death of love. You are the shield that guards the realms of men. And you've always tried to do the right thing. No matter the cost, you've tried to protect people. Who is the greatest threat to the people now?

title: The Iron Throne
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion It's a terrible thing I'm asking. It's also the right thing. Do you think I'm the last man she'll execute? Who is more dangerous than the rightful heir to the Iron Throne?

title: The Iron Throne
Name: jon
text: jon That's her decision. She is the queen.

title: The Iron Throne
Name: jon
text: jon I'm sorry it came to this.

title: The Iron Throne
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion And your sisters? Do you see them bending the knee?

title: The Iron Throne
Name: jon
text: jon My sisters will be loyal to the throne.

title: The Iron Throne
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion Why do you think Sansa told me the truth about you? Because she doesn't want Dany to be queen.

title: The Iron Throne
Name: jon
text: jon She doesn't get to choose.

title: The Iron Throne
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion No. But you do. And you have to choose now.

title: The Iron Throne
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys When I was a girl, my brother told me it was made with a thousand swords from Aegon's fallen enemies. What do a thousand swords look like in the mind of a little girl who can't count to twenty? I imagined a mountain of swords too high to climb. So many fallen enemies, you could only see the soles of Aegon's feet.

title: The Iron Throne
Name: jon
text: jon I saw them executing Lannister prisoners in the street. They said they were acting on your orders.

title: The Iron Throne
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys It was necessary.

title: The Iron Throne
Name: jon
text: jon Necessary? Have you been down there? Have you seen? Children, little children, burned!

title: The Iron Throne
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys I tried to make peace with Cersei. She used their innocence as a weapon against me. She thought it would cripple me.

title: The Iron Throne
Name: jon
text: jon And Tyrion?

title: The Iron Throne
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys He conspired behind my back with my enemies. How have you treated people who've done the same to you, even when it broke your heart?

title: The Iron Throne
Name: jon
text: jon Forgive him.

title: The Iron Throne
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys I can't.

title: The Iron Throne
Name: jon
text: jon You can. You can forgive all of them, make them see they made a mistake. Make them understand.

title: The Iron Throne
Name: jon
text: jon Please, Dany.

title: The Iron Throne
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys We can't hide behind small mercies. The world we need won't be built by men loyal to the world we have.

title: The Iron Throne
Name: jon
text: jon The world we need is a world of mercy. It has to be.

title: The Iron Throne
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys And it will be. It's not easy to see something that's never been before. A good world.

title: The Iron Throne
Name: jon
text: jon How do you know? How do you know it'll be good?

title: The Iron Throne
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys Because I know what is good. And so do you.

title: The Iron Throne
Name: jon
text: jon I don't.

title: The Iron Throne
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys You do. You do. You've always known.

title: The Iron Throne
Name: jon
text: jon What about everyone else? All the other people who think they know what's good.

title: The Iron Throne
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys They don't get to choose.

title: The Iron Throne
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys Be with me. Build the new world with me. This is our reason. It has been from the beginning, since you were a little boy with a bastardo s name and I was a little girl who couldn't count to twenty. We do it together. We break the wheel together.

title: The Iron Throne
Name: jon
text: jon You are my queen. Now, and always.

title: The Iron Throne
Name: sansa
text: sansa Where's Jon?

title: The Iron Throne
Name: grey
text: grey He is our prisoner.

title: The Iron Throne
Name: sansa
text: sansa So is Lord Tyrion. They were both to be brought to this gathering.

title: The Iron Throne
Name: grey
text: grey We will decide what we do with our prisoners. This is our city now.

title: The Iron Throne
Name: sansa
text: sansa If you look outside the walls of your city, you'll find thousands of Northmen who will explain to you why harming Jon Snow is not in your interest.

title: The Iron Throne
Name: grey
text: grey And you will find thousands of Unsullied who believe that it is.

title: The Iron Throne
Name: yara
text: yara Some of you may be quick to forgive. The Ironborn are not. I swore to follow Daenerys Targaryen.

title: The Iron Throne
Name: sansa
text: sansa You swore to follow a tyrant.

title: The Iron Throne
Name: yara
text: yara She freed us from a tyrant. Cersei is gone because of her, and Jon Snow put a knife in her heart. Let the Unsullied give him what he deserves.

title: The Iron Throne
Name: arya
text: arya Say another word about killing my brother and I'll cut your throat.

title: The Iron Throne
Name: davos
text: davos Friends, please. We've been cutting each other's throats long enough. Torgo Nudho. Am I saying that properly?

title: The Iron Throne
Name: davos
text: davos If it weren't for you and your men, we wouldo ve lost the war with the dead. This country owes you a debt it can never repay, but let us try. There is land in the Reach. Good land. The people that used to live there are gone. Make it your own. Start your own house with the Unsullied as your bannermen. We've had enough war. Thousands of you, thousands of them. You know how it ends. We need to find a better way.

title: The Iron Throne
Name: grey
text: grey We do not need payment. We need justice. Jon Snow cannot go free.

title: The Iron Throne
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion It's not for you to decide.

title: The Iron Throne
Name: grey
text: grey You are not here to speak! Everyone has heard enough words from you.

title: The Iron Throne
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion You're right. And no one's any better for it. But it's not for you to decide. Jon committed his crime here. His fate is for our king to decide. Or our queen.

title: The Iron Throne
Name: maester
text: maester We don't have a king or queen.

title: The Iron Throne
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion You're the most powerful people in Westeros. Choose one.

title: The Iron Throne
Name: grey
text: grey Make your choice, then.

title: The Iron Throne
Name: edmure
text: edmure My lords and ladies. I suppose this is the most important moment of our lives. What we decide today will reverberate through the annals of history. I stand before you as one of the senior lords in the country. A veteran of two wars. And I like to think my experience has led to some small skill in statecraft - and underst-

title: The Iron Throne
Name: sansa
text: sansa Uncle? Please sit.

title: The Iron Throne
Name: maester
text: maester Well, we have to choose someone.

title: The Iron Throne
Name: sam
text: sam Why just us?

title: The Iron Throne
Name: sam
text: sam Um- We represent all the great houses, but whomever we choose, they won't just rule over lords and ladies. Maybe the decision about what's best for everyone should be left to well, everyone.

title: The Iron Throne
Name: edmure
text: edmure Maybe we should give the dogs a vote as well.

title: The Iron Throne
Name: yohn
text: yohn I'll ask my horse.

title: The Iron Throne
Name: edmure
text: edmure I suppose you want the crown.

title: The Iron Throne
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion Me? The Imp?

title: The Iron Throne
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion Half the people hate me for serving Daenerys, the other half hate me for betraying her.

title: The Iron Throne
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion Can't think of a worse choice.

title: The Iron Throne
Name: davos
text: davos Who, then?

title: The Iron Throne
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion I've had nothing to do but think these past few weeks. About our bloody history. About the mistakes we've made.

title: The Iron Throne
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion What unites people? Armies? Gold? Flags? Stories. There's nothing in the world more powerful than a good story. Nothing can stop it. No enemy can defeat it. And who has a better story than Bran the Broken? The boy who fell from a high tower and lived. He knew he'd never walk again, so he learned to fly. He crossed beyond the Wall, a crippled boy, and became the Three-Eyed Raven. He is our memory, the keeper of all our stories. The wars, weddings, births, massacres, famines. Our triumphs... mm, our defeats, our past. Who better to lead us into the future?

title: The Iron Throne
Name: sansa
text: sansa Bran has no interest in ruling and he can't father children.

title: The Iron Throne
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion Good. Sons of kings can be cruel and stupid, as you well know. His will never torment us. That is the wheel our queen wanted to break.

title: The Iron Throne
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion From now on, rulers will not be born. They will be chosen on this spot by the lords and ladies of Westeros to serve the realm.

title: The Iron Throne
Name: tyrion
