text: tyrion I know you don't want it. I know you don't care about power. But I ask you now, if we choose you will you wear the crown? Will you lead the Seven Kingdoms to the best of your abilities from this day until your last day?

title: The Iron Throne
Name: bran
text: bran Why do you think I came all this way?

title: The Iron Throne
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion To Brandon of House Stark... I say aye.

title: The Iron Throne
Name: sam
text: sam Aye.

title: The Iron Throne
Name: edmure
text: edmure Aye.

title: The Iron Throne
Name: riverlands
text: riverlands Aye.

title: The Iron Throne
Name: yohn
text: yohn Aye.

title: The Iron Throne
Name: maester
text: maester Aye.

title: The Iron Throne
Name: robin
text: robin Aye.

title: The Iron Throne
Name: dornish
text: dornish Aye.

title: The Iron Throne
Name: yara
text: yara Aye.

title: The Iron Throne
Name: ironborn
text: ironborn Aye.

title: The Iron Throne
Name: vale
text: vale Aye.

title: The Iron Throne
Name: gendry
text: gendry Aye.

title: The Iron Throne
Name: davos
text: davos I'm not sure I get a vote, but aye.

title: The Iron Throne
Name: brienne
text: brienne Aye.

title: The Iron Throne
Name: sansa
text: sansa I love you, little brother. I always will. You'll be a good king. But tens of thousands of Northmen fell in the Great War defending all of Westeros. And those who survived have seen too much and fought too hard ever to kneel again. The North will remain an independent kingdom, as it was for thousands of years.

title: The Iron Throne
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion All hail Bran the Broken, First of His Name, King of the Andals and the First Men, Lord of the Six Kingdoms and Protector of the Realm.

title: The Iron Throne
Name: all
text: all All hail Bran the Broken!

title: The Iron Throne
Name: bran
text: bran Lord Tyrion, you will be my Hand.

title: The Iron Throne
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion N- No, Your Grace, I don't want it.

title: The Iron Throne
Name: bran
text: bran And I don't want to be king.

title: The Iron Throne
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion I don't deserve it. I thought I was wise, but I wasn't. I thought I knew what was right, but I didn't. Choose Ser Davos. Choose anyone else.

title: The Iron Throne
Name: bran
text: bran I choose you.

title: The Iron Throne
Name: grey
text: grey You cannot.

title: The Iron Throne
Name: bran
text: bran Yes, I can. I'm king.

title: The Iron Throne
Name: grey
text: grey This man is a criminal. He deserves justice.

title: The Iron Throne
Name: bran
text: bran He just got it. He's made many terrible mistakes. He's going to spend the rest of his life fixing them.

title: The Iron Throne
Name: grey
text: grey It is not enough.

title: The Iron Throne
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion Giving you to the Unsullied would start a war. Letting you walk free would start a war. So our new king has chosen to send you to the Night's Watch.

title: The Iron Throne
Name: jon
text: jon There's still a Night's Watch?

title: The Iron Throne
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion The world will always need a home for bastards and broken men.

title: The Iron Throne
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion You shall take no wife, hold no lands, father no children. The Unsullied wanted your head of course, but Grey Worm has accepted the justice of a life sentence. Sansa and Arya wanted you freed, but they understand our new king needs to make peace. No one is very happy. Which means it's a good compromise, I suppose.

title: The Iron Throne
Name: jon
text: jon Was it right? What I did?

title: The Iron Throne
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion What we did.

title: The Iron Throne
Name: jon
text: jon It doesn't feel right.

title: The Iron Throne
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion Ask me again in ten years.

title: The Iron Throne
Name: jon
text: jon I don't expect we'll ever see each other again.

title: The Iron Throne
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion I wouldn't be so sure. A few years as Hand of the King would make anyone want to piss off the edge of the world.

title: The Iron Throne
Name: unsullied
text: unsullied All the men have boarded.

title: The Iron Throne
Name: grey
text: grey Good. We sail for the isle of Naath.

title: The Iron Throne
Name: sansa
text: sansa I wish there had been another way. Can you forgive me?

title: The Iron Throne
Name: jon
text: jon The North is free, thanks to you.

title: The Iron Throne
Name: sansa
text: sansa But they lost their king.

title: The Iron Throne
Name: jon
text: jon Ned Stark's daughter will speak for them. She's the best they could ask for.

title: The Iron Throne
Name: jon
text: jon You can come see me, you know, at Castle Black.

title: The Iron Throne
Name: arya
text: arya I can't.

title: The Iron Throne
Name: jon
text: jon You think anyone will dare tell you women aren't allowed?

title: The Iron Throne
Name: arya
text: arya I'm not going back north.

title: The Iron Throne
Name: sansa
text: sansa Where are you going?

title: The Iron Throne
Name: arya
text: arya What's west of Westeros?

title: The Iron Throne
Name: arya
text: arya No one knows. It's where all the maps stop. That's where I'm going.

title: The Iron Throne
Name: jon
text: jon You have your Needle?

title: The Iron Throne
Name: arya
text: arya Right here.

title: The Iron Throne
Name: jon
text: jon Your Grace.

title: The Iron Throne
Name: jon
text: jon I'm sorry I wasn't there when you needed me.

title: The Iron Throne
Name: bran
text: bran You were exactly where you were supposed to be.

title: The Iron Throne
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion That's not- Uh-

title: The Iron Throne
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion What's this?

title: The Iron Throne
Name: sam
text: sam A Song of Ice and Fire. Archmaester Ebrose's history of the wars following the death of King Robert. I helped him with the title.

title: The Iron Throne
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion I suppose I come in for some heavy criticism.

title: The Iron Throne
Name: sam
text: sam Oh, I wouldn't say that.

title: The Iron Throne
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion Oh, he's kind to me. Never wouldo ve guessed.

title: The Iron Throne
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion He's not kind?

title: The Iron Throne
Name: sam
text: sam He-

title: The Iron Throne
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion He what? What does he say about me?

title: The Iron Throne
Name: sam
text: sam I don't believe you're mentioned, ahem.

title: The Iron Throne
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion Your Grace.

title: The Iron Throne
Name: davos
text: davos Your Grace.

title: The Iron Throne
Name: bronn
text: bronn Your Grace.

title: The Iron Throne
Name: sam
text: sam Your Grace.

title: The Iron Throne
Name: bran
text: bran We appear to be missing a Master of Whisperers. And a Master of Laws. And a Master of War.

title: The Iron Throne
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion Yes, Your Grace. Suitable prospects will be brought to you for an audience in the coming weeks.

title: The Iron Throne
Name: bran
text: bran And Drogon? Any word?

title: The Iron Throne
Name: sam
text: sam He was last spotted flying east, toward-

title: The Iron Throne
Name: bronn
text: bronn The farther away, the better.

title: The Iron Throne
Name: bran
text: bran Perhaps I can find him. Do carry on with the rest.

title: The Iron Throne
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion As you wish, Your Grace.

title: The Iron Throne
Name: brienne
text: brienne Ser Podrick.

title: The Iron Throne
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion We serve at your pleasure, King Bran the Broken, ruler of the Six Kingdoms and Protector of the Realm. Long may he reign.

title: The Iron Throne
Name: sam
text: sam Long may he reign.

title: The Iron Throne
Name: davos
text: davos Long may he reign.

title: The Iron Throne
Name: brienne
text: brienne Long may he reign.

title: The Iron Throne
Name: bronn
text: bronn Long may he reign.

title: The Iron Throne
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion That will improve.

title: The Iron Throne
Name: bran
text: bran I'm sure it will.

title: The Iron Throne
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion Ser Bronn of the Blackwater, Lord of Highgarden, Lord Paramount of the Reach and Master of Coin, would you say the crown's debt to you has been paid?

title: The Iron Throne
Name: bronn
text: bronn In full, my lord Hand.

title: The Iron Throne
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion Good. Time to start incurring a new one. We have hungry people to feed. Can we expect some assistance in this regard?

title: The Iron Throne
Name: bronn
text: bronn Indeed we can.

title: The Iron Throne
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion Lord Davos, we have an armada to rebuild and ports to repair.

title: The Iron Throne
Name: davos
text: davos We have. These projects will begin as soon as the Master of Coin and Lord of Lofty Titles provides funding.

title: The Iron Throne
Name: bronn
text: bronn The Master of Coin looks forward to helping the Master of Ships, but first he has to ensure we're not wasting coin, or soon there won't be no more coin.

title: The Iron Throne
Name: davos
text: davos Any more.

title: The Iron Throne
Name: bronn
text: bronn You Master of Grammar now too?

title: The Iron Throne
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion Grandmaester, ahem, it is my theory, based on my years of work on the Casterly Rock sewers, that clean water leads to a healthier population.

title: The Iron Throne
Name: sam
text: sam The Archmaester has done some research on this subject and it turns out-

title: The Iron Throne
Name: bronn
text: bronn The strong live and the weak don't.

title: The Iron Throne
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion Find the best builders and set them to the task.

title: The Iron Throne
Name: bronn
text: bronn Oh, speaking of builders, all the best brothels burned down. The Master of Coin is willing to fund reconstruction.

title: The Iron Throne
Name: sam
text: sam Uh... the Archmaester is less than enthusiastic about the salutary effects of brothels.

title: The Iron Throne
Name: bronn
text: bronn Well, I imagine he isn't using them properly.

title: The Iron Throne
Name: brienne
text: brienne I think we can all agree that ships take precedence over brothels.

title: The Iron Throne
Name: bronn
text: bronn I think that's a very presumptuous statement.

title: The Iron Throne
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion I once brought a jackass and a honeycomb into a brothel.

title: The Iron Throne
Name: man
text: man The Queen in the North!

title: The Iron Throne
Name: all
text: all The Queen in the North! The Queen in the North! The Queen in the North! The Queen in the North! The Queen in the North!
